11.title: Tv Show

1111.content: Puck has always been a big guy, but he's about to get start getting bigger. Question is - how will McKinley's resident mohawked, sex-shark start beefing up?
1111.title: Noah "Puck" Puckerman.

choices: Take a risk and drop Puck off at one of the other Glee member's houses
11113.content:
Puck was tired of it, always playing second fiddle to everyone else. Yeah he was a stud with an awesome body and very experienced, but he couldn't seem to get anyone to stay with him. Even the desperate moms who needed a younger touch were shying away from him these days and his power in school has gone from high to none. Santana his once former come to girl was out in the open with her feelings for Brittany (he was glad for her but now he was left high and dry), Rachel was back with Finn who seemed to have a brain transplant and for once seemed to have something of a mind of his own. Finn was still rather stupid but Puck swore Finn was smarter than before. Quinn was insane and there was no way he was going to go near that crazy bitch again. And Shelby...he had genuinely thought he was in love. He had been and it killed him Shelby didn't want him anymore. It wasn't the sex that was the problem, he drove her wild and even she admitted he was the best, but apparently she was feeling guilty or something for 'taking advantage' of him or some such shit because she was lonely and the father of her adopted kid. That was absurd, especially considering he was the father of her kid. He wasn't a kid anymore and he would have made an awesome dad. He had made an awesome dad before Shelby decided to cut him out. They were still settling over the issue although Puck refused to talk to her anymore about anything other than caring for Beth.

He didn't get it. What was wrong with him that although he was good for a quickie he was not good enough for an actual commitment? Rachel, Lauren, Shelby, Quinn, Santana, even the randoms wanted nothing to do with him anymore. He had ruined his friendship with Finn back in Sophmore year over the whole Quinn thing and although they were still friends, they weren't as close as they used to be. Rachel used to be his friend until she got all buddy buddy with Kurt and then the whole election thing and going insane trying to get into New York. Perfect Blaine was stealing the spotlight as Finn's second, and they managed to apparently find Sam and bring him back from some stripper club and so even Sam was stealing the spotlight from him because he was one of the most ripped people at McKinnley and Puck pretended not to hear them being compared. Even the Irish kid who Puck could barely understand with that ridiculously thick accent was more popular than him nowadays. How had he come so low? Not Jacob Ben Israel low, but low enough. Possibly worse because it was almost like he was invisible nowadays other than someone scolding him.

Puck admitted it, he was lonely. That's how he ended up in some bar he never been in before after driving around randomly and feeling in the mood for some random pickup. He was just getting a drink when who should come and sit next to him but...

"Karofsky?" Puck said, shocked. He hadn't seen Dave Karofsky in a while, not since prom. The sad thing was, he was so happy to be noticed for once by someone familiar, even Karofsky, that he wanted to sing.

"Hi Puck, what you're doing here?" Dave asked. Puck looked at him and noticed the sweaty football uniform and cleaned up, Karofsky looked pretty chill. He didn't have that scowl he always seemed to have at school. If anything, he seemed...happy.

"What's it look like? I'm getting a drink," Puck said, looking away.
"I'm just surprised you'd be in a gay bar." Karofsky said. Puck looked at him startled.
"Gay bar? This is a gay bar?"
"Uh, yeah." Dave said and Puck looks around closer. Those guys on the dance floor were awfully close and...oh.
"Well, that's something you don't see everyday, at least I don't," Puck said. He drained the last sip of his drink and ordered another one.
"Let me get that for you," Dave says and Puck doesn't argue. If Karofsky wants to give him free drinks, he'll take them. Karofsky owes a lot of drinks.

"So what's on your mind anyways?" Dave asks and Puck giggles a bit. He and Dave had been making small talk and learning things about each other and by around drink four and five, Puck thought Dave was the best guy in the world. 'He's a better friend than Finn and actually listens to me' Puck thought. The alcohol had done its job loosening his tongue and mind and he found himself spilling everything, how lonely he felt, how no one seemed to notice or care about him anymore, how he had been replaced, and used and thrown out.

"And Shelby...I loved her, you know? And I was a good father, took care of my family but what did it get me? Zilch!" Puck was angrily berating Shelby and Dave listend to him carry on. After being kicked out of McKinnley and accepting that he was in fact completely gay, Dave became a very good listener. He spent more time on his studies, improved his grades, and actually made friends. He listened as Puck cursed her for a bit longer and then hugged him as Puck burst into tears.

"I miss them and everyone hates me," he said sobbing. "I'm nothing and nobody and here I am crying in the arms of one of McKinnley's greatest douchebags who threatened Kurt's life".

"I'm sorry about that," Karofsky said. "I have sorely regretted that most of all. But it'll all be okay, you'll see." Puck sobbed more.
"How do you know?"
"I don't, but if I can do it, someone who as you pointed out isn't deserving in the slightest, then you will too. You're one of the strongest guys I know. Stronger than Finn Hudson, that ladylips Sam even though he does have a nice ass, and even Kurt."

"You really think so?"
"Yes." Puck got up bobbing his head.
"I guess, thanks for this. I got to go home now though." He walked and stumbled a little and Dave rushed over.
"Can't let you do that. I'm driving." Puck seemed barely conscious as they walked and Dave was worried until he saw it was just normal exhaustion, and who wouldn't be? Helping Puck in, he was glad he didn't let Puck go off alone. He wouldn't have been able to drive in this state. Dave was sitting there for a moment before he realized he didn't know what Puck's address even was. They hadn't been the best of friends in High School.

"Dang, that's a problem." Dave rubbed his head, trying to think. Should he take Puck to his house or to one of the other loser's...er, gleek's houses? Karofsky was fine taking him home to his house but Puck might not be. On the other hand, he couldn't imagine any of the glee kids being thrilled to see him, especially of he brought a passed out Puck to them.
11113.title: Drinking Buddy

choices: Let Puck think things over to make sure this is what he wants.
111131.content:
Sunlight streamed in through a crack in the curtains and landed directly on Puck's eyes, forcing him to sit up. He was still a tad disorientated and his head was pounding like crazy, "Uuuuuugh... Why did I drink so much last night?" Once Puck had rubbed the sleep from his eyes, he looked around and realized he had no idea where he was. The living room was large and cozy, with an extremely warm fire burning in the brick fireplace. The TV was on, with the local Lima news, but Puck didn't care about that - he was being drawn towards the amazing smell coming from the kitchen.

As Puck entered through the doorway that separated the kitchen from the living room, he let out a loud "OUF" as he collided with something solid, but soft. He felt two big hands grab him from both sides and steady him out, "Easy there, Puckerman. You almost knocked me over." Once Puck was steady, he realized the thing he ran into was Karofsky. He took a step back and rubbed his head, "Uuugh.. Sorry about that. So... This is your house?"

Dave smiled, "Yeah. I was going to take you home last night, but, I don't know where you live. I could have dropped you off at Kurt's house, but I'm not exactly on good terms with Hudson." Puck blinked, "You know where Kurt lives?" "Yeah, we're pretty good friends now.", Dave said, "All those incidents from McKinley are behind us now so we hang out every now and then." Puck was about to bring up a question about how Blaine felt about that, but a loud commercial from the TV decided it wanted to make Puck's head throb even more than before.

Dave grabbed the remote and turned the TV off, "Sorry about that, I like to listen to the TV while I cook. It keeps me entertained. Speaking of food, lets eat before it gets cold." Dave headed back into the kitchen and Puck followed, still rubbing the side of his head. Puck was surprised by how much food Dave had made: there was a massive stack of pancakes in the middle of the table, a big plate of scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrowns, and biscuits, and it all smelled AMAZING. Puck's stomach growled from the smell of it and Dave chuckled, "Dig in. I made enough for two."

Puck stared at Dave, "Enough for two? There's enough for four people here!" Dave laughed as he loaded up his plate with food, "What can I say? I'm a big guy with a big appetite." Puck watched Dave piling on food to his plate and he realized something; Dave WAS a big guy. In fact, he was bigger than he was at McKinley. Dave stood at at least 6'3 with super wide shoulders, thick muscular arms, and a bigger stomach than he used to have, all of which were tucked away under his winter thermal. Puck was actually scared to imagine what it would be like to be tackled by Dave in a football game.

"Dude, eat up. trust me. Food like this is one of the best ways to get rid a hangover." Dave said, before shoveling in a huge bite of his pancakes. Puck sat down and still wanted to ask Dave a few questions, but if eating would get rid of this hangover, than damn it he's eating. Puck filled his plate with as much food as he thought he could eat (not touching the bacon or sausage because of his religion) and just started chowing down, and it was was so good he couldn't stop. Puck had never had pancakes as fluffy as these, or such delicious hashbrowns eggs, or biscuits. After cleaning his plate clean, Puck went back for seconds and inhaled that too, leaving the rest for Dave.

Once it was all gone, Puck sat back in his char and grunted loudly, completely stuffed. He had never eaten that much food before and looked down, amazed to see his stomach was bloated. Dave leaned back also, patting and rubbing his bigger, solid stomach, "That was - UUURP- so good." Puck was amazed by Dave's massive figure across from him, and he had to ask, "So... How did you get so big?" Dave smiled and patted his belly, "Football. Coach wanted us to beef up this season so I've been lifting and eating non-stop."

"But what about your figure? Don't you care what girls thi- .. I mean -don't you care what other guys think of you being so big?" Dave chuckled, "Puckerman, I'm a bear cub. I'm SUPPOSED to be big and burly." " A what?", Puck asked.

"A bear cub - it's a gay term."
"Oh... then what would you call Kurt and Blaine?"
"Kurt is a twink and Anderson is an otter."
"I'm not even gonna ask."

"But yeah, I beefed up for football, and to be honest, I really love it. I feel so big and powerful." Dave said, flexing one of his massive biceps. Puck was amazed by the sheer size of them, of Dave in general, and then that's when it hit him. He's been feeling like a outcast for the longest time and what he needed was a friend - someone who was also an outcast. What he needed was to feel big and powerful, like his old self, like how Dave feels now. What he needed was a body and a friend like Dave.

"Hey, Karofsky. You remember all that stuff I told you yesterday?" Dave nodded and Puck continued, "Well... I think if I started getting bulky like you are, I'd start to feel better about myself. Y'know, raise my self-esteem and stuff. Could you help?"

Dave decides to..
111131.title: Breakfast at The Karofsky's.

1111312.content:
"Sure I will help you," Dave said. "But only if you're absolutely sure it's what you want. You're kind of an impulsive guy Puckerman and rush into things without thinking things through. If you spend a couple days thinking about it and still want to, I'll be glad to help you. Here, add in my cell which is 303-244-1220. I don't want to accidentally crush your phone." After looking at Dave's massive paws again, Puck had to agree and adds it.

"You've really changed," Puck said, still somewhat astonished by this fact
.
"Yeah, I know I had been terrible with your Glee club friends, Kurt in particular. Call it what you well, repression, latent homosexuality crisis, whatever but I had been a ticking time bomb. I guess getting expelled and away from my former friends was one of the best things that could happen to me. If I stayed I would have possibly actually done something which scares me now to think about it. I was really messed up. But after the anti-bullying club and finding new friends and people who accepted me, I don't feel like such a freak all the time and take it out on other people."

"That's good." Puck said not quite sure what to say. "Kurt forgave you?" Puck find it hard to belive. If it was him, he would never have forgiven Karofsky. On the other hand, it was Kurt and Dave was a much different person from who he had been. Puck found himself liking the new Dave, not to mention Dave cooked very well. He could still taste breakfast. Rubbing his bloated belly, he burped again manfully which caused Dave to grin.

"Yeah, Kurt forgave me. By the way, nice one." Puck shrugged his shoulders modestly, blushing a little.
"Thanks for breakfast, it was really good."
"Not a problem. If you ever want more..."
"Yeah, you bet I will. But for now, I guess I should leave. Have to go pick up my car where I left it last night." Dave drove Puck to the bar.
"I hope to see you again sometime," Dave said.
"I never thought I would say this, but me too. You're pretty cool Karofsky." Puck said.
"Please, call me Dave. Karofsky makes it sound almost like we're still enemies and I hope we aren't those anymore."
"No, we're not." Puck said smiling.
"Glad to hear it. If you're still interested, I would love to help you. You'd look really hot, even more than you do now if you started bulking up. But I want to make sure its what you want."

"Don't worry, I'll know soon," Puck promised and he watched as Dave drove away. A minute or two after Dave left, he shrugged and went to his car, driving home.

Puck did spend time thinking about it, wondering what it would be like. He drew up the pros and cons into a list and he fantasized being beefier, his biceps even bigger and his pecs and legs even more impressive. So strong and powerful, like Dave. Probably not as big because Dave was a wooly mammoth of a dude or as he put it, a bear and that was a pretty apt description, but Puck wouldn't mind it. Unlike most people, abs to him were secondary and although he had them, they weren't as cut as Sam's or Mike's. While he enjoyed having them, his favorites were the guns and chest and Dave had those. A big belly as well and even bigger than before, but it only further made Dave look manly and kick-ass awesome. Dave had always acted confident but now he truly was and grown into himself. Nobody messed with Dave if they were smart and he had calmed down enough to mostly ignore them if they were being stupid. If Puck got bigger, he'd be more respected and people would like him again. He also remembered the sensation of being stuffed and had enjoyed it. He thought about it a lot as well. What it would be like with a big rounded stuffed hard belly. Not soft and weak, but with solid muscle beneath. Puck thought it manly.

It only took a few days before he was settled for it. After putting up with Shane, Sam, and Finn in football, constantly being picked over in Glee by Blaine, Finn, Sam, even Irish Rory, and be insulted by Santanna, reminded again by Quinn he was just a 'Lima loser' (man, she had been in a bitchy mood), Shelby telling him again it was a mistake and he was just a kid, and being part of the background otherwise, he was more decided than ever to stick out.He liked the self-confidence and power, and he remembered the immense strength of Dave's that put them all to shame. Dave might have even been bigger than Coach Beiste although Puck wasn't sure on that. He wanted that and he was going to do whatever it took to got it. Besides, he wondered what sex would be like as a beefy stud and he was experienced enough to know that it wasn't always appearance but the way you do it (although his appearance was very good looking). He called the number.

"Hey Dave," Puck said,
"Hey Puck!" Dave said excited.
"I've been thinking about it as you told me to. And I want it. I need the self-confidence and power from being bigger and stronger. I'm falling apart otherwise. So please help?"
"Okay, I'll help you."
"I was thinking we could start soon." Puck said.
"Okay, how bout over dinner. I'm free tonight," Dave said.
"That will be good thanks. I'm glad I have a friend like you.
"Glad to be of assistance. I feel the same way. Where do you want to go?"
1111312.title: Let Puck think things over to make sure this is...

choices: Puck manages to eat it all and wants dessert
11113122.content:
"I was kind of wondering if I could come over to your house to eat? I've been craving your cooking since that day we had breakfast. If that's all right..." Puck asked, hoping.
"Of course, that's fine!! I've been cooking a pot roast since this morning for my Dad but he decided to go out with some friends. You can come over now and we'll eat." The two hung up and Puck pushed himself off his bed and threw on his thermal, jacket, and mohawked beanie before jumping into his car and driving over to Dave's house. Puck had never bothered to learn where Dave had lived before, but he was surprised to know it was only a twenty minute drive from his house. Puck pulled his truck into Dave's driveway and hurried to the door, shoving his hands in his pockets because of the cold.

Puck knocked and waited a bit before Dave pulled the door open, "Hey, Puck. Dude, you look frozen, you better get inside." "Thanks, man." Puck said as he walked past Dave into the amazingly warm house, "Man, this place is really warm." Dave shut the door and laughed, "Yeah. I can't stand the cold so I usually have either the heater or the fireplace working." Puck smirked, "It's winter, shouldn't you be hibernating?" Dave laughed and slapped Puck on the back, almost knocking the poor guy over, "Good one. The food is already done so let's eat!! I'm actually kind of excited to help.”

Puck followed Dave into the kitchen and took a seat at the table across from where Dave was going to sit. As they made small talk while Dave loaded up Puck’s plate, Puck caught himself staring at Dave’s insanely wide back. Puck’s still couldn’t believe that Dave had gotten to be so huge. His imagination started to wander as he began to think of himself getting as big as Dave soon - a thought that simply made Puck feel incredibly excited.

It wasn’t until Dave set down his plate that made Puck realize he was daydreaming, “OH. Thanks, Dave.” Puck said before looking down at his plate. Never in his life had Puck seen a plate so full of mashed potatoes and roast beef that it almost made his stomach want to run away. He looked up at Dave, who was already digging into his equally massive plate, and sighed; If he was gonna bulk up, he needed to start eating like Dave did.
11113122.title: Puck's First Heavy Meal

choices: Make something for them to eat later
111131222.content:
Puck was both horrified and excited by the amount of food on a plate. The smell was tantilizingly delicious and if it was going to taste as good as it smelled and was like breakfast, this was going to be awesome. There was no other way to describe it. The amount however was intimidating. Dave seemed comfortable with it and making surprisingly speedy progress, but Dave was a bear and this was a bear sized portion. No wonder Dave had grown so quickly, coupled with working out if he ate like this on a regular basis. Sticking his (rather large, meant for Dave sized fingers) spoon into the mashed potatoes, he scooped it up and took a bite and was both astounded but not astonished by the excellent taste. It was perfectly creamed, not to wet but not unsmashed, with a very good consistent quality throughout and damn him if they weren't the best mashed potatoes he ever tasted.

"Fuck man, seriously, where did you learn to cook like this?" Puck asked between bites of potatoes he was shoveling in, Dave, Puck noticed, was almost halfway done with the first plate already. Holy crap, that was fast. Dave slowed down for a moment.

"You like them?" He asked and Puck stared at him in shock.
"Are you f-ing serious? These are the best damn mashed potatoes I have ever had." Puck was surprised when Dave blushed a little.
"Oh, uh, thank you. Glad to know. I learned from my grandmother. She used to be a chef at fine restaurants. Her food is always better but she says I'm not too bad at it."
"Well, that's an understatement. I think you're fantastic." Puck said proudly. Dave smiled at the compliment.
"Thanks Puck, glad you think so. When I was younger, I used to hate people knowing I knew how to cook. I never told anyone. You're the first outside my family to know. My friends...former friends, thought it was gay for a dude to know how to cook. And you know how openly gay people are treated in this town."

"All too well. But if you think about it, the fact that you know how to cook, although surprising, doesn't mean you'd be gay. Well, you are, but not for knowing how to cook." Puck shook his head. "If people knew what they were missing out on...oh man. And looking at you, no one would accuse you of being different if you wore an apron and started cooking. I always heard it said never trust a skinny cook." Dave looked confused at that.

"Really? Why's that?" Puck shrugged.
"I don't know, I think it's because anyone who can cook well will also have to enjoy eating to know what good food is. If a cook is skinny, clearly they aren't eating good food and either they must actually suck at it or there is something wrong with them. They might be planning something fishy, stuff like that."

"Hmm, makes sense." Dave ate the last bits of mashed potatoes and pot roast and eyed Puck's plate.
"Aren't you hungry?"
"Yeah, but I don't eat as fast as you. Most people wouldn't have at this amount. Plus, I've been talking." Puck shoveled in some more mashed potatoes and groaned against the taste.

"And oh heavens above, these are fucking awesome." Dave went and got himself more while Puck was still working through the first plate.

Puck realized he had a problem when he finally got through the creamy mountain. It was more filling than he realized at first and he was getting kind of full. He was also completely sober and not drunk enough to push the feeling aside and also feeling kind of sleepy, sitting in a warm cozy room with a blazing fireplace and a full belly. Yawning, Puck shook himself a little.

"Hey Dave?" he asked.
"Yeah?"
"Can you help me stay awake? Least until I finish?" Dave shrugged.
"Uh...sure. What should I do?"
"I don't know, talk or something. Rub my stomach, anything you want. Just do something to keep me awake." Dave's eyebrows rose and Puck mentally slapped himself.
"Rub your stomach?" Dave asked and Puck just shrugged seeing as he couldn't take it back now.
"Sure, if you want. I wouldn't mind. It would help in digestion and I am feeling kind of full but I'm not done eating yet." Dave smiled.
"Oh, okay. I'm glad you like my food."
"Yeah, I'm glad to be eating it." Puck said and Dave grinned.
"This is fun. I wish you had been my best friend instead of Azimo and the rest." Puck nodded in agreement to that.
"Yeah, now get over here before this turns any more sappy and we turn into a couple of girls." Dave grinned.
"Aye captain." Standing up, Dave took his plate to the sink and then moved his seat next to Puck's. Puck took a few more bites while waitng and then to Dave's amazement, removed his shirt.

"Wha..what are you doing?" Dave asked shocked.
"It's getting really warm in here and I'd stay awake easier like this."

"Oh...okay," Dave bit the inside of his mouth. He had taken peeks of Noah changing in the Locker room before (Hey, he couldn't help it if Puck was one of the most gorgeous bodies he had ever seen and it was a guy's locker room so he had an excuse) but never had Puck done it so flauntingly, or maybe it just felt that way. His stomach was a bit bloated from the mashed potatoes but Dave enjoyed the sight, actually thought it made Puck even more yummy. Laying his thick hands carefully on it, he rubbed softly and Puck moaned. Taken aback, he stopped.

"What are you doing? That felt amazing, don't stop," Puck demanded and Dave obliged. Holding his head down low and thanking that Puck couldn't see it, he blushed as he continued rubbing, loving the feeling of rubbing it. Puck continued eating the meat and made occasional comments to Dave or just intermittently moaned when Dave did something particularly good. Soon the plate was empty and Puck belched loudly as he relaxed back against the seat.

"Uuuuurrrrrppp. Oh man, that was good. I feel stuffed." Puck reached down and rubbed his stomach himself. "Thanks for the meal and helping."
"My pleasure," Dave said amicably. Puck burped again.
"You wouldn't mind if I took a short nap do you? I'm feeling pretty tired." Dave backed off.
"Oh no, not at all. Mi casu es su casa. My house is your house." Yawning, Puck leaned against the velvet chair.
"You're a really great friend." With that, Puck fell asleep and started snoring lightly. Dave blinked at the suddenness of it.
"Oh, wow, that was fast."
111131222.title: An exhausting meal

choices: Wide awake from his nap, ready to eat.
1111312221.content:
Dave sat there for a few minutes just watching Puck sleep in a bloated bliss. It could have been taken as creepy, but Dave couldn't help it, nor did he care. He could already feel himself falling for Puck, and the fact that Puck wanted to be massive like him just made him fall farther. Dave put both of his large, thick hands Puck's bloated belly and rubbed softly, watching as a sleepy smile spread across Puck's face. Dave sighed and pulled back, taking Puck's plate and putting it in the sink with his. He cleaned up the kitchen and put the leftover pot roast and potatoes in the fridge.

With the kitchen clean, Dave crossed his thick arms and thought out loud, "Puck might not sleep that long and he'll probably be hungry when he wakes up. I should make him something.." Dave started to search through the fridge, mulling over the ingredients he had, "I don't have enough for a pie.. and a cake would take too long." Dave opened up the freezer and he smiled, "Bingo! Sundae it is!!" Dave pulled the massive tub of vanilla and hot fudge swirl ice cream out of the freezer and opened it up. He opened the utensil draw and pulled out a spoon out, scooping out a big bite of the ice cream and eating it happily. Dave, ever the glutton, couldn't help himself and just dug in, not realizing he was eating a large amount of the ice cream. By the time Dave was able to stop himself, he had eaten half of the gallon and his own big stomach was rock solid and cold from the ice cream. Dave chuckled and patted his bear belly, which made a distinct "thump" each time. He had a feeling that Puck wasn't the only one who would be getting bigger during this.

With half of the ice cream container empty, Dave decided not to bother with a bowl, and pulled out all of the ingredients out of the fridge for Puck's sundae. He opened the brand new bottle of whipped cream and covered the entire top of the ice cream in it, squirting a gracious amount into his own mouth before putting it away and grabbing the chocolate syrup. Dave drenched the sundae is chocolate syrup before pouring some into his mouth, accidentally spilling some on his white shirt. "Damn it." Dave said, pulling off his shirt and taking it into the garage to get rid of the stain. He came back, opting to go shirtless, and finished the sundae for Puck by throwing on some caramel sauce as well(and sneaking some for himself of course. Dave picked up the half gallon of ice cream sundae and went back to the table where Puck was...
1111312221.title: Puck's gigantic sundae.

choices: Puck and Dave finish the Icecream, most of it eaten by Puck
Puck and Dave finish the Icecream, most of it eaten by Dave
11113122211.content:
Puck was still asleep when Dave got back and he set the sundae down. The sight of Puck sleeping was really adorable since he was all cute and child-like. Dave sat across from him and started rubbing Puck's bloated belly again although it was less bloated than earlier. Puck made a cute moan and snuggled closer against Dave's hand and Dave grinned. Puck was adorable and the furthest thing from bad-ass as he could possibly be at this moment. Puck didn't seem to like it but Dave enjoyed the cute cuddling Puck as much as bad-ass awesome Puck and the other various sides. Dave continued rubbing Puck's belly soothing it and suddenly there was a fluttering as Puck's eyes opened.

"Huh, Dave, is that you?
"Yeah it's me." Puck blinked sleepily.
"I am having the weirdest dream. In my dream I was at your house eating food and then somehow we ended up shirtless and you're rubbing my stomach."
"No, this is real."
"Really? Did we do anything?" Puck made some gestures that made Dave blush and he shook his head.
"Ah no, you just fell asleep, rather cutely I might add."

"Cute, Puckasauraus ain't cute, he's bad-ass" Puck said, which made Dave giggle because it was cute how Puck tries to not be cute but bad-ass, especially since he still had a sleepy expression on his face.

"Hey, why are you shirtless anyways? You weren't before." Dave notices Puck subtly examining him and he grins as he flexes a bit, his massive biceps bulging. The brief look on Puck's face was priceless, all stunned and very desirous. Puck recovered quickly and made it seem like he hadn't just been totally checking Dave out.

"Nice chest hair," Puck said, looking at the thicker dark hair on Dave's pecs and continued downwards. "You are a bear."
"Do you...do you mind?" Dave asked. He thought it was awesome but not everybody thought so and he wanted to know Puck's thoughts on it.
"While normally I wouldn't find it attractive, it suits you because you're a bear and you wouldn't be as awesome without it." Puck blushed.
"Oh god, I had a Brittany moment. I mean 'you're a bear and you wouldn't be as awesome without it'? I sound freaking retarded."
"No, it's okay, I like it," Dave said.
"I am amazed you can't stand the cold. I mean, I think your thick pelt would have kept you warm," Puck said, only half-joking. Dave rolled his eyes.
"Haha, very funny. But I don't know, I am just sensitive to it or something more than most people."
"Hmm," Puck said. "Is it just me or are you bigger or something?" Dave grinned as he slapped his hard belly making a thick thumping sound.

"Hah, you are observant. I had a wee bit of icecream." Puck scoffed.
"A wee bit? I'm fairly sure it was more than a 'wee bit'."
"You're right, just a little more than a wee bit." Dave said grinning. Puck scooted closer to Dave and put his hands on Dave's stomach.
"What are you doing?" Dave asked, shocked and excited. Puck was touching him...

"Reciprocating. You helped me and I'll help you. It wouldn't be very nice to have you do such nice things for me and not pay you back in return." Well, Dave was a bit disappointed to hear that but it did make sense. And no way was he turning this down. Puck used both hands on Dave's massive gut as he rubbed it, Dave sighing at the touch. Puckerman was disturbingly good at it and it felt amazing those talented hands. He tried to not think where Puck learned it because he didn't want to throw up but wow, Puck was good. No wonder people loved him, or at least had. Dave relaxed against the couch as Puck continued massaging when a massive rumble built up and exploded.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP." Dave's face was bright red when it happened, completely embarassed. Fucking hell he couldn't believe it. Puck just laughed, his mouth cracking into a beautiful smile.

"That's freaking awesome. You're such a beast," Puck said giggling as he resumed rubbing. Dave just blushed harder. After a few more moments, Puck stopped.
"Hey, what's that?" he asked pointing at the big bowl of icecream sitting there, having only just noticed it.
"Uh, I made you a sundae while you were asleep. I couldn't resist having icecream as well but this one is yours." Puck looked doubtfully at it.
"I don't know if I can eat all that, especially after that last meal."

"I'll help you," Dave said. Honestly, he wasn't sure how much he could eat either as he was pretty full himself but if it encouraged Puck, he'll gladly do it. "And if you get too full, I'll help feed you as well." Puck looked at it then at Dave then shrugged. Picking up two spoons he handed one to Dave and kept the other. He looked at it a few more moments before digging in.
11113122211.title: Bears and Cream

choices: They wake up late that night and have a midnight snack.
They wake up the next morning and Dave makes breakfast.
111131222111.content:
Dave picked up the remote for the TV and started flipping through the channels, trying to find something for them to watch while they ate. He finally settled on a pretty funny movie that he enjoyed before digging into the ice cream with his best friend. Dave ate slowly, because his stomach was already bloated and hard from his ice cream binge before and didn't want to get sick. However, Puck was going in a completely opposite direction - despite the huge meal he had eaten earlier, Puck was devouring the mountainous sundae in front of him. Dave watched, amazed at how much Puck was eating. Dave kept at his slower pace, eating one bite for every three that Puck did.

After a couple of minutes, Puck flopped back against the couch and groaned happily, "Oh, God.... That was so good." Dave smiled and scooted closer to Puck, the tub of ice cream in one hand and the spoon in the other. Dave scooped out a big bite and held it up to Puck's mouth, "Open up." Dave said encouragingly. Puck, without saying a word, opened wide as Dave slid the spoon into his mouth. Dave fed Puck bite after bite, Puck hands rubbing his hard, bloated belly the entire time. Dave scooped out one last bite and Puck ate it happily, though some of it fell onto his chest. Dave scooped it up with his hand and it licked it off his fingers before giving Puck's stuffed stomach a few hard pats, "Man, listen to the sound of that stuffed belly. Now THAT is a manly sound."

Puck opened his mouth to say something, but words didn't come out. Instead, a massive burp was what exited his mouth, "UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURPPPPPP... mmmmmhh.. That felt SO good..." Dave laughed at how awesome Puck's belch was before he placed both of his massive hands on Puck's belly, "Man, Puck, you're really getting into this, aren't you?" Dave asked, running his hands in slow circles on Puck's gut. Puck grinned and put his hands behind his head, "Sure am! I haven't felt this relaxed and happy in a LONG time, Dave. I honestly think this was something that was meant to happen, y'know? I've always been so worried about my body, but now I realize it's time the Puckasaurus got his feast on."

"Glad to hear that." Dave said, patting Puck's stuffed belly before he kept rubbing it with one hand, sitting back on the couch and just hanging out and talking with Puck. Without even realizing it, both of them passed out on the couch, Dave's big bear paw still on Puck growing belly.
111131222111.title: Stuffed Puckasaurus

choices: Puck has to leave because Dave's dad is coming home.
An unexpected someone they know delivers the pizza Dave orders for lunch
1111312221112.content:
The wafting smell of pancakes was what woke Puck up. Mmh pancakes, Dave made delicious pancakes. He was drooling already in anticipation as he walked in and saw Dave turning them over skillfully as they cooked to perfection. He also had eggs and bacon of course already out since he seemed to make pancakes last. Puck whistled letting Dave know he was there.

“Good morning Dave,” Puck said smiling. Dave flipped over another pancake and turned around smiling.

“Good morning Puck.” Dave had a big black tank top on which look stretched on his massive frame and only accentuated it which Puck ogled once again. Damn he was big. Puck was both jealous and in awe of his new friend. Possibly his only with Finn being stupid, Kurt and Rachel being all buddy-buddy and if Kurt hadn’t been 100% gay (and not fond of bisexuals apparently) he would have sworn they were dating, Artie busy, and Sam…well, he had no idea. He wasn’t sure if they were friends or not so he’ll withhold judgment on that one. Perhaps he should see Sam later, introduce him to the new Dave Karofsky.

“It’ll be done in a few minutes,” Dave said and Puck sat down in the seat as he continued cooking. Puck flipped through the channels, knowing Dave liked to eat and watch tv at the same time and he did as well, and settled on a show called “My Babysitter’s a Vampire.” Childish, maybe, and he’d deny it vehemently to anyone who accuses him of it, but he loved little kid’s shows like that and Wizards of Waverly Place, Ben10, Yugioh (and LittleKuriboh who did the fantastically awesome abridged), and so on. Maybe he didn’t always have time helping around the house and stuff but he loved watching. Only Finn and Dave knew his love of cartoons. Sam probably suspected but Puck hadn’t told him yet.

Puck burst out laughing and Dave turned around confused. “What is it?” he asked startled.

“Ethan and Benny are cross-dressing to join the cheerleading squad to get close to chicks and their friend Rory thinks Benny is hot and keeps flirting with him. Haha, hilarious. Hey, I’m surprised I never thought of that.”

“Dressing up as a cheerleader to join the cheerios?” Dave asked, amused.

“Yeah,” Puck said.

“I wouldn’t believe you were a girl for even a second, your legs are far too hairy in the skirt plus I doubt you could do all the jumps and twists cheerleaders do.” Puck winced at the thought.

“Yeah, that’s probably true. Plus Santanna and Quin would do bad things.”

“What kind of bad things?” Dave asked curious.

“I have no idea but it’s Santanna and Quin. Whatever it would be it would be sure to make my life a living hell.” Dave shuddered at the thought of Santanna. She may have been tiny compared to him, but she was one of the scariest most demanding people he had ever met in his life and pretending to be her boyfriend only made it even more apparent.

“Yeah, Satan’s scary,” Dave said, shuddering again. “I can’t believe you guys ever dated.”

“It wasn’t so much as dated as friends (of a sort) with benefits who sometimes hooked up.” Dave made a gagging noise.

“Ew, but what do you mean ‘of a sort’?”

“I guess we’re friends but not really since I don’t know if Santanna can even have friends but…I understand her more than anyone else, even Brittany since whenever Santanna was sad she’d come to me because I was the best and I made her feel better plus she was hot and I could never suffer a girl crying…”

“Too much detail,” Dave griped. “I know you slept with her who knows how much but I don’t need to be reminded of it.” Puck smirked a little.

“Why? Are you jealous?” Dave kept silent but he blushed a little because yes, he strangely was. He turned away from Puck, hiding his face as the last pancake was ready and he removed them all, putting them on a plate and bringing them to the table and turned off the stove. Grabbing a jug of milk from the fridge and some orange juice, he put those out as well. Puck had his eyes narrowed and focused on the food as he waited for Dave to sit down. Chuckling, Dave sat down as well.

“Have as much as you want,” he said, knowing how much Puck seemed to love his pancakes. His other stuff as well but Puck had a special heart for pancakes. So Dave made a lot of them again, just for him. Puck grabbed a whole bunch and some eggs onto his plate and dug in while Dave did the same, although Dave was distracted by watching Puck. Puck divided his attention between the tv and the pancakes, as he chewed and shoveled them in, making groaning noises of enjoyment every now and then.
“Dude…mmph… these really….mmph….are the best pancakes,” Puck said in between bitefuls. Dave really liked that but so did his little friend at the sight of his big friend being all cute and adorable as he enjoyed his food. Dave squirmed in his seat. He might like Puck, like him a lot to be honest after only a couple days, but he wasn’t sure yet if Puck wanted him in that way. Yeah, Puck sent him admiring and longing gazes but that didn’t mean Puck liked him in that way. Puck himself said that he wanted to be like him which didn’t necessitate at all liking him. Plus, the dude just got burned by girls but that doesn’t mean he swung for his and Kurt’s team. After all, Puck slept with many, many, females and had relationships with them, even adult women. Dave had never had a relationship with anyone and his few fumbling attempts with Kurt scarred him mentally and drove him away to Dalton. He didn’t know anything. But he did know he wanted his friend, although it was probably too soon to suggest that seeing as they were only newly friends and again, Puck mightn’t be even gay and might freak out and only drive him away.

Looking away, Dave tried to focus only on his own food as Puck plowed through one huge plate of pancakes and eggs and got another. It was extremely difficult as Puck was extremely vocal in his appreciation that Dave was left wondering if Puck was having breakfast or doing something else because he surely wasn’t that good at cooking. Dave looked up to find out although as far as he could tell, both hands were above the table. He was however distracted by the sight of bloated stomach. Never in a million years would Dave have thought it would happen or that Puck would like it, but he did. Puck was rubbing his solid stomach as he finished the last few crumbs of pancakes, letting out whimpers of enjoyment and burping a little.

“Such a-uuuuurrpp-good breakfast. Uurrrrpp, you going to-ugh-finish those?” Puck was looking at Dave’s plate which still had a pancake and some eggs left. Dave wasn’t feeling particularly hungry right then from last night and the sight before him was far more entrancing so he shrugged and pushed them over, letting Puck have the rest. Puck finished them before slumping in his chair.

“Uuuuuuuuuuurrrrrppppp, man I love it here. Such good amazing food.” Puck patted his stomach. “If I continue to eat like this, I’m going to get huge.” The smile on Puck’s face said what he thought of that and Dave was relieved. He’d certainly hope so. Dave came over and Puck looked confused before Dave placed his hands on Puck’s belly and started rubbing. Giving a sigh, Puck leaned back in his seat as Dave did his work.

“Uuuuuurrrrppp, so-urrrpp-good.” Puck said between belches, relieved that Dave didn’t mind, even liked them. Shifting a little, he let out a sigh. “You really are surprisingly good at this as well,” Puck said. Dave shrugged modestly then continued rubbing his big paws on and around Puck’s stomach.
1111312221112.title: They wake up the next morning and Dave makes br...

choices: Puck finished all of the pizza.
11113122211121.content:
Around two in the afternoon Dave and Puck were sitting in the living room watching TV, both of their big stomachs extremely swollen from the massive lunch Dave had made for them. Dave, who was used to such massive meals, felt completely fine with such a full belly and was giving Puck one of his amazing belly rubs. Puck was completely relaxed by the feeling of Dave's large hands rubbing his belly, but the near-silence between them was broken when the cell phone in Dave's pocket went off. He pulled it out and held it up to his ear, "Hello?.. Hey, Dad! You're coming home? Yeah, I'll go to the grocery store.. okay, see you soon then."

"Your dad?" Puck asked, sounding a bit disappointed.
"Yeah, sorry. You're gonna have to go home tonight..."
Puck whined a bit and pouted, "Damn it. I love hanging out with you."
Dave smiled, he hadn't heard that in a long time, "He's only staying until tomorrow. He just went on a hunting trip with some friends and tomorrow morning he has to go on a business trip for about a week. You can come over then and I'll make some massive meals for you!"
Puck's face brightened up instantly, "Oh, hell yeah!"
"Only on one condition though. You still need to eat tonight so I'll be sending over some take out. I expect you to eat ALL of it." Dave said, giving Puck a stern look. He tried to keep his expression serious, but he ended up cracking a smile before patting Puck on the stomach, "Make sure you weigh yourself tonight. After we reach a certain weight we'll start lifting."

Puck agreed and and the two best friends said their good-byes before Puck headed home. His family was out of town so Puck had the house to himself, so he decided to strip down to his boxers and just relax on the couch watching TV. Puck ended up falling asleep for a few hours but was woken up around eight. He lifted himself up and threw on his jeans before opening the door, surprised to see a pizza boy standing there with three large pizzas, "Noah Puckerman?" He asked.
"Yeah...?"
"Your pizzas were paid for by the man who ordered them for you. Enjoy!" He said as he handed Puck his pizza and left. Puck shut the door behind him and sat down on the couch, opening the first pizza and instantly began to drool. It was a PERFECT pizza, just the right amount of meat, cheese, and sauce. Without hesitating, he grabbed the first bite and started to inhale the food.
11113122211121.title: Pizza binging by himself.

choices: Puck introduces Sam to the new Dave the next day
111131222111211.content:
It was a perfect pizza. Puck briefly thought about calling Finn over before he realized they weren't close friends anymore. Not to mention he was probably busy with Rachel doing who knew what. Not having sex with her most likely because Finn is Finn and Finn sucked. The old Puck would have been all over her. But now he just felt tired and not himself except when with Dave which was funny. He, Dave, and Finn used to be best friends in Elementary and Middle School. Even the first year of High School they were inseperable. Then Mr. Schue took over Glee club and got Finn to join and Puck joined as well because he wanted to keep his friend safe and also because deep down he was curious. Dave hadn't liked that and tormented the Glee club until he got kicked out which actually had been a good thing as Dave changed for the better, back to the nice friendly Dave he had been in Elementary and Middle School and not the terror he was at McKinnley. And now they were best friends again while Finn and everyone else didn't seem to care about him wrapped up in their own dramas. Well, whatever. Puck didn't feel like being alone right then and he couldn't call Dave or Finn so he called someone else.

Puck tapped his fingers nervously until he heard them pick up the phone. "Hey Sam," he said.
"Puck?" asked Sam confused. "Why are you calling?"
"Don't know, I was just curious if you wanted to hang or something, maybe play a videogame or two. I got pizza."
"Well, I guess so. Wanna watch Avatar?"
"Sure...I guess we could watch Avatar too," Puck said. Sam hooted happily.
"I'll be right over then! See you soon! Hey, where do you live?" While Puck told him, he heard the sound of Sam getting something.
"Uh-huh, okay, thanks. See you soon!" Sam hung up and Puck put the phone down and settled down to wait. When the doorbell rang, Puck jumped up and ran to get it.
"Woah there!" Sam said as Puck yanked it open. "Wow, you're sure excited to see me." Puck shrugged a little.
"'Little lonely or something, doesn't matter," he mumbled, almost too quietly for Sam to hear. "But now you're here and we can get started. I got pizza and stuff."
"Cool," Sam said, following in after Puck. "Can we start with Avatar?" Puck shrugged.
"Sure, why not. It's a good movie." He took the disk from Sam and put it in the dvd player. "Help yourself to as much pizza as you want, I have a ton of it." Sam looked.
"Yeah you do. Why do you have three pizzas?" He asked curiously.
"I don't know, they were just delivered as a gift from someone who apparently wants to give me a ton of pizza. I just don't like eating pizza alone."
"Oh," Sam said. "You're alone? What about Finn? I thought he used to be your best friend or something."
"Yeah," Puck said a little bitterly. "Used to. Not so much anymore. He doesn't like to hang with me anymore, something about stealing all his girlfriends."
"Well, technically you did." Sam said pointing it out.
"No I haven't. I have not once slept with Rachel. Thought about it, yeah, who wouldn't? But we only dated and that was for about a week before she dumped me."
"I thought you dumped her?" Sam said confused.

"No, I just tell everyone that. But since I'm in a talkative mood I'll tell you that I actually liked her and was upset she had dumped me after only a week. I actually hadn't been going to break up with her but then she did and I just got upset and told her I had been about to do the same."

"Oh," Sam said, not knowing what to say. Puck remained quiet for a moment before he put a smile on his face.
"So, want to see that movie?" Puck took out two of the pizza boxes and put them on the table. Puck jumped on the couch and patted the seat next to him. Sam made his way over and sat down.

"Anything to drink?" his host asked and Sam shrugged.
"Just water is good," Sam said and Puck shrugged as well.
"Cool, suit yourself. I'll get you some. Just help yourself to as much pizza as you want. I'll be back with plates and shit in a minute or something."

True to his word, Puck was back, putting out paper plates for him and Sam as well as plastic cups and a big 2 liter Dr. Pepper. He quickly went to the kitchen and filled one of the cups with water before coming back.

"Here's your water, which by the way, really? You sure you don't want anything else?" He looked at the plate where Sam had only two slices. "Come on dude, I know you can eat more than that. At least have a few more." Sam opened his mouth to say something but before he did, Puck already dropped two more onto his plate and moved his attention away as he dimmed the lights and poured himself his own drink. Sam decided it wasn't worth the argument and just stayed quiet, beginning to bounce in anticipation as Puck turned on the movie. Avatar was such a good movie and Sam had already seen it a bunch of times but he never got tired of seeing it. There was just something awesome about the world of Pandora and the Navi. Sam sometimes wished he was a Navi and had a tail. That would be so cool and he'd be able to communicate with different creatures without needing the ability to talk. He was teaching himself the Navi language right now and he was doing pretty well at it. Sadly, most people did not speak it so it was tricky to know the proper pronounciations of things but if he ever ran into the Navi, he would probably be able to put on a decent conversation.

They watched the movie in rapture, especially Sam. Puck was pretty interested himself but Sam was really into it. He unconsciously quoted lines as they were said onscreen and didn't take his eyes off the screen for a single moment. He ate his four slices without noticing and even drank Dr. Pepper without looking or noticing when Puck poured it in his glass after the water was gone, curious to see what would happen. Puck lost himself in the movie as well but on a lesser-scale but still pretty interested. It was pretty easy to fall into an almost trance like state as he watched the movie and pretty colors and tasted such delicious pizza alternated with sips of Dr. Pepper. When the movie ended and Sam turned the lights back on excited, they both blinked to see two empty boxes of pizza and almost all the two liters gone. Puck suddenly let out a massive burp and there was silence for a few moments before Sam started laughing.

"Dude that was so awesome!" Sam high-fived Puck and Puck grinned.
"Uuuuuuuurrrrrppp, thanks."
"But I can't believe you ate two boxes of pizza!" Sam said.
"Actually, 1 and a half, you ate the other half," Puck drawled.

"Well, whatever. Plus you had all that soda. Aren't you worried about the calories? I'm going to have to work out hard to recover from just that half a pizza, let alone 1 and a half. Crap, I just ate half a pizza." That caused Puck to start laughing hard while Sam stood there confused. "What?" he asked. "What is it?" Wiping pretend tears from his eye, Puck managed to settle down.

"See, that's the thing," he said grinning. "I'm actually doing this deliberately."
"Doing what deliberately?"
"Eating and gaining weight of course."
"But...why?" Sam asked, really confused now.
"Multiple reasons among which it feels good, am bulking up, is entertaining, not to mention it feels good."
"Aren't you worried though? What about chicks and stuff?" Sam asked. Puck frowned.
"I'm done with chicks man. They're all fucking crazy and I'm just done with them. I'm taking a break. Besides, it's not like anyone's interested in me anymore anyhow."
"I'm sure that's not-"

"It's true. Quinn's downright crazy, Rachel is an annoying giant loving midget, Santanna's a lesbian which would ordinarily be rather hot but now she wants nothing to do with me, and Shelby is reluctant to let me near Beth anymore. Even my pool cleaning business has been drying up and the milfs don't want me."

"Wait what about Shelby?" Puck looked away.
"None of your business."
"Fine. So you actually like this?" Sam wasn't being judgmental, he was just honestly puzzled.
"Yeah." Puck leaned back against the couch stretching his arms up and the shirt riding up exposing his bloated gut. Sam cocked his head nervously as he looked at it and the slight hairy trail across it.

"Can I...Can I touch it?" Sam asked, his voice cracking as he shut his eyes as he expected Puck to freak and sock him for asking. Instead he heard a chuckle and Sam opened his eyes in surprise.

"Sure you can," Puck said easily. Warily, Sam stepped forward a few steps at a time expecting it to either be a prank or a trap to punish him. Puck just sat their watching as Sam carefully made his way forward and hesitantly laid a finger on Puck's stomach. He flinched as he expected a hit but nothing came. Sam moved back a little and hesitantly poked it, which barely jiggled at all from its round fullness. Poking again, Sam marveled at the feeling. It was fun and who knew it could get so full? He laid his hand across and rubbed it. Puck leaned his head back and sighed in pleasure which encouraged Sam to keep going. He continued rubbing as Puck made noises of pleasure and Sam loved it. Switching hands he continued, revulsion totally gone and interest just left. He had no idea what was going on but he liked it.
111131222111211.title: Hanging Out

choices: Puck can't eat anymore and Dave finishes what's left.
Puck finishes his lasagna and another loaf of bread.
1111312221112112.content:
After such an amazing weekend at Dave's place, Puck was beyond bummed to be back in school for the next five days. Classes and Glee club came and went(they had begun talking about their setlist for regionals but nothing really stunning came to mind) and as soon as the bell rang dismissing the school, Puck was GONE. He quickly made it to his truck and hopped in, grunting as he did so. He looked down, over his growing stomach, and knew exactly what the pain that had been bugging him was. He put both hands down on the waist of his jeans and unbuttoned them, letting out a loud, happy sigh of relief. Puck had to deal with the pain of his now-shrinking jeans cutting into his jeans. He always wore them a little tight but now they were starting to hurt.

The small pain was worth it though, and it meant that he was indeed getting bigger. Puck turned on his truck and pulled out of the parking lot, heading down to Dave's house. When Puck got there, he hurried to the front door - it was freezing outside and the warm heat from Dave's fireplace is just what he needed. He knocked a few times and a big grin spread across his face when Dave opened the door.

"Hey, Puck! Get inside, you look frozen." Dave said, stepping to side while Puck hurried inside. Puck loved how warm Dave kept his house; it was obvious to him that Dave hated the winter months. "So how was school?" Dave asked as he walked into the kitchen.
"Boring." Puck said bluntly. Everything seemed boring to him recently, except for when he's eating or hanging out with Dave. "What about you?"
Dave put on his oven mitts and opened the stove, pulling out a huge lasagna, "School was good! Classes were boring but I hung with a few of my friends at lunch. My buddy, Trevor, doesn't want to admit it, but I totally caught him checking out my ass. I think he's got a thing for thick dudes."
Puck bit his lower lip subconsciously, not realizing he was a little jealous. His green-eyes were soon cast aside when the sound of his growing belly roared in protest of not being pull.

Dave grinned and walked over, "Let's see your progress." he said, pulling Puck's shirt up and revealing his stomach. Dave smiled and pressed his massive fingers against it, "You're a natural gainer, Puck! It's only been a few days and you're already soft and squishy." Dave said, squeezing Puck's doughy stomach.
Puck felt his cheeks turn red slightly, "You think so?"
"Definitely! Turn around." Dave asked. Puck complied and turned around, "So far it's all in your stomach and waist, I noticed your unbuttoned jeans, but you've put on a tiny bit of meat back here too. It looks good!"
Puck smiled, not knowing why such a compliment made him happy, but it did.

"So how was that pizza I sent over?" Dave asked, standing up.
"OH! It was amazing!! I didn't eat it all though..."
Dave crossed his arms and stared down at Puck, "Why not?"
"I actually invited a friend over... You know Sam. I kinda.. well I don't like eating alone so he came over and ended up eating half of it with me..."
Dave gave Puck a look, which made him seem upset, but he smiled, "That's fine. I'm just gonna have to feed you twice as much as I planned today."

Dave walked back over to the stove, "Lasagna's should be cool enough," he said, reaching in with a mitted hand a pulling out one large tray after another of garlic bread. Each tray had two large loaves on each, four in total. Puck sat down at the table and Dave took his spatula and cut the lasagna in half, putting each half on a plate. He one loaf of garlic bread on each plate and set them down at their usual spot, "Eat up!"

As Dave went to the fridge to get the soda, Puck scratched the back of his neck. This was a LOT of food, even for his new appetite, but, he knew he needed to make up that 1 and a half pizzas that Sam ate, so Puck picked up his fork and dug in. As always with Dave's food, Puck was in food HEAVEN when he ate. The cheese, pasta, meat, and sauce were just AMAZING. Puck just kept shoveling in lasagna, only stopping to take a huge bight out of his garlic bread, drink soda, or belch. He didn't even notice when he finished his first loaf of bread and Dave sneaked another one onto his plate, which was gone in no time.
1111312221112112.title: Back at Dave's.

11113122211121121.content:
After two loafs of garlic bread, a couple of glasses of Dr. Pepper, and god only knew how much lasagna, Puck was completely utterly stuffed. He was probably (no, not probably, he was) more full than he had ever been in his life. The pizza was light compared to this which was scary. Well, not light but lighter. Puck was really glad he'd already unbuttoned his pants before he had gotten there as he did not want to imagine how it would have felt still buckled, or if they even would have remained so. Puck shifted in his chair miserably and Dave paused to help Puck over to the couch which felt more like traveling a thousand leagues. Puck collapsed onto it gratefully before returning his attention to his poor stuffed self and moaning again as he rubbed. He promised to himself never to eat again (until it wore off).

Dave after making sure Puck was okay and not going to die (although Puck complained he was), dragged a small table over and placed it so he could be within reaching distance of Puck and moved the rest of the somewhat sizeable portion of Lasagna on his plate there along with the drinks. Sitting down, Dave continued to eat with one hand while using his other to help Puck out, feeling along that hard bloated belly and rubbing it. This made Puck feel better and Dave continued to do so as he absent-mindedly shoveled forkful after forkful of lasagna into his mouth until the last bit had gone. He was shocked when he heard his fork scratch against the plate and he came out of his disassociated state to realize that indeed it was all gone, lasagna and bread. Letting out a massive burp and getting a weak chuckle from Puck before dissolving back into moaning, Dave pushed the table aside and ponderously stood up. He was surprised by how heavy(er) than normal he felt. Dave was impressed because eating with Puck was not only pushing Puck's endurance but also his. Dave had always eaten a lot but now with Puck, he passed beyond limits even he thought possible for him. They were both mutually benefacting and cooking for Puck gave Dave the opportunity to cook tons of food not to mention it was nice having someone enjoy it. Patting his substantial belly, Dave trundled over and lifted Puck up a bit who opened an eye-lid.

"Hey, what are you doing?" Puck asked indignantly and Dave yawned.
"Taking the-uuuuurrrrrpp-couch," Dave belched as he slid himself under. Puck looked shocked as Dave squeezed himself under him and then put Puck back on top and wrapped his arms around.

"Wha-?" Puck started before Dave interrupted.
"Can't be bothered to move, plus it feels nice." Puck after feeling Dave had to agree as he laid on top the big pillow. It was very nice indeed as Karofsky traced patterns over Puck's belly as the sluggish exhaustion finally started kicking in. Yawning, Dave continued to rub Puck until Puck was asleep and without anyone to talk to, Dave quickly fell asleep as well. They laid there together, just sleeping until the sound of a car coming in woke them up.
11113122211121121.title: Puck can't eat anymore and Dave finishes wh...

111131222111211212.content:
Puck grumbled a bit as he heard the sound of a car pulling up and a door shutting. He lifted himself off of Dave and rubbed his eye, "Dude, wake up. Somebody's here..."
Dave lifted himself up onto his elbows and grunted, "Uggh... okay." Puck fell back onto his bigger ass as Dave got up and went to the door, ignoring the fact that he was shirtless, "Hello?" He asked as he opened up but was pretty surprised when he saw who was there, "Evans?"
Sam stared for a moment, temporarily stunned by the beauty that was Dave's massive body, but shook it off, "Hey, Karofsky... Uhh... Puck is here right?"
Dave blinked, "Uhh, yeah... You wanna come in?"
"Sure!" Sam said, sounding a bit excited. Dave stepped back and Sam came inside, nearly blown away by the sight of Puck's bigger, shirtless body, "H-Hey, Puck..."
"Hey, Sam. What's up?" Puck asked getting up off the couch.
"Uhh.. you know, just..." Sam sighed, "Okay... I'm gonna be blunt. I wanna help."

"Help?" Dave asked, crossing his huge arms over his chest and raising an eyebrow.
"Yeah.. I realized the other day when I was hanging out with Puck that I kinda liked how big he looked. I wanna help him get bigger." Sam said, blushing a bit.
Puck grinned, "I didn't know you were an encourager?"
"I guess so." Sam said, scratching the back of his neck, "So... can I?"
"What do you think, Dave?" Puck asked.
"Why not! It'll be nice to have an extra set of hands around to help us." Dave gave Sam a pat on the back, which almost knocked Sam over, "So, what do you want for dinner, Puck?"
Puck thought about it for a second, "Hmmmmm... I think we should eat out tonight! It'll give you a chance to relax from cooking and we can celebrate Sam joining us!"

The three of them go out to...
111131222111211212.title: Sam joins in on the fun.

choices: Sam finishes the plate to congratulations
Sam doesn't but gets effort points for trying
1111312221112112122.content:
In order to give Dave a little break from cooking and to celebrate Sam joining them, they decided that they should go out to an all-you-can-eat. Sam said he knew a good one so Puck and Dave followed him as Sam drove to the place he knew. Getting out, Sam smiled at them.

“Here we are, this place is really good and affordable and will be sure to fill your bellies,” he said with a smile quirking his face. He reached out and patted Puck and Dave which was surprising but not altogether disliked. “Are you ready?” Sam said in an evil ominous voice before grinning at them again. Both Puck and Dave rolled their eyes and Sam smirked as he led them in. “Three please,” he said to the girl waiting and the cashier lady nodded and smiled at them, her eyes giving a once-over to Puck a bit too long and definitely not just once. Dave felt a powerful rush of emotion run through him that left him almost staggering. Confused, he pushed the possessive feelings aside and pretended that the waitress did not just wink at Puck or that Puck smiled back. Eventually though, she finally did her job and rang them through at a base price of S12.00 a person and lead them to their booth. She gave them cups for their drinks and told them to call if they needed anything and then finally left.

“So yeah,” Sam said. “It’s really easy, just go grab whatever and however much you want and as many times as you want. I hear you guys like to eat so I hope you do. Now, I better go get my food before it gets eaten.” Sam got up and they all split up to different areas of the buffet. Puck was in the mood for hamburgers and fries so he grabbed as much as he could as he filled his huge plate to overflowing. Dave on the other hand went for the mashed potatoes and gravy as well as carved turkey, three-bean salad, bread rolls, and blueberry pie which was similar to what he ate on Thanksgiving. Sam just went and got a few slices of pizza and some spaghetti.

“Is that all you’re having?” Puck and Dave asked at the same time when they looked at Sam’s plate which caused them to laugh, look at each other, and laugh again. Sam shrugged unconcerned.

“Yeah, this is what I usually eat.” Puck and Dave looked at each other and communicated silently as Puck tilted his head towards Sam’s plate and Dave nodded. Sam who watched this interaction with interest, was confused. “What?” he asked and both Puck and Dave shrugged.

“Nothing, let’s just eat,” Puck said with a relish and enthusiasm Sam hadn’t heard for a long time. Dave nodded in agreement.

“Yeah dude, this is awesome. Thanks for bringing us out to this place.” They both started digging into their food and Sam slowly ate his, unable to tear his eyes away from watching them enjoy their food. Their plates, huge to begin with, were close to overflowing and they somehow ate every bite with delight yet still at a far faster pace than Sam could. By the time Sam was half-way through his much less filled plate, Puck had already eaten most of the fries and some of the ginormous stacked burger he did himself and that he couldn’t even get his mouth all the way around when he started; while Dave was already cleared of mashed potatoes, beans, and bread. Sam whistled slowly at the sight.

“Dudes, that is so awesome,” he said looking at their plates. “I can’t believe you’re almost done already.” Puck took a long sip from his now traditional cup of Dr. Pepper and burped loudly. Sam looked around startled and Puck laughed.

“Relax, it’s just us guys, and no one would care in a place like this. If anything, it would be much appreciated advertisement. No need for embarrassment whatsoever.” Puck burped again and smirked. “Besides, it’s manly. You are a man, right Evans?” Before he even knew it, Sam was boxed in between Puck and Dave.

“No need to be so tense,” Puck whispered across Sam’s back. “Just relax and have fun. We’re all buddies, right?”

Wha-what are you doing?” Sam almost shrieked when he felt Puck’s hands grab onto his shoulder-blades.

“Helping you relax, you’re really jumpy,” Puck grumbled as he started moving his thumbs in circular motions. Sam had been about to comment on that statement but instead what came out was a long moan of pleasure as Puck did something.

“Really tense, you need to relax more Sam, you wouldn’t get such knots.” Sam jerked a little as Puck pressed a little harder but relaxed again when the pain went away.

“Puck here is like a gifted masseur or something,” Dave announced. “The pleasure he can give…”

“I like to make people feel good,” Puck finished as he continued rubbing. “Now just relax,” Sam surprised but not questioning it, sat there while Puck worked on him. He opened his eyes when he heard a clink in front of him. Dave had come back with another plate of food and placed it in front of Sam.

“What’s this?” Sam asked.

“This is making good use of $12.00. I don’t know how you get the energy to play football on your rabbit food diet.”

“Kurt is the one who eats rabbit food,” Sam said defiantly. There was silence for a moment.

“He’s got a point,” Puck said grinning.

“Well, okay, but if you’re going to hang with the big boys you’re going to need to eat a little more. It’s not that we’re going to make you eat the same amount we do but it would be awkward if you don’t at least try.” Sam looked at the two of them, Puck looking at him encouragingly with a smile and Dave nodding his head. He wanted to be friends with them, they were really cool and awesome. Plus, they made it seem fun. Sam had no intention of getting as big as them but they were right in a sense and they might probably help him get over his food issues. He had been plateauing for a while in the weight room so it might help. Best of all though, he’d get to see them and he had not forgotten when Puck came over or the sight of his bloated belly. Puck and Dave were not going to continue with him unless he did so he better do it.

“Sure, I guess I can eat a little more,” Sam said. “What about you though?” Puck smirked getting up.

“Don’t worry about me, I could use some more myself. What about you Dave?”

“Sure,” Dave said lumbering up.

Don’t start without us!” called Puck and Sam rolled his eyes. He wasn’t going to and to be honest even if he did, they’d probably still finish before him. When they came back with reloaded plates, Sam dug in as fast as he could, ignoring the voice in his head wanting him to stop and wanting to get done before his brain could catch up.
1111312221112112122.title: An All-You-Can-Eat Buffet

choices: They wake up late that night and have a midnight snack.
They wake up the next morning and record their weights.
11113122211121121222.content:
After a good ten minutes of being stuffing himself, Sam collapsed in the buffet booth, his hands going straight to his swollen stomach. "Oh, God.." Sam groaned, I've never been so full in my life..."
Dave and Puck both chuckled, each having made a sizable dent in their now second helpings. Dave finished his last few bites before pushing his plate away and looking at Puck, "May I?" Dave asked, pointing at Sam's bloated stomach. Puck nodded, his mouth full of his now fourth burger. Dave cracked his fingers and placed his massive bear paws on Sam's stomach and started rubbing.

Almost like magic, Sam went from pain to blissful heaven as Dave rubbed his belly, "Now listen up, Evans. I want you to remember that we brought you on as a feeder, not a gainer. You'll probably get a little beginner belly while you work with us, but your main job is to feed us as much food as possible. If we get full, you cheer us on and encourage us to eat everything."

"Yeah," Puck added, "and there can never be any leftovers. If we get full to the point where we can't move then it's your job to feed everything that's left to us. Understand?"

Sam, who was so enjoying his magical belly rub too much to even respond with words, nodded his head at their words, and after a few minutes Dave removed his hands and left the booth to get another plate. Puck soon followed after. They returned this time with two plates in each hand: Dave had one plate that was full of nothing but a mountain of mashed potatoes while his other one had ten pieces of fried chicken and huge helpings of mac and cheese. Puck's first plate had five double cheeseburgers while his other one was stacked with a massive pile of french fries.

Sam watched, amazed, as Puck and Dave spent the next 10 minutes or so inhaling their food. Sam's eyes would dart from watching them devour their food, down to their bloating stomachs, which he was just dying to touch. He felt his face flush slightly when he saw them visibly get fuller. Dave and Puck both seemed to push their plates away at the same time, each stuffed with meat and potatoes of various kinds. They were about to get up when Sam stopped them, "You two rest. You're burning way to many calories by getting up and going to get your food. I'm your feeder and it's my job to stuff those huge guts of yours. What do you two want? More of the same or are you two big bears ready for dessert?"

Dave and Puck looked at each other, and almost simultaneously said, "Same." Sam walked away to go stack up their fourth helping and Dave put his hand on his stomach, "Man, this is great. We need to hit up buffet's more often."
"Tell me about it." Puck said, rubbing his growing belly, "The food here isn't as good as yours, Dave, but we definitely get more."
Dave chuckled, "I'll have to start making more food at home for these big boys," he said, smacking his swollen gut. It wasn't completely full yet, so when he hit it his stomach made a THUMP sound and it jiggled a little.
"We haven't weighed ourselves yet, have we?" Puck asked.
Dave shook his head, "Not yet. I guess we were having too much fun gaining. I'll record our weights once we digest all of this and make a chart tomorrow."

Sam returned a few minutes later with four giant plates; two in each each hand and two balancing on each arm. They were all full of the same things Puck and Dave had just eaten. Sam set the first two down and before he had the chance to put down the other two Puck and Dave were eating. Sam refilled their drinks and sat back down, watching in awe and Dave and Puck stuffed their growing bellies with food. Once their fourth helping of food was gone, both Puck and Dave leaned back in their booth, rubbing their swollen bellies.
Dave burped loudly and groaned, "Uuuugh... I haven't felt this full in a long time..."
"Tell me about it." Puck said, burping as well.

Sam patted both of their big stomachs, which were both large, round, and hard, "You two aren't done yet. You still have dessert to eat." Sam patted both of their bellies as he got up, "Who wants to go first?"
Dave and Puck looked at each other, "I'll go - UUUURP- ... first." Dave said. He knew Puck was a gifted eater, but he was still training, and Dave had more experience when it came to forcing food into his ever-growing gut when he was as full as he was.

Sam was gone and back in what seemed like no time at all. He had a huge grin on his face and a gigantic hot fudge sundae in his hands. He set down the massive sundae, picked up the spoon, and without even having to say anything, began feeding Dave. Despite how full Dave was, he would never deny the fact that he was, and always would be, a gluttonous bear. No matter how full he was, unless he was on the verge of throwing up, he would NEVER turn down food presented to him. Dave eagerly ate spoonful after spoonful of the vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, and whipped cream that Sam fed him, rubbing his now cold, bloated belly the entire time.

Dave opened his mouth again, expecting more food, but when nothing came he looked at Sam, who smiled back, "That's all." Sam lifted Dave's shirt up, revealing his bloated, hairy gut, and instantly began rubbing. Feeling his face grow slightly redder with each loud belch Dave made. Sam loved it when Puck and Dave burped; it meant that he was doing a good job helping them on their quest to get fatter.

Once Dave was finally in a place where his bloated pain turned into bloated bliss, Sam got up and instantly made his way to the dessert table for Puck. Puck waited eagerly, feeling a little less full than he was earlier and excited to eat after seeing how happy Dave was full of sweets. Sam came back, the same huge grin he had on before, but instead of a big sundae like Dave had, Sam was armed with a complete chocolate cake. Before Puck could say anything, Sam had sat back down, cut the cake into 8 slices, and began feeding them to Puck with his hands. Puck ate happily, enjoying the delicious chocolate he was being fed. As the final bite of the first slice went down Puck's throat, he felt Sam's fingertips in his mouth. Without thinking, Puck sucked the chocolate cake off of Sam's fingers, which Sam let him do as he grabbed the next slice with his other hand, switching them.

Puck kept eating each and every slice of cake Sam fed him, suck the remains off of Sam's fingers as he waited for the next slice. When Sam, pulled his fingers away, Puck instantly opened his mouth for the next slice, but there was none. Sam pulled Puck's shirt up and went straight to work on relaxing his swollen, cake-filled belly.

Once Puck was relaxed, Sam sat back, admiring his work; both Dave and Puck were stuffed with as much food as possible and they looked so happy. After a few minutes, Sam helped the two massive bears to his car, where the both slept as Sam drove them to Dave's house. The weekend was starting tomorrow, which meant Sam would get to spend even more time feeding his two gigantic friends and helping them get bigger.

When they got back to Dave's house, Sam helped Dave inside first, since he had the keys. Dave made his way into his bedroom and collapsed on the bed, passing out instantly. Sam admired how big Dave's gut looked while he was lying down, but then went and got Puck. He got an idea as he helped Puck in and lead him to Dave's bedroom. He put down on the bed with Dave and made sure house and his car was all locked up. When he got back into Dave's room, he helped Puck and Dave out of their clothes until they were in their underwear.

Clothing really didn't do these two justice: they were amazingly huge. Arms, thighs, shoulders, chests, bellies, all of it BIG. Sam stripped down to his boxers and snuggled between their beefy frames, resting his head on Dave's bloated belly and feeling Puck's against his back as he rolled onto his side, drifting to sleep happily.
11113122211121121222.title: Sam's first day of feeding.

111131222111211212222.content:
A ferocious noise woke the three of them up. Sam leapt up startled when he realized that he heard Puck laughing.
"Relax, it's just Dave." They both looked over to see Dave blinking tiredly as he yawned loudly again, sounding like thunder. Sam blushed as Dave looked up.
