"Rrrr...sorry, just really tired," he said flopping down again. Puck smiled fondly at Dave and stood up causing Sam an intake of breath. Puck was still in just his (rather small) boxers and Sam was again struck by how beautiful the two were, despite the body contrasts. Puck was more muscularly defined whereas Dave was just massive and more like a bear with fur and everything. Sam was honored and excited his two friends had chosen him for his special task of helping them grow. Well, Puck technically did and Dave went along but Sam and Dave had become friends, especially after the events of the night before. Dave had really changed from the bully he had known back at McKinnley in the short time they had been at the same school. Now however, Dave was an awesome guy and one Sam admired which was good because it would have been bad to be attracted to a horrible person.

Puck was yanking on an old pair of tight jeans of his that quickly became evident he had outgrown. Using words that normally would have made Sam's innocent ears burn if he hadn't been so amused by the scene, Puck hopped up and down, trying to yank up the pants and finding they did not close around his big belly. Giggling, Sam rummaged through Dave's closet for a pair of drawstring sweatpants and laid them out while Puck hopped around.

"Might want to try these. They're Dave's so I'm sure they will fit and that he won't mind you bothering, I don't think" Sam said, hoping the last part was true. Puck shrugged and took the proffered clothes and put the pants on.

"Sorry about that," Puck said when Dave blinked sleepily and looked at them. "Pants wouldn't fit so I'm borrowing yours." Dave nodded sleepily and closed his eyes again.
"S'okay."
"What was that about anyways?" Sam asked confused now that the funny part was over. Why had Puck been upset?

"I love being big and getting bigger but I didn't expect to grow out of my favorite pants so fast which is both amazing and sad because me and those pants, we had good times. It was going to happen eventually but I thought I would have a little longer before them not fitting you know?"

"Uh, sure, if you say so." Puck grinned and the scowl on his face disappeared.
"So Sam, what do you think about breakfast?" Sam thought for a moment.

"We could have breakfast later. First, we want to see where your two big bears progess is and it's best to do that on an empty stomach." Puck gave a playful frown before shrugging.

"Okay, we'll need to wait for Dave to wake up. What do you want to do in the meantime?" Puck asked.
"I-I don't know," Sam said. Puck got a mischievious grin on his face. Laying back down on the bed he leaned on one arm and patted his belly seductively.

"Come over here," Puck said smoothly and Sam swallowed hard. Puck smiled again. "It's your job and I know you want to." Swallowing again, Sam didn't resist as he sat on the bed and started massaging Puck's belly. Humming with pleasure, Puck leaned back closing his eyes enjoying Sam's touch. It didn't take long for Dave to wake up after that and making his presence known.

"Hey, it's my turn." With only a small cry of protest at the pleasant feeling being withdrawn, Puck was again smiling as Sam and Puck both massaged Dave. A few minutes later, Sam stood up.

"Okay, I think it's time to measure where you guys are currently to see how much you've grown already and for future comparisons. Puck, you first. Dave, where's your scale?" Dave pointed the way and Sam retrieved it from the large bathroom so they could all see the numbers. Taking out a journal and a camera, Sam got ready because he was going to be the best feeder partner he could be. After a few more preparations, Sam motioned for Puck to step on the digital scale (which could weigh up to a 1000 pounds).

"215," Puck said, both pleased and surprised. "I was about 185 at the start of the year when we got weighed for football. Most of the weight gained is undoubtedly within the last few weeks." Puck got off the scale for Dave to get on which looked really small beneath his feet. Sam marveled at the claim it could even weigh up to a 1000 considering it almost looked like it should have been crushed beneath Dave's massive body. However it withstood fine and the number became clear.

"Woah, 302 lbs!" Puck was excited. "That's over 300 pounds!" Dave raised his eyebrow and Sam wanted to palm himself. That was extremely self-obvious but Puck didn't seem to realize. Before it could get any more awkward, Dave interrutpted.

"Well, the last time I weighed myself at the beginning of the year, also for football was...281 lbs," Dave said, blushing a little. He was really big now. Past the big three-oh and he didn't mean thirty. He could officially count himself as part of the huge club."

"That's awesome," Puck said, heartily slapping congratulations to Dave. Had it been anyone else, the force would have probably clean knocked them over if not out, but Dave withstood it.

"Uhh, thanks.." Dave said, suddenly shy. Over 300 pounds, that was a lot. He wondered when he had crossed the line from 290s to the 300s. Perhaps it might even have occured last night.

"We should have a celebratory 300 meal," Puck said. "For Dave clearing that special number." Sam nodded in agreement and Dave blushed again as both Sam and Puck put their hands on his massive gut.

"So, now or later, what do you want special? Sam asked after writing their numbers down.
"We should see how much you weigh," both Puck and Dave said and at their insistence, Sam got on.
"168, woah, you're light" Puck said as Dave wrote it down.

"Not all of us can be huge or be gifted." Sam didn't mention that was a few poinds heavier than he expected when he last weighed himself. "But really, back to feeding. Do you feel like breakfast or waiting a bit for an huge brunch? It's your choice."
111131222111211212222.title: They wake up the next morning and record their ...

choices: They finish everything; Dave ate more.
They finish everything; Puck ate more.
1111312221112112122222.content:
"If you guys can wait a bit I'd be happy to make a SUPER huge brunch." Sam said, asking his two huge friends.
Puck was about to say yes, but both his and Dave's guts growled loudly at the same time, demanding food. Puck shrugged, "Sorry, Sammy. These guys are calling the shots and they're straving!"
Sam rubbed his chin for a sec, then got an idea, "Gimme a sec!" Sam was gone for a couple of minutes, but came back with his arms full of treats, "Knowing you guys, you can pack these away and still have room for a huge brunch. Eat these while I get started!" Sam set the large bags of chips, boxes of twinkies and cupcakes, and cold cans of soda on Dave's bed before heading down to the kitchen.

Dave and Puck both looked at each other, shrugged, and laid down on the bed; Puck tore open a bag of chips while Dave ripped open the box of twinkies, stuffing one into his mouth. Dave turned on the TV, which was airing saturday morning cartoons, and they both watched, stuffing their faces with junk and washing it down with soda. As they did, Dave's eyes wandered over to Puck's body, looking it over. Puck was definitely the more muscular of the two; his arms were still very buff and defined, and his pecs were huge(though they had gotten bigger thanks to all his gaining), and his stomach was big and round, but very spherical at the same time. It was soft and squishy, but not doughy.

When Dave was done admiring his smaller buddy, his eyes went back to the cartoons on tv as he ate the last twinkie from the box of 24, tossing it aside and opening another box. As he did, Puck(who had noticed Dave's admiring) did the same as he looked over his big bear of a friend. While Puck was more muscular, Dave clearly had more body fat and was insanely thick. His arms were muscular, but not defined, as they were thick and wide with fat. His chest was like Puck's, huge, only they were much fuller looking from his extra weight. Dave's belly, which was currently being stuffed with twinkies, was much different from Puck's - it was obviously bigger, but while Puck had more of a ball shape to his, Dave's was very fleshy and doughy, and jiggled with every step Dave would take. It hung over his waistline a little(a spot that was Dave's favorite to be rubbed), but the rest of Dave's body wasn't as doughy. He was huge and thick with both muscle and fat - truly a big, powerful bear.

When Puck was done, he also returned to devouring the bag of chips he had and laughing at the cartoon. Dave and Puck ate slowly for a good hour and a half, wanting their appetizer to last and laughing at the different shows that were on, when Same came in, "How are my two big guys doing?" He said, walking over to the sweatpants and boxer clad men, "Not too full?"
Dave lifted his arms off of his belly, "Feel for yourself? It's not even hard yet." Sam put his hands on Dave's fleshy, hairy guy, poking and prodding at it, "You're right, it's still soft. What about you, Puck?" Sam said, laying his body across Dave's soft stomach and checking Puck's for fullness, "Neither of you are full? Awesome, because I made a LOT of food. Let's have brunch in bed." Sam said as he left the room again.

Dave and Puck sat up, Dave's belly sitting on his lap slightly, and Sam walked in with brunch - a huge tray of home made fried chicken and MASSIVE mixing bowl of mashed potatoes. He set both on the bed and settled between Dave and Puck's big bodies, "Eat up!" He said, enthusiastically.
1111312221112112122222.title: Snacks and Brunch.

11113122211121121222222.content:
Puck smirked looking at the meal. "Don't mind if I do," he said taking a big hunk of chicken and tore intio it. Dave took one and did the same while Sam looked on admiringly. He loved being with Puck and Dave and being able to help them. Puck and Dave seemed to be in a competition eying one another as they ate their chickens and Sam decided to use that.

"Hey, I wonder who could eat more right now? It would be really interesting to find out. What do you think?"
"I think," Puck said between a mouthful of chicken, "that that's a pretty good idea. What say you Dave?"

"I think that'll work. See how much you progressed Puckerman." They remained mostly quiet after that as they quickly ate chicken and washing it down with even more soda and occasional manly belches. Sam helped by either getting them more chicken or quick rubs of their big bellies and words of encouragement. Eventually the chicken was gone, the result being mainly equal in number of pieces eaten which was both a a surprise to Dave and Puck.

"You've...urrrpp, really improved," Dave said in shock. Puck sat their in shock for a moment as well.
"Wow, I can't believe it." Puck patted his rounded gut and let out another belch. "Uuuuurrrrpp, man that chicken was good. Thanks so much Sam."
"Don't mention it, I just like being able to help." Sam shrugged and placed his hand on Puck's belly, rubbing it which made Puck sigh in relaxation. Dave shifted.
"My turn," Dave said stiffly and Sam grinned and moved over to him rubbing Dave's belly as well.
"Who is your favorite anyhow?" Dave asked and Sam shrugged.
"I like both you guys but in this case I do think Puck will probably win." Dave thought for a moment and then nodded.
"Yeah, I wouldn't be surprised. Puck especially loves Mashed Potatoes, way more than me. I won't make it easy for him though."

Puck had already started on the mashed potatoes, making noises and comments of appreciation on their creaminess as he shoveled them down like he had only just started eating and not just filled up on fried chicken. Dave gave a look to Sam and nodded as he got a spoon as well and started eating from the same bowl eating slower as Dave was beginning to finally feel full. He probably shouldn't have started with eating so many of those sweet cream-filled twinkies and soda but Dave did have a bit of a sweet tooth. Not to mention, mashed potatoes ranked on the list of Puck's favorite foods along with pancakes, chocolate, etc. When it came to his favorites, Puck could be really obsessed as he was with those potatoes and twitched everytime Dave dug his spoon in, causing him to eat faster. Eventually the spoons scraped the bottom and Puck started licking the sides to clear up every last spot. Dave sat back and both he and Sam watched Puck clean out the bowl. When the last spot was cleaned, Puck blinked his eyes looking around for more.

"No...UUUUUUURRRRRRPPPP...no more?" Sam leaned over and poked Puck's solidly bloated stomach.
"Nope. I can't believe you ate all that. You actually beat Dave." Puck groaned and burped again, struggling.
"H-here that? I...ugh-urrrrrpppppp, won." Dave was disappointed for a moment before he grinned.
"That's great Puck, you're the man." Puck smiled at that briefly before his face started to change.
"Sam, better take care of him before he blows chunks on my bed," Dave said as he scooched a bit for Sam to have roon.
11113122211121121222222.title: Puck wins

choices: They wake up a few hours later, bellies empty and ready for their next meal.
111131222111211212222222.content:
Sam looked down at Puck's rock hard stomach and then looked at Dave as he got up from the bed, "Actually, I think you should handle his gut, Dave. You're much better at belly rubs than I am." Sam said as he got up, taking the dishes with him, and leaving the room.
Dave looked over at Puck, "You heard him, Davey. Get to it." Puck said, putting his arms behind his head and closing his eyes. Dave smiled and place his two gigantic bear paws on Puck's stomach, rubbing and soothing it.

Both Puck and Dave sat on the bed in silence as Dave rubbed Puck's growing belly, a smile on their faces, "This is nice, huh?" Dave asked.
"Yeah... It is." Puck said, scratching his chest. Almost twenty minutes went by with neither of them saying anything, until Puck broke the silence, "It's great having Sam here to cook for us, huh?"
"Oh, yeah! He does all the cooking and you and can focus just gaining as much muscle and fat as we want!" Dave said, a big grin on his face.
"Yeah! I mean, his cooking is good, but nowhere as good as yours." Puck said.
"Really?"
"Oh yeah! You're food is like, orgasmic! Some of the best I've ever eaten!"
"Thanks.." Dave said, blushing. He looked down at Puck, his face turning a darker shade of red as he stared at his eyes.
Puck chuckled, "Why are you so red?"
Dave swallowed, "Uh... It's nothing... Okay, that's a lie. Look, I'm gonna be honest with you, Puck. I uh.... I like you."
"I like you too!" Puck said, not realizing what Dave meant.

"No, I mean.. I think you're really hot..." Dave said, avoiding Puck's face.
"Oh... OH." Dave said, realizing what he meant, "Well... I think you're hot too."
"Really?"
"Yeah! I mean, you're the definition of manly! Huge muscles, a hairy body, that massive gut!"
Dave scratched the back of his thick neck, "You mean it?"
"Yeah!" Puck said, "I honestly think I've always been kind of attracted to guys like you. I just didn't realize it until now...."
Dave smiled, "So, uh... do you wanna go out?"
Puck smiled, "I'd like that!" Puck would have gone in for a kiss, but he was still so stuffed that he simply laid there as Dave rubbed his swollen gut.

Dave, who was equally as full, snuggled up next to his new big boyfriend and laid down, falling asleep with him, their huge bellies pressed together.
111131222111211212222222.title: Like old times.

1111312221112112122222221.content:
It was absence of Dave's thundering snores that woke Puck up. Yawning, he stretched and got out of bed, feeling totally refreshed. Scratching his belly, Puck bent down to put on some tighter jeans and a comfortably snug tanktop that emphasized his big arms, broad chest, and thick belly. He was definitely even more of a manly hot stud and he hadn't been horrible to look at before. Desirable and attractive, the Puckasaurus had regained his swagger and confidence that had been lacking for what seemed like a long time. With pride in his strut, he went to go find his buddies Sam and Dave. It didn't take long to find them as Sam and Dave were playing a game of Poker which Dave clearly wasn't very good at. Puck walked up to the table and sat down.

"What up dudes?" Sam shrugged as he revealed the next few cards from the stack.
"Not much, just crushing Dave at Poker while dinner for the three of us is cooking." Puck sniffed the air appreciatively.
"Smells good, what we having?" Dave groaned again as Sammy unveiled a triplet as well as a pair.
"Damn it, not again," Dave groaned as he handed over the pile of chips. "You have to be cheating."
"Nope, I just seem to be getting really good hands. Too bad it isn't real money we're playing with right now."
"Yeah, you'd be raking it in," Dave griped. "Can't freaking believe it, you won every round except for like one."
"Instead I'm making you guys dinner. Almost unfair really." Sam turned and eyed Puck's belly and grinned. "Almost unfair, but not really."
"But what are we having?" Puck asked again. "It smells really good."
"Potroast," Sam said. "We're haing potroast. Just going to let it stew for another hour or so before it's ready."
"When did you start making it?" Puck asked.
"When you guys were asleep, a couple of hours ago."
"It cooks really slowly."
"Tell me 'bout it," Sam said. "Anyways, want to play?" Puck grinned and nodded as he sat down and Dave leaned back to watch.
"Yeah I do but trust me, you won't like it." They played a few rounds and true to Puck's prediction, Sam's luck flip-flopped and he was losing.
"Woah, you're really good," Sam said after Puck scooped him again. "How do you keep doing that?" Puck shrugged.
"I've learned how to count cards, comes in handy when playing." Sam huffed as he shuffled the cards back in.
"Cheater, I don't want to play anymore."
"It's not cheating really since it requires a fair bit of concentration and memory."
"Whatever, I have to go check on the Pot Roast, it might be ready soon anyways." Sam left through the doorway to the kitchen and Puck turned to see Dave smiling at him.
"What?" Puck asked confused.
"You're really something you know that?"
"I am going to assume that's a good thing."
"Trust me, it is. You're just incredible." The look of admiration in Dave's eyes caused Puck to flush a little.

"Uh, thank you. I...oh forget it. We're together or something now so I can do this." Grabbing Dave's face, Puck leaned in and kissed him briefly. Dave stood there stunned for a brief moment before wrapping his arms around Puck and pulling him against him as he roughly gnashed teeth on Puck's lip. Sam chose that moment right there to walk in.

"Hey guys it's time for...woah!" Sam watched with rapt attention as Puck and Dave continued to kiss roughly. "Wow, I leave for less than a minute..." he mumbled under his breath, He continued to stand there waiting while Puck and Dave continued their intense make out session. Finally just as Sam was beginning to wonder if he should leave to give the pair privacy, they slow down and reobserve their surroundings. Dave blushed when he saw Sam.

"Did you see-?" Dave started and Sam nodded.
"Oh yeah. Right in front of me the whole time." Dave turned an even more interesting shade of red while Puck laughed.
"So what did you think?" he asked.
"Think about what?" Sam wasn't sure what Puck was referring to.
"Me and Dave."
"Okay. I can not say it's much of a surprise at this point. So when?"
"Just today actually."
"Cool, that's cool," Sam said again. "Don't mind at all. Anyways, I just wanted to tell you dinner is ready."
"Is it? Let's get to it," Dave said excitedly.
"Yeah," Puck nodded. "This baby demands it." Puck pats his stomach and Dave laughed when it growled. He was still laughing when his belly growled as well causing Puck to laugh.

"Well, let's get started if your stomachs are demanding food," Sam said as he led them into the kitchen.
1111312221112112122222221.title: Dinner and Cardgames

choices: The finish the cakes: Puck is stuffed and Dave is still hungry
11113122211121121222222212.content:
"Actually, scratch that!" Sam said from the kitchen before walking back in, "Dinner won't be ready for another hour. The pot roast isn't finished."

Puck lower lip stuck out into a pout, "An hour? Thats gotta be like, like, forever away."

Dave chuckled at his bulky boyfriend, "It's okay, Puck - er.. baby. We can wait an hour." Dave scratched at his cheek, it was gonna take a while to get used to this whole relationship thing with Puck. Dave placed his massive hand on Puck's ever growing belly and rubbed it, "It's not like waiting an hour will make you lose this sexy thing."

Sam smiled, "You two won't have to wait, actually!" Sam walked back into the kitchen and returned with two of the biggest cakes Dave and Puck had ever seen in their lives. Each cake had three layers and they were both at least the size of large pizzas. Sam set them down next to the constantly-growing couple, "I went out and bought these while you guys slept. Double chocolate fudge! Nobody can resist these bad boy."

Puck and Dave's faces lite up at the sight of these two massive cakes. Without saying a word, Puck and Dave each grabbed the cake in front of them and instantly went to work, devouring the cakes. Sam was about to go and get forks for them, but he quickly realized that these two were having much more fun using their hands. Dave and Puck groaned happily as they shoveled fistfuls of cake into their mouths, doing their best not to spill any of it. Thirthy minutes went by and the two were almost half way through the thick, chocolatey cakes. While showed no signs of slowing, Puck was beginning to slow down, though he pushed on, determined to finish the cake and to keep up with his big bellied-boyfriend.
11113122211121121222222212.title: Cake before dinner.

111131222111211212222222121.content:
Even Puck had his limits. When it came to food, whatever Dave's limits were, they were definitely more than Puck's when it came to food. That doesn't mean the Puckster was going to give up of course since he was a bit competitive, and he wanted to prove to Dave and himself that he was a big eater as well, but man was he full. It had been a shock to actually win at lunch earlier but that was different and not going to be applicable here. Dave recovered faster from binges and this was one rich chocolate cake. As his chewing slowed, the thick gooey fudge stuck to the top of his mouth and throat and made the going even slower as his brain was beginning to send the full signal. The taste was still good but he was beginning to feel sick of it to his stomach. Darn, and there was only a little bit left to go too. Sam who was noticing Puck's struggle, came over.

"Hey, what's wrong?" Sam asked and Puck groaned.
"Cake...so good...but so filling." Puck shuddered and burped loudly, trying to keep from throwing up or falling unconscious. Sam quickly rushed into the kitchen and came back with a glass of milk. Supporting the moaning Puck, he helped him drink it.

"There, that better?" Sam asked and Puck made a sound.
"Ugh, not really but a little now that my throat's clear. I'm so freaking full." Sam looked down at Puck's plate.
"Are you serious? You're so close to finishing, you might as well man." Sam said.
"No way, I'm too full," he groaned. "Uuuuuuurrrrrrpppp." He moaned as another belch rumbled through.
"Well, I'm going to help you," Sam said. Ignoring the withering death glare Puck sent him, Sam scooped up some cake and brought it near Puck's face.
"Open up, you're going to finish this cake whether you like it or not."
"Ugh, why?" Puck moaned as he rubbed at his stomach.
"That's what you guys brought me on for, to help keep you eating until you no longer could," Sam said smirking.
"I'm pretty sure I've reached that stage already though," Puck groaned again. Sam shook his head.
"Nah, just a barrier. I know you could at least finish this cake before really being done."
"You...fucking..."Puck started to say before Sam stuffed chocolate in his mouth. Puck was forced to swallow as the stuff was sticky and cloggy in the throat.

"What are you-" He was interrupted again with more chocolate. It only took a third time to convince him to not bother saying anything but continue to shoot laser death glares from his eyes at Sam although Sam seemed immune. He also whined and tried to not throw up as bit by bit, the remaining cake disappeared. After the last few crumbs were gone, Sam leaned up.

"There you go. How was that?" Another massive rumble and Puck gave a record-breaking burp for him.
"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP....." It went on for quite a while that even Dave looked over in awe. When it was over Puck started shouting quite a number of curses. Sam just walked over and started massaging Puck's way too over-stuffed and full belly.

"Uuurrrppp...fuck that's amazing...don't you dare stop or I'll seriously fucking kill you..." Puck moaned as he added his hands, frantically trying to restore equilibrium. Sam just grinned.

"So again, how was it?" Puck flipped him the bird for a brief moment before returning. Dave who was finishing his cake, came over.
"Puck baby, you okay?" He asked.
"Will...will be...eventually. If I don't murder Sam in the meantime." Puck complained.
"Yeah, he's going to be fine later," Sam said way too cheerfully. "I see you've finished."
"Good stuff," Dave said patting his belly.
"I've still got Pot Roast which should be done about now," Sam said. Puck moaned loudly.
"No, please no!"
"Not for you, although it is a bit disappointing since I've spent so long making it, but for Dave, if he's still hungry."
"I could eat some," Dave said. "Still got room in this big old belly of mine."
"Awesome, you're going to love it," Sam said. "Puck, I'll be back for you shortly once I take care of Dave."

choices: The next morning Puck and Dave woke up and Sam admires their bodies.
1111312221112112122222221211.content:
Once Sam got up and walked into the kitchen to make Dave's plate, Dave sat down in the seat Sam was in; placing his big bear paws on Puck's enormous, bloated belly rubbing it lovingly, "You okay, babe?"
Puck let out a huge belch before groaning, "Uuuugh... I feel like I'm gonna throw up."
Dave chuckled, "Really? I thought a big, tough guy like you could handle a measly little cake like that."
Puck took a deep breath, "I tried, babe, but I'm not you. I just don't have the capacity for something that big yet."
Dave smiled and he leaned down as gave Puck's bloated belly a kiss, "Just try and relax, okay? I'll come back to rub your belly once I finish dinner, okay?"
Puck nodded, "Uuuugh... Okay."

At that moment Sam walked in carrying Dave's plate and Dave let out a low, impressed whistle. Instead of a regular plate, Sam had brought Dave's mashed potatoes and pot roast in on a giant 27X20 inch steel serving tray, "Dinner is served."
Dave rubbed his belly eagerly, "How much is there?" He asked.
"All of it." Sam said.
Dave was suprised, "ALL of it?"
"Yep!" Sam said, "Since Puck is too full to eat any of it, and I hate having leftovers, I thought you could just eat it all. You've got the biggest appetite of any man I've ever met, Dave!"
Dave grinned, "You're just flattering me. I'll do my best!" Dave sat down at the table, his belly folding over onto his lap. Sam put the plate in front of him, along with a fork and a two liter of soda, and without a second though, Dave began shoveling food into his open mouth.

An hour passed by and Dave hadn't said a word the entire time; he was to busy gorging. It shouldn't have been possible for Dave to eat as much as he did, since he had just devoured that entire cake, but he couldn't stop himself from stuffing his face with pot roast and potatoes. Sam had made enough food for 5 people and Dave had eaten every single bite. He dropped his fork on the serving tray and groaned, leaning back. His stomach was just as distended and bloated as Puck's was and the two could barely move. Sam smiled, proud of his work, and he slowly helped Puck and Dave up one at a time and lead them to the bedroom for the night. Once both were in bed, he stripped them down to their boxers (he undressed as well) and got between the two bloated bears, alternating between bellies to rub until they both fell asleep. Sam pulled the covers over all three of them and happily fell asleep between their warm, food filled guts.

Puck takes both Dave and Sam for dinner with his mom
11113122211121121222222212111.content:
Sam woke up and yawned, stretching his arms out and poking into Dave's full bloated belly as he did so. Dave mumbled a bit and turned before continuing his chainsaw snoring. Sam felt a bit tired having had to listen to the racket and realizing he was in bed with two beautiful and very, very big men kept him awake for a long time. Getting up, Sam sleepily shuffled out of bed and got out clothes for the day. Turning back to look at them, Sam was still somewhat surprised that the bed had managed to hold all three of them considering they took up most of it. It certainly had been a tight squeeze but damn it had been worth it, even if he was so dead tired. Feeling the completely stuffed solid flesh on either side was...well, heaven really. Also, Puck and Dave were really cute all snuggled together and even holding hands while fast asleep. Puck had been holding onto Sam when he woke up as well and that had been a bit of a struggle to get out of at first but he finally made it. Sam headed into the bathroom to wake up and wash the sleep out with a nice hot shower trying to not think of the two in his bed...okay, he better make it cold. Standing there shivering, Sam stumbled out, getting dressed. One of them had to get the day started.

"Good morning sleepy heads," came Sam's voice into Puck's head. "Or should I say afternoon? You've guys been asleep for a while and I was going to wake you up but honestly I have nothing planned and I doubt you too do and you were pretty tired so I thought it best to let you guys rest for a while." Puck grunted as he pulled himself up, his brain still somewhat asleep.

"Oh hey Sam...what time is it?"
"Noon time and although I don't mind you guys sleeping in my bed, I still think you should get up for some part of it. Dave is still asleep and I can't wake him."
"Oh that...that's easy." Puck reached over and felt under Dave's belly.
"There's a certain spot here that's really ticklish to him for some reason. If all methods of waking him up fail, this one works best." Puck started tickling and after a few moments Dave started twitching and then laughing as he came awake.

"Hahaha, please stop it, I really shouldn't have told you about this should I?"
"Nope, not really. But it's cool." Puck leaned back against the pillow and yawned. "Man I'm tired." Dave chuckled a bit.
"You're almost lazier than I am now." Puck scoffed at that.
"Please, as if. I'm just taking a break from responsibility for a bit not to mention last night...wow. Just...wow."
"I'm hoping that's a compliment," Sam said grinning.
"Yeah, I'm not sure whether I should thank you or skin you alive you sadist."
"I'll take that as a compliment then."
"Okay, I am so getting you later."
"You won't catch me. You couldn't even catch me when you had a 4% bodyfat or whatever and now you're...a lot higher." Sam's eyes traveled down Puck's belly. Puck followed him and grinned as he patted it.

"Yeah, but it's pretty sexy and manly. Even my mom is into it, but not in that sense." Puck grimaced at the thought. "But yeah, she's kind of proud, it's almost scary."
"Really? I did not know that," Dave said.

"Glad I'm finally settling down with someone or something, I don't know. Blah blah growing up, responsibility, a bit disappointed that she won't have any Jewish grandchildren but she's happy that I've found someone after Beth when I nearly...anyways yada yada I'm becoming a man since you aren't really a man until you get a few extra pounds and I finally take extra at dinner." Puck rubs it thoughtfully. "Weirdly enough it gets her off my case which is a rather unexpected pro."

"I say. You are a stud," Sam said sitting on the bed and crawling over as he ran his hands over it.
"Don't forget modest," Puck said smirking as he flexed his arms and Sam smirked back.
"Modest too. How could I forget?"
"So does your mom know we're dating?" Dave asked curiously.
"Well since it only became official," Puck glanced at Dave, "I don't believe so but I'm pretty sure she suspects it. Women have a way of knowing."
"Yeah, not to mention you make it really obvious when you're interested in someone," Sam said. "You're not exactly the most subtle, like at all."

"Eh, I believe in being straightforward and upfront which is better than all the games and cheating that went and probably still go on." Sam decided not to mention that Puck was lying about being honest in everything since he knew a bunch of times when Puck wasn't but Puck was right about not cheating and playing games.

"Since we're being honest here, how do you feel about threesomes?" Sam asked casually. Getting directly to the point was the best tact to take with Puck. Puck's smile widened.

"Threesomes, definitely awesome. I have no qualm there. Want some tips?"
"Ah, probably later. How would you and Dave feel if you expanded your lovenest a bit?"
"I wouldn't mind, what bout you Dave?"
"Huh?"
"You, me, Sammy boy having fun times." Dave looked blank and only understood it when Puck started miming which caused him to blush.
"Uh...um...if he wants, I guess. He does have pretty kissable lips and can cook." Puck smirked.
"Yes, cooking is important."
"Then you've got no problem."
"I guess we don't."
"Good then."

111131222111211212222222121111.content:
“Now, the real question is this,” Puck said, “How do you guys wanna do this threesome thing?”
Dave blinked, “What do you mean?”
“Well,” Puck looked at Dave “Like… Are we going to be in a relationship with Sam as our threesome-fuck-buddy? Or do we want to try the three of us actually dating? Like, all three of us our each others boyfriends?”
Sam scratched his chin, “Hmmm… I wouldn’t mind having two boyfriends. What about you, Dave?”
Dave blushed and scratched his head, “Well… Whatever you want, Puck.” He said. He didn’t really care if Sam was his boyfriend or not, but if Puck wanted this than he’d be happy to call Sam his boyfriend as well.
Puck grinned, “Well, than I guess I’ve got two boyfriends now!”

Sam, grinning at the fact that he was in two relationships with such big men, eagerly stood up, grabbing Puck’s wrist as he did. Once they were both on their feet, Sam turned to Dave, “One of the reasons I’m so happy about this is that now I don’t have to hold back when I admire you two.”
Dave chuckled deeply, “You were holding back on us?”
Sam smirked, “I was, but now I get to really admire you both.” Sam placed his hands on Puck’s large, firm pecs and squeezed them, making Puck grin, “I really like how, even though you’ve put on so much weight, you’re still as big and muscular as before.” Sam said.
“Hey,” Puck said, “I’m even more muscular.” Puck flexed his huge arms and Sam grinned, squeezing them as well.
“You sure are.” Sam said, his hands trailing back down Puck’s muscular torso before getting to his much bigger belly, “I always thought your abs were sexy, Puck, but this gut you’ve developed is even sexier.” He said, kissing it before giving it a smack, watching it slightly jiggle.
Puck smirked, “That’s not the only place my weight has gone to.” Puck turned around and grabbed the waistband of his boxers, pulling them down over his much larger ass. It was still strong and muscular, but it was much rounder and plumper than before.
Sam got down on his knees and squeezed it happily, “Big and round all over. It’s a really sexy look for you, Puck.”

As Sam was down on his knees, happily admiring and playing with Puck’s fat ass, he felt Dave’s massive body walk up behind him, “What about me?” Dave asked, a little sheepishly.
“Mmmm… How could I forget about my new big bear?” Sam said, standing up and placing his hands on Dave’s pecs, squeezing them, “You and Puck have such different bodies, Dave. It’s really sexy.”
“Really?” Dave asked, feeling a little bit more at ease with Sam’s groping.
“Yeah! Puck’s body almost all muscle with a sexy gut and a fat ass, but you’re a big boy, Davey. You’re pecs are massive but they’re so much softer and rounder than Puck’s.” Sam’s hands went to Dave’s gigantic biceps, “Same with your arms. They’re so round and soft, but so strong with muscle.”
Dave grinned; flexing his huge biceps hat bulged with both muscle and fat. Sam gave them a few loving squeezes before his hands trailed down to Dave’s belly, “And let’s not forget this little guy.” He said, playfully. Sam placed his hand on the bottom of Dave’s belly, where it hung over his waist and boxers, and happily jiggled it, sending a few ripples across Dave’s big, furry belly. He got on his knees; like he did for Puck, and he gave Dave’s belly a kiss, “Mmmmm… so big and meaty. I just want to make it bigger.”
“Speaking of bigger,” Puck said, grabbing Dave’s huge shoulders and turning him around, placing Sam right in front of Dave’s massive ass. Puck didn’t hesitate to pull his boxers down over it, revealing it to Sam, “Check THIS out. Is this not the FATTEST ass you’ve ever seen?”
“Puck, stop… You’re making me blush…” Dave said, his face bright red.

“No, he’s right.” Sam said, jiggling both of Dave’s gigantic butt cheeks. Dave’s butt was twice the size of Puck’s but it wasn’t nearly as muscular. “You’ve got such a huge, sexy, gigantic ass, Dave.” Sam said, giving it one small smack and watching it jiggle before standing up and maneuvering his two boys so both of their bellies were facing him. He happily rubbed both; “I can’t wait to make you two as muscular and fat as you want.” All three guys laughed before Sam felt Puck’s hand on his abs, “What about you? Feel like adding a few pounds? I think you’d look amazingly sexy with a big, fat gut.” Puck said.

Sam chuckled, “I bet I would, but I don’t think so. I like being the “skinny” guy.” Sam lowered his hands down to both of his boyfriend’s huge asses and squeezed both of them, “So… How about we celebrate out new relationships with a little bed time?”
Both Dave and Puck knew they were about to have an amazing night with their new boyfriend, and all three quickly hurried to the bed.

~~

An hour later Sam, Puck, and Dave were lying in bed, all three of them sweaty and naked. Sam eagerly got out of bed and smiled back at them, “I’m gonna go shower again. Once the two of you are cleaned up and dressed, I’ll make you both the biggest breakfasts you’ve ever.” Sam grabbed a clean and headed to the shower.

Puck looked at Dave and grinned, “So… best sex ever or best sex EVER?”
Dave smiled, “Definitely best sex EVER.”

choices: Getting to know Puck and Sam further over breakfast
1111312221112112122222221211112.content:
Sam was making a good country breakfast when the doorbell rang. Wondering who that could be since Puck didn't tell him he was expecting anyone, Sam opened the door and blinked.

"Uh, hi. Can I help you?"
"Yeah. Is this the Puckerman place?" Sam looked at the guy who was a total stranger.
"Um, do I know you?"
"Is this or is this not the Puckerman house?"
"Uh yeah it is." Sam was startled when the guy pushed him aside and came in sitting down at the table.
"Smells good. Whatcha making?" The stranger Sam had never seen before asked.
"Um breakfast ham and eggs but what are you doing?"
"Sitting," the guy replied smartly. Sam rubbed his head not wanting to deal with a smartass like this.
"Yes. But in who's house?"
"Apparently mine for the next year or whenever."
"Excuse me? I think you're confused-"
"Yeah, this is the right place. I'm going to be living here for the next year or so with my older brother Noah Puckerman."
"Puck has a brother?" Sam asked confused. "How come he never said?"

"I'm not entirely sure if he knows about me, can't say I know much about him other than his name. My mom just decided to drop me off here for a bit while she and my new step-dad or whatever get settled and thought I should get to know my own half-brother. How she came to the conclusion that dropping me off with a total stranger, even if they are related, for so long is a good idea I don't know but supposedly Mrs. Puckerman knows and has agreed to letting me stay at her place." Puck came down the stairs in just boxers.

"Smells good Sam." Puck said grinning, not noticing the new addition sitting at the table.
"Thanks. Puck, we've got a visitor." Puck blinked and Sam pointed at the table where he was sitting.
"Oh, hi. Uh...what are you doing here?"
"Are you Noah?" the guy asked.
"Uh, yeah, who's asking?"
"I'm Jake. I'm your brother and I'm going to be living here." There was silence for a few moments. Puck stared a few moments blankly before laughing.
"Hah! You almost had me going there! No really, who are you?" The guy stared back solemnly.
"I told you. I'm Jake, your brother, half-brother actually, and am going to be living here for a bit while my mom and new step-dad get things settled and whatever." Puck look stunned.

"Oh okay...its a bit much even if I shouldn't be surprised there are others running around. After all, it's dad we're talking about." Both he and Jake made a similar disgusted face and Puck smirked. "What do you know, you are my brother. Dad sucks."

"The suckiest," Jake said grinning as he and Puck high-fived. "I must admit, you're not what I expected."
"What were you expecting?" Puck asked curiously. Jake thought for a moment.
"Don't know really, just you know I guess kind of like him banging chicks all the time or whatever."
"Heh I did. Some fun times but I'm done with that shit. Some women, they just mess you up." Jake raised his eye curiously.
"You bat for others now-hope you don't mind me asking but I am curious and won't judge you but-do you?"
"Yeah, got two boyfriends." Jake whistled.
"Kinky. I'm in between at the moment since my last girlfriend broke up with me accusing me of cheating on her with another."
"Did you?" Puck asked.
"Not intentionally, I didn't really know what I was doing at the time. In fact I thought it was her since they strangely looked sort of similar despite not being related."
"Wow. So she didn't believe you?"
"Nope. It probably also didn't help that I was known as a player which I admit I had been."
"I know what you mean."
"Yeah, one of the few things I did know was your legendary exploits. It made my mom nervous a bit but was eventually convinced that it was safe to come here."
"That must have been weird."
"Yeah, I was worried at first but you're pretty alright, nothing at all like dad."
"That's good. I would hate for you to think me anything like that bastard."
"You didn't even know I was coming, why would my opinion have mattered?"
"Just cause. Anyhow, want anything to eat? Sam's making breakfast if you haven't had any yet or whatever."
"Uh sure. Smells good and I haven't had anything to eat yet."
"Don'tt worry, that won't be a problem around here," Puck said as he chuckled patting his belly.
"I admit that was one thing that I didn't expect. That you would be, you know, so big."
"Aww thanks. No but really, you're right. I didn't have this then."
"So you deliberately?" Puck noticed that Jake was sounding both surprised and pleased...
"It was both for me and as a deterrent for the more shallow girls when I got tired of that. Not to mention, it just feels good."
"That's interesting. So you live with both your boyfriends?"
"Not quite but essentially since they could come over whenever since Mom has to work a lot. You'll meet her at some point I think."
"I'm sure she's lovely."
"She is. She's a good mom." Puck grinned when a plate filled with ham and eggs was dropped down. "My friends really do know how to cook. You'll meet Dave later."
"So, you want any?" Sam asked and Jake shrugged. "Sure, that would be great." Sam grinned as he dropped a huge plate in front of him as well.
"You're going to fit quite well in soon enough."
1111312221112112122222221211112.title: Jake, Puck's Brother

choices: Dave comes in and is starving.
11113122211121121222222212111121.content:
As soon as Jake took a bite of the massive plate of scrambled eggs, he let out a groan of both happiness and shock. These were the BEST eggs he'd ever eaten! Instead of talking with Sam and Puck, Jake spent the few minutes stuffing himself with eggs. Puck chuckled, "Looks like he's got the famous Puckerman appetite."

"You mean the appetite you developed, babe?" Same said, smiling as he set a gigantic plate of biscuits and gravy in front of Jake.
Puck smiled, "Sure did!" Puck leaned back in his seat, his hand behind his head and his other on top of his big stomach, and watched as his baby brother stuffed himself. As soon as Jake finished the eggs, he grabbed the biscuits and gravy and started stuffing them down as well. Puck watched, interested by what he saw. For being related to him, Jake was a lot smaller than he was; he wasn't nearly as muscular and he sure didn't have the extra chunk that was now spread across his entire body. Puck grinned as he stood up and walked over to Sam, wrapping his arms around his thin boyfriend's waist and leaning into his ear, "Hey, Sammy?"
Sam's face turned red at the feeling of Puck's strong arms and soft belly against him, "Yes?"
"You love me, right?" Puck asked.
"Of course I do. What is it?" Sam replied.
"Well, I was thinking. My baby bro looks a little thin, doesn't he? I think you and I should help him beef up some. I know you'd love another man around to watch grow."
Sam's face turned even redder at the thought of his massive Dave and TWO huge Puckermans, "I'm in." Sam quickly sprinkled some of the weight gain powder onto the next plate of biscuits and gravy and Puck grinned, taking the plate and giving it to Jake himself. The second the plate was set down, Jake grabbed it and started eating.

Sam and Puck spent the next hour or so getting to know Jake, or at least, what they could get out of him when they weren't encouraging him to eat more and more. They found out he shared a lot of similar interests as them; he loved video games, action movies, basketball, and football. It took some working over but they were able to find out that Jake also enjoyed singing and performing, and that he even took ballet lessons.
"Ballet? Really?" Puck asked.
"Hey," Jake replied, "Ballet is awesome. I've been taking it for years and I'm really good."
"Why don't you show us some moves?" Sam asked.
"Ugh... I would but I think I ate too much." Jake said, rubbing his bloated belly. Sam and Puck had fed Jake so much weight gain powder that he ended up shoveling down 20 plates of food.

Sam grinned, "It's cool, dude." Just them, Puck's belly growled in need of food, "Oops... Sorry, Puck. I fed Jake here everything I made for breakfast."
Puck shrugged, "It's cool. We can just order a couple dozen pizzas for Dave and I."
11113122211121121222222212111121.title: Getting Jake on the gainer train.

choices: Lunch for Sam, Puck, and Dave
111131222111211212222222121111211.content:
Dave came in then. "Hey guys, slept in a bit and took a shower so I hope there's still food...uh who are you?" he asked when he saw the new visitor in the kitchen. Puck smirked and moved behind his brother.

"This strapping young stud is none other than a genuine Puckerman! Jake Puckerman meet Dave Karofsky my other boyfriend, Dave, meet my half-brother Jake Puckerman. I just met him today but he is my brother and he is going to be staying with us." Jake let out a huge belch then, turning red as he did so.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP." They all stared for a few seconds before Dave, Sam, and Puck started laughing while Jake sat there confused and still blushing.

"Nice one," Dave said glancing over. "I can see the resemblance now that you mention it."
"Excuse me," Jake said still blushing which made them laugh harder.
"Oh man I'm sorry but your face right now, it's too much," Puck said gasping in between laughs.
"Yeah, well fuck you guys," Jake said miffed. Puck stopped laughing.
"Jake, manners!" Sam raised his eyebrows behind him.
"Puck, you're going to chide him on manners? I remember you cussing up a storm just a few days ago in fact using some of the most disturbing connotations I've ever heard." Puck rolled his eyes. "Got to be a role model now, guide my younger brother with my wisdom." Jake and Sam both snorted in disbelief.
"Uh I can still hear you and psh you're only older by about two or three years."
"Exactly."

"So about breakfast...any left?" Dave asked looking around hopefully.
"Nope, Jake ate it all."
"Really?!" Two voices exlaimed, both surprised.
"Yeah," Sam said shrugging. "Didn't expect another guest coming over this morning."
"But all of it..." Dave moaned.
"Don't worry, I'll order pizza," Sam said going to the phone. "It's 11 now which is close enough to lunch anyways after your long sleep-in and shower."
"But I heard you were making eggs and stuff....dang it," Dave said.
"If it's any consolation at all, they were delicious," Jake offered.
"I can tell," Dave said looking at Jake's bloated stomach. Jake's shirt was pushed up by the straining confines of his packed belly. Jake looked down and shook his head.
"Man I don't know what came over me," he said regretfully. Puck moved to Dave and tapped him.
"Hey can we talk in private?" he asked and Dave nodded. Puck looked back at Jake.
"I'll be back soon, just got to talk to Dave for a few minutes kay?"
"Kay," Jake said looking around. Puck and Dave moved to the other room.
"Hey, wanna see my impressions?" was the last audible thing before Dave and Puck crossed into the living room and shut the door.

"So yeah," Puck said awkwardly. "Again like I said, Jake is going to be staying with us for a while."
"Hey I don't mind, I was just a little surprised is all," Dave said. "Although how long is that?"
"Possibly throught the school year," Puck said rubbing his Mohawk.
"Ah, wow and your mom doesn't mind?"
"No, she wants to meet her other sort-of son and stuff, or something. Not quite sure what her reasons are."
"You probably should make sure she isn't going to whack him."
"Dave my mom wouldn't do that." Puck said, alarmed.
"I know but you should make sure."
"Well whatever. I just wanted to apologize about breakfast since me and Sam gave it all to Jake." Dave's stomach let out a roar of hunger at the mention of food. Puck smirked and leaned down and kissed it. "So hot babe," then Puck giggled. Dave raised his eyebrow.

"What?"
"Just thinking back before all this started. Voluntairily being with not just one guy but two. Well not that part but being guys and actually being happy."
"You deserve to be." Puck's eyes glistened.
"That...that is..." Puck launched himself at Dave taking him down in Dave's surpise as he landed kisses on him. The door opened for a moment and Sam came in seeing.
"Dang what did I miss?" he asked in one of his impression's voice. He knelt down next to them. "Don't mind if I join?" Puck scooted over a little and gave Sam room to take Dave's other side. Puck returned to massaging Dave's massive pecs, Sam working on the stomach.
"Hey guys, whatcha doing?" Jake called and they froze as reality set back in. Dave's stomach gurgled loudly again as did Puck's.
"Well that's a mood ruiner," Puck joked looking disappointed.
"Yeah," Dave said possibly even more.
"Should call for pizza now," Sam said getting up.
"Yeah, check on my baby bro," Puck said pushing himself up.
"You're scarily protective," Dave said, struggling a little to right himself. Puck leaned a hand down and pulled him up.
"I never had a brother before," Puck said.
"Regardless. Though I must ask considering he just ate all of breakfast, is he going to be joining us?" Dave asked.
"Yes, going to be another addition of our growing family," Puck said with a smirk. "In all senses of the word."
"I bet he has no clue," Dave said.
"No, not yet. But he'll go for it eventually. It'd be too hard to resist."
"I'd bet, with you and Sam encouraging him subtly or directly and all the food we'd eat, it'd be a miracle if he didn't get bigger."
"It's in the genes," Puck said proudly.
"It certainly looks good in your jeans," Dave smirked back as he slapped Puck's big belly causing him to laugh.
111131222111211212222222121111211.title: Dave comes in

1112.content: Sam Evans has always been proud of his six-pack abs, but is he ready to trade it in for a possible keg? The big-lipped blondie is about to start packing on the pounds, but how?
1112.title: Sam Evans.

11123.content:
Sam had always been obsessive about his body. He had been given a gift of a built body along with decent genetics that made it easier to gain muscle than it otherwise might be. It had been his temple, his pride and joy and it was what made him who he was. If he hadn't been buff, he would never have been popular or even anybody. Other than his physical appearance, he was a comic book nerd and geek. He loved Star Wars and was so obsessed with Avatar he had learned Navi and could quote from exact memory every line and where it was in the movie if anyone would ever ask, which no one did. He loved comic books and sci-fi tv shows and had it been possible for him to read, he knew he would have enjoyed that too. Unfortunately, books, especially with small print, were frustrating and did not help his stupid dyslexic self being able to read them. They looked like squiggles on a page and blurry and the words were all mixed up. They made his brain hurt and it made him angry. Had it not been for football and sports, his condition would have made it impossible for him to do well in school, and the only reason he was doing well was the fact that teachers were motivated not to fail the best football players and cheerleaders, even if they were dumb as rocks. Honestly, Sam wondered how Britanny ever passed anything, even with grade fixing her grades were so awful. She was a sweet girl and very nice but stupid. He would have been stupid too if he hadn't been gifted at football just like Brittany at snging and dancing except he wouldn't even have gotten a break because he wasn't that stupid. The fact that he was so smart at everything else but reading and math would make them think he was trying to pull a fast one on them or something. So he stuck to what he had best which was his beautiful body. He had the benefit of extremely cut abs (probably the best anywhere except for those 1 in a 100,000 or whatever number people like him) and big biceps which although not as good as Puck's or a few of the other players, were still bigger than Finn's and he was a better quarterback honestly. He was glad he and Finn weren't fighting over it anymore, but he had to have it at the time. Without it, he might not have made the team or been anymore than a geeky blonde guy.

Then his dad lost his job and everything went to hell in a handbasket. They were barely making it by and Sam had to get a job to support them, delivering pizzas. They lost their house and all their possessions and had to move into a rundown motel and being popular and reputation no longer mattered. What mattered was supporting his family and that's what he did. He may not have been the smartest or strongest but he supported his family and dated at the same time. Then his dad got a new job and they moved. The job wasn't as lucrative as they thought it would be but it was better than when they were getting nothing so they stayed. Sam tried to find another job in the food industry selling icecream but it sucked. It really really sucked. Horrible boss, horrible pay, bratty customers, no tips, insulted all the time, and he didn't even get to taste the damn icecream. He was going insane trying to find something else when he discovered something that ordinarily he would never have thought but knew he could do. He signed on to be a stripper known as "White Chocolate" (he missed Mercedes, his first real girlfriend). Although it was a little bit humiliating, it wasn't as bad as when he was getting mocked at DQ. At least, that's what he told himself. The pay however was infinitely better and he loved the smiles of joy on his parents' faces as he brought the money home. If they knew where he was working, they wouldn't have been as happy but Sam told himself he had too. It was for them that he stripped for strangers and showed off his body. It was his gift, his talent, and if he got paid so much, then why the hell not? It was probably going to be the only thing he'd be able to do after High School anyhow. There was no way to get into college, they simply did not have the money and even if they had, Sam would have failed with his dyslexia. All that reading and math...he couldn't do it. When he was being honest with himself, Sam didn't enjoy the thought of being a stripper and showing off to random strangers who were always grabbing him and making comments as if he was prostituting himself, but it was what needed to be done. Then Rachel and Finn found him and he was humiliated, having to strip for people who actually knew him. He was a prostitute, selling himself for money. Even if he didn't sleep with any of the clients, it still was.

They convinced him to go back to school as did his parents. Sam only agreed because he really had missed it and he had made enough working to support his family for the rest of the school year. He gone back and surprisingly Blaine was at McKinnley now. Sam had nothing against Blaine, had liked him, but Blaine's comment about selling himself out...he did not like that. Did not like it one bit. He may have overreacted a little.

Sam was surfing the web, watching random hilarious youtube videos one day in the library in free period when he came across something weird. He had no idea how he got there but he came across groups of fetish videos. Normally he would have clicked out but as they say, curiousity killed the cat and he had to watch. He watched fat people eating and people giving encouragement for it.

"People actually like this? What the hell is wrong with them?" Sam had wondered until he read the comments. Not only did they like it but they really liked it. It made Sam hot reading all those comments and then he saw something that surprised him even more.

"They actually give money for this?" And some were very generous donors apparently. That set Sam thinking. It may have been similar in appearance to stripping for what people wanted but it gave distance and they couldn't physically touch them. People were more complimentive and it was oddly less stigmatized as well. Plus it would just be eating. Barely anything else to it as far as he could tell and he would give people material to fantasize to. He closed the site, unsure. He was going to have to think further on this.
11123.title: Jobs

111232.content:
When Sam moved back to Lima it was Rachel's two dads who offered their home to him, and Sam couldn't be more appreciative. Rachel's dads were two of the kindest people he'd ever met - not only did they open up their home to him but they also bought him a new laptop so he could do his homework. Sam had the entire house to himself on Saturday - Rachel was with Finn and her Dads were out of town - so he decided it was a good time to look into those videos and the possibility of getting bigger.

He couldn't believe that there were so many people who were supportive of these youtube gainers journey to get fat, but being fat isn't what Sam wanted. If he was going to go through with this, he wanted to keep his muscles and strength, but also lose his abs and get a big belly. He searched around on the internet for a bit before finding a website for muscular gainers, "This is exactly what I'm looking for." Sam browsed around the website for a while, reading comments and forum posts, and he realized that this is exactly what he was looking for. Sam thought long and hard about this, and in the end, he decided he would do it - his family needed the money that he could make from his viewers and he was curious to see what he'd look like as a bigger guy.

Then he remembered something else - Shane. Sam was determined to win Mercedes back from him, and that guy was HUGE. If Sam could get that big as well, maybe he could get Mercedes back. It was decided; Sam Evans was about to start gaining. Sam quickly made an account on the gainer site under the username "ThickWhite_Cocoa91", having grown attached to his stripper name, and made a post about how he was interested in getting bigger and asking for tips. He posted a shirtless picture of himself with his head cropped out and almost instantly Sam got a message from someone named "HelpinUgrow", who also lived in Lima.

"Sup, big guy. I wanna help you get large and in-charge. You in?" Sam thought for a moment and then started typing, "Sure, I'd love the help."

"Sweet. You wanna meet me at Breadstix? I can be there in 30 minutes."
"It'll take me an hour but I can make it."
"Awesome. I'll be at the far corner table on the left in a brown jacket. See you there."

Sam couldn't believe he was about to do this, but he got up from his bed, shut his laptop, and got dressed. After an hour drive from Rachel's house, Sam pulled into an open parking spot at Breadstix and headed inside. He told the lady at the front that he was meeting someone and headed towards the corner table. When he got there, Sam was surprised to see that the man sitting at the table was...
111232.title: Investigating Gaining.

1112321.content:
"Puck, what are you doing here?" Sam asked exclaiming. The mohawked teen just smirked.
"Hey ThickWhite_Cocoa91, I'm here 'HelpinUgrow'," Puck said, grinning at his own pun. Sam however was just confused.
"But...you...huh? You're HelpinUgrow?" Puck pointed at the seat in front of him and waved for Sam to sit. He didn't speak until Sam did.

"Heh, yeah. I admit, I was surprised when I saw something from someone in this town of Lima, let alone anyone interested so I had to talk to you. Plus I thought I recognized that ripped body of yours and here you are. I admit, you didn't strike me as a gainer. I'm pleasantly surprised that you are." Sam however was still lost.

"You're an...encourager?" he said, trying to wrap his mind around it. "I thought you weren't gay." Puck shrugged his shoulders.

"Never said I was, and I'm not. Call it a little interest of mine nobody knows about, not even Rachel or Finn. I'm only trusting you with it because I know you actually can keep a secret unlike the rest of those blabbermouths. I just happen to find large and in charge people incredibly hot. Why do you think I was all over Lauren? Mmmh, yeah she was fine. Too bad she was such a bitch, I had really liked her."

"But...what about you're thing with the 'guns'? You've always been fond of those."

"Sammy boy, you've got a lot to learn. There is no incongruency between me wanting one thing for myself and finding something else attractive in another person. Me, I like being buff.I like it a lot. Ironically, gaining anything but muscle would be not fun for me. However, I find larger people and people such as your luscious self getting larger quite desirable and bad-ass to the extreme. " Puck looked Sam over appreciatively whistling. "And man am I, er. we are going to have fun with this."

"I thought you weren't gay?" Sam said. "I'm not homophobic but this does sound very gay coming from you." Puck sighed, shaking his head.

"Such simple labels as those, it's lucky you have me to teach you. I told you, I'm not gay, nor am I exclusively straight. People like what they like and that's just that. I prefer girls but I am not closed off to the idea of other males. Real alpha bad-asses, none of those sissy rainbow people. Those people are girly, sometimes even worse, and I don't care about them. Take Kurt, he's cool but so not my type. Too fruity and girly but without the assets of being a girl, more the pity. Anyways, we're off on a tangent here, we're here to help you. Tell me Sammy,why are you gaining? Last I checked, you were obsessed with maintaining your perfect abs." Puck put his elbows on the table and leaned forward.

Sam cleared his throat. "Well," he started. "Uh, I discovered this gaining thing quite recently watching videos on youtube. I have no idea how but somehow I come across these fetish videos and watched them and discovered that there are some groups of people who apparently like, as you put it, 'large and in charge' people. Some of them like it so much they even pay." Puck nodded.

"Ah, I see. Your father still doesn't have a job?"
"No, he has one now but we're still trying to level out right now. But any extra income would be welcome and I want to help."
"I heard you were a stripper," Puck said.
"Yeah, it paid better than anything else."
"I'm not surprised. You're ripped."
"Are you jealous?" Sam asked, worried. Puck shrugged.
"Nah,at first maybe but not anymore. Especially since you're interested in becoming a gainer. What are your other reasons? I assume there must be more since I doubt that short of all the money in the world paid to you right away, gainging wouldn't have been considered ever, especially for messing with your abs." Sam blushed a little and lowered his voice.

"I guess...I guess I have always been curious to see what it would be like to be a bigger guy and not worry about weight," Sam said. Puck grinned at him.
"Now we're talking. Anything else?"

"It's a better gig. I could just make videos of my progress and people would throw money at me but this time outside of wishing on the internet, they won't be grabbing my crotch and yanking my underwear down. I won't have to put up with random strangers touching me. Finally, I'm hoping to win back Mercedes." Puck raised an eyebrow at that.

"Mercedes...that's pretty clever actually. Although I can not say for sure absolutely since I only dated her for about a day, I think the diva does prefer boys large and in charge to match her. Other than that one weird time when she had a crush on Kurt, she has always picked large men or been single."

"She had a crush on Kurt?" Sam asked, confused. Puck nodded.
"Yeah, freshmen year. She somehow missed the obvious fact that he was gay. Worst gaydar I ever saw. She broke his car windows when she thought he was dating Rachel. But that's in the past. As for your plan, that actually makes sense. You are a bit skinny for her tastes, although then again, she had been interested in Kurt...argh, digressing again. Still, you're in for some tough competition with that Shane dude. But wanna know a little secret? They won't be lasting much longer since he got a full football scholarship. This is your chance to win Mercedes back. If you start bulking up now over the next few weeks, she's as good as yours."

"Thanks for the tip." Sam said.
"So," Puck says, his mouth stretching into a playful grin. "Feeling hungry?"
1112321.title: Noah Puckerman

choices: Deciding to finish off the rest of the plate
Asking Puck to feed him the rest.
11123211.content:
"Uhh... Yeah, I am." Sam said, a little nervous about this whole thing. Puck's mouth curved into a wicked grinned, "Awesome. Now, I have to warn you, this won't be easy. Hell, it might actually hurt sometimes and you might feel like throwing up, but trust me. It'll be worth it." Puck grabbed the basket of bread sticks on the table and pushed the entire thing over to Sam, "Let's start with this. I wanna see that entire basket gone before our waiter gets here."

Sam took a deep breath before grabbing one of the hot bread sticks and holding it to his mouth, "No going back after this..." Sam took one large bite out of the bread stick, ripping off more than half of it and chewing before swallowing and finishing the other half. Once the bread stick was gone, Sam instantly started going after the rest of the basket. Puck smirked and sat back in his seat, arms crossed over his large chest as he watched his friend chow down. Sam finished the last bread stick and pushed the basket back, smiling at Puck, "So whats - URP - next?"

Puck chuckled and adjusted how he was sitting as their waiter came over and asked for their order, "Yeah, I'll have the Fettuccine Alfredo with chicken and a coke, and this big guy will have the four meat lasagna with another coke. Also, could we get more bread sticks?" The waiter took their order and walked away for a brief moment, coming back with both of their drinks and another basket of bread. "Of course, it's a good thing," Puck said, "Bread is one of the best things a gainer can eat, it really helps pack'em on." It was good." "Do you think you can eat more?" Puck asked. Sam rubbed his swollen belly, "Maybe like... something - UUUURP - .. small." Puck flashed Sam a smile before pushing the rest of his plate over to him, "Here. Eat up." Sam looked down at the plate, which was almost full, and the back up at Puck, "You planned that, didn't you?"

Puck shrugged, "Maybe. Now eat." Sam picked up his fork and started eating the chicken and pasta. If it meant getting bigger, than he could sit through the bloated pains. Sam got about halfway through the plate before becoming way to full. "I can't eat anymore, Puck... It's to much." Puck crossed his arms, "I thought you wanted to get bigger?" "I do," Sam said, "But I feel like I'm going to burst." Sam let out another burp before...
11123211.title: Stuffing Sam

choices: Puck sees Sam at school the next day
Sam is too sick to attend school
111232112.content:
He asked Puck to feed him the rest. "Uuuuurrrp, dude, I can't eat anymore. You need to help me finish it off." Puck gave a grin.
"Aww Sammy, of course I'd help you! Here let me do this." Puck moved into the seat next to Sam and lifted the bottom of Sam's shirt with one hand smirking at the sight of Sam's bloated stomach.

"I'm impressed, who knew your abs could be bloated out so far?" Puck said wonderingly and Sam groaned. Sam couldn't really see all that well right now but he was sure he would be huge. With one hand, he started rubbing Sam's stomach, his rough yet soft fingers tracing sensations across his stomach, and it felt heavenly. Sam Evans the gorgeous blonde with perfect abs was in front of him, totally stuffed to the brim and physically unable to eat anymore, and his stomach bulging out from underneath his shirt. 111232112.title: Asking Puck to feed him the rest.

choices: Puck and Sam eat in peace.
1112321121.content:
After being fed until he felt like he was going to pop, Sam headed home to rest, much to the disapproval of Puck. After getting back to his new home Sam went straight to his bedroom and collapsed on his bed, to full to even bother doing anything but sleep. The bloated teen was fast asleep, but was woken up by the sound of the doorbell ringing. Sam sat up and looked at his bedside alarm, surprised to see that he had slept until eight. He pushed himself out of bed and went to go see who was at the door.

When Sam opened the door, a delivery boy from Breadstix was standing there with a huge take out box, “Are you Sam Evans?” Sam blinked, “Uhh... yeah.” The delivery boy handed Sam the takeout box, “Somebody already paid for your order. Enjoy your food!” The delivery boy headed back to his car, and Sam stood there confused, until he looked down and saw that there was a note reading ‘Eat up, Big Guy.’ Sam shut the front door and headed into the kitchen. He set the food down and pulled his phone out - calling Puck.

“Hey, Sammy! What’s up?”
“I just got a massive takeout order from Bredstix, that’s what’s up.”
“Oh, sweet, you got my order for you. I want you to eat as much of that as you can tonight. Stuff yourself until you can’t eat anymore and then bring the rest of it to school tomorrow.”
“I don’t know if I can eat this, Puck. I’m still full from lunch...” Sam looked down at his stomach, which was no longer hard and bloated. He lifted up his shirt and saw that his abs were did look less defined than they did this morning.
“You slept for six hours, I’m sure your fine. Besides, it’s gonna take a lot of work to get rid of those super cut abs of yours. Just eat what you can and bring the rest to school. I gotta go, dude. See you tomorrow.”

Sam put his phone on the counter and stared at the take-out box: it was one one of those large, aluminum casserole dishes that Italian food is always delivered in. One top of it was a big bag of breadsticks. Sam sighed, “I guess I really don’t have a choice.” He fished out a fork and opened the container; Puck had ordered him a massive spaghetti and meatball dinner that looked like it could feed a family of four. Sam took a deep breath and dug in.

Sam paced himself the entire time as he ate, and after two hours, he was somehow able to eat half of the order and all of the breadsticks. He went to bed at around ten that night, half an hour before Rachel came home, and fell right to sleep with a full, bloated stomach.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The next day at school, Sam was at his locker after class putting books away and when Puck came over, “Hey, Sammy. Haven’t see you at all today.” Puck said, leaning against the lockers. He reached down and grabbed the bottom of Sam’s shirt, pulling it up to get a look at Sam’s fading abs, “Wow, your abs already looking pretty soft.”

Sam pulled his shirt back down, “What are you doing?” Puck laughed, “I’m just checking out my handy work. I was actually pretty bummed out that I wasn’t there to rub your stuffed belly after you ate. Speaking of, how much did you eat?” “Half.” Sam said, pulling out the other half, which was inside of a Tupperware container. A big grin spread across Puck’s face, “I can’t wait to watch you eat it.” He and Puck headed to the big stone steps outside of the school for lunch.
1112321121.title: Puck sees Sam at school the next day.

11123211211.content:
"So how was yesterday?" Puck asked when they sat down.
"How was what?"
"Eating of course! I am curious to know."
"Well...it was exhausting," Sam said. Puck looked down at the area of Sam's stomach.
"I bet," he said grinning. "Is it what you wanted?"
"It is...tough, but actually, I enjoy it. Even if I wanted to murder you yesterday." Puck grinned.
"Glad to hear it. I see you enjoyed my little gift yesterday. I wish I was there but I had to do a couple of things." Puck whistled.
"By the way, I got nice footage yesterday." Sam blinked.
"You did have a camera?"
"Yeah, I didn't want to miss a second and as you told me you wanted to put it online for enthusiasts. I was working on setting the website up and the payment options yesterday."

"Oh thank goodness, I had totally forgotten yesterday." Sam breathed a sigh of relief. "I won't have to do that again." Puck raised his eyebrow.
"Yeah you will."
"I meant losing my eating virginity." Sam said. Puck burst into laughter.
"Eating virginity, what the hell? You're crazy Evans. Nobody remains a virgin eater. Everybody eats food."
"I meant as in deliberately stuffing myself."
"If I had to name it, I'd call it feedee virginity but never mind. I want to see." Sam brought out the pasta container. Puck whistled appreciatively and grinned.

"I can't believe you're such a good eater, last year you were so obsessively not that I thought you were anorexic or dangerously obsessed with exercise. But this year..." Puck grinned, "this year you're awesome." Sam shrugged.

"Thanks," Sam said.
"Your welcome." Puck replied and pulled out a small camcorder. "You ready?" He asked Sam and Sam nodded. "Action," Puck said and Sam dug into the pasta.

Sam played it up for the camera (and because it was good pasta, even if it had to be reheated), making noises of appreciation and random bellyrubs and showing off his stomach as his abs bloated out again. When he finished the pasta, Sam let out a loud burp and grinned as he rubbed his bloated stomach. Unfortunately lunch was starting to come to a close and they had to wrap up soon but Puck gave him a big slice of uneaten pizza which he had Sam scaerf down as well. Then the bell rang and they had to get to class. Puck reached down and helped Sam up who stumbled a little.

"Up you go," he said and grinned as Sam had to straighten and pull down his shirt which had risen a little when he stood. There was an outline of curvature as his bloated belly pushed against the tight fitting shirt.

"Looking hot," Puck said appreciatively as he rubbed it. Sam belched again and waved him off.
"Urrp, yeah I know. But not right now." Puck gave a dramatized sigh.
"Ah, oh the pity. Later you're going to have to let me rub it again."
"Sure, whatever. See you in class."
"Don't forget gym," Puck said grinning wickedly. Sam's eyes widened in shock. Crap he had forgotten that.
"Don't worry, it's weights day. And you're going to have plenty of fuel to burn so I expect you to lift your hardest."
"Huh?"
"I switched with Finn to be your partner/spotter. I bribed him with a gift idea for Rachel as well as a few other things."
"Oh, okay then."
"See you," Puck said waving as he headed into the building. Shifting his shirt again (clearly wearing a tight fitter one was not one of his better ideas but he hadn't been thinking when he chose to wear it), he headed into the building towards his next class.
11123211211.title: Puck and Sam eat in peace.

111232112112.content:
Sam sighed and he pulled at the front of his gym shirt to stretch it out. His stomach was still bloated from lunch and his shirt was clung to his body really well because of it. The outline of his bloated stomach was clearly visible, and Sam was about to suck it in to try and hide it, but Puck walked around the corner and smiled, "Hey there, Sammy. That shirt's lookin' pretty snug." Puck said as he walked over and patted Sam's tiny belly. Sam laughed a little, "Yeah, it is. I think we're gonna have to bump up the amount I eat if we're gonna get rid of my abs." Sam said, shutting his locker. Puck smiled, "True. We gotta get rid of those abs before your belly can really start coming through, but, we can worry about that after school. Right now, we're gonna beef up those muscles of yours."

Sam and Puck walked into the weight room and they went straight to the bench press to work on Sam's chest and arms. As Puck loaded up the weights, Sam's eyes moved over to the massive man he was competing against for Mercedes: Shane. Shane was TRULY a giant; he had massive shoulders, thick arms, and a super-wide back with a huge chest. His stomach was big and rotund, and it even hung over his waistband slightly. He had soft love handles and a round, plump butt that lead down to his tree-trunk thighs and giant calves. Sam felt down right scrawny next just being in the same room as him. Puck put his hand on Sam's shoulder, "Don't worry, Buddy. Soon, you'll be just as big as him. In fact, no. We're gonna make you BIGGER than him." A smile spread across Sam's face, "Awesome."

He and Puck spent the next hour working on Sam's upper body, and when they were finished, they showered up and got dressed. Puck stole glances at Sam's body and he approved greatly at his own hard work After they were dressed, Puck and Sam went to their different classes, and then met up again for Glee club at the end of the day. While Mr. Schue gave his next lesson to the class, and in between breaks of them practicing a few song ideas, Sam and Puck were whispering to each other about where to go for Sam's dinner. After debating it, Sam decided he was in the mood for...
111232112112.title: Gym clothes are tight.

choices: Rachel wonders what Puck and Sam are up to
1112321121121.content:
