After going back and forth on it with Puck, Sam decided to give in and have pizza which Puck felt like being insistent on. "Come on, it'll be good," he had said. "All delicious and dripping with cheese..." and then delivered the final "it will certainly help and your fans will love it."

"I have fans already?" Sam asked and Puck nodded.
"Yeah, they really dig you. I'm not surprised really, you are phenomenal. Of course there are some mean people who have nothing to do with their lives and be useless trolls insulting you, but they are only a few and are far outnumbered by those who are more positive ones."

"And they want me to have pizza?" Puck nodded.
"Ugh fine," Sam said giving in.
"Why are you so unhappy? I thought you liked pizza?" Puck asked confused.
"Oh, I like pizza. But I worked for the pizza place we're going to and it sucked. I swore I would never go back to that place again if I could help it."
"It was worse than DQ?"
"Much worse. At least I got some free icecream there, not that I wanted it at the time but I had the option. Here you get minumum wage, insulted, and not even a modicum of a bonus which at least the icecream store had. I don't want to give that place business."

"Well then we'll find another pizza restaurant," Puck said. "It doesn't have to be at that one if you don't want it to be."
"That would be good," Sam said agreeing.
"Well, how about this one?" Puck asked, stopping the car after driving a bit further. Sam got out and looked.
"What is this place?" Sam asked.
"A pizza place," Puck said grinning.
"O...kay." Sam looked in at the dark windows.
"Are they even open?"

"Yeah," Puck pushed the door open and ushered Sam inside. It didn't seem all that promising with only a few people quietly eating there entirely focused on their own food. Leading Sam to a table he sat him down and got back up.

"What's your pleasure?" Puck asked. Sam burst out laughing.
"That's funny!" Puck just looked at him until Sam stopped laughing. "Uh...cheese pizza?"
"Would that be it? What about drink?"
"Yeah just cheese. To drink could I have Dr. Pepper?" Puck gave a grin then.
"Cheese pizza and Dr. Pepper coming right up sir."
"What are you having?" Sam wondered.

"The same. Don't worry about it." Puck went to the front where he gave the person at the register his order, paid, and went and filled two large cups of Dr. Pepper from the soda machine. Bringing them back, he plopped one in front of Sam and kept the other for himself. "It should be ready in 20 or so minutes," Puck informed him.

"Cool," Sam said and they sat there before Sam started doing impressions.
"And I said...'Houston? We've got a problem,'" Puck was laughing so hard he was nearly spraying his soda everywhere and he waved his hand for Sam to stop.
"Oh man, that is funny! You're really awesome at those," Puck said laughing. Sam smirked back.
"As they say in show business...that's all folks," Sam said in a voice that matched it perfectly. A waitress came up to them then and placed a large pizza down on the serving table.

"One extra-large cheese pizza with extra cheese and one medium meat lovers, please dig in," she intoned in a voice that said how much she didn't care. Puck thanked her anyways and she left.

"Wait, why do we have two?" Sam asked.
"One's for you of course," Puck said nodding his head in the direction of the cheese. "I got my own as well."
"That's...nice," Sam said looking at the pizza.
"I'm sure you can eat a lot of it," Puck said. "Perhaps the whole thing, who can say?"
"It's a bit much I think?"
"Just try it out Sammy, I think if you put your mind to it, you could do much further than you expect."

Puck was right, of course. Once Sam had taken a bite of it and nearly died in heavenly bliss from the best tasting pizza he had ever tasted somehow, it wasn't long before Sam was all over it. Puck ate slower, content to enjoy his pizza and the show, plus it had a bunch of meat.

"How are you recording this anyways?" Sam asked between bites of dripping hot delicious melted cheese.
"Hat cam, plus hand corder," Puck said showing.
"Ah, I wondered what was up with the goofy hat." Sam said grinning.
"You're goofy fish lips," Puck said, pouting. He liked his big fur hat, it was awesome.

Making his way through the pizza, Sam started putting on a little show again as he exaggeratedly licked his lips, rubbed his belly, and moaned in appreciation. Actually, those weren't really exaggerated at all but whatever. After about 10 slices, he started slowing down and panted in exhaustion as he scrabbled with his belly and drink. Puck put the cam down still pointed at them as he made his way over.

"I don't think I can eat anymore," Sam said with a groan.
"I can help you with that," Puck said all seductively and Sam raised his eyebrows. Puck tilted his head slightly back so Sam could see the camera rolling.
"Oh, uh...okay." Puck laced his fingers a moment before he started rubbing and Sam forgot everything and that they were on camera.
"Oh that feels so good," Sam moaned as he bucked into the touch. "Yes, harder!" Puck obliged as he rubbed Sam's stomach and Sam burped loudly.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRPPP, aw man that feels great!" With Puck rubbing, Sam managed to be convinced to eat another few slices leaving only two before he was done, along with the rest of the soda.

"Oh-uuurrrppp-I'm-uuuuurp-done for real," Sam said as he belched uncontrollably. Puck turned the cameras off and continued to rub.
"You are doing such a good job," he murmured and Sam rolled his eyes.
"Sure doesn't feel like it," he muttered before burping again.
"Well you are," Puck said as he continued rubbing.
"Whatever you say," Sam said and groaned.
1112321121121.title: Pizza.

choices: At school, Puck brings Sam another shake doughnuts.
11123211211211.content:
Back at Puck's house, he and Sam were on the couch watching the footage that Puck had taken at the pizza place. As he rubbed Sam's stomach, Puck watched the video with a proud smile on his face. He LOVED that Sam was willing to get huge and that he could be part of this. Sam was amazed that he had eaten as much as he did, his stomach still completely stuffed with food, but he had to admit to himself that he was amazed by the video. He finally understood why some people were so turned on by videos like these, it was surprisingly hot.

When it ended, Puck shut his laptop and looked at Sam, "So, what do you think? Those are the kinds of videos that people pay good money to watch of you." Sam cleared his throat and smiled, "I'll admit it.. it was actually pretty hot."
Puck grinned, "You bet it was!"
"But..." Sam said, "I think my gaining is going a bit too slowly. I mean, at the rate we're going, I'll reach Shane's size by the time we graduate."
Puck patted Sam's belly, "I was thinking the same thing." Puck grabbed the bottom of Sam's shirt and pulled it off of him, "You've put some weight on your stomach, but everything else about you hasn't changed. You've still got your abs, give or take some definition."
"Do you have any ideas how we can beef me up?" Sam asked.
Puck smiled, "Give a second, I have just the thing." Puck got up and headed to his bedroom, "You know, Sammy, I didn't tell you this before, but you aren't the first person I helped turn massive!" He yelled from his room.
Sam blinked, "Who was that?"
"You remember Dave Karofsky? Over summer I helped him gain a TON of weight. You should see him now, he's MASSIVE: big, soft belly with a broad chest, not to mention arms and legs like tree trunks. He goes to a different school now but he's one of the best football players they have." When Puck came back, he had a huge, white jar in his arms, "And I used this to help him." He said, setting it down in front of Sam.

Sam read the label; It was a jar of muscle growth powder called Big and Thick, "You used this on Karofsky?" Sam asked.
Dave shook his head, "Yep! It took about half of the jar to make him into the big bear he is now, but trust me, it was worth it." Puck carried jar back into the kitchen and grabbed the blender, as well as the tub of chocolate ice cream from the freezer. Puck emptied the entire tub of ice cream into the blender, along with six huge scoops of the powder, "This stuff is the best weight gain powder on the market: It lowers your metabolism, increases your appetite, and even triples the calories of whatever you eat." Sam was about to ask about it, but the blender started up and for about a minute straight. Once it was done, Puck walked into the living room with the glass container from the blender in hand.

"I don't know if I can drink that now, Puck... I'm still full." Sam said, his hands on his stomach.
"Which is EXACTLY why we need to drink. Trust me, after you drink this for a couple of days, your appetite with be HUGE." Puck said, handing him the milkshake.
Sam took a deep breath before putting it to his big lips and drinking it down. It wasn't easy, and Sam had to stop a couple of times to breath and get his energy back to do this, but after 15 minutes he had the massive shake in his stomach and he was totally bloated. Puck gave him the best massage of his life, "Now this stuff works best when you don't move very much, so I want you to head home and go to sleep for the night. Trust me, when you wake up, those abs will be gone!"

Sam got dressed again and headed home, passing out as soon as he hit his bed. When Sam woke up the next morning for school, the first thing he did was check in the mirror, surprised by what he saw. Puck was right, that powder did help him get big faster! Sam's abs were gone a small, but very noticeable, belly had replaced them. His body over all had a little bit more thickness to it, especially in his butt, but most of it was in his stomach for now. Sam grinned, for this first time he was REALLY excited about gaining.
11123211211211.title: Puck's new gaining technique.

choices: Mercedes and Shane are having an argument
Quinn wonders what is up with Sam
111232112112111.content:
Sam was amazed that Rachel still did not notice anything. If it didn't relate to music or to Finn, Rachel seemed astoundingly oblivious. She didn't seem to notice anything weird and he was living with her. Though in this case she had an excuse: Finn had apparently asked to marry her and in that situation, one could be forgiven if they were a little out of it. It was such a surprise and unexpected and was really messing with her. You'd think she'd be happy but now that it actually was happening, she was freaking out and wondering what to do and say. And in the midst of all this Will finally proposed to Emma and asked the glee club for opinions on how to best ask her to marry him. It was about time really, it had been obvious to everyone even before he went to McKinley he had liked her. Wrapped up in these marriage flurries, they for once didn't really notice what was going on with him. Best of all, Mercedes and Shane didn't seem to be going to good from when he saw them in school. He seemed to want to constantly walk her EVERYWHERE and Mercedes wasn't the type to like possessive and worse, hovering guys who had to know where she was every minute of every day. It was clear Shane only reluctantly let her talk to her friends in Glee. There also seemed to be an odd decrease in slushie incidents for once and they weren't really sure if it was because people had finally gotten bored of it, matured, or if the hockey and other popular kids were planning something. It was true that the major instigators of the slushie torture were gone or had retired (Puck, Azimio, and Dave Karofsky) but there were a number of hopefuls who still wanted to carry the torch and hadn't given up, especially that one jackass on the hockey time. They were beginning to think the slushy torture was beginning to come to an end for once because despite the occasional isolated slush incidents, it as a whole stopped. The annoying hockey member although quite boisterous and full of bravaado, wow, being around Rachel absorbs vocabulary, he was quite cowardly when alone and apparently only slushied when he had team support. He was no Puck, Dave, Sam, Finn, Azimio, etc. He wasn't all that big of a guy or much of a fighter without his big hockey friends and teaming up on the weaker members of Glee. Other than those rare occurences, it was surprisingly quiet in the making fun of the glee club arena since by now most people were concerned about their future (or their lack of one and the inevitablity they were going to remain in sucktown Ohio forever) and couldn't be bothered most likely. They weren't popular but they weren't targeted for utter destruction except by Sue who still had a beef with Mr. Schue and the club. Though she actually helped with proposing to Emma which was weird and almost freaky. Maybe it's because Sue had ended up marrying herself (erm, weird) that she decided to help Mr. Schue (or Emma) get married. Sam was still terrified of Sue, absolutely positively terrified and would rather face Coach Beiste's punishments than Sue in psycho mood, but there were times, rare enough but they did happen, where Sue almost seemed like she had a heart. Almost. The jury was still out on that though.

Sam was pleased though. He never thought he would be or that it would excite him as much as the pride in his well-cut abs or Avatar (okay, maybe not as much as Avatar, pretty much nothing could beat the world of Pandora or the Navi, but it came close) as it came to the feeling of gaining and getting bigger. At the start there were some reservations: getting fat, people laughing at him, being unpopular, being unattractive, eating (well, that one was still difficult at times because Puck was tough), etc. But after finding out how some people actually like and even love it was amazing. He was beginning to understand why since on the receiving end it was all the food he wanted (and more) and it felt...good. There was something about it that just felt amazing, the feeling of a full belly and getting it rubbed. Plus, he was getting bigger. And after watching that footage of himself, Sam could see why others were interested. There was something about it...not to mention, he was getting bigger! In the good sense. A bigger frame and more muscle mass and strength was good. The more the merrier. Going it this way did pack on extra fat but it actually made it even cooler. Extra mass was manly and sexy. The internet and Puck opened his eyes to it and now that it was actually happening, he was happy. He felt better than he ever had before. He didn't realize just how much he was missing when he had kept that rigorous diet and it was a relief not to almost essentially starve himself. While he wouldn't call what he was doing now healthy in most cases, it was more healthy than how he had been before which was downright disturbing. Very disturbing to be precise.

After being dropped off by a distracted Rachel who talked the whole ride over about Finn and how freaked out she was, Sam smiling walked over to where Puck motioned to him from. Puck was bouncing a little in anticipation which made Sam grin grow wider as Puck tried to see through Sam's bulky jacket that showed nothing.

"Did it work? I'm sure it worked, it has worked before but what if it didn't work for you?" Puck was dying to know and after a few moments of pure anxiety on his part, Sam finally smirked and unzipped his jacket. A smile grew on Puck's face as he looked at Sam's curving shirt because this time it wasn't just a heavy bloat.

"Hell yeah it did, what did I tell you? The stuff works wonders doesn't it?" Puck looked pleased with himself.
"Yeah, it does. Where did you get it?" Sam was curious. He looked it up and it didn't seem like something you could just get in store or over online.

"I know a guy. Cleaned his pool and did other favors for him. Some sort of bio-scientist or something who is part of a project developing stuff like this. Gave it to me as a favor and although not officially allowed to do human trials yet, he was curious to see if it works."

"It isn't dangerous or something is it?" Sam asked now worried. Puck shook his head.

"Nah, after various trials and Karofsky and a few other test subjects not done by me, as far as it looks there isn't anything seriously dangerous with it or any serious side effects. Besides you know, the rapid weight gain. But outside of that and an understandable change in how much you need to eat, it is safe and effective.

"You sure?" Sam asked.
"Positive. Besides those two things and the muscle promoting components, there are no dangerous sides and is non-addictive, physically. Of course, it is recommended not to use too much or to take with alcohol and to stop after a week at most but otherwise yeah, it's good. I have some more for you here."

"Right now?" Sam asked.
"Yeah, why not? Besides, I got a treat for you." Puck took out a box and opened it, the smell of glazed donuts coming out. "Smells good doesn't it?"
"Yeah it does," Sam said, feeling hungry.

"Good. Drink the shake." Puck passed it over and Sam took a sip and winced a little. Hmm, no wonder Puck had used so much icecream the day before, it tasted pretty awful by itself. Well, not that bad, but definitely not great. It tasted kind of like other protein powders he had before which was reassuring but there was an odd aftertaste that had been covered up by the icecream before. Sam had to choke down all of it before Puck let him have the box of donuts and he really wanted them by the time he finished the awful shake. Puck chuckled as Sam all but grabbed at the donuts and stuffed as many as he could into his big mouth. Chewing furiously, Sam got glaze all over his cheeks, mouth, lips, and hands. Puck walked over and traced a finger down over Sam's mouth who stopped in shock as Puck licked his finger.

"That's good glaze," he said grinning and Sam just stared. Puck nodded towards the donuts and Sam continued to dig into them like he was starving which it felt like he was and it wasn't long before the box was empty. Sam stood there licking his lips and Puck grinned at the sad look.

"Hey Sam," he said. "I got some more-"
"Yes!" Sam cried in joy.
"I'll just go get them then. They're chocolate." Puck returned with another box and Sam eagerly started on that box as well.
111232112112111.title: Shake and Donuts

choices: Sam finishes all of it and his pants won't stay buttoned.
1112321121121111.content:
Sam sat back in class happily, enjoying the one handed belly rub Puck was secretly giving him. He doesn't know why he didn't realize it sooner but this whole gaining thing was an amazing idea. He felt so relaxed having a belly full of donuts and gainer shake, and Puck's magic hands were just an added bonus. As his mind drifted, he heard Mercedes and Shane two tables behind him having an argument. Sam couldn't hear everything, but he could tell that Shane was mad about something and Mercedes couldn't do anything to fix whatever problem there was.

When class ended, Shane left class quickly, which was surprisingly fast for a guy his size, and Sam got up to talk to Mercedes. He pulled his back pack onto his shoulder, "Is everything okay, Mercedes? Shane seemed really upset."
"Huh? Oh, no it's fine, Sam. We had an early date planned for tonight but I had to cancel because of Glee club." Mercedes said, looking upset.
"Really? That's a stupid thing to be upset about."
"I know it is, but he can't help it. He isn't a big fan of me being in Glee because he doesn't think I get the attention I deserve in there."
"Well, you've been getting a lot lately, but I think he needs to calm down. He's being ridiculous. I know I'd never freak out at you for something small like that."
Mercedes smiled, "You're sweet, Sam, but I can see where this is going and it's not gonna happen." Mercedes headed out of the class and Puck came up behind Sam, "That just strengthened your resolve to get her back, didn't it?"

"You have no idea." Sam said, turning around to Puck, "I'll see you at lunch. I'm ready to really start eating." As Sam headed out of the class, Puck couldn't anything but grin like an idiot.

Classes went by fast and when lunch finally rolled around Sam met up with Puck and followed him out to his car. McKinley had an off campus lunch-time policy that most students didn't really take advantage of, but Sam was determined to start eating bigger and bigger meals. Puck drove Sam over to the local McDonald's and the two headed inside. When they reached the counter, Puck started to order, "Can I get 2-"
"Five." Sam said, interrupting Puck.
Puck smiled, "Okay, 5 double quarter pounders, 3 large orders of fries, and 3 large milkshakes, one in each flavor., and an order of the 20 piece chicken nuggets." Puck paid the order and their food arrived in no time. Sam sat down and Puck set the food down in front of him, "I'll be right back. I need to go get the powder from the car for these shakes."

While Puck was gone, Sam started to eat ravenously. His large mouth was made for eating like this, finishing off an entire double quarter pounder in only four bites. When Puck came back, "Atta boy!" he said as he popped the lids off of the shakes and added two large scoops of the powder to them mixing them up before giving them to Sam. Sam had already eaten the entire 20 piece of chicken nuggets and was downing some fries before he grabbed the vanilla shake and started drinking it down.
1112321121121111.title: Sam's desire to gain grows.

choices: "Pancake breakfast planned for you!" (with two gainer shakes)
"Pizza breakfast planned for you!" (with three gainer shakes)
11123211211211111.content:
Once the vanilla shake was gone, Sam picked up one of the four double cheese burgers left and unwrapped it, taking a large bite out of it and chewing happily. He swallowed the bite and looked across the table at Puck, "Hey, can you get me a few apple pies? Maybe another burger or two?"
Puck grinned happily, "That powder sure is amazing, huh?"
"Dude, it's AWESOME. It makes me hungrier every time I drink it and it's helping me gain really quickly!" Sam said, taking another large bite out of his burger.
Puck got up and went back to the counter, ordering another 5 cheeseburgers and seven apple pies. He was absolutely delighted when he saw that Sam had eaten two more burgers and had finished the chocolate powdered shake, "All yours!" He said, setting the tray of burgers down in front of the growing blonde. Without a second thought Sam picked up the one burger left and dug in, unwrapping one of the newer ones once he was halfway through, drink the strawberry shake in between bites.

Sam devoured the remaining burgers and all of the apple pies before finally falling back into his seat. Sam was absolutely bloated and stuffed beyond belief, but he was happy about it because it meant he would get bigger. His shirt, which was tight on his growing belly to begin with, had ridden up his belly and wouldn't go back down no matter how much he tried - a sight that Puck was in love with.
The mohawked teen got up and sat down next his growing friend, "Easy there, big boy. You just ate a lot of food and you need the relaxing touch of a belly rub expert." Puck said as he pulled Sam's shirt up, revealing his bloated, solid stomach, and rubbing it with both big hands.

Sam sighed happily, leaning his head back as Puck worked his magic on his stuffed belly. Sam didn't know how Puck did it but belly rubs from him had one of the most amazing feelings Sam's ever felt. He was a bit shocked when he felt Puck's hands slid down his belly to his jeans, "What are you..." Puck unbuttoned Sam's tight jeans and an amazing feeling of relief overcame Sam's body.
He let out a loud, content sigh as Puck's hands went back to his belly, "You're not the first person I've helped gain weight, and trust me you won't be the last, Sammy. I can tell from a mile away when someone's jeans are too tight even if they don't realize it."
Sam simply smiled, "Thanks, Puck. So how long am I supposed to be taking these gainer shakes again?"

"Only for one week, "Puck said, "it's for giving you that weight boost you need when you first to packing them on." As Puck rubbed Sam's belly, he continued to talk, "I'm still going to be feeding you your three big meals of the day, so you'll be getting one gainer shake per meal at the very least, three at the most."
"So that's five more days of days of intense eating like today?" Sam asked, an excited tone in his voice.
"Trust me, this was nothing compared to what I'll be stuffing you with. Plus, " He said, tapping the camera in his awesome hat, "Your fans are gonna love it." Once Sam was comfortable enough, he and Puck returned school to finish for the day before going back to Puck's house for a very fattening spaghetti dinner.

During the next three days, Mr Schue had the class focus on Michael Jackson songs to possibly use for Regionals, but of course there was plenty of drama to go along with it. With Blaine stuck at home waiting for his eye surgery, ND was down a member and things were changing for everybody, but Sam didn't really pay to much attention to that. During those three days, Sam did something really risky when it came to his attempts to win Mercedes back and he was surprised to see it worked in his favor. He could tell that Mercedes was falling back in love with him - be it his charming personality, her problems happening with Shane, or his growing body - but after their duet of "Human Nature" they had kissed for the first time since they broken up.

Sam' groaned as he slowly lifted his now heavier body up for his bed, rubbing the sleep out of his eyes before sitting on the edge and look at his alarm, which read that it was about 9 AM. Sam stood up and stretched, sighing happily as he heard his back pop a few times, before slowly making his way to the bathroom. He finished and walked back to his room, more awake now, and stopped to look over himself in his full length mirror. Sam was amazed at how quickly the gainer powder was effecting his body. Over the last three days Sam consumed 9 massive meals with about 5 gainer shakes through out each day.

Sam's weight gain, which had started only in his stomach, was now starting to spread to his entire body: his cheeks were fuller and Sam could see the beginnings of double chin. His neck was thicker, which lead down to his broadening shoulders and his thick pecs, which were still fairly muscular, but had a layer of fat developing over the. Sam's middle was where the weight gain had hit the hardest - his belly, when empty, was big, soft, and jiggled when he walked. He had small love handles that were growing in, which Puck adored and would grab and squeeze when he wasn't doting on Sam's belly. His backside was no longer toned and had developed a cute, round look to it thanks to the extra weight he'd put on there and his thighs were getting thicker. Sam patted his bigger belly, which made a thick THUMP sound, and he smiled. He really was loving being big.

A knock on the door made Sam jump and scrambled to throw clothes on over his skin tight boxers, "Just a second!" Sam said and be bend over to grab his pajama pants off the floor. The door opened and Puck walked in just as Sam bent over, a sight Puck was VERY happy to see.
"Morning, Sammy!" Puck said, giving Sam a playful slap on his softer ass.
Sam straightened out in surprise and turned around, "HUH? Oh.. Hey, Puck! Why are you here?"
"Rachel and her Dad's were leaving the house for the day so they let me in. You hungry, big boy?" Puck asked, putting his hands on Sam's growing belly. He rubbed and played with it, squeezing Sam's belly fat and jiggling it a little.
Sam blushed a bit and he didn't really mind it when Puck played with his growing body. He knew how much Puck loved bigger guys, and he WAS helping him get this big. It was the least he could do, "Sure am!" he said happily as he slipped into his pajama pants, though remained shirtless.
"Awesome!" Puck said, "I've got a huge..."
11123211211211111.title: A few days of gaining.

choices: Rachel and Finn getting married?! What is going on?
111232112112111111.content:
"I've got a huge pancake breakfast planned for you!" Puck put his hands into his pockets and felt around. After searching a few moments, he pulled out a wad of cash. "Before I forget, mail delivery for you. Donations from kind viewers online who enjoy our sweet footage. If you don't mind, I've already taken my cut as well as for other expenses but you still have over $1200 bucks which is just ridiculous. And that was just the first wave. Pretty soon there'll be even more." Puck grinned at the look on Sam's face. $1200 bucks? That was insane, and it was more than a month of stripping or over a year of minimun wage (slave labor) pizza delivery. Plus he was getting paid to do something that he decided he would have done anyways!

"$1200 bucks?! That's incredible! Thank you so much!" Sam babbled as he hugged Puck. It was all thanks to him that this was possible to begin with. Puck grinned and hugged back (taking the opportunity to feel Sam's belly because he was never one to pass a chance down) before pushing Sam off.

"Okay, okay. Save it for later. Right now a pancake breakfast awaits you. I made your favorite chocolate chip and we don't want to let it get too cold do we?" Puck laughed as Sam rushed down the stairs and he followed behind. Sam was really filling out which was thrilling too Puck. Sam looked really good and he was the one to help him get that way which was just freaking awesome. Mercedes better like Sam for all the effort he was putting into this. Sam was head over heels for her and Puck wanted it to work out. He knew all to well the bitterness of loving someone who doesn't love you back. But if it didn't work out, Sam would have many options as there are quite a number of people who enjoy bigger people. Puck grinned. Him for one, he wouldn't mind at all. Puck was all down for doing whatever Sam wanted barring any really kinky shit like being tied. Unless it was Sam being tied, then it would be okay. He shook his head, clearing his thoughts. Okay, random and irrelevant. Sam was waiting for him and he needed to focus.

Sam was waiting for him which Puck appreciated. It was well known Puck absolutely hated missing a single moment.

"Before you start," Puck said. "You wouldn't mind doing a dedication would you? Someone apparently really wants one and is willing to pay really good money for just a dedication and personal copy. It isn't hard, all you have to say is you thank all the support of your numerous fans, especially so and so, and that if anyone else wants a dedication to send in money like they've already been doing."

"Uh, okay," Sam said. "Who's it for?"
"Don't know, just someone named Porcelain. No real names, its a personal thing."
"Sure, I guess. I just want to get started." Sam said eagerly. Those were chocolate pancakes just sitting there waiting to be eaten! Puck chuckled at that.
"Someone's an eager beaver. Kay, camera....on, don't forget to dedicate."

"Uh, hi guys." Sam said. "Thank you for the money and being so supportive, it's been a blast and I'm glad you like it. Um, this episode is dedicated to Porcelain and we're starting a new thing to buy your own dedications. If you want to be mentioned just send your money like always to my man Puck who is also director and producer and without whom none of this would be possible. So umm, yeah. To Porcelain, I guess this eatings for you, or something like that." Puck nodded and Sam began to eat..

Sam once again forgot the camera. He moaned into the pancakes. Damn Puck was an amazing cook. How did Puck not get addicted to his own food? It was so freaking delicious. The chocolate just burst in Sam's mouth and the soft fluffiness made him feel happy as it slid down easily. Sam tore through the pancakes like a starving hyena the first eight. At that point he was beginning to feel sated and that he could slow down and enjoy it more. Letting out a burp, Sam continued onto the next stack. This going was a little slower and Puck poured out one of those shakes that was both oddly filling and yet made him ravenously hungry. It still tasted awful alone but being able to wash the taste with orange juice and chocolate made it better and it made him feel good. His belly was beginning to feel tight yet it felt like he could eat more. Amazing how the stuff worked. Sam was energized to start on the second batch of 8 as Puck shot from different angles showing how full and huge Sam's stomach was. After the second stack, Sam got no rest as Puck immediately thrust yet another shake for Sam to drink who does so.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPP," Sam released a massive belch. Puck laughed before getting in front of the second camera as he came on.

"Here that?" Puck said. "That's for you Porcelain and all our fans. Your contributions help to keep this young hot stud big and bloated. It would be much more difficult and boring without all you fans. So just keep sending in money and Sammy here will continue to be able to afford getting bigger for you all." Puck knelt down and held up another pancake.

"You also wanted me to handfeed him a bit so here it is." Sam looked at Puck and Puck grinned pointing to the camera as he fed Sam bite by bite a few more pancakes with one hand while rubbing Sam's stomach with the other. After it was done, Puck got a wicked grin.

"So fucking stuffed aren't you? Say how stuffed you are." Sam nodded.

"Urp, yeah, I'm stuffed." Puck knuckled his fist against Sam's stomach causing him to moan and release another couple massive belches. He waited and did it again.
"As you can see, Sammy here is totally stuffed and vulnerable. How cute is he? It's enough to make one want to do things. But for now I'm just going to give him pleasure with another famous belly rub as fans know. If anyone else is thinking about being fed by me as well send your information, a picture, an explanation of goals, your fee, etc."

Puck proceeded to do exactly that, doing his magic touch massage thing that made Sam and everyone else shiver in delight.
111232112112111111.title: "Pancake breakfast planned for you!" (w...

1112321121121111111.content:
School, like usual, just seemed to fly by for Sam. His classes came and went, as did Glee club, but it was the breaking news of Finn and Rachel's sudden engagement that seemed to be the most interesting part of the day. While the majority of the Glee club was happy for them, Sam honestly couldn't care either way. He was happy for them but it was their decision and he didn't think it was right to interfere. After Glee club was over, Sam told Puck they'd meet up later for dinner and he headed home with Rachel.

The car ride was mostly quiet, that is, until Rachel broke the silence, "Sam, listen. I wanted to ask you something."
"Hmm?"
"I know this whole, Finn-and-I-getting-married-thing is kind of sudden, and this might seem a little sudden too, but, Finn is going to be at my house a LOT more often now and I was wondering if it would be okay if he and I got some space."
"Oh, yeah. I'm usually out with Puck or in my room so it's no big deal..."
"Well, no. I mean... it's hard enough with my Dads being there and I was thinking about, maybe, you moving in with someone else?"
Sam stared at Rachel, confused, but sighed, "Uhh.. Sure. I can ask a few of our friends about it." Her family was nice enough to let him stay as long as they so Sam didn't really mind.
"Oh, no, Sam, it's no trouble. I talked to Puck about it and he's asking his family about it now."

Sam was surprised... okay, that's not true. As soon as she said Puck he knew it was going to happen. As soon as they pulled into the driveway of Rachel's house Sam's cellphone went off. The caller ID said it was Puck and he picked up, "Hello?"
"GOOD NEWS. My folks said you can move in! I assume Rachel told you?"
"She did..." Sam said
"Sweet! I'll be over in a bit and we can get started. You'll be staying in the guest room next to mine."

The rest of the day was spent packing Sam's stuff up and loading it into Puck's truck for the move. Sam didn't really mind moving; he'd get to hang out with Puck more and the money Puck would save on gas would go into feeding him. When they got to Puck's house Sam saw that Puck's sister and Mom were out, so the two had the house to themselves. They spent two hours unpacking Sam's belongings into the guest room, and as Sam was putting his jeans on the top shelf of his closet, Puck grinned as he slid his hand to the underside of Sam's exposed belly, "Somebody sure looks hungry."

Also immediately Sam's belly made a loud, rumble and Puck grinned, "So what'll it be, Sammy? I'm gonna make sure to get you super stuffed tonight to celebrate your new living conditions."
Sam chuckled and put his hand on his chin, thinking. He finally decided on...
1112321121121111111.title: Sam moves in with Puck.

11123211211211111112.content:
"I am feeling in the mood for pizza," Sam said rubbing his belly. "Since it is a party and all. But you got anything to snack on? I'm hungry now." Puck grinned as Sam's stomach made another rumble, asking for food.

"Of course, I wouldn't have let you come over without anything to eat would I? I got some snacks and I also made a special surprise dessert." Puck left and came back llugging a big bag. "My sister was curious to know what I was doing with so much food but I told her it was for a party and for friends." He grinned. "She can't wait to meet you.." Sam shifted nervously. He hadn't thought of Puck's sister's reaction. What if she didn't like him? Puck read the worry in Sam's face and figured it out.

"Dude, she'll like you. Anyone I like who keeps me from doing something stupid is someone she likes. She especially likes you already since I sing your praises all the time. Literally, I have written and peformed songs about you and what we do that she heard when I thought she wasn't around." Sam raised his eyebrows an Puck blushed. "Er, never mind that. Um...moving on, I got snacks!" The opening of the bag distracted Sam from that rather amusing revelation as he caught sight of goodies, chips, candy, etc. Sam drooled and Puck smirked. "I'm going to order the pizza and then pump some iron. You just sit and enjoy as much as you want, watch tv, play a video game, workout with me, you're my guest and part of the family now so feel free to do whatever." Puck left the room to call the pizza delivery number.

Sam went through the contents of the bag. Chips, Chocolate, Skittles, Starbursts, M&Ms, Beef jerky (beef jerky? Must be for Puck), Nerds, Smarties, Gummybears, Ho-hos, Dingdongs, brownies..yum, lots of good things. All in large sizes. Sam almost would have wondered how Puck afforded to even spend the money for these things before he realized that in bulk it is cheaper and remembering that their videos make a surprising amount of money. Well, Puck and his family deserved it. He was the one staying with them and Puck was the one who was helping him and even earned the money in the first place. Without him, Sam would have no idea, and Puck was surprisingly adept with technology which one would have guessed looking at him. The hat camera was one invention, Sam always got a kick out of the hat since Puck looked so silly in it, and other cameras, and other pieces Sam had no idea how they worked behind the scenes. Puck was definitely a lot smarter than anyone, or Puck himself, gave credit for. It probably didn't help that Puck liked to act the big intimidating (and now singing) jock because he actually was really nice. Well, to people he liked. On the other hand, Puck could be downright vicious when pissed off or if he didn't like you. This year he toned it down but Sam still remembered last year when Puck terrorized some hockey players. They brought it upon themselves but getting swirlied and super-wedgied was painful.

He heard a faint clanging noise and Sam wandered down, munching on a bag of chips he opened. Opening the door, Sam walked into the basement where Puck was pounding out reps on the bench. He was amazed at how much Puck could do, especially when he upped it past 300. This gave him some difficulty but not enough to require a spotter yet. Breathing heavily, Puck put the weights on the rack and sat up taking a break as he reached out for a water bottle next to him. After gulping water down, he smirked.

"Like what you see Sammy?" Sam was startled and Puck laughed. "I know you're here, I could feel you watching. Come here and sit." Patting the space next to him, Puck waited as Sam came and sat down next to him. "Good boy. The pizza will be here in about...30 or 35 minutes, something like that." Puck got up and gently took the bag of chips from Sam's hands. "Lay down, it's your turn. Wanna keep your strength up and your muscles big in addition to your totally sweet gut." Sam blushed as Puck patted it grinning. Laying down, the shirt rode up even more exposing his belly for all, or in this case just Puck, to see. That shirt had fit just a few short weeks ago before he started working with Puck. Which actually was pretty cool but it made finding and dressing in clothes irritating when they get grown out of. Puck's smile widened as Sam snorted, sat up with a bit of difficulty, and tugged it off. His eyes traveled down Sam's body. "Very hot, show that baby off," he murmured and laughed as Sam flipped him off. Suddenly he was gone and back with his silly hat cam and recording devices.

"Really?" Sam asked and Puck nodded, eyes glowing.
"I know people will enjoy this. The perfect combination of power and comfortable living taking its toll on your waistline." Puck went over and squeezed it. "Also would be fun to compare before and after eating all the delicious pizza that will be here before you know it. Just pretend I'm not here."

"That's hard. Your hat is distracting." Puck rolled his eyes.
"After lying down. Now get ready. It's been a while and I know you haven't topped 300 even when you were less...big so I'll lighten it for you. How about 220?" Sam shook his head. Puck thought for a moment.

"I guess 200?" Sam nodded and Puck removed the weight and moved back. He focused the camera on Sam as the big muscle-gut stud worked his bench, incline, curls, etc. This was going to be some sweet footage. Then, Puck heard the sound of a doorbell and he had Sam pause. "I think pizza's here. Let me go get it." Sam nodded wearily. Puck rushed up the stairs, coming down with numerous pizza boxes stacked in his arms that you couldn't see his face.

"Ready to be filled up Sam? You're going to get massive my friend." Puck smirked. "It's going to be freaking awesome.
11123211211211111112.title: Snacks and working out

choices: Wakes Puck up to make him a midnight snack.
Wakes Puck up to make him breakfast while he works out.
111232112112111111122.content:
While Puck set the pizza down and went upstairs to get the soda, Sam got to get a good look in the basement/workout room. Puck's basement was set up so that it was the ultimate man-cave: A huge flat-screen tv with a big comfy couch, a huge personal fridge, a water cooler filled with soda right next to the couch, a wii,PS3, and Xbox 360 with a large amount of games, several different pieces of work out equipment, and a rather large box labeled 'Gain Equip". Sam knelt down and was about to open it when Puck put his hand on his shoulder, "Whatcha lookin' at, Sammy?"

"Oh!" Sam said, surprised, "I was just wondering what was in this."
"It's my gainer equipment! I bought all this stuff when I first started helping guys get massive. I haven't had a chance to use any of them on you yet since all of our feedings have been at Rachel's house, a restaurant, or at school." Puck opened the box and Sam took a look. Inside, Sam saw several large containers of protein powder and gaining supplements, one of which he recognized as the one Puck forced down his throat for a week, as well as measuring tape, a funnel and tube, and a pair of handcuffs for what Sam assumed were for his more perverted clients.
Puck grinned as Sam stood up, "Maybe in a few days we can start using these on you. It'd be a lot of fun! But for now, lets get these pizzas into that growing gut of yours." Puck said, smacking Sam's big, fleshy stomach. A bigger smile spread across Puck's face as he watched Sam's empty belly jiggle. As much as he loved watching Sam's muscles get bigger as well, his favorite part was clearly Sam's belly.

Puck sat Sam's large body down on the couch and set the first pizza box on Sam's lap, "Eat up! You've got about eight of these to shovel down." Sam picked up the first slice of pizza and began eating quickly, finishing the first slice in seconds and moving on to the next. As Sam ate his first pizza, Puck turned on a movie for the two of them to watch, and while Sam was enjoying the movie as he gorged, Puck didn't even bother watching. He'd seen it a thousand times but this is what he'd rather be watching.
"Hey, Sammy, I'll be right back, you just keep giving that big belly of yours the attention it needs." Puck said as he reached over and grabbed a container from the 'Gain Equip' box. Sam mumbled an "Okay" through his full mouth as he tossed the first box of pizza to the side and reached over, grabbing the next and shoveling food in.

Puck reached his kitchen upstairs and pulled a full container of vanilla ice cream from the freezer, as well as some milk from the fridge. He scooped half of it into his large blender and poured the milk in before looking over the container he brought from the basement: It was the same one he had been using on Sam, Big and Thick. Even though the label said to only use for one week, Dave used this stuff for three weeks straight and there were no side effects except for getting HUGE. Puck threw five huge spoonfuls into the blender and turned it on and off, throwing in more ice cream and even hot fudge as he worked. When he was done, Puck went back down stairs with the shake, happy to see Sam had finished four of the eight pizza's while he was gone, "Good job, Sammy! Here, wash that pizza down with this." Puck said as he handed Sam the gigantic blending cup full of gainer shake.

Sam put the shake to his big lips and started drinking. He recognized the taste of the Big and Thick powder and it's effects went straight to work. Sam started chugging down the shake like it was air. Once he finished, he let out a big belch, "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPP~" and sighed happily. Puck took the blending cup and set it aside, "You spilled some." Puck said, scooping off his shirt and holding it up to Sam's mouth, who happily sucked if off. Puck pulled Sam's shirt off, since it was now dirty, and set the fifth box of pizza in Sam's lap.

Sam could feel himself getting fuller as he ate, but the gainer shake was making him just as hungry, so he had no problem scarfing down the next 4 pizzas over the following thirty minutes. groaned as he rubbed his huge, swollen, pizza filled stomach, letting out loud, short burps as he did so. Puck grinned as he placed both hands on Sam's huge belly, "There, there, Sammy. Let me take care of that." He said as he rubbed, a big smile on his face as he did. Puck knew helping Sam gain would be fun, but he never knew it would be this amazing and sexy.

After about 20 minutes of silence(the explosions from the movie withstanding) Sam looked up over his bloated belly, "Hey, Puck?"
"Yeah?" Puck asked, kneading his hands into Sam's gut.
"I think we should really use that Big and Thick stuff more often. I'm nowhere near as big as Shane yet and I need to pick up the weight."
Puck nodded, "Gotcha! We'll go back to what we were doing before: three huge glasses of Big and Thick shake with every meal."
Sam smiled, excited to get bigger, and ended up falling asleep to the feeling of Puck's hands massaging his belly.
Puck went upstairs, made sure everything was turned off, and came back into the basement. He locked the door and pulled his shirt off, resting his head on Sam's big belly and falling asleep with his gainer buddy.

Sam opens his eyes later on and yawns, feeling the weight of Puck on his softer, less swollen belly, and...
111232112112111111122.title: Living with Puck: Pizza and Gainer Shakes.

1112321121121111111222.content:
"Feeling comfortable?," Sam asked, pulling out his arms from underneath Puck. Puck just grinned.
"You bet I am. Such a nice big soft pillow to lay on." Puck lifted his head a little and jiggled the greatly softened belly. "It's amazing to think you once had a flat six-pack stomach," Puck shook his head.

"I know. But I admit I feel so much better now."
"You don't have the stress of that anymore and you can eat." Puck played with Sam's belly more. "Its looks good on you."
"Really? I would NEVER have believed that, I thought you would be totally disgusted," Sam said sarcastically but in a nice tone. Puck smiled again.
"Ooh, Sammy's got bite. Well I do think its great." Puck continued rubbing in circles. "So nice..." Suddenly a growl went through the room and Puck smirked.
"Sounds like someone's hungry. Well, I'll go make us some food."
"Cool. I'll be lifting weights. After all, I'm going to need to be able to carry this," Sam said, smacking his belly getting Puck's full attention.
"Good, very good. See you soon."

Puck went up the stairs, turning around and winking as he gave a thumbs up which Sam saw in the reflected mirror that was in the back. It was a floor to ceiling type mirror but only covered a small section. Walking up to it, Sam looked at himself. He was very different from when he started the year. Then he had been both buff and massively ripped and now he was even bigger but definitely not ripped.He hadn't checked himself out recently except for those videos, so he was a bit surprised at just how big around his stomach was or how his pecs, though large, were the barest edge of sagging a little. He was going to hace to work on that because while he wanted to be big, he didn't want to be a blob. Jiggling his belly he watched the slight bounce and he had to say whatever he felt about his upper chest, he thought the bouncing was pretty cool and that he could stick his fingers in. Turning around, he craned his head, looking at his butt which was definitely bigger and strangely better. Shrugging, Sam grinned at his reflection with satisfaction. He looked pretty good allround and he really was enjoying this now. Other than running, this wasn't going to make all that big of a difference and maybe he could change position, now that he was joining the ranks of bigger people which was weird considering he had never once been once been quite that. Big-mouthed perhaps because of his lips, but not quite big. Bending over, his stomach flopped over the waistline and his back really stood out. Straightening back up with a grunt, Sam patted himself, liking the vibrations in the mirror.

Turning his attention to the weights, Sam walked over to the squat rack. He couldn't afford to let his arms, chest, or legs go weak and watching Puck the night before had been inspiring. He was really strong and Sam wanted to be like that or stronger but as big as possible. Putting the belt on, Sam loaded the weights on and got underneath as he lifted the bar. It took a couple of tries to maintain a center of balance since it had been a while since he squatted, even before meeting with Puck, and he staggered a bit. Once he did though, he found it was fairly easy and that the larger frame made it much easier to spread the weight around than he had ever remembered it being. Getting a rhythm going, Sam started squatting.

Puck was upstairs humming to himself as he flipped pancakes. He had gotten out his 'kiss the cook' apron which normally would he would have not worn but he felt comfortable wearing it for Sam. After all, Sam was going to be part of the family. Puck forgot what day his sister was coming back from music camp but he hoped soon because he was missing the little twerp and he wanted to introduce his feedee Sam. She knew all about some of his private kinks. Although it was a little disturbing how much she knew. Still, he knew she would like Sam a lot and vice-versa. This was going to take a while and so Sam was going to be hungry once all the food was done, which was a good thing. Once the pancakes were done, Puck started on cooking the packages of bacon, enjoying the crackling and crisp smell as it cooked.

When Sam finished the first few sets of Squats, Sam was tired but felt pumped. Flexing his arms and chest, he was impressed with how solildly his muscles bulged. Wiping the sweat from his face, Sam racked the weights back up and went over to the dumbbells. Picking two up, he alternated, watching and admiring in the mirror how his arms moved next to the bulging gut.

"Ready for breakfast?" Sam heard Puck call out sometime later after Sam went through a routine of squats, dumbbells, and dealifts. Sam made a muffled noise and Puck came down.

"Just give me a sec to catch my breath," Sam said breathing hard. Puck went over to the fridge and pulled out a bottle of water which Sam grabbed and drank down. After a few more breaths, Sam was ready.

"Whew, that was some workout. Even if I was out of practice I beat my old records. Hey, does your apron say 'kiss the cook' or is that just me?" Puck smirked.
"You bet it does." Reaching out a hand, he wrapped it around Sam's arm. "Impressive pump. Me likey. But are you going to be able to eat?"
"I don't know," Sam said.
"Well, we'll see won't we? Come on, I made you a nice huge breakfast."
"Okay," Sam said laughing at Puck's eagerness. "I'm coming, I'm coming." Sam felt himself be dragged behind Puck up the stairs in Puck's eagerness at getting Sam to eat. That was an intense workout and made him very hungry but damn if it didn't make it hard to motivate himself to lift his arms.
1112321121121111111222.title: Pumping Up

choices: ate all of the food and is stuffed.
ate all of the food and is still hungry.
11123211211211111112222.content:
Puck sets Sam down at the table, which had a few huge plates of pancakes and bacon on it, along with a tray of blueberry muffins and a huge bottle of Dr. Pepper. As Sam was loading up his first plate, the doorbell rang, "I'll be right back, Sammy." Puck said, rubbing Sam's gut, "Start filling up!" Puck got up and walked to the front door, opening it and surprised by who he saw.
"Finn?" Puck asked.
"Hey, Puck!" Finn said, the same goofy smile on his face he always has, "What's up?"
"Not much," Puck said, "Sam and I are eating breakfast. You wanna come in?"
Finn shrugged, "Sure! I was just in the neighborhood and thought I'd stop by." Finn followed Puck back into the kitchen and approving smirk spread across his face when he saw Sam, who was eating as if he'd never eaten in his life.

"Hey, Sam! You're lookin' large!"
"Thanks!" Sam mumbled through his pancakes as he kept eating. Finn sat down next to him and lifted up his shirt, "Damn, Puck, you're really working hard on Sam, aren't ya? He's already gotten this big?"
Puck eyed Finn cautiously, "Yeah.. Why do you ask?"
Finn gave Sam's growing belly a few pats as he slid over a couple of muffins to Sam, who picked on up and started eating, "What? A fellow admirer can't appreciate good work when he sees it?"
Sam swallowed the chunk of muffin he had, "You're a feeder too?"
Finn chuckled, "Used to be. I've been so busy with Rachel lately that I haven't had the time to enjoy helping guys gain like Puck does. Last time I did it was when Puck and I helped Dave Karofsky become the massive bear he is today."

Sam, impressed and surprised, goes back to eating when Puck chimes in, "Well, we've got a lot to do today. Sam needs to finish breakfast and then I need to start on his lunch. We'll see you at school, okay?"
"Sure thing! Good luck, Sammy. You're gonna get huge!" Finn said, heading out of the room. Puck followed and opened the door, letting Finn out.
He stepped outside and closed the door behind him, "What was that?" Puck asked.
"What was what?" Finn replied.
"THAT. I've been trying to get you back into the feeding gig for months now and all of the sudden you have an interest in Sam's weight. What gives?"
"I guess it can't hurt to be honest." Finn said, "I got a feeding job."
"You did? With who?"
Finn smiled, "Shane Tinsley."
Puck's eyes grew wide, "SHANE? Dude, he's already HUGE. Why did he hire you to help him gain weight?"
"He knows about what you and Sam are doing. How you're fattening Sam up so he can Mercedes back. He's not going down without a fight, and he said he'll get as big as he needs to. Good luck with Sam! He'll need it." Finn said, getting in his car and driving off.

Puck rubbed his forehead, thinking about what to tell Sam. He walks back inside and sees Sam...
11123211211211111112222.title: Finn visits.

111232112112111111122221.content:
Puck was surprised and pleased when he saw all the food on the table in front of Sam gone. He and Finn must have been talking for longer than he thought or the shock of Finn doing such a bad friend thing really threw him off his game. Of all people, Finn was going to help Sam's rival Shane? It's not even like Shane needed it. The guy was ginormous as it was. Actually, he couldn't see what Finn was going to be able to do to help Shane much anyways so this wasn't the end of the world. Shane was going to need someone a lot smarter and more effective than Finn to make much of a difference considering he already was a giant and clearly did not need much help in the gaining weight arena. Puck was more pissed off at the fact that Finn knew and chose to be hired by Shane anyways, after all that jazz about being too busy with Rachel and Glee to do their fun thing. What a douche thing to do.

"Hey Sammy, good job," Puck said smiling as he rapped the table. "I can't believe you ate everything already. That was quite fast. You must have been very hungry." Sam let out a belch as he rubbed his gut that was poking out of his shirt.

"Uuurrrppp, yeah, but not so much anymore."
"Think you could still eat anymore?" Puck asked. Sam shook his head.
"N-uurrp-not really. I'm full." Puck rolled his eyes.
"Sam, you know I don't believe in that word when it comes to my clients. The whole point is to break the barrier and I know you've done it a whole bunch of times."
"Well, I mean stuffed so full of delicious food and soda I couldn't eat another bite," Sam said, laying on the flattery.
"Mmh, much better. But I still need to check." Puck moved over and placed his hands on Sam's stomach, reveling in its full and solid packed nature.
"I guess you are and that I can give you a break. I'm not in the right frame of mind anyhow because of Finn."
"Finn? What did he do?"
"He's helping Shane," Puck blurted out before he realized it might be better not to tell.
"What?" Sam asks shocked. "Why?"
"Because Shane knows why you're getting big and he plans to counter-act." Sam continued to sit their stunned.
"But I don't get it, he's already a big dude, why does he need to get even bigger?"
"Don't know. Just to prevent you from impressing Mercedes or something I guess. I can't really imagine. Besides, we don't need to worry to much."
"Why's that?" Sam asked panicked.
"Because Shane is even less of a threat with Finn helping him than he would be alone. Finn's heart isn't in the right place for it, he's out of practice, has other commitments with Rachel, and well...he's Finn and not the smartest tool in the toolbox. If anything without help, he'd probably screw Shane up which would only be for your benefit."

"I guess..." Sam said. Puck laughed.
"No need to worry. I'm sure Mercedes will be impressed with your progress because I sure am. I'm just mad that Finn would rather help Shane out than you, especially since we're all friends and in glee club together."

"Well, alright, if you say so..." Sam said. "I could use a bit of help here," Sam said patting his exposed stomach invitingly. Puck's eyes gleamed brightly.
"Oh you do, and I know just how," Puck said grinning as Sam ginned back. Grabbing Sam's arm, he yanked Sam to his feet and lead him over to the couch. Pulling at the hem of the shirt, Puck yanked it off, a smile crossing his face seeing Sam's big bare body, muscular and big with a bulging gut. Cracking his knuckles, Puck got to work massaging and rubbing Sam's belly, accompanined by the glorious soundtrack of each groan, moan, and belch of appreciation. Man it was good to be him.
111232112112111111122221.title: ate all of the food and is stuffed.

1112321121121111111222212.content:
The week came and went extremely quickly for Sam and Puck and before they knew it they were back at school. The two were in math class, but sadly their teacher had the seating chart arranged so that Sam and Puck weren't next to each other. After hearing the news of Finn helping Shane Puck decided it was best to double the amount of gaining shake Sam would ingest with each meal. As class dragged on Sam was trying his best to get comfortable in his seat but no matter what he did it wasn't working. Puck watched from the other side of the room, upset that he couldn't see Sam's thick, muscular, and chunky body as he maneuvered around.

'Stupid pants... you fit last week..., he thought as he tried to pull his pants to a comfortable spot. Sam let out a slight gasp, followed by a sigh of relief, as the button on his pants popped off and flew across the room, hitting the wall. Sam's massive belly sagged out and relaxed. Sam put his hand on it, happy to finally be comfortable in class. A few minutes later and the bell rung, and before Sam could even get up Puck was standing next to him, "Whoa, there, big guy. Lemme help you up." Puck wrapped his hand around Sam's gigantic bicep and hoisted his heavier friend up, giving Sam's enormous belly a few pats before jiggling it, "We hit a MAJOR mile stone this weekend, Sammy. I can't believe you're up by 80 pounds since last week!"

Puck took a step back and admired the much bigger Sam: His neck and traps were much bigger, and his double chin becoming even more prominent. Sam's extra-large t-shirt looked painted onto his thick body. His gigantic pecs strained the fabric across his chest, his biceps were so large that his sleeves looked like they would rip, and his belly was so big that he couldn't cover it all the way. Sam's belly had begun to hang over his waistline, but only by a little, though it was still enough that his belly peeked out from under his skin-tight shirt. Sam's waist had increased to a size 40 pants, but even those were becoming too small for the growing teen. His thighs were extremely thick and muscular, as were his calves.

Sam had become so massive that if he were to stand in front of Puck, the mohawked teen wouldn't be visible. "You've really reached the point of musclechub, Sammy! You're almost as big as Dave!"

Sam rubbed his hand on the back of his massive neck, "You keep comparing me to Dave but I haven't seen him since you put his through my 'workout.' I really wanna compare sizes."

Puck's face lit up at the thought, "He can come over tonight! I'll make a MASSIVE meal for my two special bears."

"How much do you think I weight?" Sam asked, curiously.

Puck scratched his chin, "I'm pretty good at guessing weights... I'd say you're about 310!" Sam wasn't sure he'd broken the 300's yet, but they'd find out at home.As the two left class, Puck walking behind Sam so he could stare at Sam's huge ass, the two ran into somebody unexpected.
1112321121121111111222212.title: Sam's week long growth.

choices: When picking up food, Puck runs into Dave.
When picking up food, Puck runs into someone else.
11123211211211111112222121.content:
"Hey watch it...oh, hi guys" Finn said getting off the floor. Taking another look, Finn's mouth nearly dropped open in surprise. He hadn't seen Puck or Sam since he went to Puck's house that day a week or so back and Sam had grown by leaps and bounds. He wondered what on earth Puck had fed the big guy because there was no way it was possible for someone to grow that fast in only a week. Sam was absolutely huge and really close to Shane's size already. It was like a miracle, but not a good one for him. Shane was going to be displeased. Now he wasn't going to get paid and be able to afford everything for his and Rachel's wedding. Finn had to know though.

"Puck...how...how did you get Sam so big?" Finn stammered, still shocked. Puck smirked at him and grinned as he waved his hand.
"Sorry, that's a business secret, you understand. Just between me and my clients."
"Ah c'mon please dude, that's like impossible!"
"Impossible, nothing is impossible. Isn't that like what we sing all the time about in Glee or something, following your dreams and making them come true?"
"Well, yeah, but...dude, there's no way that can naturally happen. What is your secret. Steroids or something?" Puck scoffed.
"I don't deal in that and besides, although there is a possible similar side effect of steroids with the muscle-belly and all, it's not the same. As you pointed out, its not nomral stuff."

"Aha, I knew it!" Finn said triumphantly.
"Yeah, whatever, but it isn't steroids, at least not the kind you're thinking of. Just give it up already and go back to Rachel." Finn nodded and turned.
"Fine, I will for now. But I will figure out how you've done it."
"Fine, whatever, knock yourself out trying," Puck said rolling his eyes. "Me and Sam are going to be going out now for an earler dinner."
"We are?" Sam asked excitedly. He was beginning to really enjoy eating food and looking forward to Puck's sessions as Puck filled him up. Puck grinned and patted Sam's belly.

"Of course we are. Why not? Unless you're totally stuffed, you're hungry all the time now. It makes for quite a good show watching such a massive man-beast as yourself dig in."

Sam blushed a bit at that. "It's still so weird to be called that," Sam said. Puck shrugged.
"Hey, you know me. I call it as I see it. And you're quite massive. Not as much as Dave, really big."

"Ah the mysterious Dave Karoffsky, when am I going to meet the new and improved him?" Puck shrugged, "
Don't know, sometime. For now let's just go, don't want to be late."

Puck walked the massive Sam down the hall behind him. Every eye seemed like it was watching them, or rather Sam in awe and surprise. Sam shifted uncomfortably a bit since he knew he was missing a button on his jeans and his gut was pushing out but Puck was enjoying it. Finally, the bell for the end of the day rang and people were heading out, eager to get away from the school, Puck and Sam included.

"I'm going to need some new pants," Sam said as he looked down. Puck followed Sam's eye and grinned.
"Of course, but for now, I think those will do just fine. We're going to the early bird dinner special. We're going to be spending plenty of time there so no need for changing just yet."

"Oh, okay," Sam said rubbing his hands together. 'Buffet right?"
"All-you-can-eat," Puck said grinning as he rubbed Sam's belly.
"Good." Sam said relaxing. When they got to the buffet, they were quickly seated and Puck got up.
"I'll be bringing some food for us. What you want?"
11123211211211111112222121.title: Early bird special

choices: Puck returns with two pizzas and Sam finally meets Dave.
111232112112111111122221211.content:
Sam gave his gigantic belly a few rubs, thinking about what would taste best, "You know what," Sam said, "I don't care. Bring me whatever you think will fatten me up the most!" A massive grin spread across Puck's face at those words. One of his favorite things in the world was that moment when his client stops gaining for their original reason and started gaining because they wanted to experience the thrill of getting fatter. Puck reached down and gave Sam's huge belly a nice, loving jiggle, "Anything for you, Sammy."

Puck made his way down the row of seats and was surprised by how empty the buffet was, there was only one other couple here and they were on the other side of the restaurant. Today must just be an off day because normally this place is packed. As Puck rounded the corner that lead from the tables to the food, he collided with something thick and hard, but at the same time extremely soft and squishy. He fell back onto his ass, and was about to tell of whoever he ran into, but when he opened his eyes with greeted a familiar sight - the extremely large and furry belly of one Dave Karofsky.

"Whoa, sorry about that. I wasn't watching where I wa- Puck? Is that you?" Dave asked, a huge grin on his round face. Before Puck could answer, Dave's gigantic bear paw-sized hand reached down and lifted Puck up from the ground like he weighed nothing. "Dave, dude, look at you! You're fucking gigantic!" Gigantic doesn't even begin to describe the new Dave. Puck hadn't seen Dave in almost a month, and at that time, Dave was around the same size Sam is now and he weighed 310 pounds, again, around the size Sam currently is.

But in that one month time frame Dave had really beefed up: his cheeks were adorably round and plump and he had a very large double chin that Dave's incredibly thick neck hid behind. His traps were gigantic and helped to hide his massive neck and his very broad shoulders led down to the bigger pair of pecs Puck had ever seen in his life. They were so massive and beefy that they strained the fabric of Dave's skin tight triple-extra-large polo to the point that it looked like it was about to rip. Dave's enormous biceps were each the size of one of Sam's incredibly thick thighs, but, the biggest part of Dave's body was his gargantuan gut. Dave's gut stuck out almost four feet in front of him and hung down over waistline, covering half of his crotch. Dave's skin tight polo could barely contain the monstrous belly that Dave had - the shirt only reached down to his deep belly button. Beneath that were Dave's massive thighs, which were each the size of Puck's torso and, just like his shirt, his shorts appeared to be painted on.

Dave's round face blushed and he rubbed his humongous belly, "Sure am! What, do you honestly think I would quiet gaining and lifting after you stopped coaching me"
Puck shook his head, "No way, man, but GOD. I never thought you'd get THIS big. Turn around, let me see you from behind." Dave's massive body turned around until his back was facing Puck, who's face lite up like a kid on christmas. Dave's back was incredible wide, MUCH wider than Sam's, and Dave had the bigger, roundest bubblebutt that Puck had ever seen on a guy, "Do you mind?" Puck asked.
Dave smiled, "You never asked before when you were coaching me so why start now?"
Puck reached out and gave huge ass one hard squeeze, "Dude, they're so round and soft, but REALLY firm at same time. You must be doing some crazy squats."
"Sure have!" Dave said before turning around, Puck's face staring happily at Dave's huge belly. Without asking, Puck's hands reached out and grabbed Dave's overhang, squeezing it before his hands slid up to the sides of Dave's gut, rubbing it and giving it a few playful jiggles, "Who would have guessed that my little bear cub would grow up to be such a big, strong, sexy bear."
Dave chuckled, "You're the one who coached me."

"So, how much do you weight now? Last time I saw you you were 310 pounds. You're CLEARY not in the 300's anymore." Puck asked, still rubbing Dave's furry belly.
Dave patted his huge belly, "Weighed myself this morning and the scale read 485!"
Puck couldn't believe what he just heard, "485!! Dude, you gained 175 pounds in a MONTH?!"
"Sure have! That 175 is about 40% muscle and 60% fat!" Dave said, flexing his monster arms. "So," he said, "Who are you fattening up now?"

Puck crossed his buff arms, "How do you know I have a client?"
Dave smirked, "Because, this is your favorite place to stuff anybody who breaks 300. I should know, you shoveled more chocolate down into my gut than I can count here."
"True. It's Sam Evans." Puck said, smiling.
"Trouty mouth Evans? I can see why you'd fatten him up - those plump lips must look amazing when they're eating."
"You have no idea. Do you wanna eat with us?" Puck asked, hoping he'd say yes.
"Of course! Lemme go load up my plate and I'll meet you there." Dave said, waddling towards the roast beef and mashed potatoes.
"Okay!" Puck said, heading towards the pizza, "OH, Dave, what course are you on?"
Dave smiled, "5th!"
"Nice!"
111232112112111111122221211.title: Puck's reunion with his Big Bear.

choices: Puck, Sam, and Dave continue hanging out and eating
Puck invites Dave over to spend the night with them
1112321121121111111222212111.content:
Sam saw Puck come back, a huge grin of excitement on his face. "You'll never believe it!" Puck called.
"What?" Sam asked.
"I ran into Dave, Dave, Dave of the jungle," Puck sang. Sam raised an eyebrow at that.
"Uh what?"
"Dave motherfing Karofsky! You would not believe it." At first Sam had no idea what Puck was talking about before he saw the shape making its way over.
"Holy mother of Jesus and shizznuts," Sam said his mouth dropping open. The thing behind Puck was just massive, the biggest person Sam had ever seen and he wondered how someone who reached that size was even mobile. Sam was pretty big himself now but he felt tiny compared to that monsterous size. The thing nodded in greeting.

"Dave? Dave Karofsky?" Sam said his mouth unable to keep from dropping.
"Sup trouty mouth. I see my boy Puck's been taking care of you."
"Uh, yeah," Sam replied.
"He's good at what he does, very good. You sleeping with him?" Sam's eyebrows rose shocked.
"Huh? No!" Dave shrugged.
"Oh, too bad. You're been missing out and totally should. Puck digs the big as you know and is very talented and you've always had those big kissable lips."
"Uhh, thanks?" Sam said not quite sure what to say to that. Dave got into the booth with his absolutely ladened tray, pressing against the back as his stomach brushed the table and filled up the seat.

"These things are getting smaller," he rumbled shaking his head. Puck smirked as he got in besides Sam pulling along two pizza boxes.
"Nah, they're quite roomy for table booths but you're exceptional. What have you been up to lately Dave?"
"Eating, eating, football, eating, weights, eating, uh...eating, school, interning with my dad at the office..."
"You're going to be a lawyer? I didn't know you were interested." Puck said.
"Yeah, I didn't either at first but he made me come in one day and I discovered I really liked it and was good at it. I also think the other people are scared of me there."
"Of you? I wonder why?" Puck said sounding so sincere for a moment that Sam and Dave almost believed him and gave simultaneous wtf looks at him before he started laughing.

"Hah just kidding. Yeah, you'd be good at that. Heck, you wouldn't even need to say a word, the opposing side would give up with just a look at you and your client's case would be secured." Dave laughed.

"I wish but it certainly does help. How did you convince Sam to get big?"
"He came to me and still is hoping to impress Mercedes, defeat Shane, and also because he decided he enjoyed it, right Sammy?" Sam blushed a bit.
"I guess so, everything tastes so good now and being full and I admit Puck's massages makes it feel...well, you know."
"Oh I know."
"I hear Finn and Rachel are getting married," Dave said. Sam looked surprised.
"How do you know? You don't go to our school anymore."
"Word gets around, and its not like its surprising. The hobbit's affection for frankie and vice-versa is so obvious it burns."
"Well...yeah," Sam said. "I had been living at her house but it got so love-filled over there that it was almost a relief to be kicked out."
"You've been living at Rachel's? Why'd they kick you out?" Dave asked sounding surprised.

"They didn't actually kick me out but it was pretty much 'you wouldn't mind leaving?' and I was 'no, not really, you and Finn need your private time to do...things' and well I was good getting out of there. Besides, I'm living with Puck now."

"Ah. Yeah. I can only guess he used that shake stuff with you?"
"Yeah."
"Well, its obviously effective but I suspect it does have a permanent effect on the body afterwards, not that I particularly mind but you know. I just hope it will slow down eventually. I gained 175 lbs a month off that stuff."

"A month?! 175 lbs?!" Sam was shocked for a moment before he blinked. "Well, dang, Puck you sure there are no permanent side-effects?" Puck shrugged.

"I heard there wasn't and supposedly should be safe outside of extreme growth apparently. I'll talk to the guy later to see if there is any change on that but apparently it should be without the normal health risks for a bit longer anyways. Here, have some pizza." Puck slid the slices over and Sam found himself drooling a bit. He looked over at Dave.

"Well, aren't you eating?" he asked looking at Dave's full plate. Dave looked down.
"Oh yeah, haha, can't believe I forgot," Dave and Sam both dug in and Puck leaned back, eagerly looking back and forth as the two dug into their food.
1112321121121111111222212111.title: Sam meets Dave

choices: Puck stuffs Sam and Dave with cheesecake.
11123211211211111112222121111.content:
As Puck watched, he quickly realized just how much Dave's appetite has grown. The massive man had already finished his gigantic plate of meat and potatoes before Sam was even done with his second slice of pizza. Dave started to get up, but Puck stopped him, "No, no. You sit back and relax. I'll handle the refills for both of you." Puck said, happily patting Dave's gigantic stomach.

As Puck walked off to refill Dave's plate, Dave placed both hands on the top of his massive belly, "So, Evans. How's football going?"
Sam blinked, swallowing down the last bite of his fourth slice, "Oh, I'm not on the team this year. When I moved back I tried to get Coach Beiste to let me back on, but she had already filled the whole team. I considered joining synchronized swimming, which was the only team that had an opening, but I declined."
An image of Sam's new body, all beefy and thick with muscles and fat, squeezed into a skin tight speedo appeared in Dave's mind for a bit, but he quickly pushed it out when he realized he was getting a little too excited in his pants, "Oh, well that sucks."
"Yeah," Sam said, "But, on the bright side, all this added bulk I'm putting on will be great for the football team next year!" Sam took another huge bite of his next slice.
Dave grinned, "Oh, totally! I'm a tank on the field, not gonna lie."
Sam laughed as he swallowed down the slice and went for the next, "I believe it."

Just then, Puck came back pushing a cart that had eight massive plates of the exact same potatoes and pot roast Dave had been eating, "I thought it would be easier to bring you a whole bunch at once than to have to go back after every plate."
Dave grinned, "Good thinking! Come to Papa!" He said, reaching both of his massive bear paws out. Puck placed all eight plates in front of Dave and he quickly dug in.
By the time Sam had finally finished both pizzas, Dave had devoured all 8 plates and Puck was off to get more for both of them.
"How many more can you eat?" Sam asked, wondering just how much Dave could fit into the massive gut of him.
Dave happily patted said massive gut, "Oh, trust me, I can still eat a LOT. What about you?"
Sam rubbed his own belly, "If Puck keeps bringing me those same pizzas, I'd say maybe three or four more?"
