Dave chuckled, "I remember when I could only eat five or six pizzas. I sure was a light weight." Dave noticed how Sam's t-shirt was so tight it looked painted on, and how his belly poked out at the bottom, "Starting to outgrow your clothes too, huh?"
Sam blushed a bit, "Yeah. My pants button popped in class today because of my belly."
Dave chuckled, which was very deep and hearty, "To be honest, I love the feeling of my buttons popping. It reminds me that I'm bigger than I used to be." He said, tugging at his polo, which refused to cover his belly button and furry belly.

Puck returned with the 16 plates for Dave and, as Sam suspected, four pizzas. He and Dave quickly started eating, and once Sam started on his last pizza, Dave had just finished his last plate. Puck got up again to go get more, and Dave burped before saying, "Puck, wait."
Puck turned back around, "What, you can't be full already? Not a big, strong bear like you."
"I'm not," Dave said, "but I want desert. You know what I like?"
Puck's face lit up and he hurried off to go grab as much cheesecake as possible. Once he was gone, Dave turned to Sam, "So, Sammy boy! How much do you weight?"
Sam swallowed the last bite of pizza before starting on another, "I weighed in at 310 this morning. You?"
"485!" Dave said, proud of his weight.
"485!! You're almost 500 pounds!" Sam said, amazed. Though, he knew he shouldn't be. Dave was the biggest man he'd ever seen.
"Yep! That's why weight lifting is so crucial in out gaining lives. How else will I stay mobile if my muscles can't handle it?" Dave said, flexing the biggest arm Sam had ever seen in his life.
"So, do you plan on gaining past 500?" Sam asked, curiously. He wondered what life would be like at Dave's size and was even considering gaining up to that.
"Sure do! As much as I can!" Dave said, rubbing his bloated belly, which was now pressing against the table due to the 25 plates of buffet sized meat and potatoes.

Just then, Puck emerged from out of nowhere with the cart he'd been using, which had 15 cheesecakes on it, "10 for Dave and 5 for Sam!" He said, eager to push Sam past his limit, hoping that Dave's massive size made Sam considering a gigantic gain.
11123211211211111112222121111.title: Puck's growing bears get to know each other.

111232112112111111122221211111.content:
Dave grinned at the sight of the cheesecake. "Man I love cheesecake!" As Dave reached out to get some Sam interrupted.
"Uh, you might want to wait for a second on eating those," he said as both Puck and Dave stared at him.
"Why?" Dave asked confused.
"Umm, you know, getting stuck at the table like Winnie the Pooh from all that honey. He also was a big bear too."
"Stop speaking nonsense Sammy, spit it out already," Puck said not in the mood for dribble when he could be watching bears eat.
"You'll get even more stuck then you already probably are and we should probably get out of the booth before Dave gets wedged real tight in there that it would be impossible." Puck and Dave looked down then at Dave's belly pushed up pretty hard against the table.

"You got a point there," Puck said and sighed as he put the cheesecake back. "Hang on we're going to get you out. Come on Sam." Sam tried to stand up but barely got up before he fell back down.

"Maybe in a bit," Sam said. "I'll just roll out of here, literally." Puck smirked at that before turning his mind to solve the problem of Dave.
"Well hang on, I'll be back in a jiffy with the help here. They're used to situations where this happens."

"Really?" Sam asked surprised.
"Well, maybe not one as big as Dave now probably but he was a regular so they'll be ready to help one of their favorite or hated patrons."
"I feel so loved," Dave said sarcastically.
"Heh, you eat them dry and arouse strong feelings of passion," Puck said winking as he left. They waited there for a few moments while Puck was away.

"This is awkward," Dave said shifting a bit. "Only downside is not getting out of booths and stuff. Its a good thing a drive a big vehicle as that's the only thing that's going to take me anywhere."

"Yeah, true enough," Sam said. "It's pretty weird but I love it, the feeling of being bigger. Well, when not in the stages of wanting to either severely hurt Puck or die in intestinal agony after one of his stuffings." Dave smiled.

"Yeah, he does love those. Puck especially loves the big feeders he works on. Puck takes feederism into an art."
"He certainly is obessive."
"And very well endowed." At Sam's raised eyebrows Dave shrugged, "I meant at his feeding gift but trust me he also is the other way as well. That is also s gift."
"Yeah..." Sam said and Dave smirked.
"Couldn't resist taking a look either? It's gorgeous yes?"
"...Yes, yes it is," Sam muttered.

"What are you guys talking about?" asked Puck as he came back with a couple of guys from the kitchen.
"Nothing," Sam said at the same time as Dave said "your schlong" Puck laughed at that.
"What about it?" he asked mischeviously.
"Only where to put it," Dave said grinning as Sam turned red.
"Can we please stop this kind of talk please? It's embarassing. Let's just focus on Dave shall we?"

It was a bit of a rough going. Dave was wedged in pretty tight and no amount of tugging or pulling was able to get him out. Finally someone had the brilliant idea to use slippery stuff to slide him on out. Using soap, grease, mayonaise, ranch dressing (Sam suspected that the kitchen staff was taking a little too much fun out of this) they greased Dave up.

"This feels really weird and slimy," he said as they finished.
"Don't worry, you'll be out of there in no-time!" Puck said enthusiastically as he wiped his hands on his pants. With the help of some of the kitchen staff and a bit of pushing, pulling, and grunting, they finally pulled Dave out of the seat.

"Awesome!" Puck said.
"Next time, don't use a table booth," muttered one of the kitchen staff helpers. "Freaking pig."
"I heard that!" Puck yelled.
"You were meant to dope!" Yelled the guy back. "Always coming in here with one of your prize fattened hogs eating everything, its sick and-" the rest was cut off with a visit from one of Puck's fists which sent the guy sprawling.

"Anyone else?" he asked casusally as he inspected his fingernails for invisible dirt.
"No, we're all good," the other staff member said. "Danny just forgot his manners today."
"Good,"Puck said as he strode over to the cart. "Mind if I take some home?"
"Of course," the other waiter said bowing. "Need any help to your vehicle?" Puck thought for a bit before shrugging.
"Sure why not." With the help of some of the staff who wasn't Danny, they made it to the vehicle and all packed up.
"Where too?" he asked and Dave shrugged.
"My house is good and has more space than either of yours."
"Yours it is then. That was fun wasn't it?"
"Depends on your definition of fun," Sam countered.
"Touche. And it's only going to continue soon. After all, I've got cheesecakes!"

choices: Dave weighs 520(+35 gain) and Sam weighs 320(+10 gain)
Dave weighs 530(+45 gain) and Sam weighs 330(+20 gain)
1112321121121111111222212111111.content:
"Oh! One sec, guys, I just got an idea!" Puck said before hopping out of the driver seat of Dave's monster-sized truck. Sam was sitting in the back seat, rubbing his bulging belly, "Uggh.. I think I'm way to full to eat these cheesecakes."
Dave chuckled as he wiped his belly off with paper towels he kept in the car, doing his best to get the mess off of him, "More for me, then. I'm still starving."
Sam couldn't believe what he just heard, "What? You ate three times as much as I did!"
Dave tossed the messy paper towels out the window, "Those rude employee's can clean that up. Huh? Oh, yeah, what I ate in there was nothing compared to what I can actually eat. Like I said, if you can't eat those cheesecakes I will."

Just then the back door opened and Puck set down 15 more full cheesecakes, "I figured since they're terrified of me I could just grab a few more!" He got back into the front seat and looked at his two humongous bears, "What were you two talking about?"
Sam was about to tell Puck he doesn't think he could eat 10 cheesecakes by himself, but Dave jumped in, "We were talking about how huge your cock is and how tight and buff your ass is."
Sam's face turned bright red and he blurted out, "Dave!" Dave's chubby face grinned back at Sam before Puck turned around, "Really now? And here I thought you only had it out for the ladies."
Sam looked out the window, his face still bright red, "I.. I don't know..."
Puck grinned, "Well, big guy, no need to worry. There ain't no weight limit on the Puckasaurus Express. You ever wanna fool around just say the word." Puck pointed his thumb at Dave, "This guy knows."
"Yeah, I do." Dave said, grinning, "Now, lets head home. I wanna shower before we stuff those cheesecakes down."

As Puck drove, Sam stared out the window and relaxed, rubbing his belly which bounced and jiggled as the car drove. His mind was drifting to thoughts he had never really thought about before. Could he be attracted to men? He'd gone his entire life only attracted to woman, but maybe things were changing for him. Puck was definitely attractive and Sam knew just how much Puck lusted for his bigger body, and Dave was an entirely different kind of sexy. He was HUGE, powerful, commanding. Sam scratched the back of his head, thinking. Maybe he was that one thing. What was it called? Bisexual, that's it. Maybe he was bisexual. Sam didn't have a chance to think more about it because they had reached Dave's house. All three of them loaded out of the car, and despite the massive meal still digesting in his even more massive gut, Dave was the first person out of the car and at the front door, unlocking it before heading inside to shower. As Puck unloaded the car, Sam turned to him, "Did you see that?"

"What, Dave?" Puck asked, carrying 15 cheesecakes in his arms, "He might weight almost 500 pounds, Sammy, but those thighs of his are powerful and he has to be fast on the football field."
Sam had completely forgotten about Dave's football skills, which clearly have gotten better since he's put on almost 300 pounds. Sam made his way inside and was surprised by the sheer size of Dave's house. To compensate for the ever growing teenage bear, everything in Dave's house was gigantic. The sofa made Sam's now very large and round ass look tiny, compared to how he took up half of the one at Puck's house. The TV was gigantic, as was the table, fridge, everything! The entire house was one big bear cave where everything was the perfect size for Dave's gargantuan body. The fireplace had a warm blaze crackling inside of it, and Sam sat down on the couch, his large backside barely covering one cushion, felt the warmth of the house take over and he fell asleep.

An hour and a half passed by before Sam was woken up by a large hand shaking his shoulder. Sam opened his sleepy eyes to see Puck, sitting next to him and smiling, "Morning, sunshine."
Sam yawned, "Sorry about that... I fell asleep."
Puck smiled, "Hey, it's all good. Sleep does a fat belly wonders." He said, reaching down and squeezing Sam's jiggly belly, "You're metabolism is really picking up, Sammy. You've almost finished digesting that huge meal from the buffet."
Sam chuckled, "Huh... Guess so." Sam sat back and smiled as Puck gleefully rubbed, jiggled, and played with Sam's belly fat.
Just then, Dave walked out of the hall wearing only a pair of his boxers that were so tight on his enourmas waistline, titanic thighs, and gargantuan ass that they looked more like a pair of briefs that boxers. "Hey!" He said in a loud, dominating voice, "I can forgive Sam because he's never been here before, but you know the rules, Puck. Underwear only in the Bear Cave."

Puck smacked his forehead, "Sorry, Dave! You better undress too, Puck, or else Dave'll sit on you. Actually... that sounds kinda hot." Puck stood up despite and peeled off his clothing, revealing his cut, muscular body. Sam did the same, until he was down to just his skin tight Spider-Man undies. Dave licked his lips at the sight of Sam's meaty ass packed tightly into his briefs, "I could just stare at that for days!"
"Seriously." Puck said, giving his ass a squeeze and making Sam's face turn an even brighter shade of red.
"Can we just eat now?" Sam asked, and he and Dave sat down. Dave's body was so big that it took up one and a half couch cushions, when Sam could barely fill one. It took two trips, but Puck returned with all 30 cheesecakes he had gotten from the buffet. It a couple of tries, but Puck figured out a routine that would work best for his two bears; he would simply feed both of them a slice at the same time.

After 4 of Sam's 10 cheesecakes, Sam had to call it quits. His stomach wasn't as big as Dave's and he was still full from the buffet. He expected Puck to protest and start force-feeding him, but instead, Puck took the remaining 6 cheesecakes he didn't eat and started to feed them to Dave instead. After a couple of minutes of bloated bliss, Sam fell asleep on his side of the couch.

The next morning, Sam woke up to find a blanket on him and a pillow under his head. He was about to call out either Dave or Puck's names, but Puck came around the corner, "Oh, sweet, you're up! I'll go tell Dave and we can do a weigh in! Meet us in the bathroom." Sam gets up and groggily makes his way into the enourmas bathroom.
1112321121121111111222212111111.title: Cheesecake binge!

choices: Jake meets Sam and Dave, Jake chooses Sam
Jake meets Sam and Dave, Jake chooses Dave
11123211211211111112222121111111.content:
Puck came back with Dave. Taking out Dave's scale, Puck set it down and pointed at Sam. "Okay, you first Sammy boy. " Sam look sceptically at the device.
"You sure that could stand my weight without me crushing it, let alone Dave?"

"Yeah," Puck said. "It surprisingly takes more than it looks." Sam got on and tried to lean down but couldn't see over his belly the numbers.
"What does it say?" Puck looked down.
"Woo, 320 awesome." Puck rubbed Sam's belly fondly. Puck then motioned over to Dave. "Your turn." Dave managed to somehow balance his feet on the scale. Puck looked down and his eyes widened. "Holy mother of...no f-ing way!"

"What is it?" Dave asked curiously.
"It says 520." Puck looked over. "Wow, that was sure a big jump! I've come to a realization. I can no longer be your feeder..." Puck said. Dave and Sam both jumped in surprise.

"What? But you...?" Dave started before Puck grinned.
"Relax. I can't be both your guys feeder without help. The thought of sharing you with someone else is a bit repugnant I admit but it is hard even for me to feed both of you effectively without a bit of help as I saw last night. So I'm going to bring someone in to help."

"Really? Who?" Sam asked.
"You don't know him yet. I only recently discovered his existence myself so maybe I'm just hoping too much but I'm thinking of my brother Jake. Actually, half-brother but he might as well be my brother. Just have to see if he's interested but if he's anything like me he probably will be."

"Okay then," Sam said. Puck pulled out his phone and a crumpled piece of paper.
"Now let's see...okay, here it is. Jake's number. Google is an amazing source."
"As well as scary," Dave said under his breath and Sam nodded. Puck dialed and after a few moments he started talking.
"Hey, is this Jake? This is your brother Puck..." There was silence for a moment and then loud noises coming through the phone. Puck looked at them and then left the room to continue his call privately.

"So..." Sam said.
"Yeah..." Dave trailed.
"Smash Brothers?" Dave asked.
"Okay," Sam grinned and they went to go play Smash Brothers with Dave being Bowser and Sam Falco.

After a couple of rounds, Puck came in and grinned. "There, that's settled."
"What is?" Sam asked pausing to Dave's frustration right before Bowser was going to smash Falco again.
"Well, Jake was as surprised to find out he had a brother as I was and he's going to come over to meet us in a bit."
"So, I guess he's going to help or something?" Dave rumbled.
"Yeah, I guessed right that Puckerman's love feeding since I do, my sister does, he does, my mom does, my aunts and grandparents do..."
"Not your dad...?" Sam trailed off nervously and Puck's eye twitched and his smile curdled.
"No, he's not a Puckerman, he married into the family name. Don't bring him up please."
"Sorry," Sam said and Puck grinned again.
"I forgive you so keep doing what your doing while I meet my brother for the first time. I hope he likes me," Puck said beginning to worry, Dave laughed.
"Don't worry, you're awesome. He's going to love you."
"Thanks, yeah, he will." Puck said pumping himself up. "He will like me, he will like me, he will like me..." He left the room still talking to himself.
"Should we help him?" Sam asked.
"Nah, he'll be fine. Besides, I need to get back to kicking your ass at Brawl," Dave said grinning.
"It's not over till it's over," Sam muttered as he unpaused.
"Just keep telling yourself that trouty mouth."

Eventually the doorbell rang and Puck rushed to it.
"Hey!" he said, being cool despite the fact that he was all dancing and giddy inside.
"Hey," the guy outside said offering out his hand. "I guess you must be Noah? I'm Jake."
"Please, call me Puck," Puck said.
"Okay Puck," Jake said grinning as Puck shook his hand. "It's good to finally meet you."
"Likewise. Come on it," Puck said as he lead Jake into the house.
"Wow, this is where you live?" Jake said astonished and wide-eyed.
"Huh? Oh no, this is Dave's house." Jake looked at Puck.
"There a reason you're only in underwear?"
"Bachelor house rule?" Puck said and Jake shrugged accepting it.
"So you needed my help with something?"
"Yeah, call it a little bonding experience as well."
11123211211211111112222121111111.title: Bringing in help

choices: The Puckerman Brothers feed their bears.
111232112112111111122221211111112.content:
"Bonding experience?" Jake asked as he pulled off his shirt. He wasn't as muscular as his older half-brother, but he was getting there.
"Yeah. See, heres the thing. You're a Puckerman, and we Puckerman come from a long line of people who enjoys helping other people get bigger." Puck said, trying to ease Jake into the idea, the way he was.
"Bigger? Like, a professional workout coach?" Jake asked, an idea he could get behind.
"Exactly! Only not just with muscle." Puck said, "There are some people who want to get bigger in other ways too, and its a Puckerman's job to be able to understand how to help anybody get bigger."
"Other ways? Like, weight gaining?" Jake asked, starting to realize what he was saying.
Puck grinned, "Exactly! I have two friends who are gainers, they're both gaining muscle AND fat, but both are doing it in two different ways. I can't handle it on my own, and I need your help."
Jake scratched the back of his neck, "I don't know, dude. This is kind of weird..."
"I felt the same way," Puck said, "But once you start, you realize its what you've always been meant to do. It's in your DNA."
Jake signed, as he pulled off his shorts, standing there in his boxers, "Okay, then."

Puck lead Jake into the other room, and Jake responded the exact same way most people do at the sight of Dave and Sam's size. He was SHOCKED that people could even get that big! As he stared, slack jawed, Puck chuckled, "Jake, these are my two best friends; Sam and Dave. Dave is the bigger one."
"Sup!" Dave said, grinning at the sight of another very attractive Puckerman boy. Sam leaned forward, so Jake could see him over Dave's massive body, and waved at him.
"You... You guys are HUGE!" Jake said, still stunned.
"Sure am!" Dave said, rubbing his belly with one hand and flexing the biggest bicep Jake had ever seen. His eyes flickered to Sam, who was also flexing his huge arms.
Jake was stunned by the sizes of these and Puck finally stepped in, "See, Jake! These guys are MASSIVE and I can't do all this work by myself."
"Wait, these two are STILL gaining?!" Jake asked, shocked again.
"Yep!" Puck said, leading Jake in more. Jake was standing next to Dave and watched as Puck squeezed himself between them, his body happily trapped between their strong muscles and soft, blubbery bodies, and the size of these two made Puck look tiny. Puck put his hand on Dave's stomach, "Davey, here, was a 200 pound little nothing trying to bulk up for the football team. Now he's a 530 pound beast that the other players are terrified of. And Sam," he put his other hand on Sam's stomach, "Sammy has already hit the big 320 and is doing his best to win back an ex."
Sam's eyebrows knitted in concentration, "She broke up with her boyfriend but is mulling things over still. He's also trying to win her back."
Puck rubbed his shoulder, "You'll get there, buddy. Anyway, with these two I can't cook, feed, massage, AND work them out evenly. Will you help me Jake? Please?"

Jake sighed, "I guess... if it IS the Puckerman way."
Puck grinned, "GREAT! Since this is your first time as a feeder/coach, I think you should take Dave; just feed him as much as he wants so you can get the hang of it. Just remember to give his body all of the attention it deserves!"
111232112112111111122221211111112.title: Jake picks his bear.

1112321121121111111222212111111121.content:
"Sup," Jake said offering his hand to the mountainous mass on the couch and wincing when his hand was caught in a crushing grip. After Dave let go he introduced himself again to Sam. "So yeah I'm Jake, Puck's half-brother. It's sure...something to meet you guys. You guys are huge."

"Yeah, your brother takes good care," Dave said grinning. "You're sure to do the same."
"I can only hope to do so," Jake said. "But uh..what do you guys eat?"
"Pretty much anything and everything," Puck said grinning. "Though of course some foods are preferred over others. You can cook right?"
"A bit..." Jake said. "Not much but I'm pretty good at what I do know."
"Cool, you'll be able to help me and even learn new recipes as well. Anyhow, we should get started since cooking will take a while. Sam and Dave will have snacks in the meantime which should last them for a little bit while we work." Puck reached into a bag and placed two massive bowls of chips out along with a couple two liter bottles of soda and leftover cheesecake.

"Where on earth did you find cheesecake?" Dave asked.
"I don't know, I just discovered we had some left somehow so yeah here's the rest." Puck turned to look at Jake. "Dave is a cheesecake fanatic, along with everything else, but especially cheesecake. Let's just say you do not want to get between him and a cheesecake." Puck lead Jake to the kitchen.

"How did you get them so big?" Jake asked when they were inside.
"Food, food, lots of food, and a bit of handy-dandy weight gain powders, proteins, mixes, and experimental compounds."
"Oh. They are fine right?" Jake asked.

"It would shock you but yes, they are extraordinarily healthy for the weight range. Other than being extremely big the doctors when we went for a checkup couldn't find anything wrong. It freaked them immensely which was fun but after all the tests were done it turned out they were more healthy than most people are at far lower weights and while they'd never be able to run a marathon, they're able to be do most physical stuff without being afraid of keeling over and having a heart attack. Health is of the utmost importance when gaining."

"Makes sense, although I'm having trouble imagining those two running," Jake said grinning.
"Only when they're not full. Then they'd be going nowhere," Puck added. "So you know how to make lasagna?"
"Not really."
"Well then it's time for your first cooking lesson. It's rather simple and cost-effective which is useful when dealing with one's gaining clients..."

Sam and Dave amused themselves by turning the wii back on and playing brawl again while they snacked on the bags of chips.
"This is the life, eh Sammy?" Dave said, rubbing his stomach for a moment. "Just hanging out and playing stress-free. Well, other than the stress caused by going to kick your butt at this game but you know, not the bad stress of people judging."

"Yeah," Sam grunted when Dave's Bowser slammed Falco off-stage. "Dang you're good at Bowser."
"Favorite character plus he reminds me of me."
"I totally see that," Sam said.
"So Jake seems nice." Dave said grinning.
"Yeah, he does." The conversation stopped for a while as they played a couple more rounds and filling up their chip bowls when they ran out. They lost track of time in the game before a coughing sound came.

"Ahem. Hey, so who is ready for dinner?" Puck asked. Sam and Dave turned around eagerly.
"What is it?"
"Multi-layer lasagna and chocolate fudge cake." Puck put the plates down.
"Sounds awesome," Sam said licking his lips. Dave nodded in agreement.
"So remember," Puck said turning to Jake. "Feed them slowly or at whatever pace they're going at. Be gentle, encouraging, seduce them into taking that next bite."
"Okay, got it," Jake said. Puck grinned and cut the first section of lasanga out and put it on a plate and then fed bits and pieces to Sam who eagerly had his mouth open and ready. After watching Puck a few more times, Jake followed his lead.

"I won't bite," Dave rumbled seeing Jake's hesitation. "Intentionally. Unless you want me to of course."
"Nah I'm good." Jake said and brought the first piece up to Dave's mouth. "So uh hope you like it."
"I will," Dave said and when the first mouthful went in Dave grinned. "That's pretty good."
"Oh uh thanks. Yeah, me and Puck worked on it for a while, so weird by the way saying that since you know it's our last name and we're related..." Jake rambled for a bit as he tried to keep from spilling.

"That's so cute," Dave said in between bites. "When you ramble." Jake just looked up and blushed. Wondering what's going on Puck looked over.
"Hey, no flirting with my brother Dave!" Puck said and he and Dave laughed when Jake obviously blushed looking down. It wasn't very physically visible considering Jake's darker complexion but he couldn't hide the other part.

"S-shut up," Jake muttered as he continued to spoonfeed pieces of food towards Dave. Puck turned back and continued working on Sam.
1112321121121111111222212111111121.title: Jake's first lesson

choices: Puck finishes stuffing Sam and helps Jake with Dave.
11123211211211111112222121111111211.content:
The next hour seemed to fly by for the four men as the lunchtime feeding continued. Puck made sure that Sam was so busy eating he never got to say a word; presenting him with massive bite after massive bite of the huge lasagna he and Jake had made every chance he got. Sam had one arm on the couch's large armrest, the other relaxing against the back of the couch, and he moaned happily as Puck continued to stuff his belly. Once the last bite of Sam's lasagna passed his big lips, he opened his mouth for more, and when there wasn't any Sam let out a little whine, "That's it? I want more..." he asked.

Puck smiled, "Those are my three favorite words to hear." Puck set the plate down and placed both hands on Sam's belly, running his hands over it and smiling, "Of course you can have more, Sammy. Just relax for a bit while I admire my work." Puck smiled as his hands glided over Sam's belly, which was still very soft and squishy with very little give to it. Sam's belly still had plenty of room for food and Puck planned on feeding him until his belly was at full capacity. Puck reached out and grabbed a 3-liter of grape soda, his free hand patting and jiggling Sam's belly as he did so. Puck relaxed against the small bit of space on the couch between him and his brother and unscrewed the full bottle; holding it up to Sam's lips, "Drink up!"

Sam took the bottle in both of his large hands and placed it to his lips, gulping down huge swallows of the sugary, bubble-y, purple drink. As Sam gorged himself on soda, Puck rubbed his belly, which he could feel tighten a little bit as it becomes filled with 3 liters of soda. Sam took one break as he downed the drink, stoping halfway to get some air into his lungs, before going back to swallowing down the soda. The bottle made a crinkling noise as Sam sucked out the air inside of it before pulling it back and letting out a massive belch.

The other men in the room laughed, but they all quickly went back into their own little worlds, the feeders focusing on their bears. Puck rubbed Sam's belly, feeling it for pressure, "You're still so hungry, Sammy. Ready for dessert?" Sam nodded and Puck instantly began stuffing Sam with his chocolate cake, watching lustfully as Sam scarfed down the cake, Puck's free hand reaching up and squeezing Sam's massive pecs and his nipples, something that no longer bothered Sam.

On the other side of the couch, Jake’s muscular body (though not as muscular as Puck’s) was pressed up against the solid yet squishy torso of Dave. One hand was resting on Dave’s gigantic belly while his other carefully fed the massive bear lasagna. As soon as Dave took a bite, Jake would lower his fork to the plate sitting on top of Dave’s massive belly and get other. Unlike Sam, who had one lasagna, Puck and Jake made sure to cook four for Dave, their very own ever-growing black hole. It was challenging at first for Jake, who could barely keep up with Dave’s demands to be fed, but after the second lasagna, Jake got the hang of it and was feeding Dave at a pace Dave agreed with.

Once the final bite of lasagna was gone, Jake gave Dave his very own 3-liter of soda, which Dave instantly began drinking, as Jake started to prepare dessert.
11123211211211111112222121111111211.title: The Puckerman bros feed their bears.

111232112112111111122221211111112111.content:
A groan came from Sam came as the last of the cake disappeared. "Thank...goodness..." he said panting as he clutched his sides. Puck chuckled as he rubbed Sam's stuffed belly.

"Finally full huh...you're getting more and more impressive as time goes on," Puck chuckled. "So big and beefy and content, it makes my feeder heart proud." Sam let out another huge belch when Puck squeezed down and whimpered.

"You know not do do that," Sam hissed at the pressure. "I'm fucking about to explode here!" Puck just smiled.
"Just teasing man, feeling how nice and big this thing is. I don't want you to pop." Puck turned to Jake who was bringing in the dessert.
"So how does it feel bro? Feeding two big studs here?" Jake lookd back at Puck.
"It's really something. Feeding someone and watching them enjoy your food is...wow."
"Yeah it is. Sam here is finished so we just need to finish good old Dave here up."
"Dave is freaking Goliath," Jake said brining up the first piece of cheesecake to Dave's mouth. "How much does it take to fill you?"
"A lot," Dave answered. "And I'm never filled without Puck around."
"It must be helluv expensive to feed you," Jake said bringing up another piece. Puck moved beside him and picked up a piece as well.
"Yeah...it kind of is I admit but it's still a lot more affordable than being at the hospital for long and well, my dad loves me." Dave finished Jake's piece and Puck took the next turn with his piece.

"Yeah, you're lucky you have an awesome dad. My-our dad" Puck said looking at Jake, "abandoned us and is a womanizing cheating asshole who only comes over for money."
"Puck just shut up and feed me the damn cheesecake already," Dave mocked growled but it had a hint of serious tone to it as well. Puck just smirked.
"My pleasure," he said as he brought it up and let Dave lap from his fingertips. "Mmmh it must be good," he teased shifting his hand a little. He stepped back and let Jake offer his piece when Dave finished. Eventually all the pieces of cheesecake were gone and Dave leaned back with a groan of relief.

"Ugh so good, I am really glad your my feeder again, just isn't the same without you." Dave let out a tremendous belch and patted his wide stomach. "I really missed your treatments as well. You have some frigging amazing finger talent." Puck grinned as he moved over and rubbed Dave's stomach. "Glad to be of service. It makes me happy your happy."

"Bull," Dave said. "You like to see people stuffed to the gills barely able to move after a delightfully big meal and rub their beautiful stomachs which you've said a bunch of times." Puck grinned as he kneaded Dave's full stomach bringing out a moan.

"That too I admit. Jake, take care of Sam for a moment. I'll switch places with you in a few moments." Jake grinned as he moved over to Sam and lightly placed his fingers on the globular stomach. Sam eyed him as Jake looked over at Puck and copied his movements.

"Like this right?" Jake asked as he copied what Puck was doing. Puck looked over briefly and nodded and returned back to Dave. Jake smiled as he slowly but then with more confidence repeated what his brother was doing which caught a gasp from Sam as the pleasure set in. Not quite as skilled as Puck but Jake was pretty decent and Sam moaned in relief and enjoyment as Jake's fingers caressed and massaged his full stomach. Jake was smiling as he glanced back over at Puck who grinned and nodded back as they massaged their bears. Eventually Puck got up and tapped Jake.

"Switch time. Me with Sam, you with Dave." Jake grinned and confidently nodded as he moved to Dave and they repeated the same massage. After a while and another switch or two, Sam and Dave were lulled asleep finally having been too full earlier. Puck and Jake moved to the kitchen and cleaned up.

"How was it?" Puck asked at Jake smiling.
"It's...awesome!" Jake cried grinning. "I had no idead it was so much fun."
"I know right?" Puck said grinning as well. "Did I or did I not tell you?"
"You sure told me," Jake said grinning. "But man its exhausting work. No wonder you were desperate for me to come in."
"Yeah. Just Sam is one thing, but Sam and Dave together is something not even a master feeder like myself could do on my own. But I only trust other Puckermans."
"I'm glad you trust me," Jake said.
"I'm glad to and that we're going to be spending a lot more time together."
"Amen to that brother," Jake said. Puck grinned and said that as well. Puck got up, enjoying the admiring glances of his younger half-brother who was looking up to him.
"Pretty sweet huh?" I'm going down to work out for a bit, wanna join with?"
"How do you even have any energy left?" Jake wondered in amazement.
"Not much but enough to get a good enough workout in, pump the guns and all. Tis the best time to do so." Jake sighed as he went to the couch.
"Maybe later, I need a nap and am downright exhausted."
"Kay, see you later," Puck said wandering down. Jake went onto a couch and sunk into its fluffiness and let out a sigh of contentment as he fell asleep.
111232112112111111122221211111112111.title: Puck finishes stuffing Sam and helps Jake with ...

1112321121121111111222212111111121111.content:
After an hour of napping Jake yawned and buried his face into the amazingly soft pillow he was sleeping on. Somebody must have put one under his head while he was out and he nuzzled his face into it, trying to fall back to sleep. Jake had never slept on a pillow this comfy before in his life! It was soft and squishy as well as being SUPER warm and big. It wasn't until the pillow made an audible growl that Jake realized he was sleeping on top of Dave's stomach. He looked up and saw Dave, who was smiling down at Jake over his huge pecs, "Morning."
"Oh!" Jake said, a little flustered, "S-sorry. I don't know how I got on your stomach..."
"You fell asleep there." Dave said, "When you sat down on the couch and fell asleep you kind of fell over and landed on my belly. I didn't mind though." Dave put his huge bear paws under his belly and happily gave the massive gut a few shakes, making it bounce and jiggle, "I focus more on eating and gaining fat rather than muscle, so having people sleep on my big pillowy belly makes me happy."
Jake stared, amazed at how big and jiggly Dave's gut was, "Yeah... It really was soft and squishy."
Dave smiled, "Well, if you ever want to use me as a mattress or pillow, be my guest!"
"Can... can I now?" Jake asked, embarrassed."
Dave adjusted how he was position on the couch, so that instead of sitting up, he was laying down. He patted his belly a few times, "All yours."
Jake crawled across the couch and buried his face into Dave's fat, enormous, squishy belly, happily falling right back to sleep.

Meanwhile, in the basement, Sam's belly had finally adjusted to the amount of food Puck had stuffed him with, and the two were working out. Sam was working on bulking his legs and his already gigantic butt, while Puck was working on his arms, as always. The two were happily listening to the music on Puck's itunes, which was coming from the speakers on his laptop. Puck heard his cell phone ringing and he put his weights down and paused the music. He picked up his phone and answered saw the caller ID was from Finn, "Hello?"
"Puckerman? This is Shane." The deep voice from the other end said, "I know Evans is with you. Put him on."
"Uhh... Sure. Yo, Sammy, it's for you." Puck said, a little confused.
Sam got up from the machine and walked over, "Hello?"
"Evans? This is Shane." Shane said from the other end.
"Shane? What do YOU want?" Sam said, sounding annoyed.
"You KNOW what I want. I want you to back off of Mercedes. She's dating me." Shane said, though Sam had a hard time understanding what he said. It sounded like Shane was eating.

"I'm not backing off, okay! I'm doing all of this to impress her so she'll date me again! Plus, you two aren't even dating anymore. You broke up, remember?" Sam said.
"Yeah and I'm TRYING to get back together with her. Listen, Evans, I challenge you to a series of contests." Shane said.
"Contests?" Sam asked, confused.
"Yeah. You and I will compete to see who deserves Mercedes more. School is closed tomorrow but the locker room is still open. Meet me there at noon and we'll settle this once and for all. If you don't show up you forfeit." Before Sam could say anything the call was cut off.

Sam explained what happened to Puck, who looked worried about it, but they both went on with their workouts. That night Jake and Puck stuffed Sam and Dave once again until the two were full to the point where they felt like they were going to explode. Everybody went to bed after that, Puck snuggled up against Sam's belly, hugging it protectively, and Jake asleep on his new favorite pillow, Dave.

The next day Sam was waiting in the locker room with Puck for Shane and Finn to show up. Dave and Jake had decided to stay at home so Jake could practice stuffing Dave's belly and so he could take more naps on it. Sam was about to call Finn's cell phone when the tall teenager walked in, "Sorry we're late!"
Right behind Finn was Shane, or at least, the massive mound of muscle and fat Shane had become. If Sam had to guess he'd say Shane weighed...
1112321121121111111222212111111121111.title: Challenged by Shane.

11131.content: Lead male vocalist of New Directions and McKinley High's Quarterback, Finn Hudson, is about to start getting heavier. How does the super-tall teen plan on packing it on?
11131.title: Finn Hudson.

111311.content: So, which one will it be?
111311.title: Fat or Muscle

111312.content:
It had been weeks since Finn had been passed over by the college recruiter for Shane, and it left him in a serious funk. He wasn't his usual cheerful self, but he put on a happy face for Rachel and the Glee club. One day, he was at home when his cellphone went off. "Hello?" Finn asked, not recognizing the number.

"Is this Finn Hudson from McKinley?"
"Yes. Who is this?"
"Finn, this is Cooter Menkins, the football recruiter from Ohio State. We've decided that do want you here to play football with us."
"OH MY GOD, REALLY?"
"Yes, Sir. But, there's a catch. The Ohio State Buckeyes are MASSIVE guys, which is why we went for Shane first. If you can bulk to about Shane's size, then we'd be honored to have you on our team."
"Shane's size... I'll do it! You won't regret this, Mr. Menkins." Finn hung up the phone and was happy that he shot out from his bed and started jumping around. He stopped and went into his bathroom and pulled his shirt off, looking over his body. He wasn't the most muscular guy in school, but he was fit. It didn't matter. Finn was going to bulk up no matter what, but he knew he was going to need help. Finn went down stairs and opened the fridge, happy to see that the leftover pizza from dinner hadn't been eaten yet. He heated up the leftover eight slices and took them up to his room. As he ate, he thought about what it would be like to be so big.

He'd have to buy a bunch of new clothes, and Rachel would probably have a few things to say about it, but that didn't matter. This was what he really wanted. Finn finished off his first slice and grabbed his phone, calling
111312.title: Finn needs to gain for football.

choices: Puck brought lots of good dessert treats
1113122.content:
"Hey Puck! I got awesome news!" Finn shouted into the phone when he heard the phone pick up. There was a clanging noise and muffled cursing and Puck came on.
"Dude, why the hell are you shouting in my ear, are you trying to make me go deaf?"
"No, but I got really good news!"
"It better be, if it is anything like when you thought you saw a dragon but turned out to be a small lizard I am going to kill you."
"Hey in my defense, it cast a very large shadow and I thought it was a dragon...but that's not what I'm calling about. I'm calling about the football recruiter!"
"Yeah? What about him?"
"He chose me!" He heard Puck sigh on the other end of the phone.
"You've lost it, he chose Shane, remember?"
"Yeah, but I just heard from him again today!"
"Wait, you have?" Puck was startled and Finn was nodding vigorously because he forgot Puck wouldn't be able to see it.
"Yeah, he just called today. I think they're still choosing Shane but they're willing to take me as well!"
"Really? That's sweet! I'm so glad for you man!"
"There's just a small catch." Puck stopped cheering.
"Uh-oh, what is it?"
"I have to become as big as Shane." There was silence on Puck's end of the phone.
"Did you hear me?" Finn asked.
"Yeah, I heard you."
"Well, what are you thinking?"
"Do you really want to know?" Puck asked.
"Yeah I really want to know!" Finn shouted back.
"You are so fucked. To be as big as Shane...yeah, that will be problematic."
"No it won't! I can do it!"
"Your enthusiam is admirable but the execution is much in doubt."
"You've been talking to Rachel again haven't you?"
"No, she's been talking to me. Your girlfriend is awesome and all but she never shuts her mouth. How do you put up with it?"
"Easy, I listen to half the things she says and tune the rest out by thinking of other things." Puck chuckled on the other end.
"Oh man, you're smarter than I give credit for."
"Hey thanks...wait a minute..." Puck burst into laughter.
"Don't hurt yourself by overthinking. Your brain might explode."
"Is that possible?" Finn asked suddenly worried.
"From overthinking? No. Although there could always be a first time. But back to the main point. You say you have to become as big as Shane to join the team?"
"Yeah." There was silence for a few moments.
"I'll be glad to help," Puck said.
"Huh?" Finn asked.
"It's obvious why you called so the answer is yes, I will help you."
"But what happened to their being no chance?"
"You'd have no chance of succeeding on your own I mean."
"Geez, some friend you are." Finn whined, insulted.
"I'm sorry but you know exactly what I mean."
"That's...probably true."
"So I'll help you."
"Oh my gosh, thank you!"
"I'll be over soon." The phone went off with a click. Finn ate a few slices of pizza waiting and was off like a rocket when the doorbell rang. When Finn opened it, Puck came walking in, a couple of fast food bags in hand.

"What are those?" Finn asked.
"Some food I picked on the way up. Where's Hummel?"
"Kurt, Burt, and Mom are out for the day."
"Cool. You hungry Finn?"
"Well, not really since I've just eaten a few pizza slices..." Puck slapped him across the face.
"Oww, why'd you hit me?" Finn asked.
"Wrong answer. You're supposed to say yes doofus."
"Um, sorry?"
"If you hope to bulk up to Shane's size, you're going to need more than a few measly slices of pizza. If that makes you full, you're never going to make it."
"But I am." Puck rubbed his forehead.
"Aye-yah, it's a good thing you called me. Finn, sit down." Finn sat and Puck started pacing.
"You want to join the team really bad?" Finn nodded vigorously.
"Yeah, you know that!"
"I will help you, but only if you do everything I say." Finn cocked his head.
"This isn't some trick is it?" Puck stopped and stared.
"Dude, what the hell? Are you trying to piss me off? No this isn't a trick!"
"Sorry I'm sorry." Puck rolled his eyes.
"I forgive you. Now as I was saying, you're going to do everything I say without question. Think of me as your Coach Beiste or Sue Sylvester."
"We already have those people." Finn pointed out. Puck wanted to bang his head against a wall.
"I...know...that..." he said clenching his teeth. "Now shut up, let me finish, and stop asking stupid questions." Finn mimed throwing away a key after locking his mouth.

"Now, you are going to have to get pretty big. What just happened here is a good example of why without help, you are going to fail miserably at this. Now, when I walked in the door I asked are you hungry. Your answer is...?"

"Um...yes?" Puck nodded.
"Good boy. You at least started with a pizza which is good but you're going to have to eat much more than that. We're going to reach limits that even you didn't know you have and break them. Now how hungry are you?"

"Very much...sir," Finn said. Puck smiled.
"You're learning fast. By the way, nice touch with the sir. I might just have to keep making you do that. Anyways, did you finish the pizza yet?"
"Not yet, I still have a few more slices." Puck nodded.
"Good. Let's prepare and eat the rest, then we can get started on what I brought.
1113122.title: Puck.

11131221.content:
Finn went back into his room and grabbed the pizza slices he had left up there, and when he turned around Puck was there. "We can eat in here." He said, setting all four bags of food on the bedside table. He turned to Finn and frowned, "What are you doing? Start eating."
"OH. Right, sorry, Sir." Finn said, stuffing a slice of pizza into his mouth.
Puck watched as he ate and he sighed, "Finn, oh my god, you are eating WAY to slowly. You need to pick up the pace." Hearing this, Finn finished the rest of the slice and went on to eating the next, finishing it quickly. Puck nodded, "Better. Finish those last three slices and then we can move onto the burgers." Finn ate the pizza as quickly as he could, and once the final bite was gone, Puck handed him three double cheeseburgers, "Keep going, Hudson."

"Don't I get a break, Pu- I mean.. Sir?" Finn asked, a little winded. Puck sighed, "There are six more burgers in this bag. You eat all of these and I'll give you a break to digest. Deal?"
Finn nodded and shoved one of the burgers into his mouth, trying to eat it as quickly as possible. As soon as one burger was gone, Puck replaced it with another. The two sat down on the bed and Finn ate, but after 5 burgers he had enough and had to stop.
"Come on, Finn. You can do this." Finn let out a loud belch and then groaned, his stomach full and bloated, "I don't thing I can..." Finn said before burping again.

Puck sighed and picked up a burger and holding it over Finn's mouth, "I'll have to feed it to you then."
"Puck, please.. I ca-"
"What did I say, Hudson? You do EVERYTHING I say, now open up." Finn opened his mouth and Puck fed him the burger, cheering him on and telling him to keep eating. After the entire first bag of burgers were in Finn's stomach, Puck stopped, "Way to GO, Hudson. Keep eating like this and you'll be as big as Shane in no time." Puck patted Finn's stomach, and despite the bloated pain he was in, Finn was proud of himself that he was able to eat so much. Puck decided to give Finn the break he promised by...
11131221.title: Puck is a tough coach.

choices: Finn wakes up ready for more food later
They sleep in the rest of the day
111312211.content:
"You did an excellent job of eating Finn." Puck leaned over and rubbed Finn's stomach slowly.
"UUUURRRRPPPPP, thank you Puck," Finn said smiling dazed. "I did, didn't I?"
"Yes you did. You earned a good break." Puck said and Finn gave a sigh of relief.
"Oh thank you, thank you Puck." Puck grinned as he tweaked Finn's nose.
"Your welcome." Puck reached down and unbuttoned the button of Finn's jeans and Finn lifted his head, trying to see.
"Wha...what are you doing?" Finn asked panicked, especially when Puck started pulling down the zipper and pulling the pants off.
"Giving relief to your poor stuffed self," Puck said as he wiggled off the shirt leaving Finn in just his underwear. Puck snorted. "Tighty-whities, still?"
"Hey," Finn said. "They're-"
"Whatever, I don't care. I am just going to give you your gift now." Puck laced his hands together and folded them, cracking his knuckles. "Please hold still."
"Puck what are you...oh!" Finn said as Puck started massaging Finn's bloated stomach. "That feels so good," Finn murmured as Puck massaged and kneeded his stomach,

"I know, I give excellent massages. Now no talking except moans of appreciation." Finn struggled to keep his mouth shut but it felt so wonderful he couldn't help but release a moan every now and then as Puck did his magic. It also relaxed his stomach to let loose a few more burps and belches which Puck gave a chuckle at every time it happened and mutter something about it being manly, but Finn was fascinated by the sensation and watching Puck's hands kneed and rub his expanded belly. Reaching out, Finn gave a jiggle of his belly as well. Normally watching his fat (he had no illusions of it being anything else although his mother said chubby) shake was demoralizing, especially in comparison to ripped bodies like Sam or Puck but for once it made him feel happy. After all, he had to start growing to Shane's size and Shane was massive. Finn yawned sleepily. Puck stopped a moment.

"You tired?" he asked and Finn nodded. Puck left and got the other bags. "I'm storing these for later," he said as he left the room with them, coming back a few minutes later. Giving one last rub and belly jiggle, Puck grinned down at Finn. "Good night bro," Puck said as he hopped onto the bed.

"Good night Puck" Finn said as he fell asleep. Puck watched his friend sleep for a moment before he grinned and laid his head back and closed his eyes.
111312211.title: Belly rub and nap

choices: To feed Finn the last half of the bag.
To let Finn rest for the night.
1113122111.content:
After two hours of sleeping Finn woke up stretched, sitting up and rubbing his eyes. He was shocked at first when he noticed that he was only wearing his underwear, but then he remembered that Puck had undressed him after he'd stuffed himself with food. Finn looked down at his best friend, who was passed out on the bed, and smiled. Despite what a badass Puck was, Finn was entertained by how child-like he looked sleeping. Without waking him up, Finn grabbed one of the three remaining bags of burgers left and opened them: There were at least 9 double cheese burgers in there. He opened up the other three bags and wasn't surprised to see that they all had the same amount.

Finn added it up in his head, messing up a couple of times, and finally figured out that Puck had bought thirty-six double cheese burgers for him. He'd already eaten 9 of them from the first bag, which means he had 27 left to finish off. Finn looked down at his once bloated stomach, which had finished digesting all of the food he'd eaten before his nap. His chubby stomach, while no longer bloated, looked like it had grown a tiny bit bigger. Finn put both hands on it and gave his small belly a shake, which made it jiggle, 'I gotta get this thing bigger and quick...'. Not wanting to waste the food his friend bought, Finn pulled two burgers out and started eating, taking a huge bite out of one before switching to the next, until both were gone.

Finn spent the next hour or so scarfing down as many cheese burgers as he could while he watched TV, ignoring the bloated feeling he was starting to get. He pushed through the feeling and was able to eat an entire bag and a half, but stopped and leaned back against the wall behind his bed. Finn put both hands on his insanely bloated stomach and groaned, happy that he was able to eat that much. He closed his eyes and started to rub his belly when he felt Puck's hands push his off and start rubbing, "You're REALLY fuckin eager, aren't you?" Puck said, doing his best to ease Finn's swollen stomach.

Finn groaned, "Yeah... I a- UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPP.... am." Puck laughed and patted the side of Finn's swollen belly, which made a low thump-sound. Puck rubbed Finn's stomach for about half an hour, watching TV with Finn, who was burping non-stop, when he decided
1113122111.title: Finn's Burgers: Round Two.

choices: Puck enlists Kurt's help and they both work on breakfast?
11131221112.content:
"You're going to finish the last half of this burger," Puck said. Finn groaned, thinking that maybe 13 or 14 double cheeseburgers was not such a good idea so quickly. Puck nodded in commiseration as he continued rubbing. "I know, I know it's difficult, but you are doing such a good job. You didn't even have to have me tell you to do it, you just went on your own. Although you could have at least woken me up."

"Sorry, just too excited. Although maybe not-uuurrrrrppp-so much anymore." Finn groan changed into a moan when Puck's fingers did something.
"But ohhh that doesn feel nice." Puck grinned at Finn's goofy grin.
"Glad I could help my boy out. Although Santanna is going to destroy you tomorrow, just warning you."
"Santanna's just jealous of my awesome body," Finn said, slapping his belly a little and Puck laughed.
"Heh, and here I thought you were going to be all insecure over it like you usually are. Especially if Santanna threatens to barbecue you again."
"Satan's all talk. Besides if she does get a big pointy stick, I'm using you for interference."
"Cold, just cold. Leaving your friend behind."
"You'd do the same to me in a heartbeat if a bear ever came after us."
"Other than that bears don't really eat human flesh, you're probably right.You don't have to run faster, you just have to run faster than the slowest which is you."
"Yeah, that's why."
"But in all seriousness," Puck said. "Usually you're pretty insecure over things like this which is why you're both impressing and creeping me out with this kind of attitude."

"Eh, I guess...I guess I realized I was never going to ever have a body type like yours or Sam's or Mike's and well, I'm not that much good at running and like cake and sweets and stuff too much and then there was the directive by the recruiter and thinking about it it sounds awesome and I've kind of always secretly thought about it and stuff. I guess I was always meant to have a body like this," pats his gut, "and so why the hell not I've been thinking. I can do whatever I want and it's not like I'm going to turn into a total slob right? I mean, I do plan to stay healthy and stuff, it's just extra padding for football."

"Of course," Puck said. He squinted curiously. "You still like chocolate cake the most right?" Finn nodded confused.
"Yeah, I love chocolate."
"Okay. Still...finish this burger."
"Wait what?"
"You left half a burger here. That's just wrong leaving half an uneaten burger."
"Puck...." Finn whined.
"Eat it," Puck growled warningly.
"Okay, okay." Finn said grudgingly. "No need for growling."
"I'll stop growling when you eat it."
"You're weird." Finn said.
"Whatever. Are you going to or not?"
"I don't know, I'm not feeling so well."

"Oh for crying out loud you big baby fine, I'll do it." Finn made to protest but Puck already yanked his mouth open again and stuffed it in and closed it moving Finn's jaw. Finn swallowed and Puck nodded.

"That wasn't so hard," he said and Finn just glared. "You're done for the night. By the way, what do you want for breakfast tomorrow?"
11131221112.title: To let Finn rest for the night.

choices: Finn finishes all of the pancakes and bacon Puck makes.
Finn can't finish and Puck feeds him the rest.
111312211121.content:
As Finn slept he had an amazing dream: he dreamed of what his life would be like a massive football player. He had broad shoulders, big, muscular arms, a wide chest, a massive stomach, wide bubble butt, gigantic thighs and powerful calves. He was a star on the field that nobody could beat and he had even been drafted to the NFL. He lived in a big house with Rachel, who was a Broadway star, and Puck, who had become his personal chef/trainer/gaining encourager. It was the perfect life.

However, when Finn woke up, he was actually rather upset. It would be awhile before he got to that point and he needed to start beefing up faster. Pulling himself from his bed, he realized that he was still in his - slightly smaller - briefs. He quickly threw on a pair of his pajama pants and an old t-shirt before heading down stairs, realizing he smelled pancakes and bacon. When Finn reached the kitchen, he saw Puck at the stove making a massive breakfast.

"Mornin' big guy!" Puck said, flipping another pancake before adding it to the pile.
"Morning yourself. Where is everybody?"
"Kurt went over to Blaine's this morning and your parents are out for the day. I've got a BIG day of non-stop eating planned for you!!" Puck said, adding another pancake to the ever growing pile. When Finn sat down, Puck put the tall stack of pancakes down in front of Finn, who was actually excited to be eating this much. The stack had to have at least eight butter covered, syrup drenched pancakes on it. Puck slid over a huge plate of bacon and smiled, "Eat up!" Finn grinned and he dug his fork and knife in and started eating. "Dude, we need to run to the store and get you more food for today's plans. It took me forever to find anything I could make for you."
Finn laughed between bites, "Yeah, Kurt and Mom kinda run the kitchen."
"I can tell. Finish that up cause I've got more coming." Puck said as he went back to the stove, making more pancakes.
111312211121.title: Finn's Big Breakfast

choices: Dude hangout, Sam/Artie/Mike come over for Bro time
1113122111212.content:
Puck made really good pancakes. Finn was very excited to be able to let loose and eat like this and not get a health lecture from Kurt who had turned mom. Mom used to cook hearty stuff like this (albeit even then not to the same quantity as Puck now) but then Mrs. Hudson married Burt. Finn loved Burt and Kurt. However due to Burt's heart condition, they could not really eat stuff like this and all the good stuff had to be thrown out. Finn wasn't resentful, he just wasn't thrilled to eat such 'healthy' food, Kurt's words, not his, all the time. But what was wrong with once in a while? Thank god for Puck and football, he had almost forgotten what the taste of real food was.

Puck sat across from him, eating his own smaller stack of pancakes, occasionally glancing up with a smile of smug satisfaction as he watched Finn dig into his food. It was nice to be appreciated and the rift that had temporarily wrecked their friendship was already diminishing. Puck had missed his first best friend and was glad to do anything that could help him. Besides, Finn was going to go pro, eventually. Puck liked football and the occasional playing but certainly did not want a career in it. He had his heart set out on music and as a side, a chef. That last one was a bit of a secret because he was bad-ass and no one would take him seriously at their school if he admitted to wanting to cook. First singing, then cooking? He'd lose credibility with anyone. However, he had to learn to cook to take care of the family after his dad abandoned them and his mom became too busy working at the hospital and always came home at odd hours. Out of necessity, and genuine interest after a while, he became quite good at it and was always pleased when a concotion he created was successfully received like the donation of his "grandmother's recipe" cupcakes. He was surprised that people actually believed that his mom actually cooked but that only showed most people weren't actually interested.

It was nice to get his secret out, if to one person. Especially to his best friend, who he had missed during their fighting stage. Even better that his friend needed him. Finn was slowing down on the pancakes, a more labored pace as signals began to reach his brain that he was full. Puck's pancakes were super-filling with their super fluffiness and drenching in sweet syrup and butter. Honestly, Puck was amazed that Finn could eat so many already. 6 and 1/2 pancakes, especially his, was no small feat and Puck was done after only three. Really done. It was rare for Puck to indulge so much in his own work but hanging with Finn did make him a bit hungry. Still, this is about Finn, not him.

Groaning softly as he got up, Puck moved to where Finn was. "How's it going?" he asked. Finn blinked slowly.
"It's...urrrppp....good, just a little-urrpp-break," he got out. Puck smirked at him.
"I can help with that," Puck said, grinning a little. He scooted a little closer and placed his hands on Finn's bloated stomach. "Ready?" he asked and before Finn barely had time to nod, he started rubbing. Finn shifted into it, moaning appreciatively.

"Damn Puck, how do you do it?" Finn asked in between moans of pleasure. Puck shrugged.
"Just a gift, now relax." As Finn slumped happily in his chair, Puck took as brief intervals of time as possible as he cut the remaining pancakes before returning back to helping his friend.

"Open wide," Puck said and Finn did so automatically at first so when Puck with surprising speed put a forkful of pancake into his mouth, Finn was surprised.
"Mmf, hey, what-?" Puck lovingly shoved in another forkful onehanded, the other hand still rubbing soothing circles on Finn's full stomach.

"No talking, just eating," Puck ordered and Finn instinctively listened and didn't complain as Puck slowly fed him forkful after forkful of pancake, leaving time in between to settle and get ready.after the first few. When Finn opened his mouth for his next bite (his body already subconsciously figuring out Puck's timing), he was surprised when there was nothing. Blinking wearily, Finn opened his eyes fully.

"Why'd you stop?" he asked confused. Puck smirked triumphant.
"You're finished. You ate every last bit. How does it feel?"
"Exhausting," Finn said. "And so full that if I eat anymore I might just explode." Puck grinned.
"Well, that's good enough for now. If you keep this up, I have no doubt they'll beg to have you. You are one serious eating machine."
"It's all because of you," Finn said and it might have been his imagination but Puck turned a little pink at the unexpected compliment.
"T-thank you now, let's get you up." Between the two of them, they managed to heft Finn up and waddle over to the couch. Turning the tv on, Puck turned to Finn.

"Anything in particular you want?"
"Nah bro, anything's good."
"Okay then," and Puck turned the channel to a showing of a football game that got most of Finn's attention. Puck was less interested in the game although he did watch some, as much as he was into rubbing his friend's stuffed belly.
1113122111212.title: Finn can't finish and Puck feeds him the rest.

choices: Mike and Sam stuff Finn with food, Puck enjoys the show.
11131221112122.content:
Puck smiled as he got up from the couch and let Finn sleep off his breakfast. In a couple of days Finn would be eating three times that amount of food before he got full. Normally, Puck kept the gaining help to simply himself and the gainer, as he did with Dave Karofsky, but he wanted to see what it would be like to make this into a group effort. Plus, he wanted to see if he could slip some extra pounds onto his friends as well.

After a calling both Sam and Mike and explaining Finn's need to be as big as Shane, they both headed over with food. After about two hours the doorbell rang, which woke Finn up, and Puck answered, "Sammy, Mike! Come on on, bros!"
"What's goin' on, Puck?" Finn asked, rubbing his eye sleepily.
"We're here to hang out and help you get huge, dude!" Sam said, excited! He and Mike came inside with a couple of pizzas, buffalo wings, ice cream, soda, chips, and Mike's famous homemade extreme mozzarella sticks.
"Whoa!" Finn said, "Is this all for me?"
"About 75% of it is!" Mike said, "We're turning your journey of getting muscular and fat into a party! We'll be sure not to make a mess too, Finn, we know how much your folks freak over that."

As Sam and Puck unloaded the food into the kitchen, Mike walked over with the plate of his mozzarella sticks and sat down next to Finn, "We need to get you up to Shane's size and fast, dude! We've only got until the end of the year." Finn opened his mouth to say something but Mike shoved a mozzarella stick into his mouth, "Sam, Puck and I already have a plan ready. Unless you're working out or at glee or football, you aren't allowed to do ANY activities that might make you burn each and every precious calorie."
Sam chimed in as Mike shoves another huge stick of fried cheese in Finn's mouth, "Yeah! I'll be your workout trainer while Puck and Mike will be your chefs and feeders. Well keep track of your weight the entire time! Plus, you have two classes with each of us through out the day, so we'll all make sure that we keep you well feed, even in class."
Puck walked over and patted Finn's small, but growing, stomach, "With our help this baby will be massive and you'll be a gigantic college football player in no time! Now, let's get this party started!"
11131221112122.title: Sam and Mike want to help Finn gain.

111312211121221.content:
Puck had to admit it was fun sharing. Sam and Mike's enthusiasm for this surprised him and he wondered if they were secret feeders at heart as well.When he had called them, he thought they would have put up a bit more resistance or at least a 'what the hell?' when he explained his idea but they were actually quite into it, even before he got to the part about Finn's chance at football. Although he greatly enjoyed his alone time sessions with Finn and he was probably going to have to reserve them now, it was really awesome being with their friends. Besides, maybe they could be convinced or at least not notice if a few pounds were to fall on them which would be pretty awesome as well.

Puck went to the kitched to get plates for the rest of the food while Sam was taking a turn in feeding Finn who loved all the attention as his mouth opened happily. Getting a stack of paper plates, and cups, Puck came back in and laid them out, laying out the food within easy reach and stepping back into the background.

"Take off your shirt," Puck said all of a sudden and they all looked surprised.
"Huh?" Finn asked. Puck shrugged, a quick smirk crossing his face.
"Don't want to get stains on that nice shirt, at least more that what is already there. Besides, then we could visually see."

Puck stripped off his tanktop and so did Sam and Mike who weren't quite sure but followed Puck's lead. Finn, blusihng, did so as well a bit uncomfortable. He changed all the time with them in gym but he still sometimes felt uncomfortable if he felt everyone's attention on him as they were now. He especially felt it now with air touching his bare skin. Puck smiled as he walked over and caressed Finn's belly as Sam and Mike watched on, keeping careful note of their reactions. Sam and Mike were both wide-eyed to varying degrees upon the sight of Finn's exposed body although Sam definitely recovered composure faster. Yeah, they were so into this.

"Nice belly," Puck said squeezing it, having fun. "But of course you need to be even bigger to play in the pros. What do you think Mike? Sam?"
"Uh..." Mike said.
"You bet," Sam said smiling. "Although I have to say you're bigger than I thought already. What've you been eating?"
"Puck's pancakes, hamburgers, pizza, just stuff."
"Well, we'll need to fill you up with more stuff if you want to be like Shane!" Mike said, recovering.
"Exactly what I was thinking," Puck said. "Come on, we need to help get you big."
Puck settled back as he watched Mike and Sam try to decide what to feed Finn next.
"Do both and alternate," Puck called out as he took a swig of Dr. Pepper.

"Good idea," they both said and Puck rolled his eyes. Sam took the first go, settling on bringing a buffalo wing to Finn's mouth which Finn munched on happily. Mike went next with even more of those delicious cheesesticks. Puck made a mental note to find out the recipe because they were really great as he ate one as well. After a bit of time as the food disappeared between the four of them but especially Finn, Finn leaned back with a groan.

"Okay guys, that's enough. I can't eat anymore." Patting his stomach, he let out a massive belch as he tried to shift to a comfortable spot. Puck crawled over to where Finn was.

"Done already? But you haven't even had dessert yet," Puck said. Finn put his hands on his stomach.
"I'm not in the mood for dessert Puck, I don't know if I can even fit it in or eat again, I'm so full." Puck put his hands on Finn's belly and was impressed by how solid and hefty it was.

"Wow, you did eat a lot," Puck said both amused and maybe a bit concerned. Finn burped again as he felt Puck's fingers dig in to his sensitive skin.
"Uuuuuuuuurrrrrrpppp, ugh, yeah. Between you, Mike, and Sam I ate...I don't know, a lot." Finn moaned in relief as he felt Puck's fingers touch an area releasing the pressure that was inside of him with yet another burp.

"Uuuuuurrrppp, sorry guys, excuse me."
"Is he okay?" Sam and Mike asked.
"Yeah, but we should probably give him a bit of rest," Puck said as he stood up. Sam and Mike did as well, looking down at Finn who had his eyes closed and seemed completely out of it.

"Wow, he's huge," Sam said as he absent-mindedly nibbled on one of the few remaining mozzarella sticks.
"Yeah," Mike said.
"Hey, does anybody else want food? It'd be wrong to let this go to waste and I don't think Finn will be waking up anytime soon." Sam and Mike shrugged and Puck grinned as they ate.
111312211121221.title: Mike and Sam stuff Finn with food, Puck enjoys ...

choices: Mike, Sam and Puck sneak Finn food during their classes(2 classes with him each)
1113122111212211.content:
This was going to be better than Puck had though. Not only was he going to watch Finn get big and fat, but Mike and Sam were so easily swayed into gorging themselves. They had started talking about their plans to get Finn bigger(They had decided on daily stuffing parties like this, as well as feeding him in their class through out the day.) but the entire time Mike and Sam were stuffing themselves with some of the leftovers. Between the two of them, Mike and Sam ate an entire pizza each and they split a gallon of ice cream.

They both sat back and rubbed their bloated guts, which made Puck laugh, "Damn, you two sure were hungry."
Mike smiled, "It was fun watching Finn eat like that and it got me pretty hungry too."
Sam nodded, "Yeah, it was pretty fun."
Puck grinned, excited. In his head he could easily see Sam and Mike and big, fat musclechubs with Finn, who was clearly the biggest. Puck needed this to be a reality. As Sam and Mike relaxed after their binge, Puck wrapped up all of the food and put it in the fridge to feed Finn later.

As Sam and Mike slept off their first food binge Puck sat down next to Finn, absentmindedly rubbing his belly as he watches tv. A few hours went by and Finn groaned as his eyes opened up.
"Morning, sleeping beauty." Puck said, smirking at Finn.
"Hey..." The bigger teen said, half asleep. He looked down at his bigger belly, which Puck was still rubbing, and blinked, "... Did my gut get bigger?"
Puck laughed, "If it didn't I wouldn't be doing my job, would I?" Puck patted Finn's bigger stomach before slipping his hands underneath it and jiggling it, which made Finn smile. Puck stood up and walked over to the fridge, "Let's get this big belly of yours even bigger. We've still got a lot of food left." Puck pulled the two pizzas out of the fridge, "You want me to heat these up?"
Finn shook his head, "Nah, man. I like cold pizza."

Puck grinned and walked over, sitting down next to Finn and opening the first box. Before Finn knew it, he was being hand-fed massive slices of pizza. As he ate, Finn focused on the TV, letting Puck and his mouth do the work for him. Finn opened his mouth, waiting for more pizza, but it never came, "Whats the big deal?" Finn said, upset.
"The big deal is that you ate both boxes of pizza. How ya' feelin'?"
"Hungry.." Finn said, putting his hands on his stomach, which was a little solid but still felt soft and empty.
Puck got up and went to the fridge, pulling out a massive tub of chocolate ice cream and a can of whipped cream, "Well, I can take care of that." Puck sat back down and popped open the top of the tub. He quickly began shoveling in massive spoonfuls of of ice cream into Finn's mouth, which he devoured happily. After swallowing a couple of huge spoonfuls, Puck filled Finn's mouth with so much whipped cream that his cheek puffed out. As soon as he ate that, Puck went right back to feeding Finn ice cream.

This continued for ten minutes before both the can and the tub were empty. Finn leaned his head back and moaned happily, loving the feeling of having his stomach full of so much food.
Puck patted Finn's belly, "Impressive. Earlier you were stuffed to the point of throwing up. You just ate more than that you still feel empty."
Finn chuckled, "I guess it just took a little bit to get use t- UUUUUUUUUUURP- .. to it." The burp that Finn had made was so loud that it woke up the sleeping Sam and Mike, who were equally as impressed with Finn's stuffed gut. They sat down around Finn and began hand feeding him from the big bags of chips they had brought until Finn was back to his 'to-bloated-to-move' state. Puck massaged Finn's bloated belly and eventually led Finn up to his room and into bed, where he quickly passed out.

The next day at school...
1113122111212211.title: Puck's turn with Finn.

11131221112122111.content:
Finn was excited that his friends were more than happy to bring him stuff throughout the day. Even before it had been hard to make it to lunchtime without eating something and now that he was going to be eating so much more, he could not imagine what it would be like to have to wait till lunchtime to eat anything. He rubbed his belly thoughtfully, enjoying the already added thickness. Finn had always felt kind of awkward since he always had been a big guy and one of the tallest people at school. He was glad for Glee and Football which had been where he met all his friends, people who were just as awkward if not more so than him. Even when popular he still got called things like Frankenteen which actually hurt. It was cause of his mismatched body and while he wasn't as obsessed with being thin or having perfect abs since even he knew such things would never happen, he wouldn't mind being stronger and more substantial. It felt good and Puck and his friends were quite encouraging and helpful. Making his way to his locker he saw Rachel for him who was eager as ever to talk about their next glee assignment. Not letting her say a word, Finn pulled her against him and surprised her with a kiss feeling great and leaving her stunned and speechless for a few seconds before her brain rebooted.

"Wow," she breathed. "Not that I don't appreciate it but was there a particular reason for that?" Finn shrugged.
"Nah, feeling good and wanted to give you a little something."

"Well then, thank you. So for Glee..." Finn quietly tuned out, letting her ramble but enjoying the sound of her voice if not paying attention to the words. Even when she was rambling her voice sounded like singing and Rachel had a very beautiful singing voice. Even if she talked so fast it has hard to follow or if she used big words many of which he had no idea what they meant and made him feel like a big dummy. He did have to say though that after hanging out with Rachel, he knew more words than before after looking them up in the dictionary when she used them. Giving a few nods and vague comments, Finn and Rachel walked to Finn's first class before Rachel finished talking and giving him a kiss.

"See you later," she said. "Do good." Finn shrugged because this was remedial Geometry and well, it was Geometry with shapes and figures and numbers. Worse, it was with probably the most boring teacher in their entire school Mr. Leonard. He had the type of voice that the minute he opened his mouth to say anything people were already bored, asleep, and or distracted. Sam who was also in this class since in addition to reading, he had some trouble with shapes, was the only good thing as was Puck although he rarely showed up and often ditched. Finn couldn't blame him. There were many times when he wished he could as well but he didn't want to worry or disappoint his mom not showing up in class. Though Finn had to wonder why this class was neccessary or if they could have found someone, anyone, else to teach it.

For once Puck was actually in class and Finn was surprised.
"Oh hey, Puck, you're not ditching or hanging in the Nurse's office again?" Finn asked. It was no secret that the Nurse had a crush on Puck, which was kind of creepy since she was who knew how old, but it certainly was convenient. Puck grinned and winked.

"Oh no I am, I just stopped in to give you a little snack to help you get through the day, especially this guy's lectures. It's too bad you would never consider ditching and leaving this loser, I can think of a lot more valuable and fun things to do with my time."

"You know why, but thank you Puck." Puck grinned as he reached out and patted Finn's belly.
"Your welcome. If you ever do leave I'd be more than happy to have an extra opportunity to help get this bigger though." Puck reached into his backpack and pulled out a few boxes.

"Here, I brought you some poptarts which I know you like. Well, I know you like and would pretty much eat anything barring a couple certain fruits and vegetables, but poptarts are the first thing I thought of to help keep you occupied." Puck looked out and saw Mr. Leonard coming and grimaced.

"Well, I got to go now since I don't want to get stuck in here for a whole hour listening to Leonard so see you later next class. Also these are for Sam when he gets in. I know he'll probably need them especially." Reaching into his backpack again he brought out more various flavored poptart boxes. Checking around, Puck snuck out the back door just as Mr. Leonard got in the room. Sam showed up 10 minutes later having overslept but Mr. Leonard didn't even seem to notice as he kept going on about whatever.

"Hey Sam," Finn whispered to Sam who was sitting next to him. "Why are you so late?"
"Slept in, had to miss breakfast," Sam grimaced. "Ugh, I hate this class. Why is Mr. Leonard so boring and clueless?"
"A mystery never solved. Puck was here and left you and I poptarts. I guess he figured you'd have missed breakfast." Finn pointed to the boxes of poptarts. Sam examined them and grinned.
