"Wow, tell Puck he's a lifesaver. Mmm poptarts, I don't care if they're cold." Sam eagerly opened a box of fudge poptarts and started eating the first one. Finn did so as well, loving the taste and really glad to have something.
11131221112122111.title: Mike, Sam and Puck sneak Finn food during their...

choices: Mike, Sam, and Puck stuff Finn with as much food as possible.
111312211121221111.content:
Finn spent the entire day snacking on the small goodies his buddies brought him. Along with the poptarts Puck had given him, Sam had brought Finn a couple of cheesecake slices to eat in class. He finished both and went to his next class; history with Mike. Puck showed up again, with more of the same poptarts, and Finn happily ate those along with the cold (Finn prefers them cold) chicken strips Mike brought. After that was science with Puck, who fed Finn two more boxes of poptarts before running out to get Finn lunch.

Lunch was spent with all four of them and they cheered Finn on as he stuffed down three whole pizzas before heading to Spanish class with Mike. Finn was able to eat an entire box of donuts without Mr. Shue catching him, along with another box of poptarts Puck had given him. The next class was gym, and Finn finally had a chance to work on his muscles for football with the guys. After class, they all hit the showers and Puck could tell that Finn was filling out all over. His stomach was perfectly round and bloated from all the food he had stuffed down, but his legs and butt had clearly thickened. After the shower, all four went to English, which was the only class they had together.

Class dragged on, but luckily they were watching a movie today, which gave Finn the perfect cover for eating in class. Mike and brought more of his famous cheese sticks, Sam bought a box of cookies, and Puck gave Finn his last box of poptarts, one of Finn's new favorite foods. The entire class was spent with Finn gorging on his snacks while Sam, Puck, and Mike alternated between rubbing his growing, large belly. Puck leaned in and whispered into Finn's ear, "I hope you aren't too full. We're going to Mike's place tonight to give you another huge stuffing."

Finn grinned, "I'm always up for more. You guys throw whatever you can at this." He said, smacking his belly and making it jiggle.
111312211121221111.title: Snacks in Every Class.

1113122111212211111.content:
"Woo, Finn brother, you finally made it. Guys, the party can finally start!" Puck called and Mike and Sam came out of the kitchen grinning as well.
"Woah, you guys are already here?" Finn asked surprised. Usually Puck and Sam were the last to arrive at get togethers, especially since Sam lived further out of town.

"Yeah, rode with Puck. Anyhow, you ready?" Sam asked and Puck smirked to himself. He was going to ask the same but Sam beat him too it. It was a good thing he wasn't a jealous person sharing Flynn around like this. Of course, in addition to being fun in a group, he now got more to play with who alone would have been tricky but together were easy pickings.

"Starving," Finn said rubbing his stomach causing Puck to grin mischeviously. Giving a soft punch to the gut, he playfully headlocked Finn. "Of course you are buddy. Let's get this baby of yours filled with something and then take you back so I can kick all you guys's butts at Mario Kart." Sam and Mike exchanged looks confused for a moment before Puck tilted his head at the kitchen. Following him they stood there for a moment,

"Mario Kart? Thought it was just a feeding party?" Sam asked confused. "Not that I have a problem but...again huh?"
"It's quite simple really. Finn gets bored easy and he is kind of bad at Mario Kart. He has far more fun watching anyways and will absentmindedly eat his plate of food and with his new appetite, he won't stop for a while. And then ask for dinner afterwards since it was just a 'snack.'"

"Oh, makes sense," Mike said.
"Besides, I want a challenge, you guys will give me a far better one than Finn at it." Puck took the large chip bags out and opened them while Sam took out the dip and wings and Mike the Cheesesticks. When they got out, Finn took a look at the spread and smiled.

"Nice, I'll sit out the first few rounds," Finn said and Puck shrugged as he set the system up. "Suit yourself," he said winking over at Mike and Sam.
Finn winced at Puck’s incoherent shrieks of rage when Mike’s blue koopa shell hit him only a few seconds away from the finish line and Sam and Mike who had been tailing closely for the last few laps surged ahead. Puck was uber competitive when it came to games and it really did suck to be smashed by a flying shell so close to the victory line. Reaching into the bowl again, Finn felt that it was empty and when he looked around, all the others were as well.

“Er, guys?” He asked and they all looked over from where Puck was trying to beat Mike over the head with the steering wheel and Sam was blocking. “We’re out of food.” Breathing hard, Puck composed himself.

“Okay, let’s take a break anyhow. I’ve prepared a little something for all of us. Wasn’t sure what to make short notice before thinking ‘why not pasta?’ Easy, fast, good in HUGE quantities, delicious, yeah its good. Plus there’s also cheese-sticks, poptarts, surprisingly still a few chicken wings, and other things.”

“Where did you get all those poptarts anyhow?” Sam had wondered that all day since he saw Puck pull out numerous boxes.
“From a contest that I don’t remember entering but apparently did for a free year’s supply of poptarts. They were delivered on our driveway and we had to move all the boxes to the garage and the shed and wherever we could store them.” Puck grimaced. “It took days to move all those and we only just finished.” Ushering them into the dining room to sit down, Puck returned back to the kitchen for a few moments.

“Ready!” He called. “One at a time but Finn first!” Single file, they went to the kitchen where Puck was waiting with probably the biggest pot of pasta they had ever seen.
“Woah that’s big, is that a cauldron?” Mike asked.
“Nice apron,” Sam grinned at Puck’s attire. The apron was pink, frilly, and spelled out ‘I love you’ on the front. Puck gave a groan.
“Ugh, only one I could find. I’m going to give it to Kurt later or burning it. You guys better come over here and take your food before I go psycho and murder all you fools.” Ladling out the pasta he filled all their plates to overflowing. “This is a good start. I’ll bring out the other stuff later.” Heading back to the table, they sat a moment while Sam said a prayer and they all dug in.
1113122111212211111.title: Hanging Out

11131221112122111111.content:
All four boys took their first bite of pasta and a round of low groans of pleasure left all of their throats. There was no denying it; Puck was an AMAZING cook. The next couple of minutes were spent in silence, except for the sounds of four growing teens devouring huge plates of pasta or tearing into bread. Finally, there was a loud grunt of exhausting and the other three boys looked at Mike, who was pushing his empty plate away, "I can't eat anymore..."
Puck laughed and picked up the plate, heading back into the kitchen to fill it up again, "Sure you can, buddy!"
"No," Mike said, "I can't. If I eat anymore I might be sick."
"Thats just the wall talking." Puck said, loading the plate with huge spoonfuls of pasta.
"Wall?" Sam and Finn both asked at the same time, their mouths full of food.
"Yeah. In the gainer/feeder community the wall is a term for that full feeling. If you wanna get bigger, you have push past the wall and keep eating." Puck said, setting the plate down in front of Mike just in time for him Finn and Sam to pass him their plates as well.
Mike stared at the plate, "But... I don't want to gain weight. I want to help Finn gain weight."
"I know," Puck said, loading Sam's plate up, "But you're not done eating until you get past that wall."
Mike sighed and sat up, lifting the fork to his mouth and eating as he was told.

Puck smirked, happy to see his plan was working. Sure, he wanted to make Finn as gigantic and enourmas as possible, but that doesn't mean he couldn't do the same for Sam and Mike. They'd both be smaller than Finn, but they'll both have huge muscles and guts before they knew it. Puck doubled the amount of pasta on Finn's plate, after all this was HIS gaining party, and set both plates down in front of them. Sam and Finn dug back in eagerly and smirked as he sipped his soda. Soon he'd surrounded by his favorite 5 b's: big, beefy, bloated, best bros. What more could a man ask for?

As Puck finished his first plate, he saw Mike push his plate away, which was half-full, "I can't, dude." He says, rubbing his bloated stomach.
Puck gave it a few good pats, "Yeah, if you eat anymore, you'll make yourself sick. Go rest up, I'll give you a nice tummy rub in a bit." Mike got up and walked over to the couch, where he sat down and did his best to relax. Puck looked up at Finn, "You want his left overs, Fi-" Puck stopped at the sight of Finn stuffing his face with Mike's plate, his own empty in front of him. Puck grinned, looking at Sam, "You hungry still?"
Sam handed him his plate, "Yep!"
Puck watched happily as Sam and Finn kept eating, devouring the massive pot of pasta. Sam ate three more plates, bring his total to 5, and Finn ate 10 plates, bring it up to 12.5 plates of pasta, before the pot was empty. Both boys sat down on the couch, their bellies huge and bloated with pasta, and Puck got down on his, happily rubbing and relaxing Finn's belly, "There you go, big guy. I'll get to you two once I take care of our growing quarterback." He said, happily.
Soon, all three boys passed out from having such amazing belly rubs and Puck happily sat back on the reclining chair, turning on the TV and waiting for them to wake up so they can get to dessert.

Three hours passed before Puck heard Finn wake up, "Hey..." He said, sleepily.
"Hey, big guy. You want some dessert?" Puck asked.
Finn rubbed his belly, "Yeah, I'm starving!"
Puck grinned, "Perfect!" He got up and went to the kitchen. While they slept, Puck made sure to add tons of his favorite gainer powder to Finn's dessert, eager to watch his best buddy get huge and fast. He came back with...
11131221112122111111.title: Stuffed with Pasta.

choices: Finn finished the cake and Puck has plans for all of them
111312211121221111112.content:
Puck came back with a chocolate fudge cake which caused Finn to start salivating the moment he saw it.
"Dude is that all for me?" he asked excited.
"Hell yeah it is, after all I made it for you so I should hope you eat it," Puck said grinning.
"Thanks, I don't know if I say it enough but you're just awesome," Finn said still staring at the cake. Puck shifted awkwardly not wanting to say how much that had meant because it did, it meant a bloody lot and he'd start getting all emotional and shit like a girl if they continued talking about it and he wasn't planning on that.

"Damn right I am and everybody here knows it. It's a statement of fact." Puck placed it down in front of Finn. "Hang on, got to cut it." He hurried to the kitchen and brought out a carving knife with which he deftly cut the cake into large slices before putting it back. Finn waited obediently for Puck to get back, but couldn't wait to get a taste of that delicious chocolatey chocolate cake with its delicious chocolate fudge frosting and sprinkles and he couldn't wait to eat it but he knew Puck enjoyed watching and if Puck wanted to watch well then Puck was going to bloody watch no matter how tempting it was to dig in right away. Puck came back and grinned, seeing that Finn waited for him.

"Thanks bro for waiting. I know how tempting it must be to wait with that looking at you. I'm rather tempted to eat it myself actually but that's what you're here for." Puck grinned as he patted Finn. "Shirts off, chocolate stains are irritating to remove," Puck said removing his shirt as Finn did the same. Puck leaned over and grinned as he rubbed his hands over Finn's enlarged stomach. "Amazing, you're becoming a real stud with a gut Finn, it's gotten so big already. They're going to have to take you later for football you'll be ginormous then at the rate you've grown." Finn blushed not sure whether that was a comment or an insult but considering this was Puck who was helping him, a very high compliment. It wasn't easy to get Puck's overt praise so this was awesome. Previously he would have been offended by such a statement or even the thought of getting so big but with Puck and everyone's encouragement, it wasn't so bad and he got to eat tons of delicious food. Puck, Sam, and Mike were awesome in helping and to make sure that there wasn't a single moment for long that Finn hadn't eaten or in the process of eating something and to keep his belly full. Sure there were a few downsides but when everyone, especially Puck, was rubbing and helping him it felt like heaven and he just felt like a stud like Puck instead of awkward in everything but football and glee. Even Rachel was encouraging because although she had been concerned at first, after he explained what he was doing, she was totally understanding and even told him to keep on doing it and following his dreams. Heck, she even ordered him saying she would be sorely disappointed if he quit struggling to obtain his goal. She was amazing and so was that delicious looking cake.

"So, are you going to feed me coach?" Finn said grinning as he knew how much Puck enjoyed that. Puck grinned wide and smirked as he looked at Finn.
"Of course, and you're going to eat every last bite," Puck said sternly.
"I'll certainly try," Finn said, biting his lip to keep from laughing. It was so silly but he knew Puck took the game seriously.
"Try? You'll do better than try. You'll succeed," Puck barked as he lifted up a piece and brought it over to Finn, offering it. Finn took a bite before his eyes opened in wonder.
"Oh my gosh this is so good! It's like the best cake ever!" Puck laughed easy at that.
"Thanks. You certainly say that about all my food. Heck, you even said that about the poptarts."
"Well, poptarts are good," Finn said stubbornly. "Joining the list of favorites but seriously, your cake is amazing. You should make one for Sam and Mike. They have to taste how awesome it is."
"Hmm, maybe I will later. But right now its just you and me Finney," Puck said smiling.
"They're still asleep right?" Finn asked.
"Hmm, I think so. Evans ate a lot himself and Mike I don't know."
"Well, they really should try this out," Finn insisted and Puck grinned.

"Okay, okay, I'll make more later. Now shut your mouth unless its to enjoy the delicious chocolatey goodness of this cake." Finn did so as he took another bite and moaned at how good it was which certainly made Puck pleased. After Finn finished all the bites of the slice Puck had, he licked Puck's fingers clean because there was still delicious chocolate and Puck loved that which was obvious from the happy smile he had as he watched Finn lick his fingers. Finn didn't quite get it but as long as Puck was happy, he was happy and he had no problem cleaning off his friend's fingers of delicious choclatey gooey remnants. Puck grinned as he brought up a second huge slice and Finn excitedly waited as Puck brought bite by bite up to him the cake tasting so good and helping him in their goal.
111312211121221111112.title: A whole chocolate fudge cake.

choices: Puck sets up the machine and tests it on Mike.
Puck sets up the machine and tests it on Sam.
1113122111212211111122.content:
"Ugh, no more." Finn said as he flopped back against the couch, his stomach sticking out far and completely stuffed. Puck had surprised Finn with a second cake after he had finished the first one and Finn had eaten both. Puck grinned as he rubbed Finn's bloated belly, "You okay, buddy?"
"Finn belched, "Ugh... Yeah, I just need to rest." Finn leaned his head back and in seconds he was out like a light.

Puck stood up and examined three men on the couch; Finn had definitely grown in size. His belly and muscles was huge, but no nowhere near the size required for the football team. Sam had beefed up a little bit, but most of his gain fat, not muscle. Mike has tiny beginner belly, but he hadn't developed any more mass in the muscle department. Puck knew Finn would grow fast, but he had no idea Mike and Sam would get bigger as well, and intended to keep it that way. As the three of them slept Puck grabbed his car keeps and hurried to his truck.

Puck had always been interested in the gainer community, and had even used Dave Karofsky as a guinea pig when he first started out. When Puck and Dave decided to stop Puck had helped Dave gain a solid 200 pounds, bring him up from 230 to 430, and now he's one of the best linemen at his new school. Puck knew of a special little place that focused only on the gainer community. After a 30 minute drive, Puck pulled up to a small shop called "Growing Pains" that was fairly close to the Lima Bean. Puck parked and headed inside, a smile instantly spreading onto his face.

The store smelled of warm cinnamon buns and the walls were lined with many different types of weight gain powers, muscle mass powders, and machines to help with the process. Puck saw a large bear of a man standing behind the counter watching a wrestling match and walked over. Bruce was a massive dude, probably around 350 pounds, with gigantic arms and huge stomach that flowed over his belt, "'Sup, Bruce!"
The man looked over and grinned, "Well, if isn't Puck! How are ya' buddy! I didn't recognize you without that big bear of your following."
Puck laughed, "Yeah, Dave and I ended our agreement a few weeks ago."
"How big was he?" Bruce asked.
"430 pounds! A nice, clean, 200 pound gain." Puck replied.
"Dude must be huge! What was the muscle to fat percentage?" Bruce asked.
"Turned out Dave prefered eating over lifting, so instead of the established 50/50 muscle to fat, it ended up being 75% fat, 15% muscle" Puck said, still happy with the results.
Bruce put his hands out in front of him, miming a large (er than what he had) stomach, "Huge belly?"
Puck nodded, "Bigger than yours."
"Nice! So, whats up? Got a new client?" Bruce asked, leaning on the counter.
"Yep! Well, three, to be honest." Puck said.

"Three at once? Thats a lot of man meat. What are your plans for them?" Bruce asked.
"Well, two of them don't know about it, but they will soon. I'm helping a buddy get onto a college football team. He wants quarterback but he'll be a linemen when I'm done with him. I'm thinking 60% fat, 40% muscle for Finn, thats his name, and then 75% fat, 25% muscle for Sam, and 30% fat, 70% muscle for Mike. He's a dancer so I want him to be able to still move like before, but with a bit more jiggle." Puck said, smiling.
"I like those numbers. So, what are you here for? A refill on your usual powder?" Bruce asked, turning around to get a new jug.
"Yeah, but I'm also interested in a machine for these three. Any you would recommend?"

Bruce scratched his chin for bit, "Hmmm... for three men, and with those kinds of numbers, I'd have to suggest this." Bruce walked over to a large machine that had a long hose, a pumping system, and a huge steel vat, all on wheels, "The Pump-o-matic 8000. It's the newest machine on the market and the gainers love it!"
Puck grinned, "How much?"
Bruce chuckled, "More than you can afford, but, I feel nice. You buy 100 bucks worth of supplies and I'll give it to you free. Plus, I'll throw in some different sized vats. This one would be perfect for the football player you mentioned, but I have a smaller one for the dancer and the bigger one for the third guy."
Puck loaded up on several different types of powders for the purchase; weight gain powders, muscle gain powders, and several powders that focused on specific body parts. It rung up to 110 dollars and Puck eagerly loaded everything up and headed back to get to work.
1113122111212211111122.title: A trip to "Growing Pains".

choices: Puck cooks up a huge meal for Mike and Finn while Sam is bloated and passed out.
Finn wakes up and Puck attaches him to the machine.
11131221112122111111222.content:
Puck pulled his truck back into the spot it had previously occupied in Mike's driveway. He unloaded the machine from the bed of his truck and pushed it inside, setting it up behind the couch. Puck noticed that Sam was no longer on the couch snuggled between Finn and Mike's bloated, unconscious bodies and he raised his eyebrow, "Wonder where he went..." Puck pushed the idea out of his head and began setting up the machine. He locked the wheels in place so it wouldn't roll away and began looking over the product.

The interface for the machine was fairly straight forward: You poured the bulking supplements and liquid into the vat and then stir it all together. The control panel for the machine had a knob that you turned to change the speed of the pump's flow and there was a big red start/stop button. Puck also noticed that the machine had a timer on it, so you could set it and just let it the machine do all the work. With still no sign of Sam anywhere, Puck went back to his truck and grabbed the three containers he was given: a small one for Mike, a medium sized one for Finn, and a large one for Sam, as well as grabbing a can of black spray paint. He took them into the backyard and sprayed each of their names onto the containers, and once they finished drying, brought them back inside.

As he finished setting up Sam's container, the blonde teen with full lips entered the room in only a towel, using a second one to dry his hair. Puck looked over and grinned, happy to see that Sam was already developing a rather round belly, his abs no longer visible. His face looked a little rounder as well, but other than those changes, he was still just as buff as before, "OH, Sam! I'm happy I found you, I was about to wake up Mike to test this out but since you're here I'll just use you."
"What?" Sam asked, lowering the towel from his face. He saw the machine and raises both eyebrows quizzically, "What IS that?"

"A little something that I got to help Finn here get as big as he possibly can! I want to make sure it works so I need your help." He said, walking over to Sam.
"What, Dude. I'm in a towel. At least let me change before you start this." Sam said, breaking free from Puck and walking back to the bathroom,putting on his boxers, and coming back in. Sam sat back down on the couch as Puck walked behind it to the machine.
"Okay, Puck, what do I have to d-" before Sam could finish his sentence Puck jammed the tube into his mouth. Sam looked back over the couch and watched as Puck filled the large container labeled "SAM" with several massive scoops of weight gain powder. Sam sighed in his head and leaned back, waiting for Puck to start the machine up.

Puck mixed the weight gain powder in with a gallon of milk from the fridge and stirred it in until all the power has mixed into the milk, turning it a light blue color. He set the speed to slow, to see how quickly Sam could drink it, and hit the button. The machine started up and began pumping it into Sam's belly. It took Sam a moment to get a good rhythm, but once he did, he found that he actually really enjoyed it. The powder made the milk taste a lot like chocolate milk and he couldn't stop himself from drinking it down as it continued to pump the stuff into his belly.

Puck watched with an extremely satisfied look on his face; getting this machine was an excellent choice. Sam barely noticed how round and swollen his belly was getting as the milk/powder mixture continued to flow into him. Puck, without asking Sam, turned the speed notch up a little bit, causing the speed of the liquid to flow faster into him. After ten minutes the machine's liquid ran dry and Puck turned it off, pulling the tube from Sam's full lips, "So, Sammy, how was it?"
Sam burped loudly and groaned, rubbing his full belly that stretched out far in front of him, "It was amazing... but I think I drank too much..."
"Nonsense," Puck said, walking in front of him, "You drank the entire vat! That was way more than I thought you would be able to handle!" Puck rubbed Sam's belly, to ease the pressure, and grinned. This new machine would cut the time it took too stuff these three guy in half, meaning they would gain a lot faster! Puck was very excited, getting Finn attached to the machine would be a problem at all but he had to be careful about how he got Mike and Sam to use it.
11131221112122111111222.title: Guinea Pig Sam.

choices: Mike: +30 lbs(230), Finn: +40 lbs(270), Sam: +80 lbs(290)
111312211121221111112222.content:
Finn's eyes slowly opened, finally waking up from his long nap. The pasta and cake that Puck had stuffed him with had finished digesting and what was left behind was a much softer stomach that rested on Finn's lap. He sat there for a moment, enjoying the feeling of his softer stomach, when the whirring sound fo a machine caught his attention. Finn looked to his left and saw Sam passed out next to him, his stomach swollen to a size Finn didn't even think was possible, and Mike, who's stomach was also swelling to an amazing size. Finn noticed that Mike's swollen gut was smaller than Sam's, but it looked like it was still growing. The half awake Finn saw a tube in Mike's mouth and his sleepy eyes followed it to a large machine that was pumping his dancer best friend full of some kind of liquid.

Finn watched, barely aware of what was happening to Mike. His eyes shifted back and forth between the machine and Mike's swelling stomach. Eventually, the machine stopped and Puck pulled the tube from Mike's mouth, "Good work, Mike! You drank the whole vat! How was it?"
Mike belched and rubbed his stomach, "Really fun but REALLY... difficult."
Puck patted his belly, "You'll grow into it, buddy. Speaking of growing it looks like Finn is up. How ya doin' big guy?" Puck asked.
Finn blinked, confused and still sleepy, "Uhhh... good?"
"Awesome. Ya'hungry?" Puck asked, walking over to the pre-made vat labled "FINN" and replacing it with Mike's empty one.
Finn nodded and watched, still not understanding what Puck was doing. This made Puck grin because a sleepy Finn is an easy to stuff-to-the-point-of-bursting Finn. Puck walked over with the tube, "Open wide, then."

Finn obeyed and opened his mouth wide, letting Puck insert the tube. He leaned his head back and closed his eyes as Puck hit the start button, sending the chocolate milk weight gain formula into Finn's mouth, down his throat, and into his stomach. It didn't hit Finn until 15 minutes of being stuffed with the formula had passed that he was being forcefed a weigh gain serum. He clutched his belly and groaned as it swelled outward more and more, but no matter how badly he wanted to, he couldn't pull away from the tube. Another 15 minutes passed and Finn groaned as Puck pulled the empty tube from his mouth, "I'd say this experiment was a success. Just look as how MASSIVE the three of you are."

Mike and Finn groaned as Sam continued to sleep, all three of their bellies swollen with the weight gain formula. Sam's was the largest, followed by Finn's, and then Mike's. The two were so stuffed that they passed out next to Sam and Puck just grinned to himself, excited to see how much weight they'll have gained by morning.

Hours passed and by the time Sam, Mike, and Finn had woken up Puck had just finished a massive breakfast for all three of them, "Morning, you three! About time you woke up."
"That smells amazing." Sam said, pushing up from the couch. Mike and Finn followed suit but all three quickly realized they had all gained weight over the night.

Finn, who was already fattening up and was bigger than the other two, had a much bigger, squishier stomach, and a softer, puffier chest. His love handels has developed more and Puck licked his lips at the sight of them, wanting to squeeze them. Finn's thighs has puffed out some, rubbing together, and though Puck couldn't see it from the kitchen, his ass had gotten much chunkier and fatter. Finn's double chin was also becoming more prominent than before.

Along with Finn, Sam had also fattened up quite a lot. Finn was already more muscular than Sam, and with the added weight looked bigger, but Sam had definitely put on the most fat over night. Sam's stomach stuck out far in front of him under his puffy, soft pecs and he was even developing an adorable little paunch, but what surprised Puck was the drastic turn his weight had taken. Puck has expected Sam to develop a more fatty upper half but it turned out Sam's body was more interested in being pear-shaped. Sam's thighs and hips were twice as wide as they were before and strained the elastic of his boxers. Puck could only assume that Sam was developing a bubble butt even bigger than Finn's and thought Sam's rounder face, combined with his full, sexy lips, was adorable.

Mike had the least amount of weight on him but the growth was obvious. Mike's once rock hard abs were gone and were replaced with a prominent ball belly underneath his strong pecs. Most of Mike's weight went to his belly, but Puck could see a little softness on his chest and hips.

Puck walked to his best friends and grinned, "Well, well, well. Looks like out little test run of the machine I bought was a success!"
"Mike and I didn't want to gain weight, Puck. We just wanted to help Finn." Sam said, obviously somewhat bothered by it.
"Hey, these things happen. It's like a contact high. Contact weight gain. How about you three hop on a scale and show me how much you've out on, huh?"
Despite not being happy about it Sam was curious. All three of them went to the bathroom and weighed themselves.
111312211121221111112222.title: Finn and Mike's turn on the pump.

11132.content: Mike Chang has always been muscular and an amazing dancer, but he's about to start getting heavier. How will McKinley High's best male dancer start growing?
11132.title: Mike Chang.

111322.content:
It was a Friday night at the Chang residence. Mike had just finished studying for an upcoming test and he was channel surfing, hoping he'd find something good on. Mike stumbled across a re-run marathon of the 5th seasons of America's Best Dance Crew, a show he really loved. As he watched, he found himself really being drawn towards the dance crew Heavy Impact, a group of 5 big men who were amazing dancers. He could tell that all of these guys were strong men with muscle, but he was really amazed at how fast and talented they were despite their sizes.

When the dance crew was eliminated from the show, Mike turned the TV off, not caring about who won at that point. The dance moves of Heavy Impact really inspired him a way he hadn't thought of before. Mike got up from his bed and walked over to his bedroom mirror, pulling his shirt off and looking himself over. One of his greatest features had always been his toned body, but after seeing those dancers from ABDC, he could definitely see himself as a bigger guy. The Mike thought about it, the more he would love to see himself with big arms, a wide back, and bigger, soft stomach.

Mike put his hands on his abs, which he had put so much hard work into, "Hmmm. Maybe I should get a second opinion..." Mike pulled out his cell phone and called one of his friends from Glee club. The phone rang for a few moments before...
111322.title: Heavy Dancers?

1113222.content:
"Yo, Sam speaking. Who is it?" Sam's voice answered the phone.
"It's Mike Chang," Mike said and Sam was surprised.
"Oh, hey Mike, what is it?"
"I wanted to get your opinion on something."
"Oh, okay shoot."
"What do you think of my dancing?" Mike asked.
"Well, that's easy. It's some of the coolest dancing I have ever seen and you're a really good dancer." Sam said with certainty.
"Well...what do you think of my abs?" Mike asked and there was a pause.
"I'm afraid I don't understand the question. What do I think of your abs?"
"Yes. Do you think they're necessary to dance?"
"Um...I am not really qualified to answer that." Sam said haltingly.
"Sure you are. You can dance and have are ripped just like me. Tell me, would it be weird to not have abs?"
"Er, I guess so. Why, are you getting fat?" Sam laughed at his joke. Mike said nothing and Sam stopped laughing when he realized Mike didn't join in."
"Woah, you're getting fat?!" Sam asked, completely shocked.
"Not exactly, at least not yet." Mike said.
"What do you mean by that?"
"I was watching America's Best Dance Crew and I saw something." Mike explained.
"What did you see?"
"A dance group called Heavy Impact."
"Who?"
"A group of extremely talented dancers who are not what you expect. They are all...big. I mean, really,"
"Uh-huh."
"So I was thinking...they were all talented dancers."
"They must be if you're impressed. You're going to have to show me some videos later."
"Yeah I will. But the point is, they were big and still danced like people less than half their size, and even better. They even do backflips and splits."
"Impressive. I can't do a split, it hurts. And these are fat people?"
"Not fat, but definitely big. Let's just say you would never expect them to move like they do."
"I believe you. Still, what does this have to do with why you called?"
"I was inspired by them." Mike said plainly and Sam felt the world come to a stop.
"Huh?"
"I want to be like that. All big and stuff." Sam felt as if he had fallen into an alternate universe.
"But...why? You have some of the most ripped abs I have ever seen and a very fine body. You're already a good dancer. Why would you want to change that?"
"Because I want to be known for more than my abs."
"What are you talking about?"
"What's the first thing everybody thinks when my name is said."
"Dancing," Sam said right away.
"What's the second?" Mike asked again.
"Abs," Sam said.
"That's exactly the problem. I don't want to be known for that."
"Why?" Sam was curious to know.
"I...it's hard to explain. I'm not quite sure if I even know myself. It's just that when people think about me, they don't think about me but what I look like. I mean, they don't really like me for me, if you're getting this. I am a dancer so that is fine. But I am also known for my flat stomach which I am not."

"I think I get you. So you don't feel people like you for you but for your body and that doesn't seem right does it?"
"No. Besides, all Tina ever wants to do is play and lick at my abs. I can't help but wonder if she likes me or if she just likes me for my abs."
"I think she likes you," Sam said.
"I hope so, but every now and then I just wonder...if it would be the same if I wasn't."
"Oh. I see what you mean. I sometimes wondered things like that myself when I was with Quinn and and then Mercedes. If I didn't have the perfect body, would they still like me?"

"Plus, it takes a lot of work to maintain. Possibly too much work. I mean dance helps keep trimness but not that much. It is actually a lot harder than you expect. And at first I thought it was necessary for good dancing. Then Heavy Impact comes and dances to the same skill, and oftentimes better, than people who were thin. So I can't help but wonder why I even need my sixpack? If people truly care, they would be fine with whether I have a sixpack or not. And if it's not necessary for people to care or for dancing, I don't really need it.

"That's a good point." Sam said. "If they do, they wouldn't care either way."
"So I plan on bulking up because in certain cases, bigger is better."
"Okay."
"Want to help?"
"This is really weird but sure." Sam said shrugging.
"Good, let's do it."
"If it's what you want..."
"Yes."
"Okay. I'll help you. See you in a few minutes." Sam hung up the phone and Mike was excited.
1113222.title: Sam answered the phone.

choices: out for an ice cream run. We're not done yet, Mikey.
11132221.content:
20 minutes after he and Sam hung up, there was a loud knock at the front door. Mike hurried down stairs and opened it, "Hey, Sam!" "Sup, Mike. Where are your folks?" Sam asked, walking inside with an extra large pepperoni pizza in his hand. "They're out of town for the week visiting family. You don't expect me to eat all of that, do you?" Sam set the pizza on the coffee table, "Sure do. You wanna get big, right? That means you gotta eat a LOT of food, even if it means stuffing yourself with a massive pizza like this." Sam was right, the pizza he had brought over was massive, but it would help Mike walked over and sat down on the couch, "All right, lets do this."

Without a second though, Mike opened the pizza box and took the biggest slice he could find and started eating. He and Sam spent the next thirty minutes just talking and hanging out while Mike ate. Mike even pulled up the Heavy Impact performances and Sam was amazed at how good these guys were, "Damn, Mike. You weren't lying when you said they were talented." The two watched a couple of TV shows while Mike slowly chipped away the pizza, getting incredibly full as he did. Eventually, Mike finally stopped and fell back on the couch, his rock hard abs bloated from eating so much pizza. He let out a large burp before putting both hands on his stomach, "UUUUUUUURP... Oh god, I have never had that much food before."

Sam picked up one of the three slices left and held it up to Mike, "Come on, Mike, you gotta finish. You asked for my help and that's what I'm here to do." Mike grumbled, thinking it over, before deciding that Sam was right. He needed to eat if he wanted to gain any weight. Mike sat back into the couch as Sam feed him the last three slices of pizza, making him so full that he could barely move, "Oh god... I think that was too much.." Sam chuckled and lifted Mike's shirt up, revealing the dancer's bloated belly, "Here, let me help you." Sam put both of his big hands on Mike's stomach and began to rub in slow circles, which made Mike moan happily. Sam was amazing at this and there was no way he'd let him stop. Mike just sat back and enjoyed the belly rub.

A hour passed of Mike and Sam just talking and watched TV, Sam's hands never leaving Mike's bloated belly. Eventually, Sam pulled his hands back and got up, "Hey, where are you going?" Mike asked. Sam pulled his jacket back on and smiled, "I'm heading..."
11132221.title: Mike's first steps towards being bigger

choices: Between the two of them they finish most of the two donut boxes
They save the rest for later
111322212.content:
"I'm heading home for the night. It's pretty late and you could probably use a rest. Also, my folks are expecting me home soon. But I'll see you tomorrow if you're available. No school tomorrow..."

"Oh, okay. See you tomorrow," Mike burped one last time causing Sam to chuckle as he gave a few last belly rubs. "Or you can stay," Mike said.

"Nah, but I'll be over tomorrow, promise." With that, Sam walked out the door waving goodbye and Mike got up with a struggle. Man he was full, even now. He made it a few steps to the couch which he promptly dropped down upon. Yawning he laid down. He was glad his parents were out of town for the week which was rare enough. He loved them but he needed a break sometimes from their very gungho drivenness. He was more than happy to kick back and relax for once. Feeling his stuffed belly he rubbed it, amazed at the feeling. It felt so good, like when he mastered a dance successfully. He couldn't believe he hadn't done this before.

The sound of the doorbell woke him from his sleep. Feeling refreshed, Mike went to the door and opened it as Sam came back in with a couple boxes.
"Hey Mike, I'm here like I said and I brought you breakfast," Sam said.
"I see that. What did you bring?"
"Donuts, lots of them."
"Glazed and the ones with cream in them?" Mike asked curiously.
"Yeah, got both kinds. I remembered those were your favorite."
"You bet they are." Sam opened the first box and grinned as Mike drooled.
"I haven't had donuts in forever," he said. "This is wonderful."
"Glad you like it." Sam put the box down and moved back, sitting on the couch as he watched Mike pull out the donut and bite into it.

"Mmmhh oh my god, these are so good," Mike said as he took another big hunk and licked his lips, after some sugar settled there. Pretty quickly the first donut was gone and he pulled out another one, this one with cream. Taking a bite out of it he moaned again as this delicious cream filled his mouth. "I can't thank you enough, really," Mike said as he swallowed. "These are so good." Sam shifted embarassed and flattered.

"You're welcome, I'm glad you like them. I wasn't sure what to get you at first until I passed a Donut shop and it came to me you might like those. Clearly you do."
"You bet I do! These donuts are awesome!" Sam smiled.

"Good to know," he said as he watched Mike bite into a third donut, chewing happily. Sam carefully pulled out a glazed donut in the other box and bit into it, suddenly in the mood for donuts himself. He stopped shocked for a moment. Damn, those were good donuts! He chewed faster reveling in the taste as he watched Mike take out another cream and accidentally squirting it on himself when he bit it and started licking it off.
111322212.title: Donuts

1113222121.content:
Mike and Sam each took a seat on the couch as they made their way through the boxes of donuts. Sam knew not to eat too many, these were for Mike and he had to watch his figure, so he only ate three of them, leaving the other twenty-one donuts for Mike. As Sam took the last bite of his donut, Mike reached in and grabbed his fifth one, finishing it in a few bites and grabbing another one.

"Wow, Mike, you're really powering through those!" Sam said, impressed. Mike, almost in a trance, just kept eating and eating. Sam got up and went to the fridge, pulling out the new carton of milk and sitting back down next to Mike, handing him the carton, "Here, drink this. It'll help clear your throat." Mike swallowed his tenth donut and took the jug, chugging down a large portion of it before pulling it away and letting out a massive belch.
"UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPP..... WOO!! This is AMAZING." He said, putting down the jug and grabbing a donut in each hand, alternating between bites of each.
Sam put his hand on Mike's shoulder, "You should really slow down, Mike. You're gonna get sick if you keep eating this fast. You need to slow down in the early stages."
Mike finished the two donuts in his hands and burped again, "UUUURPPP.... Yeah, you're right... They're just SO GOOD." Mike picked up another donut and kept going, eating a bit slower this time but determined to finish the box. Half and hour, two boxes of donuts, and a jug of milk later, Mike was laying on the couch with a bloated stomach, smiling through the pain because he was actually able to eat all of that.
1113222121.title: Donut stuffing.

choices: Tina comes over and approves of Mike's desire to get bigger and Sam helping
Tina comes over and doesn't like it at all. Is this the end of Mike/Tina?
11132221211.content:
Cracking his fingers, Sam got to work. Placing his hands on Mike's swollen belly, he gently rubbed, listening to the moan of pain turn to one of appreciation (mixed with pain). Sam again marveled at how big Mike got after eating and how stuffed that belly felt, the bulging protrusion very different than Mike's normal flat abs. It hadn't been very long since they had started but already Mike seemed more open and relaxed, much less stressed. He was happier and if Mike was happy with a belly, there was no way Sam was going to stop him, unless it got too extreme even for him. Sam had always wondered what Mike would look like with a belly hypothetically, but now he got an unexpected opportunity to test his hypothesis in real life. As long as Mike was okay with it, Sam was going to help him achieve it, and if he also had a personal interest and curiousity in helping people grow, that was his business.

"Uuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrpppppppppp," Mike belched loudly and Sam smirked at the relief and self-satisfied expression that crossed Mike's face,
"Impressive dude, you're more of a man than ever before." Sam continued his pleasurable rubbing. Mike nodded and placed a hand on his stomach as well, having Sam pause.
"Yeah, I finally feel like one." Sam raised his eyebrows in confusion.

"What? You mean you never felt like one before?" Mike shrugged his shoulders awkwardly.
"No, that didn't come out right. It's kind of hard to explain. Yes I was a guy but never felt like one because of my dancing and extreme body proportion? And so much pressure and effort, I don't know. It just feels good to kick back and relax." He let out another long belch and sighed in relief.

"Uuuuuuuurrrrrrrpppp, oh man that hit the spot. I finally get why its so much fun to eat when you don't have to worry about impressing anyone. After the pain, it is like the best feeling ever. No wonder people do it." Sam smiled at Mike's enthusiasm and resumed rubbing, eliciting even more moans of pleasure.

"Especially after a....uuuuuurrrrrpppp...big meal and someone....urrrrrrrrrrrppppp does that," Mike groaned in pleasure at the touch of Sam's hands which felt heavenly rubbing his full stomach. He could really get used to this, the whole eating thing. Not just as an experiment but as something to legitimately work on. His fantasy of becoming of bigger dancer might not just be a fantasy but an actual reality. Sure his parents might be freaked out at first but they would hopefully accept it. If not, oh well. And it would honestly be a relief to get rid of his abs. Other people might have admired them from afar but they were hard to keep and maintain, especially ones as defined as his. He secretly had wondered what it would be like to have a gut, one that was both round and hard. However, he had done nothing about it and pushed those thoughts aside until now. Now that he knew it was possible, he wanted to try to do something he always dreamed (after dancing). With his friend Sam's help, he could do this. The only thing that bothered him was what Tina would think. Would Tina be okay with him losing his abs and being more of his full self? Or would she want him to stop? Mike wasn't sure if he wanted to stop. but Tina's opinion did matter to him and he couldn't in conscious continue until he knew.

"Sam, would you mind if Tina came over?"
"Not at all, but are you sure?" Sam asked, figuring out what Mike was thinking.
"Not at all but I do hope she would be okay with me getting bigger."
"And if not?" Sam asked concerned.
"I...well, I don't know. I love her but I want to go through with this. We'll just see when she gets here."
"Okay, if you're sure." Sam said, taking one hand off to get his cellphone. The Glee Kids all had each other's phones under contacts so Sam pushed Tina.
"Hi Tina, it's me Sam and I'm hanging out with Mike. He wants you to come over and give your opinion on something that he has thought about for a while. What? Oh, see you soon."

"What is it?" Mike asked.
"She's on her way over now," Sam said, a little bit of disappointment in his face because his time might be cut short if Tina doens't like it and Mike gives up.
11132221211.title: Sam rubs Mike's belly.

choices: Mike eats 4 slices(half of the cake)
111322212112.content:
After an hour of relaxation and digestion, Tina finally arrived at Mike's house but didn't stay long. Everything went the opposite of how Mike had hoped it would: Tina wasn't happy with his new decision to gain weight, and after almost 20 minutes of trying to get through to her, Tina left angry. Mike slumped into the couch and put his head in his hands - upset. Sam sat down next to him and rubbed his shoulder, "Hey, it's okay, dude. It's not like she broke up with you or anything. Tina just needs time to think this over. She's just concerned that this will effect your dancing and health."
"Maybe she's right..." Mike said sadly.
"Whoa, hey! That's quitter talk, Mike. I will NOT let you give up on this dream of getting big, got it?"
Mike smiled at Sam, "Thanks, dude."

Sam smiled back and got up, "How you feelin?"
"Hungry." Mike said, rubbing his stomach. His bloated belly had shrunken down back to his flat, muscular stomach, though Mike didn't realize that his abs were slightly softer now.
"Perfect! I've got just the thing." Sam said, "I'll be right back." Sam walked outside and came back in after only a minute, tossing a bag of chips to Mike, "Here, munch on those while I go grab something."
Mike opened the large bag of chips and started eating happily while Sam was gone. After about 15 minutes, Sam came back in just as Mike was pouring the last crumbs of the chips into his mouth, "Perfect timing!" Sam said, congratulating himself. Mike watches as Sam set down a massive chocolate cake on the coffee table, cutting a gigantic slice and putting it on a paper plate, "Eat up!" Sam said, handing it to Mike.

Mike, eager to become the gigantic dancer he's always wanted to be, dug in, eating as quickly as he possibly could so he could get more. After he finished the first huge slice, Sam plopped another down on his plate, refusing to let Mike go without.
111322212112.title: Mike binges on cake.

choices: Puck comes over to play Halo and finds out
1113222121121.content:
Enjoying the chocolate taste, Mike plowed through the first and second huge slices of cake. Then he winced.
"Okay, I'm a bit full, like really." Sam moved to sit besides Mike and placed his hands on Mike's bloated belly and felt.
"No, there is still room left. I do believe you could eat at least a little more. We'll just go more slowly to allow it to settle and so you don't throw up.
"But I don't really-"
"I didn't think you were such a quitter Mike," Sam interrupted. "How can you hope to be a dancer if you quit when it gets a little tough? You'd never make it."
"But that's-"

"No, it's not different from this. This is about never giving up and if you think this is hard, you would never make it as you would be giving up on yourself. Now you're going to eat until you really can't eat anymore and you're going to enjoy every last bite of it."

"But how..."Mike started and Sam smirked.
"Why, I feed you of course until I decide you've had enough." Before Mike could start to say anymore protestations, Sam shoved the first part of cake into Mike's mouth, forcing him to chew and swallow.

"Feel that? It's good," Sam said as he started tracing patterns on Mike's stomach. Mike panted a little.
"I-urp-guess," Mike muttered, still with a slightly sick face. Sam nodded satisfied.
"Good. You're a big boy, and big boys need to eat." Mike raised his eyebrows at the tone in Sam's voice.
"Okay dude, don't start talking like that, its kind of creepy."
"Oh, uh, sorry. Got a little carried away," Sam said.
"It's okay."

"You're a surprisingly good eater, I still have a bit of trouble believing it," Sam said as Mike reluctantly chewed the remaining part of the third slice of cake.
"I guess because I've spent repressing hunger for so long...but this is a bit overkill. I feel like a stuffed pumpkin." Sam laughed, amused at Mike's comparison.
"Getting round like one too, and it will one day be permanent although with a lot less pain than there is now. I'm really sorry about that."
"It's...okay. You're absolutely right about not giving up, yet anyways. Though I would say this is a lot harder than dancing."

"Dancing comes more natural to you and is your talent. But I say you're pretty good at this as well. I mean, I don't know many people who would be able to eat all you did and still have determination to eat more." Mike groaned as his belly churned.

"Yeah, well my body disagrees." Sam leapt into action taking out pepto-bismol from his pocket and poured some for Mike who drank it.
"You keep medicine in your pocket?" Mike had been surprised when Sam so readily had it on hand.
"I like to be prepared. Now for part 2." Cracking his knuckles, Sam put both hands on Mike's distended stomach and started massaging. Mike groaned in pleasure.

"You know, you are-uuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrpppp-really good at this," Mike got out before descending into another series of impressively long burps, Sam kept on a straight face as he rubbed Mike's bloated belly. When Mike finally started settling down, Sam got out cake number four.

"Just one more and then you can rest," Sam said. Mike was kind of out of it and his head felt heavy.
"O...okay." With gentle care, Sam started feeding pieces of cake to Mike not wanting to push to much. However, the reluctance was knocked out of Mike and he slowly but surely ate each and every small piece, obediently opening his mouth when Sam waved something in front of it. When Mike, who's eyes were half-closed opened his mouth and nothing came in, he forced his heavy eyes open to look at Sam's smiling face.

"Huh?" Mike asked disoriented.
"You ate every piece and are at full capacity," Sam said, his fingers lightly brushing over Mike's rounded and over-stuffed gut.
Yay..." Mike muttered sarcastically as he let out another quick burp. "Now can I sleep?"
"Of course you can, you earned a rest. I must say I am quite impressed."
"Yeah, whatever, tell me that when I can care," Mike groaned out. Suddenly like a flash he was asleep. Sam sat there for a few moments.
"Goodnight." Getting up, Sam took the rest of the cake back to the fridge for later. Going back to the living room, he looked at the couch and at the passed out Mike on the floor.
"Wow," he muttered, then got onto the couch and pulled up a blanket. Putting his head on the pillow, Sam closed his eyes and fell asleep.
1113222121121.title: Mike eats 4 slices(half of the cake)

choices: Puck feeds Mike half the box of twinkies.
Puck feeds Mike the whole box.
11132221211211.content:
Sam had woken up early and made a run to the store to get breakfast for the growing Mike. He was in the kitchen making a massive stack of pancakes with huge piles of bacon and hashbrowns when there was a knock at the door. Sam opened the door, confused, and to his surprise he saw Puck standing there with a bag full of chips and snack cakes, as well as his copy of Halo.

"Sammy? What are you doin' here?" Puck asked, confused.

"I was about to ask you the same thing." Sam said, moving aside to let Puck in.

Puck walked inside and set down the bag and game on the couch, "Mike invited me over a few days ago. I was busy and couldn't make it until today." Puck looked down at Mike and raised an eyebrow, "Whats with Mike?"

Sam rubbed the back of his neck, thinking of a way to explain it, "Well... I'll just be blunt. I'm helping Mike gain weight."

"... GAIN weight. As in, Mike wants to be fat?" Puck said, a look of both confusion and excitement on his face.

Sam nodded, "Not just fat, muscular too. He saw a dance crew on a TV show comprised of big guys and he wants to be like them."

Puck put his hand on Sam's shoulder, "Sam, why didn't you tell me! Look, I don't go around telling a lot of people this, but you're one of my best friends and I think you have a right to know. I'm an encourager."

"A what?"

"An encourager." Puck repeated, "I like to help and watch guys get bigger. You haven't seen Dave Karofsky since he switched schools, but dude, I made him HUGE. Massive muscles, a gigantic belly, thick legs, the works. He's the star football player at his school now!" Puck made sure to leave out the part where he got turned on by it, as well as the many times he and the MUCH larger Dave fooled around.

"Huh.. well that's pretty good new then!" Sam said, heading back into the kitchen. As he started cooking again, Mike groaned a little as he awoke, sitting up and rubbing his eyes, "Oh... Hey, Puck."

"Hey, there big guy!" Puck said, kneeling down and patting Mike's tiny belly, "Sam filled me in on what you're doing and I'm gonna help! I've got a bit of experience in this department."

Mike, still half asleep, simply nodded before getting up, "Whats that smell?" Mike asked.

"Breakfast!" Sam called, "It'll be a bit before it's done though."

Puck, hearing this, set Sam down on the couch and opened up a box of twinkies, "I'll take care of Mike, Sam. You just keep cooking!" Puck grabbed a twinkie and held it up to Mike's mouth, "Open up!"

Mike sleepily opened wide and Puck shoved the twinkie in, excited to see his friend get huge.
11132221211211.title: Puck joins in!

111322212112112.content:
Still half asleep, Mike let Puck feed him twinkie after twinkie. It was a dream after all and a very tasty but freaky one. Odd that it was Puck feeding him though, he would have thought it would be Tina or Sam. There was no reason though that Noah Puckerman would be at his house so early in the morning feeding him. Especially with the excitement Puck had on his face as he fed Mike. The real Puck would probably hit him for even imagining such a thing.

Eventually there was a disappointed huff. Mike watched as Puck rooted through the box.

"Dang, no more. I would open another box but I think Sam is finishing breakfast soon and I don't want to ruin your appetite after all." Puck grinned and licked his lips and Mike cocked his head in confusion. This dream was turning even weirder as Puck laid a hand on Mike's belly and rubbed, patting it as he went to the kitchen to join Sam. How very weird. He must be really out of it if he dreamed of Puck touching him, especially since Puck was one of the straightest people Mike knew. He wondered when he was going to wake up and this weirdness would be over.

Soon the smell of cooking bacon and pancakes slowly pulled Mike from his dream state. Breathing in deeply, Mike walked into the kitchen smiling as he said "Good morning Sam-" when he stopped and stared. There sitting at the table eating a bagel was none other than Noah Puckerman. Still staring, Mike sat down in wonder. "What? That wasn't a dream?" Puck raised his eyebrows at that and smirked.

"I know I'm a dream but what made you think you think that was what you were doing? Now come on, start eating this delicious looking breakfast Sam made and we can possibly all play some Halo or something afterwards.
111322212112112.title: Just a dream?

1113222121121121.content:
Stunned that it hadn't been a dream and utterly shocked, Mike numbly sat down in his chair. Puck noticing his face smirked. "Actually, this is all just a dream. The real you had been kidnapped by aliens overnight and they are testing you to see how you would react to certain unexpected situations. As it is, they aren't too impressed." Sam nudged Puck and Puck laughed at Mike's dumb-stricken face.

"You actually believe that! Man you must be so out of it. For real we are all at Sam's house about to have a delicious home-cooked meal he made for you that I'm going to help myself too as well, minus the bacon."

"So this isn't a dream?" Mike asked. Puck frowned.
"No, no it isn't."
"Okay, then what are you doing over here?" Mike asked.
"Haven't we gone through this? Helping you with your goal to get big like a good supportive friend and also because its freaking awesome you've decided too."
"Okay but why..." Mike started before Puck sighed.
"Enough questions already, just go with it capiche? Just be content that Sam and I will be helping you in your rather surprisingly unexpected goal. I'd have pregged almost anyone else before you as more likely to be a gainer but here you are rather than someone like say Mr. Schue. Hey, do you think Mr. Schue would ever consider...?" Sam nudged Puck again.

"Focus and eyes on the prize," Sam said. That was something they all heard often from Coach Beiste in pre-game pep talks and in practice. Puck straightened up.
"Yeah, of course. Enough talking, you ready Mikey?
"Of-of course," Mike stammered. Puck gave a grin of reassurance.
"Relax Mike, we're not here to hurt you, only to help. You came to us first and here we are."
"What are you talking about? No one ever said anything about-"

"Ignore the big bonehead. He doesn't know what he's saying," Sam said glaring over. Puck smiled and grinned, waving mockingly and fingered Sam when he his back was turned, winking at Mike as he did so. It was finally beginning to settle in that this was reality and not just some very vivid hallucination and Mike was finally feeling more comfortable as his friends joked around.

"That really hurts right here," Puck said dramatically, pointing at his heart. "Right in here."
"So, pancakes?" Sam asked, ignoring Puck's antics for the moment. Puck sobered up and settled down in a more serious mood.
"Yes?" Mike asked, wondering if that was a question or a statement.
"How many?"
"How about-" Mike started before Puck cut in.
"He'll have four," he said and Mike glanced over. That had not been what he was going to say at all.
"I was going to say more like two-"
"Four it is," Sam said with a smirk and left before Mike could protest again to get the batch. Mike glared at Puck who whistled innocently.
"You're ganging up on me aren't you," he asked and Puck smiled ambiguously.
"Only if you believe that," he smirked tauntingly and Mike wished he could knock that irritating knowing smile off his face.

Soon heavily laden plates of pancakes smothered in what was certainly unhealthy but amazing tasting syrup and loads of butter was placed in front of everyone as well as additional plates of bacon (Puck the exception, he got toast instead) and scrambled eggs. Sam said a quick prayer thanking God before lifting his head.

"Okay, you can now eat." Puck had been examing the food on the table and Sam the entire time while he prayed and he had his eyebrows raised as he puzzled something out. It was pretty obvious what it was since Mike had to wonder as well how Sam could whip up a breakfast like that and not be...well, giant. Sam seemed unaware as he cut into his pancakes eagerly.

"Well don't just sit there, eat up! I can assure you its not poisoned or whatever." That was the furthest thing from anyone's mind but Puck shrugged as he started eating as did Mike. Sam smiled behind a glass of milk as he watched, thoughts of his own forming in mind as Puck and Mike first slowly and then with greater speed and enjoyment started to eat.
1113222121121121.title: Breakfast with Sam and Puck

choices: At dinner, Sam stuffs Mike (and Puck a little) again.
11132221211211211.content:
Sam watched as Mike and Puck dug into the pancakes, a smirk on his face. While Puck was stuffing Mike with twinkies, Sam had snuck in a couple of spoonfuls of weight gain powder that Puck had recommended to him before. For a while Sam had been wanting to get into the feeder/gainer business and he knew Puck was pretty well known in town for doing so. Sam had snuck the bottle of gainer shake into the house while Mike slept and it was designed to make the devourer both incredibly full and starving at the same time, while making it easier to put on weight.

Sam had made two seperate batches of pancake batter; one for Mike which was laced with the powder, and one for him and Puck. The pancake on the top of Sam's plate was regular one, while the other three were the ones laced with the powder. Sam at the top one, and then pushed the plate back, wiping his mouth, "I'm done. You can have the rest, Mike."

As Sam got up and went to the kitchen, Mike didn't even notice. When Sam pushed the plate towards him, he had already finished his plate and quickly started devouring the next. He had no idea what had gotten over him but the only thing he was compelled to do was to just eat, eat, eat. Puck, on the other hand, was definitely hungrier than normal, but he wasn't inhaling food like Mike was. Sam had given him one pancake with the powder, which was enough to make Puck hungrier but not a black hole like Mike.

Breakfast went on for two hours due to Mike's constant need for food. Sam continued to make the gainer powder laced pancakes, but after the ninth plate, he just went to making normal ones for Mike. By the end of the feast, Mike had eaten 12 plates, a total 48 pancakes total. Puck had only eaten three plates. Mike leaned back in his chair, his stomach bloated outward with the fluffy, delicious food he had just devoured. Without a word, Sam walked over and smiled warmly at Mike, his hands rubbing his bloated belly, "There, there, big guy. You ate a lot today! I'm proud of you."

Puck, who was relaxing on the couch watching TV, "What about my tummy?" He sad, a goofy pout on his face.
"You'll get your turn." Sam said, focusing on the growing dancer.
11132221211211211.title: Pancake Stuffing.

111331.content: With strong muscles and a soft, ample belly, Dave Karofsky is one of the biggest guys on the McKinley High football team, but he's about to get bigger. How will McKinley's closeted jock start getting heavier?
111331.title: Dave Karofsky.

choices: Someone he knew and could help came in
1113312.content:
Dave Karofsky had always been a talented athlete. He had been especially blessed with his size which was bigger and thicker than most people his age and while it had been a little awkward growing up, it helped a lot in sports. Unfortunately growing up, it also got him teased a lot because he had been a bigger and kind of chubby kid before it distributed more evenly. Course, he was still thickset and there was a soft pudginess to his stomach that wouldn't go away no matter what he did. And he had tried, going on diets, running laps, swimming, he done it all. It stubbornly remained and it just left him hungry and out of breath. Outside some of his friends on the football team, he was quite possibly the largest guy in McKinnley, and that wasn't always meant as a compliment. He knew that when some of the guys thought he couldn't hear, they mocked his pudginess and likened him to a pig. A pig, and he lead their team to victory on the ice in hockey and field in Lacrosse. He was not all that fat, he didn't think, and he had plenty of muscle in addition, especially in the arms, legs, chest, and back. Even so, he sometimes couldn't help but wish to be smaller. The only good thing was that most did not know he was into guys. If that was ever released, it wouldn't matter how many times he had been useful or that he could easily kick their asses, they'd destroy him without mercy. He admitted that he had been none to pleasant himself when it came to punishing the gay but he had too to fit in lest he be grouped with them.

Then shit hit the fan, he attacked lady lips Hummel and in the heat of the moment kissed and then threatened to kill him. He did not mean to do that and he actually did not like Kurt in that way but he had to know what it would be like to kiss a guy, especially one that was overtly and obviously gay. And the death threat...well, he regretted that. He regretted going that far, scaring the life out of the twink. It was just that Kurt was a notorious gossip and who knew who he would tell? It didn't matter though, he got suspended and his dad had a conniption and Kurt moved. He was relieved when Kurt came back because the guilt had been killing him inside. He and the gleek squad came to a bit of a truce where he preserved his reputation dating Santana (who was Lesbian herself and ironically interested in a certain women while he was interested in men) and they even had an anti-bullying club which gained a lot of legitimacy when Dave stopped following the wants of his team mates and did what he thought was right.

Now was a new year and a new school. He wasn't allowed at McKinnley anymore even with the anti-bullying thing because of various past mistakes (and what happened at prom but he had nothing to do with that). His dad instead sent him to another private school (not the one Kurt went to, Balton or whatever the hell it was, a different one) and it was the weirdest change in his life. There he was one of the most popular and well liked people which was disconcerting, being both popular and well liked. Most people can't be both and some are even either. But there they loved him, the exact opposite of McKinnley. Course, it'd be a different story if he acted like how he had when he had been at McKinnley. Still, woah. They all admired his size and strength and the coaches praised him openly wanting other people to be just like him.

And the scene at the gaybar where none of his old friends would ever be caught dead (literally) he was friendly with everyone and they always seemed to be calling him a bear for some reason. Then one day he got the news. Although Dave was extraordinary among people his age, he barely stood a chance against the older footballers who were just as if not more talented and bigger. He was requested to bulk up a bit, get even stronger and wider if he wanted to continue playing and Dave promised to. He was thinking on just how to do that when the answer came to him.
1113312.title: Both

choices: He knows the perfect trainer for Karofsky
11133121.content:
It was an ordinary night at the bar with Dave calmly sitting there drinking his drink when one of the most least likely people he'd ever thought to see came in the door. Well, second most, the least likely would probably be his former friend Azimio, but that was beside the point. The point was that it was someone he recognized. He watched startled as Puck calm as day sauntered up and ordered a Jack Daniels and sat a few seats down from him. Dave stood up and walked over.

"Puck? What are you doing here?" The mohawked man turned and grinned, surprising Dave even more.
"Hi Dave." Puck said Dave. Not Karofsky but he said Dave. Dave couldn't believe it.
"What are you doing here Puck? You do know where you are right?" Puck shrugged his shoulders.

"I am quite aware. I think the dudes in drag over there would have been enough of a giveaway." Puck said pointing to a couple across the room. "I'm just here watching over Kurt and making sure he doesn't get into trouble. Burt and Finn don't want him home drunk again and he is a lightweight." He took another sip of his drink.

"So they're fine with you getting drunk?" Dave asked confused. He couldn't see how Puck drinking prevented a drunk Kurt. Puck just laughed and shook his head.

"Nah, but a man's got to have his pleasures and I figure why not, I'm in a bar all the same. Besides, I'm not intending to get drunk, just a little buzzed. I have to be sober enough to drive Kurt home if need be."

"Does he know you're here?"

"Probably not but he must spot me at some time unless he's totally focused on Blaine. Which is probably the case. Right over there, example A." Puck pointed to where Kurt and Blaine were dancing. "I sound like a total girl for saying this but they're cute together."

"I guess," Dave said. Puck looked askance at him for a moment.
"Are you still crushing on him?" Puck asked, his voice with a tinge of threat. Dave shook his head rapidly not wanting to piss him off.

"No, no, I'm way over that. I just don't know Blaine all that well and he seems kind of...boring. Plus, that is an awful bow-tie. I can not believe Kurt is actually allowing him to wear something like that. Even I know that's horrendous."

"You've never heard him sing or saw him perform. He's fantastic. Although when he isn't, I do have to admit he kind of is boring. And the fact that Kurt hasn't collected all of Blaine's bow-ties and shorts and burned them yet really must mean he's in love because normally Kurt would probably die inside. Then again, he's hanging with Berry now, new bffl's." Dave raised his eyebrow.

"Bffl's?" He had no idea what that meant.
"Best friends for life, it's a girl thing I think." Puck shrugged.
"Oh." Dave had no idea what to say to that.

"So how's life treating you Karofsky," Puck said after about half the bottle was gone. Licking his lips, he scanned the room and tapped his long fingers nervously. How long was this going to take?"

"You could still call me Dave," Dave said sardonically rolling his eyes.
"Sorry Kar-I mean Dave. So weird seeing you outside school and your 'friends'."
"Well, they weren't my true friends. I'm actually relieved to be rid of them."
"That's awesome."
"I'm actually pretty popular there. And they're very accepting of gays unlike McKinnley." Puck raised his eyebrows.
"No way, I don't believe you."
"No 'tis true," Dave said grinning.
"That's awesome man," Puck said, as he started on another bottle.
"You should probably slow down," Dave said concerned and Puck laughed.
"No worries, it takes a lot for me to get drunk."
"That's...a bit concerning," Dave said.
"Don't worry, so anyways, tell me more."
"I've been chosen for a football scholarship, full ride," Dave said proudly and Puck smiled.
"Congratulations man," he said putting his hand out for a fistbump like they used to back in elementary and middle school. Dave does so eagerly.
"Well, it's not so much guaranteed yet, but rather provisional," Dave admitted and Puck looked at him confused.
"Huh? I thought you got it?"

"I will, but not yet. There is a bit of a stipulation for me to receive it." Puck was still confused as he tried to think if he knew the word stipulation. Dave grinned and rolled his eyes. "An extra requirement. I have to get bigger to compete in the big leagues."

"You are pretty big already," Puck said.
"Yeah, but the recruiter thinks it's possible to be even more ready. Plus this is the big leagues."
"Oh."
"Yeah," Dave says.
"I could help," Puck said.
"Really? How?"
11133121.title: Someone he knew and could help came in

choices: Three double-cheese burgers with fries and a shake.
Two triple-cheese burgers with fries and a shake.
111331211.content:
"You cook?" Dave asked, slightly surprised.
"Of COURSE I cook. This isn't the 70's when woman weren't allowed out of the kitchen - I'm a pretty good chef. I can't make any fancy shit but I've got a cook book at home with tons of great recipes that'll put some more meat on your bones." Puck said with an oddly excited grin.
"Okay, sure! This is gonna help a lot! Thanks, Puck." Dave said cheerfully.
"No prob, Dave!! We'll start tomorrow. I'll meet you at your place after I get out of school." Puck said before patting Dave's wide back and walking over to check on Kurt.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dave was sitting in his history class wiggling his pencil between his thick fingers the next day. Ever since last night he couldn't get the idea of Puck cooking for him and helping him grow out of his head. He was excited and couldn't wait to start. Dave sat back a little and looked down at his already big belly which, along with his muscles and tall stature, had helped him in many football games. He noticed that his new school's maroon uniform jacket clung tightly to his stomach - he had put some weight on since he bought it at the beginning of the year and it was starting to show. He patted it softly, not wanting anyway on to see, and jumped a little when the dismissal bell rang. Dave packed up his things and hurried to his car, his thick arms wrapped around his torso to keep warm. Dave DESPISED the winter seasons because of how cold it always was.

As soon as Dave got into his car he cranked the heater up and drove home, which was about a half hour drive. He pulled into his driveway and sent Puck a text saying he was home before hurrying inside. The first thing Dave did was start a fire in the fireplace, which always made the house extremely warm and comfy. A few minutes later and there was a knock at the door. Dave opened the door and Puck smiled up at, "Hey, big guy!! Let's get started!" Puck made his way inside with two grocery bags in hand and a big book under his arm.

"What's that?" Dave asked.
"This is that cook book I told you about!! This thing is full of amazingly fattening recipes that'll turn you into a mountain of a man in no time!" Puck set the bags on the counter and searched Dave's kitchen until found the largest frying pan. Without waiting, he turned the stove top on and dropped two large burger patties on the pan, "So, Dave. How much do you weight right now?"
"I weighed myself yesterday..." Dave said, "I weigh 235."
"235!! Dude, you're HUGE." Puck said turning around. His eyes instantly zoomed into Dave's belly, "And your uniform seems to agree with me. The buttons on that blazer look like they're about to burst." Puck smacked both hands onto the sides of Dave's stomach, grinning at the loud THUMP sound it made, "I'm gonna make you so big these buttons are gonna pop off!"
Dave wasn't sure why, but that made him blush. Puck patted Dave's belly and walked back over to the first of several burgers he was making for Dave. Puck's first meal for Dave is...
111331211.title: Dave's current weight and his first meal.

choices: Puck and Dave relax the rest of the day
Puck decides to throw a party
1113312111.content:
Puck and Dave small-chatted while Puck flipped the bugers, making sure they were evenly cooked but not overdone. When they were done, Puck turned the stove off. The fries he had done earlier and Puck rubbed his hands together as he stood back.

"Perfect. Now for the icecream. Do you want Chocolate, Cookies&cream, Oreo, Rocky Road, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough..." Dave blinked.
"Woah, how much icecream did you buy? The entire stock of flavors?" he asked stunned. Puck shrugged.
"Nah, not that much. I just wasn't sure which you preferred. So, what do you feel like?"
"Oh, uh, Cookie Dough I guess," Dave said unsure although Puck nodded.
"Okay, let me just go get it." Puck left through the door and came back a few minutes later with a tub of Cookie Dough,

"I'll get the rest from the trunk later," Puck said as he came in. "I'm not entirely sure if I even needed the cooling, it's fucking cold outside. No wonder you like the heat." Puck put the icecream down.

"Where can I get a scoop?" he asked and Dave almost in a daze points to where it was kept. Puck grabs it and the blender on the counter and started scooping out giant chunks of icecream. Grabbing milk from the fridge, he also pours it in and pushes blend. There is no talking over the sound of blender, not that it was possible, and when he judged it thoroughly mixed, Puck turned it off and poured the thick mix into glasses for him and Dave. Finally, Puck backed up, putting the burgers onto the buns and bringing out the fries. Then he stood there awkwardly for a moment.

"Um, bon-appetite, or something like that, I'm not entirely sure." Sitting on a kitchen table stool, he settled in to watch. Dave lifted the first burger and took a bite. He chewed first slowly, then with increasing speed as he tasted one of the best burgers he had ever tasted.

"Dude," Dave puffed between bites, "these hamburgers are amazing!" Puck nodded pleased.

"Why thank you, I do make good burgers don't I?" His mouth full of meat, all Dave could do was nod. When he finished the first big burger, Dave took pause to grab handfuls of fries and stuffed them into his mouth. One handful after another, his stomach calling out for more as it always did. Taking another burger, he bit into it eagerly, savoring the tender juicy meat Puck had cooked to perfection. What was startling was how good a cook Puck was, especially at burgers although that was all Dave knew Puck could do. He had no idea of Puck's other skills at cooking yet. Thirsty, Dave turned to the milkshake. It was a rich and surprisingly thick mixture that made the going tough but tasted wonderful at the same time. Despite beginning to feel full as the mixture already drunk settled inside with those juicy burgers and fries, Dave kept going. Picking up the third and final burger, Dave laboriously took another bite. It still tasted amazing and was pretty much the only thing that kept him going on. Puck eagerly watched as Dave forced bite after bite down, offering encouragement and cheering all the while.
