"Come on Karofsky, I know you can eat more than that. You're the man." "Think of how big and powerful it makes you feel. "Keep going almost there." Puck cheered as the last bit of meat fell in Karofsky's lips and down his gullet.

"You did it man! I knew you could." Dave groaned and leaned back on his stool, releasing a massive belch.
"UUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPP, yeah, whatevs," Dave said, his hands fumbling. Puck immediately stood up.

"Let me get that for you," Puck said moving over, his hands pushing away Dave's fumbling ones as he undid the buttons for him. The straining uniform jacket broke apart in a flash although it still somehow held both together. His hands resting on Dave's stomach, Puck's face took on a look of admiration.

"Can I?" he asked vaguely and Dave nodded. Puck grew even more excited as he started rubbing soothing circles on Dave's big and bloated belly. "How does that feel?" he asked. Dave opened his mouth to reply but another even more massive belch erupted. Chuckling, Puck continued rubbing.

"As I said," Puck said grinning. "I'm going to make you huge, you can count on it." Dave just sat there barely understanding in a food coma as Puck continued rubbing those wonderful motions that soothed his stuffed belly.
1113312111.title: First meal

11133121111.content:
Several hours had passed since Dave had finished his huge meal and he was happily passed out on the couch, his shirt pulled up and exposing his fuzzy, soft belly. Puck sighed as he sat down on the open cushion on the couch, watching Dave's belly rise and fall and he breathed. It took every fiber of Puck's being to keep himself from burying his face into the soft, squishy object of his affection. As Puck watches Dave's belly, Dave groaned a little before sitting up, rubbing his eye, "Hey, there sleepy bear." Puck said, a grin on his face.

"... Hey." Dave mumbled, letting out a loud yawn before scratching his belly, "Is there anything to eat?" He asked, his stomach grumbling softly.

"Now THAT'S what I like to hear. While you were asleep, " Puck said as he made his way to the kitchen, "I made you THIS." Puck turned around and showed Dave the massive chocolate cake he had made, "Chocolate chip chocolate cake with fudge icing and peanut butter filling! It's a specialty of mine."

Dave's eyes widened right away, licking his lips excitedly as Puck sat down next to him, cutting a gigantic slice from the cake, "I think you forgot the plate..." Dave said.

Puck laughed, "I didn't get one. You're a big bear, Dave, and you deserve to be fed like one." Puck pushed Dave against the couch's back before pulling off his shirt, revealing Dave's strong chest, arms, and soft belly, "So just sit back, relax, and let the Puckasaurus take care of everything." Puck brought the huge slice of cake up to Dave's mouth and Dave happily took a bear-sized bite of it. The amazing taste of multiple chocolates, fudge, and peanut was too much for Dave, who let out a groan of happiness before finishing the bite and moving on to the rest, devouring the cake in Puck's hand.

Puck made sure Dave didn't miss a bite constantly picking crumbs off his body and feeding them to him. Dave finished the first slice and Puck went back for seconds, which Dave happily devoured as well. As Dave ate, and whenever he wasn't picking up crumbs or globs of chocolate, Puck was rubbing Dave's belly happily.
11133121111.title: Belly rubs and cake.

111331211111.content:
"You really like doing that don't you?" Dave asked as Puck continued rubbing his belly.
"Yeah, I really love playing with it, big bellies in general." Puck traced a chocolate fudge trail before picking it back up and licking it. "Man I make good cakes," he complemented himself.

"Why are you helping me anyways?" Dave asked curiously and Puck shrugged.
"Mutual benefits and all that, and plus you're an old friend that's back to himself and not a horrible person. I must admit though, the thought of helping you get big is a major turn-on."
"If you say so." Dave was distracted by another piece of cake that Puck shoved into his mouth. "Mmm, this really is gooff cake." Puck cocked his head confused.
"What?"
"I said, 'this is really good cake.'" Puck nodded.

"Ah." He continued to rub Dave's big belly with one hand as he readied the next thick messy slice. This was going to require a lot of handwashing and he was going to have to get a new shirt since the old one was covered in stains but he had been planning to get new clothes soon anyhow. Getting to feed Dave like this was worth the mess, especially when he got to rub and feed that nice gut and have his fingers licked clean. He could even feel it get bigger and more solid with each big slice of cake thrown Dave's way. Suddenly Dave stopped eating with a groan.

"Ugh, I can't take anymore, it's too good. That peanut butter is really sticking to my mouth and that fudge and chocolate is so very very good but ugh...." Puck stopped rubbing for a second thinking on how to solve this.

"Be right back in a flash," he said as he exited to the kitchen. Dave only sat there for a few moments before Puck came back with that Puck grin on his face, carrying a bottle
"What is that?" Dave asked curious and rubbing frantically at his distraught tummy now that Puck had left it alone.

"Milk of course, what else does a growing bear need? Well besides fish which does give me an idea...but anyways, it is the best remover of stuck peanut butter and clearing out your dry throat from all that moist chocolatey fudgy peanut-buttery goodness."

"I think you're making up words," Dave said and Puck shrugged.
"Words, shcmords, this is beside the point and you're distracting me. The faster you drink, the sooner I can return to rubbing your tum."
"You'd like that wouldn't you?"
"Did you miss the part where I said I enjoy it? I'm not afraid to admit it. You enjoy it as well."
"Well..."
"Oi, just stop talking, we can do that afterwards," Puck said as he opened the bottle and grabbed Dave's head.

"Bottoms up," and started pouring it down Dave's throat. Dave sputtered a little but soon got the rhythm down, enjoying the feel of the cold refreshing milk slide down and also getting rid of lingering peanut butter, fudge, and chocolate. He even felt better as the milk filled him and Puck started to rub one-handed again, the other keeping the milk stable. Soon the milk flow slowed and then stopped and Dave opened his eyes to see Puck peering in.

"No more, milk's all gone. Think you could fit any more cake in that belly of yours Davie? There's just a few slices left." Dave rubbed his belly thoughtfully. He felt solid and full, probably more full than he's ever been before but the pain was gone at the moment and it would be a shame to waste that good cake.

"Sure, I guess I could fit in a few more slices," Dave said uncertainly but Puck just smiled and nodded.

"Right on, let's go for it." Puck gently and almost what seemed lovingly if Dave thought that he wasn't slightly imagining things since Puck didn't really ever do things like that, held the slices out and let Dave take nibbles out of them and lick the chocolate off his fingers and hands. Dave did like the feel of Puck's strong manly hands and fine fingers when licking them, not like his thick clumsy paws. It was kind of too bad Puck probably wasn't gay but merely had a size and belly fetish because he was so nice and awesome and Dave wouldn't mind dating that attractive man.

While licking fingers clean, Dave embarassingly whined a little when they pulled away and the magic hand on his belly disappeared as well. Opening his eyes he looked up at Puck who was still grinning that Dave was beginning to be a little freaked out since he couldn't ever remember Puck looking so happy, like a kid at christmas.

"What is it?" he asked and Puck's mouth lifted up even more.
"You finished it all," he said in wonder.
"All of what?" Dave asked confused.
"The cake," Puck said. Dave was about to respond when a massive rumble went through him and he gave a massive burp. And then another and a few more. Puck just broke down in hysterics laughing.
111331211111.title: Dave finishes the entire cake.

1113312111111.content:
"So how was it? Did I do good?" Puck asked later, sounding somewhat unsure of himself. Dave who had been taking a nap after that massive meal woke up wearily.
"Huh? What'd you say?" Dave asked, not quite sure if he had understood the question correctly.
"Did I do good?" Puck repeated concerned. Dave had understood but he was confused as to what Puck was referencing.
"What are you talking about Puck?"
"The meal. You enjoyed it...right? Wasn't too rough or cross a line?"
"Puckerman, I'm not sure what you're going on about but I most certainly did enjoy your food and if you don't believe that I will have to kick your ass. I LOVED it," Dave emphasized, grinning at the memory. "Probably the best food I've ever eaten." Puck looked relieved at that.

"Oh, good...sorry about that. I don't know what came over me. Just some self-doubt worried you might have hated it and only pretended to enjoy it or something, I don't even know. It's just...I've never told anyone I could cook before," Puck finished lamely.

"They're missing out, you're phenomenal," Dave said and Puck smiled brightly again like he had earlier. Reaching out, Puck jiggled Dave's belly, fascinated.Dave stood there awkwardly. It was both flattering and a bit disturbing Puck's like of his big belly. Puck was the first one after Dave who not only merely tolerated his gut but actually thought it was pretty cool. Manly, sexy, substantial, not words people generally thought of when it came to fat. But those were secret desires of Dave that nobody and oftentimes not even himself was consciously aware of and Puck was the one who brought them into the light.

"So, what do you want to do now?" Puck asked and Dave shrugged.
"Uh, I don't know really. Whatever is good with me." Puck glanced at Dave and Dave realized he was still shirtless when he caught Puck's grin and Dave made a move to cover himself. Puck reached out a hand to stop him.

"Don't. I got a certain idea in mind but it could be a bit messy so leave your shirt off. In fact..." Puck took off his own shirt and Dave flushed catching the sight of Puck's perfect body. Although he learned to like himself more and actually was beginning to be okay with his size for the most part, Dave still couldn't help but being overawed, jealous, and desirous of such smooth, tanned, flat skin that he wanted...Puck gave a wink at him and Dave flushed again, hoping Puck didn't know what it was he was thinking. No wonder everyone wanted Puck.

"What's this idea of yours?" Dave asked curiously. Puck grinned as seemingly out of nowhere a deck of cards appeared in his hands and he was shuffling through it really fast. Dave looked around startled, wondering where on earth those cards had come from while Puck just kept grinning as he shuffled.

"How..." Dave started before deciding he didn't want to know.
"Well, what are you thinking?"
"A game I made up just now," Puck said, still smiling as he shuffled. "Just a couple normal rounds of poker of course but the difference is in what the prize is. Instead of for money, the stakes are going to be cheesecake slices." Dave raised his eyebrows and Puck shrugged.

"I was a bit bored. Anyhow, the winner of each round feeds the loser a slice until the whole cheesecake is gone. Get it?" Puck asked.
"Yeah, makes sense although I do think you're at a slight disadvantage," Dave said. Puck shrugged. "A bit but we shall see. Ready?"
"Ready," Dave said as he and Puck both sat down at the table and Puck started dealing the first hand.
1113312111111.title: Playing games

choices: Snuggling in bed with Dave's belly, and Dave's gigantic breakfast the next day.
11133121111111.content:
As Dave picked up his cards, his mouth began to water at the thought of Puck feeding him cheesecake. Dave has an insanely huge love for cheesecake that he doesn't even bother trying to hide. As a chubby little kid, Dave would go down to one of the local bakeries and he would spend his allowance on an entire cheesecake, which he would sneak into his bedroom and eat while watching cartoons or power ranger re-runs. You could literally ask Dave to do ANYTHING for a cheesecake (he's even considered having sex with someone if it meant getting the delicious cake) and here Puck was, ready to shovel it into his throat. All Dave had to do was make sure that he lost as many rounds as possible.

For the next three hours Dave tried his best to lose every round of poker they played, but on some rounds Puck just didn't have good hands. The two of them played a total of 30 rounds: one round for each slice of cheesecake that was in Dave's fridge. In the end, Puck won 25 and Dave had won the other 5. A big grin spread across Puck's face, "Look like you're eating 25 slices!"

"Damn." Dave said, trying his best to sound upset, "I was hoping to win."
"Don't feel bad, big guy. Think of it this way; all of those delicious slices of cake are gonna help make you big and fat!" Puck said, excited. He got up and went to the fridge, pulling out the first cheesecake. He sat it down in front of Dave and sat next to him, picking up the first slice and holding it up to Dave's mouth, "Ope-" Before Puck could even finish, Dave had devoured half of the slice of cake, chewing happily. Seeing how excited Dave was to be eating this cheesecake, Puck quickly started stuffing each and every slice into Dave's mouth. Puck got up briefly to go get the other two cakes from the fridge, sitting back down and resuming watching Dave nearly inhale the cake he was given.

Eventually all 25 slices of cake were happily sitting in Dave's big, solid belly, which was being rubbed by Puck's large hand, "Excellent work, dude! I never knew you were such a beast for cheesecake."
Dave burped loudly before grinning, "Yeah... it's my favorite thing in the world to eat. You could literally get me to anything for it."
"Anything?" Puck asked.
"Yep!" Dave said, patting the side of his big belly.
"Okay... I know that I'm supposed to eat these, but... if I give you the last five slices of cheesecake, can I sleep with you?"
"wh-WHAT?" Dave asked, his face turning bright red at the thought.
"Not like that, you big goof ball. I mean sleep in the same bed as you. Tomorrow is Saturday, so I figured I could spend the night snuggled up against this big, sexy belly of yours."
Dave chuckled nervously, "Uhh.. yeah. If it means I can eat those last sli-." Dave was caught off guard when Puck shoved a slice of cheesecake into his mouth, and in under a minute, the last five slices joined the rest in Dave's big, fuzzy belly.
11133121111111.title: Dave Intentionally Loses.

111331211111111.content:
As soon as Puck was done, Dave let out a massive yawn. "Oof, man I'm tired. Those long games of poker and eating cheesecake wore me out." Struggling to get up, Dave felt Puck help him, one hand on his back and one under his belly as he pulled and Dave pushed up. Dave swayed on his feet a moment, his absolutely stuffed belly groaning in protest and sticking out farther than anything even he was used to. At the moment, he was so stuffed the sight of his gut was blocking the sight of his feet and his pants were strained on his massive thighs. All in all, if not for Puck, he couldn't have made it off the couch or walk to the bedroom where he sagged down onto the bed. Puck had a self-satisfied smirk on his face for some reason as he watched him.

"How you feeling Dave?" Puck asked, the snarky grin stretching.
"Stuffed. Absolutely mercilessly stuffed." Dave was too tired for anything but the truth. "Can you help me with my pants? They're beginning to hurt and I can't reach the clasp." Puck really smiled at that as he trailed his fingers down Dave's stomach, poking and prodding a bit as he searched causing Dave to hiss. Eventually Puck found it, managed to undue it and with a bit of struggle on both their ends managed to get the jeans off leaving Dave in just his underwear.

"That...that wasn't so hard," Puck said breathing heavily. "Just a little stuck."
"Y-yeah," Dave mumbled. "Least we didn't have to cut it off like you suggested." He remembered the hungry look in Puck's eyes when Puck suggested it and wondered.
"Least it's off now," Puck said staring. Dave leaned back his stomach arching and patted the space beside him.
"Well, I guess you could sleep here..." Dave said and trailed off because the moment he said that Puck jumped in right beside him. "Wow, that was fast."
"Lay down," Puck demand-requested as he moved his fingers over Dave's stomach again. Now that he was no longer hindered by his pants, it felt so much better. Yawning again he closed his eyes and relaxed to the feeling of Puck's calloused but gentle hands rubbed at his stomach.

Puck was enjoying himself as he rubbed Dave who had fallen asleep quickly. After the stuffings Dave had underwent it was no surprise at all that Dave was conked out. Dave had really eaten a lot. Puck suspected Dave threw some, if not all the games but he let it slide since he was more than happy to let Dave eat the cheesecake. Dave really was a beast and that excited Puck. He had always had inklings and desires to see people get bigger (among other things) but it took a while to realize what it was that he anticipated. Although dating Lauren Zizes was a mistake (who knew a girl that big would be such a bitch on almost the level of Quinn? At least he knew to expect Quinn to be one) he did learn a few valuable things. One was that although he did like girls he preferred the size and solidity of men who also made more sense and no wonder he liked Zizes since she was more man than anyone else even if she didn't have the equipment. At least, he hoped not though he wouldn't have been surprised if she did. The second was...he liked big people. No wonder he always fantasized and wondered about what if Finn put on a few extra pounds or Sam. Even Mike on occasion though that didn't fit as well into his image as Finn or Sam. Trouty mouth would look good stuffing those full lips full of food and he'd seen Finn eat.

But Dave...Dave was phenomenal. He'd have felt guilty if Dave had still been tormenting Kurt but since he wasn't and Dave was great, Puck really really was enjoying this. Dave played along so well and even encouraged it. He'd already been heavy but after the stuffings Puck put Dave through, Dave's belly was already straining. Getting off those pants had been a chore but admirable and a testament to what Dave had consumed. Puck seriously couldn't wait for the next day and what he could get Dave to eat then. Squeezing and rubbing his fingers, Puck felt Dave's massive stomach and smiled. It was solid and round, perfectly stuffed. Dave sure was one sexy furry bear. Suddenly, Puck yawned. He was pretty tired himself after those hours long poker matches, cooking and feeding, and then getting those blasted pants off Dave, he felt like he could sleep in for a real long while. Putting his head down on Dave's stomach, he sighed at the feeling. It was so big and comfy like a pillow. Closing his eyes, Puck planned what he was going to do for the next day's breakfast, drifting off into a restful sleep as he did so.
111331211111111.title: Snuggling

11133211.content: Which One Should He Put On?
11133211.title: Fat or Muscle

111332111.content:
'Shit! How did I let this happen? Hes gonna break up with me!!' Blaine was stressed. He had a huge test in History and it freaked him out, so he went to food to relieve his nerves, now two weeks later, the test was over but, Blaine had a souvenir from all his stress eating. His little belly and bigger ass. He could barley get into his pants this morning and though his ass looked good his belly was hanging a little.

"Hey Kurt." Blaine said as he walked up to him at his locker

"Hey sweetie!" Kurt said and as his eyes met Blaines, Blaine could tell something was up. Kurt's eyes were darker than before, "I have to go" he said hurriedly as he brushed past Blaine, and walked down the hall.

Blaine didn't see Kurt for the rest of the day and as he was walking out of the school he was grabbed from behind and pulled into a janitors closet. Before he could get out his protest, a pair of lips were on his, heatedly kissing him, Blaine realized from the smell of Lavender that it was Kurt, he quickly responded and wrapped his arms around him. Kurt did not keep his hands to himself though. He ran them all up and down Blaines body and under his cardigan feeling his newly acquired flesh and grabbed his wider ass and thighs. Once things cooled down Blaine was confused.

"Not that I don't appreciate the gesture but what was that for?"

"Blaine, I'm gonna be honest with you. I love you so much and this is really hard and embarrassing to say so please just hear me out." Kurt looked at Blaine with fear in his eyes,

"Baby, there is nothing that would make me stop loving you as much as I do." Blaine said and quickly pecked Kurt on his Lips.

"Okay, I'll just say it. I like the fact that you've gotten husky, in fact I absolutely love it. I would want to see you gain more weight, but I understand if you don't want to, sorry I know I'm a freak-"

"Hey! No, don't you dare. You are the love of my life and if this excites you then lets try it. I have missed you Kurt, we hang out sure, but we are teenagers I was starting to think you were gonna leave me." Blaine said solemnly

Kurt tilted Blaines Chin up and Pecked him, then that peck turned into another heated kiss.

"I have missed you too, and I'm sorry, I will never go that long without making you feel loved. Thank you for trying this, Lets go back to my place and talk some more. Kay?" Kurt said with a wink

"Kay" Blaine said smiling.
111332111.title: Fat

1113321111.content:
Blaine rolled his eyes as the usual fight between Santana and Rachel began. He crossed his legs and watched as disturbing words were thrown back and forth. Suddenly, Blaine felt a familiar buzz in his left back pocket. He rushed to grab his phone, fiddling around in his seat. For the past two weeks, Blaine had gained some pounds. After the incident with Kurt in the janitor's closet, Blaine started an interesting new diet. He could finally just relax and gorge in food. Sometimes he would have a massive eating frenzy. Blaine would watch his favorite TV shows and eat almost everything in his cabinets! All this new weight was hard for Blaine to get used to though. He was always in need of new clothes because his old ones just seemed to get too tight. There was a definite struggle when attempting to get his phone out. His pants felt a lot tighter that day, but he just didn't have the time to get new ones. Eventually, with a mighty tug, Blaine was able to get his phone out of his pocket. Of course, with all the force when pulling, the phone went flying. Blaine stood quickly and ran to his phone. He bent down as the room fell silent. Blaine could feel pressure on his knees as he squatted down for his phone. Without much thinking, he realized it was his stomach. When Blaine stood up and turned around to the crowd of his classmates, he saw they were all staring dead at his stomach. He felt so embarrassed! Blaine avoided making eye contact with anyone when taking his long journey back up to his seat.

" Wow Mr. Pretty Boy, what sort of show was that? " Santana crossed her arms and smirked as she looked Blaine up and down.

Blaine struggled to find his words and stared at the back end of the chair in front of him.

Rachel glared at Santana's rude comment. " Gosh Santana! Why do you have to be so mean to him?! We've all thrown our phones once or twice! "

Santana laughed, " Oh shut it, Hobbit. We all know that's not what he was trying to perform for us. "

Mr. Schue did his best to calm the two sassy ladies down. " Girls! Girls! Forget what just happened. We need a song to perform! "

" Don't even try to shush me Mr. Schue! " Santana pulled her middle finger out and continued to argue with Rachel.

Blaine looked around the room. Luckily everyone's focus was back on the song choice for this week. Blaine opened his phone and saw the culprit of all the buzzing. He had a text message from Kurt and a few missed calls.

"Hey Blaine ;) So.. I was thinking... Maybe we could spend lunch together? I can't wait to see you after not being at school...Anyways! Got any good ideas?"

Blaine smiled and began texting right away, "Well...u haven't missed much today :( just arguing. Can't remember the name but there's this great brger place somewhere near the school. if u know what im tlking bout thenn... see u there cutie! ;)"

A huge smile appeared on Blaine's face.

"You got a hot date or something?" Tina giggled and elbowed Blaine in the arm.

"Something like that." Blaine smirked and they continued to watch the argument.



Suddenly, the bell rang. Blaine shook his head, a bit shocked by the noise. He grabbed his things and got up. Of course, waiting at the door was Santana, the devil herself.

"W-What do you want Santana?"

Santana gave an evil smirk. "W-W-Well." She began mocking Blaine, "I think everyone saw your little performance. So what's with you? Are you like depressed or something? I mean come on Blaine, everyone knows."

Blaine wasn't used to people asking about his weight, "I-I-I don't know what you're talking about..."

"Oh shush it walrus, you're telling me tomorrow if you like it or not." She rolled her eyes and stomped away.

Blaine sighed and walked out of the classroom.




As Blaine was walking in the parking lot, he attempted to cover his stomach with his bag. Paranoid, he would look around, making sure no one was looking at him. He saw Kurt in the distant and smiled with glee. He ran to the best of his abilities. (A recent struggle Blaine had discovered.)

"Hey there bubble butt." Kurt blushed and began driving to the restaurant.
When they arrived at the restaurant, Kurt locked the doors. He stared at Blaine and had a serious look on his face. " Blaine. Honey, I want you to be okay with this. "

Blaine turned and made an awkward amount of eye contact with Kurt. " I love you so much, and I'd hate for you to be uncomfortable with yourself. I'd just kill myself if you started to dislike your own body! Oh god... I haven't even asked if you're com- "

Blaine cut Kurt off, "Kurt. I'm fine." He smiled, "I love you just as much and if you really want this, I'd love to do it!"

Kurt pecked Blaine's cheek and unlocked the door. They walked inside, holding hands of course, and grabbed a table in the corner.
Both just ordering water, they knew they had to choose an interesting meal. "Cheeseburger?" Blaine looked up at Kurt after a hard stare at his menu,
"We can do better than that!" Kurt responded and began to hunt for a larger meal. "Ah Ha!" Kurt threw down the menu and pointed at an item. "Triple Trouble. Basically a cheeseburger but, basically better." Kurt sat confidently knowing he found something that would grab Blaine's attention.

"I'LL TAKE IT!" Blaine shouted in between giggles.

The waitress walked up to the table. "What would you boys like to eat today.." She said with a dead look in her eyes. "We have a new item on our list," Her monotone voice was hard to understand, "It's called the Triple Trouble, and it's like really big." The waitress continued to talk about it. "It's like really really big. Oh my god, I can't even imagine how many calories it has." Blaine fiddled with his fingers. He was just too embarrassed to order, especially after her explanation of his order. Blaine looked up at Kurt. Blaine begged with his eyes, " oh please order for me " he mouthed to Kurt.
1113321111.title: Two Weeks Later

choices: Blaine has to find someone else
11133212.content:
Blaine was starting to get a weird vibe around Kurt. Recently it felt like there relationship was going a little...he didn't know, stiff or something. Kurt was his first boyfriend and he didn't have anything to compare too but he was beginning to get the impression that he and Kurt were drifting into that dreaded area known as the 'friend's zone' and he had no idea why. He was spending a lot of time with Rachel and had it not been for Kurt's rant about bisexuals and how it was just an excuse to get sex with everyone or something, he would have thought that Kurt was cheating on him with Rachel. Then again, Kurt might be, just not in the boyfriend way. They no longer had as much time together and when they did, Kurt seemed convinced that Blaine should always compliment him on everything, and complained when he didn't. He also complained when he did and Blaine was having trouble thinking of stuff to talk about that didn't have anything to do with show choir. So Blaine decided to ask the one person who knew more about relationships than anyone he knew. He went to Puck.

"Hi Puck," Blaine said and Puck looked up startled.
"Hey, uh, Blaine, what do you, um want?" Puck looked confused and Blaine didn't blame him. Outside of Glee club, Blaine didn't really associate with him. Actually, most people didn't which now that it was in his mind, was actually kind of sad. Blaine resolved to spend more time with the other members of Glee and not just Kurt but for now he had to ask.

"I got a question and I was curious, but...is Kurt still into me?" Puck looked a bit confused.
"Kurt? Are you guys having issues or something? As far as I can tell, he is still into you."
"Oh, because it might just be me but Kurt and I don't talk as much as we used to and he's always spending his time with Rachel and other people now. I just thought he might be losing interest or something." Puck looked Blaine over with a critical eye.

"You might be right about that. Has anyone told you you are a bit...bland?" Blaine was confused.
"Bland? What do you mean?"
"Well, Kurt is a girl-guy and therefore deep down has secret sexual fantasies with tall buff muscle dudes with or without long flowing hair. I'm sure you've had them." Blaine blinked.
"Um, no, not really. But that never really was my type." Puck nodded.
"Yeah. Your type is the young slender effeminate type, ie. Kurt. That's cool. But if you're right about Kurt becoming distant, he's probably finding himself no longer into you because you aren't a big macho male."
"But why would Kurt want that? He hates that," Blaine said really confused.

"One of the mysteries of the feminine mind is that they usually mean the opposite of what they say. When they say they're fine, it's usually that they're extremely pissed and will lash out the moment you do anything they view wrong. And Kurt is a female with a dick which is twice the trouble."

"So...what exactly are you saying?"
"Dude, you're puny and Kurt either subcomsciously or consciously realizes he needs a real man for complete satisfaction."
"You don't exactly hold back when dissing on someone do you?" Blaine muttered.
"Not at all."
"So um...what do I need to do?" Puck shrugged.
"You've got the personality, but you need the body to go along with it to win Kurt."
"So...I need to get buff?"
"Yes and no. Kurt seems to like guys with a bit of a gut as well."
"Huh?"
"He used to have a crush on Finn." Blaine thought about it.
"That's weird, they're step-brothers." Puck shrugged.
"It was freshman year and it was before Burt married Carole."

"Kay, so you're saying I need to get buff...and a gut? Are you sure?" Puck shrugged. "He didn't want a ride on the Puckerone and a little twink like him surely should have at least some sexual interest and he was interested in Finn. Ergo, Kurt is kinky and secretly digs big manly men with a belly like Dave Karofsky. The pieces all fit."

"Totally crude and unnecessary with detail but you actually make sense and it would explain why Kurt is starting to no longer be attracted to me. Thanks for the advice,"
"Your welcome," Puck said. Puck got up and started to leave before Blaine thought of something else.

"Hey, uh, this is awkward but uh, perhaps you can help me? Become a man and all I mean."
11133212.title: Distant Kurt

choices: Blaine continues to gorge on snacks
Puck finished dinner and stuffs Blaine

Meet me at my place after school and we'll get started!" Puck announced as he headed down the hall to class.

Blaine closed the door behind him and looked inside of the bag, seeing it was filled with cupcakes and cookies. Blaine, who did his best to hide his sweet tooth, didn't think twice as tore open the box of frosted cakes and started chowing down as Puck began dinner.

1113321212.content:
A clapping sound echoed as Puck put the last final touches of the meal and he noticed Blaine.
"Very good,very good. By the way dinner is ready." Puck nodded towards a chair. "You're going to really like this, I promise," Puck said as he sat down at the head of a table. Blaine took one look at the dish laid out and raised his eyebrow.

"Um, not to be rude or anything but...what exactly are those?" Blaine asked, pointing at the plates where strange objects lay.
"Spaghetti tacos, really good stuff," Puck said proudly. Blaine shook his head confused.
"But what exactly is a spaghetti taco?" Puck sighed.
"Exactly what it sounds like, spaghetti in taco shells, me, Finn, and Dave love them. I have no doubt you will as well."
"I don't get it, why would you put spaghetti in a taco? That doesn't make sense."
"Does it matter? Trust me, it will be fine, and I almost guarantee you love it so just put aside the skepticism for a little bit okay?"
"Well, if you say so," Blaine murmured and Puck nodded.

"Good, now please..." He gestured to the messy looking creation. Blaine picked it up carefully, only dropping a few noodles as he took a bite out of it. It tasted like spaghetti, clam sauce, meatsauce, salsa, and other things Blaine wasn't sure. Surprisingly it really was quite good although Blaine still did not understand the point of putting it in a taco shell since it was quite messy and spilling out.

"This is good," Blaine said as he took another bite. Puck smirked as he took a bite of his own taco.
"What did I tell you. Besides you don't have to eat it so slow, its spaghetti, really. Just finish off whatever falls afterwards with a fork, or your hands, whichever you prefer."
"I'm not a total animal thank you, I'll use the fork." Puck made a shrugging gesture, spilling some as he was taking a huge bite out of his.

They ate in silence a little longer as Puck doled out more tacos as they finished the ones they were eating. Blaine was amused that Puck had eaten two more tacos than he had already 4 to 2 but Puck was really into them. It was a good thing he switched to a shirt he didn't care about getting dirty because it was getting messy from sauce and noodle drippings. Blaine on the other hand ate slowly trying to spill as little as possible. He was going to do this but he didn't plan to become a slob along the way since one of the things Kurt hated most (after bullies and bad fashion) was careless and sloppy behavior. Not to mention, he was getting full. Puck who was beginning to slow down himself on his 5th taco looked over.

"Anderson, why did you stop already? You only had two tacos, don't you like them?"
"I do, but I'm kind of full and I had all those twinkies sweets before." Taking the last few bites, Puck finished his taco and with a bit of struggle got up. Blaine was a bit surprised to see the extent to which Puck's belly was distented out, especially since it was normally flat. Giving his belly a thwack, Puck let out a very long belch before sighing.

"-UUUUUUUUUURRRRPPP, that is good if I do say so." Moving over and reaching out to touch Blaine's belly before he even knew what was happening, Blaine just sat there as Puck rubbed it examingly.

"Nah, you're not that full yet, you definitely can have at least one more."
"I don't think I can." Blaine said. Puck rolled his eyes again.

"Trust me, you can. I'll even help you." Blaine made noises of protest which Puck ignored as he quickly shoved falling spaghetti taco into his mouth forcing Blaine to bite down. When Blaine's mouth was free and he opened his mouth to complain, Puck did it again. After a few cycles of this, Blaine tried to keep his mouth shut but Puck pinched his nose until he was forced to open his mouth, keeping him trapped beneath his other heavy arm. Resigned, Blaine no longer shut his mouth and opened obediently as Puck fed him bite by bite. After what felt like forever, Blaine was surprised to find no more taco.

"You did it," Puck said grinning. Blaine was by this point exhausted and he weakly growled before giving out a pretty big burp of his own.
"*uck you" Blaine muttered and Puck shrugged as he reached out.
"I'll help with that."
1113321212.title: Puck finished dinner and stuffs Blaine

choices: Blaine eats all 12 cupcakes and Puck surprised him with a huge milkshake.
11133212121.content:
It was normal day at McKinley High for Blaine Anderson: he arrived at school with a half hour to spare, he hung out with his friends and boyfriend before class, and when the bell rang, he happily attended his classes. However, something abnormal was happening to Blaine today; he was being stared at. Not the normal stares he gets from the very dapper way he dresses, but for what was beginning to show underneath his clothing.

For the last month Blaine had been purposefully getting fatter in order to impress Kurt, who he was certain was bored of him, and Puck has been helping him. As Blaine walked down the hall, he could feels eyes zeroing in on his bigger body beneath his super tight clothing: He had yet to start putting weight on in his face, but Blaine had begun developing small moobs and a very round, obvious belly that made his button up shirt look tight. He had small love handles and his thighs had thickened out, but it was his butt where his gain was the most obvious. His jeans were skin tight and his butt had a little jiggle in it when he walked. He finally reached his locker and was getting books out when he felt a hard smack on his much larger ass, "AAH!" Blaine turned around and saw Puck, who has a grin on his face.

"Ugh, Noah. Could you not do that?" Blaine asked.
Puck shrugged, "You know the rules, Anderson. If you want me to help get you get big and fat, I get to play and grope whatever I want. You agreed to it."
Blaine groaned, "Yeah, fat and muscular. All you've done is had me put weight on. When am I gonna start hitting the gym?"
Puck smiled, "Soon, buddy. No worries. In the mean time, here." Puck handed Blaine a box of cupcakes from a local bakery, "I brought you lunch!"

Blaine sighed, "Thanks." He grabbed the last book he needed, took the cupcakes, and followed Puck to the cafeteria for lunch.
11133212121.title: A Month of Gaining = A Fatter Blaine.

choices: After lunch Puck sneaks Blaine into the cafiteria to eat leftover lunch.

Blaine and Puck walked into the cafeteria and once again Blaine found his new found belly the object of everyone's stares. Although at first he was embarrassed about it, Blaine was beginning to realize that if everyone else was so interested in his new wight gain the Kurt would be bound to take interest! He started to walk with a pep in his step, now proud of the jiggle that his belly and but were displaying.

"You seem happier for some reason." Puck said.

"I just realized that everyone is staring at me, and that means they're interested and that more than likely Kurt will be to!" Blaine replied.

"Thats the spirit!" Puck chimed as he gave Blaine's belly a little pat pleased with the bounce and softness there.

Blaine and Puck went and sat down at a table in the back where they knew that they wouldn't be disturbed. Although Blaine's clothes were the same size, he was not! When he sat down down his fat gut pressed outward forcing his buttons to there limit, as his fat love handles hung over the side of his jeans. Looking down Blaine grabbed each of his love handles and used them to shake his fat belly. It sloshed and jiggled around inside his tight shirt and the growled in hunger.

"Looks like you're getting used to eating more!" Puck exclaimed "And starting to like that belly"

"Ya know Puck" Blaine replied "I think we can forget about the muscle, I feel like Kurt would just love to squeeze my big fat gut!"

"Hey its whatever the customer wants!"

Blaine then dug into the 12 cupcakes with gusto! Basically eating each one whole in a single bite! After that Puck pulled out a huge milkshake which Blaine happily gobbled down excited to fill his fat belly and give Kurt something new about him to be excited about!

As Blaine finished of the milkshake he patted his belly and turned to Puck and asked

"Is that all you got?!"
