choices: Kurts back and he and Blaine are supposed to go out and Blaine is pushing 200!
A week of gaining with Puck.
1113321212111.content:
"I'm so excited you're excited about eating!" Puck exclaimed "Look lunch is almost over we'll sneak in the back and fill this tank up!"

As soon as lunch ended Puck and Blaine hurried towards the kitchen, Puck looked on happily as Blaines belly and but shook and jiggled with every step he took. The way his belly bounced and jiggled like a huge jelly filled beach ball was awesome! He was so happy his friend was happy with his fat. As the entered the kitchen Blaine and puck headed over to the freezer where they kept the deserts. Inside was what Blaine could only describe as heaven tones of cookies, cakes, oreo's, and ice cream! It was Friday so the kitchen also had about four left over extra large Pizzas!

All for me......Blaine thought!

So Blaine just dug right in! Eating the Pizza first, he didn't want to ruin his shirt so he took it off and let his fat belly be free it wobbled and jiggled as he sat down and his moobs laid on top of his fat belly as his love handles pouched over the edge of his jeans.

After he cleared out all of the leftover food in the cafeteria he was stuffed! His belly looked humongous! He must have eaten enough food for 7 people and it all showed in has expanded fat gut. Blaine patted it as it rested in his lap and listened to the gurgles as he digested his meal.

"Wow Blaine! Thaw was some eating!" Puck said.

"I know" Blaine replied "I'm so......BURRRRRP! full"

Puck laughed "Okay buddy lets get you weighed there's a scale over in that corner"

Puck helped Blaine to his feet and was in enjoyment as Blaine nearly fell over from his new center of gravity. As Blaine wobbled over to the scale Puck thought.

"He was 145 when we started and up 25 pounds to 170 this morning......but after that meal...."

Blaine stepped on the scale and watched in glee is it rose to 177!

"Seven pounds in one sitting! that's awesome!!" He screamed!

"Dude it is!" Puck replied as he gave Blaines huge fat belly a slap and watched as it jiggled and sloshed around. Blaine then patted it and said Kurt is going to be so excited when he gets back from vacation next week"
1113321212111.title: After lunch Puck sneaks Blaine into the cafiter...

choices: Kurt Plays With Blaines New Belly
Kurt Knows He need to feed Blaine.
11133212121111.content:
Blaine heard a growling as he woke up that morning, as he looked down at his belly which was blocking the view of his feet he realized that last week since his cafeteria gorge with Puck his belly and its seemingly never ending hunger is what woke him up in the morning. He slowly rose from bed, he'd been practically eating non stop the past week and it was beginning to become obvious. His belly was now gigantic! It was a perfectly fat ball gut that his moobs rested on, and his love handles flowed from. He now only slept in shorts that belonged to his older brother and even they were having trouble containing his monster belly. He patted it and watched it jiggle lightly with each pat then angrily give another grown demanding to be filled with food.

"Okay" Blaine chuckled "Lets eat! But first lets weigh in!"

Blaine slowly carried his fat ball belly to his bathroom watching as it jiggled and wobbled with every step he took, he heard his scale creak as he stepped on it and leaning forward slightly to look over his fat gut watched as the dial clicked up fast before stopping right before 200.

"197!" Blaine exclaimed "That's another 20 pounds!!!"

Blaine grabbed his love handles and shook his gargantua gut and let it shake and wobble.

"We're pushing 200!"

Just then Blaine looked at the clock, it was noon! he slept in and Kurt would be here soon! He ran back into his bedroom to get dressed his gut growling as it realized it would not be fed now. Blaine had become really fat, however he'd yet to buy new clothes. So as he grabbed a pair of skinny jeans and a button up shirt he realized how much he needed to go shopping.

"Lets just get this over with" He mumbled

He pulled the jeans over his ankles and they stopped instantly at his butt. He laid down on his pulled and pulled with all his might as his belly resisted and jiggled as he stuffed his now huge 197 pound body into his 145 pound clothes. He could barley breath once he got them up. They were no where near ready to button, that was later. Then he slipped on his shirt and was ready for the real task at hand.

Buttoning his clothes.

Blaine down and looked as his belly pooched out his jean button was four inches away from the hole.

"Lets do this." He said with determination.

Blaine took one might breath and sucked in every part of his body with all his might. After a bit of struggling he managed to button all of his buttons. They looked like they were ready to burst and he knew the moment he let his breath out he was toast. Then a thought occurred to him.

'Maybe that's just the way I'll introduce my new girth to Kurt....."

Just then the doorbell rang. Blaine mad his way slowly to the door, right before he opened it he thought.

"Here goes nothing....hope Kurt likes the new me!"

He opened the door, and Kurt turned around and his face was unreadable at the sight of his new immense boyfriend.

Then Blaine let it all go. He breathed out.

His belly and ass filled every space available in his tight clothing at once, and it couldn't hold the strain. Kurt looked on as the seam on the side of Blaine's shirt ripped. He looked on as Blaine's jean and shirt buttons exploded off of him bouncing off the walls. He looked on as Blaine's fat gut spilled out pf his shirt and bounce and jiggled around happy to be free. He looked at Blaine's plump love handles hung off his sides and as his fat belly round and full of stretch marks with a deep belly button slowly came to a rest hanging deep over his pants.

Then Blaine's belly let out an immense growl.

Blaine looked on scared what Kurt would say.

Then Kurt reached forward and smiled and started to rub Blaine's belly.

"I think you're hungry" Kurt said.

Blaine smiled and said "Yea I am!"
11133212121111.title: Kurts back and he and Blaine are supposed to go...

choices: After Breakfast Blaine suggest they go out for lunch!
111332121211112.content:
"We need to get you some food now!" Kurt exclaimed.

Kurt pushed Blaine from behind into Blaine's kitchen relishing in how soft his back was Kurt's hands slid down to Blaine's fat plump love handles. Kurt loved the feeling of them and couldn't believe how much weight Blaine managed to put on in such a short time. After guiding him to a chair Kurt sat Blaine down watching as his belly bounced and wobbled before resting in his lap. In his lap it looked so much bigger, spread out and heavy. Kurt just couldn't wait to make it even fatter and heavier.

The Blaine's belly gave out another huge rumble.

"Wow you really are hungry!" Kurt said as he patted Blaine's belly watching it jiggle.

"Yea I am! Its use to being fed big these days!" giving it a few pats himself.

"Well lets not let it wait any longer!" Kurt smiled.

Kurt walked to the fridge and dug through for a while before emerging with a tub of ice cream.

"Here! You start on this while I cook up some breakfast!" Kurt said, "A tub for my big tubby guy!'

Blaine started to dig into the ice cream as he watched Kurt begin to make breakfast, with a smile on his face, he was so happy that Kurt was happy. He looked down at his giant belly thinking of the time when he barley had one. He was so thankful to Puck that he was able to help him make turn himself into a big fat flabby guy that Kurt loved. Blaine leaned back in his chair and realized that when he did that he couldn't even see his feet! His rounded soft belly with its deep belly button blocked it from view. Pushing 200 Blaine was proud of his gut which had managed to pulverize and outfit, so he couldn't wait to fell up on breakfast so Kurt could do some exploring.

Before Blaine knew it, Kurt was down and he had out done himself. Stacks of pancakes and waffles, accompanied eggs of every style and a giant plate of sausage!

"Eat up!" Kurt said as he gave Blaine's belly a smack and watched it jiggle. "After breakfast I want us to go show the world my new plump boyfriend!"

Blaine picked up his fork as his belly gave another roar, one that seemed to shake the windows, and said..

'It'll be my pleasure!"
111332121211112.title: Kurt Knows He need to feed Blaine.

choices: Jake arrives at Puck's house and meet's Puck's 325 pound boyfriend, Dave.
11133221.content:
"Another fight!" Will Schuester's voice yelled, echoing down the now empty school halls. He had broken up a would-be fight between Jake Puckerman, who was sitting in the choir room, and a member of the WWHS football team after school. Will was standing at the white board, his arms crossed and a scowl on his face, "Jake, you NEED to learn some restraint!"
Jake rolled his eyes, "Are you kidding me? That guy was totally asking for it!"
"I don't care," Will said, "Violence is NEVER the answer!"
"And what are you gonna do, keep me here until Puck gets here so we can have another pep-talk?"

"He doesn't have to." A voice said from the door. Both Will and Jake looked to see Noah Puckerman standing there, his arms crossed over his chest, but something was different about him. He seemed bigger. Jake noticed that Puck's neck looked thicker, his shoulders bigger and broader, and his biceps were straining the sleeves of his t-shirt. But what really surprised Jake was the small belly that Puck had developed. It curved out nicely from under Puck's much bigger pecs and his shirt clung tightly to it.
"Puck, is that you? What happened? You're huge!"
Puck smirked as he walked in, "Yeah, I know."
Will chimed in, "I called Puck yesterday after I saw you almost punch the guy you actually DID punch today."
"And?" Jake said.
"And, I'm here to help you get control of your anger." Puck said.
"And how are you planning on doing that?" Jake said.

"Easy." Puck said, reaching down and pulling of his t-shirt, revealing his muscular body and round, tight belly. He gave his belly a few hard pats, "With this!"
"... What?" Jake said.
"I hired Puck to help you get over your anger issues and he said the best way to do it was to fatten you up." Will said.
"WHAT?!" Jake yelled, confused.
"Dude, relax! It won't be ALL fat. You'll get huge muscles too, like your big bro!" Puck flexed one huge arm.
"No! I am NOT getting fat!" Jake said, angry.
"Jake," Will said, "Either you go with your older brother and fatten up or you're out of the Glee club." Will said, a serious look in his eyes.
Jake glared at his teacher for a minute, sighed, and looked down, "Fine."

Puck grinned, "Awesome!"
Will smiled, "Good. Now. I already talked to your mom about it. You'll be moving in with Puck and his boyfriend until you learn to control your anger. She moved all your things in today during school and I'll be paying for all of your expenses."
"You'll channel all of your anger into eating and lifting! As long as you do that, you won't get angry. Let's get going, little bro!" Puck said.
Jake grabbed his bag and followed Puck to his truck, heading off to his older brother's house.
11133221.title: Anger Managment.

choices: Eating lunch with Dave and Puck
111332211.content:
"He was asking for it," Jake grumbled under his breath while Puck drove. Puck sat in the front seat and lifted the mirror to look back.
"No doubt probably. What'd he do?"
"Insulted the glee club...and my mom." Puck winced as Jake shifted, looking away.
"I don't blame you bro. I would have hit someone as well if they go that far."
"Then what's this about fixing my attitude?" Jake yellled.
"Because you're angry and unstable and lash out uncontrollably with a bad attitude and you're dying inside..." Puck murmured. "I know what's it's like to drown on the indside. But people helped me and I'm going to help you.

"It still sounds like a bizarre method of doing so," Jake said. "And I don't need any help, I'm just fine."
"That's exactly why you do need help Jake. It's not fine and I don't want you to make the same mistakes I did. Also, I was lucky. It could have been a lot worse had it not been for the help of others."

"If you're going to give a sermon about the power of friendship. Please don't."
"Relax," Puck said laughing. "I wasn't going too. Even though everything that could be said for friendship is true, that would not particularly help you since you'd ignore and really, I'd ingore it too."

"Glad you see that. You haven't become a total pansy."
"True, although I'm not the one who is a pansy," Puck smirked.
"Why you-!"
"Relax, I'm not insulting you."
"Sure sounds like it," Jake said pissed.
"No, it's just a personal growth thing and I'm going to help you with that." Puck said grinning.
"Yeah, it's weird. I'm a bit confused on what you were selling to Mr. Schuester."
"That training your mind and body can help you focus and relax and maintain control so you don't lash out inappropiately."
"I do not lash out inappropiately."
"Short fuse, although in your favor you're already starting off better than me," Puck said.
"Really?"
"Yeah, at least you generally have reason enough to hit people who marginally deserve it. Freshmen year...I admit it, I was a bully and went after some for no other reason that it sickened me to look at them, that they thought they were so superior."

"They did deserve it then," Jake said.
"No, I thought they thought they were superior. And they did, but they had issues of their own besides me and taught me stuff I did not know about myself. I hated who I was and was trying to erase it by becoming somebody different."

"I really admired you growing up, but then you went to juvie, especially over something that stupid. How could you do that?" Jake asked because he always had wondered.
"I was drunk, high, sick of life, desperate, trying to buy my baby girl back...honestly, I don't even know. I can hardly remember myself now. Because really, it was just stupid.
"How does this at all relate to what we're doing now?" Jake asked now really confused.
"It's a technique I found afterwards to be successful since you channel all the negative energy and sorrows into something else. And I know you and I love being big guys."

"Yeah, you've gotten...big," Jake said sarcastically although Puck smirked when he sensed the slightest bit of admiration.
"It's awesome. At first it was unintentional but then I found I liked it and I know you will too."
"Yes, because I want to be a fat bastard."
"Trust me, it really does help. Changing the topic quickly, we've almost arrived at my boyfriend's house who we're going to meet."
"Boyfriend? Since when did you have a boyfriend or play for that team?"
"Since the end of senior year and I've always been interested in both. Puckasaurus believes in equal opportunities. It's just that you know in this town it's not exactly encouraged and makes it hard to find anybody who would be brave enough to admit to it. I've taken a break from girls since they're all crazy."

"What about Beth?" Jake asked and winced as a look of extreme pain crossed Puck's face. "Beth...Shelby took her away for a bit and she hasn't let me see her. Dave, working out, and feeding are the only things that have been keeping me sane."

"Feeding?" Jake asked confused.
"Huh?" Puck snapped out of it.
"You said feeding." Jake said pushing.
"Oh...its a....thing...where you know...you feed people...and stuff."
"I don't get it," Jake said even more confused.
"Trust me, you will," Puck muttered. "Well, here we are."
"By the way, who is Dave again?" Jake said, looking around, astonished by the size of the house they were out front of.
"My non-literal bro, boyfriend, huggle bear, puppy..."
"I can't believe you just said huggle bear." Jake made a gagging motion.
"Well, he is," Puck said laughing."
"Well, fucking rich should be added," Jake muttered looking at the house. "This place is huge."
"Yeah, Dave's dad is a very successful lawyer."
"Must be, I know lawyers and most of them aren't nearly so well-off." Jake said.
"How would you know," Puck asked threateningly.
"Just a bit of vandalism and mischief. I got off easy though."
"Feel like sharing?" Puck asked.
"Nah, not really," Jake replied. "So are we going in or what?" Puck started to go up to push the doorbell when the door slammed open and a big blur moved out tackling Puck to the ground. Jake watched in horror as some big guy ravaged his brother with kisses and just when he was about to open his mouth and scream for help, Puck pushed the guy off and laughed.

"Hey Dave, I missed you too. I brought someone here with me though."
"Oh hi," Dave said standing up. "I'm Dave, Dave Karofsky. And you are..." he said trailing off. Jake's mouth had opened wide and all thought had fled his mind as he stood there staring. Puck had to snap his fingers in front of Jake's face a few times before Jake's attention was brought back.

"Huh?" Jake asked confused.
"You were spacing out." Puck said. Jake looked again at the big guy in front of him. If he thought Puck was big, this guy dwarfed him. He was absolutely massive, the shirt stretched tightly across a wide expanse of stomach but very powerfully built with huge arms and chest that made it clear this wasn't a lazy slug by any means. He almost got caught getting lost again before there was a coughing noise and a grin came across the guy's face.

"Oh, you're Puck's brother Jake? Welcome! So rude of me, why don't you two come in?" Puck steered Jake behind Dave into a massive living room. "I was making some lunch and if you guys hadn't already eaten maybe you'd like some?" Puck licked his lips and grined.

"Oh yeah, that would be delightful.
111332211.title: Jake arrives at Puck's house and meet's...

1113322111.content:
Jake followed Puck and Dave into the house. "Damn this place is a mansion," Jake said looking around the widespacious hall and living room.
"Not really," Dave said shrugging. "For example the Fabreys and Sugar Mattas are richer."
"Well, it's bigger than my house anyways so I consider it so." Jake said.
"What did you make for lunch?" Puck asked eagerly and Dave grinned as he looped his hand around Puck's waist.
"One of your favorites, linguini and clam sauce and chocolate cream pie." Puck smiled brighter as he rubbed his gut.

"Oh man, that is totally awesome. I could eat your pie forever." Jake hoped that the oochie-coochie stuff would stop before he began barfing. What the hell happened to his brother, half-brother...whatever. The point was what the heck? Puck and Dave headed to the kitchen and Puck sat down as Dave brought over a big pot.

"Come and sit down Jake, the more the merrier!" Dave chortled. Jake almost took off there but before he could move his brother stopped him with a harsh look and made to get up. Sighing and rolling his eyes Jake sat down at the table.

"My god I've been surrounded by elves, he muttered." Dave looked confused and Puck raised an eyebrow. Jake made a face back which caused Puck to burst out laughing and Dave joined in not wanting to be left out. When they stopped laughing he stopped and looked around at them.

"What was so funny?" he asked. Jake and Puck looked at each other before bursting out into laughter again. Dave just smiled confused as they laughed a bit longer before quieting down.

"N-nothing," Jake said grinning. "Nothing at all."
"Yeah," Puck said. "Nothing at all."
"You're not going to tell me?" Dave pouted.
"Nope, and the puppy-dog face isn't going to work either," Puck said when Dave started to do it.
"Darn, you guys are no fun," he muttered. Puck smiled a bit before kissing Dave quickly. Jake made a disgruntled noise.
"What?" Puck asked coming sitting back. "Part of the lesson is getting used to guys kissing guys."
"No, its not that, it's that you guys have to do it in front of me." Puck grinned.
"Oh that, that was nothing. If you want to see real activity wait till me and Dave do..."
"Lalalalalala not listening!" Jake shouted putting his fingers in his ears. Dave snorted.
"Puck really? This is your brother? Then again it makes sense."
"F-you Dave," Puck said angrily.
"I'd love to later. But for now let's try to not traumatize our new guest," Dave said.
"Oh, uh yeah. I said that first." Puck said looking justified which Dave rolled his eyes.
"Whatever, let's just get Jake back. Yo, Jake!" Dave pulled Jake's arms out and Jake looked around.
"Is it over?" he asked.
"Yes, it never even started." Dave said thumping Jake on the back.
"I can't believe you freaked out like that," Puck said smirking. "Have you ever even slept with a girl or guy?" Jake's face burned.
"Uh...er...that's not fair, you know the answer." Puck settled back looking smug.
"That's why you got me to help you."
"No it isn't."
"Added benefit helping my baby brother."
"You suck."
"Ignoring you," Puck said cheekily.
"I regret every fantasy I ever have of two Puck's, one is more than enough," Dave muttered and both Jake and Puck hit him on the shoulder and stomach. "I rest my case," Dave wheezed a moment before getting up.

"So lunch," Puck said as he sat back down. "I'm starved."
"You're worse than me," Dave said. Puck opened his mouth to argue before shutting it and shrugging.
"That's true because you cook way better and can make stuff whenever you want it unlike me. I simply love your cooking," Puck said reaching out for Dave's hand. Dave let him grab it for a moment before pulling away.

"Pretty words. Anyways, what about our guest?" Dave said looking at Jake.
"What about him? He's eating the same thing we are." Puck said.
"He eats first." Dave said sternly.
"Oh alright fair enough." Puck picked up a plate and filled it up with pasta. "It's a good thing we he have extra."
"You sound so thrilled," Jake said wryly. Puck shrugged.
"I'm hungry right now, otherwise I would enjoy this."
"He'll get happy soon enough," Dave sad. "He always does feeding."
"Shush you," Puck said jokingly as he did begin to smile as he ladled up a spoonful and brought it up to Jake's mouth.
"What are you doing?" Jake asked confused.
"Feeding you of course. It is so much easier when your mouth is open."
"Man you're weird," Jake said.
"Open up!" Puck yelled and Jake the slightest bit intimidated did so.
1113322111.title: Before Lunch

choices: Jake joins Puck for some weight lifting.
11133221111.content:
Jake opened wide as Puck pushed the first fork-full of pasta into his mouth. Jake easily went from shock, because of how good it tastes, to eagerly waiting for more. Puck grinned, "Yep, I knew he'd like it." and started feeding his baby brother more and more. As soon as the first plate was gone, Jake watched happily as Dave filled it up again and Puck went right back to work feeding him.

This continued for about an hour, and after four more plates, Jake couldn't eat another bite, "Ugh... no more... I'm too full.."
Puck chuckled, "I remember when I was your size. Getting full of just a few plates." Puck patted his own belly proudly and looked over to Dave, "Is OUR food almost done, Dave?"
"Almost." Dave said, cooking up a storm in the kitchen.
Puck cracked his knuckles and placed them on Jake's bloated belly, rubbing it happily for him, "How's that, bro? Feeling better?"
"Ugh... yeah, a lot better. Thanks.. Puck." Jake leaned his head back and let out a belch as Puck worked his belly over. It wasn't long before Puck's amazing message lulled Jake into a bloated, blissful sleep.

Jake woke up a few hours later, his belly still bloated but not in pain, and realized he was in the front room. Puck or Dave must have carried him in here and let him sleep on the couch. Jake stood up and walked into the kitchen where he smelled someone cooking an amazing country dinner. His stomach, despite how full it was, growled at the idea of such tasty food, "Smells good."

"Thanks," Dave said, smiling back at Jake as he walked in, "How did you sleep?"
"Amazing. Where's Puck at?"
"He's down stairs in the basement, working out. You should join him, lifting is part of this whole thing after all."
11133221111.title: Feeding his baby bro.

choices: So much good food to eat
111332211111.content:
After getting directions from Dave where to go, Jake went to the basement door down the hall and opened it. He followed the steps down to where some loud pumping music was playing and he immediately started humming along before he realized what was playing which was that gagnam style song which caused him to grin even wider as he wasn't aware that Puck even liked this song. Then again, it was about a certain kind of woman so it really wasn't. Entering the basement complex, Jake whistled. Like the rest of the house it was enormous and he wondered again just how much money Dave and/or his father had because this was...wow. Turning to the right where the sound was strongest, he saw a complete home workout gym with benches, bars, weights, and everything. Puck was working at the benchpress for the moment, caught in the moment as he listened to the music as he did reps.

Jake watched as Puck did flawless rep after flawless rep, his massive chest flexing tightening and releasing as he moved the weighted bar up and down. After quick calculation, Jake was stunned to realize that Puck was doing 300 lbs as easy as a warm up set. He wondered what Puck's max was then as his was pushing about 200 max, 205 his best on a real good day and his brother was doing 300 about as easy as breathing. The sound of metal clanking back on the rack was heard and Puck opened his eyes and saw Jake standing there. Grinning, he got up.

"Hey little bro, I thought someone was watching but it could have been Dave which happens now and again. Did you like what you see?" Jake nodded speechless for a moment and seeing that, Puck smirked then smiled.

"It's cool," Puck ran a towel down the bench. "All yours or if you want to do another one, that's good too." He briefly reached into his pocket for a remote clicking a few times as the volume of the hidden speakers dropped. "If that was bothering you, I like listening to music but if you don't..."

"No its fine," Jake said, scanning the room again.
"So where do you want to start?" Puck asked. Jake thought a moment before shrugging. He wasn't in the mood for bench right now nor was he going to tell that he got slightly intimidated following Puck on it since he couldn't do nearly as much. Puck would eventually see sometime he hoped he would have improved a bit before then.

"Maybe bicep curls," Jake said heading to the free weights, Puck behind him.
"Hmm good choice, I'll be doing squats." He pulled out the remote and clicked the volume back up, bobbing his head in time as he strapped on the belt stabilizer and in the protective box as he stood under a really loaded bar that he took against his shoulders and began his workout.

Using free weights, 20 lb dumbells that Jake was sure Puck and Dave lifted like nothing, he counted out reps mentally listening to the pounding drum music as he watched his brother Puck do such weight that he thought impossible except for world champion type people (and people with superstrength), not people like his brother. That wasn't a knock-off but yeah, his old old brother would never have been able to lift such a heavy bar. But now...now he did and Jake watched in amazement and admiration as his brother squatted up and down with over 500 lbs of heavy weight. The wider added booty of Puck's added more weight distribution as he went down so that the bar didn't push to the side and try to crush him as he went down and the massive back provided a nice resting spot. Jake felt kind of gay examining his brother so closely but it wasn't that so much as a kind of pride and admiration. His big brother was so strong and massive! He always wanted a brother, being a single kid got kind of lonely so he was glad when he discovered Puck a year and a half back. Puck was big then and continued growing and right now was this massive stud before him still striving to get bigger as he lifted such heavy weights. The amazing thing was he didn't feel angry or jealous about it (well, a little jealous to be sure but not overwhelmingly so). Puck was right that the rythm of music and movement of muscles created a relaxed atmosphere and he wished he had that all the time at school as well. If he got big like Puck, even just a fraction, the school's douchebags wouldn't touch him either, something else to look forward to.

They continued working out until heavy footsteps announced the arrival of Dave who waited a moment for Puck to finish his deadlifts which he had moved to before coming over and kissing him.

"How's my muscleman doing?" Dave asked and Puck grinned as he flexed as Dave felt. Jake raised his eyebrows from over at the leg machines as he watched. He was going to really have to get used to the displays of affection because while he didn't mind, it was unnerving to see his brother act almost like a giggly girl with a crush but it was better than some of the others. Maybe he should find someone so he didn't have to keep from yakking when he saw Puck and Dave get friendly since Dave was patting Puck down in places...

"Uh hi!" Jake said. "What are you doing here Dave?" Puck shot Jake a quick glare as he moved back and Dave blushed.
"Uh, it's time for dinner so if you guys want anything..." Puck was racing up the stairs the moment dinner was said.
"Come on guys, let's eat!" Dave shrugged and looked at Jake.
"You coming?" Dave asked looking at Jake. Jake's gut agreed because at that moment it rumbled, causing him to blush.
"Uh yeah, kind of hungry after exercise."
"Of course you are, now come." Dave said as he followed up the stairs. Jake followed behind them and when he got to the table groaned.
111332211111.title: Jake joins Puck for some weight lifting.

choices: Dave offers Jake an entire apple pie and they talk about their weights.
1113322111111.content:
Jake had thought that his lunch was big but CLEARLY he had never seen a full dinner cooked by Dave Karofsky. The dinner table was covered in so much food that it looked like it was close to over flowing. Two of the biggest fully cooked turkies, one of which Dave had deep friend, that Jake had ever seen were in the center of the table. Surrounding the two massive birds were gigantic tubs of mashed potatoes and gravy, corn bread, several piles of chicken friend chicken, and candied yams covered in marshmellows. Dave had somehow cooked an entire country thanksgiving meal in the time it took Dave and Jake to workout. "How did you..." Jake started, but decided to just not bother asking.

Jake noticed that there wasn't a single vegetable on the table with the exception of the yams, but those were covered in sugar, cinnamon, and marshmellows. He was going to have to get used to this lifestyle. Puck patted his baby bro's back, "Don't look so scared, Jakey. Here's the plan. All three of us will sit down for a lovely meal and we'll eat. You'll eat until you're full and then I'll come sit next to you and shovel more food into this growing baby gut you have." Puck said, poking his little brother's already growing stomach, "Then, once you've on the verge of exploding, you'll go to sleep for the night in your new bedroom and Davey here," Puck said, lifting his boyfriend's shirt and revealing his enourmas, doughy belly, "Will eat whatever is left on the table. Sound good?"

Jake just stood there, staring at the size and softness of Dave's belly, and how it hung over his waistband, and admittedly loved how it looked compared to the rock solid shape of his brother's belly. He wanted to reach out and touch it, to feel his hands sink into the fleshy belly of Dave's 325 pound frame, and Puck noticed this and grinned, "Maybe one day you'll have a belly as glorious and big as this, Jakey? But for now, lets just try and get you huge!"

All three of them sat down and Dave made the first place for Jake. He loaded it with heaping amounts of everything on the table and Jake watched in disbelief as the massive, overflowing plate was placed in front of him. There was enough food on this plate for at LEAST 4 people. Jake took a deep breath before sinking his teeth into a large chunk of friend turkey and the flavor exploded in his mouth, Never in his life had Jake eaten turkey this good! Before he knew it he was scarfing down massive forkfuls of the food, only ever stopping to chug the soda placed in front of him. Puck and Dave didn't even bother keeping an eye on Jake, after all, Dave's cooking was so addicting that nobody could not eat it.

For the next hour, nobody talked. The only thing any of them focused on was food, food, and more food. Every now and then Puck would look up at his baby brother and see him stuffing his face, and when he did, Puck felt a wonderful sense of pride. Another hour passed by and Jake finally pushed his plate away, dropped his knife, and leaned back in his chair. Jake was beyond stuffed at this point and could barely move. His light brown stomach stuck out in front of him and was packed so tightly with food that it was almost a perfect circle sticking out from his torso. Over the course of two hours Jake had eaten a total of 18 plates of food, each just as massive as the last.

Puck walked over to his little brother and patted his belly softly, "Wow, you ARE a Puckerman! I don't even have to feed you more now, you took care of the job for me!" Jake was so full and tired he couldn't even respond. The only thing he could do was belch loudly, which helped with the pressure in his belly a bit. Puck looked at the table and was surprised at how little they had eaten; 75% of the food Dave had cooked was still there. Puck looked at his massive boyfriend, "You were holding back so he could stuff himself, huh?"
Dave chuckled, "So were you."
"Yeah, I was," Puck confirmed, "I'll be right back." Puck helped Jake up and lead him upstairs to the spare bedroom that Jake's mom had moved all of his things into earlier that day.

Puck helped his brother out of his clothes, until he was just in his boxers, and helped him into bed. Puck rubbed Jake's swollen belly through the sheets until Jake passed out. Puck smiled and set Jake's alarm for school the next day before heading downstairs to finish the massive meal Dave had made. Puck ate a quarter of what was left of the food, leaving the last half of the table to go into his boyfriend's massive belly. Puck lifted his heavy body up from the table and started preparing the breakfast shakes for Jake tomorrow.

A few hours passed and Jake slowly opened his eyes. He couldn't see, because all the light were off, but he could feel that his stomach was emptier than before. He reached under the sheets and felt his belly, which had decreased greatly in size but was still fairly hard and full. He rolled onto his side and was about to go back to sleep when his stomach let out a large growl, which surprised Jake. He had enough food to feed a small family in his belly but he was still hungry? He planned on ignoring it but then he smelled somebody baking apple pies down in the kitchen.

"Fuck it..." he muttered to himself and got up, found the door, and headed downstairs, his still stuffed belly sticking out in front of him. Jake followed the sound of a deep voice singing until he got to the kitchen. He turned the corner and saw Dave, standing in only his boxers, baking several apple pies in the over. He was at counter, cutting up more apples for the pie, and didn't even notice Jake. Jake's eyes were instantly drawn to Dave's belly, which was at least three times bigger than it was when Jake went to bed and looked just as full and hard as his own was.
1113322111111.title: A feast fit for an army.

11133221111111.content:
"What are you doing?" Jake asked Dave. Dave stopped singing and turned around.
"Oh, you startled me. I'm baking pies for you, me, and Puck. I probably should have asked earlier if you like apple."
"No apple's good but what I meant is why are you baking at...what time is it?" Jake looked around.
"5:30," Dave supplied. Jake squinted.
"Thanks. Why are you baking at 5:30?"
"I bake when I can't or am not allowed to sleep and well baking is a full time job around here anyhow where we have to get up earlier to make food for mealtimes."
"Well that makes a lot of sense," Jake said thinking about his two meals there. They would have to start real early to get anywhere near that amount of food ready.
"Me and Puck take turns at it and this morning it's my turn while he sleeps."
"Do you always eat like that?" Jake asked.
"Yep, pretty much. After a while it gets easier but its still takes a lot of preparation before." Jake rubbed his bloated gut and reflected.
"I'm going to get big aren't I?"
"That should go without saying but yes, one can only hope you will. How do you think Puck got so big?"
"Pretty much that but how is he not...you know, like you." Jake gestured to Dave's billowing stomach.
"Lots of exercise of course, far too much in my opinion," Dave said. "Puck has always liked beef." Jake stared blankly for a moment before Dave realized.
"Man beef I mean. Loves being the big bull and powerlifting. He's great at it, but it's far more dedication to maintain the body in a huge but controlled fashion than I really care for. I leave him to it and it works for him." Dave licked his mouth. "Puck is amazing and before you ask, yes he tops." Jake shook his head.

"Uh, I wasn't going to ask that and that was more info than I needed. Doesn't surprise me though."
"You hungry?" Dave asked all of a sudden. "I've got a pie or two I can spare and I don't feel like eating right now."
"No thanks," Jake said before his stomach growled again. "On second thought maybe just a little."
"Sure," Dave said as he put the entire pie in front of Jake on the table and sliced huge slices, getting Jake a plate. "Of course a little." The wink Dave sent Jake pretty much said he didn't believe him and honestly, Jake was beginning to agree. The pie smelled wonderful and if it was going to have the same perfection as the earlier meals, he wouldn't be able to stop at just one slice.

"I like your belly all big and bloated out like that. Look's like a real man's belly," Dave said as he pulled out a chair for Jake. Jake took the invite to sit down as well then he realized what Dave had said and blushed which made Dave grin even harder.

"Gaining just suits you." Dave reached out and poked Jake's gut. "It's going to be amazing to watch and see the changes," Jake flushed.
"I'm only doing this because I have to." Dave snorted.
"Pretty much everyone says that but ends up enjoying it anyway. I certainly do as does Puck and trust me you both are pretty similar in this regard. At least were." He gripped a hold of Jake's gut again and rubbed his large fingers over it. "Tell me you don't like how good it feels to eat and be stuffed and your belly full and being rubbed."

"I've never really have been able to have done this, my mom didn't make a lot of money..."
"Different issue. I asked if you enjoy it and I think you do." Dave dug harder in a moment before returning to soothing rubs that as much as Jake wanted to deny, felt immensely pleasureable on his full stomach like when Puck did it.

"Well...perhaps a little," Jake granted. Dave smirked and moved back.
"Thought so." A loud yawn echoed into the room.
"Aahhhhh oh hey guys." Puck walked into the room rubbing sleep from his eyes. "Didn't expect you to be up yet Jake, were you comfortable?"
"Uh yeah it was good, just woke up a bit hungry, smelled some pie, and came down for a snack and found Dave." Puck smiled at that.
"Sweet, told ya Dave he'd fit in." Dave looked up and nodded.
"Yeah yeah you did. I tested to make sure."
"Wait so this was all a test?" Jake shouted surprised.
"Kind of. Either way you passed," Dave said grinning. "Welcome to the family." Puck came over and pulled Jake against him in a big hug which felt both wonderful and worried that he'd be crushed. Puck eventually let up smiling fondly at his little brother. Jake stared at Puck's belly a moment.

"Do you mind if I...?" Jake gestured and Puck smirked.

"Go ahead, I don't mind. See how big your brother is." Jake chose not to comment on how creepy that had just sounded and took the invite since Puck really was touchy-feely and he never got a good chance to explore for a few moments before and getting crushed to death by hugs didn't count. Taking a deep breath, Jake put his fingers on the massive ball and rubbed it. It was rock-hard and if not for the shape and dimension, Jake would have been convinced it was the solidness of very lean-cut abs. How did it manage to stick out and his brother walk with amazing balance, it must have been like lifting a boulder as there was very little give to it. Jake was tempted to punch to see if anything would happen but at the same time he was fairly certain that that would be as great as punching a brick wall except this one could move. Puck's arms were massive pythons that he couldn't even get his entire hand around halfway, and that thick built chest....it was beautiful but at the same time unnerving."

"Wow...that is impressive," Jake said which it was. "How do you get it so hard?" Puck quirked a smile and Jake rolled his eyes. "Oh come on grow up I thought I was the little brother."

"Well dunno really, I suspect it's natural genetics but also doing power exercises and strict control maintenance."
"It's almost as bad as with someone obsessively working to get thin," Dave said.
"I'm not that bad," Puck protested and Dave moved over to him and grinned.
"No, I guess not, but you are pretty bad and I like the result at least," Dave said running his hands down Puck's chest. Jake looked away but turned back and peeked, licking his lips as he felt a desire for someone to touch him that way as well.
11133221111111.title: Dave offers Jake an entire apple pie and they t...

choices: At school, Ryder Lynn notices Jake's swollen stomach.
111332211111112.content:
Jake's eyes opened slowly and the bloated teen groaned as he reached across the bed and hit the alarm on his bedside table. He lifted himself into a sitting position and grunted as he placed his hand on his still spherical belly. When he was awake earlier with Dave and Puck they all ended up eating the pies Dave and cooked and hanging out. It wasn't until Jake had eaten two entire apple pies and a whole container of vanilla ice cream by himself that he realized how much he had eaten. Now it was two hours later and he was still absolutely stuffed. Jake sniffed the air and groaned, "Ugh... They're making breakfast."

Before going downstairs Jake decided to shower and get ready for the day. Once he was all clean he threw on a pair of boxers, dark gray jeans, and his leather boots. He grabbed a green shirt from his new closet and pulled it over his torso, but much to his dismay, couldn't get it over his stomach. Jake pulled and pulled at the normall tight shirt but no matter what he did the fabric wouldn't completely cover his swollen belly. Jake looked at himself in his bedroom mirror and saw that half of his stomach was showing and his belly button was poking out. He sighed, grabbed one of his pull over hoodies, and threw it over. His stomach was much less visible this way. He grabbed his backpack and headed down stairs.

"Morning!" Jake said as he entered the kitchen. The first thing he saw was the massive breakfast laid out on the table; several huge trays of pancakes, waffles, and french toast, along with a huge tray of eggs and a mountain of bacon, ham, and sausage links. There was also two huge plates of hashbrowns and a few bottles of milk and soda.
Puck and Dave were both stuffing their faces at the table and Puck's face light up at the sight of his little brother, "Morning, Jake! Hungry?" he said, walking to the kitchen.
"Yeah" Jake admitted, reaching for some hashbrowns before Puck stopped him, "Uh-uh. Not for you."
"What? Why?" Jake asked.
"Because, we need to build your weight up before we start building your muscles up." Puck sat Jake down and went to the fridge, grabbing two large blender glasses full of what looked like chocolate milk.
"What are those?" Jake asked.
"Gainer shakes. Dave and I use them all the time and they pack on the pounds like crazy. Until you break your freshman 50-"
"Don't you mean 15?" Jake interrupts.
"No, 50. Once you break your freshman 50 THEN you can eat the big boy breakfast. Until then it's two shakes a day." Puck said, folding his huge arms.
Jake sighed and grabbed the first container, putting it to his lips, and started drinking.

It took Jake almost 10 minutes but he finally finished drinking the two massive shakes, his stomach huge and swollen once again. He looked up at Puck, who happily put another one in front of Jake's face. Jake groaned, "No more, Bro. I feel like I'm gonna pop."
"All the more reason to drink it! It'll push you past that wall you have." Puck said, putting the shake in Jake's hand. Jake sighed again and quickly went to work. Another 10 minutes passed and Jake set it down, "Ugh.... done. Can I go to school now?"
"Sure thing!" Puck said, looking back at Dave, "Babe, I'm driving Jake to school. You can have everything on the table while I'm out. I'll grab something at a drive-thru."
Dave gave Puck a thumbs up as he ate and Puck helped Jake up and out of the house.
111332211111112.title: Jake's Big Gainer Shake Breakfast.

1113322111111121.content:
Jake groaned as he buckled the seatbelt. "Ugh, I feel like I'm about to explode." Puck sat down in the driverseat, stretching the seatbelt tight across his lap.
"No you won't. You're just stuffed." Puck looked over at Jake's jacket. "Nice wardrobe. Let's see what you have accomplished shall we?"
"Do I have to?" Jake mumbled. Puck frowned at that.
"Of course you do, it's just me so I want to see." He looked sternly over at Jake who sighed and reluctantly unzipped his jacket. Puck whistled in appreciation.
"You're doing great," Puck said reaching out and squeezing Jake's belly and jiggling it. "Really good progress already at the start."
"My shirt's shrunk," Jake said trying to pull his again rolling up shirt. "It won't fit." Puck grinned at the sight.
"I say. It's a very good sign indeed. Even I did not expect you to do so well so quickly."
"Gee thanks," Jake said. "That just makes me feel better." Puck continued driving.
"Want to stop for some food?" he asked teasingly, as he patted Jake's stomach again when he least expected it. Jake jumped a little in hs seat.
"Wha-NO! No I do not want anything. I couldn't possibly eat anything else!"
"Okay okay, just relax. I'm just getting something for me before school starts." Puck stopped at the grocery and was gone for 15 minutes before coming back with a number of loaded bags. They still had time but not much to get to school, having left early.
"Finally, let's just go." Puck just grinned.
"Someone's an eager beaver to get back to school," Puck said. "Got to show his newfound progress..."
"No one is going to see," Jake muttered.
"Oh they will eventually. Own your body Jake, own it," Puck said seriously.
"Is that some weird older brother guru advice?"
"Nope, but I'm freaking awesome.
"Yeah, whatever." Puck pulled up to the school.
"Now remember, don't do anything I wouldn't do!" Puck called as Jake got out.
"Sure, whatever that means seeing as you do a lot of things," Jake muttered. He went in to continue the existence of a high school student.

School was...school. He didn't see any of the hockey team or rascist douchebags so there were no insults throwed. On the other hand, he wasn't sure if he would have done anything if they had. Puck's logic was kind of screwy and seeing as they just started it made no sense but physically speaking, he would have gotten his butt kicked fast if he did try as he felt already felt slower and bigger although those were just the shakes from breakfast. And that pie, icecream, pasta, turkey, mashed potatoes...okay, it was going to take a little longer than he was used to to get back to normal. Or at least equilibrium. Jake already had a sinking suspicion that he wasn't going to be allowed to go back to normal. He felt under his jacket at the swelled stuffed stomach, far different from its normal flatness of...two days ago. It did have an appeal of its own though but he certainly could have done without the physically ill feeling that at any moment he was going to either explode or throw up.

First class was boring...like Puck, he really couldn't care about Geometry but he was actually pretty decent at it and actually attended though there were many times that he really really wished he didn't. It was harder sleeping there than in the Nurse's office and he'd gotten in trouble for falling asleep before. Mainly to do with the teacher, Jake couldn't imagine how it would be possible to find anyone more boring. It was even harder to stay awake listening to the drone so he had to entertain himself by playing with his belly and rubbing it to move digestion along. He was almost beginning to see why Puck and Dave enjoyed it so much when Mr. Leonard stopped by his desk and asked him a question. Jake was startled and looking at the board, quickly solved it. When he gave the right answer, Mr. Leonard scowled and moved off to torture some other poor soul. Geez, you'd think he'd like a guy who was actually good at Geometry and could answer one of his questions but no.

When the boring hell known as Geometry with Mr. Leonard (the really important part) was over, Jake was excited to get out and then skidded to a stop as he realized something. After this he had P.E. and...crap crap crap how did he forget?! He should have begged Puck to not make him go today and waited until he figured something out but no, he totally forgot in a stuffed belly and Mr. Leonard haze and he couldn't not go because Coach Beiste certainly did not tolerate skipouts. With a sense of finality and impending doom, Jake headed to the P.E. room thinking he was going to die, either of embarassment or suicide sprints which in the state he was really would be suicide. He could only hope to burst into flames before that happened.

He headed to the locker room and waited as the guys around him changed, hanging back. As soon as everyone was gone he sighed as he started to undress. "Maybe it won't fit to bad," he thought. He wouldn't be allowed to cover up but perhaps it wouldn't look bad? Jake didn't know there was still someone in there with him.

Ryder headed out into the bathroom when he saw Jake was still there when everyone else was already outside waiting. Ryder squinted. Something seemed a little off...Ryder almost worried his dyslexia transferred into his sight (was that possible? He didn't know, it certainly caused weirdly bizzare letters) and blinked again. Nope, he was seeing right. Jake's belly...well, there was a roundness and it was sticking out in that Jake actually had the beginnings of a gut. It certainly was not flat like normal. Ryder watched in amazement as Jake unbuttoned his pants and sighed in relief as it pushed forward a bit where it had been being held in check as he bent over and removed them, putting on the shorts. Ryder licked his lips at the sight, feeling slightly turned on which surprised him. Though the way Jake was being sneaky with his weight as he looked around and put his shirt on certainly was hot. It didn't even look out of place beneath the loose shirt (lucky for Jake he found a more loose shirt stuffed in his locker from a previous time he had forgotten about than the one he normally wore). It didn't look out of the ordinary at all. Jake left the room and smiling a little, Ryder followed closely behind, keeping from being seen.
1113322111111121.title: Ryder sees something interesting

choices: Puck starts dinner and Dave stuffs Jake with two massive chocolate cakes.
11133221111111211.content:
Jake was waiting with the rest of his PE class for Coach Beiste to come out and begin today's activities. Jake was doing his best to keep his bloated stomach hidden, and his shirt did help with that, but Ryder could tell it was swollen and stuffed. He was about to confront Jake about it when Coach Beiste walked out and called Jake over. Jake, confused, walked over to her, "Yeah, Coach?
"You got switched into another class. Head into the weights room." Beiste said before having her class start off with laps.

Jake didn't question this, though he was very happy he didn't have to run, what with his full stomach and all, and walked into the weight room. The room was empty, not a single other student around, and Jake was about to leave and ask Beiste why it was so empty, when his new teacher walked in. Jake turned around and was shocked to see his older brother standing there dressed like a PE teacher: a skin tight white t-shirt with the school's PE logo clung to Puck's massive arms, wide torso, huge pecs, and a giant ball belly. He gym shorts ended half way up his thighs and stuck to them just as tightly, hugging his huge ass as well.

"Puck? What are you doing here?" Jake asked, confused.
"Hey! At school you are to address me as Coach Puckerman, little guy." Puck said jokingly, "Mr. Schue got me hired as YOUR personal PE coach. The principal was a little on edge about it but when I said I'd do it for free he agreed." Puck pointed to the weight bench next to him, "Now get that skinny ass of yours on this bench and give me 50."
Jake sighed, knowing he really didn't have a choice, and did as his big bro told him.

The class lasted one hour Puck had Jake alternating between doing weighted squats and bench presses. By the time they were finished Jake's arms and legs were killing him, but in a good way. He loved the feeling of finishing a huge workout. Puck patted his little brother's back, "Good job, bro! You did better than I expected. Wait right here." Puck said, leaving the room for a second.
"Thanks." Jake said, flexing his arm. When Puck returned he was carrying a huge ice chest and Jake started, confused his older brother.
Puck set it down and pulled it open, "Before you leave you still have one more assignment to do." Puck pulled out a massive two gallon container that was filled with the same weight gain shake Jake had been forced to drink for breakfast.
"Again?" Jake said, groaning.
"Yes, again. And if you don't drink it you get an F for the day." Puck said, handing it to Jake. Jake groaned, unscrewed the top, and started drinking. He chugged it as quickly as he could, just to get it over with, but as soon as he put that bottle down Puck shoved another into his mouth, "1 down, 1 to go." Puck said as Jake took the bottle and continued drinking.

10 minutes went by and Jake had finally finished drinking down both of the bottles that Puck had given him. He groaned loudly and clutched his belly, which currently conatined 4 gallons of of his big brother's weight gain shakes, "How are these supposed to work, anyway? At home...

11133221111111211121111.content:
Jake was feeling good about himself. Even when some of the guys on the hockey team made a joke about him being of mixed race as well as a heavy ass rhino or something, he managed to resist the urge to try to go after them. Well, barely. He had been about to when he heard his brother's voice telling him to count to 10 and keep calm and that it wasn't worth it to go after the bullies, well usually. His size did prevent them from trying anything more and other than namecalling, they didn't seem to keen on doing anything else, especially since it didn't have the desired effect of making him freak out like it usually did. He did receive some weird glances at first from people who didn't recognize him and thought he was a new student but that was okay as he didn't know most of them that well anyhow. He even felt on top of the world as he patted his thick stomach, happily stuffed with eggs and sausage. It was kind of funny how last week this would have shamed him but after only a few days, this was becoming quite fun and he enjoyed the envious looks on some of the guys faces who only wished they could be as big as him. He wondered if he should send any to Puck because Puck did always enjoy helping his clients but for now, he was content to bask in admiration. He was at his locker when he was tapped from behind.

"Oh hey Jake, how was-woah!!!" Shouted Marley when she saw Jake turned around. Everyone turned to stare and after a few glares from Jake and threatening motions people turned away to mind their own business though he wouldn't be surprised if they weren't trying to listen in as much as they can. Looking back to Marley, he put his fingers to his lips and made a turnlock gesture for her to be more quiet. Marley nodded and when he put his hands down, Marley stared at Jake in surprise.

"Woah Jake-you're huge! Why-how-you get like this?" She poked her finger into his gut, surprised at the hard roundness of the stuffed flesh though there was a little give. He let out a little belch as he backed off.

"Hey, hey, no poking right now. I'm kind of stuffed." Marley stared as if in a trance.
"I can certainly see that but you were definitely a lot smaller last week so how did you get so big?"
"I had help from my brother Puck. He's an absolute genius for gaining, I mean seriously."
"I can tell...but I just can't believe that you are this big right now. I mean, I can see it...I just can't believe it."
"Believe it sister," Jake said smirking.
"That's what you're going to look like if you eat," came the snarky voice of McKinnley's bitchiest girl Kitty. She had been walking by when she saw what was going on. "Jeez Jake, blimp much? What did you do, eat Marley's whale of a mother?"

"Hey," Marley said. "You said you were going to lay off talking about my mom that way and my mom is fine thank you very much. She even lost some weight." Kittly rolled her eyes.

"I wasn't being literal...much, though I admit I did wonder if Jake had and well, your mom is big so think of it as a compliment and deal with it. Though really, how the hell did you get so big jock Jake Puckerman? Or rather, ex-jock I guess considering the size of the food baby you're having."

"And you wonder why no one likes you," Jake said rolling his eyes at Kitty, trying to keep from flinching at how much that actually did hurt. Those were some barbed words and while he was had been fine, Kitty did manage to titlt him a bit and feel self-conscious all over again but then, she had always been good at that.

"I'd say eat me but I'd worry you'd take me literally and actually do it," Kitty sniffed. "But you never did answer the question."
"Well let's just say Puck opened my eyes."
"Oh yeah, the guy who loves making people explode is your brother. I hear he's pretty big himself."
"Yep," Jake said proudly.
"If you grew that much in only a few days, I'd shudder to think of what you'd look like at the end of the month or year. Maybe you'd join Marely's mom in whale-dom, no offense Marley."

"Saying no offense doesn't make it not hurt Kitty," Marley said.
"Yeah whatever, I'm trying. Still talking to Jake here." Jake swallowed. Kitty did bring up a good point and even if growth would be at a far more reasonable rate since there is only so much that is physically possible, he probably would be huge and while Jake enjoyed being big, he did admit he wasn't sure just how big he was willing to get, no matter how fun.

"Well, I don't know. Maybe I should talk it over with Puck later so uh, bye Kitty," he said tilting his head, indicating he wanted her to leave. Kitty smirked and trounced off and Marley stayed, looking embarassed. "Geez Marley, I'm still not quite sure about you being her friend," Jake said shaking his head. "She's so horrible."

"Yeah...she is, but I think there has to be something good inside. I just need to find it." Marley said determined.
"Don't forget the fact that she convinced you were fat and then gave you an eating disorder."
"Yeah I know, I know that is bad and it is crazy to want to be friends with her-"
"Insane-" interjected Jake.
"-but I still want to and she's not always bad...sometimes."
"Well, I can't stop you from making friends with her though I do worry."
"I know Jake, I know." She hugged him. "Wow this is different but you feel nice and huggable."
"...Thank you?" Jake did not quite know what to say to that. Marley shrugged.
"Still so weird because I'm not used to it but you are kind of cool like that though I would consider thinking about how big you are going to get."
"Yeah."
"See you in Glee?"
"Sure." Marley walked off and just as Marley left, he saw Sam and Blaine come over to him.

"Hey guys," Jake said, finally getting the books for the day out and closing his locker.
"So it's true," Sam said. "You have gotten big."
"Yeah," Jake said.
"Puck?" Sam asked.
"Who else?" Jake countered.
"Touche. He is insistent isn't he?" Sam asked.
"You bet he is," Jake agreed.
"We take lessons with him too," Blaine said. "They work amazing."
"He sure does know what he's talking about," Jake said proudly.
"When it comes to gaining he sure does," Sam said. "He helped me go from a skinny junior last year to the big beefy man I am today and am still trying to grow. He also helped Blaine get big as well."

"It was time for a change," Blaine explained. "Kurt was pulling away and well, I don't know, just wanted to do something different and then I saw what Sam was doing, thought it was fun and the rest is history."

Sam poked Jake in the gut causing him to wince. "Why does everyone keep doing that?" Jake groused, "To see if its real or something, I don't know, I just felt the urge to," Sam said. Jake rolled his eye. "So...lunch?" he asked. Sam and Blaine looked at each other.

"Sure," they said as they walked off. Jake shrugged as he closed his locker and went to his first period class.

Micah again wondered how the couch hasn't broken yet underneath Puck's weight since it sure was creaking and he took up most of the room. Even from the distance of the door, it looked enormous. Trevor and Micah quietly slipped in and Trevor rushed over to the couch as he gently prodded Puck.

"Hey, Puck, you awake?" Micah rolled his eyes when Puck let out an especially loud snoring noise.
"No he's not." Micah said and Trevor shrugged.
"Just checking." He poked Puck's stomach. Then poked it a few more times. "Wow," Trevor said.
"What?" Micah asked coming closer.

"It jiggles." And so it did. Although it wasn't much, there was a certain give when Trevor poked and when he moved it, there was the slightest joggle.
"He's definitely gotten fatter," Trevor diagnosed. Micah moved beside and touched too. Although Puck's gut was still mostly solid, there was the slightest noticeable give and he actually got an inch or two into the balloon. It was...weirder than Micah expected. It must have not really sunk in before but now it was. Puck was going to be getting fat. It honestly just blew his mind since Puck had always been a hard body. A monster-beast-man that started large and somehow became a behemoth and even as he inflated, that belly of his was as solid as a fucking rock all the time and he sweated non-essential fat like crazy. It was both disappointing and exhilarating. Disappointing because, well, it was Puck and that was a body to admire but exhilaration because it pretty much sealed the deal of him being the undisputed champion and best muscle-gut ratio around. Suddenly, there was a loud cavernous yawn and both Micah and Trevor froze as Puck woke up.

"Uh...hi," Trevor said awkwardly.
"Sup," added Micah.
"Hey guys," Puck said yawning, scratching his belly and letting out another impressive belch. "Did it work?"
"Yeah, you can say that," Micah said. "You're not as hard in the stomach as you used to be and there is a slight jiggle."
"Sweet," Puck said. "What about other places?"

"Um let me check," Micah said. He looked over. "Besides the soft jiggle, you've definitely added some girth on your manly gut." He reached and squeezed Puck's pecs, with admiration. "Slight softness here too but kind of make it better. You've got an amazing chest." He knew what Puck was going to ask next so he had Trevor come over and together with a lot of force, yanked Puck up eventually from the couch. Micah squeezed Puck's butt. "Yeah, nice, thick, and juicy." Trevor felt as well and grinning, concurred. Puck took a few steps, swaying a little and his gut and body actually bounced a little with the motion."

"That is some growth," Micah said. Suddenly Jake came in.
"Hey ready to-uh hey?" Jake said seeing Puck wasn't alone.
"Hi?" Micah said awkwardly.
"Hey Jake," Trevor just said happily.
"So uh, what's going on?" Jake asked.
"Your brother's gotten fatter." Trevor said.
"Uh-uh, no way."
"Way."
"Let me see." Jake walked up to Puck and tested for himself.
"Oh my god, you did. How?"

"Cause I need to keep growing little bro. You know the need? I was getting stuck and the only way to get out would be some drastic measures. 7 gallons of the shake."

"7 gallons?" Jake was stunned from the sheer thought. "That's just incredible. How much did you put on?" Puck shrugged and Jake grinned.
"Let's find out." They pulled out Puck's special industrial scale that could measure up to a ton and Puck got on. Jake whistled seeing the number.
"Well bro, it looks like you're currently at 570. But drinking 7 gallons. How did you not explode?"
"Sheer will and size," Puck muttered. Jake patted Puck's belly in encouragement.
"The goal was 600 right? You're going to cross that easily."

"Yep. You and Micah will be focused exclusively on your muscle devolpement and feeding Trevor and Ryder." Jake turned to Micah.
"Please don't kill Ryder, I need him okay?"
"Don't worry...but he's sure going to balloon up paired with me."
"That's true...stuff him real good for me." Jake said.
"Oh I will. He won't be such a twig for long."
"I'll make sure to please Trevor."
"You do that." They went silent.
"So...I'm going to need the car," Jake said. "I guess I'll be driving us home since you're in no condition to drive?"
"Yeah that's fine."
"I wonder if you'll still barely fit the car seat or if you're going to have to sit in the back."
"Don't be a smartass," Puck grinned. "See you guys tomorrow." Jake, Trevor, and Micah all helped Puck hobble to the car.
"Later guys," Trevor said.
"Yeah, later." Jake got in the car and Micah waved a hand in goodbye which Jake grinned at. He bet that he and Micah were going to get to be very close friends in the upcoming days ahead.

"Yeah, really." Trevor replied as he ran his fat, meaty hand over his gigantic gut, "Whenever I have a big breakfast feast like this I start with as much oatmeal as I can possibly down because it fills my gut really quickly. I love to load it down with syrup, chocolate syrup, and sugar too. I don't even chew it I just put the bowl to my lips and chug it down."
"Huh... interesting method." Jake said, placing his underneath Trevor's massive gut and shaking it - watching the fat jiggle back and forth, "Well then, lets get this tank even bigger. Have a seat while I load you up." Jake said before leaving.

Trevor sat down at the booth and knew instantly that today was going to be FUN. Not only was the 400 pound too big for the big - his massive stomach pressed tight against the table - but Puck had also called in advanced and reserved the ENTIRE buffet for just Jake and Trevor. Trevor was going to push himself farther than he'd ever gone before today and he couldn't wait to get started.

Jake returned minutes later pushing a metal cart that was used to carry dirty dishes but instead was carrying 10 big bowls of cinnamon raisin oatmeal that were slathered in chocolate syrup, sugar, and maple syrup, "Oatmeal just the way you like it!" Jake said as he slid all 10 bowls to the table.
Without a single word Trevor dug in, lifting the first bowl to his lips and chugging the thick oats down. Jake was amazed as he watched - the oatmeal was very thick but Trevor was drinking it down like it was water. Trev finished off the first bowl - not spilling a drop - before setting it aside and chugging the next. Trev loved the way the delicious cinnamon and sugar mixed together with the plump raisins and various syrups. The oatmeal sat heavy in Trevor's stomach which only made the wrestler want more. Jake watched the entire event, totally mesmerized and hard at the same time.

15 minutes went by before Trevor set the last bowl down and licked his lips happily, "Oh, fuck, that was delicious." Trev said, patting his fat belly. Even while digging into the table Jake could see that there was a slight difference in size - it hadn't expanded by much but it was clearly larger. Jake expected this from Trevor - it takes a LOT of food to make him stuffed to bursting.
"What next?" Jake asked.
"Hmmmmm..." Trevor thought, "Waffles with melted cheese, sausage, bacon, ham, and eggs in between."
"That sounds amazing."
"Its my usual! If I have the time every morning before class I make three or four." Trev said, patting the top of his gut.
"Well I'll be sure to double that." Jake said before reaching behind him, "In the mean time have a snack to keep you busy." Jake said before setting down a massive plate of bacon that weighed at least 5 pounds. Jake gave Trevor's gut a hard smack before heading off to make his food.

While Jake was gone Trevor did what he did best - eat. The constantly fattening wrestler ate and ate and ate - shoveling crispy strips of bacon into his mouth one after the other only ever pausing to lick the grease from his fingers. Each piece of bacon was crispier, thicker, and juicier than the last. Trevor swallowed another bite and reached down for more but all he felt was an empty plate. The 400 pound wrestler groaned as he leaned back in his chair, rubbing his filling gut. As Trevor waited he fantasized about getting bigger, fatter, and more muscular. Surpassing and outweighing Sam and going back to being the heaviest guy on the wrestling team. The thought made him incredibly horny - his already skin tight denim shorts getting tighter underneath his heavy gut.


Jake grinned as he saw the plate empty, "Good job, dude!" The musclechub said as he rubbed Trevor's enormous gut, "Now, onto THESE bad boys!"
Jake set down a plate of 8 massive handmade breakfast sandwiches, "Dude, these are HUGE!!"
"Yeah, I doubled what you you asked me to make for you. Enjoy, big guy!!"
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Trevor's buffet binge.

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Smiling hugely, Trevor picked the first sandwich up and took a massive bite. The sandwiches waffles were huge and even bigger than what he normally ate but Trevor was in fine form that day. His hunger seemed limitless despite the bowls of oatmeal and giant platter of bacon sitting in his gut. Giving a thumbs up to Jake, he buried his head into the first massive sandwich piece after cutting them all in half so they would actually fit in his hands without dropping. He could feel Jake's eyes on him and he smirked as he chowed down making sure to give a show. The hitch in Jake's breathing allowed Trevor to know he had affected him as did when he turned his head and saw Jake stroking himself. Like Puckerman like Puckerman, Jake-boy was turned on and horny which made Trevor horny and even more determined to surpass limits.

It also helped the sandwiches were heavenly. Cooked to perfection, not to toasted, not over-cooked, and each piece done with careful precision. He was kind of surprised Jake cooked that well. It must have been in the genes or something or he learned how from Puck because he never failed to impress. Groaning around the amazing taste of fluffy heaven, ham, sausage, perfectly spread melted cheese, and even more thick juicy bacon, Trevor plowed on through one piece than another. Getting lost in fantasy of taste and size, Trevor zoned out and only when he had reached for the next piece and was unable to grab something did he become aware of what was going on. He had finished the 8 sandwiches, 16 slices cut in half.

"Wow," Jake said then.
"Yeah," Trevor replied. "So is there anything more?" He enjoyed watching Jake's mouth drop open and then the lust returning back to his eyes.
"We should probably get you out of that booth first though, free up space," said Jake pointing. Trevor looked to see his titanic gut squeezed against the edge and spilling over the top.

"Yeah good idea," Trevor said before trying to wriggle out. It was a no go.
"Um...I think I'm stuck," Trevor said.
"Oh yeah?" Jake asked examining. "It does look like your massive ass is too big against the seat," he grinned.
"So a little help?"
"Okay, okay," Jake said. He tried to reach in and pull Trevor out. Unfortunately, Trevor's huge gut pushed against the table and partly the top kept getting in the way and he was wedged in tight. Jake couldn't move the table as it was too securely bolted to the floor. He then tried to climb over the table and into what little space that wasn't occupied by Trevor and push but that didn't work either. He tried pushing backwards with his back but still nothing.

"Wow...you're...really in tight," Jake panted as he tried to push. "I don't...think you're getting out anytime soon."
"What about calling your brother?" suggested Trevor.
"Oh yeah, good idea," Jake said as he pulled out his phone and called him.
"Yo, Puck, I think we have a little situation."
"Tell me." Puck's deep voice commanded.
"Well, Trevor got stuck in the booth and I can't get him out," said Jake. There was silence for a moment before a short laugh.
"Oh, I thought it was something serious."
"It is serious. Trevor is stuck in the booth."
"Okay, okay, calm down. I'm on my way. See you in 10." With that there was a click and Puck hung up.
"So he'll be here in 10 minutes," Jake said to Trevor.
"Okay." There was silence for a moment.
"So yeah, getting stuck," Trevor said.
"Yep." Jake replied.
"First time that its happened. I mean, truly stuck, not just unable to move from fullness." Jake looked at him.
"Really its your first time?" He licked his lips.
"Yep. My very first time. I've joined the extreme fatty club where Puck and Sam and the like are."
"Yeah. You've gotten so big it's incredible." Jake rubbed the portion of belly that rested on the table.
"You have too," Trevor purred gesturing towards Jake's beefy body. "At the start of the year you were a skinny twink."
"That's slight exaggeration," Jake said frowning. "I had good muscle."
"True, I guess that would be pushing it. I guess skinny twink in comparison to now." Jake laughed.

"I guess that's true," Jake flexed his arms, huge boulders appearing in his tight grey shirt. He had taken off the overcoat in the stuffy room and it was just him and Trevor. The shirt looked small on his bulky body and it looked like if his arms flexed any harder he'd rip right out of it. Trevor would have loved to see it but it didn't happen yet to his disappointment. Of course the shirt had ridden up his fat beefy gut which hung over his jeans. Trevor smiled.

"Hello there," he said to it and Jake grinned. "Of course, this wasn't here then either. Either way, I must thank Mr. Schue for making me go with Puck to fix my attitude. He sure fixed me straight."

"I'll say. You look so good Jake." Jake blushed.
"Thanks." Just then Puck arrived.
"Hey yo Peeps Puckasaurus has arrived to fix all your problems." Puck announced.
"Whee finally," Trevor said. "Not that there was anything wrong with waiting here but I was getting bored." Puck examind Trevor.
"Ho, you really did get stuck in there! I'm proud of you! You're finally a big boy Trevor!"
"Cool, get me out." Puck disappeared heading to the kitchen and rummaged around before coming back with a few things, namely soap, grease, butter, etc.

"Come on Jake, lets grease this pig." He and Puck worked to make Trevor as slidey as possible before Puck had Jake move to the other side to push while Trevor pulled. With a minimum of effort because of the goopy mixture, they managed to pop Trevor out after a try or two.

"Yeehaw," Trevor said when he was free. "Thanks guys."
"Don't mention it," Puck grinned. "You finally got stuck in the booth."
"Yep, I did." Trevor slapped his fat belly which jiggled. "It was all thanks to that good breakfast Jake fed me, he was amazing." Puck grinned at the pleased and prideful expression on his brother's face and he reached out a hand and ruffled through Jake's short hair.

"I could use a little more though. After all that struggle, I am still hungry." Both Puckermans grinned at that as they eyed Trevor's fat belly which he flaunted.

"I have an idea," said Puck. "What about icecream?" Jake looked confused for a moment.
"Icecream?"
"Yeah," Puck said, gesturing to the icecream machines. "Me and Trev here are going to be having a treat." They both looked at him in surprise. Puck shrugged. "Hey, I'm in the mood for icecream and there is sure to be a lot so let's do it."

"Okay," Jake said. "Should I get bowls or-?"

"That won't be necessary. Me and Trev here are going to go without aren't we?" Trevor nodded. He and Puck had done this type of thing in the past where they just stuck their heads under and let it go into their mouths. "You just have to make sure the lever stays down," Puck told Jake. Jake shrugged and stepped back to let them do their thing as they both approached the side by side machines. "See you on the other side," Puck told Trevor jovially and moved his neck into a comfortable position underneath where his mouth could fit and turned it on. Trevor did the same. Jake feeling hungry himself, found some waffles and meat that he had set aside, and turned to eat his own breakfast while he watched as Puck and Trevor laid under the icecream dispensers as mixed chocolate-vanilla poured into their wide open mouths.

It took a while and Jake was long finished with breakfast as he sat watching Puck and Trevor still under the machines. Their stomachs had been steadily inflating from the thick softer serve icecream and both were looking ginormous that Jake wondered how they didn't explode. Twenty minutes and they were still going but finally it looked like Trevor started to struggle as he moved back to take gasping breaths and icecream poured down his face and chest. Puck had to take a few gasps too but not nearly as frequently as Trevor was taking them and Jake was amazed at Puck's control as the icecream still slid down, filling Puck's ridiculously massive body. Soon enough Trevor pulled out in surrender, turning it off. Puck continued on for another three minutes showing off before he too pulled out and turned off. The minute he moved though, the straining buttons of his current shirt zinged apart and flew off as the massive bloated gut spilled out which put even Trevor's tank to shame. Puck grinned and belched, going on for so loud and long Jake expected the place to collapse around them.

"UUUUUUURRRPPPP, yeah that was good," Puck ended before pounding his gut and letting out aftershocks almost as big but eventually stopped. Trevor and Jake were just wowed into silence.
"Wow," Jake said, stunned.
"Ditto," Trevor said unable to think of anything else.
"That was some good stuff," Puck grinned patting his massive gut. "I actually feel stuffed. Of course I also ate a lot of Dave's food before this snack so that might help but woof, I feel as stuffed as I did after those gallons of shake yesterday with other things."
"Awesome," Jake said.
"You bet it is. This is going to help a lot." Puck tried to get up but he stopped, his body to heavy laden to do much at the moment so he sat back down.
