"I'm not going anywhere for a while hah. Good times, good times." Trevor was in the exact same state though he looked a bit more in agony than Puck did. Puck tilted his head towards Trevor.

"Take care of him," Puck said and Jake nodded.
"What about you?"
"Him first. I can do a bit for myself." Jake nodded again and moved to where Trevor was and got down on the ground. He then reached out and started rubbing, easing Trevor's pain and aiding digestion. The moans of stomach fullness turned into moans of pleasure and Trevor writhed under Jake's fingertips which erased the pain.

"Oh god yes, do it, that's the spot," Trevor said and Puck smirked to himself. This was fun.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Trevor eats them all and is ready for more!

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
For the next few months, everybody worked on their assigned goals. It was a frutiful period with everybody growing and Puck decided it was a good time for another weigh in to measure everybodys' progress to share and because nothing pleased him more than to have numerical numbers to go along with the qualitative differences. He gathered them all for their lesson, grinning as he saw the remarkable changes most everybody had gone through in such a short time.

"Hey guys, since the semester is coming close in a few weeks after the delicious holiday of Thanksgiving which I expect all of you will take advantage of, I thought it would be a good idea to know where we all stand now. Therefore, it is time for another weigh-in! You have all done excellent on your progress so we should all share." Puck grinned as he patted his monstrous gut and waddled onto the scale. It was amazing and telling of just how strong Puck was that he was at all still mobile and able to move because he was just ginormously huge, his gut having grown even more further out when he switched to focusing on size and stuffing himself instead of the huge but taut tight muscle gut he had for a long time. How he carried himself around looked baffling now. "Somebody read it to me," Puck demanded. Jake looked at the scale and his eyebrows raised.

"750 lbs bro." Jake smiled. "Jesus, Mary, and Joseph you're huge." Puck smirked.
"That is how you do it, yeah," he flexed, muscle rising out of the mass that was his arms. "How about the rest?" He looked at them all expectantly so they didn't have much of a choice so they went in order of who looked the biggest after that, meaning Trevor was next. Like Puck, Trevor had blown up in the four months thanks to Micah and Jake who had kept him stuffed at all times and had used the thickest most fattening foods and gallons of Puck's special shakes which not only past, but utterly demolished the steady slope Trevor had been in into a new stratosphere. Trevor got on the scale and Micah read it.

"560 lbs," Micah said in awe. Trevor had pretty much always been big but this was a record the likes Trevor hadn't had since when Puck first originally trained him. 160 pounds gained in four months from an already heavy plateaued wrestler was insane and averaged higher than what even Puck had originally gotten in four months. Admittedly, Puck wasn't quite as experienced then and there were numerous feeders this time rather than Puck alone but still. It was insane.

"Sam," Puck called and Sam got on. The scale turned and Jake read it as...
"550." There was a silence then as Puck froze.
"Excuse me?" Puck asked Jake in a silent calm, but deadly voice.
"5..550," Jake said, shaking a little at the tone Puck had. Puck was rarely this serious and the fact that he was meant trouble.
"Sam, what happened? You only gained 50 pounds in four months. For some people that would be impressive but for you, it doesn't seem like you tried. Trevor just gained 160 pounds and now actually outweighs you and at the start of summer, he was 120 pounds lighter but now is bigger than you. I am very disappointed in you."

"I'm sorry Puck, I was busy." Sam tried to explain.
"No you weren't. Someone of your talent and size should have been able to gain without supervision by this point. Ryder was more busy and he's huge now compared to how he was before. Everyone else has noticeable gains but you...barely any effort. We will have to remedy that after everyone else has finished weighing in." He waved his hand and Sam stepped off. Next was Micah who was a literal beefsteak with especially defined bulky muscles which flexed hard with each movement. He honest to god looked similar to how Puck looked two years back, musclegut and all, except more spread out since Micah was a giant 6'8 while Puck was around 6'1-2. Due to that difference, he could probably gain another 75-150 before reaching the same muscle-gut ratio of Puck had at his biggest before the fat started to overtake. Sam took his turn to read it, a bit sourly.

"470," he muttered. Sam had to admit he was jealous. Micah looked and probably was a heck of a lot stronger than him and only had a thick beefy gut that made Micah even more attractive." Micah smiled and flexed, putting everyone including Puck to shame at the sheer visible muscular power. Puck smiled at that.

"Next is Blaine." That was different as Blaine took getting fat seriously. He was even more fat looking than Puck and if they wondered how Puck was mobile, they wondered just as much at Blaine because unlike Puck, there was barely any muscle beneath that fat and he hardly worked or moved at all. Most of the time he was kind of immobile and really only got exercise when he was feeding Puck.

"450," Micah said, after figuring out the best angle to view from without his chest or gut getting in the way. It was a good approximate 100 lbs (actually 98).

Next came Danny who had come in late because he had still been at lunch and missed the announcement to gather there. Getting on the scale, Jake read "530." Danny whooped with excitement as he had really been working hard and it had paid off with a 145 pound gain. Puck glanced towards Sam.

"Sam, he's only 20 pounds less than you as opposed to say 115 like earlier. This is extremely DISAPPOINTING for you." Sam had to admit he was a little rattled. Everybody seemed to be catching up to him. Perhaps he did slack a little too hard.

"Jake," Puck called proudly and Jake got on. "450, babe," Ryder said, kissing Jake. "Looks like 106 lbs were added on and mostly muscle transformation at that." Like Micah, Jake had a massive protruding muscle-gut that was nonetheless tightly taught and thick. He had slimmed down the extra jiggly fat and everything was bigger and more defined than ever. Ryder loved it though he occasionally missed the extra fat that jiggled but he did that for the both of them, and in a good stuffing, Jake might be able to. Jake especially looked like Puck in his prime when he was focused on muscle, being closer in height and body than Micah (who shruken down probably would surpass both ratio wise).

The twins Nick and Zach went next, both being 386 and still somehow being total complements of each other. No one was sure how they contunued to maintain such perfect symmetry with each other. Tyrone hadn't grown all that much because he needed to maintain for basketball but he was at 356. Ricky and Devon were 316 and 306 respectively and Matt floated up to 324. Finally Ryder went last who had changed remarkably. Gone was the fit, trim, athletically toned Ryder. He was still definitely athletic but fit and toned, well...not so much. Of them all, he probably changed most drastically going from twink to fat wide linebacker type width. He kept up with Jake when eating, oftentimes even surpassing now on some foods. Ryder got on the scale.

"295," Jake said in awe as he kissed Ryder back. "You got BIG." It was a gain of 120 pounds. Ryder grinned and jiggled his now beefy stomach.
"It's all thanks to you and Puck and everyone."
"You did a lot of the work though of eating," Jake pointed out.
"True," Ryder smiled. Puck turned to Sam.
"Ryder gain 120 lbs while you gained only 50. Sure it was easier for him but that is no excuse for you failing so miserably Sam." Okay, that was probably true. "As such, you're going to have to be punished."

"Punished?" Sam asked. Puck motioned to Trevor and they both held Sam down. He sent Jake and Micah to bring the gainer shake.
"This is for failing to live up to your potential," Puck said. Micah and Jake gpt out the funnel and after Sam was tied down, they all watched as Micah, Jake, and Puck took turns pouring a gallon of gainer shake each round. Six straight gallons was inflicted which left Sam weighed down, gut utterly stuffed to the brim but super hungry and burping uncontrollably. The rest of the class was spent, stuffing food into the hapless Sam who could't eat anymore but couldn't stop due to the concentration of gainer shake.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Gym time workouts

choices: Micah and Jake meet with the team at lunch in the cafeteria.
The team heads to Dave's new restaurant, Dave's All-You-Can-Eat Bellybuster!
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Sam groaned, flat on his back on one of the gym bench presses totally stuffed to the brim with gainer shake. It took the entire class period to get Sam totally stuffed but once the bell rang Puck dismissed his dismissed his class, "Don't want any of you late. If theres one thing I hate its being nagged at by other teachers for tardy students. 'Cept for you two," Puck said to Trevor and Danny, "I need to have a word with you both."

Trevor and Danny stayed behind as the gym emptied, each taking a seat on the bench presses opposite of the massively bloated Sam. Both hefty teens groaned loudly as their enormous thighs spread apart- a huge, blubbery gut resting between each set. Puck did the same - sitting on a bench press opposite of all three boys - his monster-sized gut spilling out before him and taking up every inch of the bench press that his massive ass wasn't already covering. He gave his huge gut a few pats and grinned, "You three know why I asked you stay behind, right? Well, two - Sam here didn't have a choice but thats regardless."
"Umm, No, sir, I don't think we do." Danny asked, scratching behind his giant footballer neck.
"It's simple," Puck began, "The three of you are my prized pupils - the three heaviest students on the entire campus. While I AM still disappointed in you, Sam," Sam groaned in response, "I am proud of all three of you and I want you all to keep gaining."
"Will do, coach!" Trevor said with his usual, chipper grin.
"And I DO know that the three of you have a bit of a rivalry going on in regards to who weighs the most so I'm changing up your gaining routines. From now on the three of you are a team - you'll all push each other to gain as much as you possibly can. Think of it like a friendly rivalry!"

"A team?" Danny asked, a little surprised.
"That's what I said." Puck responded, "Since Micah is my top bodybuilder he's in charge of keeping track of your progress when you're not in class and Jake'll be his assistant. I expect the three of you to really blow up in no time! Especially you, Sam. You've got a lot of work to do to get back in my good graces. Who knows? Maybe one of you'll reach my level someday?" Puck said as he lifted his massive 750 pound body up with almost zero difficulty. The three boys watched as their coach waddled into the back room to do paperwork - the door having been widened about a month ago to accommodate his girth.

Danny and Trevor helped the bloated Sam up and the three made their way to the locker room to change clothes. All three had lockers in different aisles so Trevor had to speak up a bit, "SO, a team! Thats pretty cool!! DUDES we should have like a team name!" The portly wrestler said as he slipped into his skin tight jeans, his thick legs and ass pulling tight at the fabric of the whole garment. Trevor threw on his skin tight blue and white stripped shirt - which covered only a small sliver of his massive, doughy gut at the very top, before putting on a gray overshirt and buttoning only the button above his gut, "LIke, we could be the fat falcons or the gorilla gainers!"

"That's... defiantly something we'll keep working on." Danny said as he pulled on his own skin tight jeans and gut-revealing white v-neck before tossing on his signature leather jacket - completing his greaser look. Danny peeks around the corner to Sam's aisle, "You doin' okay, buddy?"

Sam had gotten both his brown khakis and green henley on, which also didn't cover his huge gut in the slightest, with ease and he looked up at Danny, "Huh? Oh, yeah. I'm just-" Sam paused to let out a huge burp, "Ugh... I'm just disappointed in myself."
"Why?" Danny asked, stepping closer, his gut only an inch away from Sam's.
"Well, I did slack on my gaining but I wasn't lying to Puck when I said I was busy. I was actually focusing all my time on helping Blaine gain."
"Really?" Trevor said, appearing behind Danny.
"Yeah," Sam replied, "He wants to be as fat as he possibly can while still mobile and, well, I love him and wanted to help."
"Thats..." Danny said, "The most romantic thing I've ever heard."

"Really?" Sam asked.
"Yeah! My boys want the same from me and it's wonderful! You might have put your work off but you did it out of love and thats pretty cool, bro."
"Thanks." Sam said, feeling reassured.
"Tell you what 'teammates', after school lets out lets all go to Dave's new place and gorge until we can't move. It's out first first day as a team - we should celebrate!"
"I'm up for that!" Trevor responded.
"Sounds like a plan." Sam said. The three boys headed out and then all went their separate ways towards their classes.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Forming a gainer team!

choices: In Sue Sylvester's Office Punishment but not?
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Next period was lunch for the three of them. Trevor and Danny walked ahead, Sam waddling heavily behind them, his gut aching after all the shake that was just poured into it. His gut swayed and jiggled back and forth, protruding proudly and unable to be covered by his green shirt. He'd feel a lot better about it if he didn't feel sick like he was going to throw up or like he was going to explode either from being full, or not full enough.

When they got into the cafeteria, they had their own special table reserved for them and those who were in Puck's class. After all, they needed a lot of room compared to normal sized people. Jake and Micah were there waiting for them.

"Hey guys," Jake said.

"Puck sent us," Micah started. "Now that he has decided it would be more beneficial for you guys to be working together instead of individually, he thinks that a lot more progress would be made. It would be a lot more inspiring for each of you if you worked together to grow rather than separate. That way you know how the others are doing and be all the more inspired to match or beat it. You were kind of doing it unofficially anyways, might as well make it official but in a more structured way. After all, you guys are the biggest in the school, the state, and probably the country for our age, but you never know. Growing up and ever onwards to the limits of human possibility is what you guys are after and it is pretty damn impressive in any case. Having you work together will inspire and push each each other to the best of your abilities." Jake brought out a measuring tape and started wrapping it around Danny's arm. "We already got your weights but just out of curiosity and comparison, I think we should measure the size of everything else." (And no, that doesn't include dick size) Micah muttered to Jake. Not that they were unaware but that wasn't what they were measuring.

"Aww," Jake groaned while grinning. "No fun at all." Jake looked at the number and nodded. "18 inches, nice. Hey, it would be easier just to removed those shirts entirely, school code be damned. It's not like those big fat bellies are particularly hidden," Jake grinned as he patted Danny. "It's much easier to measure without the fabric getting in the way. He measured the chest and legs, making humming sounds. Then he tried to measure Danny's gut size. That proved to be a challenge as the tape measure was just simply not long enough to amply circle around the body and thick back. Danny stood their awkwardly as Jake had his head down low and trying to yank the tape together but it just wasn't happening. He almost ripped it a couple of times trying to force it, but managed to avoid doing so by doing a bit of a weird awkward dance shuffle that pressed his head against Danny's gut. Jake put down the tape measure and rubbed it admiringly.

"Are you really going to do that in front of all those people?" Danny asked, referring to the cafeteria where a number of people were just staring at them.
"Of course," Jake said as he rubbed Danny's thick gut approvingly.
"Okay, just checking," Danny said, Jake's touch. Jake and his brother Puck were very exhibitionist in everything and it was a good thing he didn't mind. Then again, it wasn't like anybody was going to do anything.

"You certainly grew from before." Jake squeezed Danny's arms. "Flex again for me." Danny flexed and Jake grinned. "I can feel the power. Not as big as my own guns but very impressive." Jake showed off, flexing his own huge arms. Micah sighed.

"Let's continue please. What were the numbers?"
"Party pooper," Jake sighed and whispered them to Micah who nodded and wrote them down.
"I am not, but I would like to get them measured and eating before the end of lunch."
"It would be a good show," Jake offered.
"Maybe after you measure them, if you promise not to almost dry pound them into the table."
"Would I really do that?" Jake asked, his voice sounding innocent.
"Um, yes, yes you would," Micah said. Sam, Trevor, and Danny nodded in agreement.
"Not that it isn't fun," Trevor winked. "I love when you and Micah do that."
"School rules. Sure they rarely enforce them or really any rule here but very open public relations of that sort are still banned. Besides," his normally serious face relaxed a fraction, "we could do that later. Anyways, let's continue." Jake sighed, rubbing Danny's belly one last time and pulled off. Next he went to Trevor, his smile returning.

"Hey sexy," Jake breathed in his ear and nuzzling his neck. Micah's jaw twitched. Months of this and he was still jealous, though now it was also mixed with arousal. He and Jake had an understanding but sometimes Jake liked to push his buttons like right now since he couldn't join in. Micah watched carefully as Jake measured Trevor's thick beefy arms 20 in, only a very tiny bit less than Jake's. Jake squeezed and rubbed Trevor's chest grinning as he measured it. There certainly was a lot to grab and play with his manboobs. Trevor bounced his pecs in appreciation under Jake's touch. Jake tried to measure Trevor's body, knowing there was no way it would reach around, everyone was aware of that, but he wanted to see how much it came up short. It came up very short as Jake dug his fingers into Trevor's beefy fatty mass as he went around.

Finally he measured Sam who had approximately similar arm size to Trevor but less chest, gut, legs, and butt. Not that Sam was small by any means but Trevor finally outmeasured him. Trevor smirked. "Haha beat you," he crowed.

"It's only a minor set back, I was busy. Once I actually get back on track I can-uuuurrppp beat both of you," Sam said as Jake squeezed hard around his middle, bringing up exhalation and clearing some room.

"Naw, you're just dethroned. I mean, you're full of gainer shake right now and i'm still bigger than you," Trevor smirked.
"Watch it, I will catch up." Sam warned.
"Nope, I'm the biggest here," Trevor said.
Sam burped again in Jake's face as he squeezed them together and Jake laughed as he patted Sam's belly.
"Hey guys, we're being friendly here, not competing," Micah reminded them,
"Aww, a little competing?" Trevor asked.
"A little, but you're to help each other, not argue about who is bigger."
"Which is me," Trevor said.
"No it's me," Danny grunted.
"Ugh," sighed Micah. "Let's just get through lunch." Jake walked back and pointed to 3 trays, each with five whole pizzas sat.
"Here we got you started, so dig in and eat!" Jake and Micah moved back and sat on the opposite side of the table while Danny, Trevor, and Sam sat down. Sam's gut let out a long loud growly gurgle.

"Sounds like someone's hungry," Trevor joked as he dug into the first slice.
"Oh shut up," Sam said. He felt ill but at the same time hungry for more despite only a few steps from possible explosion. He sniffed it and groaned. School food was actually good once Puck and some other people got the attention of the school board and started showing results. It might be why everybody seems to have put on a few pounds, even if they had nothing to do with Puck or the school teams.

Sam tore into it like he was starving and groaned at the delicious cheesy taste. His predicament faded for a moment and the ill feelings were put into the background as he munched the first slice. Then the second.. Then the third. He was actually keeping up with Danny and Trevor despite being out of practice thanks to the shake. Only pausing to let out out thunderous belches, all three ate as fast as they possibly could, trying only to beat each other.

The boost from the shakes lasted four pizzas. On the fifth though, a switch was flipped and the stuffed fullness came back but worse, his gut straining against his pants. Sam unbuttoned his pants and rubbed his massive stomach groaning at just how heavy he was. He ate slower and slower, expecting to pop with each bite but soon enough, he had finished all 5 pizzas. Unfortuantely, he could do no more and was afraid he would explode, even if he didn't. Sam watched, groaning and burping, desperately rubbing his stomach as Trevor and Danny continued on and even got more. Jake switched sides as he sat beside Sam, rubbing his fingers over Sam's stuffed gut and lowering his face down to kiss it as he rubbed. Sam' straightened a moment before lounging back with a sigh when Jake started rubbing down there. Trevor and Danny were too busy competing against each other to notice, and Micah tried to not say anything. Trevor won but in a rare occasion, Danny actually came really close. That made Danny happy and impressed all of them. Soon Danny and Trevor noticed what Jake was doing.

"Hey, no fair," whined Trevor. "How about something over here?" Jake grinned as he switched back sides and pressed against Trevor's back, his thick belly creating a distance he couldn't overcome. Micah couldn't help but grin at the sight, even if Jake was certainly rubbing in school inappropiate ways against Trevor's back. Moving to the front he rubbed Trevor down, Trevor sighing against him as he squeezed and grabbed each and every part. Finally, he switched over to Danny so he wasn't let out of the loving. Danny groaned as Jake felt him up and down and it was really going heavy when Puck pulled off Jake, shaking his head in mock admonishment,

"Really brother, what have I told you? No doing such hot making out in public at school or at least an unoccupied room seriously. I would recommend a number of nice closets but none of you guys would fit in those spaces."

"How about in your office?" asked Jake. Puck opened his mouth and thought about it.
"Actually, that's not such a bad idea actually since I have my own office. You can take your Puckerman horniness and feel up people there."
"Cool!" Jake said.
"Unfortunately I have to write you up for this to Sue. Don't worry though, I'm sure she'll go easy on you."
"Yaaayyyyyyyy..." Jake said sarcastically. Sue was better but still annoying and a hard ass.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Micah and Jake meet with the team at lunch in t...

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
After lunch was glee so all the glee clubbers said goodbye and headed off to the music room, excited for the best class of school. Lunch period came pretty close but they still loved to perform music. Jake, Ryder, and Sam all waddled in right as the warning bell ended. It certainly was a different looking room from how the year had started but they were still a rather large family.

"Hey guys, try come on time okay?" Will said smiling. They nodded and sat on their side of the room.
"Today we have a very special guest, the one, the only...."
"Rachel!" Sam shouted as he stumbled slowly over to her arms stretched wide as he scooped her light body up in his massive arms. "Rachel it's good to see you!"

"Good to...see you too...can't breathe," Rachel said.
"Oops," Sam muttered putting her down. "Sorry about that." Some of the other club members like Blaine came up and hugged her as well. After giving her remaining classmates hugs there was a slam of the door.

"Someone just told me Rachel was here?!" Puck shouted excitedly as he tried to come into the choir room doorway. He was too big to fit through, he massive body getting stuck in the narrow slot. Cursing, he wiggles back and steps in sideways, pushing his gut up until he squeezes through. Once he's in, he shook his fist at the door. "Damn narrow choir doorroom..." When he was done, he turned back to Rachel and ignored everyone who was staring at him. He ran over and picked her up, squeezing her against him.

"Oh my god, I'm so happy to see you Rach!" Rachel grinned as she laid against him.
"It's good to see you too. You've gotten even bigger than the last time I've seen you."
"You know it," Puck said as he put her down and flexed his muscles. "No one beats Puckasaurus."
"So Rachel, tell everyone what you're doing here," Will Schuester says smiling. He loved it when one of his students came back.
"Oh yeah. I'm doing a new show on tv and it's being filmed near here so I'm going to be around while it is being filmed!"
"No way, why didn't you tell me?!" Puck asked.
"It was a surprise and besides, we haven't had a time we could have talked to each other for a couple weeks. Anyways, I just came in to say hi and see the new changes in Glee club!" She looks over to the side where Blaine, Jake, Ryder, and Sam were. "There certainly are big changes. It sure is different now."

"It actually helps a lot," Will said. "That size gives us the edge and confidence we always needed and although we still need to work on our dancing, it is great for stamina and being able to power-sing, something that we always relied on you and Finn for. Now we have multiple people in Jake, Ryder, Sam, Blaine, Marley, Unique, Kitty...we're so going to win Regionals this year."

"Always prepping," Rachel smiled. "It just never ends but we love it."
"Hey, who's that?" Puck asked when he noticed there was someone else standing in the corner, turned away and studiously looking over the posters on the wall.

"Oh yeah! I almost forgot! Everybody, this is my boyfriend Brody!" She tapped him on the shoulder and he spun around smiling.
"Hey, what's up?" He asked smiling brightly. He turned to Rachel.
"Almost forgot, really? I'm so hurt," he pouted, giving a scolded dog look.
"You were so quiet and I had to greet everyone first," she nuzzled him and he straigthened up and smiled.
"Tell us about yourself Brody," Mr. Schue said.

"Okay, um, I'm Brody, I'm 25, I'm Rachel's boyfriend, I love to perform, act, sing, and dance, and uh, I finally gave into my girl's desire for me to visit her hometown. She's been begging me for a while, but it wasn't until now that I was really able to do it. Rachel's just been showing me around her old school, home, and stuff. Also, we were lucky and we both are in the same show which is a sort of documentary-expose thing of famous glee choirs and McKinley's is one of the more famous in recent years."

"Weren't you going to perform something?" Mr. Schue asked.
"Yeah," Rachel said excitedly. "Brody and I are going to be performing 'Shut Up and Dance With Me.' Ready?"
"Sure," Brody said as he got ready.

Brody started, staring deep into Rachel's eyes "Oh don't you dare look back/just keep you're eyes on me..." opening. Rachel sang the 'Shut up and Dance With me,' and they sang the final bridge together as they danced around. Ryder and Jake were the first to clap but soon everybody was when it was over.

"Whoo! Great job Rachel!" Puck called.
"Thank you, thank you," she said bowing dramatically.
"Good job...other guy," Puck added.
"Brody!" he called back.
"Yeah sure, good job Broseph!" Puck said, deliberately getting the name wrong just for the fun of it. It actually was a good performance though. Jake was impressed by Brody's dancing skill and while he wasn't quite as good as Jake, he was definitely talented. He also had a surprisingly amazing voice. Everyone else agreed that it was awesome.

"That was a great job guys!" Mr. Schue gushed. "Brody you can come anytime you like while you're here."
"Thank you, sir." Brody said respectfully.

"That was a sample of our lesson of the day which is power duets..." Mr. Schue started in excitedly on his lesson. Puck kept looking at Brody who was eying all the massive guys around him. Brody kept a straight face but it was obvious he was nervous, as he should be. Brody was pretty boy built but not anywhere close to the size of any of the Glee club guys all of whom were much more bigger and stronger. Puck was still Finn's bro and needed to test Brody out to see if this Brody dude was worthy of Rachel. So far Brody seemed great other than being such a small size. Brody needed a true man's size to be worthy of Rachel but fortunately he had many teachers at his disposal. Fortunately since it seemed he would be around, Puck could help him fill that role.

After Glee was over, Puck followed behind Brody and Rachel. "Hey Rachel, glad you're back. Are you and Brody doing anything today?"
"Well, I have rehearsal but Brody's free."
"That's fine. Would you mind if me and some of the other guys showed Brody around?"
"Wow, you got my name right," Brody muttered. Puck glared briefly before looking at Rachel expectantly.
"Sure, if Brody wants to.."
"You totally should," Puck said putting a hand on Brody's shoulder and subtly squeezing. "It would be a real good idea." Brody got the idea.
"Oh, uh, sure, I would love to hang out with you guys after school."
"Great!" Puck smiled brightly. Rachel beamed.
"Okay, I didn't want to leave Brody alone but since he's going to be with you guys, have fun!" She bounced off. As soon as she was gone, Brody glared at him.

"Dude, what was that for?"
"You're going to be coming with us on a trip," Puck smiled.
"Is this where you intimidate me away from Rachel or something?"
"Not really. That would be up to you. But let's just say Rachel's got certain,,,standards, At the moment you're fine but eventually who knows?"
"What are you talking about?" Brody glowered.
"Let's just say you're a little...small if you're catching my drift." Brody raised an eyebrow and Puck patted Brody's flat stomach.
"Very nice work. But if you want Rachel, you're going to have to put on some weight."
"I don't believe you," Brody said.
"I'm not saying that Rachel for sure will dump you but it won't hurt to be a bit bigger. You do love her yes?"
"I do," Brody said seriously.
"Then meet with us after school at this address. As you can tell, we McKInnley men have a knack for putting on weight.
"I'll say," Brody said faintly.
"We're doing it ourselves but I just can't help but to help another person in need of my expertise. I really hope you consider it."
"I...might. Who else is going to be there?"
"Jake, Ryder, Dave, me, and you. Today it will just be us. You don't have to worry about a thing. We will take good care of you."
"Why does that sound so downright ominous?" Brody muttered.
"Remember, this address after school. I can't wait to see you," Puck said smirking.
"See you then?" Brody said uncertainly. He wasn't at all sure about this and it seemed hard to believe that it was true what Puck was saying about Rachel but anything that gave him an edge, will, he did want to try to make her happy. He could at least see what these people were about.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Glee Club with Will Schuester

choices: Got up and ordered a meal for Brody, stuffing him with every bite!
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Brody pulled his car up into the only empty parking spot he could find and lifted himself out of his car; locking it as he made his way to the entrance. Big red and black letters spelled out 'KAROFSKY'S ALL-YOU-CAN-EAT BELLYBUSTER!' above the incredibly wide doors. Brody pushed one of the door open and walked inside, lifting up his sunglasses and looking around. The place was packed with guys chowing down on huge amounts of food, each one fatter than then last and being waited by on beefy, fat guys in revealing uniforms. The widescreen tv's placed around the restaurant all had whatever football game was playing live at the moment.

         Brody looked around, trying to find Puck amongst all of the portly patrons, when he was approached by a waiter; 20-something years old, dark skin, with thick, muscular arms and a gut that pushed out from under the crop top that read 'KARAOFSKY'S' and hung over the waistband of the booty shorts he was tightly packed into.
"Welcome to Karofsky's!" The waiter said, "My names Mitchell - may I show you to a table?"
"Oh, uh, sure! I'm actually here to meet somebody," Brody said, a little flustered, "He's supposed to be here; tall, built like a monster with a huge gut, mohawk-"
"OH, you mean Mr. Puckerman! I'll take you right to him, follow me!" Mitchell said as he turned and headed towards the back of the buffet.

         Brody's eyes wandered the entire time he walked through the restaurant; flicking between short glances at beefy men shoveling down fattening food and the AMAZING ass on the waiter leading him towards Puck. Brody wasn't very open about his bisexuality - or his preferences for HUGE men - but he was doing his best not to get a boner as he walked through the buffet. Mitchell lifted up a curtain in the back and lead Brody to a section of the restaurant that was less crowded and much quieter; the VIP section.

         There were fewer tables and seats, all of which seemed to be made of much nicer material than the ones back in the main section. The walls were a dark red color with golden accents and Brody could tell from smell alone that the food in there was higher quality than in the main section - not that the food out there didn't smell heavenly too. Looking around Brody noticed some familiar faces in the room; Jake Puckerman and his boyfriend, Ryder. The were at one table eating like champs and watching the same football game that was on in the other room. At the next table was the big man himself; Noah Puckerman.

         Brody licked his lips a little at the sight of him - it was much different from the Puck he meet at the high school that day. No longer decked out in his red and white coaching uniform Puck was wearing a faded graphic black tee that didn't cover a single inch of his expansive gut. Over that was a denim vest with spikes on the shoulders and a pair of dark red jeans and sneakers. Puck was sitting in a booth - his enormous ass taking up the space of two and a half people and his gut, huge, round, beefy, and plush, had been lifted up on top of the table and was taking up 1/4 of it's space.

         Puck was watching the game, shoving a huge slice of pizza into his mouth, as Brody and the waiter approached them, "Mr. Puckerman, sir, your guest has arrived!"
"HMM?" Puck said, mouth full of pizza. He swallowed the food down and grinned, "HEY, Brodster! 'Bout time you showed up! Thanks for showing him back here, Mitch, why don't you take 10 and fill up that gut of yours? You're lookin' thin." Puck said.
"Sure thing, sir!" Mitchell said before heading out.
"Have a seat and order up, small fry! It's on the house!" Puck said, patting at the small space remaining on his right side.

         Brody went to sit down on the opposite side of Puck but Puck protested, "Dude, how are we gonna talk when I won't even be able to see you over this baby?" he said, patting his gigantic gut. Brody sat down on the opposite side anyway and scooted closer so he next to Puck, though the giant ball of muscle and fat that was the man's belly blocked his view of anything past it. Brody looked at the table and raised an eyebrow, "Got enough food?" Brody asked and Puck laughed loudly, "You're funny, Broseph. I'm only on my 3rd course. I've got plenty of room!"

         "Okay, I gotta be honest; are you for real?" Brody asked.
Puck smirked, "All natural!" Puck said, giving his gut another smack.
"No, I mean, dude, you're MASSIVE! Like the BIGGEST person I've ever met!" Brody said, a little red in the face.
"Aww, stop, you're making me blush." Puck said as he shoved the last slice of pizza into his mouth.
"Why did you invite me here?" Brody asked, "To watch you eat? Cause I've other things I could be doing."
Puck swallowed and smiled, "I invited you here because you're as thin as a branch. I've known Rachel for YEARS and trust me when I say she prefers a heftier man."
"Like you?" Brody asked.
"Well, NOBODY can resist me, but yeah. Which is where I come in. I'm willing to fatten you up for free, Broster; I don't offer this to many people. Rachel's an old friend and she deserves the best." Puck said.

         "Well, thats nice and all," Brody replied, "But I can't. If I gain more than twenty pounds they'll kick me off the show; it's in my contract."
"I've never heard something so sad." Puck responded. "Well, you might as well eat SOMETHING, dude. It'd be rude to my boyfriend, the OWNER, not to."
Brody sighed, "Might as well."
As Brody looked over the menu he heard something and peeked over his menu; Puck was struggling to reach the next Pizza with his gut in the way. Brody pushed the pizza closer to Puck and the enormous man snatched it up, "Thanks, man!"
"No problem..." Brody said, a little turned on by the sight now that he'd settled in.

         "So, uh, Puck. How much do you weigh if you don't mind me asking?" Brody asked.
"750 pounds!" Puck said proudly.
"750?!"
"and growing!" Puck said, flexing his massive arms, "Course it's not all fat. I'm actually mostly muscle."
"Yeah, I can tell." Brody said, more turned on than before.
"Dude, if you're not gonna eat than you might as well make yourself useful and feed me." Puck said.
"Wait, what?" Brody replied.
"Feed. Me." Puck repeated, "Shove food into my mouth. I have a saying, small fry. Skinny guys are only good for two things - feeding you or fattening up themselves. Since you won't do the later than you might as well start shoving it in."

         Brody swallowed the lump in his throat and scooted closer to Puck, lifting up a slice of pizza from the tray on the table and holding it over Puck's mouth. Puck opened wide and took the entire thing into his mouth - surprising Brody. Brody kept it up, slice after slice disappearing into Puck's giant gut. Brody looked back at the table and saw 5 more piping hot pizzas. He grabbed one and just kept going, Puck's hot, plump lips closing around his fingers as he dropped slice after slice into his throat. In no time at all the 5 pizzas vanished into Puck's mass and as if on cue another waiter pulled up with trolley of at least 20 pounds of spaghetti and meatballs with a huge platter of bread.

         Brody scooted around to the outer edge of the table and went to work on that as well, stuffing the coach with meat and pasta. Once all of the spaghetti, meatballs, and bread were down Puck's gullet Puck...
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Brody meets Puck at Dave's Buffet!

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Puck let out a resounding belch, blasting Brody’s eardrums. “UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP, yeah that’s the stuff.” Jake turned his head around from where he was holding a slice of pizza against Ryder's mouth, feeding him.
"Nice," he said laughing. He looked at Brody. "Oh hey, when did you get here?"
"A while ago," Brody laughed.
"Oh, sorry for ignoring you man, I didn't even notice you arrived." Ryder groaned and Jake turned his attention back as he lovingly rubbed Ryder's stuffed belly. "Just a little more..."

With a massive groan Puck pushed himself up and Brody was amazed when Puck actually got out of his seat and edged along until he was free of the table and actually stood. Brody couldn't figure out how Puck was able to move, let alone get up by this point. When he arrived, Puck had already been eating and he had just fed Puck by hand five whole pizzas and and a ridiculous amount of pasta and bread. It was almost like feeding a black hole although clearly the food was going somewhere as Puck's stomach was a massively bloated oblong ball that hung over and blocked the view of his pants. Actually, Brody was also amazed that there were even pants that came anywhere close to Puck's size. Brody watched Puck walk, his massive body plodding ahead and well, he was aching by this point by the strain in his pants. Thinking of unsexy things was not helping now since he had a full-on view of Puck's entire body and he wasn't focused on other things and he was going to have to go to the bathroom so he got up but Puck turned to look at him.

"Where are you going?" he asked smirking. Brody quickly sat back down.
"Nowhere," he said quickly.
"Right. After all, its your turn."
"My turn to what?" Brody asked.
"To eat of course! I mean you're here after all and I want to help you too."
"But my contract..."
"Says more than twenty pounds. Which means you could gain up to."
"I don't think that's really the point..."
"Don't you ever want to cut back and relax? To not have to worry about dieting?"
"Yeah but..."
"It's a rare opportunity to have the Puckasaurus help you and to get food for free to boot." Brody's stomach let out a gurgle at that moment. It had been a while since he ate and smelling the aroma of food and talking about all this eating was making him hungry.

"Well, okay, fine then I suppose I could have a little something." There was a snort giggle across the room that was either Jake or Ryder but wasn't clear who. Puck grinned.

"Okay then, I'll order a 'little' something." Puck went through a door in the back and was gone for a few minutes before coming back. "Okay, I ordered and your food will be out shortly."

"Really? That is fast and...wait what did you order?"
"You don't mind do you?" Puck asked.
"Not really, I'm not going to be picky but I am curious." Puck picked a chair that was back against the wall and brought it to the table.
"Move over here please?" Brody was confused at first but then he realized Puck probably couldn't get into the booth again, not without extreme difficulty. Actually thinking about it, it was amazing Puck had even fit to start with getting in but now that he was stuffed, he couldn't push in. There was a massive creak as Puck sat in the chair and Brody was impressed that the chair didn't break under that massive fatass of Puck's.

"The chairs are all reinforced for our patrons," Puck said, seeming to read Brody's mind since he was staring at the chair. "As you see we have a lot of big people that eat here and it makes sense to have chairs that don't break under people's weights." He patted the booth near him again and Brody scooted there. "Oh and I ordered the staples really. Pizza, pasta, mashed potatoes, the works. Let me warn you right now, you're going to lose your mind when you taste it, it's so good."

"I bet," Brody said. Puck asked him some questions about how Rachel was doing before another massive waiter rolled up a multi-level cart to the table that was loaded. "That's not all for me is it?" Brody asked wide-eyed. "I can't eat all that."

"Of course I don't expect you to eat all of it," Puck said. "Just a lot of it. What do you want to start with?"
"Hey, I'm just going to..." Puck reached out and held on.
"You got to chill Broseph. Now, what do you want to start with?"

"Well I guess the Spaghetti looks good," Brody said. Actually, it looked and smelled downright heavenly and was making his mouth water and his stomach roar ravenously. He was even hungrier than he realized as it had been hours since breakfast and he only had a small snack on the plane. He and Rachel had only arrived that day.

Puck took a plate from the stack and scooped a massive serving of spaghetti and meatballs onto it, setting it in front of Brody. "Bon Appetite," he grinned handing Brody a fork. He leaned and watched as Brody took his first bite of Dave's cooking. Puck smirked as he watched the starstruck amazed look cross across Brody's face. People always looked like that after tasting Dave's food for the first time, and with good reason. Dave was a fantastic cook and made everything taste exceptionally amazing. There really were no words to describe it but mind-blowing.

Brody was hooked after his first bite. The taste just danced on his tongue and he eagerly continued eating, shoveling it into his mouth. Normally he wasn't a messy eater but he couldn't have enough as he slurped and shoveled it into his mouth. It even got the attention of Jake and Ryder who also stared in shocked amusement as Brody ravenously sucked the noodles down. They were shocked not because it was exceptional, this was a rather common experience with them, but it just seemed so amusingly incongrous with Brody's reserved polite manner. Sauce splattered over his face and rather fancy clothes. Soon it was done and Puck quickly scooped more onto Brody's plate. Brody eagerly started sucking that up as well. After that, Brody opened his eyes to see them all looking at him.

"What?" he burped before he could stop himself. He flushed a little red with embarassment.
"Excuse me," he muttered. Jake, Puck,, and Ryder all laughed making Brody flush more.
"It's okay man, you're in the company of men. Also, it'd be rather weird and rather insulting if you didn't. Anyhow, are you thirsty? I kind of forgot that," Puck asked.

"Sure, I could use a drink," Brody replied.
"Jake, go get the man a drink," Puck ordered and Jake smirked at Brody as he got up and left. Puck and Jake were having way too much fun with this. Soon Jake was back, bringing back a massive pitcher of Dr. Pepper which he put down.

"There you go," he said as he sat down. Brody felt a little weird now since he was surrounded by three massive guys who were all sitting near him and watching very intently. They seemed way too interested in this.

"Can you move back a little?" he asked and Jake and Ryder moved back a smidge. It wasn't very far and made Brody roll his eyes but he decided to eagerly start on the next plate.

This time it was massive scoops of mashed potatoes. He took the gravy pot and covered them in gravy because that is the only way to eat mashed potatoes: smothered in delicious gravy. Even though he was ready and prepared, the first bite of the potatoes still nearly floored him. It was so good! Moaning around it, he scooped the perfectly mashed and fluffed potatoes into his mouth, his hands moving of their own accord as he ate bite after bite after bite. He was seriously going to have to learn how to make these for sure as he had never tasted such perfect mashed potatoes anywhere before. He paused only briefly to drink some Dr. Pepper before returning back to the potatoes and gravy which easily went down and he had two massive plates of just potatoes and gravy. Once he had finished the second plate, Brody leaned back for a pause. He was feeling pretty laid back and content. He rubbed his stomach surreptiously.

"How about some pizza?" Puck asked. Brody thought about it.
"I guess a few slices won't hurt," Brody said. He was beginning to feel pretty full but he did have room for a slice or two maybe. Especially if it was the same quality as the pasta and potatoes. Puck put two slices onto his plate and Brody started. He was right, it was amazing. Brody ate those slices. Puck put two more down. Brody shook his head.

"Nah, I'm fine. Two slices are enough for me." Puck frowned.
"You still have room."
"No, I'm pretty full. Thanks for the meal though," Brody burped and rubbed his gut. "I haven't been this full for a long time."
"You still have room for more though," Puck said.

"No really, I'm-" Brody was cut off when Puck grabbed his mouth with one massive hand and with the other shoved a pizza slice in. Brody rapidly chewed as Puck kept pushing it in. "No I'm-" he was cut off again and again as Puck fed him another slice and then another. Realizing it was futile, Brody stopped talking although he did try to keep his mouht shut. Jake was there however and held his mouth open for Puck to put it in. Only after Brody had eaten ten of the slices did Puck let him go. Brody leaned back winded, feeling incredibly stuffed. Not even caring they could all see this now, he unbuttoned his pants and the straing buttons of his shirt, letting his bloated belly spill out into the now free space. Brody was shocked by how bloated his belly was at the moment. It strained forward and weighed down. Not even a hint of his abs were visible under the bloated ball. He just felt heavy. Raising heavy eyes, he saw the eager looks on Puck, Jake, and even Ryder's faces as they stared intently at it. He felt like a big fat balloon ball on display but he was too stuffed to even care at the moment.

"Might as well make yourselves useful and rub it," Brody said tiredly to them, groaning as the pain really hit him. He rubbed frantically at it, trying to relieve the pressure. Puck, Jake, and Ryder grinned to each other over his head and leaned down rubbing.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Got up and ordered a meal for Brody, stuffing h...

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
The sharp, high pitched screech of Puck's whistle filled the air of the McKinley High gym. All 10 boys of the varsity wrestling team stopped the chatter jogged over to Puck - thick thighs jiggling and enormous bellies bouncing as they did. All 10 of them, each one thicker, beefier, and fatter than the last, were all in skin tight red-and-white wrestling singlets. Trevor and Sam were the last two to make it to the group, huge, fat guts jiggling in their singlets as they waddled over. Puck dropped his whistle, which landed snuggly in the cavern formed between his monster pecs, and placed his fists on his insanely wide hips.

         Puck looked at his team silently for a while behind his black aviator shades, each boy standing still and waiting for their coach to speak. Puck wore an 8XL red polo, custom made, that was tucked snugly under his gut and into his white 78 inch shorts which clung tightly to his amazingly huge thighs and massive round ass. On the left breast of Puck's polo read the words "COACH PUCKERMAN" with "WRESTLING" underneath and his mohawk was hidden beneath his McKinley High baseball cap. Puck removed his sunglasses, tucking them into the open collar of his polo, "Okay, team, you all know we've got a BIG match coming up against the Carmel High Great Whites. I expect EACH and EVERY one of you to put your all into this! I want each of you to break up into groups of two." Puck said.

         The team knew each split into 5 groups of two; Trevor and Sam obviously sticking together. Puck smirked at this sight, and then assigned numbers 1-5 for each group, Trevor and Sam being #1, "Okay, person the left of each group, you're A. Everyone else is B. You'll practice basics for 15 minutes and when I blow the whistle person B of each group will go to the next number. 1 to 2, 2 to 3, etc." The 750 pound coach said, waving his hand in the air. Puck then blew hard into his whistle and the 10 boys scattered to the training rings set up.

         Puck waddled over to the two folding chair and table set up for him and groaned as he sat his 750 pound body down, one massive ass cheek per chair. The cheap folding chairs groaned and creaked under Puck's mass - the metal legs visibly bowing under the heft of the obese-yet-ripped coach. Behind Puck, on the school bleachers, sat Jake and Ryder watching with perverse eyes as the wrestling team trained.

         Jake's eyes scanned the room, subtitling point out each guy to Ryder and mutter their weights to him, "220.. 360... 280-ish..."
"Ill never get over how you're so good at that." Ryder said to his huge boyfriend.
"It's a gift." Jake said, winking before looking back, "410," he said, point out the 3rd biggest guy on the team, "And he's got a hot pear shape to him as well; Nice thick thighs and a fat ass. He actually sits in front of me in english, too. That meaty ass of his doesn't even fit in the school's seats anymore."
Ryder chuckled, enjoying the way his boyfriend rambled on about guys he wanted to fuck. Just then the doors to the gym opened and in came Rachel Berry, heels clicking against the floor as she made her way in, Brody sheepishly following her.

         Jake leaned forward so Puck could hear him, "Looks like somebodies in troooooubleeeee~" Jake said, teasing his big bro.
Puck rolled his eyes and placed his meaty paws on his thighs, pushing to help him lift his heft which bounced and jiggled as he did so. Puck waddled over towards Rachel, which wasn't more than a few steps since she didn't stop walking.
"Hey, Rach! Brod." Puck said in a flirtatious manner, leaning slightly to the side to acknowledge Brody.

         "Cut back on the charm, Puckerman. You know what I'm here." Rachel said, crossing her arms angrily.
"It wouldn't happen to be about that 17 pounds of pudge Brody is trying so desperately to hide under a slimming black t-shirt and cardigan, is it?" Puck said, raising his eyebrow.
"Yes, it is!" Rachel said, taking a step forward - only an inch or so between her and Puck's massive overhanging gut, "You KNEW about Brody's contract but you couldn't help yourself anyway, could you? You just HAD to stuff him?"
"Yeah, I did." Puck said, nonchalantly, "Rach, his contract says NO MORE than 20 pounds. Brody only gained 17 pounds from his little lunch at Dave's buffet with me. I don't see the problem."

         "The problem is you don't have any self-control, Noah." Rachel said, "Once you start you can't stop fattening up a guy until he's massive."
"I still don't see the issue." Puck said totally honestly.
"Look, you know I don't actually care that you fatten guys up for a living. But you knew Brody could get in trouble and he almost got fired this morning. I'm not gonna stop you from doing it but don't. Do. It. To. BRODY." Rachel said, poking Puck hard in his pec with each word.
"Owwww... Fine." Puck said, rubbing the sore spot on his pec, "I won't fatten Brody up again UNLESS he asks me to. Deal?"
Rachel stared at him for a moment before giving him a small chuckle, "Deal. C'mon, babe, we gotta get back on set."

         Brody stared at Puck for a bit, a little flustered, before speaking, "See you guys." He said before following Rachel out. Puck smirked before taking his whistle and blowing hard into it, signaling for the boys to switch partners.

Two hour later the heavy-set boys of New Directions (Jake, Ryder, Sam, and Blaine) were all gathered in the choir room for a fitting of the outfits they'll be wearing at Regionals next week, having won sectionals earlier that year. Mr. Schue had left room to get some coffee while the boys undressed and tried on their new clothing - all of which had to be custom ordered for their sizes. As Jake slid into his perfectly fitting black dress pants he looked over at Blaine, "So, Blaine, where were you today? You're Puck's official assistant and I didn't see you at wrestling today."

         "Thats true," Sam said, buttoning his shirt down.
"I was off campus, actually. Mr. Schue needed to grade papers so he had me drive to the tailors to pick up the clothes. Puck didn't mind." Blaine replied as he struggled to tuck his shirt in under his gut. "Y'know, I love weighing 450 pounds but it makes getting dressed a pain in the ass."
"Ain't that the truth," Blaine's 550 pound boyfriend replied, finally tucking in his dress shirt and throwing on his red and white blazer.
"Its the price we pay for vanity, I guess." Ryder said, buttoning his blazer up.

         All four fatties looked each other over, turning around showing off their new outfits. Each of them were in red blazers with white piping, white dress shirts and red ties, with black dress pants and red dress shoes - all of which fit perfectly.
"Wow, you guys look great!" a voice said. All four boys turned to see Puck and Trevor standing outside the classroom.
"OH, hey guys!! C'mon on in!" Sam said, grinning.
Trevor waddled in first, his fat gut and hips brushing the sides of the doorframe. Puck was another issue as the school had enough in the budget to widen the door of his office. The 750 pound man struggled as he pushed through, his fat molding around the door frame as he tried in vain to get through. Finally, Puck POPPED through into the room, his heavy body shaking the room a bit as he landed on his feet - fat jiggling all over.

         Puck was still in his coaching uniform but Trevor had changed into the outfit he'd worn all day; a light blue button up (the buttons straining to contain his massive, flabby gut), a pair of dark jeans, and his WHHS letterman jacket, "Outfits for regionals?" Trevor asked with a interested face.
"Yeah! They're custom made, too." Ryder responded.
"New Directions is actually pretty famous on the show choir circuit. Partly cause we've won a bunch of times." Blaine said before he was cut off by Sam.
"Recently, though, it's cause of these bad boys." Sam said, placing his hands under his fat gut, lifting it, and dropping it - the massive ball of fat bouncing in Sam's perfectly tailored uniform.
"Oh, sweet!" Trevor said, scratching behind his head, "Hey, umm, I was wondering... Do you guys have any room in the group for new guys?"

         "You thinkin' of joining, Lloger?" Puck asked, calling Trevor by his last name.
"Yeah, actually. I've wanted to for a while but I was always worried I was too, well, BIG. Silly, right?" Trevor asked.
"Not at all!" Mr. Schue said as he walked back in, Puck noticing his sweater vest a little tighter around the middle than usual, "But your audition will have to wait until after Regionals." Will said, "We've already got out routine planned out around these big guys." He said, pointing to the other four.
"Oh, yeah, no worries!! Trev said, excited.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Wrestling Practice and a Performance Fitting.

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
"Whoo! This place is packed!" Puck said as he and Dave waddled into the theatre that Regionals was being held in. Every seat in the house was taken by attendees from all over the state of Ohio - each one eager to see the school they're rooting for win and head to this year's nationals. Dave and Puck were both dressed semi-formally; Puck was wearing a dark red graphic t-shirt with a black blazer, a pair of khaki pants, and dress shoes (all custom ordered for his size) while Dave was in a blue button up, jeans, and dress shoes. Dave's wardrobe wasn't as perfectly tailored for his bulk as Puck's was - the button up stretched tightly across his fat gut and thick arms and his jeans looked painted on to his thigh thighs and huge ass.

         Puck and Dave made their way down to the seats that Will had reserved for them along with Rachel, Brody, and Trevor; a favor Puck asked Will to do for him. The two reached the aisle where their seats will and Puck let out a sigh of irritation, "Schuester, I thought you said these seats were front row?" Puck said, staring at the small space between the seats and the back of the next row.
"I said near the front row, Puck. You'll just have to squeeze in. This was the best I could do; you're lucky I was able to get you two seats." Will said, looking back down at the program.
"Hey, Puck!" Trevor said, sitting next to Will. Trevor was also dressed semi-formally; a plaid button up with the sleeves rolled up, a dark blue jacket, and jeans with nice sneakers, but like Dave Trevor looked like he'd burst out of it any second.
Puck sighed and turned sideways, "Hey, Trevor," he said sucking in his gut the best he could as he shuffled to his seat.

         Trevor lifted up the arm rest between Puck's two seats seconds before Puck dropped his 775 pound body onto them; the soft, plush theatre seats audibly groaning under Puck's heavy mass. Puck let out a deep breath and his gut surged forward, filling up the remainder of his lap and pressing up against the back of the two chairs in front of him.
"Thanks, Trev." Puck said, before chuckling, "And thanks for getting me the two seats, Will. It's kinda impossible for me to sit anywhere without two now."
"No problem." Will replied.
Dave sat down in the seat next to Puck's, grunting a bit as he did.
"Everything okay, babe?" Puck asked.
"Yeah, these seats are a little too small for me." Dave said, trying to find a comfortable way to sit in the slightly-too-small chairs.
"Yeah, they're pretty thin," Trevor responded, "Took me a few minutes to set comfortably myself." Puck looked to his left and saw that Trevor looked like he was practically pouring out of the small chair.
"You're looking huge, Trev. That team I put you on with Sam and Danny working for ya?"

         "Yeah!!" Trevor replied, "The three of us all put on about 20 pounds each this week! I'm still the biggest."
"580, huh? Good job." Puck said.
"You remember why weight?" Trevor asked.
"Course I do, Lloger" Puck replied, "You're the heaviest guy I've ever made - how could I not remember my star pupil's weight?"
"Th-thanks..." Trevor said, his face turning beet red.

Meanwhile, backstage, The New Directions were getting ready for their performance. They were scheduled to go first and everybody was preparing and getting into place.
"Has anybody seen Sam?" Marley asked.
"He's kinda hard miss." Artie replied jokingly as he wheeled over.
"No, I know that but I haven't seen him since we arrived." Marley replied.
Just then Sam's familiar heavy footsteps could be heard as he waddle-jogged in, "Hey, guys, sorry about that." Sam said as he reached the group, "I was having a bit of a wardrobe problem."
"That's pretty clear." Kitty said, looking Sam over.

         Sam's once perfectly-tailored uniform was now tight across his thick, fat frame. Sam's white dress shirt was snug along his giant, flabby gut; the buttons holding on well but it was visibly clear that the shirt was tighter than when he wore it a week ago. His red and white blazer was button but the buttons looked like they were gonna pop off at any second and his pants looked painted on.
"Sam," Blaine said, an upset look on his face, "You know we were supposed to lay off the gaining this week so these would fit perfectly."
"I know," Sam replied, "But Puck was so upset with me that I couldn't help myself - and it's just 20 pounds."
"20 pounds makes all the difference," Unique said as she walked over, unbuttoning Sam's blazer and adjusting his tie, "There, now nobody in the audience can tell."
Just then the stage manager informed the group it was show time and the lights were dimmed as New Directions made their way on stage.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: The Day of Regionals.

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
"Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to this year's Glee Club Regional competition! First up, from Lima, Ohio, please welcome last year's national champions, McKinley High School's New Directions!!"

         The music started up, the lights flashed on, and Jake, who was standing right in the middle of the group, turned on his heel and started singing as he walked down the steps of the three rowed raised platform,

"Oh don't you dare look back
Just keep your eyes on me.
I said your holding back,
She said shut up and dance with me!"


         At 'shut up and dance with me'" Ryder and Marley chimed in, walked up to either side of him.

"This woman is my destiny
She said oh oh oh
Shut up and dance with me"


         Ryder and Marley twirled into Jake's arms before going back out. Ryder and Marley took the next verse; Ryder singing the first two lines and sharing the next line with Marley before she sang the last two, dancing in sync as they did.

We were victims of the night,
The chemical, physical, kryptonite
Helpless to the bass and faded light
Oh we were born to get together,
Born to get together.


         Jake took over the next two lines before all three sang the chorus together:

"She took my arm,
I don't know how it happened.
We took the floor and she said

Oh don't you dare look back
Just keep your eyes on me.
I said your holding back,
She said shut up and dance with me!
This woman is my destiny
She said oh oh oh
Shut up and dance with me!"


         The song continued - New Directions giving back up and dancing as Ryder, Marley, and Jake sang the rest of the song. Jake's solid, beefy muscles flexed in his perfectly tailored suit and Ryder's chunky belly, thighs, and ass shook and jiggled as he danced. The last few chords were played before the music stopped and the group posed, waiting a few seconds as the audience cheered.
"We totally inspired them." Rachel said, leaning over to Brody.
The next song started up right away with Unique and Kitty singing:

"Because you know I'm all about that bass,
'Bout that bass, no treble.
I'm all 'bout that bass, 'bout that bass, no treble
I'm all 'bout that bass, 'bout that bass, no treble
I'm all 'bout that bass, 'bout that bass, bass, bass, bass, BASS"


         The two girls moved as Sam stepped through them, a cocky grin on his fat face as he sang:

"Yeah it's pretty clear, I ain't no size two
But I can shake it, shake it like I'm supposed to do
'Cause I got that boom boom that all the boys chase
All the right junk in all the right places."


         While Sam sang he swirled his hips and did his signature body wave move, which he learned from back when he was a stripper. As Sam danced his enormous gut bounced around, his huge, fat body jiggling in every way as he performed.

"I see the magazines working that Photoshop
We know that stuff ain't real
Come on now, make it stop
If you got beauty beauty just raise 'em up
'Cause every inch of you is perfect
From the bottom to the top."

         Unique and Kitty sang along with Sam during the last two lines before Blaine joined in, his gargantuan body jiggling and shaking just as much as his boyfriend's did.

"Yeah, my momma she told me don't worry about your size
She says, boys they like a little more booty to hold at night
You know I won't be no stick-figure, silicone Barbie doll,
So, if that's what's you're into
Then go ahead and move along."

         The four sang the rest of the song, Sam and Blaine taking most of the lines while Unique and Kitty chimed in here and there; the rest of ND doing back up. The song ended and group posed once more as the audience cheered and clapped. Puck, who thought it would be best to wait until everything was over to stand up, leaned over to Dave, "My idea."

         The music started up again, this one much slower than the previous two. The glee club members took their places before Ryder stepped forward, singing;

"I know I took the path that you would never want for me
I know I let you down, didn't I?
So many sleepless nights where you were waiting up on me
Well I'm just a slave unto the night."


         Jake stepped forward next, on the opposite end of the stage of Ryder;

"Now remember when I told you that's the last you'll see of me
Remember when I broke you down to tears
I know I took the path that you would never want for me
I gave you hell through all the years"


         There was a pause before the music kicked up and the entire club started singing the chorus, moving about the stage the same way they'd rehearsed;

"So I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you
I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you"


         Sam stepped forward next, singing his verse, followed by Blaine;

"I've been around the world and never in my wildest dreams
Would I come running home to you
I've told a million lies but now I tell a single truth
There's you in everything I do.

Now remember when I told you that's the last you'll see of me
Remember when I broke you down to tears
I know I took the path that you would never want for me
I gave you hell through all the years."


The whole club chimed in again;

"So I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you
I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you"


         All four boys stepped to the front of the stage, paired up by relationship, and sang together;

"Don't tell me that I'm wrong
I've walked that road before
And left you on your own
And please believe them when they say
That it's left for yesterday
And the records that I've played
Please forgive me for all I've done"


         One last time all of the club members sang together for the final chorus;

"So I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you
I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you

So I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you
I, I bet my life, I bet my life
I bet my life on you!"


         Everybody bowed their heads as the lights shut off once the final note ended and the audience cheered louder than they had the entire time. New Directions quickly left the stage, grins on all their faces because they pulled that off flawlessly. The group reached their waiting room as the next school performed and all of them took a minute to relax.

         "I'll be honest, Sam, I thought your shirt was gonna burst open when you were dancing." Ryder admitted, patting Sam's huge gut.
"I did too, honestly. Thank god it didn't." Same replied.
The rest of the group all sat down and waited until they were called on stage again for the announcements of who got took what place. Everyone was nervous but the second they heard "NEW DIRECTIONS" as the winners it all melted away and were replaced with cheers and laughter.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: New Direction's Regionals Performance.

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
"Celebration at Dave's!" Puck called out in a booming voice. "Anyone who wants to come is welcome!" Marley, Kitty, and Unique passed since they already had plans for their own celebration and they knew full well what happened to people who ate at Dave's. The rest however were excited and they all got into their cars and followed behind Puck and Dave to the restaurant.

"Where is everyone?" Sam asked when they got out and saw the parking lot was pretty much empty.
"I closed the place down for the day so it would be just our group," Dave said. "It is a special occasion after all that should only be celebrated in the company of friends."

"That's very kind of you Dave," Mr. Schue said.
"It's my pleasure," Dave grinned as he took out his keys and opened up. "Just let me tell the staff we're ready. Of course, a lot of food has already been prepared since we knew we had big eaters coming." Dave went in and headed straight to the back where he talked to the staff before returning. "Okay, we're good to go. Sit anywhere you like and food is set out already. If you have any special requests of course, just talk to a waiter and we will get right on it."

Eerybody headed in and got started right away in getting the first course. There was a huge variety of food set out and something for everyone. There was eggs, pancakes, sausage, bacon, etc for those who liked breakfast for dinner; different types of pasta like lasagna, angel hair, spaghetti, fettuchini, linguini; hotdogs, pizza, meat platters, macaroni and cheese, fried chicken, barbecued ribs, soups, jello, cake, salad, and so forth. The two long tables were overflowing with food. They all grabbed what they wanted and moved to sit down at another long table that they pushed together from smaller ones as they sat and ate together.

"That was an awesome set we did, Vocal Adrenaline did not know what hit them!" Jake was narrating with exaggerated epic detail of how they trounced the other groups. "They were in total awe of us when Sam, Ryder, Marley, and I did those incredible twirls because no one expected us to be able to dance so well with how large we are." Suddenly there was an additional ching of the bell as another person stepped in.

"Room for one more?" the stranger asked.
"I'm sorry, this is a private gathering for the New Directions and invited guests so if you come back another time..." Puck got up and started saying before he screamed. He wobbled for a moment before he ran towards the figure and squeezed them hard against his stomach. "OH MY GOD I NEVER THOUGHT I WOULD SEE YOU AGAIN!!!!!!" Puck bellowed loudly at the top of his lungs and he actually started to cry.

"Um, hey, you are...oh my god, is that you Puck?!"
"Yes it is! You have no idea how much I missed you! If this wasn't so such a happy moment, I'd kick your ass black and blue because how dare you for not calling, texting, or communicating! I must admit I was beginning to think you were dead."

"Puck, who is that?" Rachel called out, getting up.
"You would not believe who just came in the door! It's Finn!"
"Finn?!" Rachel shouted loud. Everybody else in the group became excited when they heard the name.
"Oh my god, Finn's back?!" Sam yelled excitedly as he got up and ran to join Puck and Rachel. So did all the original glee club members, leaving only Jake, Ryder, Brody, and Trevor at the table as they weren't too familiar with Finn. Of course, Jake and Ryder had heard stories of the legendary Finn who had been leader of the Glee club until he had graduated and vanished so they were curious but at the moment, everybody else was surrounding him.

"I can't believe this. Finn, you're back!" Artie said surprised.
"I missed you Finn," Tina said, also joining in the crying tear fest.
"It's been ages! What have you been up to?" Sam asked.

"Let me go and I'll tell you," Finn said gasping for air and Puck, Rachel, Sam, and the rest quickly let him go. Finn took a gasp of air, wheezing.
"Whoo, thank goodness, it was beginning to go black." Finn took a step back and blinked when he saw Puck, Sam, and Blaine. "Woah, who are you guys."
"It's Puck, Sam, and Blaine," Rachel told him.
"Oh Rachel, I missed you-WHAT?!" Finn reared back in surprise. "That's Puck, Sam, and Blaine! They're...they're massive!"
"Yeah, while you were away, we had some BIG changes. Emphasis on big," Sam said.
"But...oh my god Puck, what happened to you?" He looked up at Puck who now was just a few inches taller than he was and had expanded out in every direction. "You're so...so...so..." Finn stuttered.

"Big?" Puck asked grinning.
"Well yeah!" Finn said. "I just...how...you're bigger than I am by far!" He turned to Sam and Blaine and blinked rapidly. "I must be seeing things because you guys are too!"

"Nope, we've grown!" Sam and Blaine told him.
"A lot has changed since you were gone," Rachel told him.
"I see that..." Finn said, shaking his head in disbelief. "I just mean, wow."
"So, want some food?" Puck asked. "We have a lot to talk about because I want to know why you didn't talk to us for two and a half years."
"I'm sorry about that." Finn said. Seeing the loaded plates everybody else had, he loaded his up and pulled up a chair next to Rachel and Puck.
"Hey Finn!" Mr. Schue said excitedly. "How was your trip?"
"Good," Finn said. "Very long but I was happy to see it."
"Wait, you actually saw us perform?" Sam asked.
"Well, I heard it anyways. You guys did an amazing job."
"WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN FOR THE LAST FOREVER?" Puck asked loudly. "I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU CAME WITHOUT TELLING ME OR THAT YOU ICED ME OUT FOR THE PAST COUPLE YEARS! I THOUGHT YOU WERE DEAD!"

"Oww, you don't have to yell in my ear," Finn moaned, clutching his ear.
"Oh, sorry about that. But where where you?!" Puck demanded.
"I was various places here and there, traveling around and finding my calling. I tried the military before I got kicked out for sucking at it and I floundered around for a while, doing odd jobs and performances but was unable to find anything that stuck. I almost came back in defeat before I was recruited as a teacher in various third world countries and Africa where I helped out in charity work, education, and singing and performing. It was a bit all over the place but none of those areas had a good phone or internet connection and I guess...I guess I was just scared of calling for a long time. First I was scared of admitting I was a failure for the first year and a half and after I began to do meaningful work I was scared to call because I haven't contacted any of you in such a long time that you would be angry at me.

"So instead you decided to do a surprise visit out of the blue?" Puck asked.
"Well, yeah. That way if you're mad at me, you couldn't just hang up the phone or turn off the computer on me."
"Good point, because right now I'm torn between more manly crying or killing you for what you put us through. Put ME through," Puck emphasized. "You know I would never judge you and it was thanks to you I was able to pull myself together and graduate and become the successful man I am today."

"Yeah. Do you know how much that hurt Finn, being cut out like that?" Rachel asked.
"We would never judge man, we're family," Sam sniffed.
"I know, I know, I was being stupid. I'm sorry for cutting you all off like that. But I'm back and I plan to be sticking around for a little bit. If I ever do need to leave, I will make sure to tell you and will not leave you guys in the dark again."

"Anyways," Puck said raising his voice. "Everybody, keep digging in, we got lots of good food to share." Finn took a bite and moaned.
"Oh my god, what is this? Did I die and go to heaven?"
"No, that is Dave's delicious food."
"Dave? As in Dave Karofsky?" Finn asked shocked.
"Yeah, you've been gone for a while but Dave is a really good cook," Puck told him.
"Dave Karofsky...can cook? I have been gone for a while," Finn said, feeling extremely guilty.
"Don't worry, I will get you all caught up on everything that's changed. Of course, a lot has changed since High School," Puck said.
"Yeah, I see that," Finn said looking from Puck to Sam, to Blaine. "Puck...how..."
"I came to a certain epiphany of growth, discovered how much I enjoyed it, and now share the gift with others," Puck summarized.
"Still, you guys are so large...I mean, damn I have never seen anyone as large as you, ever Puck. Not with mobility anyways," Finn said. "How could you get so large, especially so quickly?"

"With a lot of effort, training, formula, and FOOD."
"But you always loved being so muscular," Finn said. "You used to have six pack abs and everything and I was always jealous of you for that."
"Yeah, funny that. Of course, I love being muscular and size but I realized that in order to get even bigger I will have to go to the extreme and well, bigger is better." Puck patted his massive stomach. "Plus, I happen to love food and stuffing myself to the brink, constantly getting bigger and stronger."

"What about everyone else?" Finn asked.
"More or less the same really," Sam replied. "Except Puck all showed us the way. He's really persistent at that."
"Wow...first time I ever felt tiny," Finn said looking around.
