"Try being surrounded by them," Artie said. "It was hard enough when they were normal sized big but being surrounded by all these beefed up giants is intimidating." He pushed his glasses up. "It's a very different place now."
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Celebration Dinner at Dave's Buffet.

choices: Puck runs into a fatter Evan (25 pounds) in the hallway.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
One by one the party began to shrink as people went home with full bellies. Artie and Tina were the first to leave, followed soon by Will and then Rachel and Brody. Though they had all left the food never stopped flowing and Dave’s cooks brought out piles and piles of delicious, fatty food for the group to chow down on. As Trevor, Sam, Blaine, Ryder, Jake, Finn, Dave, and Puck all ate one by one they each reached their break point and had to call it quits.

         Ryder was the first to give in, his stomach bloated and tight from the 13 plates of chicken tenders and fries he wolfed down, though his dress shirt and pants remained buttoned on his pudgy frame. After Ryder was Jake, hitting his limit after eating 12 steaks – undoing the button on his pants himself as he sat back and belched. Finn was the next to quit; shocked at how he was able to eat 11 triple cheeseburgers and at least 4 pounds of fries. Blaine and Dave both quit at the same time, the button on Blaine’s pants bursting off as he sat back, his flabby gut surging forward and stuffed to the brim with 16 cherry pies. Dave, however, quit before reaching his breaking point, leaving the table as he went to the kitchen to talk to his staff.

         As everybody sat back and rubbed their stuffed bellies Puck, Trevor, and Sam all kept going, devouring as much as possible. Puck was on his 24th deep-dish pizza, Trevor was scarfing down his 18th enormous bowl of fettuccini alfredo (pausing every so often eat huge loves of garlic bread) and Sam had eaten close to 200 buffalo wings. While Puck was stuffing his face he noticed that Trevor and Sam seemed to be in a competition all their own. They both ate as fast as they could but in the end it was Sam who caved first – the buttons on his dress shirt bursting off and his huge gut flowing out into his lap, reaching almost to his knees. Trevor gave up only 10 minutes later.

         Puck sat back and chugged the last of his soda before letting out a massive belch, “30 deep dish pizzas; new personal best.” He said, slapping his gut.
“How much do you weight now,” Finn asked, “Last time I saw you you were only 270.”
“I’m getting close to breaking 800.” Puck said with a grin.
“800 POUNDS?!” DUDE, how are you even WALKING?!”
“Daily leg workouts,” Puck said, “keeps me mobile AND makes my ass look amazing.”
“It’s true.” Everybody said at the same time.
“Man, to think we started gaining together and you’re almost 500 pounds heavier than me.”

         “Wait,” Sam said, “You two started gaining together?”
“Sure did,” Puck said, “Right before graduation. Looks like all that traveling didn’t help you grow, huh?”
“Nah,” Finn said, “I’ve been stuck at 300 for months now.”
“Don’t worry, buddy,” Puck replied, “We’ll fatten you up in no time.”

_________________________________________________________________

         Soon after the guests, as well as all the chefs, went home as it was getting close to 2 am. Puck was standing outside, playing a game on his cellphone, as he waited for Dave to finish locking up. Puck’s once perfectly tailored shirt was now skin tight and covered only half of his gut, which spilled over his waistline down to his knees and stuck out nearly 2 feet in front of him. As Puck had reached level 20 he heard a noise in the alleyway; he tucked his phone into his jacket pocket and waddled over to the alleyway, which Puck was almost too fat to enter.

         Inside the alley was a kid, 17-18, with a tall green mohawk and shaved sides, a soul patch under his plump lips, tan skin, a strong, muscular body, and porky pot belly that was just starting to droop over his waist. The kid was wearing a black long sleeve thermal, which was tight on his biceps, pecs, and pudgy gut, as well as a denim vest covered in studs, black jeans, and knee high boots with spikes. Puck thought he was quite attractive, and would be even more attractive with an extra 300 pounds on his frame, but then Puck noticed the graffiti on the wall of Dave’s buffet.

         After snapping a quick pic Puck called out, “HEY!”
The kid turned to see him and Puck noticed his pierced eyebrow and snakebites. The kid ran in the opposite direction and Puck chased after as best he could – his fat hips, lovehandles, and gut only inches away from both walls.

         The kid reached the end of the alley but tripped, landing on his stomach. The punk rolled onto his back just as Puck stood over him and sat down – pinning the vandal under his 775-pound body.
“HEY, C’MON LET ME GO! YOU’RE CRUSHING ME!” The punk said.
“Trust me, you’re fine. I’m only on your legs” Puck said, though his gut was covering the punk’s entire torso, “Now, what were you doing to my boyfriend’s buffet?”
“None of your business, FATASS!” The kid said.
“That’s a compliment,” Puck said, lifting up his gut dropping it on the kid, knocking the wind out his lungs for a sec.

         Puck looked back at the graffiti and chuckled, “Y’know, that reminds me a lot of my old work.” After thinking for a second, Puck stood up, helping the kid to his feet as well, “What’s your name?”
“… Evan.” He said, coughing as he took deep breaths.
“Sorry about that, Evan. This thing weighs a ton.” Puck said, patting his gut.
“Yeah, I’ll say.” Evan replied, “You’re not mad?”
“Nah,” Puck said, “nobody comes down this alley anyway – it’s fine. BUT you have to do me a favor.”
“Which is?” Evan asked.
“I don’t call the cops and YOU let ME take you out to eat.” Puck said.
Evan stared at Puck, confused, but shrugged, “I can’t really turn down free food.”

         The two exchanged phone numbers and made plans to meet up next week at Dave’s buffet at 3. Puck waddled out first, being the biggest, and Evan left shortly after Puck and Dave drove away; finishing his art before heading out.

         That next week at school…
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Feasting and celebration continued

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Puck was on his way to his office when he saw the kid he met in the alleyway behind Dave's buffet. Puck was surprised that he hadn't known Evan went to McKinnley though he shouldn't be since everybody who lived in the county went there. Still, how'd Puck miss someone like Evan before was irritating since now that he knows Evan's existence, it was pretty obvious. Puck almost walked on before he did a double-take, eying Evan again who was busy twisting in the combination of his locker. Puck had an eye for the beefy and Evan looked even beefier than he had last week. He had clearly gained weight with how skintight stressed his pants were clinging that plump ass and thighs and when Evan turned, his jacket was open and his white shirt rode up, exposing a stretch of stomach.

"Oh it's you," Evan said when he saw Puck. "I didn't know you went here."
"I actually am the gym teacher and coach," Puck said.
"Really?" Evan eyed him skeptically. "I find that extremely hard to believe, especially with how big you are."
"You'd be surprised," Puck said smirking. "Anyways, I thought I recognized all, or at least most students who go to this school but I can't believe I never saw you before until this day."

"My family actually just moved here," Evan said. "Today is my first day in this school."
"Your family actually moved here?" Puck was surpised. "Why would anyone actually move into Lima, Ohio?"
"I don't know," Evan shrugged. "My dad got a job here and mom just followed."
"Did you gain some weight?" Puck asked.
"Wow, that's direct," said Evan.
"But you have," Puck said smirking.
"Okay maybe a little." Puck just rolled his eyes.
"Tha'ts a lot more than a little."
"Okay, I did get bigger," A lot bigger. Evan was unconsciously patting his bulging stomach.
"Tell me how," Puck cajoled.
"Well I had to try out the buffet that happened to be right there. I like food a lot as you can tell. But man that place...is good. I've gone a couple times already and I always leave there utterly stuffed."

"Dave's food will do that to you," Puck said grinning. "I had been hoping to witness your first time tasting food there but at least I can see the results."
"Yeah, sticking out like a sore thumb," Evan groaned.
"It's awesome," Puck smiled. "By the way, don't forget we're going to be meeting there after school today as per our agreement."
"Oh, yeah..." Evan groaned. "Can I change or something first beforehand so I don't ruin my clothes?"

"I sincerely doubt you'll be wearing those again for a long tme," Puck gestured, "given how tight they are now. Besides take pride in your being a big sexy guy. Also, it's rather expected and par for the course at the buffet and especially after eating Dave's food. Our regulars have been growing a lot in general as you know. So, see you at 3?"

"Ugh fine, see you then," Evan said. Puck started to walk away before he stopped. "Hey, show me your schedule. I want to put you in my PE class along with my other students." Evan handed it over and Puck scribbled and signed a note. "There, you are in my class so I expect to see you tomorrow. And no ditching that one," Puck admonished. "Well, no ditching any of them, except maybe math. I ditched that one myself plenty of times, but I especially don't want you ditching mine."

"Okay, I got it," Evan mumbled as he turned away. "I'm off to history now so bye." Puck nodded.
"Of course," Puck said, not really believing it from the way Evan glanced down as he said it. "But just know I am keeping an eye on you and if you do make some graffitti markings, I recommend the back dumpsters because no one ever goes to check back there." Evan eyed Puck before walking away and Puck did the same.

At three o'clock as they had agreed, Evan was there. Puck was rather surprised at how punctual he was as he had only just arrived to find Evan already there waiting for him. "Wow, great job of being ontime," Puck grinned. "It's nice when people are."

"Yeah, let's just do this. I'm starving for this delicious food," Evan said cutting to the chase. "By the way, are you some sort of kinky sex pervert that gets off on watching other people eat?"

"I wouldn't say that in such a negative way but I definitely enjoy watching and helping people grow," Puck grinned. "Is that a problem?"
"I guess not. I was just wondering though given how big you are how into this you." Evan gestured to his protruding gut.
"Well, that is true, I do like that a lot." They headed into the buffet which was at low tide in the number of people there which is why Puck chose then. There was slightly more privacy, he can get food quicker, and he wanted this to be fun and actually hearing and talking to Evan.

"Hey Puck," Finn said, waddling over to them. From the looks of it, Finn had been there for at least an hour or more already with the way his shirt had ridden up and exposed Finn's slightly hairy bulging gut. "I was just having some lunch while I was looking for work."

"I see." Puck's face lit up. "Dude, you should see if you can assist Mr. Schue with the Glee Club!"
"That's a good idea. Hey, whose your friend?"
"This is Evan," Puck said introducing him. "Finn, this is Evan. Evan, this is one of my best friends in the whole world Finn."
"Nice to meet you," Finn said, holding out his hand. Evan stared at it and did nothing. Finn shrugged. "Okay then. Hey, he kind of reminds me of someone though, I can't put my finger on it...oh wait, you Puck."

"Haha, but I actually liked you though," Puck said.
"With everyone else I mean but yeah, Mohawk, shirt, size queen..."
"Size king Finn, not a queen," Puck interrupted.
"Yeah size king...a lot like you."
"I'm still here you know," Evan interrupted.

"Yeah, I know." Finn patted his stomach and burped. "Uuuuuurrrppp, yeah, sorry about that. Finally have room for some dessert so see you guys later," Finn said walking off. Puck would have loved to have checked on Finn but he had Evan to worry about. Next time would have to do. Puck lead Evan to the back area he loved to sit in. Surprisingly, they weren't alone because Brody and Rachel were there as well, Brody stuffing his face with cheesecake with Rachel rubbing his belly and occasionally taking nibbles from it as well.

"Oh hey," Puck said surprised. "I didn't expect to see you guys here at this time."
"Well, it is less busy now," Rachel said.
"What about whatever contract you guys were on?"
"We finished today and needed to celebrate. The food here is very good," Rachel said. Brody moaned in agreement. Rachel leaned over and kissed him, her hands massaging his bloated belly. She then started feeding him slices of cheesecake.

"You're pretty good at that Rachel," Puck said impressed. She didn't respond but Puck could tell she was pleased. Anyways, this remind him that he needed to feed Evan. "So what do you feel like having?" he asked Evan who was staring a bit.

"Um, sorry, let me think for a moment." Evan watched interested as Rachel fed the last pieces of cheesecake into Brody's mouth. Brody was flagging a little bit but with encouragement he managed to get it all down. He sagged back, against the seat and his shirt rode up, exposing his bloated stomach which bowed over his pants. It wasn't huge at all and by Puck's standards was just a baby belly, but it was looking pretty big on Brody who only a couple weeks before had six-pack abs before he got to them. Sometimes, Puck felt so evil. On the other hand, Rachel clearly wasn't complaining as she laid kisses up and down his stomach and playing with it. Hmm, weird actually since while he had always known-suspected that Rachel enjoyed Finn's heft for example, he had never pegged her as a feeder sort but maybe it was just with some people. Evan was also interested and Puck wondered which part he was thinking about, or perhaps both? He will ask later but first...

"So, what are you going to have?" Puck asked Evan again. Evan looked away and said, "I will have..."
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Puck runs into a fatter Evan (25 pounds) in the...

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
"Mashed potatoes, macaroni and cheese, and chicken wings," Evan said. "You know, the classics."
"Oh I know," Puck said. "Who doesn't love those? I'll tell Dave you're ready." Puck got up and went into the backroom. Evan looked around. There were only a few people there like the Finn guy who was Puck's friend and the girl and guy couple. She was rubbing his very bloated belly as he laid back and panted a bit, but there was a look of satisfaction on his face. He was enjoying it and so was the girl. Evan's attention snapped back when Puck and Dave came out, rolling over a large trolley with the selected items.

"I wanted to introduce you to Dave, the owner of this place and the main cook," Puck explained.
"Hey, I'm Dave. I understand you're Puck's new personal project," Dave told him. "I totally agree, this is going to be awesome."
"What?" Evan growled. "I'm no one's project.
'I'm certain the police will be interested in some very interesting information then," Puck told him. "Besides, you ate here a couple times already. It's not so bad. I just want you to do what you already are clearly good at doing." He nodded at Evan's belly. "Eating and growing that big boy. You know you like it." Puck was right of course but it was the principle of the thing." Evan almost got up and left but the smell of the food made his tummy grumble. He always did have a weakness for food, especially for mac n' cheese and wings.

"Fine whatever, let's get this started with the macaroni and cheese." Evan loved cheese and this was so him. Puck placed a massive deep dish pan in front of Evan, several layers thick of the stuff and Evan had to admit he was impressed. That was a lot of macaroni. Picking up the fork, Evan scooped the first spoonful into his mouth and groaned at the taste. It was so gooey good that Evan nearly cried. It was the best tasting macaroni and cheese that he had ever tasted. The cheese danced on his tongue, a pleasure and delight to taste. Eagerly, Evan shoveled in another bite and another bite. He couldn't get enough and he wondered why he didn't have the macaroni earlier. This was good stuff. Layer after layer went into his mouth, his gut expanding. He didn't care as he always liked the feeling, to see how far it could go. The macaroni was very filling and eventually he scraped the bottom of the deep pan. Evan rubbed his gut and burped, and he grinned feeling Puck's eyes on him. It was interesting to know that this guy was really interested. Evan still didn't really know what to think about Puck. He seemed nice enough but blackmail was not cool.

Evan did get free food though which is worth it. Evan nodded towards the mashed potatoes and they were placed in front of him, a massive white mound that was thick and high on the huge plate. This was going to be tough, especially after all the cheesy goodness of macaroni. Evan was up for it though and started right away, stuffing as much as he could down. It naturally tasted great. He slowed down as his gut gut fuller and fuller. Finally, he was at the bucket of wings. He didn't even need to taste those before he knew they were going to be good, especially after what he's eaten so far. Evan almost gave up but he felt fuller than he had in a long time and it felt good. His stomach was bloated out onto his lap and he reached down and undid the button of this pants, letting his gut spill out. Ahhh, that felt good. Evan sighed in relief as he spilled out. He needed that in order to get ready for the rest. And then a bucket of chicken wings was placed in front of him. He didn't need to taste to know it was going to taste absolutely amazing. They couldn't serve anything that was less than excellent and he could smell it. Evan happily picked out a handful from the large bucket and bit into them and groaned. Yep, they tasted amazing.

The wings were far easier to swallow than the macaroni and cheese or mashed potatoes. There was a quite a bit in the bucket but considering the multiple layers of macaroni and cheese he had to get through or white potato mountain, those were definitely harder. With wing after wing going into his stomach, he absent-mindedly rubbed his stomach letting out some loud stuffed belches of his own. Somehow he managed to finish through and there was only crumbs left in the bucket.

"Great job," Puck said. He had been watching Evan eat the entire time but Evan had just about forgotten he was still there."
"Oh, -uuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrppppppppp hey. Man I'm stuffed." Puck grinned and left for a moment again. Evan laid there rubbing his stuffed stomach. He was surprised though when Puck came back with a massive sundae that he dropped in front of Evan.

"How about dessert?" He asked.
"No--uuuuuuurrrpp thanks," Evan burped again and felt queezy.
"I'm sure you can handle it, just like everything else," Puck said confidently.
"I don't think so," Evan muttered.
"You're doing it," Puck said, giving the look again that he made when he talked about when potentially calling the police.
"Fine," Evan said. He took his spoonful and slowly dug in. It was a very rich chocolate and vanilla swirl and he almost threw up. This was going to be the activity that defeated him. There was no way he was going to be able to finish. After a number of bites, Evan flung the spoon down in defeat.

"Okay I lost. Sorry I couldn't finish it." Puck smirked.
"I'm sure you can. Let me help you finish it. Evan tried to say no but didn't have the energy when the spoon was roughly shed into his mouth. Evan swallowed and tried to complain but another spoonful was shoved into his mouth. Fortunately, Puck's other hand was rubbing and soothing Evan's belly at the same time and he made it feel really good. With Puck's help, all the icecream was soon gone and Evan was more stuffed than he had ever been in his life. He was bigger too and Puck was definitely having fun taking care of it.

"We're going to have to do this again sometime," Puck grinned and Evan groaned at the thought but oddly excited, especially with how Puck's touch on his tautt-full stomach. It felt good and he wished for it to happen again.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Evan's meal

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
A loud, almost echoing belch filled the nearly empty room as Puck sat back in his seat - one hand on his gargantuan gut, which had doubled in size from his massive meal, and the other picking at his teeth with a toothpick.

"Tasty as always." The nearly 800-pound man said as he patted his gut, a satisfied look on his face.
Evan sat across from Puck, still bloated from his meal but not nearly in as much pain as he had been two hours ago. His full, swollen belly was fully exposed, his shirt ridden up and refusing to go back down, but it was the stunned look on the punk's face that made Puck raise an eyebrow.
"Everything okay?" Puck asked.
"You just ate enough food for like... 12 people. How are you not in a food-coma?" Evan replied, still in shock.
"Oh, psssh," Puck said, waving his hand dismissively, "That was nothing, trust me. It takes a lot more than that for me to get totally full." Puck placed his toothpick on top of the stack of plates before scooting to the side of his booth and standing up - showing off the full circumference of his stuffed gut.

Puck's enormous belly hung low and jutted out far; the massive mound of muscle and fat reached down to Puck's knees and stuck out nearly 3 feet in front of him. Puck turned towards Evan, his body jiggling with each step, and he placed his hands on his hips, "Ready to go?"
"Uhh..." Evan said, his face red at the sight of Puck's godly body, "Y-yeah." he finally stuttered out, trying to regain his demeanor. Evan exited the booth and the two walked (or in Puck's case waddled) out of the buffet. Once outside in the chill, November air, Puck turned to Evan.
"So," he started, "You know why I asked you lunch?" Puck asked.
"You mean blackmailed me?" Evan replied.
"Okay, yeah, blackmailed you," Puck responded, "But, no, I brought you here because I see a lot of myself in you."
"I'm like one-third your size." Evan replied sarcastically. Puck replied with a punch to the arm.
"You know what I mean. You remind me a lot of myself when I was your age and, truth be told, I don't wanna see you make those same mistakes. Home isn't that great, is it?" Puck said.

Evan was quiet for a bit but then answered, "Not really. It's not like, abusive or anything, but it's almost like I don't even exist anymore. My parents are so busy with everything all the time that I just feel... ignored." Evan chuckled, covering his face with his hand, "God, I can't believe I'm even telling you this."
"It's fine." Puck said, "Look, think of me as like... an older brother figure; someone to look after you and keep you outta trouble. I know your acting out is just cause you're seeking attention and I'm willing to give you that attention."
"Really?" Evan asked, a confused look on his face.
"Really. On one small condition, though." Puck said.
"Lemme guess - you wanna fatten me up?" Evan replied with a small laugh.

"Correct-amundo." Puck said, patting Evan's gut, "In a few short weeks you'll be a big 'ol butterball when I'm done with you."
Evan thought about it for a second and then shrugged, "Why the hell not?"
"Perfect." Puck said with a grin, "I've already talked things over with Dave and he's agreed to give you a life-time 100% off discount. Breakfast, lunch, dinner - all of it is free."
"How the hell you'd pull that off?" Evan asked.
"Dave's my boyfriend." Puck answered.
"Not surprised." Evan said, rolling his eyes, "Gimme a lift home?"
"Sure thing."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------

A month had passed since then and the chill air of November soon froze over into the frigid, snow filled month of December. All the schools were on winter break and had been for the last 3 weeks and extra time off only fueled the gainers of WMHS to pack on more weight. The digital numbers of Trevor's brand new scale flashed changed at a rapid pace the second the wrestler's titanic ass stepped on: 275, 318, 464, 499, 526, 587, and finally resting on an even 600.

"Babe, you gotta read it for me, I'm too fat to see past my gut." Trev said with glee. He had been too fat to see past his own stomach for some time now but saying it always made him giddy.
"Well, congrats, babe. You finally hit 600 pounds." Micah said, placing his massive hands on his huge hips.
"YOU'RE KIDDING!!!" Trevor practically screamed, stepping off of the scale and doing a little happy dance. His entire body bounced and jiggled as he did so and Micah couldn't be more proud or turned on than he was now.
"I'M SO HAPPY!" Trevor said, wrapping his arms around Micah's huge musclegut before looking at his bodybuilder boyfriend, "I can't believe I finally broke 600!"
"I'm so proud of you." Micah said before leaning down and kissing his butterball of a boyfriend.

Sweet kisses soon turned hot and heavy as Micah's tongue slid into Trevor's mouth, his powerful hands gripped Trev's strong ,beefy thighs, and the huge juggernaut lifted his 600 pound boyfriend off his feet and pressed him against the wall. Trevor's arms wrapped around Micah's thick neck as they made out - only being supported by Micah's powerful arms. After a few minutes they slowed down, foreheads pressed against each other, and they grinned before Micah lowered Trevor back down this feet.
"You hungry?" Micah asked.
"Always." Trev responded and the two headed down stares.

Trevor plopped his massive, fat frame onto the couch while Micah's hulk-like body headed for the kitchen.
"Pasta okay?" Micah called to his boyfriend.
"Sounds great! And don't forget the garlic bread! I bought 3 loaves yesterday - go ahead and cook 'em all." Trevor replied.

Micah hummed in the kitchen to himself as Trevor sat on the couch, watching TV and playing with his fat. Trev was surprised as he felt Micah's hands grab and pull off his crop top before reaching down and fondling Trevor's soft pecs, "Water's boiling. You're so huge and soft, babe."
"I know right?" Trev said happily, "I can't wait for Puck to see."

Things got quiet and Micah slipped his hands off Trevor's moobs. It took Trevor a few seconds to realize and when he looked up from his gut Micah was already back in the kitchen. Trevor lifted his heft off the couch and followed.
"Everything okay, Mike?" Trevor asked.
"Yeah, everything's fine." Micah replied.
"No it's not," Trevor said, "I know when you're keeping something secret."
Micah took a deep breath and sighed, "You... You still love me, right?"

Trevor blinked, confused, before speaking, "Of course I still love you. Where is this coming from?"
"Puck. It's coming from Puck." Micah said.
"Puck?"
"Yeah. He's all you talk about lately; 'how big do you think Puck'll get? Do you think I'll impress Puck with my weight when school starts again? How fat do you think Puck'll make Evan?' It's like you don't even care about me anymore."
"Babe... look, I know I talk about Puck all the time but that doesn't mean I don't love you! I mean, yeah, I have a bit of a crush on him, but he's my idol! I wanna be as big as him - even bigger! I'm attracted to him but I'm not in LOVE with him. I'm in love with you." Trevor said, turning Micah around.
"You mean that?" Micah asked.

"Yeah. Puck can fatten me up and fuck my ass raw but he's not interested in me romantically the same way you are. You take care of me when I'm sick, you comfort me when I get scared. You know all my secrets."
"Like your toy collection." Micah interrupted.
"Yeah. I'm turned on by Puck but I'm in LOVE with you." Trevor said.

The two smiled for a bit and Micah wrapped his obese boyfriend in the biggest of bear hugs, "I love you too. I'm sorry about all that."
"No problem," Trevor said, "It's partly my fault. Let's get this food finished, huh?"
"Of course."
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Winter Break

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
Winter break continues and a month passes. During that time, Evan faithfully ate at Dave's buffet every day which was the new place to be. While there, Evan got priority and privacy in the back though away from the noisy crowd outside for him to eat in peace. At the current time however, Evan was at home, sorting through the mail when he saw a red envelope with his name written on it. Curious, he opened it and was shocked to find a Christmas card. Inside was a message that invited him to a Christmas party at the Puckerman house. It didn't take long at all before Evan decided he was going to go. It was going to be a quiet Christmas at home anyway of awkward small talk since his parents barely knew anything about him and most of the time didn't care to. Around the holidays, they get reminded they have a son whom they try to awkwardly communicate with but it never went well and someone left the table angry. Sometimes it was Evan, sometimes his parents, but the sad thing was they had absolutely nothing in common. Evan supposed it could have been worse, they could have been abusive and beat on him like other kid's parents. He was most certainly glad his parents didn't. But what a pathetic standard it is that at least they don't abuse him. They did provide for him, especially funds for food as well as schooling, but nothing much else. He wasn't even sure if they had noticed any changes in him at all as sad as that was.

Driving to the house, he heard Christmas music playing through it and smelled delicious smells that he could smell even outside before he even got in. There wasn't much snow on the ground at the moment so it was an open window. Evan went to the door and rang it. The door was opened to reveal Jake filling the doorway. "Oh hey Evan, come on in." He gestured stepping aside.

"I got to ask, aren't you guys Jewish or something?" Evan asked as he walked in. "I wouldn't have thought you would celebrate Christmas."
"We are, at least I'm half Jewish. We're not so religiously inclined and while we don't celebrate Christmas as a religious holiday, we find nothing wrong with celebrating Christmas as a secular holiday that celebrates friends and family coming together, having a good time, and exchanging presents. Well, after Puck and Micah." Evan guessed that the really big tall blond stud had to be Micah. "Last time Danny won and it shocked Sam who had been falling behind and slacking. Puck showed Sam up in front of everyone and poor guy had to suffer drinking gallon after gallon of Puck's special weight gain shake."

He did have a pretty decent sized pot gut that stretched his white wife-beater. They were each carrying a couple of boxes with presents and dumped them under the christmas tree before coming back."

It was more than a few as Evan had been a brief witness to many of the times they came in and getting slightly bigger each time and he was tempted to tease but didn't. Puck had already come up and was squeezing Rachel to him.

"Sam's that way," Puck pointed to where Sam and Danny were neck in neck demolishing gingerbread cookies. Rachel chuckled and shook her head. "We've really come a long way since freshman year of high school haven't we?"

"Well, that is too bad. We need to hang out again sometime Rachel," Puck told her.
"Of course. Well, see you later,"

"Go away Finn," she said.
"Please talk to me,"
"I don't have any time right now Finn and I am still mad at you," she told him.
"Yeah I know but I was hoping we could get past that. "ere

"So, everybody hungry for the big meal? Trust me, eat as much as you want, we have plenty.

He could see Trevor shuffling down the hall, his wide body taking up halls space. That was a big one and while not as big as Puck and Micah, he was still one of the largest guys Evan had ever seen period.

"How's it going?" Evan asked Trevor. He and Trevor had some interesting conversations over Christmas and New Years and it seemed like Evan was going to be Puck's new project. Trevor had been slightly jealous but they hashed it out since Micah had been concerned about Trevor leaving him for Puck and Trevor reminded him that as much as he was into Puck, he wasn't emotionally committed to anyone but Micah and not to mention Puck is always with everybody anyways. Puck was good at many things but a monogamous relationship was not one of them and Trevor did value intimacy and closeness and while Puck could be intimate, it just wasn't really the same as with Micah and Trevor had been shocked at hearing how Micah had been really scared of Trevor leaving him. Micah had never said anything and been stoically tough so Trevor had never even known there was a problem until it just exploded out. They fixed it though which pulled Trevor back enough to be very happy that Puck had found someone else to feed. Though in truth, he was still just a little envious that Puck would be focusing so much on Evan. He didn't blame Evan at all though, Evan was a great guy and much like him, but not as cool.

"It's good, gained a bit over vacation. I'm now at 640," Trevor said proudly. He certainly looked it. Evan could not understand how the fabric wasn't jumping off from Trevor's fat body with how tight it was clinging and revealing gaps of his thick fleshy stomach. "Well that's great," Evan said.

"What, you are? I mean, you can sing?" Evan asked surprised.
"Yeah I can. I'm pretty good too. I'm also bringing Micah in so we can do it together. He gets nervous but I think that's silly because he's even better than I am with such a deep masculine manly voice it gives me shivers to listen too and no one would dare mock him for it. He'd have knocked them out either by his talent, or by his fists. But I definitely think the first is more likely if he would just get up and do it."

"Well I don't know..." Evan said. "I'll think about it. It's not really my thing but there are some cool people there and I have heard good things about it."

These doorways are too small for my body to fit through. Hey, does anyone want to help me? Evan, if you're still there, can you help a guy out?"

"Oh alright," Evan muttered as he got behind Trevor and started pushing. "How are you going to get back out later?"
"Honestly, I have no clue. How does Puck deal with these again?"

With some struggle and pounding against Trevor's thick rubbery body, Evan managed to push him in. Sweating from the effort he wiped his forehead. "There you go, you're in!" He called out. "Find your own way out later, I have my own class to get to!" Evan turned around and saw that there was a crowd of impatient students who had just witnessed what had happened. "Uh, you're free to go in now," he said awkwardly.

"Finally," a number of them muttered under their breaths as they trudged in.

Evan thought about it. Did he want to do Glee club? Could he even sing? He had done it a couple times but he didn't exactly practice or do it very much. It wasn't his normal thing but then again, this wasn't a normal school. Here Glee club was actually kind of popular after having won numerous years in Regionals and making it to National Competitions a couple of times and here the greatest people lived. Also here was the legend of Noah "Puck" Puckerman who had been in Glee club and was now making everybody play along to his tune in weight gain. Trevor and Micah were trying out, he knew Jake and Ryder from Puck's parties and they were pretty cool, and any form of anything interesting that happened in this town related to the Glee club somehow. Perhaps there was no risk in at least trying out in any case. Perhaps he will. He was going to think about it after lunch.

As for the first day, people could either eat outside, or if they were able to drive, to leave campus and eat elsewhere. Many did since there wasn't enough prepared if everybody's appetite increased. So when Evan arrived at Dave's buffet, he wasn't surprised to find the parking lot full of students and people having to park in the street or further down and having to walk in. It was the most busy and packed Evan had ever seen it and he wondered where everybody had come from because although it had been busy, there were never this many people. He was fortunate to have a connection with the propietor as he got his normal table as he saw people having to be turned away just for space and safety laws. It was complete utter havoc but at least he got food.

After the mess that was lunch, Evan drove back to school because why not? He wasn't the biggest fan but things were getting interesting that everyone was getting big. Just staring at all those extra pounds on everybody just made things much more entertaining. He also wondered about joining the glee club. Perhaps he should.

“You can consider it a rite of passage that we all went through. I mean, I did it and loved it. I still love it. But if you need another reason, you can call it you’re doing it or you can be prosecuted for vandalism and other crimes.”
“Are you seriously blackmailing me, again?” Evan asked in astonishment.

“Yes, it is also another glee club tradition and the school’s to get members by blackmail. You can be spanked the hard way or the easy way. Now will you at least try voluntarily or do I need to make calls as a duty you have to do?”
“Ugh fine.” Evan muttered.

“See you in the auditorium at 3,” said Puck. “I’ll be watching.
Evan wasn’t sure what song he wanted to do as he hadn’t planned on participating but now that he had to, he thought hard about it. He was stuck until he heard the perfect song on someone’s ringtone and decided that was a song he knew that was pretty good and sure to wow the crowd.
At three, everybody went into the auditorium. There weren’t many sign-ups, which was a bit disappointing because while Glee club was not a pariah anymore, most people still didn’t want to sing or whatever. There was Micah, Trevor, Evan, and a couple other random people who were either bored or brave enough to try their hand at singing in a performance drama group. There were only a few open slots but at least they didn’t have to cut that many people. One of them was okay, not bad, but not spectacularly amazing either. One had a voice that irritated like nails being dragged down a chalkboard. Another was a stoner kid who got confused and thought they were a group for being happy. That one was honestly confusing because if he was a new student that might have been plausible, but he was a senior and had attended McKinley for every year that Glee club actually went to state and nationals. How could he still not know? Evan who was a little nervous, became confident when the other people went. He might not have been enthused about having to do this, but at least he was better than those other people. Plus, he might impress Puck and the others. Readying himself, Evan strutted onto stage and began.

I got those jet pack blues
Just like Judy
The kind that makes June feel like September
I'm the last one that you'll ever remember
And I'm trying to find that peace of mind
Behind these two white highway lines
When the city goes silent
The ringing in my ears gets violent
She's in a long black coat tonight
Waiting for me in the downpour outside
She's singing "Baby come home" in a melody of tears
While the rhythm of the rain keeps time
And I remember "Baby, come home"
I remember "Baby, come home"
I remember "Baby, come home"
I remember "Baby, come home"

Evan sang his heart out. There was some stunned silence and then clapping and whistling. He looked over into the audience to see the Glee clubbers clapping and cheering for him. Puck was the loudest and most noticeable but it was hard to not notice him. He saw Sam, Blaine, Artie, Tina, etc. Finn was there with some strange look on his face that seemed a cross between disgust and confusion, like he had tasted something sour or something. It was obvious the guy was jealous. From the moment they met, Finn was very jealous over Evan’s relationship with Puck and the Glee club. It wasn’t his fault though the guy had issues. Well, whatever, Finn could think what he wants. The only people whose opinions mattered was Puck and the rest of the Glee club.

“You’re in!” Mr. Schue said excitedly. “Excellent job Evan, that was excellent singing!”
“Why thank you Mr. Schue, I just really like that song.”
“Well if you sing all songs like that, I know you’ll do great.” Mr. Schue praised. Next up was Trevor who sang Maroon 5’s Sugar

I'm hurting, baby, I'm broken down
I need your loving, loving
I need it now
When I'm without you
I'm something weak
You got me begging, begging
I'm on my knees

I don't wanna be needing your love
I just wanna be deep in your love
And it's killing me when you're away, ooh, baby,
'Cause I really don't care where you are
I just wanna be there where you are
And I gotta get one little taste

Your sugar
Yes, please
Won't you come and put it down on me?
I'm right here, 'cause I need
Little love, a little sympathy
Yeah, you show me good loving
Make it alright
Need a little sweetness in my life
Your sugar
Yes, please
Won't you come and put it down on me?

My broken pieces
You pick them up
Don't leave me hanging, hanging
Come give me some
When I'm without ya
I'm so insecure
You are the one thing, one thing
I'm living for

Trevor looked at Micah as he was singing it to let him know. As he had unexpectedly discovered recently, although Micah was the toughest looking, and actual toughest person Trever could imagine, Micah really cared about him and was worried about Trevor leaving him for Puck. An absurd notion because Puck was great at many things like sex and making people become massive, but Puck was not a monogamous person. At all. In the slightest. When Puck liked you, he was a devoted lover. He certainly was a devoted feeder. But as fun as Puck was, which is especially incredible for an individual of his size, Trevor wanted someone more stable and who actually liked him for him and not just his size. Puck was a size fanatic. Micah smiled at him and Trevor bowed as the rest of the Gleeks cheered.

“I didn’t know you could sing,” Jake said.
“Yeah, well, apparently I can,” Trevor said.

Finally it was Micah’s turn. Ironically he chose My Chemical Romance’s Teenagers.

They're gonna clean up your looks
With all the lies in the books
To make a citizen out of you
Because they sleep with a gun
And keep an eye on you, son
So they can watch all the things you do
Because the drugs never work
They're gonna give you a smirk
'Cause they got methods of keeping you clean
They're gonna rip up your heads
Your aspirations to shreds
Another cog in the murder machine
They say all teenagers scare the living shit out of me
They could care less as long as someone'll bleed
So darken your clothes or strike a violent pose
Maybe they'll leave you alone, but not me
The boys and girls in the clique
The awful names that they stick
You're never gonna fit in much, kid
But if you're troubled and hurt
What you got under your shirt
Will make them pay for the things that they did
They say all teenagers scare the living shit out of me
They couldn't care less as long as someone'll bleed
So darken your clothes or strike a violent pose
Maybe they'll leave you alone, but not me
Ohh yeah!

There was silence for a moment before Puck and Trevor began clapping as did the rest of them. It was an interesting and quite appropriate choice of song since Micah was huge and frankly did terrify many of them. “Great job Micah, you have a wonderful deep voice. We are always in need of one of those to have counterpoint to all our higher singers and girls. All three of you are in,” Mr. Schue said. “Wonderful job, wonderful job.” He sighed. “I am going to miss using the choir room though. There are a lot of fond memories in there. At least we managed to get a permanent reservation on the auditorium that Sue didn’t steal.”
“Excellent job,” Puck said to all three of them. “You all did great, which is no surprise to me.”

“You did good,” Finn told Micah and Trevor with a smile. The smile wasn’t so real when he got to Evan. “You did good too…I guess…” Finn mumbled
“Such enthusiasm,” Evan rolled his eyes. “I feel so welcome.” Puck elbowed Finn, nearly sending him to the ground.
“I mean, welcome to glee club where everyone may join, even you.” Finn said.

“Whatever,” Evan rolled his eyes. He didn’t really want to, especially if Finn was going to be there a lot like this. Then again, pissing Finn off sounded fun since he was such a baby about it.
“See you all in the auditorium tomorrow. I need to go figure out what I’m going to do with the choir room since we can’t use it anymore…” Will Schuester said.
“I have some ideas,” Puck said walking with him as did Finn.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Trevor, Micah, and Evan audition for Glee Club.

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
School was postponed for a month in addition to Christmas break due to needed renovations. McKinnley was getting old and always needed them but now there was the additional factor that a lot of the students and teachers were a bit larger than they used to be and it was so widespread that it was necessary to upgrade. There was a lot of things that needed to be added like bigger reinforced chairs that could handle heavier weight, widening the doors, etc. Everyone was excited to hear about the extra days off...until it was revealed that due to the necessity of education standards it will be made up for over time with additional days during the summer and weekends. Nonetheless, it was a very exciting time as people went on vacation.

It was a very filling holiday season for everyone filled with food, fun, games, and more food. Without school to keep people occupied, there was a lot of free time on people's hands. Many went to Dave's buffet because it really was the best tasting food joint in town. The other food places in order to not go out of business partnered up and became part of Dave's and also learned what made him so successful. Puck and Dave never expected to set up a restaurant chain but now that it was happening, they were excited to be able to spread the love. It was a good thing too as the original was always packed with people, especially with school out and being the place to meet up for teenagers and young adults and eventually everyone. Once the franchise was expanded, they were able to diffuse the amount of people to the other locations again making the other shops happy.

And it was a good thanksgiving for Dave and the Puckermans who were now getting quite wealthy in the restaurant and food business and grabbing the attention of some major food stores. Not that that was the only goal and they didn't really need money except for food and the other essentials, but it was really nice to have. Jake was super excited to get a vehicle that he could get into without getting cramped since one of the downsides of size was getting squished in smaller cars. He sometimes wondered how Puck dealt with it. Puck's newest project Evan was at their house everyday for a session with either Puck, or if he felt like sharing, Jake. Needless to say Evan was getting bigger quickly and it almost seemed like he was every time Jake saw him. It was cool but Jake was more interested in his and Ryder's growth. Jake was much more easygoing with people than his brother and was more than happy to let people move at their own pace without forcing them, but Jake was eager to see Ryder grow a little faster. Fortunately, Puck's and Dave's food was good for that and it broke the flat slope Ryder had been stuck at, especially with so much more time for eating, video games, movies, etc. Without football to keep him busy, Ryder fell into a lazy routine of video games, food, tv, books, more food, etc. He barely ever had to get up since Jake was more than happy to bring down food and snacks and to play with him and he started to food graze. Jake worked out when not spending time with Ryder since someone in the house had to be responsible and active plus needing the strength to support his heavier boyfriend.

Eventually the time came that the repairs were finished and they had to go back to school. The work wasn't entirely done but they couldn't really delay any longer and all the important things were finished so it was back to school which was a sad but also happy day as people were beginning to get bored and want to go back to school. Nobody missed school homework but they did miss seeing their friends and not having to sit around in their house or at the mall or a food place.

At 11:40, Trevor wished he was back at home or anywhere else. The teacher was droning on about something math, numbers, factorials, slopes, angles, nothing that Trevor really cared or was good at. He was also hungry as boredom always made him hungry and even if he was interested or good at math, he wouldn't have been at this moment anyhow with how hungry he was. One would have thought that with how things had changed that people eating would be a more tolerated thing but in fact it was still against the rules. Well, it made sense because if people were eating, they wouldn't really be listening to the teacher talk but still, he was starving. He scribbled down a note and passed it to Micah who also looked bored. It wasn't because Micah didn't understand this stuff because he actually did, but it was a secret thing that almost nobody knew except for maybe Puck and Trevor that he was actually too good at it and already knew all this information. He was just plain bored. Micah opened up the note and scanned it before nodding. They both raised their hands and asked to be excused and while the teacher glared at them, they were able to get a pass out.

"Ugh finally," Trevor said. "I can't stand math."
"Math is fine, but Mr. Gold is just not very interesting. I can certainly eat though." Micah said. "When did Puck say it would be open?"
"He said that the fridges would be stored in the choir room and stocked daily for any who need a snack."
"Yeah, let's do that." They walked to the old choir room and went in one at a time. "So how does this work?"

"Well you know, we each have a personal fridge filled with food that we could eat throughout the day and there is a signup sheet detailing whose timeslot it is although if the room is unoccupied and they elect not to use it, then anyone can. Of course, it's because only 3-4 people can reasonably squeeze in here being so large and with the refrigerators and we can't have a jam. Fortunately, Puck gave us a time slot at math since he knows how much we don't need that class and he is working on getting us a free period so we don't even have to lie."

"That does make me feel better," Micah opened his fridge and pulled out some massive sized meat sandwiches. Unwrapping one he bit into it and groaned in pleasure. "Puck and Dave really do make the best damn food," he said. Trevor nodded as he pulled out a massive juicy hamburger, bacon, cheese and everything on it and dug into it. When one was finished, they would move onto the next selection like hefty portions of lasagna and turkey. Pushing aside milk Micah saw a massive chocolate cake that somehow ended up in his fridge and was probably meant for Trevor. Micah was going to give it to Trevor but the strong sweet smell was overpowering and he couldn't resist having a couple pieces. Trevor looked at Micah and grinned seeing that and Micah rolled his eyes. He might have indulged over break but that was then and this is now. Still, it did seem look good cake and he might as well have some. Taking out the provided silverware, he popped a chocolate piece into his mouth and moaned. It was such good cake! He shoveled it into is mouth while Trevor munched on a bucket of chicken wings.

"How do you like your food?" came Puck's voice and they both turned around to see him standing and filling up the doorway space.
"Oh it's quite delicious," Trevor said grinning. "Tell Dave thank you and that the fridges are an excellent idea."
"Of course they are," Puck grinned back. "I can't have my people starving at school can I? I would hate for my favorite guys to waste away to nothing can I?" Micah rolled his eyes because as if that would ever happen.

"So I'm sorry for the mix-up, the chocolate cake was supposed to be in Trevor's..." Puck said before seeing what was in Micah's hand. "Huh? You're actually eating it?" He asked excited.

"Just a little..." Micah said, blushing a little.
"Yeah, he just couldn't help himself," Trevor grinned. "His strict diet edict against sweets is temporarily down."
"Really? What happened?" Puck asked.
"He was Santa for Christmas!" Trevor smirked. Micah blushed more.
"Oh?" Puck asked intrigued. "How did that happen?"
"Well, I was hired to do the Santa Claus at the mall given how big I am but it turned out I was too big for any of the uniforms."
"Hah, really?" Puck grinned.
"Yeah. So I couldn't do it but Micah was with me and they took a look at him and asked if he could do Santa instead because they needed someone immediately the next day. They also asked if he was interested in doing security but he said 'no not really, I still have school and sports to play.' He was willing to play Santa however."

"Yeah, to save you the embarassment," Micah said.
"Yeah whatever. It turns out he's great with kids and they always love him once they realize he's not a monster going to eat them."
"Just stop it," Micah said.
"Well, he did that throughout the holidays. It was rather humorous though because Micah is a muscle monster so they asked him to soften up a bit to fit the role of buff santa better."

"I did it for the kids," Micah muttered.
"I know, and I love that you cared so much," Trevor said, walking over and hugging him. "We have to go for accuracy. So whenever he went out for Santa he had to eat their cookies and drink their milk." Trevor grinned. "I made sure that there was always a lot of cookies because Santa is very hungry." Micah pulled away.

"You did! I knew it!" Micah shouted.
"Be honest, you loved making those kids happy by eating their cookies and carrots and letting them ride big Santa."
"That is true," Micah admitted.
"They especially loved rubbing and hugging his full belly for luck," Trevor smirked. "It was a game to see who could fill up Santa more and make him unable to move because he was so stuffed." Micah huffed.

"Whatever." Puck looked him up and down.
"Ah I see. That us amazing and man I wish I could have seen it."
"I have pictures," Trevor said.
"Don't you dare," Micah said.
"Oh alright fine. I won't show Puck right now." 'Later' he mouthed to Puck when Micah wasn't looking. Puck nodded back. He turned his attention back to Micah and grinned, a plan forming in his head."

"Bye for now, I'll see you guys later," Puck said, smiling deviously.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Renovations and the old room's new purpose

choices: Danny and Tyrone get to know each a little better.
Puck gives Evan a special after-class lesson.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
The final bell's ring echoed through the now empty halls of McKinley High, signaling the beginning of the next class. As the growing student body all settled into their now reinforced seats - Puck's boys were all getting reacquainted back in the weight room. The winter holidays, as well as the extra month off they got during renovations, had really taken a toll on every one of their waistlines. There wasn't a single boy amongst the nine students who hadn't gained weight or muscle during that time and every one of them was showing off and examining each other.

The boys had all paired off into two groups, per Puck's request they had all received via text that morning. Trevor, Sam, Danny, Ryder, and Evan were Puck's "fat boys" and as such they were all sittin in a group on one side of the room, while Puck's "buff boys", Jake, Micah, and Tyrone, were on the other size. Every single boy in the room was dressed in their school's required PE uniforms but there wasn't a single one that actually fit any of them. Massive moobs and pecs were squeezed tight, and huge guts, either rock hard and solid or blubbery, spilled out from underneath skin-tight shirts. Love handles hung over every pair of gym shorts and there wasn't a single pair of said shorts in the room that weren't about to burst at the seams thanks to monstrous thighs or enormous fat asses.

"I still can't believe how you've blown up, Evan!" Sam said to the blubbery punk of the group, "How much you weigh now?"
"No idea," Evan admitted, patting his big, soft belly, "Puck's the only one allowed to weigh me; it's one of our rules. All comes with being his 'pet project'." Evan said with air quotes.
"He got you on any kind of weight lifting regimen?" Danny asked, curiously.
"A little bit; he wants my gaining to be almost 100% fat so he only does enough to keep me strong and mobile." Evan replied happily, "Y'know, I wasn't sure about all this at first, but now that I'm this big? I'm totally on board with the whole thing."
"What's... Puck's current goal... for you?" Sam asked in between bites of the one dozen donuts he'd brought as a pre-class snack.
"He's never given me a number - he's only ever said 'I'm gonna make you as fat as Iwant'." Evan replied, emphasizing the I.
"Dude... you're gonna be massive," Ryder said in response.
"I know." Evan said with a huge grin on his face.
"Lucky..." Trevor mumbled under his breath as he swiped a donut from Sam's box and shoved into his mouth, despite being bloated from his massive meal with Micah. Evan and Trevor were friends but that didn't stop Trevor from being jealous of all the attention of Evan got from Puck.

Meanwhile, on the other side of the room, the "buff boys" were showin off their own gains, but the conversation subject was focused on Micah's new pudgy gut.
"DAMN, Micah, you got CHUNKY!!," Jake said with a cocky grin as he gave the 6'8" beefcake's gut a couple smacks, chucklin at the slight jiggle it now had, "Never thought I'd see the day where Micah "muscle-god" Von Haller started chubbin up.~" Jake said teasingly.
Micah swatted Jake's hand away, his brows furrowed in annoyance, "Yeah, yeah, laugh it up. I'mma melt all this extra fat off in no time, just you watch."
"I'll see it when I believe it," Tyrone replied, "I wouldn't let Puck find out if I were you. You know he'll do everything he can to keep that chub on ya."
"He's right," Jake replied, "You might as well get used to havin' that extra jiggle."

Just then the newly expanded door of Puck's office opened and their massive teacher waddled out, followed closely behind by his personal assistant, 'butterball' Blaine Anderson.
"All right, boys, I've got an announcement!" Puck said, hands on his wide hips, "As some of you may have noticed our class has shrunk. Over the holidays Matt, Devin, Nick, Zack, and Ricky all left school for various reasons. It's sad but hopefully they're all still gainin wherever they are. OKAY, line up; it's time for your first weigh in of the new year!" Coach Puckerman said as he stood next to the their new industrial sized scale. "All righty, Blaine, you're up first."

The obese teen waddled over to the scale, his gut jiggling under his slightly-too-small cardigan and polo, and stepped on. A digital screen placed on the wall flashed several numbers before landing firmly on an even 500 pounds.
"Nice, nice! Proud of you, Anderson!" Puck said with a grin, "Trevor, your turn big guy." As Blaine stepped off he wrote down his weight on his clipboard as Trevor waddled over and took his place. One by one the rest of the class stepped on got weighed and each number was written down on Blaine's clipboard for Puck's files:

• Jake - muscle - 530 lbs
• Ryder - fat - 355
• Sam - fat - 675
• Blaine - fat - 500
• Trevor - fat - 700
• Micah - muscle - 560
• Danny - fat - 650
• Tyrone - muscle - 430
• Evan - fat - 450


"Lemme just say I'm VERY proud of all these numbers," Puck said, looking over Blaine's writing. He handed the chart back to Blaine and grinned, "But lemme show you how a pro does it." With a cocky swagger in his step Puck hefted his mighty frame onto the scale and watched as the green numbers flashed 920 lbs. The ENTIRE room was stunned by that massive number and smirked when he saw the way Evan was biting his lip, no doubt thinking about a future where he's that big.

"Hopefully, with that extra motivation, each and every one of you get some massive gains this year. Now, lets start class." Puck said happily.

Class came and went; every boy in the room chugged a massive gallon of Puck's patented protein shakes before heading off to their assignments. The "buff boys" stayed in the work out room to do some weight lifting while the "fat boys" all waddled off to the empty gym where Puck had laid out a massive lunch for them - catered by Dave of course.

After class...
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: First Weigh in of the New Year!

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
"Hey," came a voice behind him while he was putting on his regular clothes again. "Nice game last Saturday." Tyrone was shocked that he was being spoken to.
"Hi?" Tyrone said, confused why Danny was talking to him. Danny was okay, he wasn't mean or anything. Actually he was really nice like when he had the entire class at his house for that party and catered to everyone. That was a good day. However, he had never spoken to Danny that much before so this was really random.

"Thanks," Tyrone said.
"That was an amazing shot and you can really dribble," Danny said.
"Yeah but...why are you talking to me?" Tyrone asked confused.
"Is there a problem with me talking to you?"
"Well no but...it just seems so sudden since you never have before one on one. It just seems like you have some sort of angle."
"No, no angle...other than asking if you want to go out with me," Danny said quickly. "I just think you're really good looking.'
"Is this because you're two boyfriends left because I don't want to be somebody's rebound like that."
"It actually doesn't. I miss them a lot but since it was over break I have had time to get over them. They were pretty but to be honest, between the two of them, they only had one brain. They really weren't that smart which I guess I kind of ignored because two sexy twins with complimentary bodies?"

"That's not really helping your case," Tyrone said, finishing putting his large shirt on.
"I don't know, I just think I've always liked you. You're an absolutely amazing player. Also, I've seen your test scores. You're actually really smart and I like that."
"Yeah, well thanks for that." Tyrone got up to leave but Danny got in his way.
"Just hear me out okay? You're like the perfect package. Smart, strong, excellent player, big, kind...I've been to all your games and think you would do great going pro. I know people." Tyrone paused.

"You do, do you?" he asked.
"Yes. I'll be happy to talk to them if you want. I just think you should at least give me a chance?" Tyrone wished it hadn't come down to bribing but Danny offered a good deal. It mattered the people you know and the successful rich all know each other very well.

"Alright fine," Tyrone agreed. Danny smiled at him.
"That wasn't so awful was it? Anyways, that was a very interesting class."
"Yeah, we lost a lot of people to moving or switching schools.We just dwindled down to the primary."
"Think Micah will still fall on the muscle side?" Danny asked. "I'm still in shock at seeing him heavier with actual jiggle and softer fat. If I know Puck, he's probably already scheming things to keep Micah from losing it."

"There is no doubt Puck is but Micah is not a gainer like you, Sam, Trevor, or Puck. He definitely is a behemoth tank. Still however that was just woah. It's just...so different. Good for him though whatever happens."

"I was just thinking I could have another party and invite everybody again? The last one went really well. Team morale and everything."
"Go for it." Danny whipped out his phone and sent out the mass text to everyone.

"Swim party at my place after school! Hope to see you there!" which is all he needed to say as everybody knew that Danny's parties were awesome. This one however he was going to keep among their class because it was special.

"I hope to see you there especially," Danny said seriously to Tyrone.
"Whatever, see you later." Tyrone walked out towards the next class while Danny alerted the staff that they were going to have company after school.
1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.title: Danny and Tyrone get to know each a little better.

1113322111111121112111121111211221111112.content:
When Sam opened his locker, he saw that there was a note left to him from Puck. He opened it to find it was a single sentence "Meet me in the office once you read this. -Puck." It was a little bit presumptuous but he was now a teacher and he would have gone anyways. Sam shrugged and headed to the gymnasium and towards the widened door office that the school finally fixed and updated.

"Puck?" He called out. "I'm here. What do you want?"
"I can't say hi to a friend? I'm a bit hurt," Puck rumbled coming out in just some really small looking on him shorts. His hair was wet and he had just come from the shower.
"Nah, nothing wrong with that," Sam agreed. "I was just curious as to what's so urgent you actually sent me a note. Also, you actually sent me a handwritten note, there is a thing called texting now," he said sarcastically but grinning nonetheless.
"This way was more fun and traditional . Anyways Wwell I, was just curious to see how you are doing and hang out a bit. Free you from class for a while. Are you and Blaine still together?" Sam looked a bit suprised and a bit sad.
"How do you know?" Sam asked.
"I have my ways," Puck said lowering his voice to do a mysterious feel before returning back. "Anyways i'm sorry to hear things aren't going so well."
"Well, technically we're still together as we haven't broken up yet." Sam said.
"It's only a matter of time though?" Puck guessed, genuinely sorry for Sam's predicament even if he was a little relieved too.
"Yeah. I just never thought that he and Kurt would get together again," Sam said. "It's a shock since he swore to me Kurt wasn't his type and all that and I walk in going to surprise Blaine and there he was kissing Kurt. Though it probably wouldn't bother you given you're many, many activities and partners."
"In which I am very clean and careful," Puck said. "No, that wouldn't really have bothered me except for wondering why he'd be interested in such a skinny twink over a blonde beefcake like you. It seems totally absurd."
"Yeah..." Sam said frowning. "I just don't know what to do or feel about it so we're on a bit of an unofficial break."
"I definitely think you know what you feel," Puck said. "You're definitely betrayed and upset."
"Damn right I am," Sam said sourly.
"So why not dump him and move on? Honestly Blaine was never really your type, Just too...passive and chubby and feminine."
"Right, and you are?" Sam asked.
"Of course. Far more than Blaine. And you know I'm good," Puck smirked. "I remember a time or two when we did some very fun things." He leaned over and whispered them into Sam's ear.
"Yeah," Sam said blushing a bit. "Those were good."
"And since you're not with Blaine anymore..." Puck grinned and reached out trailing his hands up Sam's beefy fat chest, rubbing gently. "You won't feel so bad if I did this. I've wanted to fuck you again for a while. I've never had you at such a large size."
"Always so forward," Sam grinned.
"You love it. Blaine never did that unless it was in song." Puck reached behind and teased Sam's butt swatting plsyfully. "You need a real man again." Sam let out a startled yelp when Puck hit but nodded in agreement. "Y-yeah." "Well I got just the thing" Puck grinned. "You're a massive stud and growing so well. The second biggest after me.
"Yeah well, you are gargantuan though. I could never reach that."
"No, but you're a gorgeous hot as fuck blonde beefcake that I want now," Puck grinned twisting Sam to hiss and moan. Puck always did know what people like. "Help you forget Blaine for a bit, what do you say?" he asked.
