Brody reached into his mail box deposit picking up his mail and heading towards his room. He had a date coming up with Rachel soon so he had to get everything ready. A perfectly appropiate vegan candlelit dinner for them (or rather Rachel, he could barely stand the stuff and made his own food as well) was a bit cliche but hey, why depart from the classics of a good formula? It took a while to wear Rachel down from that Finn guy but after Thanksgiving and now that she was back from her cruise he had a very good feeling that they were finally going to start dating. Humming he set the plates as he looked through his mail. Junk, school announcements he knew, junk, junk, bill, junk (he wondered exactly how he was getting advertisements in a college mailbox, that just wasn't right) bill, announcement, ooh discount for free frozen yogurt! That would be useful. The final letter though looked official and not a billing statement so Brody was curious what it would be. Carefully opening it, he pulled the nicely typed document out and scanned it. Then he read it again. And a third time his mind in a state of shock then excitement. He had been chosen to play in a new Broadway show as one of the major leads! Not a minor role but an actual lead! Over who knows how many aspiring actors who worked years they had chosen him, Brody Wes, to play the lead in actual broadway show...he hoped he wasn't going to faint. He took a tentative step. Okay he wasn't...Broadway hit him again and he passed out.

"Oh my god Brody are you alright? Do I need to call an ambulance? I was just coming in to see where you where and then I saw you passed out on the floor and..." a worried voice talking a million miles a moment reached wherever Brody was and he groaned as he started coming to. Blinking heavily he looked up and saw Rachel was standing over him still talking. He interrupted her.

"Oh hey Rachel, you're back. Was it a fun cruise?"
"Why yes it was Brody but you're hurt. Can I do anything for you, get you ice, tea, warm glass of milk?" Brody shook his head.
"Nah I'm good, I'm good. I love your voice but can you be quiet for a moment until my head stops hurting please?" Rachel backed off and nodded silently. Brody gave her a grateful look as he stood up.

"I'm not bleeding am I?" he asked.
"Nope," Rachel confirmed.
"Well that's good." He hobbled over to the chair and sat down.
"Brody, what's going on and why were you on the floor?" Rachel demanded.
"I passed out," Brody deadpanned. He smirked a little at the 'no duh' look on her face.
"I could see that. But why?" Brody's grin grew even bigger as he picked up the unnoticed letter on the floor.
"Because of this. Read it." Brody handed it to her and he watched her eyes glance over the page and widen.
"Is this...is this what I think it is?" she asked shocked.
"It is." He laughed.
"Oh my god Brody that's wonderful and amazing!" She said jumping up and down squealing excitedly.
"I know right? I'm going to be a lead in a Broadway show!" he joined her in their happy jump dance. After jumping up and down and squealing as Brody lifted Rachel up and swung her around, they settled back down and Rachel looked at the letter again. She blinked and looked back up at Brody. Then back down. Then back up. Brody watched her confused.

"Rach what is it?"
"There is...there is a clause though." Rachel said carefully. "They chose you for your potential but there will have to be some things you do before you get the part."
"Oh, what?"
"The director thinks you're perfect for the role because you're sexy and talented..." Rachel started
"Why thank you very much," Brody smiled at her.
"-and look like who they have in mind for the role but that person is a lot bigger than you."
"Huh?" Brody asked trying to see now. Rachel moved back as she kept reading.
"Since it's a musical about differing body types they were hoping to get someone to fit the role and you were the best by far in everyway but that. However, everyone else who was the appropiate body type or close either are horrible actors, can't sing, couldn't do it, or weren't the same attractiveness necessary."

"Get to the point," Brody said with a sinking heart not liking where this was going. He didn't get the part did he?
"You got the part but if you want to keep it you'll have to..." Rachel trailed off.
"Just spit it out Rachel, I can take it," Brody hoped he could anyways.
"Well you have to gain weight and bulk up quite a bit. They need a 'big star'" Rachel said in quotations.
"I already am," Brody protested.
"Not enough. Again emphasis on big." Brody slumped in his chair.
"Rachel, what am I going to do?"
"Well," she said.
111332222121.title: Opportunity on stage

choices: Puck explains his plan on how he'll make Brody gain.
Puck is staving and takes Brody out for some NY-style pizza.
1113322221211.content:
"I have an idea." Rachel said, walking over to the coffee table and opening Brody's laptop. She continued talking as she pulled open facebook, "You see, back in my senior year of high school, one of my glee club friends ended up realizing a few things about himself. First, he realized just how attracted he was to men, and second, that he was mostly attracted to BIG men, and by big I mean the kind of big you have to get to, Brody."
"Right..." Brody said, wondering where Rachel was going with this.
"Well, the thing is, he found several of the guys in Glee club to be VERY sexy, but he just couldn't bring himself to date any of them until he.. well, look." Rachel said, showing Brody a picture of her friend, Sam, "This is Sam when he rejoined Glee club last year. And this," She said, changing the picture, "Is him today."
Brody couldn't believe what he was seeing. This Sam guy, at the beginning of last year, looked just like Brody does now; buff and muscular, but not gigantic. But now, gigantic was the ONLY word he could use to describe the guy in the picture. Sam Evans looked like he weighed around 450 pounds, with his massive stomach, wide hips, and huge ass. What really shocked Brody, though, was how muscular he was at the same time. Sam's arms were the biggest he'd ever seen, and he had huge, beefy thighs to match, and his chest was strong and solid.

"Wait, so your friend did THAT to him?" Brody asked.
Rachel nodded, "And not just him. Mike Chang, Rory Flanagan, Joe Hart, even several members of the football team like Shane Tinsley." Rachel said, showing him all of the enormous men that this friend of hers had grown. All of them varied, which was what surprised Brody: some had more muscle than fat and vice versa. Rachel pulled up the man's facebook page, "His name is Noah Puckerman, but most people call him Puck. I don't. As you can see, Noah did some gaining as well." She said, showing off Puck's new bulk. Brody was amazed, the dude looked massive! A huge, round, solid looking gut and a giant arms, legs, chest, shoulders, and neck. "The only guy he didn't get his hands on was Finn, but thats because we were dating at the time." Rachel pulled up her Ex's profile picture, "And as you can it didn't take long for Puck to fatten him up too."

Brody was amazed that somebody could get so many people to get THAT BIG that quickly. He couldn't even say anything, he just kept staring. Rachel continued, "This is the guy he started on, Dave Karofsky. He's also the biggest guy Noah's ever helped." She pulled up a picture of Dave at the gym and Brody almost fell over in shock. The dude was MASSIVE! He looked like he weighted over 600 pounds, the majority of it being fat, but he could NOT deny that Dave had the biggest muscles he'd ever seen, even bigger than that Sam guy from before. "Puck and Dave are dating, now." Rachel said, looking back at him, "Listen, Brody, if you're really serious about getting this part then Puck is your best chance."

Brody stared at the computer screen a bit longer, thinking things over. He finally took and breath, "Lets do it." Rachel smiled, "Perfect. I'll send Puck a message right now." Rachel's fingers began typing and it only took a few minutes for Puck to reply, "He says he'll do it but he'll need a place to stay."
"He can stay here with me." Brody said, "I have an extra room he can sleep in." Rachel told Puck that and he replied saying he'd buy the first ticket he could and he'd be on his way.

The very next day Brody is sitting in her living room, watching TV, when the doorbell rings. Brody gets up, answers the door, and realized just how massive Puck actually was. The powerlifter physic he carried on him was so massive that he was actually wider than the door frame. He wore a heavy jacket to keep himself warm in the NYC cold, but the black t shirt he wore under it was skin tight against his massive traps, gigantic pecs, and monstrously round and tight gut. His denim jeans cling to his tree-trunk thighs and thick calves. Puck grinned, "So, you must be Brody."

"Yeah. Noah, right?" Brody asked.
"I prefer Puck. C'mon, man, you gonna let me in or what?" Puck grinned, excited to help this skinny guy before him grow to his fullest potential.
1113322221211.title: Puck moves to NYC.

11133222212112.content:
"Uh sure," Brody said stepping back from the door. Puck smiled as he tucked his and moved sideways through the opening.
"Who's that Brody?" Rachel called from the bathroom where she had been freshening up when the doorbell rang.
"Oh it's your friend Puck!" he called out and the door opened with a bang as Rachel came exploding out of the bathroom and reached them.
"Oh my god you're here! I can't believe it! I'm so excited and it's so very nice to see you again and thank you so much for doing this," she said as she hugged around his middle.
"It's cool Rachel," Puck said. "More than happy to and I had been looking for my next client. It's kind of a business you know, makes real good money."
"Of course," Rachel said snuggling him. "Not to mention it suits you well. I'm so proud of you Noah." Brody was amused to see a blush form on Puck's face although he was the only one who could see it.
"Yeah, yeah, well uh thanks. Anyhow from what I understand Brody here needs to put on some mass for some weird-ass show?"
"Noah, language," Rachel scolded affectionately. Puck grinned.
"Yeah so some weird show?"
"Yeah, pretty much," Brody said. "Apparently I'm not 'big enough' or something," he said doing hand motions with the quotations. Puck looked him over critically.
"Well in the idea of size that Rachel told me is required, you really aren't, not that you're not attractive but not nearly manly enough to pull such a role off like that."
"That's why you're here," Brody said and Puck smirked.
"Feisty, shouldn't be surprised. No one else would have suited Rach."
"Hey, are you saying I'm not lovable?" Rachel asked.
"No, but it certainly takes a specific type of person to keep up with you."
"I have standards," Rachel said. "I mean you have to be nice, kind, a good performer, an amazing singer..."
"Cute but I don't need to hear the list," Puck said. "Anyhow, the plane ride went on for a while so I thought why not get started on training and I am kind of hungry and this baby needs constant feeding," he patted his massive gut. "Metaphorically speaking, I'm not actually pregnant so you know."
"I didn't say anything," Brody said putting his hands up innocently.
"No, but I can tell when someone is thinking that but hey, I don't blame you. It kind of is my baby." Puck and Rachel laughed at that.
"So before we start," Puck said when Rachel finally let go of him. "Are you a vegan as well like Rachel?"
"No, I'm not really," Brody said and Puck sighed in relief. "Thank goodness, vegans are tough to know what they can and can't eat and make it real hard since let's be honest it may or may not be healthy depending but either way vegan food is generally crap."

"Hey," Rachel said a bit offended. "Is not..."
"Most of it," Puck clarified. Anyway its not awkward that for Rachel to eat her stuff and you to eat whatever?"
"No, not really, she has her meal and I have mine," Brody said.
"Cool. So I hear New York has some amazing world-class pizza."
"You bet it does," Brody said.
"Well we could go get some," Puck said.
"That's a good idea! Let me go get ready," Rachel said rushing to her room.
"I have to get started sometime soon I guess," Brody said. "Going to be really weird eating whatever."
"Yeah it always is at the start for most people but you become used to it pretty quickly, a couple of days or a week generally."
"So you're a dancer?" Puck asked.
"Yeah, dancer, singer, performer, actor, did ballet, martial arts, variety of things." Brody replied.

"Rachel did show me some of the stuff you guys did, it was amazing." Puck smirked and licked his lips. "I can't believe she actually wore that low cut black dress in 'Oops I did it again' which by the way was really hot. She always wore cute animals sweaters in high school and was embarassed to show even the slightest bit of skin let alone her boobs like that."

"Yeah, was a bit of a surprise as well but she was determined to prove she had sex appeal and well I wasn't going to stop her, though even if I did want to I couldn't."
"Once Rachel sets her mind to something she does it. That is one of the things I always admired about her. She inspired me," Puck said.
"What are you guys talking about?" Rachel asked coming back having changed into clothes more appropiate for going out.
"What an inspiration my wonderful girl is," Brody said kissing her. She laughed and hit at his head.
"Hey, not right now. I just put on clothes and don't want to have to take them off again." Puck raised his eyebrow and whistled causing Rachel to glare at him.
"It's not what you're thinking, I mean I don't want to go out in public with rumpled clothes."
"Sure, sure," Puck said laughing. "Though now I am curious..."
"Not going to answer that question Noah," Rachel said smartly.
"Aww no fun," Puck said.
"So are we going?" Rachel asked.
"I guess so whenever Brody here is ready. I assume you're getting the vegan or vegetarian option?"
"Of course," Rachel said.

"Cool, I'm getting meat and uh you have whatever. Doesn't really matter till we get there there. Show the way Rachel." Rachel smiled as she lead the way out, Brody following, and Puck side-stepping after them. They walked along the path and Brody could tell that everyone they walked by was staring at them, or rather at one individual in particular which wasn't him or Rachel for once. Puck just lapped up the attention of the random passer-byers occasionally sending winks and smiles or growl as he flexed his massive muscles which brought uncomfortable memories back to Brody's mind.

"Can you not do that please?" Brody asked Puck. Puck was about to say something but the look on Brody's face stopped him and he nodded, trying to ignore the prying eyes the rest of the way.

"So Mario's Pizza buffet?" Rachel asked. "Some amazing people and well a buffet because you know," Rachel said.
"Sounds good," Brody replied and Puck agreed as well. They went in and sat down while Puck flirted with the waitress as she took their drink orders.
"I thought you were gay," Brody said once the waitress had taken their drink orders. Puck laughed.

"Oh I am, but I like both and she was quite pretty and was certainly interested." That certainly had been true, the waitress hadn't been able to tear her eyes Puck the whole time when she took their orders and Brody was making a bet with himself how long it would take before the woman jumped him. "Mayhap she and I can have some fun time together later."

"Aren't you and Dave together?" Brody asked really confused.

"Yeah but we have an understanding. Of course I'll always have Dave first but that doesn't mean I can't have some fun with others." Brody didn't know what to say to that.
"Anyhow, so let's eat," Puck said getting up. "Come on Brody," he called as he walked to the buffet lines. Brody looked back at Rachel and she nodded as she headed over to the much smaller (but still there) vegan and vegetarian options. With a sigh wondering just what he was getting into, Brody got behind Puck in line.
11133222212112.title: Going out

choices: One of my famous Puckerman Monster Sundaes.
111332222121121.content:
Puck stood behind Brody in line as they two waited for the people in front to get their pizza from the buffet line. Once Brody was up to pick he grabbed four slices of pepperoni pizza, two more slices then he normally would eat, assuming that Puck would be okay with that much. Puck, being almost a head taller than Brody and almost three times as wide, looked over Brody's shoulder, "Dude, thats it?"

Brody looked back and up, confused, "What?"
"Thats really all you're going to eat? I thought you wanted to bulk up?" Puck asked, unimpressed.
"I do." Brody said, looking at his plate.
"Well you're eating the Puckerman Pizza Special tonight." Puck took the four slices on Brody's plate and put them back on the rack before grabbing the entire rack. He grabbed another with his already full hand and two more with his free hand, "Brody, grab two baskets of those quadruple cheesy bread sticks." Puck said before heading back to the table.
Brody, shocked by the amount Puck was taking with him, did as the massive beast of a man told him.

At the table Puck set the four racks down and looked at Brody, "Start eating. I need to go get mine." Puck said before walking off. Brody turned around and watched Puck walk away, his eyes traveling down Puck's insanely wide back and locking onto his massive rear end. Puck had the biggest, chunkiest bubble butt that Brody had ever seen. It swayed to the right when he took a step to the left, and vice versa, and bounced and jiggled ever so slightly. Brody ripped his eyes away, feeling his face flush a little, and sat down to eat. He looked at the massive meal in front of him, sighed, and dug in, devouring his first slice.

Not even into his second bite Puck had returned with 6 whole normal size pizzas, 4 baskets of quadruple cheesy bread sticks, and 3 huge pitchers of soda. He had to have a waiter help him carry it all back. The waiter walked away and Puck settled into his seat in the booth, his belly pressing up against the table, and grinned at Brody, "Eat up!"

Rachel returned a few minutes later with her own meal: a salad and a few slices of veggie pizza. She didn't comment on the amount of food Brody was going to have to eat, but he could see on her face she was a little worried. They all started eating and Brody did his best to keep up with Puck but there was no possible way to do that. For every slice of pizza Brody ate, Puck had already devoured 4 slices.

30 minutes passed and Puck groaned happily as he sat back in the booth, his stomach bloated and stretched out before him, causing his shirt to ride up. He had eagerly devoured all 6 pizzas, all 4 baskets of bread, and all 3 pitchers of soda. Puck placed his hands under his belly and lifted it up, resting it on top of the table, "Oooooh, shit, that was good. How you holding up, Brodster?"

Brody swallowed the piece of crust in his mouth and sat back as well, groaning loudly because he had done what he thought was the impossible: he had eaten all 4 smaller personal sized pizzas and both baskets of bread. "Finished..." he said, his stomach bloated and stretched out in front of him, his skin tight V-neck clinging tightly to the ball of food stuffed flesh.

He rubbed his belly and groaned loudly as Puck grinned, "Well, well. Looks like somebody is a big eater. Guess you're ready for..."
111332222121121.title: Brody eats the Puckerman Pizza Special.

1113322221211211.content:
"A nice massage to ease your stomach," Puck said. "I'm pretty good at it and people tell me all the time how wonderful it is. Course, I only give it when people do a good job and well I think you have." Puck got up and moved to sit beside Brody and Rachel. Fortunately the booth was in a rounded half-circle rather than a straight table so Rachel and Brody could scoot over as Puck took up most of the room as he switched spots. Dramatically cracking his large fingers, he laid his hands on Brody and got to work. Lightly rubbing his large fingers over the stretched taut stomach, he patterned circles and squeezed together as he began.

Rachel watched with avid interest in the proceedings as she had always wanted to learn the proper technique of a massage (the few times she tried, people said she went to fast and rough). Who knew that fingers so big could so delicately tease and rub like that? Brody seemed to be enjoying it quite a bit as he tried to move closer to the smooth touching fingers so it could cover all the areas. Rachel could also tell he was making happy (and some pained but mostly happy) gasps as Puck gave his bloated belly his full attention. Rachel knew Brody was a somewhat big eater and had been trained to hold back but she didn't know that he was that big of an eater. He did splurge a bit on Thanksgiving but nothing compared to this. Then again, at Thanksgiving they had all those weird friends of Kurt's boss (Rachel wondered how many actually were and how many were friends of friends that came along uninvited) over and far more than expected so they had run out of food fairly quickly. It had still been fun though.

Brody made such a funny face as he released a couple of huge burps as Puck massaged that Rachel couldn't help but laugh long and hard. They were both staring at her as after a couple minutes of laughing and pounding the table she finally ran out of air and was coughing as she kept laughing. Brody was about to do the heimlich if she was about to start choking to death but Rachel waved him off smiling.

"I'm fine, I'm fine," she said smiling before hiccuping and another peal of laughter.
"What the hell Berry? Are you on something?" Puck asked shocked.
"No, no I'm not," Rachel said finally settling down.
"Then what the fuck was that?" Puck demanded.
"Noah, language," Rachel reminded. Rolling his eyes Puck tried again.
"What the name of motherflipping love was that?"
"I was laughing." At the sight of Puck's and Brody's rather murderous faces she backpedaled. "Sorry Brody, you just had the funniest face expressions when Puck was rubbing you that I couldn't help myself. Not to mention it is cute when you burp which is rather manly." Puck grinned and Brody's face flushed slightly in embarassment.
"Yeah, you did look rather funny," Puck teased. Brody pouted and Rachel moved to him.

"Can I have a turn Puck?" Rachel asked, batting her eyelashes a little. He raised his eyebrows but allowed her to place her own hands on Brody causing him to shiver. Rachel rubbed Brody, occasionally helped by Puck as he corrected her when she was going too hard or too fast. He also gave tips and advice as he fixed her position when it was too much. Brody was in euphoria and it was almost too much and yet not enough. He made an embarrassingly whiny noise when Puck and Rachel both stopped and drew back. Rachel smiled at him and kissed his cheek whispering later. Brody really wished it was later then.

“So do you think you can walk or will we need a cab?” Puck asked. Brody blinked, his mind still focused on the pleasure he had earlier when Puck and then Rachel then both were rubbing him.
“Huh, what?” he asked.
“Cab or walking?” Brody looked down at his still hugely swollen stomach that pushed his shirt up.

“Cab,” he said immediately, not enjoying the thought of walking back, if that was even possible in his condition. He kind of doubted it. “Cab definitely. It’s too far for walking.” Rachel nodded as she went to go flag one down. Puck helped a groaning Brody up and Brody would have been embarrassed to need help like that if he wasn’t so full or that Puck would definitely draw far more attention than him. Brody was waddled, pulled, and nearly had to be carried out. Thankfully there was a taxi where Rachel was waiting and they got in. It was a really tight squeeze with Puck in there and Brody was frankly surprised that he fit. Then again, he was all but pushed into the side door so he was thankful when they got back home after dropping Rachel off at her place. Puck followed behind him as he stumblingly made his way in and opened the door. Heading to the bedroom, he called out “make yourself at home! I’m going to take a nap, I’m exhausted.” Brody got on the bed and as soon as he did, was out like a light. Puck looked around awkwardly and then decided to tuck Brody in before going to the couch and watching Brody’s surprisingly huge flat-screen tv.

11133222212112111.content:
Brody groaned as sunlight flitted in through the blinds in his bedroom and hit him in the eyes. He grabbed the bed sheets and rolled over in his bed, covering his face. The sounds of the busy New York city streets filled his room; cars honking, New Yorkers cursing each other out as they drove through the busy streets. These were all sounds that Brody had grown used to and at this point in his life were sounds that lulled him to sleep. However, there was a new sound in Brody's life that he wasn't used to yet; the loud sounds of a 560 pound man wandering through his apartment.

Brody did his best to ignore the heavy footsteps in his living room but he couldn't help but think that the sounds were getting closer. Brody buried his face into his pillow and rolled onto his stomach, trying his best to fall back to sleep. Just as Brody was about to slip back into dreamland the door to his bedroom door opened up and Puck entered clad only in his boxers, "Morning, Brodster! Time for another big day of eating!"
Brody groaned, "Can't we do it later? It's still early." He mumbled into his pillow.
"You're kidding, right?" Puck asked as he was finally able to squeeze his enormous, bigger-than-the-doorframe-body into Brody's room, "It's never to early to turn somebody's chiseled abs into a big, thick, sexy ball of fat. Now get up!"
"No." Brody protested, wrapping his arms around his pillow.
Puck raised an eyebrow before grabbing the comforter, "C'mon Brody. Get... UP!" Puck said, pulling the comforter off of him.
"NO." Brody protested again, refusing to wake up at such an ungodly hour for anything other than school or rehearsal.

Puck stood there and looked over Brody's body; his body tight and muscular, his legs were strong but not thick (they reminded Puck of Mike Chang's legs before he fattened Mike up into the 480 pound dancer he is today), and his ass was tight and perky. Puck licked his lips, excited to watch said ass grow wide, thick, juicy, and fat.
A deep chuckled escaped Puck's mouth, "Okay, fine, sleep in."
"Thank you." Brody mumbled.
"No problem. You're right though, it is super late. I think I'll head back to sleep too." Puck said as he walked over to the side of Brody's bed he was sleeping on. Puck patted his monster sized gut a few times before positioning himself and then letting his gigantic body fall onto the bed, completely covering Brody's body with his own.
Brody let out a loud gasp as he felt 560 pounds of muscle and fat suddenly surround his body. He grunted and groaned as Puck adjusted himself so he was lying on top of Brody in the same position Brody was lying.
"Night, little dude." Puck said to Brody, a grin on his face.
"Get... off..." Brody said as he struggled underneath Puck's massive frame, feeling his thick, solid, yet still somewhat soft belly mold around his strong back.
"Only if you agree to get up so I can stuff that tiny gut of yours." Puck said, grinning.
"Ugggh... FINE!" Brody said before taking a deep breath of air once Puck had rolled off of him, "What the hell, man?!" Brody yelled, sitting up.

Puck grinned and slapped his gut before jiggling it a few times, "Just giving you some motivation! What, you didn't like it?"
"NO! Of course not!" Brody said, falling onto his back and laying there next to the mountain of a man who was going to make him equally as mountainous.
Puck grinned as he reached one of his massive hands down ran it across the huge erection that Brody had in his boxers, "Really? Cause this seems to think differently."
"DUDE, WHAT THE HELL?" Brody said, covering his crotch, "I'm not gay."
"Of course not." Puck said before getting up to his feet and standing with his back turned to Brody, "You're bi."
Brody's eyes shout straight down to the insanely fat and round ass Puck had, "No I'm not!"
Puck turned around, "Yeah you are. I went through your phone and found all of the naughty pics you have of yourself with other guys. Not to mention all of the texts you get from both men and woman asking for hookups. Lemme guess, you're a male escort to pay for school?"

Brody sat there, speechless for a bit, before sighing, "Yeah, I am. I guess you think I'm some creepy sex pervert now, huh?"
"Course not!" Puck said, a bug grin on his chubby face, "Dude, any job that leads to sex is an amazing job. You think I've fattened up all those guys and DIDN'T fuck them? Whatever you gotta do to make money is fine by me, Brody."
"Really?" Brody asked, honestly very happy with what he heard.
"Yeah!" Puck said, "I gotta question for ya. Do you top or bottom?"
"Top, I'm not into bottoming." Brody said.
"Hmmm. I can work with that. Good news Brody. Once you pack on your first fifty pounds I'll let you take a ride on the Puck-asaurus's caboose." Puck said, turning around and pulling his boxers down, revealing his enormous, fat, spherical ass.
Brody's face flushed red, "Wha- what?"
"You heard me, Brodster. Gain 50 pounds and you'll get to plow these huge cheeks." Puck said, slapping his ass causing it to jiggle and bounce, "Normally I'm only a top but mixing it up could be fun."
Brody reached out to grab it and Puck pulled his boxers back up, "Nope. Here's the deal. Gain twenty-five pounds and you can touch it. Then once you hit fifty you can fuck it; I'm being pretty generous here."
"Deal." Brody said.
"Good! Now lets get you stuffed!" Puck said as he walked towards the door.

Brody watched Puck's ass as he walked, enjoying how it swayed and bounced, and was so enthralled by it that he didn't even notice Puck getting stuck in the doorway again.

11133222212112111.title: An eventful morning.

choices: Eating pancakes and Brody does a good job but requires some help
111332222121121111.content:
"So like, where are you staying?" Brody asked Puck, watching him move about the kitchen as he got out supplies to make pancakes. Puck thought a moment.
"I was thinking about getting an apartment outside the city and take the train in."
"You could stay here," Brody offered. "Could use extra rent and it will still be easier and more affordable and save on traveling everyday. It also will allow you to be nearby." Puck smiled at that.

"That would be awesome. You really don't mind?"
"I wouldn't offer if I did," Brody said. "It is just me at the moment though. I had been going to move in with Rachel but then Kurt and Santanna came and there wouldn't be much room with all of them since they're all space hogs from what I gather."

"Yeah, best not to interfere and feeding you will be much more convenient alone. I can't wait until you start getting bigger, you'll look fantastic with a gut."

"Sure, uh whatever, thanks," Brody said awkwardly. He still had to wrap his mind around the idea that he was going to be deliberately gaining weight and quite a bit of it too. He had never really been fat before in his life. A slight bit of stubborn pudge when he was younger that had persisted all the way till his first year of College at Nyada but he had never been really fat before, or whatever term they were going to use. Probably better to say beefy or husky, beefy definitely, than to imagine it fat. This was going to be a real different experience but he was an actor and good actors would expand their ability to include all sorts of diverse roles of which this was going to be one. Plus, if weight gain had to happen at some point, why not at a time when he was in control and would enjoy it? He just had to remember that and not think too hard that he was going to lose his wonderful abs that he had worked hard for. At least on the bright side he'll definitely be enjoying food more and well, Puck's proposal certainly was an intriguing one. Puck was right of course that he was bi. He was an actor and it would only make sense to enjoy both and why limit to one? He still wanted Rachel as his number 1 girl but if Puck was offering and Rachel was okay with it and she seemed to have been, that Puck could be his number 1 guy. Yeah Puck was dating someone else but Puck certainly didn't let that limit him and Brody assumed that anyone who would be with Puck would have to accept that Puck liked to spread around since he certainly wasn't quiet or secretive about it.

Puck was making pancakes while Brody pondered where Puck was going to sleep if he was going to stay with him. Possibly the couch though he couldn't imagine that being comfortable while an inflatable mattress sure wouldn't work. He'd offer the bed but he wasn't sure if the bed could support Puck's weight nor sure of how Puck would constantly get in and out with the smaller doorframe than the entrance to the apartment and Puck being too wide to get through easy.

"I could sleep on the floor," Puck said startling Brody. "I don't really mind and I don't think I'll want to daily tangle with your door and more than necessary unless you want to knock it down and expand?"

"You really don't mind the floor?" Brody asked.
"Nope, I'm good wherever I lay. So, chocolate or blueberry pancakes?" Puck asked, changing the subject.
"Chocolate," Brody grinned. "I love chocolate."
"Who doesn't?" Puck said back as he sprinkled chips in.
"People that lack personality, a soul, or are allergic," Brody said.
"All of those would be unfortunate, but especially the last one. That'd be like, awful."
"Yeah." Brody continued watching as Puck expertly flipped the pancakes over.
"So, what made you decide to get so big?" Brody asked curious.
"Well it was in the second year of high school and well let's just say I got introduced to it by a woman named Lauren Zizes. He made his way back into the kitchen just as Puck was setting a stack of 15 pancakes on his plate, "Each of these are pound so lets see you eat your own new weight." Puck said with a grin.
11133222212112111122222.title: Brody's first weigh in.

choices: Going out with Puck and Rachel
111332222121121111222221.content:
Brody was feeling good and encouraged by his progress. It had only been a few days and already he put on 15 pounds! It was going to be both harder and easier in the future but for now he was just excited and excited about being excited. Rubbing his gut, he mused on how only days ago he had six pack abs to be envious of. They weren't from being thin either and while he would not say he had been super bulky, he was definitely more muscled than most with his dancing, karate, and other physical activities. He squeezed and rolled a bit of new flab between his fingers. Had this always been so much fun? It had seemed awful when he was younger and it probably was. No kid should ever want to be fat and he would honestly question the sanity of someone who suggested it. As an adult however? This was way more fun than he had ever realized and he had to thank Puck for that.

'This did not mean letting go though,' Brody thought as he got ready. He was seeing the fun of a belly but he still definitely wanted, and needed, to be strong. He now thought Puck's approach was the best and Brody was surprised it had never been apparent to him before. Strong with a nice big belly, friendly, capable. Not a useless slug like those who just got fat and didn't do anything, Brody needed to be active. It also wasn't like having a six pack either since one didn't have to worry about what to eat or when. It really was stressful and he had never realized stressful it was until he got that letter and Rachel brought Puck in. Strength and size though had the best of both worlds...like Puck. Of course, Puck might have gone overkill since he was monstrously big. Quite a turn on but rarely practical but the principle was sound. Plus Puck looked very, very hot filling up the space in his apartment and getting stuck in the door...but what on earth was he thinking? He should be eating those delicious pancakes that were calling to him.

"Chocolate pancakes?" he asked Puck, tying a bib around his neck, one that ironically said 'kiss the cook.' He sure wouldn't mind doing that...or some other things. Puck grinned and nodded as he sat down and one again Brody was left to marvel how his furniture managed to not be squished under the beast. They were definitely worth the money he and his parents had spent on them. The smell of chocolate was now beginning to tickle his nose and Brody inhaled with a sigh of pleasure as he examined the stack. Okay, fifteen pancakes. That was more than twice what he had managed to eat on his own the last time and half a time again what Puck had somehow managed to stuff into him. Brody didn't particularly expect to beat the record but he hoped to at least impress Puck and himself with improvement. Shaking off all further thoughts, Brody dove into the pancakes with ferocity.

He definitely ate quickly but at the same time made sure to savor the taste of flying away to chocolate heaven. Brody couldn't resist the moans of rapture and prayer that flew from his lips in between bites or the constantly running monologue in his head that essentially went 'oh my god chocolate, I love chocolate, this chocolate is so good, fuck I love chocolate, Puck and Rachel wrapped in chocolate...' and he lost his mind a bit as he scarfed down the fluffy as sin pancakes. Time was in a haze and Brody was a machine until the chocolate pancake high he was on was shattered when the first pain signals reached his brain that he was reaching his limits and he was forced to slow down. He was panting and he turned to see Puck watching intently, panting a little too but for a much different reason. Groaning, Brody put his fork down and rubbed his stomach which had vastly expanded with every bite of those fluffy miracle wonders. Already it was bigger than he was used to ever before, sitting in his lap and peaking cautiously from underneath the bib. He rubbed it fretfully as he tried to not throw up and he already missed his the chocolate pancake high that had ended far too early for him. There were only a few pancakes left on the plate, three of them, but it felt like an open infinite chasm as Brody tried to keep the nausea down. Puck scooted the chair over next to Brody.

"Are you okay?" Puck asked concerned.
"Never...never better," Brody wheezed.
"Do you think you can finish?" Puck asked.

"Honestly? Not really," Brody laughed deprecatingly and winced as he rubbed his stomach. "I'm fuller than full, fuller than like ever, even in the past couple days." Puck raised his eyebrows impressed.

"You don't go soft do you?"

"No, I always go hard when I want to achieve something. However, I don't think I can finish those last remaining pancakes." Brody let out a massive burp and clutched his stomach again. "Yeah, I think I'll go lie down..."

"How about I rub you and feed you the rest?" Puck said. "At least as far as you can go. I know it kills you to give up." Puck also figured there was no way he was going to turn down a belly rub from him and he was proved right as Brody rubbed his head a moment before giving in.

"Maybe just a little bit more," he conceded. Puck rubbed him with pleasure as Brody leaned back. With one hand, carefully alternating every now and then, Puck cut up the rest of the pancakes into little sizable bites and popped them into Brody's mouth who seemed only semi-conscious at this point, in full thrall of Puck's touch. Puck had to admit, he was both impressed and a bit unnerved at how quickly Brody fell in thrall to his massages and while most people generally did sooner or later, nobody enjoyed it quite so much or conked under to let him do his thing as quickly as Brody did. Shrugging his shoulders, Puck continued to feed Brody who didn't even seem to notice, or if he did the effect was small enough that Puck's ministrations quickly soothed it over, the bite sized pieces and in short work, the last three pancakes were gone and Brody had managed to have eaten every bite. Looking down, Puck was amused to see that Brody now seemed fast asleep like a babe. Puck grinned as he moved his hands under him for support and with hardly any trouble, bent his legs and heaved up and carried Brody to the couch like he weighed nothing. Turning Brody on his side, Puck feasted his eyes on his new favorite student who learned well. Only a few days of protestations and Brody was already on board with the plan and enjoying it. Brody was an amazing natural gainer and learner. Already after only a few days his rock hard abs were already being replaced by a sexy growing gut which was beautifully stuffed at the moment. He looked beautiful lying there and Puck sat on the ground in awe. He could only imagine what Brody would look like in the weeks to come. For now though, Puck had to get ready for the rest of the day. Laying a kiss on that tummy (he couldn't resist, it just begged for it), Puck got up to make some phone calls and to set things up for the next portion.
111332222121121111222221.title: Chocolate High

1113322221211211112222211.content:
A half hour went by and Puck emerged from the bathroom after a nice warm shower. He was wearing his massive boxers, as there were no towels big enough to reach around his massive 60 inch waist, but was completely dry. His enormous gut covered his crotch easily and hung down to his mid-thighs. The gargantuan almost-naked Puck waddled over to Brody, who was still fast asleep on the couch and Puck nudged him with his muscular thigh, "Hey, wake up, dude."

Brody groaned before looking up, getting a face full of Puck-belly and grinning, "Hey, whats up?"
"We're heading out to lunch. Rachel is busy so she'll meet us at the mall after." Puck said before he went to get dressed. Brody admired the shake and jiggle of the fattest ass he'd ever seen as he did so.
"Awww, okay." He said before getting up and heading for the shower. After a quick shower and doing his hair, Brody hurried from the bathroom to his bedroom to get dressed.

He grabbed the doorknob when he heard Puck's voice, "I already got your clothes." he said. Brody turned to look at Puck and saw that he was already dressed for the day. Puck was wearing a skin tight white long sleeve shirt that was tucked into his jeans (though Brody was amazed that Puck owned a shirt that covered the massive overhang of his gut). Over that was a gray skin tight v-neck sweater that, unlike his white shirt, didn't cover his belly so Puck's clothed overhanging gut was on full view. On top of that Puck wore his thick military green winter jacket, as it had started snowing outside, as well as his big fabric mohawk beanie and fingerless gloves.
"Really?," Brody asked, "I thought you couldn't get that fat sexy body of your in and out of my room without getting stuck in the doorframe?"
"Oh trust me I did get stuck. It was a miracle I could even get out of that skinny ass door." Puck said as he rubbed his gut. Brody could feel himself getting hard at the thought of seeing Puck stuck in his doorframe again, a kink he was starting to develop.

"Anyway, now that your gut is starting to show progress, I want you to wear this." Puck said, holding up a small white button up shirt, "You're gonna end up destroying a LOT of these as you get bigger."
"Look forward to it." Brody said as he dropped his towel and put on the boxers Puck had set out for him. He threw on white tank top first before putting on the tight button up. Brody had some trouble getting the buttons on and once they were connected you could see them visibly strain around his new belly. Brody threw on his black winter jacket and a pair of brown khakis and some boots before styling his hair. Once the two were ready they headed out, though Brody did have to push Puck out because he had gotten stuck in the door frame.

The two headed down the stairs to the busy NYC sidewalk, snow falling all around them, and made their way to the subway. Once there they board the F train, which Puck specifically chose as a fun reference to their weight gaining, and the two headed off. The subway car was packed so Puck and Brody were crammed very close to each other, but neither minded. Brody loved the way Puck's enormous gut felt pressed up against his entire torso and how it jiggled and bounced as the train did and Puck enjoyed the feeling of having Brody's smaller body pressed against his massive frame. Eventually the train got off and the two entered Grand Central Terminal.
"What are we doing here?" Brody asked.

"Lunch, remember? We gotta stuff that gut to max capacity if we're gonna get you clothes that'll fit." Puck said and the two of them went to Frankies Dogs on the Go, a famous hot dog restaurant in GCT. Brody grabbed a booth as Puck walked over and waited in line to place the order. After a few minutes Puck came back carrying four trays, balancing two on his arms, and set them down in front of Brody, "I made sure to get the dogs that'll really pack on those pounds: Frankies cheesy dogs." Puck said.

Brody looked down at the four trays and counted his meal; Puck had bought him 16 hot dogs, all topped with cheddar and mozzarella cheese, and 8 double twist pretzels, each one smothered in melted cheese. There were also 4 bags of chips and a large root beer. Puck sat down next to Brody, his massive 560 pound frame squeezed into the boot so tightly that his enormous gut pressed into the table. Brody blushed a bit, "Uhh, theres umm... room on the other side?"
"I know, " Puck said, "but with my bulk in the way you have no choice but to finish all of it cause I refuse to move until you do."

Brody took a deep breath and started chowing down, blowing through the first few hot dogs with ease. After hot dog number 5 Brody started to slow down, his stomach bloating out a bit and getting full but he pushed on. After around hot dog 14 Brody groaned and rubbed his bloated gut. Puck grinned, "Let me." He said as he picked up the last two hot dogs and stuffed the first one into Brody's mouth. Brody protested but Puck pushed the whole thing in, amazed by Brody's lack of a gag reflex (that'll come in handy) and watched as the stuffed college student chewed and swallowed.
"Puck... you have to... be so forc-" Brody's words were cut out as Puck stuffed the entirety of the long hot dog down Brody's throat, loving how thick beefy fingers felt in in his mouth before pulling out and watching Brody eat. Brody gave up the protests after that and sat back as Puck force fed him the 8 massive pretzels and the entire 4 bags of chips.

Brody moaned loudly, his belly stuffed as much as it had ever been before, as Puck lifted up the drink. Brody wrapped his sexy lips around it and started drinking. He could physically feel his gut straining and growing as he drank and he soon as he finished the drink and pulled his lips off Brody felt his button up shirt burst open and heard three buttons ping against the seats on the other side of the table.

Puck grinned, "Atta-boy!" He said as he patted Brody's bloated gut, "Now you wait here while I get my food." Puck said as he waddled off. Brody sat back, rubbing his gut as he waited and in no time Puck returned with the same order Brody had but twice as much. Brody just sat back and watched as Puck devastated the 32 hot dogs, 16 pretzels, and 8 bags of chips. The massive man washed it all down with his soda and smiled, "Mmmm, that was good. If we weren't on such a tight schedule I'd go back for seconds." Puck said. "We'll leave when you're feeling up to it."

"I can make it..." Brody said. Puck shrugged, wiggled out of his extremely tight booth, and the two hopped back on the train as it departed for the Manhattan Mall.
1113322221211211112222211.title: Lunch with Puck before shopping.

choices: Brody trying clothes on,modeling, and the three go out to dinner
Brody trying clothes on, modeling, and other things
11133222212112111122222111.content:
Riding the train was slightly nauseating after that but by some miracle Brody didn't throw up. He had no idea how Puck could stand so calmly but maybe he was just so heavy he was like a boulder in the middle of a stream forcing the water to go around, just like getting on the train. People couldn't help but look over since Puck was kind of hard to miss and whenever he did he smirked at them which was kind of funny, especially the people who were shaking their heads in disgust or the people who giggled and liked it. Brody was especially partial to the latter group, especially those who took pictures which Puck made silly faces at.

Eventually they got off and went in towards the center where Rachel was waiting. She didn't see them at first since she had her back turned and was talking on the phone so Puck picked her up in a giant bear hug which caused her to scream at first but then turned into a laugh when she realized it wasn't some stranger.

"Puck!!!" she squealed loudly in excitement and Puck laughed as Santanna's voice came swearing from the phone. It was still on and Santanna was nearly deafened by the shrieking.

"Puck! God damn it I thought she was being attacked and was getting ready to come on right over to kick some ass after I would have set the cops on those fucker's trail who would make the mistake of making Rachel a target. But its only you and now I'm deaf."

"Sorry about that, I couldn't resist surprising her. It's nice to hear from you too."
"Well we should get together sometime since from what I understand you're going to be staying a while with donkey face?"
"Yeah, I'm with Brody and really Santanna, that's not very nice to say of my boy."

"Yeah well, you know I do that with everyone giving them a special name to remember them by. I'm actually calling him it nicely. So what are you and donkey face Brody up to? I am getting pretty much nothing from Rachel."

"Just doing my thing," Puck said grinning.
"Which thing-oh you mean...no way!" Santanna started cackling. "Mr. Perfect six-pack abs and everything is actually getting the Puck treatment and getting bigger?"

"Yep. It's for some future play thing but really, he's getting to love it. One of the sexiest best natural eaters I ever had the opportunity to work with."
"I'm actually surprised. I'm kind of curious what he looks like..." Rachel grabbed the phone back.
"Santanna, aren't you late for your appointment?" She asked.
"Oh shit yeah well tell donkey face hi for me and bye to Puck and that I want to see what Brody looks like and that we should all go out together sometime." Santanna quickly hung up the phone and Rachel shook her head smiling.
"Abrasive as ever. Well then I'm glad you called to go shopping as I haven't done so for a while and this is the perfect opportunity to get some of those new shoes and that dress I want but where's Brody?"

"Right here beautiful," Brody said grinning as he did the same thing as Puck wrapping his arms around her from behind. "It's so good to see you since you're so busy with rehearsals."

"Well you know how it goes," Rachel said sighing against him. "I would love to see you more too. But I have some extra free time so..." she stopped and moved out from under his arms.

"Brody?" she said in surprise when she stared at him. Brody blushed nervously since while he knew theoretically she was okay with it maybe she hadn't been thinking all the way through and she might change her mind and decide she didn't want a bigger him. Sweating nervously for a moment, Brody relaxed when she smiled and placed a hand over his swollen gut and rubbed.

"Wow, I could see why you need new clothes already. I can't believe how much you've grown in such a short time." Smirking, Rachel's face turned devious as she squeezed. "Or that you got on the train coming here looking like this," she said pointing to the battered button up with three missing buttons and his tank-top that couldn't cover his burgeoning gut and showing skin. "So how much have you gained?"

"The last official count was 15 but considering the lunch I was just put through more like 20." Puck came and grinned as he poked Brody's gut too.
"I say more like 25 probably," he said patting it. "You're doing great."
"Clearly it's a good thing I called then," Rachel said smirking a little. "Puck sure knows his stuff and how to get people to do things. So are you ready?"
"Yeah," Brody said.
"I'll leave you guys alone. I have some other things I need to get and might as well get some extra stuff for myself. Meet you guys later? Maybe you, me, Brody, Santanna, and Kurt could go out to dinner or something."
"Hmm yeah I'll call her and ask," Rachel said. "See you later!" She waved by to Puck as she took Brody by the arm and pretty much dragged him behind her.

"Hmm so bigger clothes that will fit and grow into." They went into Macy's and she started running down the aisles and grabbing stuff from the racks.
"You do know I can choose my own clothes right?" Brody asked smiling.
"Yeah...well...just felt like choosing stuff that would look good on you." Rachel stammered.
"So you really don't mind this?" Brody asked pointing to his gut.
"Of course not, if I did, I wouldn't have called Puck. Once he discovered his talent he went crazy with it and have you seen him? If I can handle that size, I can handle just about anything though I would be worried if you were planning to get that big."
"No, not that big. So you don't feel disappointed about me losing my abs?" Brody pushed.

"Do I have to smack some sense into you? I said no I don't care. While I did love your abs...really loved them, I have no problem with you getting bigger, especially for a role or if you just want to. I would like you either way and Finn was still chubbier than that."

"Well that's good...but did you just have to bring up Finn? I don't really like him."
"The feelings mutual though I don't understand why you guys couldn't get along."
"He still wants you back," Brody grumbled and Rachel grinned.
"We talked about it and we agreed to see different people. Besides, he's busy on some secret project where we're not really allowed to talk or make contact anyhow. It drives Puck crazy."

"I bet," Brody said feeling just the slightest tinge of irrational jealousy over Finn and Puck being so close. He even knew it was crazy since Puck and Finn were best friends for years before and there was absolutely nothing wrong with Puck being friends with Finn who he hadn't even seen for a while but it was still annoying. Maybe he just wanted to be that close to Puck as well who was really beginning to grow on him along with Rachel." Rachel gave him a warning glance and Brody shut up quickly not wanting to push her mood. Rachel was awesome in so many ways but when she was in a mood she could go utterly ballistic and he did not want to be alone with her should that happen. She opened the door into the dressing room and put the clothes in and before she could get out Brody grabbed her and shut the door.

"Don't leave yet, I miss you and haven't seen you for a couple of days." Brody ripped off the button-up and the tank-top loving the way Rachel was eyeing him. She was telling the truth, she was still as into him now as she was when he had the more traditionally perfect body. He felt both relieved and just the slightest bit insulted but relief was the stronger. He had been a bit worried as he hadn't had the opportunity to work out for a few days and while he was onboard with the whole gaining process it was slightly bothersome to feel like a slug and the softness forming in his pecs and arms and gut (when not utterly stuffed to the brim by meals that were more like feasts for each one). They were still pretty respectable since it was only a few days but given a few days more might not be so pretty so he was going to have to talk to Puck about that.

Rachel had gotten the picture and was removing her shirt as well showing off her perfect boobs in that black bra Brody loved. Licking his lips Brody grinned. "So you were ready for me too?"

"I had been hoping," Rachel said, putting on the sex voice that made Brody real excited. He pushed her against the wall and started kissing her causing her to moan and driving them both more excited.

"I...had been...missing this," Brody breathed heavily as he kissed and sucked on her mouth, neck, everywhere he could get his hands on.
"Yeah, me too. It's...been a while," Rachel said heavily. "I was saving these for later but since we're doing this now I thought..." she said pulling out a bunch of condoms. Brody smirked and he moved his hand lower and reached out for one of them.

Sometime later after they were finished Rachel smiled and kissed Brody. "You are wonderful. I hope we didn't spend too long."
"You know you're totally awesome. I never would have thought you'd be the type to go for a quickie in a public place."
"Yeah well it's been a while and you were looking good to me and I am a performer."
"Yeah you are," Brody said lazily as he reached out. "Want to go again?"
"Nah, we got to try out clothes to fit you that will also be able to grow into so you hopefully won't need to for a while." She reached out and fondly played with Brody's gut."After all especially with Puck, you're going to get so big." She grinned as she reached around and slapped him on the butt. "This too."
"I'm beginning to suspect that you might like that," Brody said grinning.
"Maybe just a little. I do like to cuddle." Rachel said. Though she said it somewhat flippantly, it had to be true since she seemed to love that and feeling his belly and chest when they were doing it. Putting her clothes back on, she fixed her hair and went out. "Make sure to model for me!" she called.

Brody looked at the clothes seeing 40s length pants which seemed huge but when he put them on actually fit somewhat decently and were excellent belted with room to grow into and he probably would with Puck and Rachel's help.
11133222212112111122222111.title: At the mall with Rachel

111332222121121111222221111.content:
Brody sorted through the clothes Rachel brought him and was pleased with most of her choices except some bright orange thing that just looked ugly. There was also a pink polo and while that normally would have been added to the junk, it wasn't the annoying bright pink and it did look kind of snazzy. After a few moments considering, he shrugged and added it to the keep pile. Other than dress suits which weren't in this particular store, Rachel had gotten everything and she picked some pretty good ones. As she was waiting outside, he put on one of the outfits as the button-up earlier wasn't going to work and went out. Rachel's eyes lit up as she saw him.

"What do you think?" Brody asked smirking. He was dressed in a black tank-top and better fitting blue-jeans that showed off his muscular arms and clung nicely to his butt. One could also see the indentation where his gut was beginning to form but it definitely fit more and wasn't pushing up, yet. Rachel thought he looked like a Rock n Roll god or something and immediately said as much which caused Brody to laugh.

"Why thank you, but also a little applause for you for finding these clothes," Brody said to her.
"Your welcome," Rachel said and all of a sudden, Puck seemed to come out of nowhere with his usual bounce of energy.

"Nice Brody, very nice. I got some things for me as well though as you can imagine, not much clothing can be for a man of my size which is why I didn't get any clothes. I did get some books and materials for later sessions. What took you guys so long though?" The brief fire red blush on Rachel's face did not go unnoticed and Puck smirked. "Why you dirty dogs, I'm especially surprised about you Rachel. I can only imagine the show that would have been seen if someone walked in. Hell, I bet they could have heard you." Rachel's face turned even redder in embarrassment and Brody shifted too. He wasn't so much embarrassed, because just about nothing could anymore considering his job, but he did feel for Rachel who wasn't normally so kinky. Well, not until recently. Rachel liking this gaining thing was a bit of a surprise, but she didn't normally do things in public places, even if the door was locked and there was no one around.

"Hey, what time is it....?" Rachel asked herself and pulled out her phone but then was surprised. "Wow, I can't believe it's almost 7! We've been here for almost six hours." Rachel wondered where the time went by because surely it wasn't that late. However it was and so she remained silent until she saw the text message from Santanna.

"Oh, looks like Santanna got off early tonight and is demanding to have dinner with us to see the "new" Brody." She turned to him. "If she says anything negative, just ignore her. She can't help herself and that's who she is." Brody nodded because while he didn't really interact with her, he and Santanna had met a couple of times and she sure was a firecracker that can shoot off words that cut deeper than knives. There were times he wondered how Santanna and Rachel were even friends. Rachel had told the story about how they were in High School and Santanna was one of her biggest bullies and somehow later became the best of friends but there were other times it was just like hmm, really? Santanna also had a habit of calling him donkey face for some reason and he wasn't sure if that was an insult or a pet name because she actually approved of him. He always got both feelings with her. He just called her Satan back because it really was a good nickname and while he had heard of Santanna having the capability to step up and be an actual nice person, there were other times that he cringed as she could really lay it into someone. Brody had to wonder if that was what she was planning on doing tonight. Maybe try to convince Rachel of what a fat dirty loser he was. He subconsciously cringed and wrapped his hands around his growing gut. Puck noticed and gently bumped him, though it almost knocked Brody over.

"Don't worry about Santanna, she's not going to hurt you. If she says anything bad, just ignore her. Besides, she actually does like you. She's just curious because she knows what I'm like, especially after I discovered my talent for helping other people grow." Brody nodded, feeling better. Someone who did not know Santanna would have wondered why he had freaked out over embarrassing himself with Santanna but she was one tough chick. He could tell even from the very brief interactions he had with her. She was the first one who got suspicious and forced his revenue job into the light. She was looking out for Rachel which he had to admire, but she had certainly been an instigating manipulative troll that might have almost cost him his relationship with Rachel. Fortunately it didn't, but it might have had if things were different. She still wasn't on his list of favorite people and did they really have to eat with her?

It turns out they did and Puck stopped at some Italian place called Mario's. Santanna was sitting there waiting for them, looking hot in a slinky black dress. If she hadn't been such a bitch and if he wasn't in love with Rachel, Brody would have been into that. Okay, he was. Santanna was sex on fire and that would have been fun. She got up and glided over to them. "Hey donkey face," Santanna smirked at him which caused Brody to grit his teeth. His face didn't look that much like a donkey's did it? Or at the very least it could be a sexy donkey face

"Get behind me Satan," Brody retorted, causing Santanna to laugh.
"I'm starting to like you donkey face. I heard you were now on Puck's school of witchcraft and wizardry?"
"Yes," Brody admitted, waiting for the rude comment.
"Interesting. I never would have thought. You didn't seem the type at first when I first heard but now I can see it."
"I don't plan on getting that big." Brody explained.

"Good. Rachel doesn't need some obese immobile person. Still, you might be pretty sexy for a donkey face with a little bit extra oomph. While I don't always agree with Puck's style, he certainly is right that it is hot. I've never been fond of skinny twinks anyway. Even chubbyroll Finn as much as I like to make fun of him at times was pretty good...even if he did have a quick trigger." Rachel turned embarrassed again as she covered Santanna's mouth.

"Okay that's enough, we're in a public restaurant. Please no lewd comments while at dinner okay?" Santanna removed Rachel's hand from her mouth and shrugged.

"I'll be on my best behavior, unless I can't help myself. By the way, how was it riding the donkey or did the donkey ride you?"
"Santanna!" Rachel shouted, scandalized.

"What? I'm just curious."
"That's none of your business," Rachel glared.
"Sorry, sorry I just wanted details. I'll just shut up, for now. Tell me everything later okay?"

"Santanna!!!!" Rachel screamed right as the server came by to lead them to their table. There was awkward silence for a moment with everyone and the server staring at her.

"Umm, right," Rachel said as she deflated and turned her head away. The scene over for now, they were lead to their seats in a back corner. This was going to be an...interesting dinner.
111332222121121111222221111.title: Brody trying clothes on,modeling, and the three...

choices: Allow Puck to stay and keep him warm.
Wake him up and ask him to leave.
1113322221211211112222211111.content:
Brody could recall only half of what happened at their dinner. This was partly because not 5 minutes in, while they were waiting for their order, Rachel and Santana got into a heated argument. A discussion about what is and isn't proper for someone committed to a job like stage acting. The conversation seemed the typical back and forth between the two girls. Throwing out examples of each others behavior. Santana still liked to hold that as a former understudy who quit she had swooped in and commanded an applause-worthy performance while Rachel scuttled off to LA. for an audition. Truth be told, Brody suspected Rachel enjoyed sparring with Santana even if she always acted as if each word out of the other girl's mouth was an affront to her integrity. She certainly wasn't going to get a dialogue-match like that with Kurt. Santana's tongue was a well honed word weapon.

Though the conversation was so rapid and blurred with Brody's disinterest, there was another major reason Brody could not remember specific events. Apparently, while Brody had been off using the restroom, Puck had flagged down the waiter and ordered several more, large dishes of high calorie meals to be delivered at staggered intervals. Brody had thought he'd ordered a fairly hefty platter at the start. But when the food just kept coming, Puck commanded that Brody would eat everything that was brought in front of him, even if Puck had to help guide it down. And so it was, the evening blurred between Rachel and Santana's distracted sparring and Puck stuffing forkful after forkful into Brody's bloated belly.

Somehow, he and Puck had gotten home without incident. Brody knew this only because, when he finally came out of his food-drunk haze, he was lying on his familiar bed, stripped down to his underwear, engorged stomach only just beginning to soften in the dark of the night. The second thing Brody quickly became aware of, however, was the feeling of soft skin spilling into his back, nuzzling up against his spine providing warmth. Apparently, Puck had decided to join him tonight.

Brody decided to...
1113322221211211112222211111.title: At Dinner

11133222212112111122222111111.content:
Brody allowed Puck to stay the night. Puck was apparently a sleep cuddler and he was very warm and soft to be up against. Also, Brody didn't think he'd have been able to push Puck's heavy arms away that were encircling him. A few brief moments of struggle confirmed that for sure and Brody laid there exhausted before giving in and pushing his head up against Puck's massive chest which were very nice pillows. After a few moments of settling, he quickly fell back to sleep.

Brody woke up in bed alone though. There was a beautiful male voice singing over a delicious smell and it could only be Puck making breakfast again. Brody was torn between excitement and some remaining horror because Puck certainly pushed the boundaries and always left him utterly stuffed full and hapless. The restaurant was a dirty trick ordering that much food and continuing to push it down his throat. It was obviously the most he had ever eaten in a single setting or even the total combination of a week or two. Brody cautiously got up and went to a mirror to check the damage. There wasn't even a trace of his former six-pack glory and instead was a rounded gut that protruded even bigger and farther out than ever before. There was a hint of a jiggle and bounce to it but only slightly. He must still be somewhat full from dinner the night before. Brody patted and rubbed it, feeling the heft and feel of it. It wasn't so bad. Actually, it felt pretty good and confirmed that this really was the way to go. Brody walked, or rather swaggered due to his new gravity center over to the drawer and looked for clothes to wear but unfortunately couldn't find some that would actually fit his new bigger self. Where were all the clothes that he had bought with Rachel yesterday? She must still have them. Dang, okay then, just underwear it is. It's not like he had ever been particularly worried about showing off before and Puck was definitely going to love this. Brody walked into the kitchen to where Puck was again making another massive breakfast and sat himself down.

"Hey Brodster, what up?" Puck asked grinning. "How was last night?"
"Very filling," Brody deadpanned causing Puck to laugh.
"Hah, you're just too funny. I like that. I can't believe you got all that food down without exploding or much puking."
"I can't either but please don't do that again okay?"
"Scout's honor," Puck said holding two fingers up.
"Hey no crossing behind your back," Brody said, knowing that he was with the other hand.
"Fine, fine. I won't do it very often. But still, I was honestly very impressed.
"I didn't have much of a choice," Brody muttered.
"Even so, that was amazing how you handled that food with my help. You have an inner fattie at heart."
"Let's just stop talking about this," Brody eyed him.

"Fine, moving on," Puck started. "I made you a big gut-burster breakfast of everything: sausage, eggs, bacon, ham, the works. You're going to eat every bite." Puck scooped a bit of everything onto a plate and put it in front of Brody. "Cheers!" Brody rolled his eyes and lifted up his fork and started eating. Puck really knew how to cook and it wasn't long before Brody finished the massive plate. He leaned back and stretched, thrusting his gut out for more room and burped a couple of times as he massaged his stomach. Brody was unsurprised when Puck came back with another equally full equally rich platter of everything and put it in front of him. He sighed, mentally preparing himself for this. He was beginning to feel sated but nonetheless shoved another forkful into his mouth and carried on, bite after bite of meat and egg making its way and stretching his stomach out even further. It rested on his lap and he leaned forward with each bite. Soon Brody was panting and struggling a bit as he squirmed, one hand resting and shaking his belly while the other ever so slowly brought pieces of food to his mouth. Puck seeing Brody begin to slow, also moved to behind him as he massaged Brody's gut with one hand and used the other to scoop up more food with the fork Brody was using. Brody just laid back exhausted as Puck took over feeding for him and opening his mouth when Puck told him to. It was easier to do that than it was to struggle and with some difficulty, Puck managed to put in a second massive platter of food into Brody's bloated huge gut.
11133222212112111122222111111.title: Allow Puck to stay and keep him warm.

choices: The boys of Big Time Rush
112.content: Big Time Rush! Love their music and don't want this to happen in reality (just like all the others) but just for purposes of amusement.
112.title: Big Time Rush

1121.content: The 4 guys of Big Time Rush are living the rock life and although they do remain active via their crazy stunts and adventures, the ease they could order stuff and party might not be so good.
1121.title: The boys of Big Time Rush

choices: Kendall drowns his sorrows in sugar
The other three meet and try to come up with a plan to help Kendall
11211.content:
Kendall Knight, leader of the world famous band BTR/Big Time Rush, lord prankerton and president of awesomeness, and lead dog of his pack, was depressed. Not about Jo leaving (anymore, he had been a mess over that for a while) but for a reason even more horrifying: his leg was broken. He had leg and other injuries before of course, but not ever one like this. One can't dance or play hockey or any of the other million fun things that are possible on broken legs. He did not like to admit it but it hurt worse than any other injury he had before and even attempting to move with it sent daggers of pain through him. In fact, the doctor (not the crazy one that normal patients saw that served the Palmwoods and surrounding county but an actual doctor) was worried about him walking on that leg ever again and so was Logan after seeing the x-rays. Something about torn ligaments. He got stuck on the never walking on that leg ever again bit. That had sent him into a panic that took James, Carlos, and Logan to restrain him from hurting someone (and certainly himself).

"Ohmygodohmygodohmygodohmygodohmygod" Kendall had chanted from the couch while Logan paced anxiously, biting his nails while Carlos was eating cup after cup of pudding (stress eater) and James was combing his hair. He had started on Kendall's but after Kendall chewed him out, James was sulking and doing his own hair. The doctor called back and said it might be possible but Kendall was not to use that leg under any circumstances for the next period of time.

"And that means any Kendall," Logan was explaining. "Not even crawling."
"How long will it take?" Kendall asked.
"Months, at the least. It's too dangerous to risk surgery now, not unless you want a prosthetic limb?"
"Nah, I'm good with the one I have right now. Besides, I'd never be allowed to play hockey then."
"There is always alternative sports..."
"Why are you talking about me losing my leg already? I certainly don't intend to if I can help it," Kendall said, glaring at Logan.
"It's just..." Logan started.
"Enough, I don't want to hear it." They all looked at Kendall shocked. He rarely ever got snappy with them, especially with Logan.
"O-okay," Logan said back out. "See you later then. Carlos put down the pudding, you should have stopped at 6 cups."

Kendall was left alone with just James. "Are you ever going to stop that?" Kendall snapped, feeling sorry as he did so. He didn't mean to be snappish with his friends, but everything was out of whack and he was scared. The thought of being a cripple the rest of his life...well, some live quite successful lives but the side-ways looks and glances, the pitying gazes and words, and secret laughter behind your back...he would be taken as a fool and laughingstock. People would forget that he was still there and his friends...he'd never play hockey with them again. Play in the snow, swim, move as fast as them. Would they forget him? Would they leave him behind? And his mom and sister...after dad died, someone had to look out for them. He had to keep Katie out of trouble and if he ever lost the music gig what would happen then? He groaned and buried his face in his hands as he cried. James looked away from the mirror.

"Hey, it'll be okay..." James said hesitantly not sure what to do. Especially with Kendall, and Kendall never cried, not like this.
"Can you please leave for a while?" Kendall whimpered. James flinched.
"Okay...but if you need anything..."
"Yeah, I know. Just want to be alone." James left, hesitating as he looked back, not sure if leaving was a good idea right now. But as the sobbing cries got louder, he winced and ran out.
11211.title: Kendall

choices: Kendall drowns his sorrow in sugar
112111.content:
Kendall was lost to them for the next few days, like Jo although this time they couldn't do much of anything about it because Kendall was bedridden and watching hockey would only remind him and cause him to burst into tears all over again. It was a heartwrenching sight and Logan, Carlos, and James tried on the first two days only to get shouted at and stuff thrown at them. Mrs. Knight and Katie did as well but Kendall even flipped out on them. So the next couple were terse as Kendall morosely sat in bed, staring at the ceiling or tormenting himself looking at all the hockey trophies and listening to sad music. Food was barely eaten and only picked at and much of it returned. One day however, it changed.

"Logan?" he heard a raspy voice call and it almost startled him. Logan rushed into the room where Kendall was. Kendall hadn't spoken to them in four days (except to cry or yell or blame them or berate himself and such) and Logan was nervous. Kendall was leaning up on the bed, his arms pushing him up. Dull green eyes looked at him.

"I want a smoothie." Kendall said. Logan blinked.
"What?" Logan asked, not quite sure if he was hearing things correctly.
"I want a smoothie," Kendall said. "A really big smoothie."
"Um...what type?" Kendall looked at him angrily for a moment before the passive expression came down over his face again. Logan wasn't sure which was worse, Kendall when he was throwing a tantrum or this unrecognizable Kendall who seemed out of it and uncaring. In the past, he would have said angry Kendall but now he wasn't quite so sure."

"You know what type," Kendall said and Logan did. Kendall always bought Jo and himself smoothies when they were dating, blue and pink. Most people thought that the pink smoothie was for Jo, being a girl and all and she seemed the type who would have liked pink smoothies. However, most people did not know that those were actually for Kendall and that the pink strawberry was his favorite flavor. On the other hand, Jo much preferred blue blueberry.

"Yeah, I guess I do," Logan said. He left the Palmwoods and walked the block down the road to the smoothie store and waited in what felt like an exceptionally long line. Actually, it wasn't but one chatty customer kept talking to the person at the counter for half an hour while people behind were angrily waiting to be served. Finally however, he got in line and a smoothie.

"Sorry about that," the guy at the counter said. "Here everyone have a two for one smoothie day." While people still weren't happy, they did take their free smoothies and Logan ended up with two extra-large pink smoothies. When he got back to the apartment, Kendall had a tray of cookies next to the bed and was munching on one. Kendall tilted his head at Logan questioningly.

"What took so long?" Logan shrugged.
"An annoying guy in the line spent a long time talking to the cashier and making everyone impatient. It was unbelievable. However in order to make it up, everyone was given a two for one deal so I ended up with two smoothies." Kendall smiled a bit and Logan almost wept for joy. It didn't last long but for one of the very few times Kendall had smiled since the accident, it was wonderful.
