"Cool, now hand them over,"Kendall said. Logan carefully put them on the bedside table and sat next to Kendall on the bed as Kendall ate another cookie.
"Where did you get those?" Logan asked curious. They didn't have cookies as far as he knew.
"Carlos made them." Kendall said.
"Carlos?" Logan said confused.
"Yeah, apparently when not under immediate pressure he actually can bake amazing cookies." Logan hmmed. They could have been the worst cookies in the world but as long as Kendall was talking, who cared? Taking a bite out of one, Logan gasped at the burst of chocolately flavor. They were fantastic. 'Why didn't Carlos tell about his talent before?' Logan wondered. Kendall was eating yet another one.

"How many of those have you had so far?" Logan asked curious. Kendall stopped for a moment scrunching up his nose.

"Ah...um...er....I don't know. They are just so good and it isn't like I have much else to do right now," Kendall's voice cracked as the depression started coming back. "Not with a lame leg..." Logan cursed himself for asking and he thrust a smoothie into Kendall's hand who tilted his head back as he chugged about half before spluttering, one hand clutching his head in brain freeze, but at least smart enough to keep one hand from spilling the drink.

"You okay?" Logan asked. Kendall sat and thought for a moment.
"No," he said. "But I might be eventually." Kendall tipped the rest of the smoothie back and swallowed. He swished for a moment before reaching for the next one.
112111.title: Kendall drowns his sorrows in sugar pt1

choices: Kendall takes his first steps in days
Kendall has to wait because something happens
1121111.content:
Kendall seemed to be developing an addiction to smoothies and kept having Logan going out and getting him some. Over the last three days alone he had some 15 of them. 15 smoothies that came out of Logan's pocket, or would have if they didn't have their own band bank account set aside for them. Logan was talking with Gustavo on having a smoothie machine put in their appartment because it didn't look like Kendall was going to get sick of them anytime soon. At least Kendall's mood was improving. He no longer angrily threw things or yelled at them (which he was scarily almost did better than Gustavo, almost). He also didn't always burst into tears at the mention of hockey, just most of the time when James or Carlos accidentally slipped up. Kendall was getting better and if all went well, would be able to walk again. At least, Logan let him think that. He'd be able to walk alright, but barring an extreme miracle, it would be with a limp and not fast. Kendall's dreams of being a famous hockey player were pretty much toast. At least Kendall could still sing.

"How was Gustavo?" Kendall asked after sipping from yet another smoothie. Logan shrugged.
"You know how he is. Angry, pissed off, called you an idiot and worse names ranting about you for a few hours, the usual. However, he did convince Griffin not to replace you like he wanted to."
"I let you guys down," Kendall said looking ashamed.
"In what way?" Logan asked.
"That stupid accident, breaking my leg, you know. I was playing around and did something I wasn't supposed to and am paying for it. You guys as well since I can no longer dance with you. I'm never going to walk again on it, am I? Tell me the truth." Logan looked at Kendall.

"Truthfully, probably not. It'll be a lame one and twisted. I'm so sorry, you'll never play professional hockey." Kenall looked thoughtful.
"Oh...thank you for telling me. I figured but I needed to hear it out loud to accept it. At least I can still sing right?" He quirked a Kendall grin and Logan felt relieved. He missed that expression. It didn't seem like Kendall without it. Kendall drank some more smoothie and belched.

"Urrp, yeah, that's good stuff. But I wish I could get up and go somewhere, you know? It's getting so that I even wish that Mr. X would come in and have me dance to exhaustion and then have me dance more and cause me to pass out, barely able to move the next day because my body has no more energy. Although, I guess I won't have to anymore, huh?" Logan smirked.

"Carlos is tempted to see if he could break his own leg to get out of dancing like you but I talked him out of it. We don't want any more people injured."
"That's good. Goofball would probably wreck himself more than me if he tried."
"Probably so." Kendall pushed himself up on the bed.
"How long until I can get up of my own accord? I might kill myself if I have to stay in bed any longer." Kendall spoke lightly but Logan noticed a dark humor underneath and he shuddered.

"That's not funny. You shouldn't say things like that."
"Okay, okay. But when can I? Yesterday you said that maybe if I was careful and supported myself on crutches I could eventually be able to at least shuffle around the apartment without being carried."

"Possibly tomorrow but just to be safe maybe you could wait just a little bit longer..." Kendall stopped Logan right there.
"No, I'm not waiting any longer. If it is safe for me to at least move around in this damn room, I am going to move around tomorrow. I get enough bedrest as it is." Kendall finished the rest of the smoothie and threw the cup aside.

"Thanks for doing this," Kendall softly said as Logan picked the cup up. "You're the best." Logan shrugged.
"I'm just doing what I can to make you feel comfortable. We all are."
"I've been a royal prick recently, haven't I?" Kendall said matter of factly.
"No..." Logan said wanting to be polite. But yeah, they all thought he had.
"Don't lie, I know you guys were all thinking it. But I am sorry. It's just been really rough for me lately."
"That's understandable."
"Still doesn't give me the right. Anyways, just wanted to say thank you to all of you but especially you Logan." Logan's heart fluttered a little as he looked at Kendall's expressive eyes.

"Oh," Logan said breathily.

"You'll help me?" Kendall asked uncertainly and Logan knew how much it hurt for Kendall to ask for help. Although Kendall loved helping others, he hated having to ask others for help and was never comfortable with it. Kendall tried to put off asking others for help as much as possible and if Kendall was asking for Logan to help him, it had to be even more painful than Logan thought it might be. Kendall had a good poker face, Katie certainly didn't learn her Poker technique from Mrs. Knight, exceedingly good but wow.

"Of course," Logan said. Kendall smiled a real smile at him and Logan nearly melted from the beauty of it and what he heard next.
"That's why I like you best and you're my best friend."
1121111.title: Kendall drowns his sorrow in sugar pt. 2

11211111.content:
Kendall was anxious as he waited for Logan. Today was the first day in a while that it was safe for him to at least move around on his own and not stand the humiliation of having James and Carlos picking him up and moving him. He couldn't wait to be able to move on his own but Logan would probably kill him if he tried to move without him just in case something bad happened. Logan always thought bad things were going to happen but in this case, Logan was probably right to worry. Kendall was a bit worried himself and he knew the likelyhood of falling and doing a faceplant, the only thing more embarassing than having to be carried, would be extremely high since he hadn't walked in a while. He just had to hope all his leg muscles didn't atrophy or something in the meanwhile. Atrophy, Logan taught him that word. Oh god, he was turning into Carlos, with all these random thoughts. At least he wasn't saying these things out loud.

"Saying what out loud Kendall?" Logan said, coming into the room. Kendall cursed internally. Apparently at least part of it had been out loud. That was embarassing.

"Nothing. So, let's do this." Kendall pushed, scrabbling at the bed and winced as a pain shot down his bad leg and he would have collapsed if Logan hadn't caught him. With Logan's help, Kendall struggled up and got onto his feet and swayed a little, but remain upright. Moving gradually, Logan backed off, ready in case Kendall started to sway dangerously again. Kendall stood, one foot normal and the other twisted and scarred where they fixed the tissue that had been torn. Taking a small step, Kendall inched his left foot forward and then his right. There was a brief bit of pain but nothing that Kendall couldn't handle. Grinning hugely, Kendall took another step and another, lengthening the distance. It was slow moving, very slow, but he was remaining upright and able to walk which was infinitely better than nothing. Laughing, Kendall did a tiny spin and almost fell over had Logan not been hovering, ready to catch him.

"Look, I'm walking!" James and Carlos poked their heads in when they heard the shout.
"Huh? What's that?" James said, shirtless and his hair wet having just come from the shower.
"Oh my god it's a miracle!" screamed Carlos as he rushed into the room. "Look James look! Kendall is walking!"
"He is?" James came in to see. "Oh, you are! Congratulations!"
"Uh James..." Kendall started.
"What is it?" James asked.
"Your towel just slipped." James looked down.
"Well bugger that," and he quickly yanked it back up and tied it securely around his waist.
"Is it safe to open my eyes yet?" Logan asked after having that image burned into his mind.
"Yeah, it's safe," Kendall said. Logan opened his eyes.
"Oh thank goodness. Thanks for burning that image into my mind James." James shrugged.
"It isn't something you haven't seen before. I assume you have one as well and we did change in the Locker Room. Besides, you're going to be a doctor."

"Yeah, but it still isn't necessary to show the world. Go put clothes on or something." James shrugged and as he passed Kendall, he gave a friendly slap on the back which almost knocked Kendall over.
.
"Yeah dude, you can walk!" James left and it was just him, Carlos, and Logan. Carlos was smiling and Logan was still hovering anxiously.
"See you later Kendall!" Carlos said and walked out behind James. Kendall blinked a moment.
"Okay, that was weird. Hey, want to go somewhere?" Logan looked sternly at him and Kendall flinched.
"You're not strong enough to leave the apartment yet."
"I know that, but...fine. Hey, want to have breakfast?" Kendall asked. Logan grinned a bit.
"Already one step ahead of you, and have already made breakfast. I figured you would be hungry." Kendall nodded sheepishly.
"Yeah, I am a tiny bit hungry." Logan just smirked.
'I bet. I made all your favorites because I wasn't sure what you wanted." Lending a supporting arm, Logan helped Kendall hobble out to the table where Carlos and James were wide-eyed staring at the covered kitchen counter.

"Woah, that's a lot of food." they all said.
11211111.title: Kendall takes his first steps in days

112111112.content:
"Woah, that's a lot of food," they all said. The table was covered with plates of croissants, beignets, pound cake, pancakes, eggs, etc.
"Logan?" James asked.
"Yeah?" Logan said curiously.
"What's up with all the food? We're not expecting a platoon or something coming in are we?"
"No, just us."
"Then why? Just...why?"
"I got excited and anxious and I discovered cooking helps with stress." Logan said.
"You made all that?"
"Well, no, but most of it. I bought the croissants, beignets, and cake from the french bakery."
"The fancy one?"
"Yeah, that one. But it was totally worth it. I got a bargain."
"Their stuff tastes awesome!" Carlos said excitedly.
"Indeed it does. Uh, just help yourselves I guess." Logan backed away and James looked at him suspiciously.
"You're not eating?"
"Nah, I'm good."

"Leave him alone James," Kendall interrupted. "Logan, this is awesome. Thank you." Carlos was already loading his plate with as much as he could grab and Kendall seated himself with a plop. James shrugged and sat down as well although he still looked at Logan funny. 'I'm not doing anything!' Logan wanted to shout but that would be weird and would make it seem like he was up to something so he stayed quiet. Logan took a croissant and a couple of beignets to appease him and James finally turned away and started loading his own plate. Kendall and Carlos already filled their plates and Carlos was really going through it as he inhaled beignet after beignet and alternated with eggs and cake. Kendall ate slower and neater but still pretty quickly as he focused in on the pancakes while James spread nuttella chocolate on his croissants.

They continued eating while Logan finished his small breakfast and watched. James ate a couple of croissants and two pancakes before mumbling he was done. Getting up, James moved to the sink and dumped his plates there.

"I'm going to the gym if anyone wants to come," he announced. Kendall and Carlos both nodded at him but continued eating and James shrugged. "Suit yourselves," he said and left. "See you later!"

"See you later!" they called back. Kendall and Carlos returned to eating. Carlos finished with the beignets and started in on tearing through the pancakes. Kendall continued on with his stack with dogged determination as he also ate pound cake. The two continued eating for a while until with a loud burp, Carlos pushed away and staggered up.

"I'm full," he moaned as he staggered up and over to the couch where he plopped down again groaning. Kendall gave a groan of relief.
"Oh finally," he said as he struggled to get up as well. Logan saw and rushed over to help him up. "I win this time," Kendall said before giving a loud burp of his own.
"Uuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrpppp, oh huh. Maybe not so much a good idea. I'm not feeling so good." Logan head's snapped up.

"Here, sit on the couch next to Carlos," he said helping Kendall hobble over. "I've got medicine, pepto and such for stomach aches. Let me go get it." With that, Logan was off in a flash and then was back before they knew it.

"How...?" Kendall started before groaning. Logan poured two dosages, one for Kendall and one for Carlos and all but forced it down their throats.
"There, that's better. And until it starts working sit up."
"Huh?" Both Carlos and Kendall said confused.
"Sit up please." They did and Logan nodded. "Thank you. I'm going to help you by doing this."
"What do you-oh my god," Carlos moaned as Logan started rubbing his bloated belly. "That feels so good like you wouldn't believe."
"Hey, what about me?" asked Kendall offended.
"I've got some for you too," Logan said smiling as he proceeded to do the same for him. Kendall moaned in pleasure.
"Oh god, that does feel nice." Kendall leaned his head back with a smile and Carlos bounced a little.
"Hey, no hogging, I want some!" Logan laughed.

"Please, no fighting. I will do it for both of you." Logan proceeded to alternate between one hand and two hands as he did both Carlos and Kendall at the same time and Carlos and Kendall alone.

"Oh man, this is the life," Carlos said.
"You said it." Kendall nodded in agreement as Logan kept grinning.
112111112.title: Large breakfast

1121111121.content:
"Is it just me or is Logan acting strange?" Kendall wondered aloud. He was on the couch playing Mario Kart on wii with Carlos and had paused to take a sip of water when the thought had struck him. Carlos who was impatient to continue on with the game shrugged.

"Is he? He seems normal. Can we continue playing now? I was just about to kick your butt on this last lap."
"In a moment. Logan's just seems different lately is all. James as well." With a sigh Carlos sat back.
"We were all just so worried about you, after the...you know, thing." Carlos bit his tongue to keep from blurting but Kendall knew what he meant.
"You mean the accident? I don't mind if you say it, it is what it is. I really am sorry I wasn't the bestest friend during it."
"It's okay Kendall, we all forgive you. We were just worried...but you're getting better right?" Apparently Carlos didn't know and Kendall wasn't going to be the one to break it to him.

"Yeah, everything will get better soon, I know it." Carlos smiled brightly and Kendall smiled faintly back because he wasn't certain it really was, despite his show of optimism earlier. But Carlos needed to hear what needed to be heard to keep him unaware for just a little bit longer.

"That's good. Hey, do you want anything Kendall?" Carlos asked. Kendall shrugged.
"You guys and mom mother me too much, I'm fine...but actually, do you think you could make those cookies again that you made earlier?" Carlos breathed a sigh of relief.
"Sure, whatever you want buddy. Anything you want, just ask."
"Speaking of those cookies, remember that time with Griffin's daughter Mercedes and we almost had to leave the Palm Woods if our demo cd hadn't been chosen?"
"Yeah, she was awful. How can one not remember that?"
"She wasn't...okay, she was horrible. Anyhow, why were the cookies so bad? They really do taste like little bits of heaven."

"All due to Grandma's secret recipe. Well, that day I was under a bit of stress as you recall and you guys know I don't do so well under pressure. Also, there was no way I would want to date that she-beast. I admit I might have put the cookies in the oven for too long but there was all that yelling and screaming...it was scary.

"It's okay Carlos." Carlos paused the game and turned it off.

"Goodnight Mario Bros. Carlos just has to bake some cookies and then we can return back to kicking Kendall's butt okay?" Kendall rolled his eyes and snorted because as if that would happen. Carlos got out the white chef hat which he had gotten somewhere and apron and set about gathering ingredients. "Kendall, out" he commanded to Kendall who was watching curiously.

"Huh?" Kendall asked confused.
"It's a secret recipe. It won't be a secret anymore if you know how they're made. So out out out." Carlos steered Kendall into the hall before slamming the door shut. Then they reopened briefly while his crutches were thrown out as well. Kendall stared for a few moments before shaking his head.

"Whatever, I guess I could see how everyone else is doing until Carlos finishes his secret cookies. I can't imagine what is so secret that I had to be kicked out though.

Awkwardly bending over to pick the crutches up, Kendall wandered aimlessly down the Palmswood halls searching for people. There were not many people around because there was some big audtion thing for something. The only people still around were Big Time Rush, Katie, Budhha Bob, Mr. Bitters, and a handful of other people somewhere. Suddenly he saw the new girl...Lucy Stone or something. She had just moved right in but that was around the time of his little incident and he was too busy recovering that he didn't know her that well. This was as good as any a time to get to know her as any, especially since he was recovering. Hobbling a little, Kendall moved over to where the rocker looking chick (thank goodness she didn't have a mohawk, Kendall was a bit freaked out by girls with mohawks) was sitting and sat down next to her. Coughing a little to get her attention, he waited until she looked up.

"Hi," he said. "My name's Kendall Knight."
"Lucy Stone. You're from Big Time Rush right?"
"Yeah," Kendall said proudly.
"Eh," she shrugs for a moment before looking at him more closely. "Woah, what happened to your foot?"
"Tragic accident, really. Kind of silly."
"Well are you going to tell me?" Lucy asked, even more curious now. Kendall gave a laugh and shook his head.
"Nah, that will have to remain a mystery. Hey, do you still need any help moving in?"
"Uh sure, I've got most of my stuff unpacked already but there are still bits and pieces if you want to help."
"Oh I do. I need to get out and do something," Kendall said.
"I understand. Well, if you want to meet me at my room, I can show you some stuff that needs to be done if that would make you happy. You want to come with me?"
Lucy held out her hand and helped Kendall back to the elevator.

"If it's too much, I'll understand if you want to take a breather."
"Nah, I'm good. I just really need to do something if you don't mind." Kendall repeated stubbornly and Lucy shrugged deciding if he wanted to help so much, he could help.
1121111121.title: Cookies and helping

11212.content:
James couldn't take it anymore. He was clearly upset with the fact that Kendall was dating Jo. He tried to seem ok with it and always wear a smiile whenever they were together close to him. But inside he couldn't feel more depressed. All this time he was secretly trying to call the blonde's attention by having the perfect body. He even flirted with random girls to see if Kendall would feel jealous about it, but nothing happened. So now he had no reason to keep going to the gym. And feeling like this there is nothing better than eating to forget about the problems. So when he was alone at the 2J, he decided to order three boxes of peperoni pizzas and two 3-litter bottles of soda to eat into oblivion.

"Cheers." James said to himself before opening the first box of pizza and eating the first slice. It tasted so good. So good that after a while the whole pizza was gone and he was moving to the next box. His belly was starting to show due to the amount of food he was shoving down his throat. Nothing else mattered now. Soon he was stuffing himself like a pig, placing a whole slice of pizza into his mouth before chewing and washing it down with a gulp of soda. By the time the second pizza was down, James was feeling full. His stomach was sticking out a bit, making his tank top rise higher and the skinny jeans to feel tighter.

Now he felt just like when he was younger. When everybody made fun of him for being fat and how it only made him eat more. At that moment it wasn't so different. He wanted to forget the blond that he had a crush on ever since they met. So even after reaching his limit, James opened the third box and kept on eating.

"Unf..." James sighed when there was nothing left for him to devour. His mouth was covered in grease and all that was left was three empty boxes of pizza and the two bottles which were now dry. Everything was inside James' overinflated belly. Now he realized how much it hurt. So he moved his hands towards the stretched skin before him and gave it a massage, trying to sooth the pain away. "Ugh! I ate too much..."

Suddenly he heard the door being opened and revealing...
11212.title: James

112121.content:
"Hey James, I..." Kendall started but when he looked at his bandmate with his legs spread due to the belly sticking out of his torso. Then he saw the boxes of pizza and bottles of soda empty like nothing had been inside them before. James' white tank top had damps all over the fabric, while the once defined abs turned into bloated belly which skin was tight as a drum. "You ate all this stuff?"

"I, uh..." James started but a belch interrupted his speech. "Yeah, I did. Got a problem with that?"

"No, I just asked. You're always the healthy one." Kendall pointed ou, but the way the pretty boy could barely move. He never thought of seeing James like that. He seemes devasted by a reason and the blond wanted to find out. Sighing, he moved to the orange couch and sat down beside James. The over stuffed singer was begining to feel nervous again. The one he had a crush on was right beside him and he couldn't run because he was too big to do so. "What's happening James? I'm your friend. You can tell me anything."

"Well, you see. Ever since we met I knew we would get along right away. But then I realized I liked you more than a friend. Sorry Kendall, but I-I've got a crush on you." James finally opened his heart for the blond singer and everything around him seemed to paralyze. But when he was about to say something Kendall...
112121.title: Kendall

112131.content:
Carlos Garcia loved a lot of things. He loved his friends, his dad, Mrs. Knight, Katie, the Jennifers, his helmet, Dinosaurs, Hide and Seek, Kelly, Singing, Hockey, Girls, Rides, Magazines, TV, Video Games, Cars, Palmwoods, the pool, music, and even Gustavo most of the time. He also loved food, corndogs and pudding in particular. You could get Carlos to do anything for a corndog or pudding cup (except hurt his friends, he wouldn't do that for all the corndogs in the world...well, if it was all of them, maybe. But otherwise, it aint happening!). With his trusty helmet and a corndog, he could do anything he put his mind to, like dig a tunnel to China or become a superhero. Well, maybe not that far, yet. He still had to work on that. But he wasn't stupid like everyone (Logan) says he is, he had good ideas just as much as the others. Logan was just a downer who said no to everything like him jumping out the window to land on a trampoline and do a perfect flip and cannonball into the pool with the most epic splash ever. Apparently it was too "dangerous". Logan needed to learn to live a little.

But that day, Carlos was bored and didn't want to do anything. Completely devoid of ideas, he loafed in the apartment wondering what to do. The others were all busy. Kendall was on a date with Jo, James was on a date with some random chick, Logan was building a science project, and he was left all alone with nothing to do. Even Mrs. Knight and Katie were busy, Mrs. K with errands and Katie busy cleaning suckers of their money at poker since Mrs. K wasn't their to make sure she didn't. And Carlos couldn't bother Katie if he wanted to keep his corndogs. Katie threatened the corndogs if Carlos bothered her for stupid reasons which pretty much was everything but an emergency and even then, someone better be dying. So they were all out. The Jennifers were too busy doing girly stuff right now and they still did not forgive him for what happened at prom. So absolutely bored, he sat there.

He lasted for 3 minutes before twitching. Carlos was not made for patience and the absolute silence in the appartment was driving him insane. He had to do something, he just didn't know what. Absent-mindedly he wandered over to the refrigerator and looked for some eats and was quite pleased to find a large stash of pudding. Looking around guiltily, he takes most of it and hurries to the couch, pushing most of it under the table so no one who came in would see. Kendall, James, Logan, Mrs. Knight, and Katie were going to be gone for a little while but it was better to be safe and sorry. James and Kendall did not like anyone stealing their pudding cups, even though James always tried to steal his, and usually succeeded or guilt-tripped Carlos into handing it over. "Hah," he thought. "I've got your pudding now James."

Carlos turned on the tv looking for something to watch. He ended up watching a show about 4 teenage boys who want to be famous forming a boyband and were flown off to New York where they stay at this crazy hotel and pull a lot of pranks and sing and do awesome stuff. They even had a grumpy music director named Brock Hustovo who called the boys urchins. Carlos was amused by it because they were hilarious and reminded him a lot of them. Before he knew it, all the pudding cups, even the ones he had stashed under the seats was gone after watching a few episodes. Carlos had also leftover apple pie, the last few remaining slices of a pizza, three corndogs, and a scoop of icecream. Letting out a big burp, Carlos relaxed on the couch, belly comfortably stuffed. Running his hands over it lazily, he stops and looked down to see his stomach sticking out a little. Poking it, he burped again and shifted position. It was a weird experience and one that almost never happened to him before, at least that he could remember. Giggling as if he found a new trick, he started playing with his belly. This was actually very fun and it felt so good. He wondered why other people didn't do it. He would have to do this again sometime because it was so much fun.
112131.title: Carlos

choices: At dinner, they notice something weird
Dinner seemed the same as normal as far as anyone knew
1121311.content:
Carlos was still playing when the door opened up and Logan came strolling in. "Hey Carlos," he called. "I'm just looking for a glue gun and baking soda and...what are you doing?" Carlos froze in place, hoping that if he didn't move, Logan wouldn't see him. A few moments passed before Logan coughed.

"Not moving does not mean I can't see you Carlos," Logan says.
"Darn it!" Carlos whined unfreezing. "I totally thought that was going to work." He resumed rubbing his belly.
"But really, what are you doing?" Logan asked, looking at the mess Carlos created. There was a pile of pudding cups, a pizza box, the pie container, and Carlos had his shirt off for some reason.

"I had a snack, it was delicious," Carlos announced. Logan looked at the trash again and was mentally tabulating.
"You ate all the pudding cups that was for all of us for the next week? Darn it Carlos, not cool man."
"Sorry, I was just so bored and then I got hungry and watched Little Infinite Stop and next thing I knew all this happened."
"But all the pudding cups...and there was still half a cherry pie in there. You seriously ate all that food?" Carlos grinned cheekily as Logan shook his head.
"Yep, and it was delicious. I actually ate even more than that." Carlos burped agin. "Though maybe I might have overdone it, it doesn't feel so good anymore. It did earlier but now not so much. Logie, would you help me?"

"By doing what?"
"Rubbing my tummy, you won't believe how nice it feels." Carlos put on a puppy dog look and Logan sighed. Nobody can ever resist the puppy dog look. Carlos patted the seat next to him and scooted over for Logan to sit down.

"What do I have to do?" Logan asked in a monotone voice, hoping he heard wrong.
"Rub my tummy silly," Carlos said. He leaned back and stretched his legs out, thrusting his tummy in Logan's direction.
"Alright fine, but only for a little bit. I need to get this project done."
"Yeah yeah, just do it already." Muttering to himself, Logan put his hands on Carlos's belly as Carlos closed his eyes. He kept them there for a few moments, not sure what to do.

"What are you waiting for?" Carlos whined.
"I...this is weird. Sure I can't do something else? Like get you ginger ale or something? Ginger ale is good for a full belly."
"No, just do it, please Logan? Pleeeeeeaaaaaaaasssssssseeeeee?" Carlos whined, extending the please.

"Oh all right, just stop that. I'll do it." Logan tentatively rubbed his fingers around which caused a mewling sound from Carlos as he squirmed a little. The skin of Carlos's belly felt taut and warm, full from its feasting. Poking it, there was a slight resistance but a resistance nonethelsess. Carlos moaned again in pleasure and Logan flushed. The sound that Carlos made sent tingles down Logan's body and he stiffened when Carlos reflexively brushed his hand low near his jean line. Carlos didn't even know as his eyes were screwed shut as he made happy noises and dug into Logan whenever Logan rubbed a seemingly particular spot. Logan however was both sweating nervously and flushing as Carlos almost ground against him, making those noises. Logan was just beginning to fall apart when Carlos opened his eyes and smiled.

"Thank you Logie, that was nice. I feel so much bertter now." Logan made some sort of sound as Carlos turned around. "I can finally sleep now and I feel tired. See ya later." Logan was still speechless as Carlos did some sort of shake dance as he still shirtless went to his bedroom. But the sight of that perfect ass, hugged tightly by those jeans was too much for him.

"Well shit Carlos, I need new underwear and pants as well. Lay to leave crunbs on me." Logan walked into his room in a near daze. "Kay, I needed something...what was it again? Oh crud I can't remember...I should probably replace those pudding cups. Kendall, James, and Mrs. Knight aren't going to be happy to find all the pudding cups missing." Logan put on a clean pair, still unable to believe what just happened. He had just...and Carlos...food, those noises he made...oh god. And when Carlos was shirtless and that little stuffed belly peaking out and hanging over those pants...well, he was never going to be able to forget that image. He actually hoped for quite the opposite because when he rubbed Carlos's belly for him, it felt amazing and Logan wanted to do it again. So rounded and stuffed...he wondered what it would be like for Carlos to do it again, maybe just once or twice. Sure that would be over the limit of a healthy diet but what was a few times? It wasn't like Carlos was going to get fat or something after a few times. In fact, Carlos would look good like that more often. Logan licked his lips again. Mmmh Carlos...
1121311.title: Logan was looking for something

choices: Logan is sneaky for a bit longer in helping Carlos
11213111.content:
When dinner preparation rolled around at 7, James, Kendall, Mrs. Knight, and Katie came in. All three Knights had their arms full with grocery bags while James had a small one as he rambled on in some story of how amazing his current girlfriend of the week was.

"Logan, can you help me with unloading?" Mrs. Knight said and Logan agreed. James was useless at it and Kendall and Katie already fled the scene so it was just him and Mrs. K as they packaged the food away. It only took a few minutes before everything was done and they put the water on to boil for pasta. "So what did you do today?" She asked, as she nodded in satisfaction of a job well done.

"Me?" Logan asked, jumping a bit when she asked. "Well I...uh was working on my science fair project and I needed a glue gun and so I came back here and..." Logan trailed off, and shifted his legs a bit, hoping Mrs. K didn't see as he remembered what happened then. "Well, that was it really. I got a glue gun and continued my project which I'm almost done with."

"Oh. When do you think it'll be done?"
"Very soon hopefully." Logan said, biting the inside of his mouth. It was almost done and he had expected to get it done today but then that whole...thing with Carlos distracted him and he had to go to the store to buy pudding replacement. By the time he got back it was too late to finish and he had only 5 minutes to prepare before the group had gotten back. Logan had gotten the last pudding in the nick of time when he heard the door click open and Mrs. Knight's voice and Logan jumped away and moved to greet them. Carlos came in rubbing sleep from his eyes as he yawned tiredly, still shirtless. Logan was relieved (and disappointed) to see the results of Carlos's bloat pretty much all gone although there was still a tiny bit if one looked really closely and knew what happened.

"Hey guys," Carlos said tiredly as he put his arms down and scratched his stomach lazily.
"Hey Carlos, just making pasta for dinner," Mrs. Knight said.
"Cool," Carlos said and strode to the couch and dropped himself heavily on it.
"Woah, he must be really tired. What did he do?" Mrs. Knight asked shocked.
"I have no idea," Logan said, confused himself. While he knew what Carlos did, he had no idea why Carlos was so tired, especially after a long nap like that one. He went up to Carlos.

"Are you okay?"

"Yeah, I'm good." Carlos must have been because by the time the water was boiling and the pasta cooking, he no longer seemed so exhausted and was his bouncy self again, even humming as he played Super Smash Brother's. Kendall and James had come out and they were all playing as Mrs. Knight told him to and that she could finish the pasta herself. Kendall was Wolf, James was Kirby, Logan was R.O.B., and Carlos was Toon Link. Toon Link was Carlos's favorite because Carlos always did like cartoons and he liked the speedy demon. Although Logan wasn't the biggest fan of video games, he did enjoy doing them and he liked the robot with laser beams and in his opinion one of the most dangerous Smash powers barring the StarFox cannon blasters for continual punishment. And it made sense for Kendall to be Wolf who was both a loner and a pack animal and Gustavo always did call them dogs. James had no real preference or specific reasons other than that they were cool but he loved playing Kirby, Meta knight, and Bowser because they were just "cool".

"Awwwoooooooooooohhhh!" Kendall howled jumping up dancing. "Take that suckers!" James and Carlos groaned simultaneously as Wolf summoned his airship and blasted first James and swung around smashing Carlos for victory. Logan had already lost all his lives since the other three had decided on a temporary truce apparently to take him out. James pouted, lip sticking out.

"No fair, that was my smash ball." Carlos looked disappointed for a second as well before sniffing the air.
"Macaroni and cheese!" he shouted happily. Carlos loved Macaroni and cheese, but on the other hand, Carlos seemed to love anything that weren't vegetables with the exception of broccoli. Broccoli was probably the only vegetable he liked and when Logan asked why, Carlos laughed and said "they're like mini-trees! How awesome is that?" After Corndogs, pudding, and dinosaur shaped chicken nuggets, macaroni and cheese was Carlos's favorite.

Kendall was still doing the happy 'in your face' dance as James muttered and sulked. Logan couldn't hear what James had said but it caused Kendall to laugh and put his arm around James as he nuzzled him. If Logan didn't know better, he would have long ago assumed that James and Kendall were together. Just the way they acted around each other...but Kendall was with Jo and James had a thing for trying to claim every hot girl. Oh well. Jo was a very nice girl and James was...James. Logan did not agree with James to hit on every single chick but at least James respected his relationships (as long as they lasted, be it a day or a week). Logan knew other guys wouldn't even do that much.

Dinner was a noisy affair as always. James and Kendall bickered over something, Katie texted at the table while M.K. scolded her, Carlos still chewed with his mouth half-open and was dropping as much food as went in even though he wolved it up really fast. Logan just picked at his food not very hungry and Carlos noticed.

"Hey, can I have that?" Carlos asked pointed at Logan's plate and Logan shrugged as he handed it over and Carlos dug into that as well. Logan watched him dig in with gusto.

"How does he do it?" Logan wondered watching. Despite the fact that watching Carlos eat was almost gut-wrenching when he at times sprayed his food, there was still something fascinating about it. Maybe because he enjoyed it so much. Logan felt hyper-aware today and it felt like the others were receeding into the background with just Carlos sticking out. He noticed Carlos reach under the table to every now and then to play with his belly and that made Logan think of earlier when Carlos had been lying there shirtless, playing with his gut. Honestly, he was amazed Carlos could even eat anything right now, especially with the amount he had earlier. His stomach was all in knots and he didn't even eat much. Where did the boy put it all?

Soon it was time for dessert and Kendall asked for some of the rest of the pie. Mrs. Knight checked the fridge.
"There's none left," she said and Kendall was confused.
"What? But we had half a pie left."
"Come and see for yourself." Kendall checked and sure enough, no pie.
"What the f-" he started until Mama glared at him and he changed track. "-lip happened to the pie? Logan, you didn't use for your experiment did you?"
"No Kendall, I didn't."
"Then who..." he started.
"I did, " Carlos said.

"Aww man, did you eat all of it? That's not fair," James whined.
"I'm sorry, I just felt hungry and it was just sitting there looking all delicious and it called out to me."
"It's okay," Mrs. Knight said. "We've still got icecream." Carlos grinned and Mrs. Knight looked at him.
"Not for you, you had your dessert earlier."
"Least he didn't eat the pudding cups," Kendall said. Logan laughed mentally at that. Oh if they only knew...Carlos pouted but he knew the rules as everyone got dessert except him. The look on Carlos's face was so pouty though Logan slid his bowl of icecream over to him and was rewarded with a big smile of grattitude that lit up all of his face.

"I wasn't really hungry anyways," Logan said, blushing. He wasn't, but Carlos apparently was a near black hole of food. It did much more for Carlos than for Logan. "Much, much more,' piped his mind and Logan felt a tingling of excitement again as Carlos dug in.
11213111.title: At dinner, they notice something weird

choices: Ask Logan out on a date?
Carlos needs to think about this.
112131111.content:
Carlos was a pretty heavy sleeper who woke up long after Kendall and Logan and even sometimes James who often claimed the need for beauty sleep. Carlos wasn't sure how sleeping in longer made you prettier because James always looked pretty and Carlos never got prettier during his sleep. People still preferred James to him and he slept in longer. Oh well. So when Carlos woke up around noon he wasn't surprised to see them all gone. Kendall actually woke up at 6:30 on the dot every day to do his daily routine. He wasn't sure why Kendall even needed to be up at 6:30 since that was a holdover from when they went to school in Minnesota and had to get up to catch the bus. Now that they didn't have to and their school and singing schedules varied, there really wasn't a reason to. And even Gustavo Rocque did not like working at 6:30 in the morning.

Stepping into the shower, he sighed in pleasure as the warm water cascaded down on him. Humming and dancing to "Love Me, Love Me," one of their new songs, he scrubbed himself clean and noticed something different. His stomach area was a bit more curvy and bulgy than normal, felt softer as well. While he never had six pack abs or even a hard stomach, Carlos didn't think he had this before. Bending down he watched a roll form and he shook it a little. Yep, definitely new. How very strange, but not althogether unpleasant. Carlos wasn't as obsessed with musculature as James was, probably because he had always been a bit husky and carried the slightest bit of pudge preventing him from ever hoping to have a six pack. Carlos loved his food too much and couldn't stand the restricted regimen of dieting that James once decided to help Carlos with. He quit after a few days hungry and angry as hell and none of them tried to make Carlos do that again. Also, it was pretty fun to play with. Carlos was of the opinion that as long as he could still play hockey and do all the amazing fun things, he shouldn't care. Besides, no one can talk smack of this little bit when you look at Gustavo or Mr. Bitters. Running the shampoo through his hair he washed it and got out, wrapping a towel around himself and cleared the mirror which always fogged afterwards. Looking at his reflection, he saw there was a slight bulging out of his stomach but nothing out of the normal. He actually looked pretty good as far as he could tell, perhaps even better than normal. Pulling on his underwear he started on his jeans before running into a slight problem. They were a bit too tight. Grunting, Carlos tried jumping and wriggling in them and with a bit of effort and words that normally one would never expect to hear from his mouth, he managed to get the pants on and zipped up, even though though it did feel as if it was cutting off his air supply or circulation. His stomach overhung it a bit and Carlos shrugged.

"Stupid pants," he muttered as he pulled on a shirt. "Need to remind Mrs. Knight to get new ones." He walks out of the room into the kitchen where Logan was putting the finishing touches on his project.

"Heyah," Carlos said and Logan looked up briefly and said 'hi' and continued to work. Carlos sat a few moments knowing Logan was only going to answer when he was done and that it was near impossible to drag his attention away from something he was working on when he was working on it. Finally Logan put the last piece on and cheered.

"Woo! Finally! A+ here I come!"
"That's awesome," Carlos says and Logan grinned.

"I know. Just le me put it away, make sure it won't get damaged." Logan left the unstated part unsaid that if he left it out, Carlos might accidentally destroy it which happened once and he never let Carlos forget it. Looking around, Logan reached up and put whatever it was on the top part of the closet out of Carlos's normal reach. Carlos was short compared to his friends and there was occasional mocking over it. Carlos hated it.

"Good morning," Logan said. "I guess you're hungry?"
"Starved," Carlos said and Logan smiled.
"That's good." Carlos was confused with that but before he opened his mouth, Logan pulled on a "kiss the cook apron" and was already getting stuff out so Carlos kept quiet.
"Pancakes?" Logan asked and Carlos nodded.
"Did you make pancakes for the others?" Carlos asked.
"No, just you today." Logan said, looking lower than normal away from Carlos.

"Oh," Carlos said, not sure what to make of that. Carlos spent the time waiting looking at Logan cook, the way he flipped those pancakes and how that apron looked so comely on him. Carlos was so entranced he was surprised when a plate was put in front of him with 4 steaming hot pancakes covered in maple syrup, exactly how he wanted it. He gave a wide grin to Logan.

"This is awesome, thank you," and with that, Carlos dug in with abandon. He could feel Logan's eyes watching him as he ate and it would have been creepy if it hadn't tased so good. Shortly the pancakes were finished and Carlos groaned from the feeling of the tight pressure around his middle and he couldn't seem to reach it. Logan came over to him.

"Want me to help?" Logan asked, a tone in his voice that was unfamiliar to Carlos and he never heard Logan speak in before.
"Uh, sure, that would be much appreciated." Logan liked when he used big words like that. After fumbling for a few moments as Logan grabbed at things that were not the zipper or the button and caused Carlos to intake a massive breath, Logan managed to reach the button and undo it. The zipper came down of its own accord and Carlos's bloated belly spilled out and he blushed again. 'He must think I look like a fat-ass' Carlos thought as the strange emotion flittered in Logan's eye again.

"Uh, sorry about that," Carlos said. "I've gained a bit of weight recently, just a few pounds and I expect it to to be gone soon,,," Carlos rambled, hoping Logan bought it. He had no intention of losing them but Logan didn't need to know that.

"No, it's okay," Logan said. "I like it." Carlos blinked, speechless and his mind on stop and hit the rewind.
"Uh, what?"
"I like your cute belly," Logan said. This made Carlos feel excited but also confused.
"But what about healthy dieting?" Logan shrugged making motions.
"Healthy eating-smelthy eating, It doesn't work for you and I shouldn't force you to as long as you remain at an acceptable limit.
"So...you don't mind? And you actually like it?"
"Yes."
"Oh, uh...that's good." Carlos said as he patted his belly. Logan's eyes seemed to watch the movement.
"Why do you keep looking at me like that?" Carlos asked.
"Because I think it looks hot," Logan said simply and Carlos was thrown for a loop.
112131111.title: Logan talks with Carlos

choices: Carlos and Logan go out for dinner
1121311111.content:
Blushing, Carlos ducked his head. "You think my fat looks hot?"
"Yes." Logan replied.
"Oh, uh, I didn't know you felt that way. I thought you liked Camille or something."
"Nah, Camille is a good girl but we're better off friends. Lately I've been having feelings for someone else." Carlos felt a rush of dislike for whoever this person was.
"Who?" he growled out and Logan looked at him inquisitively.
"Is your throat sore? You just sounded like you're getting a cold." Carlos rolled his eyes.
"Who?" he repeated in as an even tone as possible.
"You know him very well." Logan said and Carlos felt something in his heart break.
"It's James, isn't it?" Carlos turned and was about to run away before Logan burst out laughing.
"You..I...James...relationship? That's ridiculous! It's not James."
"Well then who is it?"
"I should think it should be obvious."
"I don't know."
"Well, you're being stupid."
"I'm not stupid."
"You must be if you haven't figured it out I mean you." Logan said shouting and Carlos stopped.
"You like me?"
"Yeah, I think you're great. But maybe it's a mistake if you're going to get all huffy about it."
"I'm not huffy and Logan, I like you too. Wouldyouliketogoonadatewithme?"
"Huh?"
"I said would you like to go on a date with me?" Carlos repeated, slowing down.Logan looked shocked.
"You...you would? You're not kidding or playing with me?"
"Why would I do that?"
"I don't know, because you've never shown interest before and you like to play with toys?"
"No, I mean it." Carlos and Logan were looking at each other and leaning in before Kendall came barging in the door.
"Hey I need to get...what's going on here?" he asked looking startled as Carlos and Logan jumped apart quickly.
"Nothing," Logan replied at the same time as Carlos said "we're dating." Kendall and Logan both turned their heads towards Carlos.
"You're what?" Kendall asked.
"Dating as in me and Logie are now boyfriends which is more than boys who are friends." Kendall shook his head.
"What...how...when?"
"It was over breakfast this morning. Logan made me breakfast and he said some things and I said some things and we almost started fighting but then I asked him out and it is all good now."

"But when did you start liking Carlos, Logan?"
"I suppose for a while now but especially recently." Kendall narrowed his eyes as he looked Carlos up and down.

"I never noticed this before but you're getting fat Carlos. Logan, how can you like that? What happened to healthy eating and exercise?" Logan and Carlos looked at Kendall in shock and even he looked a bit surprised the way he had said that so viciously, especially about his friend.

"Kendall, I can't believe you just said that!" Logan said. Kendall shuffled a bit before his green eyes steeled up again,
"Yeah but it is true. He can't even fit into those pants and look at the zipper. Carlos is getting fat and I won't stand for it."
"You don't get to decide that, Carlos does," Logan said peeved dealing with Kendall who seemed extremely out of sorts today.
"But you were always the one who..." Kendall started.
"I like him this way," Logan said and Kendall stared, his eyes bugging out.
"What? That is attractive to you?" He stomps over and squeezes Carlos's exposed belly. Suddenly, Kendall was pushed into a wall and was in shock as the shorter male pinned him there.

"Leave Logan alone!" Carlos yelled. "I like you Kenny but right now you're being mean so please go away." Kendall struggled a bit and was surprised to realize he couldn't get out. Carlos was glaring at him and Kendall stared. What the hell was going on?

"Let go of me Carlos." Kendall said.
"Not until you apologize to Logan and me."
"For what?"
"Insulting me and scaring Logan." They both looked over to where Logan was worriedly watching, chewing on his nails which he always did under stress as he rocked back and forth. Kendall's eyes flashed a moment before he sighed and lowered his head in surrender.

"Logan, I'm sorry for scaring you. Carlos I'm sorry for calling you fat. You aren't that fat yet." Carlos rolled his eyes but took it because Kendall had a point. "I'll just go to the pool now, I forgot my swim trunks." Carlos let go and Kendall awkwardly goes into his room and puts them on. He comes out, giving a quick look at Carlos and Logan. His eyes flicker down towards Carlos's belly and then to Logan and back before he shakes his head. "See you later," he muttered and walks out. When they were alone, Logan looks at Carlos.

"I wonder what all that was about?" he wondered and Carlos shrugged.

Kendall walked down the hallway, stunned. Logan and Carlos...together. That wasn't fair. He liked Logan for far longer than Carlos and Logan was his first friend. It was always him and Logan. Logan was the jelly to his peanut butter, the moon to his sun, the rudder to his boat and other weird metaphors that represented their relationship. What did Carlos think he was doing? And Carlos was gaining weight, and not the good kind. And Logan liked it. What the hell was going on? Logan always had been big on healthy eating...he stopped and had a flash of inspiration like he always does whenever he came up with a plan. If Logan liked heavier people, Kendall was going to oblige him.
1121311111.title: A new relationship and conflict?

11213111111.content:
Kendall continued making his way to the pool. A swim would help clear his mind and he needed it. All he could think about was Carlos and Logan kissing. Well he hadn't seen them but when he came in it was clear they had been about to and now they were dating. Dating! How could they do that? They were his friends but they couldn't do that. Not with each other anyways. He didn't care if Carlos and Logan were gay, especially Logan because he always did have suspicions, but with each other...whatever happened to girl loving Carlos anyways? The one who wanted the Jennifers or that delivery girl or the other girl who pretend dated him and then tried to do all she could to dump him but actually really did like him? And if Kendall was being honest with himself, which he was because his mom never allowed denial, the truth was that he liked Logan. He always liked him and now that he and Jo were just friends, she was totally cool with him going after the guy he wanted and they were still very good friends.

Okay, he was jealous. Whoop-de-freaking-doo. Who wouldn't be? Logan was quite the catch and an all round awesome guy. He just couldn't believe that of all people Carlos got there first. The only thing worse would beJames swooping in to try to win Logan as well but thankfully is totally straight (boy kissing games when they were younger and kissing each other aside). He couldn't compete with James when it came to wooing. As it was, he was up against a friend already. Although, he would have thought that it would be James into Carlos, what with them both being the Super Party Kings. But they weren't spending as much time together since Carlos was apparently spending time with Logan apparently. Logan had been awfully busy lately with that school project, was it all just a cover? Hmm...okay, now he was being paranoid. And Logan and Carlos were not kissing in the apartment, they weren't. Maybe this was all just a dream and he would wake up and tell them and they would all laugh over it. Giving a hard pinch, he yelped. Okay, not a dream. Damn, this really was happening. Logan and Carlos were together. Gritting his teeth, he jumped into the pool with a big splash and swam hard going back and forth. Those who had been in quickly got out as if they could sense his mood although they probably also saw the 'I am about to murder someone if you touch me' expression on his face. Soon he was alone as he paddled back and forth doing laps, trying to clear his mind. It took a while but after about 20 or so back and forth, he finally managed to clear his mind and just feel his body working. Doing 10 more, he gasped as he got out but totally pleased. He was too tired to want to bash Carlos's face at least if he saw it and he could focus. Sitting down, he dried himself off as he thought more about his flash of inspiration.

At first it had seemed stupid, something illogical and not well thought out at all. It wasn't, at least it wasn't illogical. He was going to have to work on the thinking it out part. Logan was usually better at thinking this longterm stuff. He just came up with the ideas and lead them through them. See, he needed Logan. They had such good synergy together while Carlos was a goofball. Sad, but true. He didn't want to demean his friend but that didn't hide the truth although clearly the motivation was because he just couldn't stand the fact of Carlos and Logan together. Shaking his head, he refocused. Back to the issue at hand, something important. Logan had always talked about health and fitness, which made sense because he wants to be a doctor. But Carlos was breaking the rules, and Logan liked it. The way that Logan was looking at Carlos...he didn't like it but it was clear Logan liked it. And there was a line between extra weight and fat out of shape useless slugs. Carlos wasn't the second one and the weight gain seemed fairly recent, not to mention Carlos had always been slightly huskier but when provoked, he had surprising strength. The fact that Carlos pinned him against the wall and he couldn't move, that was impressive. Annoying, but impressive. And he actually worked out at the gym, swam, skate boarded, etc in addition to hockey while Carlos was all over the place and if anything was less active than he used to be if that recent belly was any indication. Not to mention...Logan liked it. Kendall bit out a cry as he punched the ground. Damn damn damn damnity damn it.

Maybe it was a newly discovered thing of Logan's. Because he had never shown interest in that before. And it wasn't just Carlos because this...this infatuation only happened recently. Maybe Logan was one of those secret belly enthusiasts. Kendall had found out about them before online when he was researching something, what it was he couldn't remember, but somehow he ended up on a (rather disturbing) website where people were complimenting fat. It horrified and shocked him at first but having read further, the comments made for entertaining material, even if what they were directed to didn't attract him at all. But it was his first awareness that people could even have an interest in heavy people and not just for making fun of, but being attracted to them. Kendall thought that was creepy but you can't control what you like and if they like that, there isn't much of a problem (unless you're talking about corpses, underaged children, or animals, which is just sick).

And Logan liked it with Carlos. It would certainly explain this sudden interest. Nodding, Kendall stood up. It was settled. He liked his body as it was. But that idea earlier was good. If it was what it would take to win Logan, he could stand to put on a few pounds, perhaps more. Whatever it would take to win Logan's interest again. Kendall very much doubted that Logan liked obese people. If he knew Logan, he wouldn't risk his or Carlos's health that way and probably knew ways to still be healthy and being bigger than normal size. And being big and strong, emphasis on big, would be something different and interesting. He could do this.
11213111111.title: Plans and jealousy

112131111112.content:
Now that Kendall made up his mind, it was much easier. The rest would be just a matter of details to worry about later. Putting on his spare shirt, Kendall smiled as he went back in and was even smiling as he passed by Carlos and Logan on his way to the room.

"Hey guys," Kendall said pleasantly and Logan raised his eyebrow. Kendall continued onward still smiling and Logan and Carlos exchanged looks.
"That was weird," Logan said.
"Do you think Kendall's been replaced by a clone from the planet X?" Carlos asked. Logan sighed and rolled his eyes.
"No, I don't think so. Let's just go." Carlos nodded excitedly.
"Yeah, that's fine. I'm hungry."
"You're always hungry." Logan said fondly and Carlos blushed as Logan's hand brushed against his stomach.

When he got in, Kendall paused for a moment. He honestly wasn't sure how to go about this. It pretty much went against everything he knew but he had to do it, for Logan. He was wondering what to do when Katie walked in playing the gameboy and Kendall immediately grabbed her before she could wander off.

"Katie, I need advice on something!" She sighed and put her gameboy down after closing it.
"Yeah, what is it?" Kendall was unnerved how a nine year old girl could already master "the look". Maybe it was a girl thing but it was terrifying.
"I'm going to gain weight and I wonder if you have any ideas because I don't." Katie raised her eyebrows, stunned.
"Uh, what?"
"I've decided to bulk up, put on a bit of muscle, you know stuff like that. Any ideas?" Katie relaxed a bit.
"Oh, okay. Yeah, you are a bit scrawny. I might come up with something."
"Thanks Katie-wait what?" Kendall asked with an edge. Katie backed up slowly.
"I mean, let's get started! Uh, well, I guess go and do the Carlos method."
"The what?"
"Eat everything, simple enough really. I'm just going to go now," Katie said running out. Kendall stood for a moment and thought. That idea was just crazy enough that it might work. It was so freaking obvious he was amazed he hadn't thought of it.

"Way to be stupid Kendall," he muttered to himself. "Let's just do it before somebody else gets back. He was a bit hungry after that exhausting swim which was excellent. Opening the cupboards looking for something to eat turned up almost nothing of value. There wasn't much left and they were going to need to restock supplies from the supermarket soon anyways but he did turn up some cups of pudding, bread, some meat, and cheese. At the least he could make himself a sandwich. Putting a big pile of meat onto the bread he lathered it in liberal amounts of mayonnaise before closing it. Raising it to his mouth, he took a big bite and grinned. It had been a while since he ate mayonnaise, in fact he couldn't remember the last time. But he did remember the taste and this was even better. It was so freaking good, it was incredible. Taking another big bite, he nearly moaned. Why didn't his mom use this stuff again and why didn't he try this before? It tasted amazing.

He finished the sandwich in a few huge bites but not without casualty as some mayonnaise dripped onto his shirt and swim trunks. After he was done, Kendall so liked the taste that he had to lick the mayonnaise on his shirt (it was that good and why waste it?). He was still hungry so he opened up some pudding and all but devoured it. One thing all four loved with a passion besides singing and being friends was pudding. The pudding wars they had were epic and they learn to eat their pudding fast and enjoy it while you can before somebody else stole it. Licking the last of the pudding from his fingertips, Kendall looked around. He couldn't believe how much he ate already. Usually he was much more conservative with eating. Even more incredible was that he was still hungry, even after a big sandwich and pudding cups. Working out must have took a lot more energy or he could eat more than he thought. Picking up the trash, he threw it away as he wondered what else there was. Nothing really in their apartment and mom was getting new stuff that evening. Kendall was about to give up when he saw a card lying on the desk counter for pizza delivery. Since he was still hungry, Kendall decided to order pizza. It was going to take his mom a while to get back anyways and he could always save the rest.

"Hello, Gigi's pizzeria, how may we help you?"

"Yeah, hi. Um, I guess I would like a...medium? Yeah, a medium cheese pizza delivered to the Palm Woods? No, make that two please. Two medium pizzas to the Palm Wood," Kendall said, grinning.
112131111112.title: Kendall starts his plan

1121311111122.content:
The pizza finally came twenty minutes later. When he opened the door, the cute delivery girl was obviously checking him out but he ignored it, for the most part. She did have nice eyes though. Hurrying though, Kendall took the pizzas and paid, making sure to add a nice tip though because she deserved it. Smiling brightly, she thanked him and left and Kendall felt good for helping out, especially after earlier with his uncharacteristic behavior. He had not meant to be mean to Carlos but on the other hand, if it meant getting Logan, Carlos was going down. He was also going to pretend that he didn't feel the pleasure of saying exactly what was on his mind either.

Kendall sat down and opened the first box, inhaling the delicious scent of cheese. There was nothing quite like the smell of delicious pizza and although pudding was still king, pizza came in close second, just like Carlos's corn dogs or the dinosaur shaped chicken nuggets. Breathing it in a few seconds longer, he took out a slice and started eating. Gigi's pizza was amazing as always and Kendall was glad he ordered it since it had been a while since he had it. The last time he probably had it was when Jo had left to do the movie in New Zealand. Gobbling it down fast, Kendall paused to get a drink from the refrigerator. Drinks always had to go with pizza so he got out a couple of cans of Dr. Pepper. Carlos had already finished off the cream soda, 'lucky bastard', Kendall thought, but Dr. Pepper was a very close second in the soda category. Normally Kendall was a smoothie person but he honestly couldn't be bothered to go and get one right then and it had been a while since he had Dr. Pepper. Snapping one open, he took a long couple couple gulps, choking a bit and burping loudly. Making sure to slow down, Kendall took another sip, sighing at the taste. So. Freaking. Good. Letting out another burp, Kendall took another slice of pizza, tearing into that one as well. Kendall soon got the rythm down of sipping every few bites and he went on auto-pilot.

When Kendall next took a break, he was surprised to find he already ate half the first pizza. That still left one and a half to go but he was becoming a bit full after glutting himself on half a pizza and that massive sandwich and a number of pudding cups earlier. After all, there wasn't some sort of magic that expanded his stomach to unlimited capacity and he was reaching his limit. Although not near what Carlos eats on a regular basis, it was a start and farther than anything Kendall had expected himself capable, and man was he exhausted. Groaning Kendall stood up and took the pizza boxes to his room to hide them in since Carlos would never think to look there for food. Then he crawled onto his bed and collapsed there.

"How does Carlos do this?" he wondered and grudging respect was awarded. Kendall was stuffed and it hurt to move or even breathe a bit. Suddenly feeling the urge, he let out a quite impressively long and loud belch and afterwards, Kendall sighed in relief. That felt so much better and that had been incredibly manly. He was going to have to figure out how to do it again and beat Carlos in the next burping competition. Running his fingers over his bloated stomach, a pleasure Kendall never knew was coming over him. It felt so...so...well, he didn't know but it was good. It was solidly packed and playing with it was fun. He couldn't believe he had never done this before. This feeling was incredible and he had to do it again. Kendall lay their in a daze, fingers tracing over his stomach when he heard the front door open.
1121311111122.title: Kendall continuation

11213111111221.content:
"I'm back!" James announced into the appartment before he remembered that Carlos and Logan were out on a date or something and Kendall was doing...something. James wasn't quite sure since Kendall had been acting really strange lately, as was Carlos but Carlos always was a bit of a strange person. It wasn't a surprise with Carlos to do random things but Kendall wasn't himself lately. He just seemed...on edge or something. And he kept sending dark looks at Carlos and muttering. Actually, all three of his friends seemed to be acting weird because Logan was really buddy-buddy with Carlos and Logan wasn't as complaining of Carlos as he usually was. It was all very strange and sometimes James wondered if he hadn't fallen into another universe like that girl Alice.

Especially since apparently Carlos and Logan were dating. That was just weird. James had no problems with his friends liking other guys but it was weird because it was Carlos and Logan who were like extreme opposites. Carlos was all spontaneous, random, and energetic while Logan was carefully planning and attempting to control, think things through in advance, and was always a rather reluctant member in doing anything until he actually did it. He couldn't figure out how they took the leap from friends to more than. Or that they remained together because he bet money with Kendall and other Palmswood's people that they wouldn't last for long and they already broke Jame's guess of less than a day, which was how long many of Jame's relationships unfortunately were. Girls either got to clingy, got mad at him for stupid reasons, apparently using him to make someone else jealous because they thought he was gay (he had no idea where the girl got that impression), or they were super rich famous popstars that he couldn't remain with, etc. But that was okay since James' liked variety.

He heard a loud noise that pierced the air like a gunshot in the empty apartment and James rushed to investigate. It came from Kendall's room and he barged in, and stopped awkwardly. Kendall was rubbing his enlarged stomach that looked extremely uncomfortable in those tight hip-hugging jeans.

"Umm...is everything all right?" James asked, feeling stupid. Kendall yelped as he frantically looked around for a pillow to cover himself before he realized James had already seen.

"Uh, yeah. I was just...aiding my digestion. I ate a big lunch." At that moment, another massive burp came out and it lasted for quite a few awkward seconds. "Uuuuurrrrrrppppppppppp...excuse me," Kendall said, grinning awkwardly and hopeful. James stood there for a moment.

"Oh...okay, yeah whatever. I thought you were in trouble and uh...I guess you're not, at least in trouble with anything serious...er, I can help with that." Kendall raised his eyebrows when James walked over and placed his hands near the top of his jeans.

"W-what are you doing?" Kendall asked, blushing furiously at the images racing through his mind. James raised an eyebrow back (he was much better with the expression than Kendall was).

"I'm helping, what did you think I was doing?" Before Kendall could say anything about how that didn't explain anything, James already had his fingers looped through and Kendall's pants unbuttoned as he yanked them down. "There you go," he said to the stunned Kendall. "Your pants were far too tight on you then, if you're going on an eating binge, you should unbutton them before they get too tight and you can't undo them yourself." Smirking at the surprised look on Kendall's face, James stepped back. "Hey, I used to be a fat kid too, before puberty." Kendall flushed a bit.

"Oh...uh, yeah, sorry about that." James shrugged. "Yeah, I was too. Is there a particular reason why you ate so much? You almost never do that." Kendall flushed a bit.

"Ahhh....uhhh..." James leaned forward eagerly.

"Ooh, this sounds good. I have to know now." Just as soon as Kendall opened his mouth to speak, there was another banging noise as Carlos and Logan walked in, laughing and making noise. kendall breathed a sigh of relief as James' attention diverted from him as he got up. Before he left, James paused at the doorway.

"Don't think that I have forgotten. I'll just have to ask you at some other time, when you least expect it. Be prepared Kendall Knight, be prepared." Giving an evil laugh that sounded odd coming from his mouth, James walked out and left Kendall there sweating. He couldn't have Logan and Carlos see this. Not yet anyhow. Kendall would have to be even larger before he could comfortably show off to Logan. Right now it was just a small compared to Carlos but that would soon change.
11213111111221.title: James

112131111112211.content:
Earlier that day

"So, what do you want to do?" Logan asked Carlos. He wasn't sure what was changed since they were now in a dating relationship. Logan didn't have much experience in that area considering that the only person he ever dated was Camille and she was not the best example of a normal relationship. He liked her a lot but their on-again off-again thing was really confusing and they decided they were better off just as friends. She would not be the best person to ask for advice. Logan also had considered asking James and Mrs. Knight but those two wouldn't be much help either because although James was a total flirt, his relationships did not last that long either because he moved on to someone else or he flirted with someone else, did something stupid, etc. Mrs. Knight was an awesome mom in many things but she was just as hopeless if not more so than Logan was. An attractive single mom in her 40s with two kids who would scare anybody who was interested would not be the most help in dating advice, especially since it was probable she was going to end up a cat lady in the future. So he decided that the only way was the direct one and ask Carlos.

"Well I wanna scuba-dive, rock-climb, be on the inside of a volcano, throw water ballloons on people's head, see the world's biggest rubberband ball, ride a llama, sky-dive, cannonball in the pool, eat, watch movies..."

"Uh, you just want to go see a movie and then eat?" Logan asked and Carlos nodded excitedly. "We can do that. And Carlos..."
"Yeah?" asked Carlos confused.
"Some of those...no, just no. And the world's biggest rubberband ball?"
"Yeah, its a ball of rubberbands and its big!'
"I can imagine," Logan said dryly. Carlos just grinned as he grabbed Logan's hand.
"What are we going to see?" Logan thought about what Carlos was interested in before it struck him.
"You want to go see that new Avengers movie?" The look on Carlos's face was priceless as he jumped up and down excitedly.

"What, you mean it's out? We need to see it NOW! I can't believe its out and nobody told me!" Logan soon found himself being half-dragged, half-running behind an excited Carlos towards the nearby movie theatre who was woophing and yelling in excitement.

"This is going to be so good! It has Thor and Iron Man and the Hulk and that guy Loki who's like a cool evil version of you and this is going to be so good cause they're going to be looking for some cube thing and I want a hammer like Thor, do you think I could get one? That would be so cool to be able to summon lightning with a Hammer and smack bad guys with it because Thor is freaking awesome. Iron Man is cool too and Captain America! It's like a dream come true! Well, without the pudding, in my dream they all sat around eating giant buckets of pudding in a candy-cane forest..."

Logan stopped listening right there for his own sanity because it only got weirder from then on peppered with flying unicorns, rainbows, giant ant creatures from space, it must be one hell of a dream Carlos had. At least Carlos was excited and Logan admitted that Carlos's enthusiasm was rubbing off on him as well and Logan had also really wanted to see this movie as well. Unfortunately, Carlos decided to insist on snacks since it wasn't a proper movie without a giant bucket of butter popcorn and large drink. Logan couldn't understand how Carlos, or the others for that matter because they enjoyed it as well, could enjoy that buttered popcorn stuff. It was nasty and disgusting and was super greasy and they loved it. Logan was just fine with plain popcorn but they always put butter on their's. But Carlos wanted buttered popcorn and it made him happy and Carlos did look cute.

Unfortunately the line was long and was moving obnoxiously slow for some reason and they were only standing there for a few minutes before Carlos got bored.
"Are we there yet?" he asked and Logan looked at him.
"No." They stood there in silence for a few moments longer before Carlos coughed and asked again.
"Are we there yet?" Logan actually face-palmed.
"No, we haven't even moved yet. Do you think you could stand still?" Carlos was bouncing on his feet back and forth and he stopped for a moment.
"Huh what? Oh um sure." And Carlos did try. He managed to stand still for three minutes before he started humming under his breath and dancing.
"Are we there yet?" he started singing and Logan really wanted to facepalm himself. He loved Carlos but he was attracting too much attention right now.
"Is it necessary-?" Logan started to ask before Carlos gasped and shushed him.
"You know it is Logie! Movies need popcorn, especially buttered popcorn. And corn dogs and pudding but I don't think they have those here so I brought some of my own." Logan turned and stared at Carlos.

"You brought corndogs to the movie theatre? Where?"
"Shush," Carlos said looking around suspiciously. "Someone might be watching. They're here in this bag."
"Then why are we waiting in line for popcorn if you already have a snack?"
"Because movies need popcorn, duh Logie! Sometimes you're a little slow." Carlos started dancing and singing again.

"I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby
I, I love you like a love song, baby

And I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat"

"Is that Selena Gomez?" Logan asked and Carlos nodded excitedly in beat.

"Yeah and I keep hitting re-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat." It was admittedly cute even if a bit off-tempo and tone but they were beginning to draw a little too much unwanted attention so Logan did the only thing he knew that would shut Carlos up. He kissed him.
112131111112211.title: Carlos' and Logan's date

1121311111122112.content:
"That was so cool!" Carlos had loved the movie and thought it was one of the best things in the whole world. "It's like the ultimate super-hero team up and ah! By the way, what is Swarma?"

"It's Shawarma and I honestly don't know. Its a total mystery." The movie was good but Logan hadn't nearly been as into it as Carlos was. Although it probably didn't help that he missed a great chunk of the dialogue either because Carlos was laughing too hard, spitting, eating and drinking rather noisily (which did not make the people around them too happy and they were almost kicked out for causing a disturbance) and that he was too busy watching Carlos to pay very much attention. When he did manage to look over, Logan had no idea what was going on at all other than Thor, Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow, and Hawkeye were trying to stop some sort of alien invasion. He was probably going to have to watch the movie again on his own to understand what Carlos was babbling about and he really did want to see it without distraction, no matter how sexy and cute.

Like the way Carlos had been so into the movie as he shoveled popcorn in his mouth. It would have taken the world ending or the building to collapse right on top of the screen to get his attention off it. If only Carlos was able to be so attentive at school, he would have aced his classes easy instead of mediocre and always needing his help, not that Logan minded giving. Carlos was still talking when something caught Logan's eye. It was a sign for an all-you-can-eat buffet restauraunt. With Carlitos's new appetite, they were going to need places like that where it wouldn't be weird for someone to eat tons of food, and was actually encouraged. Tapping Carlos to get his attention, Logan pointed at the sign.

"Hey, want to go there for dinner? If you're still hungry of course," Logan said. Carlos gave him an 'are you kidding, no freaking duh' look as he nodded vigorously.

"Uh yeah of course I do. Those were just snacks at the movie theatre." Logan mentally choked at the thought of a giant tub of butter popcorn, a couple of corndogs, and pudding cups as 'just as snack' before the ramifications of that kicked in and he grinned.

"You sure you haven't ruined your appetite?" Logan asked as he poked Carlos's belly. Carlos gave a little shuffle.
