"Not really but if we must go home..." Logan shook his head.
"No, it's okay Carlos. We can still get dinner. A growing boy like you all needs all the food he can get." Logan hit himself mentally. 'A growing boy?' Not at all creepy and diabolical sounding. Carlos nodded excitedly.

"Yeah exactly, you're so nice Logie-bear." Carlos gives Logan a big hug, squeezing all the air of of him while Logan struggled.
"Ah, Car-Carlos, please let go. You're crushing me." Carlos quickly dropped him apologizing.
"I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry..."
"It's okay, just...don't hug so tight. You might have cracked my ribs or something." Logan tenderly felt to see if they were. No, they seemed intact.
"Are we going in?" Carlos asked intensely.
"Yeah." $12 each later and Carlos and Logan were in and Carlos looked around excitedly.

"Wow, there's a lot of good stuff here: mac 'n cheese, pizza, pasta, sliced ham, turkey, chicken, soups, salads, bread, etc. And oh my god the dessert, chocolate cake, icecream, jello, pie, and is that a chocolate fountain?!" Carlos screamed excitedly at that and Logan covered his ears.

"Screaming is not necessary Carlos. Use your inside voice inside remember?"
"Oh yeah. Ahhh!!!!" He screamed again quieter. Rolling his eyes, Logan put his jacket on the back of the booth. Getting a tray, he followed Carlos who was already filling his up. It was going to take a while longer for Logan to get used to this new appetite of Carlos but at the same time he couldn't help but feel a bit excited for what was to come.

Logan ended up getting just some spaghetti with meat sauce, bread, and a bowl of salad to start with. Carlos started with what seemed like almost everything and was already inhaling pasta as Logan sat down. Logan was finding it hard to concentrate on his own meal so he eventually gave up as he watched Carlos making good disappearance of a mountain of food. With the last few noodles being sucked down, Carlos ravenously dug into mac 'n cheese making noises of appreciation that made Logan's hair stand up. He wondered where on earth this ravenous hunger Carlos had was coming from but go on ravenous hunger! Logan even found himself egging Carlos on as he ate.

"Show those noodles that your boss, woo go Carlos! Yeah, go for the chicken!" He was finishing the chicken when he slowed down for a moment and Logan was confused.
"Huh, what is it?" He asked worriedly. Carlos groaned in relief as he got his hands around the button of his pants and loosened them.

"They were getting quite tight, but now I feel good," Carlos said, sighing in relief as his expanded belly surged forward a bit to claim space that had been denied. Letting out a massive belch, Carlos rubbed himself for a moment before launching back into the meal.
1121311111122112.title: Dinner

11213111111221122.content:
When Carlos had finally had enough, he let out another massive belch and sighed. "Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrpppppppp, man that's good. Thanks for taking me," Carlos said with a smile. Logan grinned back as he fiddled with his fingers.

"No problem, hey, are you going to have dessert?" He asked. Carlos shook his head. "Nah, my tummy hurts. I don't think I could eat another bite." Logan shrugged.
"Oh, okay. I'll just bring some home then so you won't have to raid the pudding supply again and cause everyone to complain. Wait here, I'll be right back."
He waved over the waitress and put on his most ingratiating smile. "Hey, mind if we take some dessert home? It would be much appreciated." The waitress who was abvout their age looked like they were about to say no before a flash of recognition appeared in her eyes.

"Hey, you're Logan from Big Time Rush right?" She asked excitedly. "I love all your songs and think you guys are amazing! You're so hot!" She batted her eyelashes at him as she surreptiously slid over a piece of paper. "Call me," she whispered.

"Uhh, thank...you," Logan said. "But can we?"
"Can you what?" she asked blinking.
"Uhh, can we bring dessert home?" Logan asked, wanting very much to run.
"Sure. And if you want, you could even get extra," she whispered, touching Logan.

"Thank you," Logan said pushing her away gently. "We'll just grab our dessert and be going now." Rushing over to the desserts, he grabbed a box and started filling it with as much junk as he could cram in the fastest possible time. He wanted to get out of there before the waitress, Jenny according to her nametag, would try to tackle him. She certainly looked like she was considering it. Rushing back, he grabbed Carlos by the arm and pulled him up roughly.

"Let's go, let's go, let's go," Logan chanted as he half pulled-half pushed the befuddled Carlos in front of him out the door. Holding onto his pants, Carlos panted as he tried to keep up.

"Wha..what is it?"
"Fan waitress who recognized us."
"Oh," Carlos puffed. "Okay, can we...can we slow down for a minute?" Checking around, Logan stopped as he waited for Carlos to catch his breath.
"O...okay, I think I'm ready," Carlos said panting. Trying to buckle his pants again, he pouted as it wouldn't stay together long enough. "Mrs. Knight must be using a lot of detergent, my pants shrunk," Logan just shrugged, trying to keep from saying something.

"If you say so. Come on, let's go." It took a bit longer than usual to get to the Palmwoods since Carlos had to hold up his pants the whole time and had to rest a few times but they finally made it. When they got in, Carlos collapsed to the floor.

"Finally....made it..." he gasped. "That...was...an eternity." Logan nodded in agreement before sitting down and letting Carlos have a few minutes to rest as he opened up a National Geographic and started reading. After he finished the article he started, Logan got up.

"Hey, wanna get off the floor, the couch would be much comfier." A muffled sound was what Carlos made and Logan pulled him up,
"Easy there, just moving you to the couch so your face doesn't have a permanent imprint of the floor. Carlos said something that sounded rude but Logan wasn't really quite sure and helped walk him over to the couch. Setting him down, Logan nodded.

"There you go. How does that feel."
"Better," Carlos said.
"Yeah, I thought so." Logan said sittting on the couch next to him and turning on the tv. "That was fun tonight wasn't it?"

"Uh-huh," Carlos said, already entranced by the bright colors of the tv. Logan just smiled and looked over at the tan smooth tight-strechedness of Carlos's belly. Looking again to make sure no one else was there, Logan placed his hands on it and started rubbing.

Logan loved it. Carlos wrapped his manly arms around Logan's waist and pulled him in closer to his lap. Logan grinded slightly, causing Carlos' manhood to stir in his tight jeans. Carlos grunted. After about 3/4 of the ice cream was inside of Carlos, Carlos let out a big massive manly burp.

112131111112211221.title: Belly massages and dessert

choices: Carlos comes out of his room.
1121311112.content:
Carlos didn’t know what to say or think. Logan had just said he thought Carlos’ extra weight was “hot.” By association, Logan thought “he” was hot. Was this a joke? Yes, that must be it. Logan wasn’t being serious. It just didn’t make sense.
Carlos stood up. “Y-yeah, sure. Quit messing with me,” he said, his voice a bit shaky. Logan looked into his eyes with a serious expression, as if deeply considering his next response. It lasted a moment, awkward accurately describing it.
“Here, maybe this will help.” Logan leaned in and kissed him.
Carlos jumped back, nearly falling over his chair, and covered his mouth with his hand. He looked the most shocked and surprised Logan ever saw him in his life.
“Carlos-“ before he could finish, the other boy had already bolted to his room and slammed the door behind him. Logan was left alone in the kitchen, silently berating himself for his obviously poor choice of action.

Carlos paced the room frantically, trying to make sense of what happened mere moments before. Logan had kissed him. He replayed the moment in his head again, and again. Each time, he felt his face flush. He rubbed the sides of his head with both hands in frustration. This just wasn’t right! It just didn’t make sense! His band mate was attracted to him of all people. How could this be? How did everything go from normal to something so… confusing? He stopped and stared out into space. Besides the initial shock, he didn’t find it unpleasant… Maybe this wouldn’t be a bad thing. All Carlos really wanted was someone to be close to. So what if it wasn’t a girl? He really did like Logan a lot. Times are different. As he thought about it, his desire for it to be true seemed to manifest and grow as images of him and Logan dating started blinking into his mind; holding hands, cuddling, kissing, and having… wait, what!?

His face grew so hot that he thought his head was on fire, and his sporadic train of thought went full circle. This can’t be true. There’s no way for it to be… especially with his friend and band mate. Plus, Logan was into girls, or at least that’s what he thought. But that small hope that they could be together remained amongst all of the doubts and chaos. He began to pace quicker as his thoughts continued swirling around to the point he had a headache. They went faster and faster until…
They just stopped… and all he thought of was pudding.
1121311112.title: Misstep?

11213111121.content:
Logan sighed to himself and started to clean up the mess from the pancakes he made for Carlos. He should’ve been more tactful, he thought. He was usually more cautious to avoid situations such as this. That’s the last time he goes out on a limb like that.
         The door to Carlos’ room swung open and he walked into the kitchen with a serious look, one that was unfamiliar on Carlos’ visage.
         “Carlos -“ He didn’t even glance at Logan as he passed by, grabbed a spoon, and opened the refrigerator.
         Logan watched as he tore off the covering of a pudding cup and, in seconds, devoured its contents like he was a man on a mission: “Pudding genocide.” Another cup’s contents were demolished and its empty husk thrown aside for his next victim. Logan watched, amazed, as another two puddings met the same fate. All the while, Carlos’ face had that same, serious and single-minded expression that was borderline angry.
         Then there was a pause. This particular pudding cup’s cover was especially stubborn, and Carlos couldn’t seem to get up open.
         Logan flinched as Carlos screamed, “Damned pudding!” before tossing it violently to the floor. Logan hadn’t him seem him this angry since he tried that diet! Carlos stood there huffing while Logan bent down and picked up the slightly dented dessert. He carefully removed the covering and walked over to Carlos with the intention of handing it to him, but was caught by surprise when he saw Carlos’ face. Amongst the frustration, he could see how torn and distraught Carlos really was.
         “I’m sorry if… what I did earlier upset you. We can just forget that it ever happened if you want.” Logan said. He couldn’t stand seeing Carlos like this. It would better just to have things as they were. He held out the pudding cup to his friend. Carlos glanced down at the dessert, then quickly back up to meet Logan’s gaze.
         “A-Are you messing with me?” Carlos choked out.
         “Wha- no, I wouldn’t…“
         “Why would anyone prefer me over somebody else?” He interrupted. The question puzzled Logan. “I mean I don’t have much going for me. I-I’m not as tall as you guys, a-and I’m just not as attractive as you guys.” He was talking quickly and sounded as if he was holding back sobs. Carlos then motioned downward to the object of Logan’s attention. “And this. I’m not as fit and trim as you guys and especially James.”
         Logan was the one thrown for a loop this time. Did Carlos really believe all these things? Has he always had this feeling of being inferior?
         “So tell me!” he raised his voice. “You’re just screwing around with me, right?!”
         The two boys gazes never broke for the next few moments. Logan was left speechless by Carlos’ emotional outburst, but as he stared into Carlo’s eyes, glistening from held back tears, he could see something; Logan saw what looked like a small glimmer of hope in the shorter boy that Logan really wasn’t playing with his emotions. Of course, he didn’t see it literally, but it was more of a feeling in his gut. He had to break his mental word and go out on a limb one last time. He placed the pudding on the counter and wrapped his arms around Carlos, pulling him into an embrace. He embraced Logan back. That was a good sign. Carlos buried his face into his shoulder, and he felt him steadily calm down.
         “I’m just so confused,” he heard Carlos say.
         “Don’t you ever think you’re not good enough for anyone just on those superficial things,” Logan said softly. “You have much more going for you.”
         “You’re just saying that,” Carlos mumbled into his shoulder.
         “Well, what I like about you is that despite your inherent goofiness, you always have a positive air to you.” Logan loosened the embrace and stepped back a bit. Carlos was wearing an expression akin to a sad puppy. Logan couldn’t help but blush and chuckle a bit. He had to admit. Carlos was just too precious sometimes. “You also have this strange and irresistible innocence. Plus, you seem to forget you can sing and you are exceptionally cute!” Logan felt his face blush even more after saying that last part.
         Carlos’ expression then switched to one of skepticism. “I didn’t think you were… that way, Logan. And if you were, why would you be attracted to me of all people, since I put on all this weight and all. What will people think!?” They both could imagine all the magazines and tabloids plastering articles about the two band mates hooking up and one of them looking puffier than usual.
         Logan smiled. “To be honest, I don’t know. I just like it. I like you, too. And maybe I just don’t care what others would think.” Though, he still wasn’t one hundred percent sure about the last part of that statement. Carlos’ eyes drifted off to the side. He was still skeptical. “Don’t believe me?” The taller boy put his hands low on Carlos’ now-fleshier waist and pulled him close so their bodies touched. Then he kissed him again.
11213111121.title: Carlos needs pudding!

112131111211.content:
Their lips met and Carlos immediately fell into the kiss as if he were waiting for it this time.
         Carlos couldn’t believe it. He was officially making out with Logan. And it felt great! His eyes were closed while he tried to mimic some of the things Logan did (he was more experienced from the looks of it). Logan’s hands scoured his shirtless back, his touch sending chills throughout Carlos. Kissing girls was nice, but this was just as good, if not several times better! All of Carlos’ fears and doubts seemed to have vanished from existence at that moment.
         Carlos tasted sweet; like syrup and pudding (for obvious reasons.) It was wonderful, Logan thought. The feeling of Carlos full belly pushing against him was unbelievably hot, too. He lowered his hands to the shorter boy’s waist to feel the softening area. Carlos was obviously loving this, because his hips starting a subtle motion that rubbed their fronts together. Something was coming over the both of them, and Logan wanted more of it. His hand went lower into the waist of Carlos’ jeans, approaching the now fuller cheeks filling out his underwear.
         Yep, some weight definitely took residence down there, too, Logan discovered.
         But as the boys were sucking face in the kitchen, the front door opened, and Ms. Knight came in. She had forgotten a notepad she usually kept in her purse. Someone must’ve gone into it for some unknown reason and didn’t bother to place everything back. She glanced around the room and moved towards the kitchen, but froze in her tracks at the sight of Logan and Carlos kissing, and they were really going at it! She took a few quiet steps back so she was at an angle hidden from them.
         ‘Okay, Jennifer, Let’s approach this carefully…’ she thought, trying to keep calm. She saw something she’d never expected to see. If not handled with care, there could be a lot of awkward repercussions. Plus, she was ‘cool mom,’ and progressive was her middle name. If the boys went for that, it really wasn’t any of her business, but if they’re going to do this, they need to learn to be a bit more private about it. For her next move she…
112131111211.title: Great Kiss

1121311112112.content:
Ms. Knight silently moved back towards the door. She figured if she made her presence known, she could get them to stop without actually walking in on them. It would probably cause a bit less drama, but there was going to be drama one way or another. She opened it and closed it loudly before obnoxiously announcing, “Hey! Has anyone seen my notepad?!”
         At the sound of the door and Ms. Knight’s “arrival,” the boy shot apart. Logan quickly turned and made it look like he was cleaning up the mess he made. Carlos, on the other hand, started to panic. He was in no condition to be seen by anyone. He was shirtless and his pants were still undone. If it was hard to do them up this morning, then it was impossible now with a belly full of pancakes and several pudding cups. To make things worse, there was another blatantly obvious bulge in his underwear due to their hot activity.
         Logan glanced back at Carlos and noticed the predicament. Ms. Knight’s footsteps were being heard coming towards the kitchen, so he quickly pulled Carlos to the counter to hide his front from most angles. Luckily, Carlos caught on and made it look like he was helping to clean up right as Ms. Knight came into the kitchen.
         “Hello, boys,” she said nonchalantly. She chuckled inwardly when she saw how flustered they look. “What have you been up to this morning?” As if she didn’t already know.
         “Breakfast,” Carlos blurted out.
         “Nothing spectacular,” Logan said at the same time. The boys glanced at each other, and figured the responses good enough.
         “Mmhmmm,” she hummed before walking out of the kitchen. Once she was out of sight. Carlos started to panic again.
         “Logan! It won’t go down!” he said in a low, albeit frantic, voice so Ms. Knight wouldn’t hear. “What do I do!?”
         Logan’s face reddened at the first idea that popped in his head, but they needed to act fast. “Hold still and suck in your stomach.” He moved closer and maneuvered his hand over Carlos’ crotch.
         “Logie! What are yo-“ he gasped as Logan adjusted Carlos and quickly pulled the up the zipper. He was more or less presentable, but he was blushing furiously at what Logan had just done. Ms. Knight walked back into the kitchen just as they finished.
         “Ah, I found it,” she said. She paused when she saw their faces. They were redder than before and looked slightly sweaty. “Are… you boys okay?” They both nodded and started towards Logan’s room.
         Before Carlos entered, however, he stopped and turned back to Ms. Knight. “Oh, Can we go to the mall sometime? I need new pants.”
         “Uh, sure, honey?”
         “Okay, thanks!” Carlos said in his usual cheerful tone before entering Logan’s room. The door promptly shut behind him. Jennifer blinked, a bit confused by the strange scene, but she just shook her head and got ready to leave, but noticed the empty pudding receptacles on the floor.
         “Boys! Make sure to clean up your mess!” As far as Ms. Knight is concerned, the guys can kiss each other all they want, but what they won’t be doing is leaving trash on the floor.
         “Okay!” they both responded from the room.
         Logan stood with his back to the door and sighed in relief. Carlos was sitting on the bed, smiling a wide grin. Then he busted out laughing.
         “What?” Logan asked incredulously.
         “It was funny!” Carlos said. He was obviously referring to what had just occurred. Logan didn’t find it in the least funny (well, maybe a little), but he now realized he wasn’t quite ready to let anyone see him kissing Carlos (at least like that) out in the open. Now he knew exactly how powerful teenage hormones were! Who knows what could’ve transpired if Ms. Knight hadn’t come home.
         Logan shook his head and sat next to him. “Whatever you say, goofball.” Carlos just looked at him with that same wide grin, happy, hopeful, and child-like. Typical Carlos. Logan decides…
1121311112112.title: Ms. Knight decides to redo her entrance

choices: Mrs. Knight arrives a short while later with unexpected takeout
She's late coming back from an appointment and does't arrive until late at night
11213111121122.content:
Logan planned to continue what was started in the kitchen, part of it anyways. He prodded Carlos to lay down and Carlos did so, a whoosh of exhalation pushing his zipper down again. They stared a moment and both burst out laughing.

"Hey, you do need new pants," Logan said and Carlos twitched a little.
"Yeah," he said his face blushing red. "They were really hard to put on this morning." Logan chuckled as he fondled the exposed stomach.
"I wonder why?" he said, smiling to make sure Carlos knew he wasn't making fun of him. Carlos shrugged.
"They shrunk a bit," he said simply. "I haven't grown that much." Logan would beg to differ but Carlos would have to come to terms with it on his own.
"So...want to continue?" Logan asked, a smirk coming onto his face. Carlos looked confused.
"Continue what?" he asked and Logan grinned as he leaned over so he was looking down into Carlos's eyes.

"This," he said as he place a kiss on Carlos's cheek. "And this," he said as he did the other one. "And even this,"he said planting one on on Carlos's lips. Carlos stared up a moment before pulling Logan down on top of him, his mouth greedily seeking Logan's. Logan groaned low against him and Carlos pulled even closer.

After some time of making out had passed, Logan pulled away smiling dazed as was Carlos. "That was amazing," he said breathily. "No wonder James is so obsessed. Kissing is wonderful."

"Hey, what do you think they're doing?" Carlos asked. Logan shrugged.
"I don't know. Hey, Mrs. Knight wants us to clean the kitchen. If we don't, she might wonder what we did while she was gone." Carlos pouted.
"I don't want to." Logan rolled his eyes.
"You have too, I'm not doing it by myself. Besides, it's easy." Carlos gave a sad puppy dog face which normally worked but Logan was too worried about Mrs. Knight for it to work.

"Come on, let's go." Carlos grumbled a little but pulled on a shirt and yanked his pants up roughly, wincing as he did so as he struggled with the button.
"Stupid pants, stupid mess," he muttered as he somehow managed to get them closed. Logan was already dressed and waiting.
"Here, you clean the floor, I'll wipe up the stove." They worked in silence for a few minutes and when they were just about done, the door opened.
"Hey guys," Kendall said coming in as he threw his hockey stick down. "You should have come and played. We crushed the other team."
"Yeah," James said. "It was a lot of fun." Logan shrugged.

"Then you didn't need us, besides, I was working on my project remember?"
"Oh yeah," James said. "Did you finish?"
"Yep, it's a keeper." Logan replied proudly.
"So, what did you do today Carlos?" Kendall asked as he removed his hockey gear. "You were still asleep when we left." Carlos looked panicked for a moment.
"You know, I did...things...things that were fun..." Carlos waved his hands in vague motions. James rolled his eyes.
"It's probably better for us not to know Kendall. It's Carlos after all." Kendall chewed his lip for a moment but let it go when his phone rang. Picking it up he smiled.

"Hey Jo," he said moving away. "How were you today? I was playing hockey and..." his voice got softer as he moved into another room. James shrugged.
"Well I'm bored. Hey Carlos, want to play video games?" Carlos squealed in excitement as he and James rushed to the spot and turned on the game system. Logan stood their shaking his head.

"Ah well, clearly I'm not invited." Carlos looked up having heard him.
"Of course you are, Logie, come and play!" Logan shook his head.
"Nah, I'm good. I'm going to check on my project and get the water boiling for when Mrs. K comes back," Carlos looked uncertain for a moment before shrugging.
"Oh, okay then." He turned his attention to the game as James loaded it up.
11213111121122.title: Finish what started in the kitchen

112131111211221.content:
After a few rounds of Super Smash Brothers, the boys’ attention turned towards the door when Katie and Mrs. Knight entered with several bags in tow. Each bag had the logo of a small fast food establishment that wasn’t too far from their building. Logan noticed Carlos’ eyes light up at the sight and smell.
          “Mrs. Knight, what’s with all that food?” Logan inquired, pointing to the bags in their hands.
          “Courtesy of the house,” she smiled triumphantly. “The owner is such a kind man.”
         “Mom started a scene at the restaurant,” Katie started, lugging her bags over to the table. “She and one of the employees nearly fought it out over some cold fries.” Katie put a hand over her mouth to keep from laughing. There was no doubt she’s had a hand in “negotiating” the deal.
          “Long story short, we got free food,” Mrs. Knight finished, joining her bags with the others on the table.
         “I guess we don’t need the boiling water then,” Logan said, turning off the stove.
          “Sorry about that, honey.”
         Logan shrugged and went over to the table with everyone else. Carlos was already digging through one of the bags, inspecting its contents. There were eleven bags, each with at least two burgers and an order of fries in it.
         James took a quick look into all of the bags. “That’s a lot of food, though.”
          Mrs. Knight nodded. “It is, but whatever we don’t eat we can put away for later.” With that, everyone sat down and started rummaging for what they wanted. When Logan took his seat next to Carlos, he wasn’t surprised to see him almost done with one burger and shoveling a handful of fries into his mouth.
          That night’s dinner was a repeat of the previous ones. There was the bickering, the scolding, and all that other good stuff. Logan was just about finished with the last of his fill when he noticed Carlos plop the last piece of his third burger in his mouth and already reaching for the fourth with his other hand. Logan poked Carlos in the side, prompting him to turn with his cheeks still full.
         “Slow down a bit,” Logan said, smiling. He gestured towards Carlos’ unbuttoned pants and full-looking stomach. He simply shrugged and went back to stuffing his face. Honestly, Logan was unsure if he himself wanted him to slow down either...
         After a while, everyone had eaten their fill and gone off to their own business, but Logan and Carlos remained at the table. Carlos was slowly finishing off, as far as Logan counted, his eleventh burger. Granted, they were all somewhat small, simple burgers with little on them besides basic toppings, but eleven is still a lot and that’s not even mentioning the amount of fries Carlos managed to swallow in between them. God knows how many he’s had. He truly was a spectacle when it came to eating. He swallowed the last bit and let out a large belch just as Katie came back in the kitchen.
         “How many burgers are left?” she asked, peeking into the remaining bags.
         “Two? Maybe?” Logan responded.
          “Two!? Wow, you guys just eat everything. I’d think we'd have some left for tomorrow at least.” She pulled one out of a bag and lamented, “Looks like all the fries are gone, too.” As if on cue, Carlos burped again. Katie didn’t really need to know that he ate a majority of the food she and her mother brought home. Katie took her burger and left to her room.
         “You full now?” Logan asked. Carlos just smiled at him sleepily and put his hands on his bloated stomach. He tried to stand, but stumbled back into his seat.
         “I think I need help getting up,” Carlos said sheepishly. Logan offered his arm and helped pull him to his feet. They made their way to his room, and Carlos sat on his bed. Logan locked the door behind them to prevent any “walk-ins.”
         “Ugh, I feel like I’m going to explode,” Carlos groaned falling back on his bed. His engorged belly caused his shirt to ride up quite a bit past his navel, and its size made those pants look like a lost cause. “Can you rub my tummy again?”
         Logan lit up, but quickly concealed some of his excess excitement. “Sure, okay.” This was the moment he’d been waiting for since the last time Carlos went on a binge. He sat next to him and placed a hand gently on his belly. When he started rubbing slowly, Carlos sighed and, just as Logan had hoped, started making those same irresistible sounds he made last time. It just made Logan’s heart race. He switched to using both hands to survey its taught roundness and shivers went up his spine when Carlos let out a moan of pleasure.
         “Ah, that feels so good,” Carlos said groggily. Logan didn’t appear to hear him as he tended to the overstuffed stomach, but when the overfed Carlos let out one final belch, Logan almost swooned. He changed his position so that he was lying on his side next to Carlos, supporting his head with one hand and continued rubbing with the other. He could so get used to this.
112131111211221.title: Fast Food

1121311112112211.content:
Something felt off. Kendall didn’t know what it was, but something was definitely off. Things just haven’t been feeling right lately; Logan seemed to be hanging out less with him and James, and Carlos was always eating. Always. You would never see him without a corndog in hand or popping a chicken nugget or some other snack food into his mouth. Kendall also noticed that whenever some girl would approach either of them they showed very little, if any, interest. They weren’t disrespectful, but their sudden disinterest was very strange and unlike them. They had secret girlfriends, perhaps?
         At first, these were things that Kendall simply shrugged off, but a while ago, his suspicions rose when he had seen the duo at the mall. It seemed out of the ordinary, so Kendall hid behind a clothes rack. Carlos had come out of a dressing room and lifted up his shirt, so Logan could see, apparently. He had a small pooch of a belly and must have recently put some weight on (which was no surprise, really). Logan raised an eyebrow and stuck his index finger into the front of the waist behind the button, and it unsnaps with next to no effort on Logan’s part. The open button allowed Carlos’ extra girth to expand forward slightly, obviously relieved to have some room. Carlos blushed and said something, but Kendall wasn’t close enough from where he was spying to hear. Logan just smiled widely as he handed Carlos another pair of pants to try on.
         It wasn’t until the second time he saw them at the mall while he was on a date with Jo that he really started wondering. He saw them both at the food court and Carlos had an amount a food someone his size probably shouldn’t be eating in one sitting. They were just talking, but the way they looked at each other was… different. He couldn’t quite put his finger on it, but it was familiar and Kendall wasn’t sure how he felt about it.
         “Kendall, what’s the matter?” Jo asked.
         “Oh, nothing. I just see Logan and Carlos over there.” He points to them.
         “Let’s go say ‘hi!’’ Kendall grabs her arm before she runs off.
         “W-wait. That’s okay. We’ll probably see them later anyway.” Kendall could tell Jo was a bit suspicious. “Hey let’s go into this store!”
         “That store? It’s full of girly pink stuff,” she said with a raised eyebrow. Kendall realized that he would never go into such a store and shook his head.
         “Okay, let’s just go this way then,” he suggested, starting in the opposite direction of Logan and Carlos.
         “Alright, whatever,” Jo said, glancing in the other two boys’ direction one last time. Kendall was just being weird today, she figured.
         Some time later, Kendall stood near the counter, munching on a sandwich and trying to process his thoughts. Something was up with those two. They may act normal at home, but at the mall… As usual, it was a futile attempt that left him frustrated. His mother came into the kitchen and noticed his foul mood.
         “Kendall, is something the matter?” she asked with concern.
         “I don’t know. Something seems off.”
         “Off?” She repeated. Mrs. Knight went into the refrigerator and poured herself a drink. “Like what?”
         Kendall took a moment to try to formulate his words. “It’s about Logan. He’s acting… different.”
         His mother took a sip from her glass. “Different how?” Kendall shrugged, prompting his mother to roll her eyes. It’s difficult to help him if he can’t formulate what the problem is. She thought he was just going through a mood.
         “He’s acting a bit distant,” he began, grabbing his mother’s full attention once more. “And I noticed he’s been hanging out with Carlos a lot more.” Mrs. Knight took another sip of her drink, her gaze drifting to the right. She knew exactly what was going on, but she wasn’t going to rat the boys out. It wasn’t her place.
         “You’re all friends, so maybe Logan felt he was neglecting Carlos lately.” Hopefully that’d satisfy his curiosity. It was true to a point. Carlos sometimes seemed the odd one out of the four, even if it was usually not the boys’ intent.
         “Maybe.” He sighed and finished off the remains of his sandwich. “It’s still weird. Even at dance practice, our choreographer commented that the two had ‘good synergy.’”
         “Synergy, hm? I see,” she commented knowingly, amusement apparent in her voice. Kendall noticed and looked at her for a moment. It occurred to him that she may know something about this, but then again, it could just be her acting like she knows everything. Moms are like that sometimes. His mother looked at her watch and realized what time it is.
         “Oh, I’m going to be late. I wouldn’t worry about it too much, honey.” She pecked him on the cheek and leaves through the front door. “I’ll see you later!” Kendall was left along with his muddled thoughts, and they only intensified when he remembered how Logan and Carlos were around each other, laughing and smiling. And how Logan looked at Carlos and vice versa… They could’ve been almost described as… intimate? Or maybe love struck was a better word?
         At that point he decided that so far, he had nothing to go on. He decided to…
1121311112112211.title: Kendall is unsettled.

11213111121122111.content:
So Kendall had decided. He wanted to figure out exactly what was going on. Worst case scenario, his mom would be right and there would be nothing to worry. Just some wasted time. He started pacing the living room, formulating a scheme, when his sister came out of her room. Kendall smiled when he noticed her presence. He moved to block her path.
         “Baby sister! I need your help,” he said.
         She raised an eyebrow. “With what?”
         “I need to figure out what’s going on with Logan and Carlos.”
         Katie blinked. “What’s wrong with them?”
         “They’ve been acting differently,” he explained. Katie had to agree, they weren’t quite themselves. “I’m thinking they have secret girlfriends or something.”
         “Alright, come with me,” she commanded. They went into her room and she fished out an average looking stuffed bear. “Use this.” Kendall took it and turned it over in his hand.
         “What do I do with it?” he asked. Katie groaned and pointed to a couple of holes where cords would fit.
         “It has a camera in it. Stick it somewhere you’ll know they’ll be and where they won’t notice it, then you can watch it later for suspicious activity.
         “Oh! Cool!” Kendall exclaimed, but his amusement was short-lived. “Now why, exactly, do you have one of these?”
         “Many reasons,” she responds coolly.
         “Like?”
         She grins mischievously. “None you need to know of.” Kendall stared at her for a moment, suspicious of his sister, but decided to refocus on the main task at hand. He has Katie teach him how everything works and gets to work finding a nice spot for it when she leaves. After he figured he’s done everything for now, he decides to change to go to the pool for a while. Hopefully, the bear-cam would catch something that would explain everything so he can be rid of all this suspicion and worry.
         Now Carlos, on the other hand, felt like he was floating on air. His relationship with Logan had to be the best thing to ever happen to him since the invention of corndogs! And that’s saying something. They managed to go on a few couple dates: mostly hanging out in the mall and other small things. One of their outings was to a buffet to celebrate the A+ Logan received on his project. Honestly, Carlos rather would’ve stayed home and made out with Logan, but he said they might get bored of it if they did that too often. That sucked, but Carlos could understand. Of course, they also had to keep the thing they have secret (which also sucked), but things can’t always be perfect.
         He got dressed; pulling on a shirt and one of his new pairs of pants. The pants fit nicely and without issue, though they were a bit snug in the back. Logan said that Carlos’ butt was getting big, but he dismissed it as harmless teasing. His shirt did feel a bit different, though. He looked down, and noticed that his stomach made quite an outline from under it, but he shrugged that off and grabbed his helmet (because it felt like a helmet day to him), giving it a few pats to hear that cool sound it made. Right now he wanted some pudding! And maybe a corndog or two.
         When he exited his room, he saw someone sitting on the couch. It was…
11213111121122111.title: Katie's Bear

choices: Logan and Carlos decide to dispose of or sabotage the bear.
112131111211221111.content:
Carlos noticed that Logan was on the couch, reading a book. He hadn’t seen him all day, and seemed to have forgotten about his snack craving for the moment. He went over and hopped over the couch so he was beside Logan. The other boy noticed when he plopped himself down and smiled.
         “Hey, Carlos,” he said before returning to his book. It looked like a biology book or some medical journal, but Carlos couldn’t tell from where he was.
         “Hi,” he returned. It went quiet. Logan was fully immersed in his reading and Carlos just stared at him. It wasn’t until after the whole kissing incident that Carlos noticed how hot Logan was. His lips just looked so delectable… Carlos just wanted to attack him and immerse himself in that amazing rush of making out!
         But he was at an impasse. How would one initiate something like that? So far, Logan had been the one to start all of the kissing, but he didn’t seem to be thinking about that at the moment. Carlos was getting antsy. He tried to remember exactly how Logan started things, but everything before each account was a blur. The kissing was just that good. So, being Carlos, he’d thought he’d just ask.
         “Logan?” he said, grabbing the other boy’s attention. “When you want to… do stuff, how do start?” Logan stared at him for a moment, but figured out what he meant. He glanced to the side, in the direction of the television, for a second before scooting a bit closer.
         “Do you mean-“ Carlos smiled and nodded excitedly before he finished.
         “Yeah! I mean, it’s just like with a girl, I guess, but I figured it could be different with two gu-“ Logan placed two fingers to Carlos’ lips to cut him off. Carlos looked cross-eyed at Logan’s fingers, wondering what he was doing. The other boy turned his head towards the television, as if someone was watching, and Carlos did the same, trying to see if there was something there, grabbing Logan’s attention.
         Logan then leaned in close and whispered, “Don’t say anything about us here. I think someone has a spying device in that bear.” Carlos furrowed his brow incredulously and made a noise that sounded like “Huh” with Logan’s fingers still obstructing his mouth. Logan made a small gesture with his head towards the television, and Carlos turned his head.
         “Oh,” he whispers when Logan finally lowers his fingers from his mouth. There was a plain looking stuffed bear sitting on top of the television set. Now that his attention was brought to it, it seemed strangely out of place. Carlos got up and walked up to it. He stared at it for a bit, and then changed angles a few times to get different views of it. He couldn’t tell for sure, but there could definitely be something in it. What other business would a stuffed bear have being in the living room, anyway? Carlos started making goofy faces at the bear and chuckled a bit.
          After his fun, Carlos stepped back a bit. His gaze was still locked on the toy when he felt Logan’s hand (he knew exactly how Logan’s hands felt now) grab his and pull him in the direction of Logan’s room. Logan closed the door and threw his book to the side. He quickly took Carlos’ helmet off and it, too, joined the book to the side before Logan pulled him into a deep kiss.
         “And just to answer your question,” he began before kissing the shorter boy again, “don’t worry about it. It’ll probably just happen. Like this.” Carlos probably only heard every other word as he was becoming fully immersed in the feeling of Logan’s lips on his, the warmth of his breath, and the sensations caused by Logan’s roaming hands.
112131111211221111.title: A bit too conspicuous

1121311112112211111.content:
The next day, Kendall saw the bear sitting where he left it and quickly scooped it up. He looked around to see if Logan and Carlos were around. As far as he could tell, they weren’t home. He took the opportunity to hook the bear up to the TV and start watching whatever it captured. He fast forwarded past the parts where Logan and Carlos weren’t involved. The living room was mostly empty, so Kendall was beginning to think he shouldn’t hope for much. He should place the bear elsewhere next time. James came in as Kendall was watching, but he paid him no attention.
         “What’s that?” James asked, causing Kendall to jump.
         “Woah!” he exclaims. “Thought you were one of the other guys.”
         “Other guys?” he inquired. He took a seat next to his band mate.
         “Logan and Carlos. I’m investigating.”
          James turned his attention to the screen. “So you noticed something strange about them, too?”
         “Yup, so Katie let me borrow her spy bear thing.”
         James looked puzzled. “Why does Katie have a spy bear?”
         “Beats me,” Kendall said with a shrug. At that moment, something caught his attention on the screen, and he returned the video to normal playing speed. It was Logan! His excitement lessoned when he noticed he was just sitting there reading, but it quickly returned when he saw Carlos come in and hop on the couch. They greeted each other and sat there for a few moments.
         “Carlos is looking a bit, awkward,” Kendall commented.
         “And kinda… chunky,” James added.
         “Of course. All he does is eat all day.”
         “Yeah, what’s up with that?”
         “I don’t know, but he doesn’t care if he becomes a fat slob, that’s his issue.” Kendall’s tone caught James a bit off guard. It sounded a bit… cold. “No one will give him a second look if this keeps up.”
         “Wait, I think he’s saying something.”
         Both boys leaned forward when Carlos started talking. Was he asking for girl advice? Logan glanced directly at the camera, and then closed the distance between Carlos and himself. Logan said something and Carlos grew excited. He started talking again, but Logan stopped him with his hand, putting fingers to Carlos’ mouth before turning back to look directly at the camera and whispering something in Carlos’ ear.
         “Why does Logan keep looking at the camera?” James asked, “Does he know that it’s there?”
         “I’m not sure.“
         “Hey!” a voice very nearby called out. Both boys screamed and nearly jumped out of their skins. They turned around to see both Carlos and Logan leaning on the back of the couch behind them. “Who are those handsome guys on the TV?” Carlos continued. Both he and Logan were smiling, giving the other two the “busted” look.
         “Um, uh, hey guys!” Kendall began nervously. “I… didn’t think you’d be back so soon.” Carlos and Logan nodded slowly. Carlos then started to laugh and point at his own silly faces he made into the camera that previous day.
         “So, Carlos,” Logan said, tearing him from his amusement, “I’m guessing there was, indeed, a camera in that bear.”
         “It seemed so,” Carlos agreed. “But why would our friends want to spy on us?” Logan shrugged, and made an ‘I don’t know’ face. Kendall and James looked at each other several times in between Logan and Carlos’ amused and accusing stares.
         “It was Kendall’s idea!” James yelled out.
         “What!?” Before Kendall could say anymore, James had already bolted for the door. Of course, James was right about it being Kendall’s idea, but now it was just Kendall with egg on his face with the other two. He gave a nervous laugh before he, too, made a quick exit. Logan and Carlos simply watched as he literally flew out the door. They stood there, still leaning on the couch, before they started laughing.
         “Oh, wow.” Logan calmed himself a bit and said more seriously, “they’re getting suspicious. We need to be more careful.” Carlos nodded and Logan gave him an affectionate squeeze on the shoulder before heading into the kitchen. Once Logan had busied himself with something, Carlos turned back to the screen, looking a bit troubled. It was still playing. The living room in the video was empty, so that was most definitely the part where he and Logan were making out in the other room. He smiled inwardly, but his mood was still on the drop.
         Unbeknownst to the other two, Carlos had returned home when they were in the midst of talking about him. Logan came in a bit later, and didn’t hear what they had to say about Carlos’ recent gain. It was the latter of Kendall’s comment that hit him. No one will give him a second look if this keeps up. That statement reminded him of what Logan told him before their secret began, “as long as you remain at an acceptable limit.”
         Carlos lifted up his shirt and seriously inspected, for the first time in a while, the damage of his unleashed appetite. He no longer had just a bit of chub around the middle; he had a real belly going on. It was definitely bigger, and even with the shirt down, it was noticeable unless he really sucked it in. He put both his hands on its sides, and felt its softness and its round, smooth shape. He liked it, and he knew Logan did, too, but how much would be an “acceptable limit?” Would Logan stop liking him if he went too far and got too big?
         “Carlos, are you hungry?” Logan called from the kitchen. “I’m putting some chicken nuggets in the oven.” Carlos grew giddy.
         “Starving, actually!” He pulled his shirt down and went into the kitchen with Logan. His regular mood came back now that he was about to get some food, but in the back of his mind, Kendall’s comment still ate at him.
