11533111.content: Does Naruto get buff or get fat?
11533111.title: Naruto

115331111.content:
It was a quiet and peaceful afternoon in Hidden Leaf Village, no attackers at the gates, no ninjas fighting, the only sounds of commotion in the village could be heard from Zeroth Training Grounds. Sure enough, the source of which was young Naruto Shippuden training vigorously with the wooden and straw combat dummies. Shirtless, revealing his toned, muscle bound torso, wearing his trademark headband, and intensely focused, the young man delivered an impressive combo against one of the remaining straw dummies, finishing it by sending a chakra blast its' way, blowing it clean in half.

Finished, Naruto leaned back as the afternoon sun beat over his sweat glistened body, causing him to exhale exhausted as he grabbed a towel and wiped down. "Hehe, and that's why I'm the best," the blond said to himself as he finished wiping down. As he did, he stopped and sniffed himself, reeling back. "Whoa, talk about rank...I should probably fix that..."

So the young man headed over to the training grounds hot springs to bathe himself. Wearing only a towel and his headband, the boy stepped inside the warm water and bathed in peace. Unbeknownst to him, someone else had stepped into the area.

"Having fun?"

Startled, Naruto immediately stumbled, covering himself and hiding in the steam. As he looked up, sure enough, it was...
115331111.title: Training hard in Hidden Leaf Village

choices: Naruto continues to stuff himself after 12 bowls
1153311111.content:
Blushing profusely, the annoyed Naruto glanced up at on and off rival Sasuke then blurted out an angry, "What the hell are you doing here?!" Smirking, Sasuke said, "Well, I saw that you've actually been working rather hard as of late, and to congratulate you, I figured I'd treat you to that stupid ramen shop you like so much." Upon hearing the word ramen, Naruto's eyes lit up, as his anger and embarrassment were immediately replaced with excitement.

"You ARE hungry, right?" asked Sasuke. As if answering for him, Naruto's muscular bare stomach let out a vicious growl, causing Naruto to smirk with embarrassment as he rubbed the back of his head. Sasuke shrugged, then said, "Well, I'll be outside. Hurry up," then took his leave so Naruto could clean himself in peace.

After a little while, Naruto got dressed and headed out to Ramen Ichiraku with Sasuke. "So what's the occasion? Why are you being nice to me all of the sudden?" asked Naruto suspiciously. Sasuke simply smiled innocently and said, "No reason, I just figure it's easier if we all get along, rather than always going at each others throats. And what better way for us to get along than by me watching you eat twice your body weight in ramen?" he said, half jokingly as Naruto did tend to overdo it every time he had ramen.

As the two sat down and ordered, Naruto's stomach once again groaned impatiently. He rubbed it assuring and thought, "Don't worry, you'll get your fill soon enough." With that, ramen was served. Naruto sniffed the broth for a moment, and moaned in pleasure before taking his chopsticks and scarfing down his noodles at an inhuman pace. Sasuke simply watched in amazement. "I never realized before today just how fascinating it really is watching you eat," Sasuke said as he ate his ramen at a much slower rate.

Upon finishing his first bowl, Naruto was immediately greeted with a second, which he immediately began chowing down rapidly. After a little while, bowls upon bowls of ramen began to pile up. Sasuke was long since finished, but still watching Naruto continue to stuff his face with almost admiration, particularly just how much his stomach began to expand with each bowl.

After some time...
1153311111.title: An invite to Ramen Ichiraku

11533111112.content:
Finally, upon slurping down his 12th bowl, Naruto leaned back and sighed with satisfaction as he rested both hands atop his surprisingly bloated stomach. "Ahhhh, that tasted great. Thanks a bunch, Sasuke!" said Naruto. Sasuke simply nodded with a smile on his face, fixated on Naruto's ballooned belly. From simply sitting next to him, Sasuke could hear Naruto's extended stomach churning and working on his hearty meal.

"Most impressive, I have to say," said Sasuke, catching Naruto's attention.
"What is?" asked Naruto.
"You. I don't think I've ever really appreciated just how much you can actually make yourself put away, but seeing it today, really is quite remarkable."
"Ummm....thanks?"
"Seriously, not many people can push their body to these kinds of limits. If you think about it, it really is quite a talent."

Naruto glanced back, considering what Sasuke just said, then glanced back at his bloated middle, rubbing it contently before nodding, almost agreeing with him. "Yeah, I guess I can see that. That would explain why I can always beat Sai or Kiba at ramen eating contests, right?" Sasuke nodded and said, "Exactly, because they can't push themselves as far as you can." Shocked at hearing an actual complement from Sasuke, Naruto did a double take, and almost dropped his jaw. "I'm sorry, if I didn't know better, I'd say you just complemented me...."

*GGGGUUUUUUUURRRRRRGGGGGLLLLLE!*

Naruto stopped, then clutched his stomach, catching Sasuke's attention. "Something wrong?" he asked. Naruto was about to reply, but a rush of air worked its' way up his throat and out of his mouth.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!*

Naruto burped in his traditionally loud fashion, extending a few seconds before coming to a close. Blushing, Naruto rubbed the back of his head and grinned innocently before muttering "Eheheh, excuse me" quite sheepishly. Sasuke smirked then said, "Also quite impressive."

Once again, Naruto had to do a double take at the boy before asking, "Don't you usually get pissed whenever I burp like that?" asked a confused Naruto. Once again, Sasuke simply smirked and shrugged. "Like I said, I didn't have an appreciation for it at the time."
Naruto simply stared for a moment, then asked "...For my burping?"
"For you. It's taken me a little while to realize, but you're a rather impressive specimen, Naruto. You work hard, you fight hard, you eat hard. Everything you do, is to the max. Not many people ever bother to put 110% in every little thing they do, that's what I can't help but admire from you."
"Wow, that's...actually one of the nicest things anyone's ever said to me," responded Naruto, smiling cautiously at Sasuke.

After a while, Sasuke asked, "So, ready for round two?"
11533111112.title: Naruto takes a break

115331111121.content:
Before Naruto could protest, his ballooned belly gave yet another hungry groan, shutting Naruto up in advance as another batch of Ramen was cooked. Damn near salivating at the sheer smell of the broth, Naruto dug right in as Sasuke once again, simply watched. Hungrily, the boy scarfed down the noodles and promptly grabbed the edge of the bowl and slurped down the remainder of broth left behind and immediately moved onto the next bowl. Sasuke simply watched, still admiring Naruto's vastly expanding belly.

Upon finishing the second bowl in this second batch, Naruto leaned back in his seat, rubbing his quickly filling up stomach. Sasuke smirked and raised an eyebrow to the boy. "You're not quitting on me now, are you?" Naruto simply glanced back at Sasuke and scoffed. "Pfffft, dream on, it's just getting a little cramped inside," responded Naruto as he clutched his belly firmly.

Sasuke leaned in and patted Naruto's belly as he said, "Then perhaps you outta make some room." Unaware to Sasuke however, his patting has loosened some of the excess pressure cramping space in Naruto's tummy, forcing out a low but lengthy *uuuUUuuUuUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPppppp!* right in his face. Smiling with relief, Naruto thumped his gut and said, "Ahhh, goooood idea," then got back to work, as Sasuke was still almost dumbstruck from direct impact. "That was wonderful," Sasuke thought to himself as he maintained composure and resumed watching Naruto stuff himself further.

After some time, Naruto's belly had expanded a considerable amount, pushing his jacket and shirt to their limits. All that remained was one last bowl, which Naruto was on the verge of consuming, when out of nowhere, Sasuke placed his hand atop Naruto's bloated midsection, catching his attention. "Hey, what the hell are you doing?" asked Naruto. Sasuke smiled back and said, "Forgive me, but, I just want to feel it grow as it works on your next mouthful." Naruto pondered for a moment, then with a shrug, unzipped his orange jacket, and pulled his shirt up, exposing his bare bloated belly to Sasuke, whose eyes widened as soon as he saw his pale flesh. "Well, then you may as well feel the real deal, but if your hands are cold or dirty, I'm kicking your ass." Sasuke simply bit his lip and smiled as Naruto downed the last bowl.

Sasuke could feel the contents of Naruto's vastly bloated stomach slosh around as more of the noodles entered and expanded on it. Naruto's flesh was taut and soft, felt absolutely wonderful to the touch. Finally, Naruto had finished consuming what remained of his 24th bowl of ramen. He then leaned back, letting his gut protrude outward over his pants, as he sighed heartily.

".....So how do you feel, champ?" asked Sasuke. Naruto simply moaned as Sasuke could feel a violent churning emanate from Naruto's stomach as several gas bubbles worked their way up his throat and, of course; Naruto, being Naruto, opened his mouth wide and proud.

*bbbBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPP!*-*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRR RRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!*

A bassy two part belch immediately blasted from his lips and out to the surface, reeking of chicken broth. Sasuke took a whiff and chuckled. "I'll take that as you feeling pretty good right about now," said Sasuke. Naruto chuckled a bit exhausted, then...
115331111121.title: Let there be ramen!

choices: That belly rub made more room. Mind if I have more ramen?
I think I can call it a night. Can you help me get home?
1153311111211.content:
"Hey Sasuke, my belly hurts. It could use some rubbin'." Naruto indirectly asked Sasuke, expecting the latter to refuse and get angry with him. Sasuke, on the other hand, couldn't be more excited. He just played it off, saying, "I guess that's what team mates do!" Naruto was shocked by the response, and the fact that Sasuke was happy the entire time. He always remembered Sasuke sulking and complaining a lot, but something had changed in Sasuke. However, Naruto, being Naruto, didn't look that deeply, however, and he just enjoyed the fact that Sasuke was being nice to him.

Sasuke's hands now began to gingerly massage the taut flesh of Naruto's distended belly, causing Naruto to belch occasionally. "Oh yeah. *Uuuurrrrrpppp* That hit the spot!" Naruto sighed, causing Sasuke to smile warmly, his thoughts concentrated on how soft and smooth Naruto's belly was. Once Naruto's belly was beginning to loosen up, Sasuke began to knead Naruto's flesh more vigorously, and Naruto was practically kicking his leg, it felt so good.

After Sasuke finished, Naruto said, "Man! That felt GOOD! Where'd you learn to do that?" Sasuke coolly replied, "I guess it's just a skill you pick up." Naruto thanked Sasuke, saying "I never knew someone like you could be so nice." Sasuke was a bit annoyed, but he came to expect remarks like that from Naruto, so he just brushed it off. Meanwhile, Naruto said, "Hey Sasuke,..."
1153311111211.title: Time for a belly rub

11533111112111.content:
"I think that belly rub made some more room. Would you mind if I got a little more ramen?" asked Naruto. Much to Sasuke's surprise, the teen's already swollen midsection let out yet another audible rumble of hunger. Smirking, Sasuke called out for another order of ramen bowls to sate such a hunger.

Wasting no time, Naruto immediately began to slurp down his next bowl ramen at an impressively fast rate. Finishing up, Naruto licked his lips then placed the bowl aside before getting to work on another. Sasuke watched in utter awe. The boy's volleyball-sized stomach was already at its' maximum capacity, but somehow, it continued to expand ever so slightly with each bowl Naruto slurped down. Finishing up his fourth bowl, Naruto stacked the bowls up then leaned back and sighed in satisfaction. "Ahhh, that tasted great..." he said, patting his belly heartily.

"Full already?" asked Sasuke? Turning curiously, Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Huh? Yeah, well, not quite, but that's fine, I don't want to bankrupt you," responded Naruto as he chuckled sheepishly. Smiling, Sasuke patted Naruto's bloated gut in an assuring manner, causing it to jiggle just slightly, and said, "Nonsense. It's worth it to see what your real limits are. So don't worry. Eat until you can eat no more." Naruto's eyes widened at the notion.

Examining his swollen belly, he knew he was already pretty full, but how full did he REALLY want to be...?
11533111112111.title: Mind if I have more ramen?

choices: He didn't want to risk it, so he took Naruto home.
He should continue to encourage Naruto, just until his breaking point.
115331111121111.content:
Naruto ultimately decided that he owed it to Sasuke to eat as much as he possibly could, as Sasuke was blatantly asking him to eat as much as possible. He didn't want to disappoint Sasuke, as he finally got Sasuke to be nice to him somehow, and he didn't want it to stop. With this new drive, Naruto then took the next bowl, and he began to stuff even more ramen into his face, eating as if he wasn't this full.

Sasuke's eyebrows were raised, as he was genuinely impressed. Naruto was concentrating on the ramen, though, so he was completely ignorant to everything around him. Seeing that Naruto was trying so hard, and seeing that Naruto would probably not care anyway, Sasuke began to slowly rub Naruto's belly again, making sure to make as much room as possible. Sasuke was enjoying the feel of the hard, fleshy orb with a smooth surface, and he practically felt every inch of Naruto's abdomen, feeling gas escape occasionally, corresponding to a small belch between bites for Naruto.

Naruto grunted in thanks as he continued to eat the ramen more and more tentatively. With each passing bowl, Naruto's overfilled belly continued to stretch out slightly farther. Soon enough, Naruto stopped, and was close to giving up, the stretching of his belly beginning to become painful. Luckily, he had the Kyuubi's chakra, which expedited any healing, which included an overly stretched stomach. For most people, their stomachs probably would have burst, or at least they would have been close, but Naruto's stomach was able to stretch and heal much faster thanks to the Kyuubi.

Naruto said, "Thanks for that." to Sasuke, who was still gingerly massaging Naruto's massive stomach, which was now as tight as a drum. Naruto took about five minutes to recover, and he was actually having a normal conversation with Sasuke. Either way, as he talked to Naruto, Sasuke thought about the situation, and he decided that...
115331111121111.title: Enduring

choices: Naruto finishes the remaining bowls (with some help from Sasuke)
Naruto tries, but it's eventually too much
1153311111211112.content:
"So how are you feeling?" asked Sasuke as his hand continued to slowly rub across Naruto's distended and stiff belly in a slow, circular motion, causing the young blond to coo with delight before turning to Sasuke with a relaxed smile on his face and saying, "Extremely relaxed, thanks to those little miracle workers you call fingers..."

Sasuke smirked as he continued to rub across the other teens midsection. His hand then reached the middle of Naruto's belly and patted it gently, then asked "Think you got any more room left?" A look of uncertainty grew across Naruto's face.
"I'm actually starting to feel pretty full..."
"I imagine you would. Still, it's just a little more, right? I'm sure someone like you can stomach the challenge."
"Ehhhh, I dunno...."

As if to 'persuade' Naruto, Sasuke began to knead at Naruto's gut in a massaging manner, causing the boy immense comfort and relaxation as he seemed to go limp like putty. "Ohhh man, that feels amazing...tell you what, keep doing that, and I outta be able to do the rest."
"Hehe, sounds like a plan."

And so, Naruto moved onto one final batch of ramen. Though he found slurping down this next bowl a challenge, Sasuke's massaging touch gave him just enough ease to sluggishly consume the noodles. Gulping down a hearty mouthful, Naruto took a deep breath, and powered through the rest, eventually slurping it all down shortly after, if at least slower than before. Doing so however, caused his continuously expanding stomach immense discomfort as he groaned in pain and clutched his aching belly with both hands. "Ugh, my stomach...."

Springing into action, Sasuke recognized the problem and immediately rectified it as best he could. "Feels like there's a considerable amount of excess pressure building up right now. This should help a little bit." With those last words, Sasuke pressed down atop Naruto's sore stomach with just the right amount of pressure, resulting in Naruto letting out a loud, drawn out belch for a good few seconds straight. When it ended, Naruto sighed with relief. "Ohh *URP* man, that felt good ....thanks Sasuke!"
"My pleasure. There's only a few bowls left, think you can manage?"
"Guess we'll find out..."
1153311111211112.title: Continued to encourage Naruto, to his fullest.

choices: "Of course! You've exerted yourself more than enough!"
"Why don't I take you to my apartment? It's a much shorter walk from here."
11533111112111121.content:
These last few bowls felt like the longest bowls in Naruto's life. With each passing bite, Naruto's stomach stretched out even more, becoming slowly more taut. Naruto grudgingly ate each new bite, swallowing the mouthful with difficulty. Sasuke was shocked by the amount that Naruto was pushing himself. His determination was truly something to be admired.

Naruto was very thankful for Sasuke's help, as he was sure he would have given up long ago without Sasuke's relaxing massages. He would belch occasionally due to Sasuke's massages working out gas, and each time he did was an immense relief. Sasuke concentrated on the precision of his moves, focusing greatly to ensure that he didn't screw up and make Naruto puke.

He continued to gently work his hands across Naruto's belly, rubbing gingerly, and feeling for gas pockets, which he would carefully work out. Feeling the taut orb of flesh and it's velvety smoothness was almost too much for Sasuke, but he knew that there would be a greater reward for it later.

Faster than either of them expected, Naruto finished slurping the last of his broth, belching a bit afterwards. He then said to Sasuke, "How's that for my limit!" At that rhetorical question, Sasuke chuckled, saying, "You continue to amaze me Naruto, even in eating." Naruto smiled, despite that he felt like he was about to puke. Sasuke sensed this, though, and decided not to prod him any more.

Either way, Naruto asked Sasuke, though a bit weakly, "Can you help me get home? I usually can't walk very much when I eat like this." Sasuke nodded, saying...
11533111112111121.title: A glorious finish

choices: "My belly still kind of hurts, think you can rub it a little longer?"
"Ah, nevermind.  See you in the moring."
115331111121111212.content:
"Hmm, y'know, it's pretty late. If you want, you just stay over at my apartment for the night? Afterall, it's a much shorter walk from here." Sasuke noted. Naruto paused for a moment and considered the idea, when suddenly his ridiculously bloated stomach gurgled audibly, causing him to wince with discomfort and clutch it in an effort to calm it down. "Ugh, yeah, that sounds like a good idea..." said Naruto. And so, Sasuke helped the stuffed blond up and together, the two headed out.

Opening the door, Sasuke stepped back as Naruto immediately stumbled forward and plopped onto Sasuke's couch, groaning lazily as his belly seeped outward on his lap. "Ohhhh man, that was a pain. I can't even imagine how much worse it would have been trying to get to my apartment from there..." said Naruto weakly.

Sasuke smirked and sat himself down next to Naruto. "Yeah, well, like with all things, you found a way, right?"
"Ugh, barely. Anyway, thanks for all that, Sasuke. That was a hell of a meal!" he said, patting his belly for emphasis. "And thanks for all your help back there too. I wouldn't have gotten anywhere near as far as I did if you hadn't helped and encouraged me all the way on," Naruto added.

"My pleasure. I was just glad I could bare witness to such a display of strength in both body and will."
"Well, my body...err, well, I guess my stomach could only take on so much because your encouragement gave me the will to push myself."

Smiling, Sasuke nodded and patted Naruto's belly lightly. "Glad I could help," he said, then paused for a moment as he felt Naruto's bare flesh beneath his fingers. After a moment, he could feel it was still a little tight, and so he massaged and kneaded those parts of Naruto's expansive belly for a few minutes, making Naruto moan with delight and comfort. "Goodness, I still can't believe you managed to consume so much...." Sasuke added. Smirking, Naruto said, "Yeah, I don't think the ramen cooks could believe it either."

The two chuckled in unison briefly, something they hadn't done before. After a moment of silence, Sasuke checked the clock and said, "Well, it's getting quite late, so I think I'll call it a night. You can sleep on the couch, but if you'd like, I can bring some spare sheets in case it gets cold."
"Oh, no I'm cool, thanks anyway though."

Nodding Sasuke got up from the couch and headed towards his room. Until,

"Hey, Sasuke?"
"Hmm?"
"I was wondering..."
115331111121111212.title: Off to Sasuke's apartment

choices: Sasuke woke up first, and began making a "little" breakfast for Naruto.
Naruto woke up first, and wanted to go work his huge meal off.
1153311111211112121.content:
Naruto was giving his best puppy dog eyes, but Sasuke didn't really need a reason to come back and rub Naruto's belly more, so he made his way back to Naruto, saying, "Anything to make you feel better."

"Thanks Sasuke!" Naruto exclaimed with a bright grin on his face. His grin was quite contagious, as Sasuke soon began smiling warmly as he sat back down next to Naruto, focusing on running his hands across the heavy appendage. Naruto nearly moaned at the amazing feeling, and he practically began melting, occasionally saying, "Ooh, that hit the spot." or something like, "That feels so much better."

His stomach had already settled for the most part, so he didn't really burp at all. Really, he didn't need another belly rub at the moment. He just really wanted to feel the amazing sensation again. Little dd he know that Sasuke was just as happy about rubbing his belly as he was.

Either way, Sasuke focused so much on the enticing orb on Naruto's lap that he didn't even realize that Naruto was falling asleep. He was to busy enjoying the feeling of Naruto's stomach as it slowly began to relax more and more, going from taut to slightly wobbly and firm, to very wobbly and slightly malleable.

It didn't take long before Naruto was out cold, and he began snoring loudly once he was. Sasuke heard the first snore, and was a bit startled as it broke his focus. Once he did discover that Naruto was asleep, however, he tore himself from the enticingly swollen sphere on Naruto's lap, and he smiled again, softly laying Naruto down on the couch before lightly patting his forehead, whispering, "Enjoy your feasts, Naruto. There are plenty more coming!"

He then swiftly and silently strode to the doorway, turning back to get once more glance, seeing that Naruto had already hung his arm and leg haphazardly off the couch. Everything was going perfectly for Sasuke. Naruto was almost like a goofy little brother to Sasuke, or maybe even something more. Either way, Sasuke was very pleased, and he laid in his bed, falling asleep much faster than he normally did.

The next morning...
1153311111211112121.title: More belly rubs

11533111112111121211.content:
Night turned to day, and though it was well into morning, Naruto was still in a deep sleep, occasionally snoring. Suddenly, a sizzling aroma caught his nose, slowly waking him from his food induced slumber. Naruto's eyes flickered open as he sat up and turned towards the kitchen. Much to his surprise, Sasuke was already wide awake, and cooking what appeared to be a breakfast for a family of twelve. "Sasuke...?" said Naruto as he groggily rubbed his eyes.

"Morning, sunshine," responded Sasuke as he poured more batter into a frying pan. Looking down, Naruto placed his hand atop his no longer swollen middle. Thanks his fast metabolism, his massive ramen meal from last night had been all but digested and worked down, leaving onto a tiny layer of pudge atop the young man's stomach, otherwise completely unnoticeable. "Wow, can't believe I actually managed to digest all of that.." he said with astonishment. Turning his attention back to Sasuke, he rose from the couch and approached his teammate.

"What's all this?" Naruto asked.
"Oh, just a little breakfast to kick off the day." responded Sasuke.
"....A little....?"
"Hehe, well, to someone who can stomach it, I suppose."

Chuckling, Naruto got the message, then went wide eyed as he examined the various stack of plates piled onto the dining table. Scrambled eggs, a mountain of bacon, pancakes covered in syrup, rice balls, and buttered toast, as far as the eye could see. The mere sight of such a vast feast made Naruto's mouth water with anticipation. Noticing this, Sasuke smirked and said, "Hope you're not TOO full from last night."

As if to refute his point, Naruto's stomach growled hungrily, causing Naruto to grin sheepishly as he rubbed the back of his head with slight embarrassment. "Ohhh, I think we'll be fine on that front."

Naruto washed up, and the two sat to breakfast. Sasuke poured Naruto a cup of milk and served himself a modest plate of bacon and eggs, while Naruto; overwhelmed by the surplus of choices, stacked whatever he could on his plate, immediately going for his fork and knife as he eyed his breakfast hungrily. "Bon appetite," said Sasuke as he slowly bit into his breakfast, eyes completely fixated on Naruto, who immediately began to inhale is breakfast at a record pace, as though he hadn't eaten in months...
11533111112111121211.title: Sasuke was making a "little" breakfast for Naruto

choices: Do you have somethin' to drink?
I could use another belly rub!
115331111121111212111.content:
Sasuke wasn't even done with his own plate by the time that Naruto had finished his plate, which had at least twice as much food. Naruto's blinding speed in his eating still left him in awe, and as he finished his plate, satisfying his own hunger, he switched his primary focus to Naruto, who was well into his second massive plate.

Naruto was completely oblivious to the fact that Sasuke was now observing him, as he was too busy contentedly stuffing his face, enjoying the meal that Sasuke had provided, which was actually very tasted. Naruto was surprised by how delicious Sasuke's food was.

Either way, he scarfed down the food greedily, much to Sasuke's delight. Sasuke watched as the piles of food that he made slowly but surely shrinked disappearing in Naruto's ravenous maw, ending up his stomach, which was now beginning to become noticeable, only making Sasuke more excited. At this point, he gradually began to lose momentum, his stomach filled.

Naruto was still as tenacious as ever, however, and he completely ignored his fullness, pushing to keep up the pace to impress Sasuke more. This seemed to be the key to keeping Sasuke happy, so he didn't want to stop until he was beyond stuffed. The best part was that he loved being beyond stuffed. He usually made sure to not to stuff himself too much, as he would run out of money, and he might have more difficulties staying physically active, but now he was less concerned. Something about Sasuke's encouragement took away any semblance of guilt that Naruto felt.

Either way, Naruto stopped quite suddenly, surprising Sasuke, who was busy watching the progress of Naruto's belly, which now began pressing on his shirt enough to begin lifting it. Sasuke was about to ask why Naruto stopped so suddenly, but Naruto blurted out, "Hey Sasuke!..."
115331111121111212111.title: Going back for more

choices: Combined with Sasuke's belly rub, the results were explosive...
Which caused his belly to bloat out even more
1153311111211112121111.content:
"-Yes, Naruto?" Sasuke responded quickly with great anticipation.
"Do you have somethin' to drink?"
"Oh," he said with a little less enthusiasm, "y-yes, what are you in the mood for? Milk? Juice?"
"Actually, I was thinking something along the lines of cola or somethin'."

Sasuke stared blank eyed for a moment, then asked, "Cola this early?" Smiling, Naruto nodded and said, "Yup! I know it seems weird, but cola actually really helps when I'm eating a lot. Like, whenever I start to feel really full and incapable of eating another bite, I drink a little soda, then let fly a huge burp, and sure enough, I can eat some more! And..." Naruto added, giving Sasuke a kind of 'well, y'know' look, "...last night, those magic fingers of yours alleviating all that pressure and easing my stomach muscles was probably the only reason I managed to put away as much as I did. Imagine how effective it could be if we combined it with a little cola in the mix. There's no way I couldn't finish any meal with such a combo!" Doing his best to hide his excitement, Sasuke smiled and immediately took out a gallon of cola he had stored in his fridge which he promptly poured into a cup for Naruto.

Still not quite feeling full, Naruto simply continued to scarf down his immense breakfast. The more he ate, the further out his stomach distended. Gradually, it began to push outward, lifting up the bottom of his t-shirt, exposing his bare stomach, just below his bellybutton. Simply staring at his exposed flesh, Sasuke could already picture how taut and soft his flesh would likely begin to feel around this point.

More time passed, and more of Sasuke's massive pile of breakfast was deposited straight into Naruto's gullet, which had now pushed out so far, that his t-shirt rose completely up, exposing his bloated belly now pushing outward like a basketball.

Sure enough, Naruto's pace began to slow down. Sasuke took a glance at his face, and knew that he was starting to feel a little stuffed. "Oh man, don't think I've ever had that many flapjacks before..." Naruto started, before glancing back at Sasuke and smirking back at him. "Would you do the honors?" Rubbing his palms together, Sasuke smiled back and said, "I thought you'd never ask."

Immediately, he placed both hands atop Naruto's distended stomach and began working his magic. Naruto shut his eyes as a wide smile grew across his face. Sasuke's fingers circulating across his taut flesh never felt better. He could already feel the tightness in his stomach loosening up.

The experience was doubly enjoyable for Sasuke. The feeling of Naruto's expanded belly in his hand, reacting to his every massaging movement, softening and becoming like warm putty in his gentle hands. It was a little slice of heaven for both of them.

Then Naruto took a sip of his cola...
1153311111211112121111.title: Sasuke pours Naruto a cup of cola

choices: Cooking more food, as he was about to run out.
11533111112111121211111.content:
Soon enough, Naruto belched a belch that nearly knocked Sasuke over. The final pocket of gas that Sasuke freed and the gas from the soda both escaped simultaneously, causing such a massive belch.

Sasuke was quite impressed, and Naruto felt so much better now that his stomach was relaxed. In fact, now that he saw all of the delicious food in front of him, his stomach even growled a bit, causing Sasuke to smile widely. Naruto then grinned at Sasuke before he stopped using his plate, opting instead for the platters that Sasuke had served his breakfast on, as he began pulling the platter of eggs towards himself, and Sasuke helped, pushing the other platters in front of Naruto.

Now Naruto had a smorgasbord in front of him, and he was more than ready to begin stuffing again. Soon enough, he was stuffing food in his face just as quickly as before, astounding Sasuke with his speed and heft. As he ate, his t-shirt began to slowly rise up, exposing more and more of his flesh. Also as he ate, he occasionally took a swig of cola, then a massive "UUUURRRPP" was released, shaking his stomach, and shrinking it ever so slightly, only making more room in his stomach, causing him to gain a small burst in speed afterwards.

Sasuke merely watched, amazed as Naruto continued to stuff his face, the piles of food shrinking, and his stomach growing. Within ten more minutes, Naruto's stomach was large enough to lift his shirt to the point where his naval was exposed to the world. Naruto was again beginning to slow down at this point, and he began to focus more on the cola, leading to more belching.

At this point, Sasuke began intervening by...
11533111112111121211111.title: Explosive results

choices: Resumed watching Naruto stuff his face.
Actaully felt kind of hungry, and decided to eat alongside Naruto.
115331111121111212111111.content:
"Wow, you plowed through that breakfast a lot sooner than I expected you would! No matter, there's still a little bit left. You can work on that while I get to cooking up some more bacon and sausage," explained Sasuke as he got up and prepared to cook up more waves of food for Naruto to conquer. "Sounds like a plan. If you don't mind though, I'm just gonna spend a few minutes relieving as much pressure in my belly as I can before then," responded Naruto.
"Oh, I don't mind at all. Go right ahead."

Smirking, Naruto grabbed his cola and immediately began downing it straight from the bottle as Sasuke began to fry up some sausage over his oven. Pulling the bottle from his lips, Naruto took a deep breath, and pushed out a loud, drawn out belch which shook his belly, making it jiggle a bit and echoed throughout Sasuke's small apartment, causing Naruto to laugh at his gassy eruption, and Sasuke to smirk with amusement as he continued to prepare the next course of breakfast. "Whew, that was LOUD!" laughed Naruto as he patted his bloated belly with apparent pride as he continued to drink more cola. Sasuke had finished with the sausage, and began to stack up a sizable pile atop a plate, and got to work on sizzling up as much bacon as he could fit on his pan.

Naruto spent a little while taking big drinks, and letting out pretty quick and decent belches almost immediately afterward. It amazed Sasuke how Naruto could just push one out after another like that and not make himself dizzy or sick. It was quite a display to behold, in truth.

However, Naruto wasn't making anywhere near enough room for the next onslaught of food, so he decided to take it up a notch and began chugging his cola profusely from the bottle. After a little while, Naruto stopped chugging, and greatly from drinking so much at once, which also caused his eyes to water slightly from the intense carbonation. He then let out a quick but wet burp, then a sudden look of slight discomfort and immense focus grew over his face as he held his hand forward to get Sasuke's attention. "Oh, wait wait! I feel a big one coming up," warned Naruto, just seconds before he pounded his open palm into his chest.

*BBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPP!*

A thunderous and lengthy belch exploded from Naruto's mouth and carried on for several seconds straight, carrying with it, the scent of the immense first wave of breakfast Naruto had consumed. When it finally drew to an end, Naruto sighed with immense relief and rubbed his bloated gut affectionately, then said, "Y'know, *URP* these are some pretty good ones. But it's still way more of a relief when you help."
"It is?"
"Hell yeah it is! I get WAY more gas out when you're pushing it out as carefully as you do. And the way it feels when you rub my belly...I can't even describe it, man..."
Sasuke couldn't help but blush at the complement, but he quickly regained composure before Naruto could catch it, and proceeded to finish prepping the bacon. "Well, thanks. I'm just happy it helps. I'd help now, but these hands are a bit occupied at the moment."
"Oh no, it's cool. I think I'm all burped out for the time being anyway. That last one made tons of room," he said as he gave his slightly less bloated belly an assuring thump, still causing it to ripple from the motion.
"Well, whenever you need further assistance, just say the word," said Sasuke, still masking his eagerness as he stacked up the bacon on a separate plate. He then carried both plates and placed them down atop the table.

"You know it, man. Speaking of which, y'know what's odd?"
Sasuke shook his head as Naruto smirked to himself, and continued, "You know that I've always kinda been a burping maniac. But in all our time working, fighting or just hanging out together, I don't think I've ever seen YOU burp before."
"Oh, really? Well, it's not THAT strange, is it?"
"I dunno, man. I mean, everyone else does it. Kiba's a belching maniac, Sai can let out some pretty good ones, even Sakura if you can believe it!" said Naruto with a laugh, legitimately surprising Sasuke as he could never imagine such a girly girl like Sakura doing something so 'unladylike.' Finally, he said with some embarrassment, "Well, the honest truth is...I don't really know how..."

Wide eyed, Naruto shook his head and grabbed a glass, his big, bloated belly sloshing and jiggling all the way. "Okay, now THAT can't stand," he said as he filled the cup with cola and handed it to Sasuke. "Drink up."
"Naruto, I really don't think-"
"Don't think, just drink."

Taking the glass, Sasuke glanced for a moment, a bit uneasily, then sipped at the fizzy liquid. "ALL the way," said Naruto, making Sasuke grimace slightly before eventually gulping down the rest of it in one hearty go. Sasuke wasn't used to chugging too much of anything, let alone soda, and the surplus of so much carbonation at once wasn't sitting right in his stomach. "Ugh, Naruto, I feel a little weird..." said Sasuke as he grasped his thin stomach in discomfort. Naruto nodded, then explained, "That's just the gas building up. If you wanna let it out, all you gotta do is gulp down a bunch of air and push it out of your stomach. Like so!" To demonstrate, Naruto gulped down a considerable amount of air, and after a moment, he bopped his head forward and pushed out a quick, but audible belch. "Now, you try."

It's times like this where Sasuke really wished Naruto used his words a bit more coherently. He swallowed air, but all it did was make him feel even sicker. "Naruto, I don't think this is working..." he said with more discomfort in his voice. Suddenly, it clicked for Naruto. "Hold the phone, that's it! We were just talking about how great you were at helping me to burp the gas out of my belly. Just do the same thing you do with me!"

Sasuke thought about it for a moment, and figured it was worth a try. So applying a similar method that he would do with Naruto, Sasuke began to rub his own stomach tenderly, easing the pain a bit and feeling around for the gas pocket that was causing so much discomfort. Granted, his stomach was still its' normal, perfectly toned size, but it felt just slightly bloated from the pressure building, which made it easier to eventually find the gas pocket that was causing his abdomen so much discomfort. "Here goes nothing..." he thought to himself nervously, and then, he pressed against his abs firmly.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPP!!!*

Sasuke's eyes widened as a massive, lengthy belch, unheard of from the young man, bursted out of his mouth like a fireball for several, loud seconds. Naruto burst into a fit of controllable laughter as he held his distended sides and laughed himself to tears. When it finally ended, Sasuke's face was flushed with embarrassment as he covered his mouth, still shocked that he could produce such noises. Finally, Naruto wiped the tears from his face, still giggling and said, "Damn, man! I didn't know you had it in you!"
"Get in line..." Sasuke said, still in a bit of shock.

As Sasuke sat there, processing, Naruto sat back at the table and began getting to work on the massive piles of food laid before him. After a while, a small smirk grew over Sasuke's face. That actually felt kind of good to him.

He then glanced back at the table, and...
115331111121111212111111.title: Cooking more food, as he was about to run out.

choices: Still some gas left to be belly rubbed away.
115331111121111212111112.content:
Pouring himself another cup of cola, Naruto leaned back and took a hearty few gulps of his carbonated beverage, causing his already bloated belly to distend outward further just slightly. Putting his cup back down on the table, Naruto sighed, then after a moment, clutched his gut with one hand as his mouth flung open. A fairly audible but lackluster burp emitted from Naruto's mouth. Sasuke stared curiously, "Something wrong?" he asked.

A look of discomfort grew over Naruto's face as he thumped his surprisingly still toned chest with his fist a few times, forcing out an even smaller and weaker belch. Naruto groaned in frustration and mild discomfort. "Ah crap," Naruto started as he caressed his stomach slightly, "I got a burp brewing, but it's stuck or something! Would you mind?"
"Do you even need to ask?"

Sasuke carefully planted his hands atop Naruto's bare belly and began to rub away once again. The feel of Sasuke's hand running slow circular motions up and down his bare stomach caused Naruto immense comfort as a wide smile grew over his face.

As Sasuke rubbed away, he felt around, trying to find the gas pocket in question that was causing his friend such discomfort. After a moment, he found a spot where Naruto's stomach felt as though it was rumbling slightly. "Aha, there it is." Said Sasuke as he began to massage this section of Naruto's stomach slightly then clutched it firmly. "Sometimes, you just need to apply a little more pressure to get the job done. Like so."

Sasuke pressed down on Naruto's upper belly firmly, and began to knead at it slightly, causing Naruto's gut to churn and rumble loudly, until finally...

*BBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!*

A massive and lengthy belch rushed up Naruto's throat and out his mouth, carrying on several, audible seconds straight, once again causing his belly to deflate slightly from the expulsion of so much gas exiting Naruto's stomach at once. This one lasted even longer than his previous eruptions, and was considerably louder. Neither Sasuke nor Naruto himself realized such noises could erupt from a person.

Finally, after his burp drew to a close, Naruto sighed with immense relief and leaned back in his chair, letting out a smaller burp afterward. "Goodness, that was a big one, Naruto!" said Sasuke, as he patted Naruto's belly proudly. Naruto smiled weakly as a smaller burp escaped his lips. "Whew, remind me to-*URP*-ugh, give you a call next time Kiba challenges me to a burping contest!" responded Naruto, causing both boys to laugh.

"So, shall we continue?" asked Sasuke.
115331111121111212111112.title: Rubbing Naruto's belly again.

choices: Do you have anything else to eat?
Can I stay here for a while? I can't make it home with this belly.
1153311111211112121111121.content:
Sasuke got his answer, as Naruto didn't need to be told twice before he began digging in to his food again. He wasn't quite as vivacious as when he began, as he had eaten quite a lot already, but he still ate with much more vigor than anyone would at that point. Sasuke smiled in approval as Naruto stuffed himself, excited that he had such an eager subject.

Sasuke was beginning to fall into a trance as he watched Naruto's belly. It very gradually grew with each bite or gulp of cola, and with every movement Naruto made, it jiggled a bit, wobbling around in response to the motion. The motions were very mesmerizing to Sasuke, and he couldn't help but stare. Naruto didn't really mind. In fact, he barely noticed that Sasuke was staring at his belly.

As Naruto ate more of the breakfast, he began to feel pains in his stomach again, causing him to slow down. Sasuke's trance was broken by the sudden motion of Naruto's arm, which was pointing at his belly. Sasuke got the message, and he gladly began to massage the fleshy orb.

At this point, it was taut again, and it wobbled at the slightest touch. Sasuke was careful and gently, scanning for gas pockets as usual. He would work out the gas pockets, causing Naruto to belch, then sigh, before he went right back into the fray.

This system worked for quite a while, as Naruto was able to finish a considerable amount of the meal that he was presented with. By this time, his stomach was nearly as large as it was with yesterday's binge. Naruto was now feeling a different discomfort, and it was clear that he was, as he slowed down considerably. Sasuke thought that he was doing a good job with the belly rub, so he thought Naruto was getting full.

Soon, to Sasuke's surprise, Naruto stopped. He then began trying to push his belly in so that he could unbutton his pants. At that point, Sasuke realized that Naruto wasn't getting full. His belly was merely being restricted by his pants button. Sasuke went to help him, pushing his belly in so he could unbutton his pants. Once the button was undone, Naruto's belly surged outward a good inch, loosening a bit, and even freeing up a decent belch, which quickly and loudly escaped Naruto's mouth.

"Thanks Sasuke! That feels soooo much better!" Naruto practically blurted out, with Sasuke responding with a mere "No problem." before he smiled, saying, "There's only a bit left. Do you think you can finish it?"

Naruto took that as a challenge, asserting "Of course I can! I ate all that ramen last night!" before he went back to the food, determined to prove to Sasuke that he could handle all the breakfast.

Sasuke was amazed with Naruto's determination, and he was taken aback by the speed of Naruto's eating, especially given the fact that he had eaten so much already. He then went back to rubbing Naruto's belly, still astounded by Naruto's endurance. In less than ten minutes, Naruto was finally finished, ending with a final loud belch, grinning widely at his accomplishment, patting his overstuffed stomach, which was the nearly the size of a small beach ball.

Sasuke began to clear the table, and Naruto said, "Hey Sasuke..."
1153311111211112121111121.title: Back to the feast!

choices: A familiar look of discomfort grew over Naruto's face
Naruto finished the ribs at a record pace
11533111112111121211111211.content:
"That was a great breakfast, thanks so much!" said Naruto as he happily rubbed his bloated belly. Smiling back, Sasuke nodded and said, "Anytime."
"Well, funny you bring that up, because I was wondering...do you have anything else to eat?" Sasuke almost did a double take upon hearing that. Eyebrows raised, he responded with, "You actually have room?" Smirking, Naruto slapped his bare rounded belly, causing it to jiggle slightly as a result and said, "To the absolute limit, right?" Sasuke was quite surprised to hear him say that, as his stomach had already neared its' size from yesterday night. He was unsure where this new found vigor was coming from, but if it meant watching Naruto continue to push himself and his gut to the limit, far be it for him to complain.

"Well, if you put it that way, Kiba actually dropped something off the other day," said Sasuke as he headed towards his fridge and hauled out a surprisingly large platter of bbq ribs, which he promptly warmed up in his oven for a moment. "Whoa...Kiba actually gave away food?!" said Naruto, stunned at his often gluttonous friends display of generosity. "Indeed. Unfortunately, I'm not a big fan of ribs, but couldn't tell him that because I didn't want to seem ungrateful or insult him. Luckily, there's someone here who DOES have an appreciation for ribs," hinted Sasuke as he took the ribs out and gently placed the platter before Naruto, causing him to smile toothily at his next edible conquest. Then, much to Sasuke's surprise, the young blond's protruding stomach let out a hungry growl, apparently as eager as Naruto to resume their seemingly endless morning feast.

Wasting no time, Naruto immediately grabbed a slab of ribs and tore into the meat with his teeth and bare hands. Sasuke couldn't help but chuckle slightly as Naruto tore chunks of meat from the bones and chewed heartily on it like an animal. Normally, he found such piggish behavior revolting, but for some reason, that wasn't the case with Naruto, who continued to gulp down more and more meat, stacking up the bones in a pile on the side of his platter.

And with each hefty chunk of meat consumed, Sasuke watched as Naruto's belly would expand outward more and more. His t-shirt had risen just below his pecks, exposing his bloated belly to all the world as it continued to grow and grow with all he was consuming.

Finishing a few rib racks, Naruto licked the sauce from his lips and fingers, and placed the bones aside as he leaned back and rested one hand atop his bloated gut. "Mmmm. Been a while since I've eaten ribs this good!" said Naruto. Sasuke, still utterly fixated on how far Naruto's stomach had distended, was just waiting for Naruto to call for his assistance to finish eating. Really anything to able to feel Naruto's taut gut in his hands, but Naruto seemed to get along just fine as he immediately began to tear into more of the rib meat shortly after.

That is until...
11533111112111121211111211.title: Do you have anything else to eat?

choices: "I think I'm done for the morning."
"Are you kidding? I still have some room!"
115331111121111212111112111.content:
Sasuke immediately understood when that look of discomfort appeared on Naruto's face. He therefore walked up to Naruto, then he placed his hands on the latter's belly, feeling just how taut it was. Soon enough, as Naruto belched, he worked out gas bubbles and helped relax the massive orb of food-filled flesh.

Naruto practically purred as Sasuke did this, his mouth hanging open as he stopped eating, enjoying the sudden relief of pressure that came with the relaxing massage. Sasuke then stopped rubbing, as Naruto's belly was now more loose and flexible again.

This broke Naruto from his trance, and he soon realized that he was supposed to be eating. Not wanting to disappoint Sasuke, Naruto went straight back to the food, ripping off chunks of meat with gusto.

His face was becoming more and more covered by sauce as the plate of ribs became closer and closer to empty, Naruto's giant belly getting just a bit larger with every single bite.

Now, the final stretch was in sight, only causing Naruto to want to go faster to finish. There was only a half of a rack of ribs left. Now, instead of tearing off individual ribs, Naruto opted to take the entire half rack, eating each rib horizontally by eating the meat to the bone, then taking out the bone, eating the next area of meat between bones.

This method made his eating even faster, and in less than five minutes, he had finished the last of the racks, leaving behind a pile of bones and a massive belch that shook his bloated belly.

"Man, Kiba can sure make a good rack of ribs!" Naruto exclaimed, as he genuinely enjoyed the delicious, barbecue-laden meat, surprised that Kiba of all people could cook so well.

After that, Sasuke asked, "So Naruto, do you think that satisfied you yet?" Naruto then responded by saying...
115331111121111212111112111.title: Back to belly rubs

choices: Naruto consumes several plates of salmon
The surplus of seasons and garlic give the already stuffed Naruto heartburn
1153311111211112121111121112.content:
"Are you kidding? I still have some room left!"
"You're certain? Because I would hate for you to get sick."

Smirking, Naruto waved his hand dismissively and said, "Trust me, whatever is dished my way, I can take!" He gave his large belly a hearty slap for emphasis, causing it to jiggle a bit. Glancing down, Sasuke had noticed that Naruto's sizable stomach had increased considerably after consuming Kiba's BBQ ribs. From a small beachball, it seemed to continue to expand outward, to the point where it began to rest slightly atop Naruto's thighs. His flesh appeared stretched and strained from the tightness that came from consuming so much food. Sasuke was almost entranced as his belly almost glistened in all its' perfect, smooth and round form. That is, until it emitted an audible groan.

Naruto smiled cheesily as Sasuke laughed and patted Naruto's stomach in an effort to calm it down slightly. "Okay, okay. Let's see what else we've got to sate your ravenous hunger," responded Sasuke as he did a little looking around in the kitchen.

"There's something kind of liberating about all this, isn't there?" Sasuke stopped as he heard Naruto's remark and turned curiously to the boy, then asked "What do you mean?"
"Think about it..." Naruto started, "we spend so much time fighting, training, and fighting some more. It's not often that we just get to kick back and say 'damn the rules and damn limitations.' It's just...nice to know that we can have that kinda freedom."
"Not to mention how far one's endurance allows them to go. It's, unlike anything I've ever seen."
"Well, thanks. That means a lot. So does all the encouragement....and of course, the cooking," responded Naruto as he chuckled and brushed the back of his head. Sasuke smiled and nodded, "Anytime. And speaking of cooking..."

Sasuke pulled out a tray from his fridge and unwrapped the foil, revealing seasoned salmon, which he promptly warmed up. "I just remembered that I was cooking this yesterday morning. Smoked salmon with lemon and garlic peppered seasoning."

Just the mere description was making Naruto's mouth water. "Usually, I cook dishes like this to last me a few days. But I usually find myself hungering for something else after a little while and so I end up never really finishing the whole thing. Somehow, I don't think you'll have that problem." The fish was nearly done waring up, as the zesty aroma filled Naruto's nostrils as he began rubbing his extended stomach eagerly, and licking his lips. "Oh man, I don't think I'll have that problem either..."

All warmed up and ready to go. Sasuke grabbed a spatula and placed the tray down on the table before Naruto, and handed him a plate and fork. "It's all yours," Sasuke said with a hint of eagerness. Even if Naruto had eaten his fair share, the wonderfully seasoned fish was enough to spark hunger in his belly all over again. And so he immediately took the spatula and helped himself to a large slice of salmon which he dug his fork into and immediately began to wolf down.

That first bite was a wonderful tag team of light, flaky fish, and a diverse combination of fine seasonings, all bursting with overwhelming flavor. "Mmmm! This tastes amazing, Sasuke!" called out Naruto between bites. Sasuke smiled, appreciative for Naruto's complement, then resumed to observe him as he consumed the meal...
1153311111211112121111121112.title: "Are you kidding? I still have some room!"

choices: Order more food for Naruto, as he was nearly out of food at his house.
Encourage Naruto to call the quits, as he didn't want to risk it.
11533111112111121211111211121.content:
Like a trooper, Naruto continued to plow through the salmon, despite the fact that his stomach was already so full of food. The deliciousness of the food was a big help, and the lightness of the fish was a godsend compared to the heavy, rich ribs that he just ate. As he ate, his stomach continued its slow march outwards, like a beach ball inflating very slowly.

As his stomach grew, more and more of its weight shifted onto his legs, and the sheer heaviness of his stomach caused it to droop considerably. Naruto took notice of this, so he spread his legs, causing his massive belly to droop even more, falling nearly to the chair.

While all of this happened, Sasuke merely watched, intrigued. He didn't see Naruto in particular discomfort, and he was essentially mesmerized, so he didn't go up to rub the mass of flesh.

Naruto's skin and flesh around his stomach were still quite stretched and strained, but they were slowly becoming less and less strained, thanks to Naruto's healing abilities. It still took quite a while to adjust, but the speed at which Naruto's stomach adjusted to the new mass was astounding. Sasuke also hypothesized that Naruto's healing abilities are what is causing him to have the ability to eat even more food.

Last night, Naruto's stomach must have adjusted quickly to the massive amount of food, meaning that it was quickly able to increase its size so that it didn't strain too much to contain all of the food. Now that Naruto was eating right after he was done digesting, his stomach probably stayed the same size, meaning that Naruto would be able to push it even more today.

That though made Sasuke particularly excited, and while he was thinking it, Naruto continued chugging through the salmon, humming and gently kicking his legs like a child, which amused Sasuke quite a bit.

Either way, Naruto was nearly done with the salmon already. He had slowed down again by this point, but that was probably some residual gas, and Sasuke thought about his next move before he decided to...
11533111112111121211111211121.title: Several plates later...

choices: Assorted Family Platter (Chicken, Steak, Potatoes, the works!)
115331111121111212111112111211.content:
Naruto began to feel a tightness brewing within his gargantuan belly as he put his fork down for a moment and began to caress his gut tenderly in an effort to sooth the pain of fullness that was keeping from consuming what remained of the salmon. He looked around, and saw Sasuke returning to the room.

"Oh, sorry, I saw we were running low on food here, so I ordered a little take-out, if you don't mind," said Sasuke. Naruto shrugged as he grasped his gut firmly. Naruto's perfectly rounded gut had expanded to the point where it began to just barely hang from his body. While the rest of his body still maintained a relatively fit physique, his stomach had grown so vastly large that his shirt couldn't even cover it. "Ooof, sounds awesome, man. And umm, while you're in a generous mood, would you mind?" asked Naruto as he hoisted his distended gut up slightly for emphasis. Sasuke smirked then nodded as he approached his friend and rested his palms firmly atop his incredibly taut belly.

Sasuke was amazed at how soft and distended it felt. Naruto was going all out this time around, and Sasuke couldn't let anything hinder his friend. So he appeased him by rubbing and kneading at Naruto's belly as best he could. Naruto shut his eyes and enjoyed the remarkable sensation. Occasionally, Sasuke would begin to knead at Naruto's stomach, causing gas pockets to loosen up in the form of impressive belches from Naruto, who would sigh with immense relief after a particularly big one exploded out of his mouth and caused his bloated belly to deflate just ever so slightly with each one. Sasuke continued to massage the boy's gut as Naruto resumed eating what remained of the peppered salmon.

Little by little, the salmon disappeared into Naruto's hungry mouth, and down into his ever expanding belly, still being coaxed by Sasuke's rubbing wonders. When he was finally finished, Naruto belched loudly and smiled as he leaned back in his chair, causing his belly to almost push into the table. It was amazing how much this young man could consume in so little a time, and more so how he still had the strength to want more. "Ohhh man, I swear, you should be a cook, Sasuke! That was easily the best fish I'd ever eaten!" said Naruto happily and gratefully, causing Sasuke to smile in appreciation of the complement. "It's more of a hobby than a profession for me, really. Besides, I much prefer serving someone who truly appreciates the meal, and won't let an ounce of it go to waste," responded Sasuke, which earned a hearty laugh from Naruto. "I truly doubt you'll have anything to worry about on that front," he said, giving his belly a hearty slap, causing it to jiggle for a moment, which entranced Sasuke immensely as he continued to rub away at Naruto's bloated abdomen.

As great a cook as Sasuke was, the only thing Naruto enjoyed more was the feeling of Sasuke's fingertips atop his vast belly, rubbing away and easing the pain of fullness like magic. For the next few minutes, Sasuke continued to rub Naruto's belly firmly yet carefully, which coaxed Naruto into occasionally belching out the remaining gas pockets festering within his rounded, fleshy gut until the doorbell finally rang.

The delivery man had finally arrived, and with him, was the meal Sasuke had ordered for Naruto.

Which was...
115331111121111212111112111211.title: Order more food for Naruto, as he was low.

choices: A few pounds wouldn't hurt. As long as Sasuke's providing, he'll keep feasting.
He should try to stay fit by working out and trying to cut back massive feasts.
1153311111211112121111121112111.content:
Sasuke knew that Naruto couldn't resist ramen, and as soon as he found out that Ichiraku's recently began to deliver, he had to jump on that opportunity, as Ichiraku's was even more irresistible to Naruto.

He presented the container, which was about the size of a mixing bowl, to Naruto, smiling. Naruto looked back with a bit of suspicion, but when he opened it, and the smell hit him like a brick wall. "Is this Ichiraku's?!?!?" Naruto exclaimed, excited by the mere thought.

Sasuke nodded with a smile, and Naruto nearly jumped up and hugged him. The only reason he didn't was because his massive stuffed belly was weighing him down. Either way, despite the sheer amount of food that Naruto had eaten, a deep rumble was heard from Naruto's massive belly.

Sasuke nearly screamed in excitement, anticipating how much bigger the massive orb would still get. He carefully watched Naruto, eager to see him begin.

Naruto broke his chopsticks, then dove in like an animal, shoveling noodles into his mouth as if he hadn't eaten in days. It was a sheer feat of endurance, and it was amazing to see his already huge belly continue to spread outwards as he fit more and more noodles into his gigantic belly.

Despite the amount of food inside of it, Naruto's belly was still fairly soft and malleable. It rested on the portion of the chair between Naruto's legs, and it sat heavily in his lap, and surprisingly that was the part that was causing him the most discomfort.

He merely ignored it, and he continued to eat, his belly inching outwards as it spread across the chair. Naruto occasionally felt his belly actually touch the table, and at that point, he would scoot backwards to make more room.

He finally finished the noodles, and his belly was resting on about half of the char between Naruto's legs. Now it was time to finish the massive amount of broth. "Hey Sasuke, can you give me a hand?" Naruto asked in as polite a manner as he could.

Sasuke said, "Of course" before he walked up to Naruto saying, "Need a belly rub?" Naruto said, "Actually, no. What I need is help lifting the bowl." Naruto's need of help was quite justified, as the bowl was massive and heavy, and Naruto would surely risk spillage if he tried it solo. That was because the massive bowl was meant for serving, not meant to be used as an eating bowl.

Neither boy cared, however, and Sasuke held up the bowl as Naruto held it near the edge, directing it so that it was aimed to pour into his mouth at a manageable pace.

Soon enough, a torrent of broth began to pour down Naruto's greedy gullet, and it was even more amazing to watch his belly at this point. Each gulp caused his belly to inflate slightly. It was like watching a water balloon reach its maximum capacity.

Naruto's belly expanded outwards and became firmer as it filled with the broth. It was astounding to see how quickly it grew, and it took up more and more of the area of chair between Naruto's spread legs.

Finally, Naruto finished, and his belly had gotten to the point where it hung off the chair, and he would probably need assistance with it in order to walk. Either way, after he finished, Naruto belched loudly, expelling gas that happened to make it through.

He moaned a bit, wincing, and Sasuke immediately understood what Naruto needed. He went to his usual routine of finding gas pockets, and pushing them out. He was sure to be extremely careful this time, as Naruto had pushed it much farther than he did last time.

Naruto simply said, "I think that's my absolute limit", then he groaned, looking slightly green in the face. "I have no regrets." he assured to Sasuke, who said, "That's something else that is simply amazing about you, Naruto."

"And what's that?" Naruto inquired. Sasuke then said, "Your adaptability. You were able to handle almost twice as much today, because your stomach's capacity was increased by last night's meal, and you had the endurance to keep going far past that! With that, you can do anything you put your mind to."

"Thanks Sasuke" Naruto said, before he said, "I think I need to lie down." He then got up, but nearly fell down due to the sheer size of his belly. Sasuke was quick to respond, holding Naruto up.

Now that Naruto was standing, his gargantuan belly hung more than halfway down his thighs, close to reaching his knees, even. Sasuke then decided that the best course of action was to hold Naruto's belly, so he did, allowing Naruto to keep his balance.

Sasuke even lent Naruto his bed, as he was afraid that the couch wouldn't be enough. Either way, Naruto needed to lay on his side, as his belly would cause him severe discomfort if he laid on his back.

Sasuke then said, "I'm gonna make a run to the grocery store. Make yourself at home!" Naruto said, "OK. Thank's Sasuke." with Sasuke saying, "Anything for a teammate." Soon enough, he was off.

While Naruto laid down, he thought about these massive meals that he has been having lately. He was a bit concerned that if he continues to eat like this, he won't have the same fit physique he once had. Right before he fell asleep, even despite the mid-morning sun shining softly into the room, he decided that...
1153311111211112121111121112111.title: Naruto's favorite

choices: An uncomfortable gurgling from his stomach wakes him.
11533111112111121211111211121111.content:
"Oh, who am I kidding? A few pounds wouldn't hurt. I've always been a fit, active warrior with enough stamina to work off whatever weight I ever put on, so why not enjoy the feeling for a little while before working it off?" Naruto thought to himself, with certainty. He then thought back to Sasuke, who was even going out of his way to get Naruto more food and helping him to push himself. He owed it to his friend and teammate to see just how far he could take it.

And, the honest truth, was that he found himself enjoying Sasuke's company much more lately. There seemed to be less of a rivalry between them, and more of a genuine friendship, and it was nice to have. "So it's settled then. Long as Sasuke's providing and supporting me, I'll keep feasting and seeing how far I can push this behemoth," he said as he clutched his massive gut.

It still amazed Naruto that he'd pushed himself this far. His stomach was larger than it had ever been in his life. Perfectly smooth, round, and a pure testament to his ability to push his limits. Going beyond this seemed almost impossible, but Naruto wouldn't be Naruto if he wouldn't be determined to at least try.

But that would come later, for the time being, his eyes were growing heavier and heavier. Regardless of the time, his immense meal had drained him of a lot of his usually spritely energy for the time being. He needed a moment for his belly to digest before he could move on. Luckily, he'd have no problem digesting at a much quicker rate than normal people. It would just require a bit of resting for the time being. And so, with a hearty yawn, Naruto slowly massaged his immense belly for a moment, then drifted into a deep slumber...
11533111112111121211111211121111.title: "A few pounds won't hurt, long as Sasuke provides"

choices: A firm belly rub sounds nice.
115331111121111212111112111211112.content:
Some time had passed, and Naruto was snoring like a rusted chainsaw. Suddenly, a gaseous gurgling emanated from his vast belly, causing it to visibly rumble slightly. Wincing in his sleep, the gurgling eventually grew so violent that it managed to wake Naruto from his sleep. "Rgh, what the hell?" mumbled Naruto, but an abrupt rumbling caused him to wince and clutch his gut firmly.

As he did, Sasuke had returned with an immense amount of various groceries which he placed on the counter, yawning, as all the running around and cooking in so quick an interval had tired him as well. He'd just finished putting away all the groceries when he heard a moaning from his bedroom. Curious, he investigated, to find Naruto attempting to calm his bloated belly down. "Naruto? Are you alright?" asked Sasuke.
"Ugh, I dunno, I think something isn't sitting right, cause my stomach's killing me right now," responded Naruto as an audible, acidic gurgling sounded off from his large belly, causing him to wince even more.

Walking by his friends side, he pressed his ear against the vast, bare orb of flesh stretching past Naruto and listened to his stomach sloshing and groaning from within. "Just sounds like a little indigestion," noted Sasuke. "Err, maybe in this case, big indigestion. Your stomach still isn't used to working off such a massive meal, so it's working double time to work off as much as it can. Here, one second." Sasuke rose to his feet and headed to his fridge. He poured a glass of ginger ale and brought it to Naruto. "Here, drink up."
"Ugh, I REALLY don't think soda's gonna help right now..."
"Trust me. Ginger ale is great for helping to sooth indigestion, especially ginger ale made with real ginger like the brand I buy."
"Really? Well, if you say so..."

Naruto hesitantly took the cup, then began to sip it a bit. Tasting the carbonated ginger on his tongue for a moment, he then proceeded to chug the rest of the cup in one go. Smacking his lips, Naruto placed the glass aside on Sasuke's night stand and belched loudly.

*BUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRP!* "S'cuse me," mumbled Naruto, causing both boys to smirk slightly. "How do you feel now?" asked Sasuke. The rumbling had grown less violent since consuming the ginger ale.
"A little better actually! But my belly still feels kinda tense."
"That's because you only drank a little bit in respect to the size of your stomach. You can drink more, since that should help a bit more. Or I can massage your stomach and help ease the rest of the process for you. Whichever you'd prefer."

Naruto thought for a moment...
115331111121111212111112111211112.title: An uncomfortable gurgling wakes him.

choices: He walks out to the kitchen to find another massive meal.
1153311111211112121111121112111122.content:
Sasuke didn't need to be told twice, so he quickly began massaging Naruto's belly, feeling that it wasn't firm like before, but there was still lots of undigested food. He also felt a gurgling on the inside, which was no doubt Naruto's stomach working hard to digest the massive amount of food.

Sasuke just kneaded Naruto's belly firmly and mechanically, which was surprisingly soothing to Naruto, who moaned in satisfaction. It didn't take long for Naruto to fall asleep, however.

Once Naruto was out cold, Sasuke gently left Naruto to digest his meal. As he left, he thought, "Now I just have to keep Naruto full and eating more", then he went out to the kitchen to plan Naruto's next meal.

In a few more hours, Naruto woke up, his stomach having finally digesting the massive amount of food. Now, instead of a massive, bloated belly, Naruto found that his originally flat stomach was not quite as flat, as it bulged out ever so slightly. It wasn't quite enough to jiggle when he moved, but it was still soft instead of firm like before his meals with Sasuke. That's where most of the new weight was focused.

His rear end was also slightly rounder and larger, making his boxers less loose. His chest was also a bit flabbier, but he hadn't quite developed moobs yet. His chin was slightly fuller, and his arms and legs were just a bit thicker. In short, he was now chubby, but certainly not fat yet. Either way, his belly growled, much to his surprise.
1153311111211112121111121112111122.title: A firm belly rub sounds nice.

11533111112111121211111211121111221.content:
Naruto walked into the kitchen, yawning as he scratched his belly from under his shirt, feeling much softer and doughier than it used to. Upon entering, his mouth gaped open as laying on the table was yet another massive meal of various meats, noodles, and rice balls, just for him. "Good afternoon, sunshine," said Sasuke as he continued placing some of the last remaining platters upon the table.

"Hey," was all Naruto could say, completely fixated on the meal around him.
"You cooked all this when I was asleep?"
"Oh, it wasn't too bad. Cooking was never something that came with any hardship for me. And I figured I showed you what I could whip up for breakfast, so why not add lunch to the mix as well?"
"Welp, can't argue with that, I guess."
"I trust you brought your appetite?"

As if to answer Sasuke's question, Naruto's stomach let out a surprisingly audible growl, causing Naruto to chuckle sheepishly as he grinned with an open smile and brushed the back of his head. "Guess that's a yes," smirked Sasuke as he kindly sat Naruto down and handed him a plate of Mongolian Beef smothered in Garlic Beef sauce. "This one was a new recipe actually," started Sasuke, "i thought I'd start you off with that to see if it's a hit or-" before Sasuke could finish his statement, Naruto immediately began to dig right in, eagerly stuffing chunks of beef down his awaiting mouth, moaning happily as he gulped it down and smacked his lips.

"Holy crap, Sasuke! That's some of the best damn Mongolian beef I've ever eaten!" Sasuke smiled and thanked his friend as he continued to inhale the decent sized chunks of beef a few at a time.

Sasuke watched as Naruto's chubbier midsection began to bloat up a tad more after several mouthfuls of beef. Due to Naruto's slight increase in girth, his stomach would no longer round out quite as quickly as it used to, which meant it was going to tak eeven more to fill his awaiting stomach up, and for that, Sasuke couldn't be happier. After several minutes, Naruto finished the last of his beef and began to lick his plate clean of all the sauce. Sighing happily, Naruto patted his belly and moved onto the next course.

Which was...
11533111112111121211111211121111221.title: He walks to the kitchen to find another meal.

choices: A massive pile of thick, fluffy waffles.
A stack of smoked breakfast sausage and bacon.
115331111121111212111112111211112212.content:
Sasuke brought over a plate piled ridiculously with zesty smelling Spicy Buffalo Wings. Taking a big whiff, Naruto's mouth watered at the steamy aroma wafting from the plate. "Oh man, I bet this is gonna taste epic..." exclaimed Naruto. Smirking, Sasuke stepped back and let Naruto be the judge for himself. Grabbing a wing, Naruto took a huge chunk out and gulped it down. The explosion of spicy flavor was enough to set the blond over the edge as he immediately began gnawing on the wing and picking it completely clean of any meat and sauce.

Dropping the bone, he grabbed another and began to greedily tear into it, wasting no time in tearing the wing bone dry and moving onto yet another like clockwork. As he continued, he began to get some sauce on his face, which he'd occasionally wipe or lick off whenever in range, and proceed to scarf down even more wings. As more and more wings began to enter his distended belly, Naruto began to wince from the surplus of burning spiciness resonating in his gut and on his lips. Licking his lips, he attempted to cool off by pouring himself a glass of milk and chugging it down in one huge, speedy gulp, which ended with Naruto slamming his cup on the table, gripping his gut firmly, and letting free a deep belch, before smacking his lips and getting back to the wings.

Sasuke watched in joy as the boy continued to put away wing after wing like a big, bloated machine. His attention shifted to his friends stomach. Sasuke smiled as he noticed that Naruto's flabbier than usual stomach, had begun to press firmly against his shirt, barely contained as it stretched outward more and more with each wing consumed. "Boy, you're really coming along, aren't you..." noted Sasuke as he was continuously enthralled by his friends continuously expanding belly. Smiling, Naruto slapped his belly proudly, causing it to jiggle a bit and said, "Sure am! That's because my belly can take anything anyone throws at it!"
Sure hope so... thought Sasuke as he smirked and continued to joyously watch his friend stuff his face raw.

Finally, Naruto managed to reduce his plate of wings into nothing more than a massive pile of broken and meatless bones. Leaning back in his chair, he rested one hand atop his gut proudly, then glanced back at Sasuke with a look that could only mean one thing.

Chuckling aloud, Sasuke propped himself next to Naruto, and lifted his shirt up, exposing his greatly distended bare belly to the world as Sasuke firmly grasped it with both hands. Much to his surprise, Naruto's stomach felt infinitely softer yet doughier than usual. The impact of all their meals had really affected the boy, much to both their enjoyment. Due to it's thicker resilience, Sasuke began to firmly knead and press against Naruto's belly, massaging it in a bit of a rougher than usual manner, though due to the added girth, Naruto felt no discomfort in the more forceful belly massage, instead smiled with delight as a look of bliss grew over his afce.

Firm but gently, Sasuke rubbed all over it, pushing into Naruto's belly deeply to work up any of the still pent-up gas bubbles, the result of which was a very loud belch, earning a sigh of relief from Naruto. "Ohhh man, that felt good...." said Naruto with relief as he turned to Sasuke and thanked him as he lowered his shirt, which just barely managed to conceal his stomach as he began to absently rub it all over. Hungrily and eagerly awaiting the next plate from this delightfully tasty breakfast his friend Sasuke had prepared.

Shortly after, Sasuke presented Naruto with the next dish...

Sasuke offers to feed Naruto the waffles while Naruto kept the stack together.

Naruto tried to approach from every angle. He even stood up to reach the top of the stack more easily, but any movement he made caused the stack to wobble, making it difficult for Naruto to eat. He tried every method he could but nothing was working. Finally,...
