11533111112111121211111211121111221212.content:
"Okay, it's becoming clear that I didn't really think this one through," said Sasuke a bit shamefully as he rubbed the back of his head embarrassed. But then, a lightbulb had gone off inside of his head as he saw Naruto holding the stack steady. "You seem to have a steady grasp on the stack, wouldn't you say?"
"Yeah, sure. Why?" asked Naruto curiously.

Smirking, Sasuke very carefully reached from the top of the stack and grabbed a syrup laden waffle, which he proceeded to hold next to Naruto's mouth. After processing what was going on for a moment, Naruto eventually caught on and opened wide as Sasuke folded the waffle and gently inserted the whole thing right into his mouth like nothing. Chewing on it heartily as he held the stack, Naruto smirked, enjoying the flavor then smiled with approval. "Mmmm, these things taste great!" he said as he eagerly pointed up like a kid waiting for more. Needing no more less than subtle hints, Sasuke grabbed another waffle, folded it up and slipped it into the blond's eager mouth.

Naruto took no time at all chewing his next waffle up and promptly gulping it down. Feeling the sweet, syrup soaked treat slip down his throat and into his midsection, Naruto moaned happily, enjoying every second of flavor resonating from each waffle consumed. Before little time at all, Sasuke was stuffing more and more folded whole waffles into the ninja's mouth, with every few causing his belly to push out a little more each time.

As more time passed, the two picked up the pace a bit more. Now instead of one folded up waffle, Sasuke would fold up two or three and stuff them all into the young blond's mouth, watching with great joy as Naruto would gulp down even more comically large proportions at once, and sigh with immense relief when the chewed up waffle bits found their way into Naruto's expanding belly.

Before long, that stack pf waffles was beginning to shrink down a manageable pace, but both Naruto and Sasuke had been enjoying this process so much, that they just kept going. Only now, instead of continuing to hold the now manageable stack steady, Naruto simply leaned against a chair with his mouth wide as Sasuke would continue to stuff his friends face with more syrup drenched waffles. Lifting his shirt up, Naruto proceeded to rest one hand atop his now bare stomach, feeling just how vastly his belly had expanded since breakfast had begun. "Coming along nicely, isn't it?" asked Sasuke.
"Suuuuuure is..." gloated Naruto as he patted his belly proudly, causing it to jiggle beneath his fingertips, earning a chuckle out of the boy as he focused his attention back on Sasuke and the waffles.

The two continued at this pace for a while, stuffing more waffles into Naruto's mouth than he'd ever eaten before in his life. It was truly a feat worth noting for both of them. All the while, as Naruto's belly grew larger and larger with each passing waffle folded up and stuffed into his maw, the subsequent stack only continued to rapidly deplete, shrinking lower and lower, when suddenly...

"Yes, Naruto?"
"I was wondering, do you think...could you rub my belly while I eat?"
Sasuke was flabbergast for a moment, as he did his absolute best not to break into a stupid grin then and there. "Absolutely! Errrr, I mean, yes, of course, I can!" rambled Sasuke happily. Seeing Sasuke try to contain his excitement, Naruto couldn't help but smile.

And so, he dug right into his breakfast sausage, taking big hearty bites as each chunk of juicy meat burst into flavor in the boy's mouth with every bite. Sasuke's touch managed to sensitize Naruto's stomach, causing the acids within to react in such a way that it almost began to speed up in breaking down the food within.

As he would continue to ingest more and more sausage, Sasuke's massage seemed to make Naruto's belly digest it all at an even quicker rate, which would also cause gas to begin to build up and form gas pockets at quicker rates. Luckily, because of how thorough Sasuke was as his hand gently pressed kneaded all across Naruto's domed over belly, it didn't take long for him to feel them building tension, and for him to quickly press and knead onto wherever they resided within Naruto's stomach, resulting in Naruto belching long and loud shortly after, before typically smacking his lips in satisfaction and continuing to stuff his face. Due to Naruto's increased girth, he found himself consuming more, feeling less full, and letting out some monumentally more beastly belches than he used to, and Sasuke rubbing all over his belly only helped to speed the entire process.

In addition to which, the actual massage itself eased much of the tension within Naruto's stomach that came from consuming so much in so quick a duration.

Naruto continued to stuff his face with more juicy, fattening sausage while Sasuke continued to rub all over the blond's quickly expanding midsection and said, "Wow, I don't think I've seen you eat anything this fast in a while!" After gulping down a big gaping mouthful of sausage, and wiping his mouth of some sausage and grease residue shortly, Naruto sighed with relief and said, "Well, that because my stomach's never felt this relax while I ate before! Honestly, I feel like I could keep going for hours at this rate!"
"I'm game if you are," Sasuke noted with that familiar sleek grin on his face as his hand circled the upper portion above Naruto's belly button, causing Naruto to lean back and hum with delight whilst continuing to scarf down more and more sausage. With each gaping mouthful gulped down, Sasuke could feel Naruto's belly push outward further a bit, before receding just slightly due to him rubbing his belly so thoroughly and speeding up the digestion process.

It wasn't long before Naruto had successfully cleaned his plate entirely of all sausage. Sasuke couldn't but chuckle as Naruto licked his lips in an almost cartoonish fashion and leaned back against his chair, seemingly satisfied as he patted his slightly more distended belly heartily, causing it to jiggle quite visibly as he turned to Sasuke and said...

Naruto finished all the doughnuts, and his stomach was almost all the way out to his knees. Now, it was a bit firmer, but Naruto continued to chug along.

After a pile of scrambled eggs, Naruto's belly had indeed reached his knees. It was too heavy for his thighs, so he split his legs apart, letting his belly rest comfortably on the chair, which caused it to pull back slightly as it hung down to the chair. Sasuke was practically hypnotized as it pushed out farther and farther.

Naruto's belly continued to push outward, supplied by Sasuke's seemingly endless supply of food, and eventually, it got to the point where Naruto's belly was barely starting to hang off of the front of the chair. At this point...

Naruto has passed out from his food coma, but Sasuke massages his gut anyway.

"Ugh, oh man...I think that's enough for now..." groaned a queasy Naruto as he rubbed over his massive gut. Smirking, Sasuke said, "Good timing, because I think I'm all outta food anyway." Moaning in one of the heftiest food comas anyone's ever been in, Naruto attempted to massage his vastly distended gut in an effort to coax the discomfort ailing him. Helping Naruto up, Sasuke's eyes widened as he saw Naruto's vastly expanded stomach hanging down his thighs and near his knees once he actually stood on his own two feet. Seeing it was actually large enough to weigh him down, Sasuke grabbed as much Naruto's stomach as he could and helped 'carry it' with Naruto as they headed back to Sasuke's bedroom so Naruto could digest in peace again.

1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Naruto was beyond full.

Naruto wants to go home to freshen up and change.
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Sasuke continued to massage Naruto's belly, even as the latter lost consciousness, as he wanted to ensure that Naruto was comfortable, and that he was digesting as quickly as possible. A contended smile appeared on Naruto's face and his body relaxed as Sasuke worked out all of the kinks in Naruto's stomach.

As Sasuke rubbed, he though about his exploit, and was filled with glee, as Naruto was fine with the constant stuffing along with the gradual weight gain that came with it. If anything, Naruto seemed to be enjoying it. Either way, Sasuke was very satisfied with the results so far, and was eager to see how much farther he could go.

Sasuke tidied up the house, did a bit of training, made sure the kitchen was well-stocked, and after a few hours of this, he heard a stirring in his bedroom, and soon enough, Naruto lumbered out to the living room, rubbing his eyes, his hair a bit messy from the sleep, and he scratched his belly, not really noticing that it was now jiggly, and stuck out even farther.

He then went up to Sasuke, and said, "Hey Sasuke, can I talk to you for a bit." Sasuke sat down at the dining table, inviting Naruto to sit across from him. "Alright, I'm all ears." Sasuke said.
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Naptime massage.

choices: He had brought an entire rotisserie chicken
He brought back a smoked ham
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
"Y'know, I've been thinking a lot about the past few days..." said Naruto as he rubbed the back of his blond head sheepishly, not quite sure how to word what he was trying to say. Sasuke raised an eyebrow curiously. "Yeah, Naruto?"
"Well, I've really enjoyed hanging out, and well...eating as much as I have," responded Naruto with a chuckle, as he patted his now larger stomach happily, causing a bit of noticeable jiggle, while Sasuke chuckled and said, "Yeah, me too."
"But more important than that, I've just...I've enjoyed hanging out'n, I guess, getting to know you a little bit better, and I was wondering...."

Sasuke was a bit taken back, unsure where Naruto was going with this. Until finally, the boy just blurted out, "Can I move in with you?" Sasuke was surprised. He wasn't sure how to respond, but before he could, Naruto continued and said, "Thing is, I've grown kinda fond of you over these last few days. I mean, at first, I thought you hated me and thought I was an idiot!" Sasuke rubbed the back of his head at the second part of that sentence, Naruto caught that and sighed, then followed up with, "Okay...forget that last part, but you know what I mean. I've enjoyed being able to spend this time with you, and frankly, I feel like, living with someone you like spending time with is better than living alone. Isn't it?"

Truly stunned, Sasuke simply sat for a moment. Initially, this started because he wanted to see Naruto get as big as he could, and obviously still wanted that more than anything. But, whether he'd admit it or not, Naruto raised a good point. More importantly, he too; had grown a bit fond of the blond idiot since this stuffing endeavor had begun. He was willing to put his body on the line and stuff as much as he could fit into his maw on a whim. And it had been nice having the company, after spending so much time alone over the years. Something about Naruto seemed to brighten the dark days of his life. The young man was always just so joyous, so full of life, a bit beef headed and downright stupid perhaps, but kind hearted and a genuinely good person who'd been through many similar rough patches as himself. Maybe this was just what the two of them needed. Finally, Sasuke smiled warmly and said, "I'd love it if you moved in with me." Giving a wide mouthed grin, Naruto smiled at his new roommate to be and said, "Thanks, man."

The moment was interrupted by a acidic gurgling emanating from Naruto's distended gut. Chuckling, Naruto rubbed it hungrily and said, "So, do we got anything to eat for dinner? Cause I'm starved!" Laughing a bit, Sasuke walked up and gently gave Naruto's belly a friendly pat then said, "Y'know something, Naruto? I think this is gonna be the beginning of a beautiful friendship."

With that, Sasuke rose to his feet and headed towards the kitchen.

Upon returning....
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Naruto wants to move in with Sasuke.

choices: The feast is interrupted by a knock on the door.
Naruto showers afterwards, finding out just how much heavier he's become.
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Naruto was impressed as he was brought an entire chicken to gnaw on. Without further ado, he tore off a leg, and he quickly gnawed all of the meat off of it. He then did the same with the other leg. Soon enough, the wings were also clean, and Naruto moved onto the breasts, taking bites out of the carcass instead of using actual utensils.

He finished that chicken in record time, his stomach now distending considerably as he finished. Sasuke then brought a large bowl of mashed potatoes, a fitting side dish for the chicken. "Hey Sasuke" Naruto begun. "On it!" Sasuke chimed as he began to rub Naruto's distended belly. Now, the layer of fat was even thicker, so Sasuke again rubbed harder, practically making Naruto melt.

The next feast continued this way, and as per usual, Sasuke rubbed Naruto's belly, coaxing out a few burps. Naruto was now like an eating machine, he finished the potatoes in no time, and Sasuke said, "Uh, Naruto. You forgot the gravy." Sasuke observed. "Oh, you're right." Naruto said sheepishly. He then casually grabbed the gravy boat, and drank the entire thing, much to Sasuke's surprise and delight.

This display of mass gluttony continued, and Naruto's stomach expanded outwards to the same point as this morning, except he was getting more and more used to the extra weight. Either way...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: A whole chicken down the hatch

choices: Agreed, but only if Akamaru could eat too.
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
As Naruto wiped some of the gravy residue from his face, a sudden knocking caught his and Sasuke's attention. So Sasuke got up to check and see who it was while Naruto continued to get to work on some dango Sasuke had set on the table prior. Upon answering, Sasuke was surprised to see it was none other than Kiba at the other end of the door. "Kiba?" Sasuke asked confused by his presence, "What are you doing here?"
"Oiy, Sasuke," responded Kiba, "You seen the knucklehead 'round lately? We were supposed to hit up this all-you-can-eat place tonight and-"

Kiba's question was promptly answered as immediately looking past Sasuke, he found a beyond bloated Naruto stuffing his face with dango in the kitchen. Kiba's jaw gaped at the sight of his air headed friend's massive gut. "Holy...N-Naruto...?"

He slowly approached the hefty young blond, still practically gaping at the sight of his new thicker form. Glancing back at Kiba, Naruto's eyes widened as he slapped his forehead and apologetically said, "Oh crap, the eating contest! I'm sorry, Kiba, it completely slipped my mind!" But Kiba was too dumbstruck to respond. Instead, he asked, "W-when the hell did this happen...?"
"Oh," responded Naruto, before gulping down a hearty mouthful of dango and sighing with relief, "Sasuke's been treating me to all kinds'uh awesome food as of late, and, well, guess we're seeing how far we can take it."
"How far you can take what...?"

Naruto slapped his grossly distended belly, answering Kiba's question immediately. Shortly after, Kiba's giant dog, Akamaru, pranced in, much to Sasuke's surprise and thought, Hey, Kiba, you find Naruto ye-holy crap!

Like Kiba, Akamaru was stunned to see Naruto's new form. Did Naruto get locked inside Ichiraku's or something...?

Laughing, Naruto waved his hand forward and said, "Honestly, it's been a blast, man. Ask Sasuke!" Both Kiba and Akamaru immediately turned to Sasuke, flabbergasted. "So what the hell is this?" asked Kiba. Shrugging, Sasuke smirked and said, "Naruto's always been a big eater and someone with a high level of endurance. We're trying to see just how much he can really put his body through."
"Isn't this...unhealthy?"
"I wouldn't put Naruto in danger. Everything I cook, I make myself from all organic supplies. Besides, as soon as Naruto's ready to call it quits, he'll have no problem working off whatever he puts on. Not to mention how much he's enjoyed himself."

Curious, Kiba turned to Naruto and said, "You like this?" Nodding eagerly, Naruto smacked his lips and said, "You betcha! Think about it, we stuff ourselves almost annually! How often do we ever just toss back the rules and go all out? Trust me, you haven't lived until you've felt what it's like to just kick back and stuff your face with all kinds'uh your favorite foods, enjoying that soothing sensation that comes from gettin' your big ol' belly rubbed up'n down and all around, and of course, working all that gas outta your gut and letting out the most beastly burps your stomach's ever produced. Trust me, I haven't had this much fun in years!"

Considering this, Kiba rubbed the back of his head and said, "Well, that DOES sound pretty awesome..." as if to further Naruto's point, Kiba's own thin and muscle bound stomach let out a madly hungry growl, causing him to blush as he clutched it and attempted to hush it beneath his voice. Seeing this, both Sasuke and Naruto shared a glanced and smirked, before Sasuke turned to him asked, "Why don't you give it a shot for a little bit? Just kick back and see what it's like to disregard the rules and just enjoy getting a bite out of life! Trust me, we've got MORE than enough food to go around."
"Yeah, how 'bout it, Kiba? You game to stuff your maw to its' limits? Or are you scared that you'll never be able to catch up with me?"

Hearing this, Akamaru immediately glanced at Kiba, who he knew was seriously considering joining Sasuke and Naruto on their little gaining adventure, and whimpered to himself as he shook his head. Great...

Finally, Kiba decided to...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: The feast is interrupted by a knock on the door.

choices: Hey Sasuke, do you mind giving me a belly rub?
Hey Naruto, do you think you can take me? Lets see who can eat the most!
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Turning down a free opportunity to stuff himself wasn't something that Kiba would do, so he was certainly in. He asked Akamaru if he wanted to join, but Akamaru declined, opting instead to be an observer. Shrugging, Kiba said, "I'm in! My mom never lets me stuff myself at home, so I'm really gonna let loose!"

At that, Sasuke said, "Help yourself!" with a grin. Kiba was a bit confused, as Sasuke was not normally this friendly, but he shrugged again, as Naruto seemed to be enjoying it, and he couldn't resist any longer.

Kiba eyed a plate that was piled high with a coil of sausages. He sniffed it, his mouth watering, and he took a hearty bite out of the sausage at the end, his eyes widening at the amazing flavor. "Where'd you get these, Sasuke?"

"I made them" was Sasuke's simple response. "Well, whatever you did, it's really good!" Kiba exclaimed. "Yeah! Sasuke's a really good chef!" Naruto responded eagerly "He could be a cooking-nin if he wanted to. And wait 'till Sasuke rubs your belly! That's the best part!"

Either way, Kiba was already unconsciously stuffing his face as Naruto said that, soon, Kiba was sucking in the string of sausages in a comical manner, though not nearly as fast, and he developed quite a bit of momentum

Soon enough, he was finished with the pile of sausages, and his stomach was puffed out accordingly. Not quite enough to lift his shirt, but certainly enough to be noticeable. Kiba then said, "..."
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Stuffing buddies

choices: "Think I could stick around for a bit and eat some more with you guys?"
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
"Feels weird asking this, but do ya think you could give me a belly rub? J-Just until I don't feel this tightness in my gut?" Kiba was hesitant to ask, but the more Naruto talked about it, the more it sounded like exactly what his noticeably distended gut could use right about now. Smiling warmly, Sasuke nodded and said, "I'd be happy to!" then sat himself properly next to Kiba while Naruto continued to stuff his own face.

"First, can you unzip your jacket? It'll be a lot easier to rub your stomach if I can actually feel it." said Sasuke. Kiba paused for a moment, a bit reluctant, until turning to Naruto who nodded assuredly at the dog-nin. Nodding back, he shrugged, then unzipped his jacket, exposing his netting undergarments which, after a bit of a struggle, he managed to pull up, exposing his slightly rounded but still firm bare belly to Sasuke who smirked then immediately placed his open palm against the bloated appendage. Kiba winced slightly at Sasuke's cold hand embracing his flesh, but was immediately subdued as the raven haired boy began immediately stroking his belly in just the right places, causing a bit of a goofy smile to grow across Kiba's face while Sasuke continued to gently rub his belly in slow, firm, circular motions. Akamaru watched and couldn't help but chuckle mentally, watching his dog-nin companion so readily subdued by a belly rub. And I thought only dogs could make that kind of face...

"Ohhhh man..." muttered Kiba, in utter bliss, "you weren't kidding, Naruto...this...feels...amazing..." Naruto grinned wide in agreement and after gulping down a huge chunk of chicken, said, "Damn straight it does! Ain't nobody got the magic touch the way Sasuke does!" Sasuke smirked at the remark, and continued on massaging the dog-nin's bloated gut. Admittedly, Kiba's flesh felt considerably rougher than Naruto's did, still retaining quite a bit of muscle definition despite it's slight but noticeably rounded shape, but felt no less pleasant to Sasuke, feeling his taut yet firm skin gently beneath his fingertips.

And of course, much like with Naruto, Sasuke felt around for tension caused by excess gas pockets, which sure enough, after literally slurping down sausage, Kiba had a considerable amount of. Finding these points across Kiba's belly, Sasuke began to gently knead and press against these points, working up a few of the gas pockets in the process. Suddenly the goofy looking smile dropped from Kiba's face as he felt a rush of air rising up his throat. Almost immediately after, Kiba's mouth flung open as he released an incredibly loud belch, which carried on for a few short but more than audible seconds, earning a hearty laugh from Naruto while Kiba merely sighed with great relief. "Phew, that one felt good!" he said proudly, patting his belly in the process, before turning to Naruto, and with a mischievous grin, followed up with, "Let's hear you try and top that, bonehead!"
"Hey, that's no fair! Sasuke worked that one out of your belly, not you!"
"Pffft, you're actually gonna try and give Sasuke credit for MY burp?!"

Hearing this, Sasuke grinned and pushed hard on Kiba's bloated belly, forcing out yet another gargantuan belch from Kiba's mouth in the process, surprising even Kiba. Blushing slightly, Kiba rolled his eyes while Naruto smirked back at him smugly. "Fair enough..." turning to Sasuke, Kiba smiled gratefully and said, "Thanks for that, bud. That felt absolutely amazing!" Sasuke smiled and said, "My pleasure," then stepped back, to allow Kiba to once again resume scarfing down the remaining sausage he had on his plate, causing his still bare gut to push outward more and more with each sausage gulped down.

After a few moments, both boys stopped for a breather, massaging their painfully distended bellies in the process. Naruto's belly obviously much larger than Kiba's, but still, in so short a time, Kiba managed to put away enough food for his belly to look distended to point where it looked like he had swallowed a whole melon. Caressing his belly as he leaned back against his chair, Kiba smirked back to Naruto. "You weren't kidding, man..." Hearing that, Naruto smiled. "See? Told you it was awesome to just stuff your face, especially with cooking as good as Sasuke's," he said, patting his belly happily for emphasis. Sasuke smiled gratefully for the complement while Kiba nodded in agreement, still licking his lips. "You can say THAT again..."

After a few moments, finally, Kiba asked...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Hey Sasuke, do you mind giving me a belly rub?

choices: Naruto is mopping the floor with Kiba
Naruto really was starting to feel too full...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Leaning back, Kiba rubbed his noticeably distended stomach gingerly while Naruto slurped down the remaining contents of his meal. Grinning impishly, he turned to Naruto and said, "Oiy, bonehead!" Smacking his lips, Naruto turned to Kiba. "What's up, dog-brain?"
"Seems you've gotten pretty good at stuffing your face and that bulbous tank..." responded Kiba as he poked Naruto's immense gut, causing the young ninja to smirk and slap his belly heartily, causing it to ripple, much to Sasuke's amusement.
"Yeah? What of it?"
"Well, I was thinking; maybe now, you're man enough to actually take me in an eating contest. Whadduya say?"
"You're joking, right?"
"Awwww, are ya too stuffed or only pretending to be so you don't get your butt handed to you...like always?" Naruto glared intently at Kiba while Akamaru rolled his eyes. Every-single-time...

"Oh, you're SO on! Oiy, Sasu-" before Naruto could finish. Sasuke had already placed down two massive platters of assorted meat and treats for both Naruto and Kiba, smiling back at the two while they glared at each other competitively. "Ready to see how a REAL man eats, Uzumaki?" taunted Kiba. Naruto grinned toothily and said. "Are YOU?"

And with that, the two dove right into their platters of food...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: "Hey Naruto, think you can eat more than me?"

choices: Sasuke rubs Kiba's belly to help him catch up.
Kiba is too full, and stops, but Naruto continues to devour his food.
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Despite the fact that Naruto had already consumed an entire chicken, he kept on chugging with gusto, annihilating Kiba right from the start. As Kiba was about a third of the way through the plate, eating as fast as he could, he glanced up to see that Naruto was on his last bite, something that was not only amazing, but also quite frightening for Kiba.

Either way, instead of being deterred, Kiba became more determined, and he began to gain momentum, much to Naruto's surprise. Either way, his attempts were quite futile, as for every plate that Kiba ate, Naruto would demolish one and a half, his stomach flowing outwards to accommodate for the massive amount of food.

Soon enough, Kiba was slowing down quite a bit. His belly was now huge for what he was used to. It was easily basketball sized, and it lifted his shirt up, showcasing his food filled stomach.

Naruto's stomach, on the other hand, was not quite as jiggly anymore, as his belly was beginning to be stretched enough to create a sensation of firmness. Either way, at this point,...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Naruto's progress

1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Finally, after consuming another plate, Kiba groaned a bit and leaned back, massaging his aching gut while Naruto continued to trail-blaze onward like it was nothing. "Man...I dunno how you got so good at this, bone-head...but....." Kiba grimaces, clutching his groaning belly in pain. "...Oh man..." Naruto merely scoffs before gulping down a mouthful of sausage remnants. "Oh, don't be such a baby," Naruto stated, picking up a plate of chicken wings, "you just gotta take it in strides, one bit at a time. Like right now, your gut hasn't grown large enough to accomodate as much of Sasuke's fiiiiine cookin' the way mine can."

Seeing his friend in pain, Akamaru whined and licked Kiba's hand, earning a smirk from the dog-nin as he ruffled the big dog's head. Just then, Sasuke leaned in and rested his palm against Kiba's bloated midsection before he gently began to knead his taut flesh, earning a goofy smirk from the young man while Akamaru scoffed to himself. Hope I don't that ridiculous when I'm getting my belly rubbed....

"At first, it may seem like you're biting off more than you can chew, but like all things, the trick is fight through the pain until you've pushed to your absolute limit," noted Kiba as he continued to rub all across Kiba's bloated bare abdomen. Kiba, still smiling with delight, said, "Well, it's a hell of a lot easier when you got someone rubbing the pain away. Hell, my stomach barely hurts anymore!" Smiling, Sasuke nodded and said, "Of course. Your stomach just needs a bit of coaxing to be able to handle this much food. Besides," he began to feel around and knead certain portions of Kiba's upper abdomen, "there's still plenty of room. It's just being occupied by some excess pressure."

With those last words, Sasuke pressed firmly against the bloatedarea of Kiba's stomach just below his chest, forcing up a rather forceful belch, followed promptly by a softer burp immediately afterward. Picking another wing bone dry, Naruto chuckled and gave his friend a thumbs up. "Nice one, man," he then began greedily chomping down another wing with lightning fierceness and speed.

Sighing with relief, Kiba leaned back and smirked while Sasuke gently patted Kiba's belly and stepped back. "So how about it? Feel like giving it the ol' Chunin Exam try?" Looking back at Sasuke, he grinned toothily and said, "Hell yeah I do!" then grabbed a plate of ribs which he began to chomp into with new-found momentum.

As time pressed on, both continued to scarf away, and...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Sasuke rubs Kiba's belly to help him catch up.

choices: Make a clone of himself to rub Naruto's belly, making it fair.
Let Kiba win. Losing would give Naruto the drive to eat more in the future.
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Kiba wasn't kidding when he said that his belly barely hurt anymore, and because of that, when he grabbed a platter of ribs, he was able to eat them all the more viciously. He was starting to tear one off with his Inuzuka claws when he saw that the ribs were so tender that the meat practically fell off the bone. Taking advantage, Kiba pulled out every singe bone from the rack of ribs, leaving a slab of meat with holes in it. "That was some quick thinking!" Sasuke remarked as he continued his soothing massage. "If there's anything I'm good at, it's finding a way to eat faster!" Kiba responded as he pulled out the bones of the other rack.

Naruto normally would've responded, causing the two to bicker, but he was too focused on picking the meat off of the wings, slowing him down considerably. Either way, Kiba began tearing savagely into the slabs of meat, his Inuzuka teeth giving him a major advantage in helping him chew. Combined with Sasuke's belly rub, he was an eating force to be reckoned with, and he was gaining steadily on Naruto.

Despite the fact that Naruto only had a quarter of his wings left, Kiba finished his three slabs of rib meat right before Naruto finished. All of that food had an affect on the sheer size of his belly, which was now the size of a beach ball, resting heavily on his legs. Naruto's belly was a bit larger, and he split his legs to let it hang down to the chair, but because he didn't have Sasuke's belly rubs, he was starting to feel like he couldn't handle much more food, and he tried in desperation to force out some gas in his stomach while Kiba pulled over decent-sized ham. At this rate, Kiba might be able to eat more than Naruto, though only thanks to Sasuke. Sasuke knew this, and he thought about the situation. He decided to...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: The effects of a belly rub

choices: Naruto belches louder than he's belched before.
Naruto feels sick and needs his belly rubbed immediately to relieve the pressure
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.content:
Sasuke opted; against his better judgement, to leave Naruto dry this time around. Though he felt bad about not helping his friend out, he knew Naruto well enough to know defeat would drive him much further than any belly rub could. So, he continued massaging Kiba's beach-ball sized appendage, while Naruto continued to struggle between tearing the meat from his wings on a steadily fully belly, and trying like mad to rid himself of the gas that had been building up since Sasuke switched over to aiding Kiba.

Swallowing a mouthful of ham meat, Kiba glanced over at Naruto and with a smirk, asked, "Having some trouble there, Uzumaki?" Glancing back at Kiba, Naruto scoffed and feigned a confident "Pfffft! Hell no! What, you think I'm gonna lose to a lightweight like YOU?"
"I dunno, pal, you're starting to look a lil green around the gills," retorted Kiba as he continued to tear into his ham with his fork and knife. Gritting in annoyance, Naruto tried to stuff more chicken meat into his mouth, but his immensely bloated gut gurgled violently in protest. Wincing in pain, he clutched his gut and attempted to push the gas ailing his midsection out himself, but to no avail. Dammit, my stomach's killing me! Ugh, if only Sasuke weren't busy with that damn Kiba...he knows how to work out the gas that gets stuck better than anyone! thought Naruto, still trying to ease his aching belly. Looking up, he saw Kiba's ham beginning to grow more and more bare. Oh, there's no way am I letting him beat me...

Naruto hoisted himself from his seat and went towards the counter to grab a pitcher of cola Sasuke had laying around, and poured himself a cup to the brim, which he proceeded to chug rapidly. As he did, he saw Kiba beginning to slow down and opted to chug faster so as to catch up while he could. Unfortunately for him, Sasuke was well on top of it, and already kneading Kiba's bloated belly for pent up air pockets. As if on cue, Kiba let free a loud belch, followed immediately by a softer burp and sigh. "Ahhh, much better. Thanks, Sasuke!" he said before getting back to his ham.

Gulping down the rest of his cup, Naruto slammed it back on the counter and pressed firmly against his immensely distended abdomen, trying to force up an even greater pent up gas bubble. Unfortunately, all this time Naruto spent trying to relieve the pressure in his stomach, Kiba spent finishing every last bite of his ham. Dropping his fork and knife, Kiba leaned back in his chair and belched loudly one last time before patting his belly proudly. "Well, would'ja look at that? Guess we know which one of us is the REAL lightweight, don't we, Naruto?"

Naruto opened his mouth to respond to the gloating dog-nin, when his stomach let out a rather loud groan. Suddenly...
1153311111211112121111121112111122121212.title: Let Kiba win.  Losing'll drive Naruto to eat more.

11533111112111121212.content:
The bright sun through the window curtains beamed down on Naruto's face, forcing him from his peaceful slumber. His eyes fluttered for a moment, until he finally gave in and sat up groggily. Yawning, Naruto stretched then scratched his stomach from under his shirt. Much to his surprise, his stomach had worked off almost all of the massive meal he'd enjoyed the previous night, and had shrunken down considerably to a barely noticeable bulge of pudge layered atop his lower abdomen, giving him the slightest of a pot belly. "Wow, that didn't take long at all!" chuckled Naruto as he forced himself up from Sasuke's couch.

Looking around, he didn't spot any Sasuke in sight. At that moment, he realized that Sasuke was still asleep. This, Naruto needed to see. Stealthily, Naruto snuck his way into Sasuke's bedroom to get a first hand glimpse at his teammate sleeping to see if he was as well composed as he was when he was awake. Secretly, he was hoping he'd see him sprawled ridiculously like some kind of ragdoll nightmare, snoring up a storm.

Much to his surprise however, Sasuke was still just as tranquil and quiet as he was when awake. Although it didn't give Naruto the laugh he was hoping for, it was a strangely cute sight for some reason, just seeing Sasuke in such a peaceful state. It was almost a shame to have to wake him. Nevertheless, Naruto being Naruto...

"Rise and shine, Sleepy Uchiha!" shouted Naruto, causing Sasuke to wince at the sudden loudness. Slowly opening his eyes, he glanced slightly irate at Naruto and mumbled, "Rgh...n a good morning to you too...." Rising from his bed, Sasuke rubbed his eyes and glanced back at Naruto, equally surprised by his gut's almost regular size.

"Goodness, you really DO have a fast metabolism..." Sasuke said, with a subtle hint of disappointment in his voice.
"Guess so," responded Naruto as he scratched the back of his head, also with a faint hint of disappointment. "Still, it definitely left a mark," he continued with a chuckle as he grabbed the small chunk of pudge still left over on his stomach. "Can't let that hang around, right?"
"I suppose not."
"Then you wanna hit up the dojo's with me so I can work this sucker off? I mean, you never know..." Naruto continued, "...nothing works up an appetite quite like working up a sweat, right...?"
Almost immediately catching what Naruto was hinting, Sasuke smiled back and nodded. "I think I know exactly what you mean," Sasuke stated.

Getting changed, both headed to the dojo together, accompanied by a few familiar faces here and there, all already occupied with their own training. So both young warriors trained vigorously. From running the tracks to practicing hand to hand combat tactics. The hours passed, the others had long since called it a day, and though Sasuke was all but bushed, Naruto just kept pushing onward and onward and onward.

The energetic young man's will and stamina were unlike anything Sasuke had ever seen. Despite what seemed like infinite hours, he just kept going. And so, like before, Sasuke encouraged and cheered Naruto on, which only strengthened his vigor.

Finishing a set of push ups, Naruto finally called it quits, breathing heavily as he sat up, sweating profusely. "Whew, think that'll cover it for the day," chuckled Naruto as he took off his shirt and was ready to hit the showers.
"I'll say...and look at that, no paunch either," responded Sasuke. Looking down, Naruto glanced at his stomach, which was; once again, fat free, and exposed quite an impressive muscle definition glistening from the sweat inducing workout. Suddenly, an incredibly audible RUMBLE emanated from the young blond's abs.

Chuckling, he gave his bare stomach a good pat and and said, "Well, take a long hard look while you can. These bad boys are going bye-bye once we get eating, cause I'm STARVED..." Neither Sasuke nor Naruto could wait for the ensuing stuffing to come. And with a clean slate from the workout, Naruto was going to have plenty of room to spare.

After the two showered and changed, they headed to eat. What were they hungry for?
11533111112111121212.title: Naruto wanted to go work his huge meal off

choices: He made shadow clones to get his food and even fed himself with the clones.
Sasuke offered to get his next plates.
115331111121111212121.content:
Both Naruto and Sasuke realized that the perfect place for copious amounts of eating was the buffet, where there was essentially limitless food, perfect for another one of Naruto's stuffing sessions. And with Sasuke's help, and the hunger Naruto worked up during the day, he was probably going to need virtually limitless food. Soon enough, the two were in the buffet, and they went up to the counter to pay and get their plates.

Naruto got out his frog wallet to pay, patting it on the head as if it were a real animal, but as he was about to get his money, Sasuke said, "Don't worry about it. I'll cover it!" Naruto looked at Sasuke as if to question him, but before he could ask, Sasuke said, "Don't worry about it! After..." He hesitated a moment, causing Naruto to raise his eyebrows. "After... the incident, I inherited much of my clan's fortune. Even though I really don't need much money, I have more than I could possibly spend."

After that, Sasuke was in a more somber mood, but he felt Naruto's arm around his shoulder. He looked to see Naruto grinning his characteristic grin, saying, "Don't worry, I know how it feels." He looked down for a minute before saying, "It's alright. It feels better once you have friends." Sasuke was reassured by Naruto's talk, and Naruto's positive mood was always quite contagious, and soon Sasuke remembered that he was about to see Naruto stuff himself silly again.

The two proceeded into the buffet, and there were surprisingly few customers in today. The few that were there were surprised to see how much food Naruto was able to cram on one plate. He crammed a whole variety of foods onto his plate, mostly meat and rice, and he grinned as he was about to eat nearly all of his favorite non-Ramen foods. Sasuke was excited to see how much Naruto would be able to stuff himself.

Naruto and Sasuke seated themselves at a booth by the the window, then as Sasuke ate at a normal, even reserved pace, Naruto viciously attacked his food as if he hadn't eaten in years. Sasuke smiled as he watched Naruto eagerly cram the food into his mouth. Soon enough, Sasuke had eaten his fill, but Naruto was still eating with gusto.

Naruto had quite a bit on his plate, but as expected, that food didn't last long, and soon enough, he was ready for another serving. As he was about to get up, he felt a slight pang in his stomach. He hadn't eaten nearly as much as he would soon eat yet, but the walk up the buffet table was more than enough to make his stomach churn.

He definitely didn't want to keep getting food, as it would only be harder and harder with every plate. He thought about it briefly, then...
115331111121111212121.title: Just what the doctor ordered

1153311111211112121212.content:
"Something the matter, Naruto?"
"Nothing, it's just that, my stomach kind of hurts a little. I don't know, I guess between working out so hard, and now, it's a little too tense to be moving around too much if I'm gonna be eating my fill."
"Fair enough. Well, I'm done eating, so I don't mind getting your plates for you if you'd like."
"I don't know, it feels kind of weird asking you to get my food for me. I mean between you paying for all this, and getting the food? I-I don't want you to feel like I'm taking advantage of you or anything like that."

Sasuke could sense that Naruto was really hesitant about this. Smiling kindly, he gently patted his friend on the shoulder and said in an assuring manner, "I know you'd never do that to a friend. Don't worry." Naruto glanced back up and saw the sincerity in Sasuke's eyes, then smiled thankfully. "Thanks, man." Nodding, Sasuke headed towards the buffet lines, but not before adding, "Besides, if you're eating everything I put on the plate, this means we both get to go a little all-out." Naruto thought about that, and smirked, imagining how far Sasuke was going to test his limits.

Leaning back for a moment, Naruto looked around, once again confirming how empty the buffet was, then lifted up his shirt to examine his abdomen. His six pack was still visibly defined, only his stomach pushed out just ever so slightly from consuming so much of his first plate at one moment. Clutching his abs, he almost absent mindedly began to massage his own stomach to ease the pain slightly.

The pain began to lessen over time, and as he continued, his stomach let out a surprisingly audible RUMBLE of hunger. Chuckling, he gave his bare stomach a good slap then let his shirt drop back down to normal. "Hehe, hope you're ready," he said, almost pep talking his own stomach as Sasuke returned with a tray containing what appeared to be a mini-mountain of food. Naruto's jaw practically dropped.

"....Wow, you really went all out, didn't ya...?" was all Naruto could say as he simply stared wide eyed at the tray. Smiling, Sasuke nodded and gently placed the plastic tray besides his friend. Layered upon the many plates were several ribs, a pile of beef jerky, a massive pile of chicken and shrimp dumplings, and finally, a pile of chicken wings.

"So how's your stomach feeling now, Naruto?" asked Sasuke with a hint of eagerness in his voice. Sure enough, Naruto's stomach rumbled loudly in response to the mini-buffet before him, causing him to chuckle sheepishly before licking his lips and grabbing his fork and knife and responding, "Hungry..."

And with that, he dove right into his meal and tore into it without mercy...

What did Naruto start tearing into first?
1153311111211112121212.title: Sasuke offered to get his next plates.

choices: His stomach freed up enough space to get his own plate, pain free
11533111112111121212122.content:
Naruto grabbed the plate of what appeared to be an infinite amount of shrimp dumplings, and grabbed his chopsticks, allowing him to pick a dumpling and flick it straight into his maw, chewing on the dumpling heartily as he savored the burst of flavors, then gulped the contents down his throat. "Mmmm, I forgot how much flavor these little fellas pack away!" Naruto said with a smirk as he began consuming more and more dumplings at a quicker rate.

Sasuke glanced and noticed Naruto's muscular stomach pressing outward against his t-shirt just a bit with the more dumplings consumed, giving it a more flat look as opposed to his previous concave form. It was a delight watching Naruto consume more and more while his stomach continued to expand more and more, all over again. Finally, after several dumplings had been gulped down, Naruto paused for a moment and began to rub his stomach tenderly, as it was now pushing outward slightly more.

Sasuke appeared surprised however. While the day's workout and training had worked up quite an appetite from Naruto, his shrunken stomach may have also lost some of its' previous extra space. Which would make him fuller quicker and give him a smaller capacity for this little stuffing escapade of theirs. "You okay there, Naruto?" asked Sasuke.
"Rgh, oh yeah, I'm just fine. My stomach's just feeling a little tight right now..." responded Naruto as he continued to rub his stomach firmly.

Finally, Sasuke's concerns were laid to rest, as Naruto stopped rubbing, pressed his hand firmly atop his upper abdomen, and let out a large, bassy belch. After letting it fly for a few seconds straight, Naruto sighed with immense relief. "Ahhhh, there we go!" he said as he patted his stomach, pleased and relieved, earning a chuckle from Sasuke. "Good thing there aren't too many people here," commented Sasuke who shook his head with amusement. To which, Naruto scoffed and responded with, "What can I say? I needed the extra room."
"And do you have it now?"
"Ohhh yeah..."

What did Naruto do next?
11533111112111121212122.title: The pile of dumplings

choices: Naruto asked Sasuke to get more food from the buffet.
Sasuke was having difficulty with a stubborn pocket of gas.
115331111121111212121221.content:
With that, Naruto picked up the plate that was heaped with ribs, placing it within easy reach. The ribs were already pre-cut into individual ribs for the convenience of the customer. They were smothered in tangy barbecue sauce, and their glistening brilliance practically screamed for Naruto to eat them.

That was all the motivation he needed, as he quickly grabbed a couple, finding that the meat practically fell off the bone. Smiling, he said to Sasuke, "Hey Sasuke! Watch this!" He then proceeded to stick the entire rib in his mouth, holding it on one end. He pulled the rib out clean, having used his teeth to strip it of its succulent meat.

"I have to admit, that's pretty impressive!" Sasuke commented as Naruto pulled two clean ribs at a time out of his mouth, depositing them on a pile he had started on an unfolded napkin. He grinned his characteristic, bright grin, content in his self-stuffing. Sasuke merely observed, interested, ready for the next time Naruto needed a belly rub.

Naruto continued this method, taking in two meaty ribs at a time, his stomach gradually pushing outwards to make more room. He continued to devour the ribs undeterred, as he was practically in a trance, forgetting how full he was. Sasuke's eyes widened as he watched the pile of ribs shrink and shrink.

About ten minutes later, Naruto had finished the entirety of the plate of ribs, and he belched proudly, patting his belly in satisfaction. Since he had started, his bloated midsection had grown to the point of lifting his t-shirt, leaving a sliver of exposed flesh on the underside.

As Naruto regained his senses, the feeling of fullness hit him like a pile of bricks, and the pressure in his stomach was building as the gas was, as he went the entire time without belching.

As if on cue, Sasuke began rubbing Naruto's belly, feeling a multitude of gas pockets, and he proceeded to free them, with Naruto belching, a goofy smile appearing on his face as the feelings of relief and comfort washed over him.

Once he was satisfied with Sasuke's work, Naruto reached for the nearest plate, and he began yet again. This all happened silently, and Naruto's smile was all Sasuke needed, as he could tell that Naruto was grateful.

Either way, Naruto got back in the zone, working on the remaining dumplings, and he continued to mindlessly consume the food. Sasuke stayed on stand by, massaging Naruto's belly whenever he began to slow.

The two continued like a team, concentrating in silence until...
115331111121111212121221.title: Rib time!

choices: Rub and knead at Naruto's belly until the gas is expelled.
1153311111211112121212212.content:
More and more, Naruto continued to inhale the many dumplings at an incredibly seamless pace, whilst Sasuke stood by, entranced but alert. The more he continued to ingest, the further his muscular abdomen would continue to push outward. Little by little, that small trace of visible flesh beneath his t-shirt continued to grow just slightly more visible with each mouthful of shrimp dumplings gulped down.

After a few more undisturbed minutes, Naruto began to slow down a bit, before stopping altogether as he leaned back and rested one hand upon his visibly bloated stomach. "Ugh, man, those things add up after a while," chuckled Naruto as he gave his stomach a few light pats. Prodding gently at Naruto's stomach, and feeling how hard and tense it felt from ingesting so much in so short a time, Sasuke raised an eyebrow and said, "Tell me about it..."

He glanced back at Naruto, who looked a bit tense himself then asked, "Need a little help?"
"More than a little, man..." Naruto responded, half-joking, half-serious. Nodding, Sasuke got to work and began to gently rub across Naruto's muscle-bound but slightly distended belly in their continued effort to keep the momentum going. Naruto smiled with delight as the massaging feel of Sasuke's fingers working around Naruto's gut was easing a lot of the immediate pain he was feeling.

Sasuke was also marveling how soundly Naruto's stomach maintained the muscle definition from his previous superhuman workout, while still pushing outward. His muscle seemed to outweigh the fat, and thus, left him with less room to consume at a given notice. His stomach would have to adjust like before; expand to intake. Thanks to Naruto's elevated metabolism and endurance, he could push himself to eat more and more with each passing wave of food. However, he'd first need some help from Sasuke to make sure he had as much room as he could stomach.

As Sasuke continued to rub Naruto's belly, he could see that Naruto himself was no longer in pain, but his appetite still hadn't quite returned to him the way it usually did when Sasuke assisted. "I dunno, I still feel pretty full..." commented Naruto. Then it dawned on Sasuke that Naruto hadn't belched yet, and however unsavory to anyone onlooking, it was essential if Naruto was to continue his feast. So Sasuke continued to rub, almost scanning around Naruto's bloated muscle-gut for a sign of extra tension, but it was proving difficult. So Sasuke lifted Naruto's shirt up, exposing his whole belly while he felt around, rubbing and trying to find the evasive pocket of gas preventing Naruto's meal from continuing.

Eventually, he felt it festering towards his upper abdomen, brewing and causing a considerable amount of tension. "There you are..." muttered Sasuke almost victoriously as he pressed firmly against this portion of Naruto's stomach, expecting Naruto to belch his characteristically loud belch, but nothing happened. Curious, Sasuke pressed harder and harder, trying to force the gas out of Naruto's belly while not all out assaulting the poor blond in the process. Nothing worked.

"Hmm, I don't suppose you can just burp it out yourself?" asked Sasuke. Raising his eyebrow, Naruto smirked and said, "Of course I can! Check this out..." then sucked in as much air as he could, causing his belly to bloat out even more with the excess air being deposited from his esophagus. He then opened wide expecting a thunderous eruption, but nothing. "Oh man, that's really stuck in there..." commented Naruto, a bit discomforted and regretful for his failed attempt at expelling the gas.

Sasuke needed to find a way to get it out. Then it hit him...
1153311111211112121212212.title: Difficulty with a stubborn pocket of gas

choices: Go back to devouring the food with even more zeal.
Guzzle more cola, seeing if he can top his first burp.
11533111112111121212122121.content:
Soon enough. Sasuke got out of his chair, causing Naruto to question him. "Why are you getting up?" he asked. "I'm going to get some soda." Sasuke replied, with Naruto blurting out, "Cola is the last thing I want right now!"

Sasuke then calmly replied, "Trust me, Naruto. If you drink cola, then obviously there's going to be more gas building up." At that though, Naruto cringed a little, "But that gas will build enough to force itself, along with that pesky gas pocket, out of your system."

Naruto was still a bit hesitant, but then he soon got over it, and cheerfully exclaimed, "I guess it's worth a shot!"

With that, Sasuke went back to the drink machine, then he asked for a couple of pitchers, and because the buffet was practically empty, a polite employee politely provided him with a couple. He then proceeded to fill them with cola, then he grabbed a glass, just in case Naruto wanted to use it.

He returned to see Naruto with is back draped over the back of the chair. He stared at the ceiling while his belly was emphasized, being completely exposed, as his shirt was lifted all the way. Upon seeing Sasuke, Naruto went back to a sitting position, his shirt falling back down to cover as much belly as it could.

Sasuke then offered a pitcher, and Naruto snatched it, thanking Sasuke with a relieved smile, then he put the spout to his mouth, tipping the soda over and guzzling down as much as he could, confident that Sasuke's idea was a good one.

Ignoring the pain, he guzzled down the soda, his belly visibly expanding with the quick introduction of all that liquid and gas at the same time. He finally stopped when he had finished about half of the pitcher, amazing given his recent past of stuffing his face to its fullest. His belly had become large enough to lift his shirt up nearly all the way, and his stomach quivered slightly due to all the pressure.

Time practically froze for Naruto before finally, "UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP& #34;
He unleashed a gargantuan burp that lasted over ten seconds, and it practically knocked Sasuke back.

The few customers that were there stopped what they were doing, and they stared, almost afraid to continue to do what they were doing. Even the employees ran over to check to see if everything was OK. Sasuke merely brushed them off, assuring that everything was fine, and then he said, "Now that was impressive!!"

Naruto smiled confidently, and Sasuke was even more excited when he thought about how that stretched Naruto's stomach, and it gave him more room to eat. Now Naruto would be able to eat even more.

Sasuke then watched, intrigued, as Naruto proceeded to...
11533111112111121212122121.title: Cola?

choices: "I'll drink these pitchers, then you'll coax the burp out of me!"
"I'll drink as much soda as I can without burping, and let the gas build up!"
115331111121111212121221212.content:
"Man, that was awesome!" said Naruto with immense relief in his voice as he patted his belly proudly. The expulsion of so much gas at once had deflated his stomach back down considerably to its' earlier significantly less bloated form. However, his stomach had contained so much excess pressure for such an extended period of time, that it had actually expanded and stretched out, thinning his muscles slightly, but giving him ample room for consumption.

He then proceeded to grab the second pitcher of soda. "Didn't you get it all out already?" asked a curious Sasuke.
"Pfft, and THEN some!" said Naruto with emphasis, "Still, that felt REALLY good getting all that gas outta my belly at once. Besides, did you hear how loud and long that burp was? I don't think I've EVER burped that good before!"
"I should doubt it."
"Which is exactly why I gotta see if I can top it! Like yesterday, I ate to my absolute limit, and now I'm trying to go beyond it. Same thing here. Burped my best burp ever, and now I gotta get a better one out."

Sasuke couldn't help but admire the sentiment. Afterall, it was that very sentiment that caused him to grow to admire Naruto and this little venture of theirs from the get go. And so, Naruto chugged away. Little streams of cola leaked from the side of the pitcher and down his mouth. Like before, Sasuke glanced to see Naruto's stomach expanding with every bountiful gulp of cola being sloshed into his gut. He could already feel the gas building up within him, causing some sharp pain in his upper abdomen, but he just kept on chugging.

His stomach, still nowhere near as bloated as before, had distended from so much soda, to the point where a fair amount of his stomach's began to expose itself more and more, reaching just below his belly button. Sasuke could see that Naruto's abs were still visible, but thinned out and softened from the nights festivities. Finally, around half way into the pitcher, Naruto placed his pitcher down with a hearty sigh and wiped his mouth, before using his right hand to clutch his distended stomach.

"Ugh, ohh man, I can already tell this one's gonna hurt a little bit," said Naruto, half-jokingly and half-nervously as he slowly massaged his own stomach to ease the pain. Then, stopping for a moment, Naruto's clutch became firm, as he then proceeded to press down on his own stomach.

The resulting belch exploded out of Naruto's mouth like thunder, lasting several audible seconds, but not quite as loud or long as his previous masterpiece. When it came to an end, Naruto raised an eyebrow with an almost disappointed look on his face, as a smaller, wetter burp forced its' way out of his mouth. "What the hell? That one sucked!" said Naruto with disappointment.
"Well, remember, your stomach was trying to deal with a lot of gas at once before you forced it all out," reminded Sasuke. And in that moment, a dim light bulb went off in Naruto's head as he began chugging away at the second half of the pitcher, earning yet another curious look from Sauske.

"Still giving it a try?"

Naruto finished the cola at a surprisingly quick pace, then breathed with exhaustion as he reached for the third pitcher. "Yeah, but here's the thing. The only reason my last burp was so big was a lot brewing in my stomach at once. So the plan is simple..."
115331111121111212121221212.title: Guzzle more cola, so he can top his previous burp.

choices: Naruto finally let loose his biggest burp yet.
Naruto asks Sasuke if he could use his belly rubbing to keep the gas in.
1153311111211112121212212122.content:
Sasuke was intrigued by Naruto's idea, although he was a little nervous, he was excited to see Naruto push himself even harder. No doubt this will expand his stomach so that he can handle even more food.

With that thought in mind, Sasuke stared intently as Naruto downed the third pitcher as quickly as he could. The rapidity of his drinking was awe-inspiring, and Sasuke could see Naruto's throat visibly expand to accommodate for such large gulps.

Even more astounding was the rate at which Naruto's stomach expanded. With all the liquid and gas entering his belly at the same time, it soon surpassed the size it was for the first burp, but Naruto kept going, his shirt no longer covering his belly, as it rested on the top now.

The orb of flesh was now perfectly smooth and stretched considerably, and the skin was taut. That didn't stop Naruto, however, from reaching for the final pitcher after a bit of a breather. Sasuke went wide eyed as he watched Naruto drink an almost grotesque amount of soda. He also noticed that all of the pitchers would be empty soon.

Because of this, and because Naruto tended to surprise everyone with how far he went, Sasuke began filling the other three pitchers again, just in case. When he got back, Naruto was just finishing the fourth pitcher.

He slammed it down gloriously, taking in a huge breath, and holding his stomach with both his hands. It was amazingly large at this point, about at the point where it was last night. It didn't look like Naruto would be able to hold it in much longer. Soon,...
1153311111211112121212212122.title: Fillin' up

choices: "Not much you can do, so just keep burping til it's all out of your system."
Call it a night and let Naruto rest his tummy troubles off.
11533111112111121212122121221.content:
Soon, Naruto's ridiculously distended belly began to quiver from what would arguably be considered the perfect storm brewing. Smirking as best he could, he turned to Sasuke and with strain in his voice, said, "Would you do the honors?" Sasuke's eyes widened. Normally, he'd be more than happy to help, but this time around, he was a tad nervous at how inescapably loud this was going to be. Nevertheless, this was bound to be; as Naruto would put it, epic. So, Sasuke begrudgingly rose from his seat and sat beside Naruto, placing one hand slowly over the bloated mass of once muscle-bound flesh, feeling an overwhelming amount of gas flurrying about from within, and after a nod, Sasuke pressed firmly against Naruto's belly...

*BBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRP PPPPP!!!*

Blasting mightily from Naruto's lips, came one of the loudest, lengthiest burps Sasuke and anyone likely within a quarter mile radius had ever heard in their lives, and only seemingly getting louder and louder as it progressed. Sasuke kept his hand flat against Naruto's belly all the while during, feeling the immense amount of gas rushing out of his stomach, causing it to deflate gradually with the massive belch, until Naruto's stomach had deflated back down to a mere noticeable bulge in his torso. After 18 seconds straight, Naruto's burp finally came to an end. Naruto almost went limp from exhaustion at the sheer amount of gas exiting his body all at once. He simply groaned with vast relief, and rested his hand atop his still bare stomach and smiled before letting out a smaller, wet burp. "Whew....talk about one for the ages, right, Sasuke?" said a pleased Naruto as he smacked his lips and patted his belly one more time before letting his t-shirt once again fall back over it again. But Sasuke, along with half the people still in the buffet, were still a bit dazed from the volume of Naruto's eruption. Glancing around, Naruto smiled sheepishly whilst rubbing the back of his head nervously, then said, "Ehheheh, sorry if that was too loud, I'll try and keep it-*URP*-down..." Covering his mouth, Naruto uttered another apology and began to massage his strained stomach, burping yet again.

Finally regaining his composure, Sasuke glanced back at Naruto and saw him clutching his gut whilst unsuccessfully attempting to stifle the gas exiting his mouth. "Naruto, you okay?" asked Sasuke. Naruto nodded, burping again. "Ugh, yeah, I'm *URP* fine...but my stomach's *BURP* killing me! It feels like I can't stop *URRRP* burping!" responded Naruto as he seemed to be burping a bit uncontrollably right now.
"Hmm, could be you tried to nurse too much gas at once, and now that you let out that deafening behemoth, your stomach is trying to rid itself of all the leftover gas that was being clogged up by it."
"Ugh, so then what should I d-*buuuuRRRAP*-ugh...do?"

Sasuke thought about their options for a moment.
11533111112111121212122121221.title: Naruto finally let loose his biggest burp yet.

choices: Naruto began slowing down, and needed a belly rub.
Sasuke decided to take entire serving containers to Naruto.
115331111121111212121221212211.content:
Not too long afterwards, Naruto's burping streak had ceased, though he still burped occasionally afterwards. "I think I feel better now." Naruto said. Sasuke then replied with, "I'm glad to hear! You ready to get back to eating?" Naruto then said, "Are you kidding? That gave me much more room!"

With that, Naruto began stuffing his face with any food that Sasuke put in front of him. Nearly every type of food that the buffet offered eventually disappeared down Naruto's gullet. Naruto's eating was mechanical and steady. Sasuke felt like he was putting the plates into a machine rather than giving a human plates. Every few plates, Sasuke needed to refill. He also checked on Naruto's progress by looking at his belly, of course.

After a couple plates, Naruto's belly began to lift his shirt again.

A few plate later, and Naruto's belly was large enough to lift his shirt over his bellybutton.

About a half dozen more plates and caused Naruto's belly to become large enough to lift his shirt all the way to the top of his belly.

At this point...
115331111121111212121221212211.title: Letting it all out

choices: Sasuke gets Naruto another full plate of various food, which he promptly inhales
Naruto finishes one last plate, downs the rest of his drink and calls it a night
1153311111211112121212212122111.content:
Naruto was currently gulping down a cup of extra spicy, extra chunky chili. With each spoonful ingested, Naruto's gullet continued to protrude outward more and more. By the time he'd finished his cup, his stomach was the size of a watermelon, visibly distended outward and bare. His abs were still visible due to the sheer intensity of his earlier workout, but just vaguely due to being covered by a moderate layer of fat from the night's gorging. By the time he was done with his chili, his pace had slowed down to a near crawl, until he eventually winced and clutched his gut with one hand.

Nodding, Sasuke immediately came to his friends aid, and gently rested his palm against Naruto's belly, soothing the pain of gluttony as he began to massage at his aching midsection. Naruto cooed with delight as Sasuke continued to massage slowly all over his bloated stomach. It was unreal for Sasuke, how hard and hollow Naruto's belly felt. It truly felt almost like a fleshy watermelon stuffed within Naruto as he continued to rub and knead away. The hard yet smooth feel of Naruto's bare flesh was oddly soothing for Sasuke as much as his massage was for Naruto. Something about it just felt relaxing.

As Sasuke continued to massage his friends distended gut, he reached towards Naruto's upper abdomen, feeling a bit of tension just below the surface. Acting swiftly, Sasuke kneaded his thumb's knuckle right into this part of Naruto's belly and pushed down. Almost immediately after, Naruto burped loudly twice in a row, causing him to laugh. "Haha, wait hold on..." said Naruto as he sat up with a focused look on his face, one hand held forward in a 'wait a second' fashion. A few seconds passed, until Naruto's head bobbed forward, letting out a bassy, drawn-out two-part belch.

*Buuuurrr-RRRAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPP!*

Sighing with relief, Naruto slapped his belly firmly and smiled. "Damn, that felt good!" said Naruto as a tiny after-burp escaped his lips. Laughing a bit, he turned to Sasuke and said, "Sorry bout that, Sasuke. Chili always makes me kinda gassier than usual."
"Not a problem, long as it gives you the room you need to keep going" chuckled Sasuke as he too, patted Naruto's belly then rose up to get him more food.
1153311111211112121212212122111.title: Naruto began slowing down, and needed a belly rub.

choices: Sasuke gives Naruto a much needed belly rub to coax any gas pockets and pain.
Naruto immediately sleeps off his massive meal til the next morning.
11533111112111121212122121221112.content:
Naruto prodded and poked at his ballooned belly, admiring the almost perfect roundness that came from his massive meal thus far, when Sasuke greeted him with a plate of various desserts to close the night with, along with a hearty cup of cola. Licking his lips, Naruto got to work on eating from an ample bowl of ice cream smothered in fudge, nuts, whipped cream, and a cherry on top. Wasting no time, he would take ample spoonfuls and quickly stuff them into his mouth, enjoying the wonderfully sweet cluster of taste that resulted. Smacking his lips, he proceeded to greedily stuff more and more bites of ice cream into his mouth, completely disregarding the threat of a brain freeze, too enthralled by the wonderful taste of his frosty treat to care.

Sasuke watched as the ice cream began to quickly deplete from the bowl, only causing the muscular blond's bloated belly to push outward little by little. As he completed the hearty bowl of ice cream, Naruto turned his attention towards a plate loaded with dozens of chocolate chip cookies. As if he were a kid again, the teen proceeded to cram as many cookies into his mouth as he could, and greedily chomped them down, messily spraying cookie crumbs all over the table in the process; much to Sasuke's amusement.

Some time had passed, and by the time it was over, and all the cookies were reduced to a pile of itty bitty crumbs across the boy's face, and all over the table, Naruto looked all but dazed. He groaned happily as he leaned back in his chair, both hands rested atop his vastly bloated belly. It had grown so much that had actually begun to push against the table. Rubbing it gently in an effort to soothe it, Naruto decided to wash down the remnants of his massive dessert with his drink. Grabbing his cola and bringing it to his lips, Naruto proceeded to gulp down his carbonated beverage in one lengthy go, which ended with the young man slamming his cup onto the table, clutching his distended abdomen, and letting free a mighty belch strong enough to shake the table, and cause his own belly to visibly vibrate in the process. Licking his lips, Naruto patted his belly proudly and weakly turned to Sasuke, who smirked back at him. "Great job, Naruto. Didn't think you'd manage to put away so much, but I guess all that extensive training earlier must've REALLY paid off!" complemented Sasuke, earning a weary smile from the bloated teen as be massaged his aching gut and said, "Tell me about it...just....not right now, cause if I eat another bite of anything....or THINK about eating another bite of anything...I'm gonna hurl..."

Rising from his seat, Sasuke assisted the bloated blond up from his seat, and the two headed back to Sasuke's apartment. Upon arrival...
11533111112111121212122121221112.title: One plate and one drink later, Naruto's too full.

choices: Sasuke continues to work out as many gas pockets as he can before sleeping.
Sasuke continues to rub Naruto's belly until the two get too tired.
115331111121111212121221212211121.content:
After some grueling travels, the two eventually reached Sasuke's apartment. There, Naruto immediately plopped onto the couch, resting one hand firmly atop his domed out belly. Wincing by his shirt riding against the upper portion of his stomach, Naruto opted to just save face, and shortly after, much to Sasuke's surprise, just pulled his shirt off entirely before leaning back once again, now bare chested. "Hope you don't mind, but I mean, it's not like my shirt was covering all that much anyway at the moment. Besides, it felt kinda uncomfortable always having to adjust it..." noted a now-shirtless Naruto as he massaged his achingly bloated belly.

Sasuke regained composure and said, "Ummm, sure, it's fine," as he headed into the kitchen and poured himself a cup of water. Observing Naruto's body, he couldn't believe how much his training this morning had impacted him, and perfectly everything seemed to go hand-in-hand. His chest, his arms, forearms and even though he was still wearing pants, his thighs were all perfectly firm and visibly muscular. Not thick and beefy, but moderately thin as Naruto usually was and respectably ripped; almost chiseled, while his abdomen seem to completely complement his muscular chest as this large, round appendix, appearing almost strained beneath so much muscle above and below it, yet perfectly contained.

After drinking his glass. Sasuke noticed a hint of discomfort across Naruto's face as he massaged his stomach, then sat next to him. "Something wrong, Naruto?" asked Sasuke.
"Nothing too bad, just kind of a bellyache..." responded Naruto as his face visibly winced to a sudden gurgling emanating from his gullet. Smirking to himself, Sasuke said, "Well, I could certainly help with that, if you'd like."
"Oof...ugh, yeah, by all means, man..."

With that, Naruto leaned back against the couch, letting his belly hang just slightly more over his lap while Sasuke gently placed his hand atop it, and at first, simply kept his hand in one place right above Naruto's belly button while his fingers soothingly massaged the firm yet hollow flesh in its stead. Naruto closed his eyes and cooed with delight as a notable smile of bliss grew over his face. "Mmmm, dude, that feels sooooo good..."
You can say that again, thought Sasuke with a grin of his own, before moving his hand circularly all around Naruto's perfectly ballooned gut.

After some moments, Sasuke could feel a great amount of pressure and tension building in certain portions of Naruto's belly, and as per usual, began to knead and press on these tense regions of his gut, until successfully working up some of the gas pockets that had been stuck. Feeling a rush of air rising in his throat, Naruto slammed his fist into his chest and let free a beastly loud belch which carried on for a few seconds before he leaned back and sighed with relief.

As he glanced back at Sasuke, he couldn't help but notice an almost giddy grin on his face, before he smirked and teasingly said, "Hehe, you like those, don'tcha?"
"I just think it's impressive. It's almost a direct representation of the results of how much you've eaten. And, given how much you've eaten..." Sasuke noted as he patted Naruto's distended gut for emphasis, "...I'd say the results are accurately loud."

Scratching the back of his head for a moment trying to wrap his head around all the science-y talk, Naruto chuckled sheepishly and said, "Well, I dunno about all that. All I know is that my stomach feels a whole lot better after I do. Like at the buffet? Hooooly crap, did it feel good getting those titans outta my system. Guess that comes with the territory of being like the best burper in all of Konoha, huh?" he noted proudly. To which, Sasuke smirked in a sly manner and said, "Well...I dunno if that's a fair statement to make." As expected, Naruto immediately glared back at Sasuke as he continued, "Afterall, a lot of the ones you've been letting out today have been with some help..." he rubbed around Naruto's gut for emphasis, earning a heated glare from the blond as a result.

"Oh yeah? Well, try this one on for size!" Naruto said intently as he sat up as much as he could with his gut sticking out almost on top of his thighs. He then proceeded to slap his belly as hard as he could a few times in an effort to force out as much gas as he could in one fell swoop. The result led to an ear-splitting loud belch which carried on for several bassy seconds straight, followed immediately by a lighter but lengthy after-burp. By the time it was over, Sasuke couldn't help but laugh and applaud his friend, "That was pretty awesome!" he noted.
"NEVER doubt the master!" shouted Naruto as he patted his belly proudly, but immediately winced. "Oof, that actually kinda hurt, heh. Crap, think I might've jostled some of those gas bubbles outta whack" Sasuke chuckled upon hearing this, then immediately planted his palm firmly against Naruto's gut. "Eh, I guess even the master needs help sometimes..."

Sasuke spent the next few moments rubbing Naruto's belly and easing the tension as best he could...
115331111121111212121221212211121.title: Sasuke gives Naruto a much needed belly rub.

1153311111211112121212212122111212.content:
The conversation then died down at bit, and Naruto laid back on the couch, with Sasuke shifting position to continue rubbing his belly. "Ya know, Sasuke?" Naruto said, "I always thought that you were uptight, and that you hated me, but I'm glad to know that you're actually a pretty nice guy."

"Thanks for that." Sasuke replied. "It's not to often when someone actually cares about who I am instead just my accomplishments. I've always admired your ability to take the heaviness out of life, and to be honest, I've always been jealous of your ability to laugh anything off and put on a tough face, even despite the pain inside."

At that remark, Naruto was silent, as he was taking in everything that was said, and he said, "Thanks, Sasuke. If there's anyone who understands the pain of loneliness, it's you. By the way, can I stay the night?"

Sasuke replied with "Of course! You're pretty much ready to sleep now." Either way, Naruto said, "Goodnight, then!" and Sasuke replied with another "Goodnight" as he patted Naruto's bloated belly softly.

The next morning, Naruto was the first to wake up bright and early. When Sasuke woke up, and walked out to the living room, he was greeted with a loud, "Hey Sasuke!" and Sasuke recoiled a bit from the sheer loudness.

"What is it?" Sasuke asked, a bit groggily at that. Naruto smiled, then said...
