11533111112111121212122121221112122.content:
Much to Sasuke's surprise, Naruto was already dressed in his traditional orange sweat pants, workout shoes, a black sleeveless tanktop, and his traditional headband. He grinned playfully and said, "What took you so long to wake up?" asked Naruto energetically as he hopped around with a bit of bounce to his feet, earning a confused "Huh?" from Sasuke. To which, Naruto replied with, "Let's train!"

Sasuke glanced back down at Naruto's stomach, which no longer bared the bloat of yonder, but neither did it maintain the same physical firmness and perfection that came of yesterday's training session. It had gone from a concave firm to a flat and soft surface with only a hint of muscle buried beneath a thin layer of fat that currently flattened and softened Naruto's stomach.

Rubbing his eyes, he looked back at the clock and said, "It's a little early to be training, isn't it?"
"Eh, it's only early if you look at it vaguely. If the day were spent training, sure, it'd be early. But as you can guess..." Naruto started, earning a curious glance from a still dazed and groggy Sasuke, "I'm planning on working up QUITE an appetite..." as those words left his mouth, Naruto slapped his stomach firmly for emphasis, earning a smirk from Sasuke as he finally said, "Well, since you put it THAT way..." before getting ready and heading to the dojo with Naruto once again.

Some time had passed as Sasuke helped Naruto train physically and tirelessly for hours on end. He held down the young man's feet while he did one set of sit ups after another. He helped spot him while he did some old fashion weight lifting, pulling up some pretty impressive weights by himself. His biceps and shoulders growing more firm and muscular with each set. As he lifted his last set, Sasuke couldn't help but notice the veins in his muscles practically popping out of his arms. It was quite an impressive sight to see how much he could work himself out in so short a period of time. Placing the bar back up, Naruto breathed heavily as he leaned up against the bench press, wiping his face with a towel from all the sweat gathering all around him. Feeling how moist his shirt had gotten from working out so extensively, Naruto opted to pull it off from his body. His bare torso; a beacon of physical perfection, glistened with sweat as he continued to catch his breath. Sasuke was amazed at how quickly Naruto's body had transformed.

Within mere hours, his stomach was once again complemented with rock hard abs, and without an once of fat to be found anywhere. "I can't believe you've already worked off last night's binge. You look like an entirely different person!" Sasuke noted in awe, earning a chuckle from Naruto as he rubbed the back of his sweaty head a bit. "Haha, yep! What can I say? I train hard if I know I'm gonna eat hard!" Sasuke laughed a bit, still kind of exhausted from his own lesser workout, but was still completely fixated on how vastly defined Naruto's stomach had become since the start of this morning. "T-this is gonna sound weird, but...can I touch them? It was so round and bloated yesterday! Now, I just...I gotta feel the difference..." Chuckling a bit sheepishly, Naruto stretched his arms back a bit to make room and said, "Knock yourself out." Sasuke immediately rested his hand atop Naruto's sweaty bare stomach. He couldn't believe how rock hard it felt. His abs felt as if they were in fact made of stone, even with the hint of softness that comes from human flesh, it was almost unreal. Slowly, he raised his hand towards Naruto's upper belly, and the results were the exact same; pure muscle without a single visible ounce of fat to felt anywhere. Blushing a bit, Naruto smirked as Sasuke's hand kind of tickled in this current state as Sasuke removed his palm and still in awe, said, "Wow...I can't think of a single person who could work themselves so extensively so fast. Your will is unmatched, Naruto." Smiling proudly, Naruto said, "Thanks! But I wouldn't get too used to these bad boys, cause I'm feeling MIIIIIIGHTY peckish right now." He gave his firm bare belly a hearty slap as it growled viciously, much to Sasuke's surprise. Shortly after, Naruto showered, got changed into more casual attire, and with Sasuke, headed out to reward themselves for such a remarkable training and workout session.

"So, Naruto, where do you feel like eating?" asked Sasuke. Thinking for a moment, Naruto eventually decided on....

Luckily for Teuchi, the stand was empty right now, so he could focus on serving Naruto.

Teuchi proceeded to the back to make an enormous pot of miso pork ramen, as it was Naruto's favorite, and knowing Naruto, he was going to need that much ramen. The pot could easily hold a small child, and Teuchi practically made this batch in bulk, so it took longer.

Meanwhile, Naruto and Sasuke were talking like good friends would, bringing up various missions and such, an atmosphere that surprised Teuchi, as he was always under the impression that Naruto hated Sasuke, given previous conversations he had with Naruto.

Either way, after more than twenty minutes, Teuchi informed Naruto that the ramen was ready, then he proceeded to get a serving bowl for Naruto. Seeing this, Naruto...

"Oiy, Teuchi! Do you think you could whip up another bowl for my pal over here?" asked Naruto, to which, Teuchi smirked and said, "Well, I figured you'd be taking in a few of these, so I had another one ready for you when this was done. One second, I'll go get it for you." Teuchi went to the back of the stand to go put the final touches on the already practically made second bowl, while Naruto and Sasuke continued to chat.

"Y'know, Naruto, I'm not so sure I can do this," said Sasuke uncertainly. Curious, Naruto raised and eyebrow and asked, "Why not?"
"Most people can't put away anywhere near as much as you can. I've hardly ever been able to eat all that much to begin with, how am I gonna stuff away the amount of food you can?"
"It won't be easy the first time, I can say that much. You're gonna wanna quit at every turn, but you won't."
"Why not?"

Smirking, Naruto took a deep breath, and explained, "Because miso pork ramen is the best ramen anyone can make. Just imagine that lush flavorful ramen soaking in your mouth while your tongue savors every ounce of flavor it can absorb. Then imagine that warm, steamy ramen warming your belly and filling you up. After a while, no matter how full you feel, it starts to feel less uncomfortable, and more relaxing, just eating til your hearts content, feeling heavier and heavier, til you've reached your limits. It's tough, but man is it worth it..." finished Naruto, rubbing his stomach eagerly.

Finally, he added, "And don't worry. Yeah, it'll leave an impact and you may add a few pounds here or there, but we'll train the next day. Before you know it, you'll be turning that fat into muscle, and you'll be hungrier than you've ever been in your life. Why do you think I always manage to stay in shape even after stuffing my gut with enough food to feed a mammoth?"

Sasuke considered this. Naruto always seemed to enjoy stuffing his face and working himself tirelessly, before rinsing and repeating again and again. It worked for him, and paid off immensely. Maybe it could work for him too.

As if on cue, an audible, notably hungry rumbling emitted from Sasuke's flat stomach, causing him to blush while Naruto laughed. "Sounds like you could use this," Naruto noted, poking Sasuke's stomach playfully. As he did, Teuchi returned with an equally ample bowl of miso pork ramen for Sasuke, and said, "Enjoy, boys!"

Glancing back at Sasuke, Naruto grinned and said, "Let's do this!"

"Yeah, what do you say we see who can eat the most bowls of ramen?"

Glancing back at each other, they turned their attention back to the ramen and began to slurp it down without haste.

Naruto confidently slurped down an ample amount of ramen noodles with Sasuke not trailing far behind in the slightest. Much to Naruto's surprise, he found Sasuke to be inhaling his noodles as a rather quick pace for someone who wasn't usually inclined to stuff himself the way Naruto was so accustomed to doing. Nevertheless, he wasn't one to be showed up, least of all by a novice eater. Slurping down the remaining noodles and broth, the two immediately turned their attention to their next bowls and wasted no time bringing them to their lips, slurping it down greedily, each one gulping it down as fast as they could to top the other.

All the while, with each passing gulp of noodles and broth gulped down into their gullets, both Sasuke's shirt and Naruto's jacket continued to ride up at a rather even keel. Sasuke's shirt had risen up to expose a good amount of flesh below his navel while Naruto's jacket and undershirt began riding upward near the same position; his abs still visible despite his gradually growing gut.

More and more, the ramen bowls began to stack up considerably for both youths, but neither one, despite how full they felt, was willing to give in to the other. After about ten additional bowls each, both stopped and took a breather.

Both their bellies now exposed both their belly buttons and a bit of flesh above, having now grown to the size of small beach balls each. The two gingerly massaged their aching guts respectively, groaning in satisfaction and a bit of discomfort. "Ahhh, I tell ya, Sasuke, there's no better feeling in the world than having this much ramen in your belly at once..." gloated Naruto as he patted his distended belly proudly. Sasuke simply groaned in discomfort as he continued to massage his pale stomach. "What's wrong? You're not full ALREADY, are you?"
"Rgh, n-no, it's nothing. It's just that my stomach just feels really tight right now...I've never eaten this much before in my life..." groaned Sasuke, rubbing his aching belly all over, trying to coax the pain away.

Glancing back at his friend, Naruto thought for a moment, thinking back to whenever his own gut felt that way. Finally, he concluded, "Sounds like you got a little extra gas in your gut that you need to burp out."
"I would, except I don't really know how," confessed Sasuke a bit embarrassed, earning a chuckle from Naruto. "You kiddin'? It's easy!" As if to demonstrate his point, Naruto gulped down some air, pounded his chest with his fist, and let out a rather loud belch on the spot, before smacking his lips and slapping his belly proudly. "See?"
"Yeah, it doesn't come that easily for me..." responded an annoyed Sasuke, still strained from the pressure brewing in his gut.
"Look, if you're gonna stuff yourself, you need to learn how to relieve pressure whenever it builds up. Otherwise, you'll never properly finish a meal. Think back to when you helped me last night...in fact, ah, I know JUST what to do!"

Just then...

He was amazed at how the normally very thin and light eater was able to pack away so much for his stomach to have distended so vastly in so short a time. So much so that he was more fixated on helping Sasuke push it to its' absolute limits than he was stuffing his own bloated gut with his favorite dish. "Really?"
"Yup! In fact, I think you can push yourself as far as I did that first time, with some help."

Upon saying that, Naruto rested his palm flat against Sasuke's rounded gut, causing the raven haired boy to blush slightly. "So whadduya say, Sasuke? Wanna see how far ya can go?"
Sasuke nodded and proceeded to resume slurping down bowl after bowl of ramen while Naruto continued to massage his gradually growing tummy, surprised by how much fun he was having trying to massage the bloated flesh in just the right way, earning an uncharacteristically goofy smile from Sasuke each time.

With each passing bowl slurped down, his stomach would inch out further and further, lifting up his shirt just slightly more while his belly began to push against his blue shorts waistband. As it did, Naruto gaped in amazement before laughing a bit and saying, "Holy cow, I can actually FEEL it getting bigger with each bowl you slurp down! That's so cool!" Sasuke chuckled a bit and said in a slightly strained voice, "Yeah, I always enjoyed the feel of it too. It's like feeling a water balloon fill up and get bigger and bigger."
"You said it, man! Let's see how big we can get this balloon going!"

Smiling, Sasuke nodded once again and poured an entire bowl of ramen down into his maw; noodles, broth and all. After spending a few brief moments chewing and savoring the wonderful taste, Sasuke gulped it down his throat, while Naruto felt his stomach expand as the ramen reached its' destination.

Naruto continued to rub Sasuke's belly, easing the tension away after he began to feel cramped from so much ramen. At one point, Naruto could even feel the tension of gas building up within Sasuke's belly, and; as if to make a game of it again, Naruto promptly began feeling around for the tension building gas pockets, and would immediately knead them out, earning some rather loud belches from Sasuke in the process before he would sigh with relief and resume eating his ramen.

As time passed, Sasuke's belly had bloated outward beyond the point of small beach ball, and to the point where it was beginning to look like a medicine ball. Only the bottom portion was constrained by Sasuke's shorts. As Sasuke ate onward, he stopped and winced in discomfort. Naruto initially rubbed to try and coax what he thought was gas, but instead, he noticed the strain came from Sasuke trying to undo his button over his immensely sized stomach. Being all too familiar with the feeling, Naruto helped by lifting the lower portion of Sasuke's belly just enough for Sasuke to reach and undo his shorts button.

Immediately after doing so, Naruto released Sasuke's gut, which immediately flopped down, pushing down the teeth of the zipper and expanding outward a good inch a half promptly after. Sighing with immense relief, Sasuke smiled and loudly exclaimed, "MUCH better!" before blushing at his sudden outburst, earning a hearty laugh from Naruto. "Welcome to the club, man," noted Naruto, patting Sasuke's belly playfully while he continued eating.

After a good few more moment, Sasuke's belly had ballooned outward to the point where he looked to be pregnant with triplets, almost resting on his upper thighs. He proceeded to slurp down his final bowl of ramen, before stacking it with the many other bowls he'd already consumed, then leaning back and patting his belly proudly. "Ohhh...I've never been so full in all my life..." groaned Sasuke, before pausing for a brief moment, and letting out a loud, almost six second belch immediately after. "Whoa, nice one, man!" said Naruto. Sasuke smacked his lips, and with a grin, proudly said, "Wow, I did that one by myself, too!" Naruto laughed, patting Sasuke's belly proudly. "Well, yeah, look at how much you've packed away! You're a natural, pal!"

Sasuke smiled appreciatively and said, "Thanks, Naruto. And you know something? This was actually quite fun, too! Not to mention satisfying," he noted, rubbing his bloated gut gingerly. "Still, I hope tomorrow, we can actually have that contest. I'd really like to put my skills to the test against a REAL champ." Naruto smiled widely and said, "You know it! But first, we should rest up and digest our guts off. After that, we can train and turn all the added girth into muscle...but more importantly, work up an appetite like no other, cause you're gonna NEED it if you're gonna go up against me."
"Sounds like a plan," responded Sasuke, both eager and still immensely full.

Finishing, Naruto licked his lips happily and patted his bloated belly happily, before microwaving up a few dozen bowls of instant ramen. In no time at all, he was scarfing noodles and broth down like he would any ramen binge he'd ever partaken on. With each passing bowl gulped down, Naruto's stomach continued to protrude outward a little bit more and more, until about eight bowls later, when his stomach had distended so much that his tank-top had risen high enough to expose an ample amount of flesh just before his belly button.

Leaning back in his chair, Naruto groaned and rested one hand atop his belly. "Ohh man, for instant-stuff, that ramen wasn't half bad..." said a stuffed Naruto. "Feeling full yet?" asked Sasuke. Naruto shook his head, but groaned a bit more. "No, but my gut could use a breather..." Sasuke smirked and rested one hand atop Naruto's belly, before turning to him and asking, "Would you like me to help with that process along the way?" Naruto chuckled and said, "Do ya even need to ask?"

Immediately, Sasuke's palm began to rub all over Naruto's almost beach-ball sized stomach, earning a rather blissful smile from the teen. The rubbing sensation began to circulate the pent up air trapped in Naruto's belly, causing Naruto to let out a few ample belches while Sasuke continued to rub away. "Ohhh man, that's never anything short of amazing, Sasuke. You're like a wiz or something, man..."

Smiling, Sasuke patted Naruto's belly and said, "Hey, considering how great it felt when you helped me out, the least I can do is try to make it feel as relaxing as possible when I return the favor, right?" Sasuke continued to gingerly rub Naruto's belly until he felt sated enough to continue with his next meal...
1153311111211112121212212122111212211111.title: Went to the kitchen to give Naruto belly rubs.

1153311112.content: Who was there to greet him?
1153311112.title: Someone else

11533111121.content:
"K-KIBA?!" barked Naruto, eyes wide as saucers as he hid himself beneath the steam. "WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING HERE?!"

Laughing, Kiba; the lean, brunette, teenaged dog-nin, currently wearing his trademark jacket and headband, stood from afar, alongside his big white nin-dog, Akamaru, who wagged his tail and barked in amusement at Naruto. Nice to see you too, Naruto.

Still chuckling, Kiba waved his hand dismissively at the blonde and said, "Ah relax, Uzumaki. We just finished training like...well, like dogs." Akamaru rolled his eyes and smirked a canine smirk at that cheesy remark as Kiba added, "Aaaaand we WERE gonna head home...then a HORRIBLE stench caught our senses. So we thought we'd come over and investigate...low'n behold..."

Scowling, Naruto grunted in annoyance and said, "Yeah? Well, gee, I'm sorry, dog-breath, but when ya bust y'er ass training, ya TEND to work up a sweat. Which is why I'm SHOWERING, dumbass! Sorry if I just happen to train a lil harder than you do."

Akamaru's ears flopped over his eyes.

Heeeere we go...

"Pffft! YOU? Train harder than ME?" Kiba retorted, as he raised an eyebrow. "Please! Me'n Akamaru here were bustin' our asses off for HOURS! I LITERALLY just finished showering up before washing Akamaru up!"

Akamaru; despite himself, chuckled. I always get super fluffy...dunno why...

"Oh yeah? Well, if you were training for HOURS, how come I didn't see you, huh?" retorted Naruto, still hiding in the steam to avoid any more embarrassing incidents. "...More importantly...WHY ARE YOU STILL HERE WHEN I'M TRYING TO SHOWER?!"

Kiba was about to open his mouth with a retort. Before he could, however...

*GGGGGGGUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGLLLLLLEEEEEE!*

Both Naruto and Kiba's eyes widened as the two teens immediately looked down and rested a palm against their respective and groaning stomachs in perfect unison. Akamaru blinked dully.

That sounds like a helluva stalemate if I ever heard one...

Still gripping his rumbling stomach, Kiba blushed and said, "Uhhh, guess we trained a lil longer than I thought..."

Chuckling, Naruto gave his bare, currently toned stomach a few hearty pats. "You can say THAT again..." He then looked back at Kiba and said, "After I wash up, whadduya say to grabbin' some grub? There's still a few places open that we can chow down at." Kiba smirked and said, "That's the smartest thing I've heard you suggest all week, bonehead."

"Ha ha ha..." Naruto uttered in a deadpanned tone before adding, "Well, if ya don't want me smellin' like a foot first, I suggest you guys give me some freakin' privacy..."

"Yeah, yeah, whatever you say, smelly...just don't take too long," replied Kiba as both his and Naruto's stomach's groaned again for emphasis.

--------

Some time later. Naruto emerged, dressed in a casual black T-Shirt with a red Konoha Leaf symbol in the middle, his trademark orange pants, and headband. "Oi! Dog breath! Ya ready?" remarked the young Uzumaki as he approached the dog-nin and his canine companion. "You know it, bonehead!" Kiba replied right back before the trio exited the training grounds.

"So, where ya feel like eatin', Uzumaki? And DON'T say Ramen, cause I had MORE than enough last time..." said Kiba as the two wandered down the village under the moonlight sky. Naruto just scoffed.

"Pffft, man, ya think if Ichiraku's were open at night, I'd EVER have a reason to go home?"

Kiba blinked then shrugged. "...Fair point."

"Besides, I got somewhere else in mind..."

"Oh? Where?"

At that, Naruto grinned impishly and slugged Kiba playfully in the arm. "Don'tchu worry, dog-breath, you'll see..." Still grinning, he folded his arms behind his head and added, "...aaaaaaaaand somethin' tells me y'er gonna like this place..."

As the two walked, Akamaru; overhearing this, whined to himself. Yeah, something tells me he probably will...and I am NOT looking forward to seeing him walk around like he's carrying octuplets...

Hearing that, Kiba chuckled and playfully ruffled Akamaru's furry white head as he said, "H-heh, hey, I can't help it if pint-sized servings don't cut it for me."

Akamaru blinked dully again. A full steak is HARDLY pint-sized...

Kiba grinned toothily and added, "Neither is a 72 oz steak..." He then turned to Naruto as his stomach rumbled again and said, "How much further til we're at this mystery place anyway...?"

Naruto grinned and said, "About two more steps..." And immediately, Kiba looked up, saw where Naruto had led them, and grinned eagerly...

"...Now that's what I'm talkin' about..." remarked Kiba, upon the trio reaching the building in question...

Which was...
11533111121.title: Kiba

11533111122.content: Is it Hinata who spots him?
11533111122.title: Hinata?

choices: Getting toned but still getting a belly
115331112.content: Is it full on muscle or is it more muscular but with a belly?
115331112.title: Muscle Gain

11533112.content: What about Naruto's teacher Kakashi?
11533112.title: Kakashi?

115331122.content: How about Team 10's leader Asuma?
115331122.title: Asuma?

1153311222.content: How about Team 8's resident dog-boy?
1153311222.title: Kiba?

11533112221.content: Do his muscles buff up, or does his midsection swell up?
11533112221.title: Kiba!

choices: Kiba just gets lazy while waiting for missions.
115331122212.content: What is the cause of his gain?
115331122212.title: Weight Gain

1153311222122.content: Maybe he learns about an upcoming eating contest and decides to prepare for it?
1153311222122.title: Something else.

choices: A familiar face spots the feasting dog-nin
11533112221221.content:
Just haaaaaaaaaad to insist we go for a walk in town...smooth Akamaru...reeeeeeaaaaaal smooth...

It was mid afternoon, when Akamaru; a large, white furred nin-dog found himself sitting at a booth in a near empty buffet. The large canine was kicking himself internally for pleading with his owner and dear pal to go for a walk. It all started so great too. The two had been venturing all around Konoha, seeing its' many sights and having the time of their lives. That is, until Akamaru's owner stumbled upon that damned flier.

'Konoha's "Bottomless Pit"' it was called; an eating contest where the contestant to withstand every single wave of food thrown their way would receive an ample cash prize. Akamaru understood the two were strapped for cash at the moment, but nonetheless, he cursed himself immensely for letting his owner spot such a flier...

...And the reason why had just returned to the booth...

"Mmmmm, damn fine lookin' eats, ey, boy?" said the dogs' owner. Kiba; the brown haired, teenaged dog-nin, currently wearing his headband, black pants, sandals, and a gray T-Shirt instead of his trademark leather jacket, had just plopped down on the opposite end of the booth before Akamaru, licking his lips hungrily as he set his tray down on the table. It was literally jam packed with every possible delight Konoha's buffet had to offer. Piles of fried tempura, steaks galore, tons of beef jerkey, fried chicken, BBQ wings and drumsticks, a MASSIVE burger, and even several slices of pizza. The aroma was undeniably intoxicating, but not enough for Kiba's eyes to widen as he snapped his fingers.

"OH! Right! Almost forgot the drink!" he said with a chuckle as he turned the large dog and ruffled his fuzzy, white head. "Back in a sec!" And eagerly, the young man hopped from his booth and back towards the buffet line. Akamaru simply sat there, whimpering some more.

Kiba and Naruto may have bickered often, but they'd grown to be very good friends...who bickered often...but nonetheless, had an ample amount of things in common. They were both stubborn, ill tempered at points, never backed down from a fight or challenge, always watched out for their friends, and in this case...loved, LOVED food.

And there in lied the problem. They never ever knew when to quit. So often, the two would stuff themselves silly and be left damn near incapacitated from fullness. Even after each ordeal, Kiba would occasionally find himself a bit on the heavier side than usual, which; if his mom ever found out, would result in a scene or two the dog could only describe as 'terror incarnate...'

Naturally, being a ninja and dog-nin, meant Kiba lived a very active and athletic life; hence why he'd always manage to work the weight off. As it stood, the teens stomach was currently flat, trim and packing some muscle to boot. But knowing Kiba had a week to prepare for this contest, meant it'd only be a matter of time until the boy overdid it yet again. And with no missions currently lined up for the next few weeks, it remained uncertain how long it might take Kiba to work his inevitable gut off.

"Much better!" exclaimed Kiba as he returned, carrying a few ample pitchers of cola with one hand, and another plate stacked with steaks in the other. Akamaru's eyes immediately bugged out.

Y-you're gonna eat ALL that?! B-but you already have tons of steak! exclaimed the dog in his dog-language, a language Kiba; being a dog-nin, spoke perfectly, as suggested by the playful smirk on his face.

"Pfffft, I wish," replied the brunette teen before; to Akamaru's surprise, he set the plate down before the dog. "What? Ya thought I wasn't gonna share the wealth with my best bud?"

Akamaru, despite himself, wagged his tail and barked appreciatively. Even if Kiba was about to gorge himself on more food than any teenager...or creature alike, should ever eat, he was still always considerate to his canine buddy. And despite the situation, one whiff of those tender, juicy steaks, and Akamaru couldn't help but salivate with anticipation.

Setting his soda pitchers aside, Kiba's empty stomach roared hungrily, as the teen licked his lips, turned to his pal and said, "Whelp, let's get this show on the road!"

And without missing a beat, the boy immediately began tearing into his meal. Akamaru whined low enough for the currently feasting dog-nin to catch it, but nonetheless, as his own stomach rumbled with anticipation, Akamaru; too, tore into his first steak...
11533112221221.title: Kiba's "training" begins!

choices: Kiba continues to trailblaze through his meal
After a while, Kiba needs to take a break
115331122212211.content:
Try as he might to ignore it, Akamaru was unable to glance away as; sure enough, Kiba was already on what could only be described as an 'eating rampage'. Damn near ravenous, Kiba stuffed several shrimp tempura in his mouth at once, chomping greedily before gulping them down and stuffing another handful of tempura right back in his all-too-eager maw, voraciously chomping away, gulping the almost comically ample mouthful down his throat, and immediately digging right back in for more.'

And so it begins... Akamaru sighed to himself as he tore off another chunk of steak and chomped down on it himself. Though, despite the none-too-promising situation, the large dog couldn't help but appreciate how deliciously juicy his steaks were. And for an all-you-can-eat buffet, that said something.

Eventually wolfing down a good deal of tempura, Kiba smacked his lips and reached for a slice of pizza. "Mmmm, this is the stuff, ain't it, boy!" exclaimed Kiba before stuffing half the pizza slice into his maw and chomping it clean in half. Akamaru chuckled uneasily and nodded, not wanting to comment on his lamenting, knowing it would fall on deaf ears. However, watching Kiba stuff the second half of the slice right into his mouth and chewing viciously, Akamaru couldn't help but chime in.

D-do you maybe wanna pace yourself a bit there, Kiba? You don't wanna choke afterall...

Catching this, Kiba winced a bit as he gulped down the massive mouthful of pizza, causing a noticeable bulge of food to slide from his mouth down his throat, then sighed with relief. "I am pacing myself, buddy. But I gotta be quick if I'm gonna be the first to win this thing, right?" Akamaru whined softly.

I guess so...

"And on THAT note..."

Akamaru's eyes bugged out for a moment when he saw Kiba stuff an ENTIRE slice right into his maw, seeing it open wider than he'd ever seen Kiba open his mouth before.

Is...is he really going to try and-

Before Akamaru could finish, Kiba had successfully shut his mouth over the slice, and chewed amply, looking strained, but with an undeniably amused smirk on his face as he did so. Finally, after several moments of strained chewing, Kiba clenched his eyes shut as he took a hearty swallow.

Akamaru blinked dully.

...I think you and I have veeeeery different definitions of pacing, buddy...

Chuckling, Kiba rubbed the back of his head and said, "H-heh, sorry, think I might actually be a lil hungrier than I thought."

...You don't say...

Kiba was about to grab another slice, but winced as a look of discomfort grew over his face, much to Akamaru's concern. Whining, he leaned towards the teen and asked, Kiba? You okay?

But Kiba didn't respond. Rather, he held a finger up for a moment, before balling his palm into a fist, thumping his chest, and burping loudly immediately after.

"Ahhh, much better!" Kiba exclaimed with a smile before taking yet another ample bite of pizza. Akamaru's ears flopped over his head. Thank goodness this place is practically empty...cause this is gonna be a loooooong day...
115331122212211.title: Kiba's on a roll

choices: He needs to stop half way
1153311222122111.content:
Finishing his first piece of steak, Akamaru smacked his chops, and eagerly glanced down at his second piece, before glancing up at Kiba and watching him stuff his craw with a few hearty pieces of jerky at once, chomping on the thick pieces of dried meat and chowing down like there was no tomorrow. Despite the massive quantities of food still left to be conquered, the young man had put a considerable dent on said pile, and still with no end in remote sight.

Glancing under the table, Akamaru whimpered softly as he saw that Kiba's stomach was no longer concave, but flat with an ever so slightly rounded angle to it, hardly noticeable beneath his shirt. Yet, at the rate the dog-nin was chomping away, that was bound to change fairly soon...

"Mmmm-mmm!" hummed Kiba, after gulping down a hearty mouthful of jerky and smacking his lips happily. "Damn! Y'know, for a buffet, this stuff ain't too shabby, wouldn't ya say, bud?" Akamaru barked softly in agreement. Even if he was notably distracted, he couldn't deny that the steaks were, indeed quite delectable. "Heh, too bad the bonehead ain't here. He'd probably get a kick outta this place too."

Actually, I'm pretty sure Naruto would start whining that this place isn't Ichiraku's...

At that, Kiba immediately rolled his eyes and scoffed. "Ohhh man, TELL me about it! I swear, that dope never shuts the hell UP about that stuff!" Then, Kiba stopped for a moment and smirked. "Though, I guess to be perfectly fair, their ramen ain't half bad..." Then, his grin turned impish as he grabbed a piece of jerky and held it towards Akamaru's muzzle. "Still ain't got NOTHIN' on the good stuff though, am I right?"

Akamaru; despite himself, wagged his tail and eagerly bit the piece of jerky out from Kiba's hands and wolfed it down in a matter of moments.

No question...

Smirking, Kiba poured himself a cup of soda and took a hearty swig to wash down the contents in his mouth, before licking his lips, setting the cup aside, and grabbing a few drumsticks at a time. The teen immediately sank his teeth into the chicken and tore off sizable chunks of zesty seasoned meat, chewing voraciously, quickly gulping it down and chomping right back in for more.

The more he put away, the more and more rounded that angle in Kiba's stomach became. It remained well concealed behind his shirt, but with every few hearty mouthfuls gulped down, that slight bump got juuuuuuust a bit bigger and bigger...

And all the while, Akamaru remained every bit as stunned that his friend just kept going and going damn near seamlessly from one bit of food to the other. If he didn't absolutely lament the idea of his dear pal getting heavier, he'd have to be rather impressed with the pace he was keeping up. If anything, he'd definitely be giving the other contestants at this contest a run for their money...

Finally, after gulping down a sizable amount of tempura, Kiba leaned back in his chair and rested a hand against his stomach as he sighed to himself. Gulping down the last piece of his second steak, Akamaru glanced back at Kiba and reluctantly asked, Well, how you feeling so far?

Kiba burped loudly then patted his belly as he glanced back at Akamaru and smirked confidently. "Oh man, heh, I feel like I could eat this stuff for freakin' days! I mean, every last bit of it just tastes so damn great!" Letting out a much lighter burp, Kiba licked his lips then reached over for his burger.

The sheer size of this behemoth required Kiba to carry it firmly with both hands, and; after a light struggle, he managed to bring the beast up to his mouth, which he opened as wide as he had when he was stuffing it with whole pizzas...then; like a famous shark, took a massive CHOMP into the burger, chewing firmly as his face began to light up from the sheer burst of juicy flavors. Little as the canine wanted to admit it, that burger DID look rather savory. Nonetheless, he turned his attention to his third piece of steak, admittedly, feeling a tad full, but; Akamaru being Akamaru, was utterly too enticed by delicious and juicy beef to call it a day just yet. That, plus he'd need a distraction to keep from watching his buddy inevitably eat himself into a stupor.

And so, Akamaru got to work on his steak while Kiba chomped and chomped and chomped some more...
1153311222122111.title: Kiba continues to trailblaze through his meal

11533112221221112.content:
Time ticked by as Kiba and Akamaru tore into their respective dishes: Kiba taking bite out of bite out of his titanic burger, Akamaru tearing into his third piece of deliciously juicy steak. In spite of how ridiculously oversized the burger was, Kiba kept at it, spurred oward by just how zesty and flavorful it was. Akamaru, even as he watched Kiba tear into the burger with a mix of concern and envy, ripped off bite after bite of his steak, tail wagging at the juicy flavor. Oh man, this steak is awesome! His eyes went over to his plate, and his enthusiasm dimmed a bit when he saw just how much was left. Even if that means I'll end up looking like I'm carrying puppies...

Oblivious to his buddy's inner musings, Kiba continued ripping into his burger, privatey marveling at just how tasty it was...and how much he still had to go. Can't let that stop me, he thought, taking a particularly huge chomp of the sandwich. If I'm gonna take the gold in that contest, I can't let something like THIS keep me down! With that thought galvanizing him into action, he continued devouring the burger.

With every several hearty bites he took, the bump under Kiba's shirt bulged ever-so-slightly, pushing out further and further. Kiba felt his tummy getting heavier, but he merely grinned and pressed on. Likewise, Akamaru, gulping down a mouthful of his steak, glanced at his own stomach, and winced as he saw a very noticeable furry bump where his midsection was. Yep, thought so... Then, shrugging, he went back to his steak; while he was starting to feel a little more full, the steak was just too damn good...

Finally, Kiba set his behemoth burger back on the table, leaning back in his seat and contentedly patting his belly. "Ah, man," he muttered, licking his lips. "This burger's a hell of a contender..."

Indeed it was; despite the delicious flavor of the sandwich and his own determination, the sheer size of the burger had forced him to take a break partway; as such, half of the beefy behemoth now sat upon the table, the other half resting inside Kiba's bulging tummy. At this point, his midsection had swollen up rather noticeably, pushing forward noticeably and, despite the fact that it remained underneath his shirt, a few more hearty mouthfuls of food would likely change that. His waistline was also beginning to feel a bit snug, but he didn't pay that much mind at the moment.

"Ahhh," he exclaimed, grinning and licking his lips as he patted his belly, slouching back in his seat, "that's some good beef..."

Really? Akamaru woofed flatly, licking his own chops and staring at Kiba's engorged tummy. Never woulda guessed... Suddenly, he yawned, and leaned back into his own part of the booth, shutting his eyes. Though he had no intention of sleeping (and the fact he didn't want to leave those oh-so-delicious steaks sitting a moment longer than they needed to), he felt like he needed some kind of rest...

Chuckling at the sight, Kiba did the same, leaning back, shutting his eyes, and gently rubbing his belly...

Ooh, hey, that burger looks mighty tasty. You gonna eat the rest of that?

Kiba chuckled. "Yeah, I actually kinda wa---"

His eyes flew open as he recognized the canine voice, as did Akamaru's. Slowly, their heads turned toward the side of the booth from where the voice had come.

Standing in front of the table were three rather large dogs, each roughly Akamaru's size. The three were absolutely identical: somewhat wolf-like in apperance, ash-colored fur on the tops of their bodies and tail, white fur on the rest of them, and brown/gray eyes. One-the one who had spoken-was sitting, his tail wagging. The other two-his brothers- stood up, staring up at Kiba and Akamaru as their own tails wagged.

Akamaru blinked and stared, making sure he hadn't nodded off and this wasn't some sort of dream. The Haimaru Brothers? the dog wondered privately. Out loud, he asked, What're you guys doing here?

One of the others-the dog standing to the first sibling's right-barked happily, panting. What, we need an excuse to visit our two favorite squirts? Besides, Hana's booked full-time for today; she said we could take the day off. This one's voice had a slightly higher register than the first's.

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "Squirt?" He repeated, a playful tone to his voice. "In case ya forgot, I'm a Chunin now..."

...and I'm the same size as all of you, Akamaru retorted, even knowing it would do no good.

The third sibling-the one to the first's left-winked at the two. We told ya before, didn't we? No matter how big or successful either of ya get, you'll always be squirts to us. In contrast to the second sibling, this one's voice had a slightly deeper register.

The first brother-the one who was sitting-finally got to his paws, trotting up to Kiba. Come on now, enough gawking. Say hi to your pal, willya?

Chuckling, Kiba reached a hand out and ruffled the dog's head. "Heh, good to see you too, Shomaru."

(Though the brothers, upon being born, had simply been christened 'The Haimaru Brothers' , they'd each settled upon a name for themselves to allow others to differentiate between them: Shomaru, Nimaru, and Sanmaru.)

In reply, Shomaru playfully licked Kiba's hand. Same here, kiddo.

Watching this, Nimaru and Sanmaru rolled their eyes. Pffft...suck-up. Nonetheless, they both trotted over to Akamaru's seat, tails wagging.

Akamaru, in spite of himself, wagged his tail. Hey, guys; what's goin' on? Despite his annoyance at repeatedly being called 'squirt', he was actually rather fond of the triplets; ever since he'd been a pup, they'd played with him whenever they got the chance, had gone with him and Kiba on play-missions....in short, they'd almost been like uncles to him.

Nimaru-the one with a higher register-shrugged. Eh, nothin' much; walking around the village, seeing the sights, peeing on that snooty visiting noble's robes... Akamaru's eyes widened at that, but before he could protest, Sanmaru-the one with the lower register-cut in. Oh, and we also came across Naruto stuffing himself at that ramen place he loves so much.

Kiba started at this, looking up even as he continued petting Shomaru. "Wait, you saw Naruto?"

Shomaru nodded. Yep. I thought I overheard him saying he was getting ready for some sort of contest; the "Konoha Bottomless Pit", or something?

Kiba nodded, laughing. "Yep, that's the one." He indicated the bounty of food still on the table, as well as the half-eaten burger. "I'm actually gettin' ready for that, too."

Nimaru glanced over. Not that I don't have faith in ya, kid, but...are ya really gonna keep that from your mom? At this, everyone present shuddered. I mean, whenever ya stuff yourself...she ain't too happy...

Understatement of the century, Kiba thought, shuddering. And if KUROMARU finds out... He clamped down on that thought, not wanting to take it to its logical conclusion. Out loud, he replied, "Eh...I'm still workin' on that." He gave the brothers an imploring glance. "Uh, you guys won't..."

Sanmaru winked at him. Our muzzles are sealed.

Nimaru rolled his eyes and looked at his brother. That'd be a first.

Sanmaru glared at his sibling. Oh cram it, ya jerk! You're not exactly an impenetrable fortress yourself! What about when Kuromaru caught us returning home covered in pink polka dots, and you BLABBED to him that it was a botched prank on the Hokage?

Shomaru, catching this, trotted over to the two. Oh, don't act like you're completely innocent; YOU were the one who tripped that exploding feather bag!

Nimaru growled. Yeah, but at least I didn't knock over that stack of papers and get the whole damn ANBU sent after us!

Shomaru snarled. What did you say?!

Nimaru glared at him. You heard me!

Sanmaru barked at both of them. You're both jerks.

WHAT?!

At this, the three started barking at each other, arguing, bickering, and making frankly immature facial expressions at one another. Kiba and Akamaru stared at the sight, torn between embarrassment and amusement. It was the strangest thing, really; while they were on missions, the three were the epitome of professionalism: always devoted to the mission, all business. Off mission, though?

...well, there was a reason several older members of the clan, human and canine alike, swore up and down that the three had been dropped on their heads at least once during their puphood.

The two watched this go on for a bit, until...
11533112221221112.title: He needs to stop half way

choices: Kiba and Akamaru resume chowing down
Kiba decides to wash down that burger
115331122212211122.content:
The trio of large identical dogs continue to bark and bicker back and forth; their words lost in a sea of obscenities and barks. Both Kiba and Akamaru continue to watch in an embarrassed yet undeniably amused fashion as the two can't help but snicker at the sheer ridiculousness being loudly exclaimed by the Haimaru Brothers.

That is, until...

*GGGGGGUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRGGGGGGGLLLLEEEE!!*

A pair of rather audible gurgles emit from both Kiba and Akamaru's stomachs in unison. The hungry rumbles were so loud, in fact, that they could actually be heard over the dogs bickering, which; oddly enough, silenced the Haimaru as they all stopped, and shared curious glances at both Kiba and Akamaru alike, and noting the red flush on Kiba's face and the blush of embarrassment seeping from under Akamaru's white fur.

"Man, you squirts really ARE hungry, ain'tcha..."

Chuckling sheepishly, Kiba rubbed the back of his head and said, "H-heh, guess so..."

Shaking off his embarrassment, Kiba glanced down at his burger and licked his chops. Akamaru does the same with his steaks, but then stops as he realizes something.

Oh, hey, since you guys are here, do ya want anything to eat? I mean, it IS a buffet, piped Akamaru.

Nah, we're good, replied Nimaru.

Sanmaru, on the other hand, glanced at Akamaru's steak and licked his chops. Although...those steaks DO look quite tasty...

Shomaru simply rolled his eyes. Oh, will you stop being such a damn pig? We LITERALLY just ate half an hour ago!

Sanmaru growled back at the other dog. Hey! I didn't say I wanted to EAT it! I said it looked tasty! That a crime?

Nimaru then snickered and added, Plus, you ain't exactly one to talk, Shomaru...or should I say...'Blimpmaru?'

Shomaru immediately snapped his head back at the other twin and growled. What'd you call me...?

Nimaru flashed a grin. Oh, I'm sorry, is that NOT what I should call someone who stuffed his face to the gills with all those pork chops when Kuromaru was on mission?

And like YOU didn't stuff y'er damn face with all those drumsticks?

Hey! At least I didn't roll around like an ass like a certain SOMEONE did after he got into the jerky!

Then, Sanmaru's ears perk up as he barks angrily. Hey, don't drag ME into this, you horse's ass!

Aaaaaand like clockwork, the trio were bickering again in full force. Akamaru and Kiba glance at each other for a bit, then chuckle amongst themselves before digging in. Akamaru wasted little time chomping into his next steak with vigor as he took hearty bites and savored the juicy, tender meat.

And like before, Kiba assaulted his burger like a shark to a sailboat, with one massive shark bite after another. His cheeks were immediately bulging with burger meat and other ingredients as he chewed and chewed and chewed some more, before taking an ample gulp that sent a large, noticeable bulge down his throat, only to disappear into his chest, and eventually add to the increasing mass in his midsection.

With every few bites, Kiba's stomach expanded more and more, with him occasionally stopping to rub his belly soothingly or burp to make a little more room for the incoming burger. Not as though he'd be done after this burger...not if he wanted to be ready for this competition, but even still, the burger's sheer size required some accommodation...

Akamaru's tummy; like Kiba's, had also begun to swell up ever more noticeably. He whined to himself, realizing it would be hard to chastise Kiba for eating so much, when he was doing the exact same thing. But, for the life of him, he couldn't help himself when it came to steaks so utterly delicious.

The two ate and ate, while the Haimaru bickered and bickered, until finally...

*BBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAPPPP!*

Their bickering once again came to a halt as a pair of utterly titanic belches emitted from both Kiba and Akamaru. As the burps subsided, both Kiba and Akamaru sighed in unison and leaned back in their seats. Akamaru had put a considerable dent in his stack of steaks, while Kiba had successfully demolished his massive burger, the result of which left his belly so swollen, the slightest sliver of flesh could now be seen from the bottom of his shirt.

"Man oh man, now THAT'S a damn good burger!" Exclaimed Kiba merrily as he smacked his bloated gut proudly. Akamaru simply smacked his chops and added, these steaks aren't too bad either!

Despite himself, Shomaru chuckled. Well, least we ain't as bad as THESE two squirts, right? And both his other siblings simply snickered at the sight of the two engorged pals and nodded.

No question.

And so, shortly after taking the brief moment to catch their breath...
115331122212211122.title: Kiba and Akamaru's stomachs growl

choices: Kiba and Akamaru finish their current plates, and Kiba goes up for more
Kiba winces as he feels his waistline becoming tight....
1153311222122111221.content:
Of course, it didn't take long for Kiba and Akamaru to get their second wind and jump right back into their meals. For Kiba, he simply didn't want to lose steam now, especially if he was gonna win that contest. Akamaru? Well, the steaks were just too damn tasty to let sit...

And so, licking their chops, they immediately began digging right back into their treats; Kiba alternating between shoving handfuls of tempura and jerky into his mouth, with Akamaru taking large bites out of his steaks. Every now and then, the dog-nin would pick up a few drumsticks and rip massive hunks of meat off of them, or take massive bites of pizza, wash it down with a hearty gulp of cola, and dive right back in.

All the while, the Haimaru's watched, marveling both at the speed at which they were going and the fact that, as Kiba continued shoveling goodies into his mouth, his tummy slowly but surely bulged bigger and bigger as more and more food plopped into it. It swelled and pushed out noticeably, his t-shirt slowly sliding up and the small sliver of exposed flesh widening.

Damn, Shomaru woofed to his brothers, lookit the kid go!

Sanmaru's eyes widened. Geez, he must really be hungry, huh? He shrugged. 'Course, there's the fact he's gettin' ready for that contest, too...

Nimaru was too fixated on Kiba's slowly growing belly to join in the conversation. Instead, he barked, How big ya think the squirt's gut is gonna be by the time he's done here?

Catching this, Sanmaru glanced at the bouty of food still on the table, then at the rest of the buffet. Depends on whether or not he's going back for seconds after he's done all this...

Somehow, Kiba caught this; swallowing a mouthful of chicken, he glanced over at the brothers and grinned. "You're damn right I'm going back up! And I ain't leavin' till I feel like I'm gonna explode!"

Akamaru's eyes widened, even he gulped down the last bite of his current piece of steak and pulled the next one close to him. That's what I was afraid of... the dog whined to himself, taking rather large bite of the new steak.

Chuckling a bit at the younger dog's reaction, Shomaru wagged his tail and looked between his brothers. Bettin' ya five dog treats Kiba's belly button pops out before he's done here. Akamaru yelped, but quickly got himself under control before Kiba noticed.

Nimaru smirked. Make it ten, and you're good to go.

Sanmaru, tail wagging, eagerly added his two cents. And I'm bettin' ya Akamaru's gonna be batting at it too once it goes...

Akamaru flushed a deep red under his fur at this, and Kiba reddened slightly too. In spite of this, he managed a smirk. "Y-ya know, boy," Kiba began, picking up a wing and tearing into it, "There's no shame in admitting ya like playing with my belly-button when it pops..." He grimaced as he chewed. "Even if it feels really, really weird when you do..."

Nimaru snickered. You didn't seem to mind last time it happened...or was it some other squirt who was grinnin' like a goof and sticking his tongue out as that little nub'a flesh went back and forth like a punching bag?

This time, Kiba's face DID burn red in embarrassment, and he quickly dove back into his food, cramming a slice of pizza into his mouth; it was times like that we was exceptionally grateful that his clan's dogs, with the exception of Kuromaru, only spoke 'dog'...

Akamaru wasn't much better. Y-yeah, keep laughing, you three, Aamaru stammered, trying to sound reproving. Wh-what about when he...WE eat so much we get wedged into the damn booth? He gave a worried look to his tummy, which had ballooned up a bit more from the steak.

To his surprise, Nimaru gave a matter-of-fact answer. Whaddaya think? We help pry ya out.

Akamaru tilted his head, growling in annoyance. I was being serious.

Nimaru smirked a bit. So was I.

Shomaru picked up from from where his brother had left off. OK, we'll admit, it's fun watching you two eat so much you look like you're having puppies...but you really think we'd just leave ya hanging?

Chuckling a bit at Kiba and Akamaru's surprised expressions, Sanmaru continued. In case ya forgot, we're a pack... he winked at the two. ...and pack members look out for one another.

Akamaru's eyes widened. Guys... he whined, more than a bit touched. As goofy, silly, and downright crazy the Haimaru's could be off-mission, it was easy to forget that they were also among the most loyal, devoted clan-mates---and friends--- one could ask for.

Kiba, equally taken off guard, nonetheless managed a smile. "...thanks, guys," he finally said, his tone full of gratitude. His smile quickly turned mischievous, though, and he added, "Hope you guys are ready for a workout, 'cause me 'n Akamaru are gonna be goin' all the way today!"

Sanmaru trotted up to Kiba, licking his hand. Wouldn't expect anything less. Then, smirking, he glanced back at the other two. Dunno about me, but these two layabouts are definitely gonna need a workout... Ignoring Shomaru and Nimaru's indignant growls, he winked at Kiba in a mock-conspiratorial manner. They've been doin' a lot of laying around lately, if ya catch my drift...

Laughing, Kiba patted Sanmaru on the head. "Ah, don't worry; I'll give 'em a good workout." Then, flashing one last smirk at the dog, he immediately resumed digging into his meal, this time targeting several large pieces of fried chicken. Wagging his tail, Sanmaru trotted back to his siblings, who both glared at him. What? he asked innocently.

Akamaru, in spite of the looming realization that, yes, he and Kiba likely WOULD get wedged into the booth, couldn't help but wag his tail as he looked at the brothers. Ahhh....never change, you three, he thought fondly, before hopping back to his own steak.

Time went by, and Kiba and Akamaru continued digging into their meals. Their bellies slowly continued to swell, with Kiba's ballooning up, pushing forward, and forcing his shirt higher and higher, exposing more skin. All the while, the Haimaru's watched, in a mix of fascination and anticipation...

Eventually...
1153311222122111221.title: Kiba and Akamaru resume chowing down

choices: Kiba chows down until he snaps his button
Kiba gets a stomachache trying to snap his button off
11533112221221112211.content:
Like a machine, both the teen and his dog chomped and chomped and chomped some more. Kiba; holding two drumsticks in each hand, dug his face into one drum, tore off an ample chunk, and as he was chewing voraciously, turned to the other drum, and tore off a huge chunk of THAT piece as well.

Sanmaru's eyes widened at the sight. Maaaaaan, lookit the kid go! He's like some damn eating machine'er something!

But the other brothers were equally fascinated with the pace in which an otherwise reluctant Akamaru was chowing down.

The large white furred nin-dog was holding an entire piece of steak up by his muzzle. He was chewing on the part of it inside his mouth vigorously, gulping down a good bit of it as he tilted his head back a bit and allowed more of the steak to slide into his surprisingly eager maw, only for him to repeat the same process over again.

H-heh, think that's something? Check out Squirt number two over here! Pup's like a freakin' Seagull wolfing down a guppy! remarked Nimaru, much to Akamaru's embarrassment. However, despite hearing that, he still soldiered on, right alongside his buddy, gulping down more and more of their ample bounty, while the dogs watched.

Uh-huh, yeah, I WISH guppies looked even half as good as those steaks do... remarked Sanmaru, licking his lips eagerly as he watched the dog wolf down those savory chunks of beef. But nonetheless, shook it off and maintained composure...for the most part.

Having picked the drumsticks of all meat, Kiba took another hearty swig of cola, sighed with relief, and promptly stuffed another slice of pizza right into his maw, nearly in one bite like before.

Shomaru, having turned to Kiba in time to bare witness to this occurrence, bugged out for a moment. Holiest of craps...

The other two dogs turned, and promptly gaped as they saw Kiba stuff an entire spice of pizza; right down to the crust, right into his mouth. His cheeks bulged comically as he chewed witha notably strained look on his face, before; with a MIGHTY gulp, sent that humungous mouthful down his throat and into his gullet. Gasping with relief, Kiba licked his lips and grabbed more chicken wings.

Do yourself a HUGE favor, kid...don't ever...ever...ever...and I mean EVER...do that around your mom...or Kuromaru... muttered Somaru, flabbergasted, but with a slight smirk across his muzzle to signify him being notably impress.

After gulping down a chunk of chicken meat, Kiba chuckled nervously and rubbed the back of his head. "H-heh, yeah, that's...that's a given..." replied the boy before stuffing his craw with more and more food.

Once again, Akamaru; even as he ate his own steaks, found himself glancing over at his dera friend, seeing him still stuffing his face with whatever could fit inside of it, and wincing nervously as he saw how rounded out Kiba's belly had become.

Having packed away such a positively stupendous amount of food in so little a duration, Kiba's stomach had swollen to the point where it looked like he had swallowed a medicine ball. On top of that, his shirt had hiked just atop his belly button, making Akamaru even more nervous.

Oh, great...won't be long now til Kiba's belly button's showing...then it won't be long til he eventually pops it outward...and THEN it won't be long til I accidentally try pawing at it when it's wobbling...aaaaaaaaaaand then, I'll never ever hear the freaking end of it from these guys...

Akamaru was in a bind, indeed. Kiba was only going to stuff himself further and further, and even after the days' escapades had passed, it'd only encourage him to rinse and repeat for his next "training session". But, nonetheless, it did no use worrying now since it was going to happen regardless. Plus, it was hard to say no to such delicious steaks...steaks which got Akamaru wondering about some of the other treats this place had to offer...

Nonetheless, for the time being, the two ate and ate. Akamaru's plate of steaks was starting to thin out considerably. And Kiba's tray was beginning to get lighter and lighter as the sheer mountain of food laid upon it grew smaller and smaller.

Finally, after swallowing one last piece of fried shrimp tempura, Kiba had successfully picked his tray dry. Like his pal, Akamaru's plate had been demolished and literally licked clean.

So...much...meat... whimpered Akamaru as he glanced down and saw his bloated tummy sticking outward considerably.

And'ja look like y'er about to give birth to a few pups, pup! added Nimaru.

Akamaru blinked dully and glanced at the Haimaru in question. Yes, thank you for that...

Chuckling at that, Kiba slouched back in his chair, let out a massive belch, then sighed with relief as he patted his own rounded stomach proudly. "Ohhh man, you weren't kiddin', boy...this stuff is FILLING, but MAN does it taste awesome!"

Akamaru, despite himself, wagged his tail. No question...

He glanced slightly at his owner, seeing Kiba's belly had swollen to the point where his shirt now rode a little bit above his belly button, and oddly enough, seemed surprised. Huh, thought his stomach might have been bigger by now... the canine thought to himself.

Then, to his alarm, Kiba winced a bit.

Kiba? You okay?

"Huh? Oh, h-heh, yeah, I'm cool," replied the teen as he reached over his massive belly, trying to get to his pants button. "...Rgh, think I forgot to unbutton my pants again..."

The boy struggled and struggled some more, much to the amusement of the Haimaru's. Until eventually, he stopped and shrugged...then grinned mischievously. "Whelp, guess I gotta unbutton the only other way I know how..."

And with that, Kiba rose from his seat, ample belly sloshing just slightly, but constricted due to the button containment, and approached the buffet line while Akamaru's ears flopped over his eyes.

Greaaaaaat...so, on top of EVERYTHING else, NOW I gotta worry about flying buttons...

Again, the Haimaru laughed amongst themselves, just as Kiba returned with yet another frightful amount of food on his tray, and a second tray, loaded with a hearty stack of steaks, and loads upon LOADS of jerky...

Akamaru's eyes had never been wider...

...I know the steaks were awesome, but...you don't REALLY expect me to eat all THAT, do you...?!

Laughing heartily, Kiba ruffled his dogs head playfully and shook his head. "Haha, ohhh admit it, you'd LOVE it if I did!" The dog blushed a bit beneath his fur, but sensed something else. "Buuuuuut I couldn't help but overhear how totally badly these guys wanted some of that steak you were eatin', soooo..."

With that, he surprised the Haimaru by setting the plate down besides the table for the three of them. "Go nuts, guys!" He then turned to Akamaru and set the plate of jerky for the big white dog. "And this is for you, boy! Enjoy!"

Despite himself, Akamaru barked in appreciation, and proceeded to chomp away, as Kiba got to work himself, notably slower however, due to his constriction.

The Haimaru, on the other hand, just stared in silence...

I...I know we already ate...so...I'm...not THAT hungry...

Y-yeah...yeah, me neither...

...Then again...I s'pose...m-maybe...maybe ONE wouldn' hurt, right, guys?

Weeeeeeell, I s'pose not...

Y-yeah! Like, m-maybe a bite...

...Or two...

...Aaaaaand in perfect unison, all three leaped at the plate hungrily, much to the amusement of Kiba and Akamaru...
11533112221221112211.title: Kiba and Akamaru finish, then Kiba goes for more

choices: Kiba, needing a break, allows the triplets to feel his stomach
Severely weirded out, Kiba jumps back into his meal.
115331122212211122111.content:
As Kiba continued shoving food into his mouth at a slower, albeit steady pace and Akamaru wolfed down mouthful after mouthful of jerky, the Haimaru's dug into their plate of steaks. They jostled, growled, and barked at one another as they ate, though they all stayed where they were, their tails wagging all the while.

Oh man, Shomaru gasped as he came up for air, only to duck his head right back down, for a buffet, these things are AMAZING!

Nimaru woofed his agreement, even as he tore chunks of meat from one of the steaks. You're tellin' me...I could eat these things for DAYS!

Sanmaru wagged his tail so hard, his rump appeared to be shaking right along with it. Man, I don't care if I end up lookin' like a blimp; these steaks are just too good!

Kiba smiled as he gulped down a particularly large bite of pizza, even as he winced at the tightness in his waistline. "Heh, they're good, aren't they?" The Haimaru's gave emphatic barks of agreement at this, even as they dug into their meat.

Akamaru wagged his tail as he gulped down more jerky. Heh, I coulda told them that...

And so, they continued; the Haimaru's continuing to tear into their steaks, Akamaru gulping down increasingly large mouthfuls of jerky, and Kiba shoving whatever he could get into his mouth and gulping them down, occasionally taking a hearty swig of cola for good measure.

As time ticked on, Kiba and Akamaru's bellies steadily swelled; Akamaru's continued to bulge out, inching closer and closer to the table. Kiba's tummy's growth wasn't as noticeable, due to his pants still constricting his belly, but it still bulged noticeably with every few mouthfuls. All the while, his button continued to strain...

Time passed, and as Kiba chowed down, his button got tighter and tighter. The dog-nin winced, but soldiered on; after all, that wouldn't be the first time he'd snapped his button off, and it certainly wouldn't be the last. To that end, he renewed his efforts, going as fast as his button would allow him. Chicken, pizza, tempura, wings, soda, steak, burgers...all of it went down his gullet, straining his button further and further. At the rate he was going, it wasn't long before one of the threads holding the disc to his pants frayed, causing it to loosen. Feeling this, Kiba grinned and pressed on even harder. As he did, his button continued to fray...

Akamaru, hearing the sound of tearing fabric, glanced up and whined. Oh great...not much longer till he pops that sucker off... As he thought this, he lowered his head, hoping that it would help him avoid the imminent projectile even as he continued wolfing his jerky down.

Completely oblivious to any of this, the Haimaru's continued tearing into their steaks, having lost none of their vigor or speed. Their stomachs hadn't quite started bulging yet, though their furry bellies did appear a bit more concave than they had been. They felt as much, but soldiered on; after all, it wasn't often they got to eat steaks this tasty...

More and more Kiba ate, and the looser and looser his button became. Akamaru, hearing the tearing of fabric, whined. Oh geez...not long now...

Indeed, Kiba felt as though his button were on its last legs. Heh, HE thought to himself, smirking. almost there! He glanced at the goodies still on the table. One more big mouthful oughta do it...

Eyes falling upon a particularly huge slice of pizza, he grabbed it, opened his mouth wide, and crammed the whole thing in. HE chewed slowly, wincing as the pain in his waistline became almost unbearable. Just...a little...more...

Finally, when he felt he'd chewed the slice of pizza enough, he took a deep breath through his nostrils, gulped the whole thing down (wincing as he did so), and, as it traveled downwards...

Upon hearing a slightly louder tearing of fabric, Akamaru ducked his head down so far it was practically on the table. Here it comes...

Kiba waited with bated breath as the pizza traveled down his gullet to his stomach. And, as it plopped into his belly...

POP.

With an audible SNAP and tearing of fabric, Kiba's button burst off his pants, making a beeline for the opposite side of the booth. Thankfully, it whizzed right above Akamaru's head...

Phew, the dog thought, wagging his tail. That was a close one...

And promptly ricocheting off the back of Akamaru's seat...

GAH!

....and Sanmaru promptly yelped and fell back. His brothers, noticing this, immediately went to his side. Uh, bro? You OK? Shomaru whined.

Meanwhile, Kiba's belly, freed from the constraints of his button, seemed to spill forth, surging forward until it was dangerously close to touching the table of the booth and bulging out to the sides. His shirt hiked up several more inches, and his fly pulled itself down about halfway. "Ohhhhh man," Kiba moaned, slouching back in his seat. "That feels SO much better..."

Akamaru, glancing up (and privately surprised at just how much bigger Kiba's stomach seemed to have gotten simply from busting his button), was about to reply, when he heard the whines of the Haimaru brothers. Confused, he glanced to the side of the table. His eyes widened as he saw them. Uhhh, Kiba... the dog whined.

Sitting up a bit, Kiba glanced at his pal. "Yeah, Akamaru?"

Akamaru motioned toward the triplets with his head. I think your button took an, ah, unexpected trajectory...

Raising an eyebrow, Kiba looked over to where Akamaru was indicating. "Unexpected? What do..."

His own eyes widened as he saw Shomaru and Nimaru standing over Sanmaru, the dog protrate on his back and paws up in the air. On his forehead, there was a very noticeable red mark.

Kiba blushed. Whoops...

Then, with some more concern, he asked, "Oi! You OK, Sanmaru?" The dog's only reply to this was a whine.

C'mon, bro! Nimaru urged, panic seeping into his tone. Say something! ANYTHING!

The dogs and dog-nin watched with bated breath as Sanmaru twitched a bit, whining...

Then, his eyes flew open, his muzzle opened wide, he took a deep breath, and....

FINLAND!

Shomaru and Nimaru glanced at each other, utterly confused. Akamaru simply rolled his eyes. Yep; he's OK.

Kiba raised an eyebrow, utterly lost even as Sanmaru staggered back to his paws. "Uh..."

Sanmaru, wobbling a bit on his paws, nonetheless flashed Kiba a doggie grin. Eh, don't worry, squirt, I'm OK. And trust me, I don't know what the hell Finland...is...either... The dog trailed off, his eyes widening as he stared at Kiba. His siblings, following his gaze, soon mirrored his expression.

Kiba blinked. "Uh, guys? What's the matter?"

Instead of replying, Shomaru raised a paw and pointed toward Kiba's stomach. "My gut? Whaddaya..." He glanced down, and his eyes widened as he saw just how much bigger his stomach had become upon breaking his button. It had gone past medicine ball size, becoming more like a small beach ball in both size and appearance, hiking his shirt up several inches above his navel and, if the slight draft playing about his lower body were any indication, opening his zipper partway. In addtion, Kiba could have sworn he felt his belly beginning to brush the table...

Laughing, Kiba rubbed the back of his head. "H-heh, guess the button was a lot tighter than I thought, huh?"

The Haimaru's did not reply, only continuing to gape. Then, they glanced at each other, nodded, and looked back toward Kiba. Uh, kid? Shomaru began, looking a bit nervous. Akamaru tilted his head, not sure what they were thinking. Can we ask a favor?

Kiba frowned, puzzled. "What sorta favor."

Again, the Haimaru's glanced at each other, seemingly gathering their resolve. Then, looking back at Kiba, they opened their muzzles, and as one, they asked...

Can we touch it?

Kiba blinked dully. "Touch...touch my gut?" The Haimaru's nodded numbly. Akamaru, meanwhile, simply shook his head. Yeah, not surprised at all...
115331122212211122111.title: Kiba chows down until he snaps his button

choices: The Haimaru's continue forcing burps outta Kiba until he has room to eat
Kiba feels ready to eat once again
1153311222122111221111.content:
"Well, that's...kiiiiind of a weird request, isn't it...?" Kiba asked, as he rubbed the back of his head, admittedly, a bit taken back. He then glanced at how surprisingly rounded and large his stomach had distended since this feasting had begun. Even he was more than surprised by the ample progress and how much further his stomach had distended from losing that blasted button. Drumming his fingers atop his belly for a moment, Kiba was about to reach back for another slice of pizza, but stopped and winced a bit, gripping his bloated gut firmly, much to Akamaru's alarm.

Are you okay, buddy?

"H-heh, yeah, I'm cool, just...oof...my gut's kinda feelin' loaded right now. Eh, guess a break wouldn't hurt for a bit..."

Kiba leaned back in his seat, drumming his fingers atop his belly, when Akamaru subtly tilted his head towards the side to get Kiba's attention. Catching on, Kiba turned, seeing the Haimaru's still looking up at him a bit pleadingly.

Aw, c'mon, squirt...pleeeeeease? whined Nimaru.

Yeah, pretty pleeeeeaaaaase? added Sanmaru.

"Weeeell," Kiba began, thinking for a second then eventually shrugging, "Ah, what the hell, guess it ain't often you see me packin' THIS much food in my gut at once, right?" He slapped his belly proudly for emphasis, causing his rounded appendage to jostle about slightly. "Besides," Kiba added, reaching down and ruffling Sanmaru's head, "I guess I DO kinda owe ya f'er the button, right?"

Sanmaru barked happily and licked Kiba's hand before he rose up to his hind legs, and placed his front paws slightly against Kiba's big, bloated abdomen.

Oh, woooow... Sanmaru mused, feeling Kiba's belly all over with his paws, much to Akamaru's and even Kiba's amusement. Hehe, it's all soft'n bouncy! Sanmaru added, rather childishly as he continued.

Really? Lemme see too! remarked Shomaru as he rose up to Kiba's seat and also started pressing and feeling Kiba's bare stomach.

Hey! Make room, ya jerks! added Nimaru as he squeezed between the two other siblings and also rested his paws against Kiba's ample gut. Once again, Kiba found himself a bit taken back by how fascinated the dog sibling trio had currently become with his stomach, but couldn't help but chuckle a bit at their remarks and banter.

Oh, man! It's like kneading a buncha silly putty....minus Kuromaru gettin' mad at us f'er accidentally eatin' it... remarked Nimaru.

Accidentally? Ya freakin' said 'bottoms up,' ya dunce! noted Shomaru.

Akamaru, watching from across the table, snickered to himself, catching Kiba's attention.

"Hey, what's so funny, boy?"

Hehe, with your stomach looking the way it does now, and the way the guys are feeling it, I swear it's almost like you're pregnant.

Kiba sputtered, face immediately reddening, much to Akamaru's amusement, as he glanced back and said. "W-wha?! No I don't!"

But just as he made his case...

Oh man, listen to how loud it is in there! remarked Shomaru as he pressed his canine ear against Kiba's belly and listened to it. Shortly after, both Sanmaru and Nimaru joined him, equally perplexed.

Maaaaaaaaaan, I didn't know the stomach even MADE noises like that! remarked Sanmaru, also listening with one ear pressed against Kiba's ample tummy.

Damn, kid, your gut's noisy... added Nimaru, listening like the others as his paw adjusted a bit.

Kiba, simply blinked dully, turning back to Akamaru who was grinning a doggie grin. "...Oh, shut up, I don't look pregnant..." Kiba replied bluntly and disgruntled. But just then, his tummy began to gurgle quite audibly, much to the notice of the Haimaru's as they pulled their respective heads off of Kiba's stomach for a moment as they glanced at the gurgling appendage in confusion.

The hell's goin' on in there? muttered Nimaru curiously as he poked and prodded Kiba's belly curiously. Unfortunately, the prodding at the midsection had worked up a sudden pressure pocket built up from the sudden churning, which worked its way up Kiba's throat and out the young dog-nin's mouth in the form of a positively HUGE belch, which reverberated throughout the entire buffet, causing Kiba's face to go redder than a tomato.

"Uhh...s-s'cuse me..." Kiba muttered apologetically, thankfully no one was really in the buffet to be too disgusted by the massive eruption. The Haimaru's, on the other hand, seemed less than disgusted...

Hahaholy crap! Ya got some pretty damn good pipes on ya, squirt! remarked Nimaru as he snickered with amusement, tail wagging rapidly/

Heeeeey, no fair! I wanna try too! Complained Sanmaru before he lifted his paw up. Eyes widening, Kiba was about to protest, but as soon as the large dogs' paw pressed firmly against Kiba's rounded middle, the only thing that came out of Kiba's mouth was another, particularly lengthy belch, much to Akamaru's amusement, who watched, snickering to himself the whole audible time.

Ha! The one I got outta the kid was longer than yours! Bragged Sanmaru.

Pfft, big deal! The one I pushed outta him was way louder! Barked Nimaru.

Hearing the two argue who got a better burp outta Kiba, got the dog-nin and nin-dog glancing blankly at one another as the two shook their heads in unison at the ridiculousness of the conversation. That is, until Shomaru lifted his paws up.

My turn! the third Haimaru said.

"Ah crap..." muttered Kiba dreadfully, before the large dog pressed BOTH paws against the boys' belly...

*BBBBBBBRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!!!! !!*

The third belch forced out of the young dog-nin was easily the loudest and longest, which actually caused his belly to jostle a bit with the sudden movement. Shomaru just glanced at his two siblings and stuck his tongue out as he said, I win.

The two other Haimaru's grumbled in annoyance amongst themselves, while Akamaru; unable to contain his snickering, glanced at his friend as he caught his breath. Hehe, you okay there, Kiba?

To his surprise, however, Kiba's eyes widened as he felt his stomach a bit and, finally noted, "...Actually...yeah...I think all that kinda took a bit 'uh the pressure sittin' in my gut away..."

As those words left Kiba's mouth, the trio glanced at one another and; in perfect, frightful unison, grinned a fiendishly mischievous grin...
1153311222122111221111.title: Kiba lets the Haimaru's feel his bloated stomach

choices: They continue chowing down, until Kiba's belly begins to feel oddly tight...
They continue eating until their position becomes a "tight fit"....
11533112221221112211111.content:
Um...guys? Akamaru whined upon seeing the Haimaru's expressions. What are you thinking about?

Confused asto what his pal wal stalking about, Kiba glanced over at the siblings...and immediately felt dread spike through him as he saw the positively evil expressions on their faces. Oh, great...

In the past, those three had always worn that expression when planning something ridiculous, embarrassing, and/or hilarious. The last time they had worn it, Kiba's kitchen had been flooded with whipped cream, the walls had been splotched with an incredibly garish yellow paint, and Kuromaru had been absolutely livid (it had taken WEEKS to wash the pink polka dots out of his fur). Kiba could only guess what they were planning now...

Hey, squirt? Shomaru's barking voice brought Kiba out of his thoughts, the dog-nin looking up to see the Haimaru's all focused on him.

"Err...yeah...?" Kiba replied, almost a little fearful as to what the answer would be.

Nimaru smirked a doggie smirk. You said that last one that Sir Numbnuts here forced outta you took away a bit of the pressure in your gut, right? Shomaru glared at his sibling, while Sanmaru snickered.

Kiba blinked. "Uh, yeah, but there's still a lot of..."

He trailed off, the Haimaru's intentions becoming crystal clear in his mind. Are they actually gonna...?

Akamaru whimpered. Guys... he implored, evidently having come to the same conclusion as his pal.

Sanmaru gave Akamaru a friendly wink. Ah, c'mon, squirt, he assured, tail wagging. Kiba's made it pretty damn clear he intends to eat as much as he possibly can...but he can't do that with all that pressure in his gut, can he? And, before either Kiba or Akamaru could reply to that, all three Haimaru's surged toward the table, got up on their hind legs, and, as one, rested their front paws on Kiba's swollen belly. Then, they all glanced at one another, flashing those fiendish grins.

Ready? Shomaru began, tail wagging. One...

Kiba winced. "Uh, guys, maybe just one at a time...?"

Two... Nimaru continued, not heeding what Kiba said at all.

Akamaru gulped. Um, fellas, are you really sure you wanna...

Before Akamaru could even finish his sentence, Sanmaru's eyes shone with a fiendish glint....

THREE!

And, as one, the Haimaru's pressed down hard on Kiba's belly...

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*< br />
...and the dog-nin subsequently let loose with an incredibly loud, incredibly long belch, his mouth flying wide open and his belly vibrating. Even Akamaru gaped at the sheer magnitude of the burp.
