Hoo-WHEE! Shomaru whooped as Kiba's belch wound down, a noticeable blush coming to the dog-nin's face. Now THAT was a good one! He tilted his head. How ya feelin', squirt?

Kiba's blush intensified a bit before he got the nerve to reply. "Well...a lot more pressure just went out..."

All of it? Nimaru asked,hisrump practically shaking in anticipation.

"W-well, no, but..."

OK then! Nimaru replied cheerfully, pressing down....

*BRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*

Though the subsequent belch lacked the sheer magnitude of the first,owing to the fact that only Nimaru had pressed down on his belly, Akamaru still sat dumbstruck by it...even as he rolled his eyes. Real smooth, Kiba; real smooth...

As the belch wound down, Kiba's blush intensified a bit more. However, he had barely any time to recuperate when Sanmaru pressed down....

*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!*

....then Shomaru....


*BREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRR RRRRP!*

...then Nimaru....

*BREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP PPPPP!*

...then Sanmaru again.....

*BREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAA AAAAAAAAAAARRRRPPPPP!*

And so it continued, the brothers forcing gargantuan belches out of Kiba, one after the other, tails and rumps wagging and huge, doggie smiles upon their muzzles. All the while, Kiba's face steadily grew redder and redder, the markings on his face becoming harder to pick out, and Akamaru simply watched, awestruck at both the magnitude of Kiba's burps and just how many the Haimaru's kept on wringing out of him. Must be a loooootta pressure in there....

At last, as Kiba's latest burp wound down, the Haimaru's all looked at one another, tails wagging. Well then, gentlemen, Nimaru began, a mischievous glint in his eyes. ...big finale?

Big finale, Shomaru and Sanmaru replied in unison, eyes lighting up. At the same time, Kiba's own widened.

"W-wait guys," he stammered, face redder than ever. "I-I think I've freed up enough roo--"

He'd scarcely said this when the Haimaru's reared up, lifting their front paws off Kiba's belly....and as they SLAMMED them back down....


*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*


...Kiba let loose with what was probably the longest, LOUDEST belch any of them had ever heard. Again, Kiba's face reddened, and again his belly vibrated....but now, Akamaru could have sworn he'd felt the booth itself vibrating.

As the burp finally began to wind down, the Haimaru's finally got off of Kiba's belly, returning to standing on the floor as they looked up at him. Well, squirt? Nimaru asked as the belch began losing volume and intensity. How ya feeling...?

Kiba gave a small afterburp, appearing a bit dazed. "Oh man..." he muttered. "Don't think I've ever belched so much in my life...."

Take it from me; you haven't, Akamaru chimed, wagging his tail in spite of himself.

Chuckling weakly, Kiba sluggishly raised a hand to his belly, gently massaging it...before his eyes widened. "Holy crap..." he muttered, suddenly more alert. Putting both hands on his belly, he tentatively kneaded it. "Wow...there's no pressure anymore!" he exclaimed. "I feel like I could eat way,WAY more!" He flashed the triplets a grin. "Thanks, guys!" And, with that, he went right back to chowing down on the bounty of food he had on the table.

Shomaru smirked. We aim to please.

Nimaru nudged his sibling. Well, I can tell you ONE squirt we ain't pleasing...

Curious, Shomaru and Sanmaru glanced over at Akamaru, who was giving all three of them the stinkeye and growling a bit.

Unperturbed, Shomaru shrugged. Eh, ya can't win 'em all...

Shaking his head, Akamaru promptly dove back into his own food....
11533112221221112211111.title: The Haimaru's continue forcing burps outta ...

choices: Kiba and Akamaru somehow wedge themselves in their booth
115331122212211122111111.content:
In no time at all, Kiba, Akamaru and the Haimaru's were chowing down voraciously, scarfing down whatever was within sight and with no signs of stopping any time soon. As Akamaru scarfed down another huge chunk of steak and gulped it right down, he watched Kiba greedily stuffing as much meat into his maw as he could possibly cram into it. Seems; despite that utterly humiliating situation the Haimaru brothers just put Kiba through, that release of so much pressure seemed to really be helping the young dog-nin pick up his second wind, as he was chowing down almost as fast as he was when he and Akamaru had first arrived at the buffet to begin with.

Wow, guess all that nonstop burping really DID free up some much needed room in his gut, huh... Akamaru mused, watching Kiba chow down relentlessly. Still, he's got pretty good pipes on 'em...hope he doesn't make a habit of using 'em too much...caaaause I'm pretty sure that's how Earthquakes start...

Shuddering at the thought, the big white dog went back to chowing down across from his dog-nin buddy; both their bellies continuing to expand with every few ample mouthfuls gulped down.

Meanwhile, the Haimaru's were joyously scarfing down one steak after another, tails and rumps wagging and shaking merrily as they did so.

Oh, sweet mother of mercy...how the hell does buffet steak taste like steakhouse steak?! mused Shomaru between bites.

Beats the hell outta me. Usually, it's s'posed to the cheap crap, right? woofed Nimaru in agreement, also between bites.

URRRP! Who cares? Just shaddup'n eat, ya nitwits! responded Sanmaru, after gulping down an ample mouthful, and digging right back in for more. The other two would have growled angrily at him, but were just too enticed by the flavor to do so. Instead, they did just what Sanmaru suggested...they shut their traps, and chowed down...

More time had passed as the gang continued relentlessly wolfing down the contents of their respective plates and trays. Both Kiba's and Akamaru's bellies continued to swell and swell, getting a little closer to the booth than either one would like...not that they had noticed yet. Meanwhile, the Haimaru's midsections continued to swell and round out beneath them, beginning to hang from their torsos and jostle a bit as they continued merrily wagging their tails and rumps and chowing down like no tomorrow.

Suddenly, after a particularly large mouthful had been gulped down, Kiba stopped, and winced as he rested one hand firmly against the middle of his bloated belly. Catching this, Akamaru stopped mid-bite, glanced up at Kiba and whined with concern.

Kiba? What's wrong?

Immediately, the Haimaru's all stopped and jolted their heads up at the sight of Kiba gripping his gut.

Ohhh! Do ya gotta burp again, squirt? Barked Nimaru...almost eagerly.

"N-no no! I'm cool!" Kiba said, in a nervous effort to assure the big dogs that their "help" wouldn't be necessary. "Nah, my gut just feels..."

Before Kiba could finish, Akamaru's concern died down as he sighed to himself and woofed. ...Kiiinda 'tight'?

Blushing a bit, Kiba smirked and nodded back at the big white canine. "Y-yeah, just a lil bit."

Well, Akamaru began, we COULD always use that as an indicator to call it a day. I mean, it's a pretty safe bet that we've all MORE than eaten our fill by now, right?

OR... Shomaru interjected, ...ya could power through that uncomfortable tight feelin'er whatever ya call it...and then POP goes the belly button!

Upon hearing that, Kiba turned to Akamaru and grinned somewhat mischievously. "Ehehe, sorry, boy...buuuuuuut I'm not quite ready to call it a day just yet..." And no sooner did he finish that sentence, Kiba promptly grabbed a rack of BBQ ribs, and proceeded to greedily tear the meat right off the bones, and chow down, smearing his mouth with a great deal of BBQ sauce in the process. Akamaru just blinked dully as he watched Kiba ravage the meal before him without hesitation or mercy.

How many stomachaches does he have to endure before he learns the value of moderation....? Thought Akamaru, before promptly looking down at his own blimped out belly and whining to himself. Probably around the same time I do...

Watching Kiba chow down, the Haimaru's stopped and watched Kiba eat eagerly. But more specifically, their attention had fallen down to Kiba's already ridiculously swollen belly. They watched as it surged outwards just more and more, slowly beginning to press just a tiny bit against the booth...but still nothing Kiba couldn't manage. All the while, they waited and waited...watching Kiba's belly groan and gurgle as it began to exceed capacity, making Kiba wince in pain and discomfort as that tightness in the middle of his abdomen only became more and more severe. Akamaru whined, wishing Kiba wouldn't push himself so far...but knowing full well he was equally as stubborn as a certain blond bonehead...

Finally, Kiba's eyes widened with one last, ample mouthful gulped down...

Akamaru and the Haimaru's turned their attention to Kiba's belly as it jostled and vibrated ominously, until...

*POP!*

Just as predicted, Kiba's navel popped outward from his usual innie, to an outie stub. And with that infamous pop, came a tremendous sigh of relief as Kiba leaned back in his seat, with a blissfully goofy look on his face and smiled. "Ohhhhhhh man...THERE it is..." Kiba said, voice notably relieved as he gave his belly a hearty pat, causing that fleshy stub to wobble about. "Hehe, that'll never stop feelin' funny..."

Akamaru once again cursed himself as he felt himself almost mesmerized by the stub, wanting to plop down from his seat and bat at it like a dazed pup. But a sudden bark broke him from his trance.

HA! barked Shomaru as he pointed his paw at Kiba's belly button then turned his attention to Nimaru. See that? You owe me five-no, I'm sorry, TEN doggie treats!

Nimaru woofed in annoyance. Ah shaddup...

Meanwhile, Sanmaru was sighing with relief. Phew, good thing he didn't hear my bet about Akamaru battin' at the thing...

Actually, I did... replied Shomaru, causing Sanmaru's ears to drop. And usually, when ya wanna say things to yourself...you THINK 'em, ya don't say 'em out loud...

I thought inner monologues were when ya say things no one else can hear... whined Sanmaru.

The only way no one can hear 'em is if y'er by yourself...or THINKING it, ya walking' dunce cap! barked Shomaru, tail wagging at his victory, much to Akamaru's and Kiba's amusement.

So, Akamaru began, almost indifferently, I guess, now that the tightness is gone, y'er gonna be on your third-

But before Akamaru could finish, Kiba had already begun chowing down relentlessly, causing the dogs' ears to drop again.

...wind... he finished.

Ah, stop bein' such a wet blanket, pup, barked Nimaru. The kid's stuffin' his face regardless. Ya may as well enjoy it...ESPECIALLY when ya got the best tastin' steaks in all'uh Konoha sittin' right in front of ya!

Glancing back at the steaks, then down at his own rounded belly, noting how much bigger it had gotten, and not quite catching how it was slightly pressing against their table, Akamaru shook his head. Ah, what the hell...when it Rome, right...? And immediately, the big dog started chowing down, causing Nimaru's tail to wag before he got to work on his own plate along with his two brothers. All five continued powering through their respective meals for a good long while; Kiba powering on without a trace of discomfort...

...That is, until...
115331122212211122111111.title: They chow down til Kiba's belly button feels tight

choices: A month of free food has gotten the better of the dog-nin.
11533112221222.content: Perhaps Kiba had already won an eating competition prior, and as a reward; received a free voucher for all the free food of Konoha that he could possibly eat for one whole month? (And needless to say, Kiba's been putting that voucher to some gooood use...)
11533112221222.title: Something else (again)

115331122212221.content:
Kiba sighed happily, leaning against the tree with his arms folded behind his head. "Ahhh....this is the life, eh, Akamaru?" The giant dog in question, curled up next to him, simply looked at the dog-nin-who was clad in a short-sleeved grey shirt and blue-black shorts-and sighed.

Earlier that month, Kiba had entered an eating competition hosted by the village, and though he had gone up against some rather stiff competition (specifically, Naruto and Choji, the latter of whom had given him a serious run for his money,) he had eventually come out on top. And, as he'd leaned back in his chair, rubbing his majorly swollen and distended belly, the contest officiant had walked up to him and, after the typical series of congratulations, had handed him his prize; specifically, a voucher for all the free food he could eat for a whole month.

Now, Kiba had always had a healthy appetite, even if it wasn't anywhere near Choji's level, but in the course of his preparing for the competition, that healthy appetite had increased exponentially. And, of course, he was never one to turn down free food...

And so, as the month had begun, Kiba had taken full advantage of the voucher; stuffing his craw with steaks one day, devouring an entire turkey another day, gulping down giant sundae after giant sundae...his midsection had, predictably, grown considerably after each one (he'd lost count of how many buttons had needed to be sewn back on,) but his metabolism and active lifestyle had ensured it had shrunken down quickly enough.

However, an active metabolism and an active lifestyle could only do so much, something Akamaru lamented as he looked at Kiba now. Though he was still mostly slim, his stomach had begun taking on something of a rounded appearance.

This was not lost on Kiba, as he turned towards the dog with a concerned look on his face. "Eh? What's up, boy?"

What do you think? Akamaru asked, whining. Your gut's starting to be affected by all the food you've been eating.

Kiba looked down at his belly, placing a hand on top of it. "Huh, looks like you're right, boy." He grinned, ruffling the dog's furry head. "Still, the vouchers only good for the rest of this month; I promise that once it runs out, I'll work it all off. Don't worry," he added, winking. "I'm not gonna end up like Choji."

Akamaru raised an eyebrow. Heh, better hope not, buddy; your mom would go ballistic.

Kiba's face paled at this; if ever he'd needed an incentive to not let the voucher affect him in the long run, that had been it. Akamaru, seeing this reaction, whined. Sorry, Kiba; didn't mean to freak you out. He licked Kiba's hand reassuringly.

Kiba, for his part, quickly regained his composure and smirked. "Nah, I'm good, boy." He ruffled the dog's head affectionately. "Actually, I think that's exactly what I needed." Akamaru wagged his tail, both at the gesture and the reassurance Kiba would get himself sorted out.

At that moment, Kiba's stomach let out a rather noisy growl. Blushing, Kiba put his hand on his belly and got to his feet. "Heh, looks like it's that time again, Akamaru." He chuckled as Akamaru whined, even as he got to his paws. "I'm kinda feelin' some meat, right now." He smirked. "Don't worry, I'll get something for you, too." Laughing, Kiba turned around and rushed off. Akamaru stayed where he was for a moment, sighing. That makes me feel SO much better... Shaking his head, he rushed off after his partner.

Eventually, they reached...
115331122212221.title: A month of free food has gotten the better of t...

choices: He decides to go someplace for dessert. He wanted to really stuff himself today.
He ran into one of his friends in the street.
1153311222122211.content:
Both Kiba and Akamaru's noses were greeted with the intoxicating aroma of meat cooking on a grill. The two had been to this place quite often now that all of Kiba's food was free, and most of the servers recognized Kiba because of it. As Kiba sat down at a table, with Akamaru laying down by his feet, one of the servers walked up to him and asked, "The usual, sir?" As if to answer, Kiba's stomach growled persistently. Kiba confirmed by saying, "Of course, I'm starving!" Akamaru winced a little upon hearing that, as he knew exactly what the usual was.

After some idle conversation between Kiba and Akamaru, the server finally arrived with the food. She struggled to carry a platter used to carry multiple plates, and she placed it on a fold out stand, just like with any other restaurant, she then placed plate after plate onto the table in front of Kiba. A whole assortment of types of steak was laid out in front of him. Finally, the server grabbed one final plate with a singular steak on it, depositing it in front of Akamaru. "Let me know if you need anything else!" The waitress politely said.

Kiba took a hearty whiff of the steaks in front of him. He took a mental inventory of everything, and time and time again he was proud of the order that he had devised, one that became "the usual". In front of Kiba were two stacks of five 16 ounce porterhouse steaks each, a platter with fifteen pork chops on it, a plate with ten kielbasa sausages on it, a plate with a dozen sliders, and finally, as a little indulgence, a plate with five lobster tails and extra butter sauce. Finally, there was a pitcher of cola to wash it all down. Kiba rubbed his hands together, and he began to dig into the feast in front of him, starting with one of the steaks, which he merely grabbed with his hands, chewing through it easily with his Inuzuka teeth.

He chewed through the steak almost mechanically, quickly and efficiently removing all of the meat from the bone and licking the bone clean. "Man, that's delicious!" He blurted out to no one in particular, patting his stomach before deciding to move onto the sliders, stuffing a whole one in his mouth, and chewing it down with his cheeks full. He continued this process, going through the sliders in no time. At this point, his stomach, which was a bit softer and rounded as it is, began to push outwards.

This was nothing though, and after a hearty swig of cola with a burp, he moved onto the other steaks, taking four more down like he did with the first. After the first of these four, his stomach now visibly pressed against his shirt. Another one, and some strain was now showing on Kiba's shirt. The next one brought it to the point where Kiba's shirt began to lift ever so slightly, revealing a sliver of his bloated midsection, and finally, the last steak made that sliver into a more visible strip,

Before the eating contest, Kiba's stomach would probably be rock hard by now, and he would just power on through, but since he had eaten so much in the past couple of weeks, his stomach capacity was much larger, so his stomach was still soft and pliable, jiggling whenever he shifted his weight. Either way, he took another large swig of soda, burping afterwards, then proceeded to the kielbasa.

Akamaru had finished his steak and was chewing on the bone at this point, as he had gone at a much more leisurely pace. At this point, he watched Kiba stuff his face, slightly amused.

Kiba grabbed two sausages at a time and he took hearty bites out of them. The sausages were fat and juicy, so that was more than enough to fill up his mouth again, his cheeks bulging to accommodate. He proceeded like this, his stomach proceeding on a relentless march outwards in order to make room. One he was done with all of the sausages, his stomach had lifted his shirt to just under his bellybutton, and he rubbed his belly aimlessly as he took another swig of cola.

Next up were the pork chops. They weren't that large as far as Kiba was concerned, so that's why he ordered fifteen. He grabbed two at a time, cramming them into his greedy maw. If anything, Akamaru was impressed by how much Kiba could fit in his mouth, and he was also amazed that Kiba could still chew quickly with all of that in his mouth. As the pork chops were deposited into Kiba's stomach, his shirt traveled upwards, and by the time he had finished all of the pork chops, his navel was completely exposed for the world to see.

Luckily for Kiba, his shorts had an elastic waistband, as the shorts were now being pressured by Kiba's gargantuan stomach, which was still not at its limits yet. Kiba then proceeded with the last stack of five steaks, proceeding just like he had before, and each steak had a considerable impact on his midsection, his shirt rising about an inch for every steak until his stomach was finally freed fully. It was now only a little bit flexible, and it wobbled only slightly, as there wasn't too much room left.

Kiba saved the lobster tails for last, and he ate each half of the tail meat in one massive bite, being sure to drench it in butter sauce first. All of that lead to the final state of Kiba's stomach, which was now free from his grey shirt. Because his shorts had an elastic waistband, they merely stretched to make room, but at this point, this was the extent of how far they could stretch. This was the limit of Kiba's stomach capacity now. This was what he considered to be a good meal now. His stomach was now just a bit taut, but if he wanted to stuff himself more, he certainly could. Either way, he belched, satisfied, and he patted his massive stomach proudly. Akamaru would have face palmed if he could, but he merely said to Kiba You can really pack it away. If it weren't for your metabolism, Choji would be a shrimp to you. "If I can get lots of free food, it's worth a few extra pounds!" was Kiba's simple response. Speak for yourself, Kiba Akamaru replied. He was concerned that a few extra pounds would turn into something much more, but at least this would be over with at the end of the month.

Kiba left a tip for the waitress, as she was always polite to him, and he got up and stretched, then walked out with Akamaru in tow. He would typically have had trouble with the additional weight in his midsection, but thanks to his constant feasting like this, he could walk around as he normally did, with ease. People would sometimes stare if they didn't already know him, but he was used to it. Either way...
1153311222122211.title: Konoha Steakhouse

11533112221222112.content:
Kiba gleefully strolled down the street, one hand carelessly rested atop his especially bloated belly; now barely concealed by his shirt, which now began to peak right below his belly button. As he and Akamaru trotted on, they got occasional glances from the townsfolk. While Kiba paid them no heed, Akamaru couldn't help but whine a bit as he knew exactly what was surprising them so much. Hearing this, Kiba looked down at the giant dog and asked, "Something wrong, boy?" People are still giving you weird looks.

Looking around to confirm, Kiba scoffed. "Ah, whatever. They're all just jealous cause THEY don't get to enjoy a free all you can eat pass to any restaurant in Konoha." Kiba bragged, smirking cockily as they continued on. Akamaru's ears dropped over his eyes in embarrassment at the sight. Yes...that MUST be the reason... "Oh come on, lighten up, buddy. We're just having fun is all. Besides, these people'll be giving us those same looks when they see how fast I can work this off next month!" Kiba responded, patting his distended gut for emphasis, causing it to bounce slightly with each pat. So I hope... As the two carried on, a familiar voice called out to them.

"Oi! Kiba! Akamaru!"

The two stopped and immediately turned around, greeted by none other than Kiba's boneheaded pal, Naruto Uzumaki, who approached the two. Upon reaching them, his eyebrows raised as his attention shifted right towards Kiba's rounded gut. "Jeez, what've you been doing these past few days?" Naruto asked. Kiba grinned and said, "Oh, y'know...just hitting up every single restaurant I can and enjoying as much free food as I can possibly eat. Which, last I checked..." Kiba stopped as a slightly impish grin grew over his face. "...was more than you and Choji." Akamaru's paw immediately rose over to his face as he shook his head. Here we go, heeeere we go...

Immediately, Naruto's face steamed bright red as he angrily shouted, "YOU GOT LUCKY AT THAT STINKIN' EATING CONTEST!!" Kiba laughed and said, "Funny, didn't seem like luck when you started groaning on about having a bellyache while I was trailblazing on and on to victory, Uzumaki." Stammering angrily to respond, Naruto pointed in Kiba's face furiously and finally added, "Oh yeah?! Well, JUST YOU WAIT, DOG-BREATH!!! CAUSE NEXT TIME-"

A sudden audible rumbling caught both Kiba's and Akamaru's ears. Naruto had stopped mid-sentence and mid-point as his face flushed red once more, with embarrassment, as his own thin stomach began to rumble quite audibly. Kiba burst into laughter, causing his stomach to jiggle a bit as Naruto's face grew redder. Wiping a tear of laughter from his face, Kiba shook his head and patted Naruto on the shoulder playfully. "Look, bonehead, instead of griping about how badly you're gonna lose again if we ever go head to head in another eating contest, how about we go get ourselves something to eat?" He then pulled out his voucher and added, "My treat."

The angry and embarrassed expression on Naruto's face lightened a bit as he glanced curiously at Kiba and said, "Really?" Akamaru immediately glanced back at Kiba and added in a much less amused tone. …Really?

Kiba gave Naruto a wide smile and said, "Why not? They said all the free food I want, and if I order more than even I can handle, well, there's no harm in sharing, right? Besides, no use being able to enjoy a free voucher if I can't enjoy it with my buds." After a moment, Naruto's face lit up as he smiled back and said, "Heh, thanks, man!" Kiba playfully nudged Naruto in the arm, but Akamaru was still less than enthusiastic. Seeing this, Kiba ruffled the big dog's head and said, "Hey, after all those steaks, pork chops, and what have you, I was feelin' like some dessert anyway." Kiba, I REALLY think you're overdoing it this time… But before Akamaru could continue, his own furry, white stomach let out a hungry growl, causing the dog to blush beneath his fur as Kiba laughed and said, "Guess I ain't the only one hankerin' for some after-steak dessert. Don't worry, boy. I already told you, even if I add a few pounds, I'll still work it off in no time! Plus, how can I NOT use a free food for a month voucher to its' fullest use?" Kiba gave the dog a sly grin and said, "Wouldn't wanna be wasteful, now would we?" And with that, he and Naruto headed off. Akamaru shook his head. Why couldn't they go to an all-you-can-eat salad place…?"

Akamaru eventually rejoined Kiba and Naruto as they headed towards...
11533112221222112.title: He ran into one of his friends in the street.

choices: While Kiba stuffs his face, Naruto takes his time, savoring his treats
Overtaken by the deliciousness of the treats, Naruto starts stuffing his face
115331122212221122.content:
As they walked, Kiba's sensitive nose picked up something positively delectable in the air. Grinning, he sniffed. "Ah man...do ya smell that?"

Against his better judgment, Akamaru sniffed the air. Immediately his tail started wagging. Yeah, I smell that. Mmm, smells great...

Naruto, curious, sniffed the air. "I don't smell anything," he replied, frowning.

Kiba looked at him oddly, then smirked. "Ah yeah, that's right; sometimes I forget not everyone has our sense of smell." He shrugged. "You'll start smelling it soon enough, though." Naruto grumbled something about "stuck-up Inuzukas" under his breath, but otherwise said nothing.

Chuckling, Kiba continued leading the other two, maintaining a brisk pace in spite of his massive midsection, apparently not caring that his shirt was resting on top of it and completely exposing the orb of flesh that was his belly.

A few minutes passed, and Naruto was just about to start complaining when something caught his notice; curious, he sniffed the air. "Hey, that smells really good!" In spite of himself, he grinned.

Kiba grinned back. "Heh, told ya." He began strolling as quickly as his gut would allow him. "C'mon, we're almost there!" Naruto and Akamaru, the latter groaning to himself, followed close behind.

Before long, the three came to a large, brick building; though it looked fairly unassuming, the sheer volume of delicious scents coming out of it overwhelmed them, and their mouths began watering. In spite of this, Naruto managed to speak. "A...a bakery?"

Kiba nodded, smiling. "Yep! I've been here a few times already; they've got really great stuff!"

Akamaru, in spite of himself, chipped in. Yeah, and their jelly donuts? Oh man...

The dog nin grinned. "Heh, my thoughts exactly, boy." He walked to the door and pushed it open, gesturing for the other two to follow.

Once they were inside, Kiba strolled up to the counter, grinning. "Hey, it's me again!" The man at the desk gaped at Kiba's fully exposed, engorged stomach, but seeing as how he'd been in here several times already, wasn't all that surprised. "Erm...yes." He cleared his throat. "What would you like?"

Kiba didn't waste a second. "Six dozen donuts, ten apple pies, three dozen cinnamon rolls, and five quadruple-decker marble cakes. Biggest ya got, too!"

The man's eyes widened, even as he scribbled all this down. "Al-alright; anything else?"

Instead of answering, Kiba looked towards Naruto. The blonde, who had been distracted looking at all the treats available, snapped to attention. "H-huh?"

Kiba rolled his eyes." Whaddaya want, dummy?"

Naruto flushed a bit at the insult, but he quickly cheered up, remembering he could get as much as he wanted. "I'd like five dozen sticky buns, eight dozen cupcakes, ten dozen muffins, eight blueberry pies, and four triple-decker chocolate cakes. Also, the biggest you got!"

The man's eyes widened even further as he scribbled it all down. "Anything...else?"

Kiba grinned down at Akamaru. The dog whined, but figured that as long as he was here...

Oh, fine, Akamaru growled. Tell him I want four dozen jelly donuts, five dozen blueberry muffins, eight dozen of whatever cookies they have that don't have chocolate, and three vanilla cakes with buttercream icing. Grinning, Kiba relayed this all to the man. By now, the man's mouth was opening and closing like a fish out of water, but he nonetheless continued to scribble everything down.

"Al-alright," the man stuttered once everything was written down. "I-I'll have everything out as soon as possible." He motioned to one of the nearby tables. "Just, uh, take a seat there." With that, the man went into the back to retrieve what they'd asked for, mumbling to himself. Shrugging, Kiba led Naruto and Akamaru over to the indicated table, where they promptly sat down in the rather comfortable seats (though Kiba had to sit a little further away from the table).

The two humans exchanged idle chatter and banter, while Akamaru occasionally chimed in. He still wasn't sure about this, but there was no denying the stuff here was really good...

Soon, several attendants brought out their individual orders, setting the overloaded platters down on the table, which creaked but held. In the meantime, a couple more attendants set Akamaru's order down in front of the dog.

Naruto gaped at the sheer size of the baked goods, but Kiba and Akamaru, used to this by now, simply licked their lips and muzzle, respectively. "Wow...that...that's a lot," Naruto managed.

Kiba smirked. "Well, what didja expect?" He picked up a donut with chocolate frosting and sprinkles. "Well, don't just sit there; dig in!" With that, Kiba took a massive bite.

Naruto, raising an eyebrow, picked up a chocolate chip muffin and took a bite. His eyes widened. "Oh man...Kiba, these are awesome! They're warm, and moist, and..." unable to keep going on, Naruto swallowed and took another bite. Akamaru rolled his eyes, even as he took a bite of his jelly donuts, the powdered sugar and jelly practically exploding onto his tongue. Ooohhh, that's good...

Naruto and Kiba continued tearing into their muffins and donuts, respectively, savoring the taste of each. Mmmm, Naruto thought as he gleefully polished off the muffin and grabbed a sticky bun and a handful of cookies, cramming them both into his mouth. This stuff is awesome! Can't wait to see what the rest tastes like...
115331122212221122.title: A Bakery

choices: All three proceed slowly, wanting to finish as much as possible.
Seeing the pained look on Kiba's face, Naruto offered to rub Kiba's belly.
1153311222122211221.content:
It was interesting to watch the two eat together. Kiba stuffed his maw greedily, his belly already distended from a previous meal, while Naruto, much to Kiba's surprise, took more time while he ate (at least compared to how he usually eats). He basically took an experimental bite out of each new confection, and every time he tasted a new treat, his eyes would widen, and he would finish it a bit more quickly.

Nevertheless, he still ate at a rather leisurely pace. The nice thing about bakeries was the fact that the food didn't have to be eaten immediately. It could be taken home later. Naruto particularly liked the sticky buns, and he had his fun with them, working his way down the spiral as he ate.

All the while, Kiba was stuffing his greedy maw as much as he could. He was pretty full already, but he wanted to see how much more he could fit in the tank. He was able to eat quite a bit at the eating contest, and now he truly wanted to push his limits. With that in mind, and without particularly caring about being polite, he grabbed chunks of one of his cakes with his hands, frosting and all, stuffing them in his face with a goofy smile.

Finally, there was Akamaru, who laid down in between them. From there, he had a perfect view of both of their stomachs. Either way, that wasn't really his main focus, as he was currently chowing down on a pile of jelly doughnuts in front of him. They were one of his weaknesses for sure. He did keep an eye on the two, however, as he was interested to see how this played out.

Kiba's stomach made a relentless assault outwards, placing quite a bit of strain on his elastic shorts. In addition, his massive belly was making its way to the table, nearly touching it once he finished his cake. At this point, his stomach was taut, but he was still determined to push himself farther. Naruto, on the other hand, was starting to get full, but he was enjoying the flavors so much that he didn't want to stop. Kiba's doughnuts looked particularly tempting, and luckily, Kiba was taking a little break, belching a bit and patting his taxed stomach.

"Can I try one of your doughnuts, Kiba?" Naruto asked, trying to be as polite as he could. "Sure, just let me have one of your sticky buns!" Kiba replied. Before he even finished, Naruto was trying a doughnut, loving the flavors that he was experiencing. Kiba took one of Naruto's sticky buns, eating nearly half of it in one bite.

The two teens proceeded to eat many of the baked goods in front of them. Kiba was beginning to work on his apple pies. He removed the tin, and he grabbed the pie with both hands, holding it gingerly so it didn't fall apart. One of the specialties of this bakery was their pies, as they prided themselves on their ability to make pies that were not only delicious, but also stable. One of their selling points was that people could easily remove the pies from the tin and cut it from there, making it easier to serve and easier to clean. It also made it easier for Kiba to eat, and he took a bite out of the side of the pie. The filling was still pleasantly warm, and he moaned with delight.

Naruto watched Kiba do this before he tried the same with a blueberry pie. He grabbed the pie, took a bite. "Owwwww!!! That's hot!" Naruto screamed, startling everyone in the room, causing Kiba to nearly drop his pie, and causing Akamaru to stand up in alarm.

"You idiot! You were supposed to make sure the pie was cooled first!" Kiba snapped. "How was I supposed to know! You were doing it!" Naruto retorted defensively, fanning his tongue with his hands. "There was steam still coming from yours, but mine didn't have any steam!" Kiba replied. Naruto dropped it at that, and he placed his pie back in the tin, waiting for it to cool. Meanwhile, Kiba was already close to finishing his, and his stomach reached the table when he did so. Seeing that, he patted it proudly.

Akamaru resumed eating, and much to his own surprise, he had finished all the jelly doughnuts. His stomach was now slightly distended at this point, but he couldn't resist digging into some of the snickerdoodles in front of him.

Naruto, meanwhile, was working on one of the chocolate cakes, while Kiba worked on some of his cinnamon rolls. Kiba was slowing down quite a bit at this point, as he had never quite eaten this much before, and his huge stomach showed. Now his waistband was slowly beginning to quiver, and so was his navel. Naruto loved the flavor of the cake, though, and he powered through it surprisingly quickly compared to how he ate before. His stomach was now beginning to distend, and with each bite, it was becoming more and more visible under his jacket. Finally, after Kiba had to stop for a little while, Naruto finished the last of the cake. At this point, his jacket was now stretching quite a bit to fit around his stomach. He was now quite full too, but not overstuffed like Kiba seemed to be.

Akamaru had made a considerable dent in the snickerdoodles, and because of this, his stomach was now much more noticeably distended, and it appeared as if he was going to have puppies soon. All three sat there for a bit, belching occasionally, somewhat tired after the sugar high.
1153311222122211221.title: Enjoying the flavors

choices: Either Kiba's belly button or the elastic band pop...
Both Kiba's belly button and the elastic band pop, making extra room...
11533112221222112211.content:
Both teens leaned back in their chairs, massaging their achingly bloated bellies to coax the cramped pain away, while Akamaru merely laid on his side, allowing his own distended furry gut to hang out on the floor besides the two teens. "Holy cow..." Naruto exclaimed, rubbing his bloated belly; just barely contained beneath his jacket, "...I can't even remember the last time I ate that many sweets before..." Kiba burped queasily and nodded, thumping his vastly distended belly heartily as he did.

"Hehe, I can..." Kiba said proudly, earning a roll of the eyes from Akamaru as he recalled Kiba's previous feeding frenzy at this bakery. Naruto glanced at Kiba's immensely swollen stomach pressed into the table, and noticed the elastic waistband to his pants quivering noticeably, and a strange quivering from near Kiba's belly button. "Man, I don't think I've EVER seen you eat that much before, Kiba..." Naruto noted. "Hell, I don't think your gut was even that big after winning that stinkin' contest!" Kiba grinned toothily and said, "What can I say? Today? I felt like REALLY cuttin' loose, y'know?"

Naruto shrugged, still resting his hands atop his own stomach and added, "Well, I'm just glad we can take this stuff with us. It'd suck if we had to waste all these goodies." Kiba nodded, and said, "It sure would, bonehead..." he then glanced down at all the tasty baked goods before them and added, "Still, it'd be a shame not to at least TRY To eat as much of these as we could while they're still fresh..." Both Naruto and Akamaru glanced at Kiba and his massive gut, still pressing into the table. Akamaru noticed Kiba already eying another batch of cinnamon rolls, and immediately knew what Kiba was suggesting. You can't be serious...

Considering this for a moment, Naruto glanced down at his distended midsection, wincing a bit. "I dunno, I'm feeling pretty full right now..." he then glanced back up at the still steamy and sweet smelling goods and licked his lips. "Buuuuuut like you said...might as well get what we can while they're fresh, right?" Kiba smiled and said, "That's more like it!" The two two then grabbed some more cinnamon buns and proceeded to take a big honking bite from each respectively, both taking a little longer to chew. Akamaru sighed to himself. Eh, we're gonna be here anyway...no use just sitting around doing nothing but waiting for them to stuff their faces... And so, despite his own fullness, Akamaru started chomping down on some more jelly doughnuts at a slower pace than before.

With more and more goods consumed, Naruto's belly had begun to grow to the point where a sliver of flesh had begun to peak from beneath his jacket as he staggered to consume more buns, still smirking to himself as he proceeded to eat one in a spiral for his own amusement, albeit a bit sluggishly as he did so. Finally gulping down the bun, Naruto winced a bit, massaging his belly before getting to work on the next bun. "Ugh, so full..." Naruto had barely finished speaking before belching loudly and groaning in a mix of relief and discomfort. Akamaru also whined in discomfort as he had just finished gulping down several jelly doughnuts, despite his better judgement, causing his own belly to swell out even further, to the point where the giant dog looked as if he'd swallowed a massive beach ball. Damn jelly doughnuts...how am I going to be able to talk sense into Kiba if I'm too busy stuffing as many of you into my mouth as I possible can? Ugh...hypocrisy...thy name is Akamaru... Before Akamaru could rant on however, a sudden creaking from the table caught both his and Naruto's ears.

Naruto looked up and saw Kiba's belly was had distended to greatly that its pushing into the table had begun to cause the table to strain upward just slightly due to the sheer size of Kiba's taut gut, causing the young dog-nin to wince and groan in discomfort. "Oi, Kiba, you feeling okay?" asked Naruto, still uncomfortably full himself. The band to Kiba's shorts was quivering now more than ever, but all Naruto could see was Kiba's face as he struggled to eat another doughnut. Seeing his friend seemingly green around the gills alarmed Akamaru as he glanced up at his pal with concern. K-Kiba? Are you alright?! Kiba nodded weakly and said, "Y-yeah...m-my stomach just...feels kinda...tight right now..."

The strain in Kiba's voice didn't provide any comfort to Akamaru; whose fears worsened as a loud rumbling emanated from Kiba's globular gut, causing him to immediately cover his mouth with one hand as he rested the other atop his belly. The rumbling worsened as both Naruto and Akamaru glanced at their friend with concern, expecting the worst. But instead...

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA APPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!*

Kiba let out a massive belch, which startled several around them for several disgustingly loud seconds straight, causing Kiba's gargantuan belly to shiver almost uncontrollably. However, as it carried on, Kiba's belly button and the band to his shorts began to quiver irregularly from the sudden motion, until finally...
11533112221222112211.title: All three slowly try to finish as much as possible

choices: More time passes, and Naruto slowly but surely catches up to Kiba
As time passes, the table begins to reach its limit....
115331122212221122112.content:
Kiba's overtaxed shorts band, unable to be stretched any further, gave, busting apart with a loud SNAP, the sides of the busted elastic whipping out to either side of him. Akamaru yelped as the band shot toward him, and was just barely able to move his head to avoid getting it to the face. Damn it! Kiba wore those shorts because they didn't have a button! He whined pitifully, leaning his head back down on the floor. No matter what he wears, it's not safe for anybody...

Things didn't stop there, though; his belly, freed from the restraint of his waistband, surged forward as much as it was able, putting even more pressure against the table and causing it to strain upwards more. And, no sooner had it surged forward than...

*POP!*

...his navel violently inverted with a loud, fleshy pop, wobbling about above the table. Seconds after that, Kiba sighed, leaning back in his chair and letting his arms hang limply at his sides. He let his head lean back, his tongue sticking out the side of his mouth. Ohhhhh man...that feels sooooo much better...

Naruto, having paused in his own gorging to gape at the sight, finally spoke. "Uh, Kiba? What the hell just happened?"

Lifting his head up, Kiba smirked, sluggishly bringing one of his arms up to massage his engorged tummy. "What's it look like, dummy? My shorts couldn't keep up. And this?" He took a finger and wobbled his navel. "Well, that just means my gut's really packin' a lot in."

Akamaru rolled his eyes from the floor. Like it wasn't before? He whined as he thought of the other effect of Kiba's gorging: specifically, his busted shorts. He sure hoped Kiba would be able to hold them up and keep his balance when he was done here, considering he was wearing those undies today...

Naruto stared at Kiba's midsection, somewhere between shocked and genuinely awed. "I'll say you are..." He looked again at the massive size of his gut, then the vast amount of goodies still before him. "You, uh, takin' the rest home?"

To his surprise, Kiba smirked. "Heh, about that..." he smacked his midsection heartily, forcing a burp free. Shaking it off, he continued. "After that, I actually feel like I have some more room now." He grinned. "Besides, I said I'd try to eat as much of this stuff as possible..."

Akamaru's eyes widened. Oh, come on, Kiba! You've busted your shorts, your gut's pressing against the table...don't you think it's time to call it a day?

Kiba chuckled, reaching a hand down and ruffling Akamaru's head. "C'mon, boy, you know I don't give up easy. Besides," he added, grabbing a rather large hunk of cake, "this stuff's way too tasty to let go to waste!" He took a massive bite, sighing with pure bliss as he swallowed and went in for another bite.

Akamaru groaned. Shoulda known... He craned his head to look at his jelly doughnuts. Well, if he's going all out, no reason I can't either.... With that thought he resumed gulping down doughnut after doughnut.

Naruto watched Kiba and Akamaru continue to stuff themselves. He smirked. Heh...if they're still going after everything they've already eaten... Licking his lips, he grabbed a few muffins and crammed them in his mouth. There's no way I'm losing to you again, Inuzuka!
115331122212221122112.title: Both Kiba's belly button and the elastic ba...

choices: Naruto unzips his jacket, releasing his massive belly.
Naruto pushes through, and the jacket breaks off violently.
1153311222122211221121.content:
Now that Naruto had seen just how much Kiba had eaten, he began to get competitive, wanting not to be outclassed. He originally wanted to just relax and have a good time with Kiba, but since Kiba was stuffing himself way past the gills, he wanted to see if he could even come close to Kiba. With that in mind, he began picking up a second wind as he stuffed muffin after delicious muffin into his face.

Akamaru was also eating quite quickly, as he was picking up on the excitement of the other two, and he decided that he might as well stuff himself as much as possible, as the others were doing it anyway.

Kiba on the other hand, despite the cocky words, wasn't quite as fast as the other two. He had more room in his belly now, but he still was approaching his limits.

As Naruto focused on his muffins, the effects on his belly became very rampant. Now, the front of his jacket was stretching precariously tight, and the teeth were starting to creak in protest. Naruto wasn't very concerned, as he knew that his zipper was strong. It wasn't going to come undone that easily. The jumpsuit was specially made for him after all. As he continued, the zipper groaned more and more loudly in protest. Naruto's belly was now beginning to squish up against him, and instead of rounding out, it was pressed up against the rest of his abdomen.

Akamaru's belly had all the room it needed to expand, and it definitely used it. As he ate doughnut after doughnut, his belly got closer and closer to touching the ground, a feat that he hadn't accomplished in a very long time. Either way, this didn't really matter to him at the moment, as he was too focused on eating.

Kiba's belly, which was pressing against the table, now began to push the table slightly. The table wasn't fastened to the ground, and it only had a central base, no legs, so it was fairly easy to move. It also began to lean ever-so-slightly.

Naruto's zipper was becoming a major concern, however, and it was starting to make him feel very uncomfortable. He could eat more, but he was a little skeptical about breaking his jacket. It was his favorite, after all.
1153311222122211221121.title: Catching up

choices: Catching on, he warns Kiba to adjust before he knocks the table over.
He disregards it and continues eating away.
11533112221222112211211.content:
Wincing, Naruto glanced down at his swelling but uncomfortably contained gut whilst the others continued to eat. Oof...oh man, feels like a rock is pushing against my gut... Naruto thought to himself. He glanced at his ample baked goods, still calling to him, then back at his stomach. Never one to up and take the easy way out, Naruto forced himself to shrug it off and attempted to take a big honking bite off the top of another muffin, certain that his favorite jacket was strong enough to hold, despite a creaking in the zipper to the contrary.

Chewing heartily and still enjoying the flavor, he gulped it down. Upon doing so, he gritted his teeth in pain as his midsection's containment forced it against the rest of up his upper torso, causing an incredibly sharp pain in his stomach. Almost immediately, he dropped the muffin and gripped his gut. Catching the commotion, Kiba glanced curiously at the blond and, after gulping down a mouthful of muffin, asked, "Oi, bonehead. You okay?" Naruto shook his head, face visibly wincing in pain and said, "Ngh...I got cocky, is all...shouldn't 'uh tried to push my jacket to the limit like that." Kiba raised an eyebrow and asked, "Don't you normally just bust your clothes anyway?"

Despite his sharp pain, Naruto scowled at Kiba and responded with, "It's not like I ALWAYS try to bust everything I wear when we eat!" Both Akamaru and Kiba glanced at Naruto, blatantly skeptical of his remark. Immediately, Naruto looked away sheepishly and said, "Okaaaay...maybe I do sometimes...but ONLY sometimes! Besides, this is my favorite jacket, I don't wanna ruin it..." With that, Naruto reached, trying to muster the strength to move his painfully contained torso just enough to reach for his front zipper.

Taking a deep breath, Naruto sucked in his gut as much as he could, and pulled the zipper to his jacket down. Immediately, his belly pushed outward from the jacket like a dam that had just burst from pressure. His gut had expanded so much that it was almost resting against his thighs, now showing a good amount of flesh just a little below his belly button, from the bottom of his now exposed black t-shirt. Letting out a tremendous sigh of relief, Naruto leaned back in his chair and smiled with immense bliss on his face.

"Ahhhhhh, MUCH better..." he mused, patting his freer, much larger belly with relief. Kiba smirked and said, "Feeling better?" Naruto nodded and glanced back down at his muffins. Licking his lips with a newfound hunger, he said, "MUCH better..." and proceeded to viciously chomp away at his muffins. Not one to be bested, Kiba grinned and returned to his treats as well, causing his even larger belly to expand little by little while his inverted navel wobbled comically with each bounce of his moving gut. Naturally, as it expanded, it pushed further and further into the table, causing more of it to tilt forward.

Akamaru had already continued to feast away on his treats, but the sudden creaking of the table caught his sensitive ears...
11533112221222112211211.title: Naruto unzips his jacket, freeing his large belly.

choices: Kiba's stomach can't take any more, and he stops eating
Naruto becomes stuffed to the brim
115331122212221122112111.content:
Akamaru looked towards the source of the creaking, his eyes widening as he saw Kiba's massive and still-expanding belly pressing more and more against the table, causing it to tilt upwards more and more. Uh-oh... Akamaru thought, whining. The table was creaking more than ever, now, and if Kiba put any more pressure on it...well, Akamaru was fairly sure the voucher didn't cover broken furniture.

Determined to stop Kiba from making an even bigger fool of himself, Akamaru lifted his head and barked. Oi, Kiba! Kiba, midway through biting into a jelly donut, looked toward the dog. "Something wrong, Akamaru?"

The dog nodded. Unless ya wanna bust the table and send everything crashing to the floor, ya might wanna adjust your gut.

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "Huh? What do..." He looked down at his belly, and blushed when he noticed is was pushing the table forward. "...whoops. Lemme do something about that." He scooted back a good bit, allowing the table to return to its position on the ground. His belly still contacted it, but only just. Kiba smirked. "Heh; that oughtta do it..." Licking his lips, Kiba looked out over his treats. "Now let's see, where was I..." Grabbing what was left of his doughnut, he crammed it into his mouth, then reached his arms out, grabbing whatever was in reach and bringing it up to his mouth.

Akamaru breathed a sigh of relief. Phew, glad I nipped that in the bud... He groaned suddenly; his engorged belly, now beginning to touch the floor, was beginning to hurt. Ow, my tummy aches... He growled, looking at his remaining confections. Damn you, jelly doughnuts! Why must you be so delicious?

Kiba frowned sympathetically at the dog, but Naruto was heedless, cramming treat after treat into his maw, slowly causing his belly to swell and his shirt to hike up higher and higher. When Kiba caught notice of this, he growled, cramming treats into his mouth despite his aching belly. Naruto, seeing Kiba pick up the pace, did the same, shoveling as much as he could into his mouth at time.

Eventually....
115331122212221122112111.title: Catching on, he warns Kiba to adjust before he ...

choices: Not nearly as large as Kiba's.
Just about the same size as Kiba's.
1153311222122211221121111.content:
Not too long afterwards, Kiba slowed down, and he stopped soon after that. He was green in the face, but he couldn't help but smile proudly. He gently patted his distended gut, which was now beginning to press against the table again. It was so large that it stuck out past his knees. It was also tight as a drum, and it was almost painful for Kiba just to touch his belly.

"I guess I made a good dent in the food!" Kiba said sarcastically, as he had eaten nearly two-thirds of his entire order. At this point, Akamaru had run out of the delicious jelly doughnuts, and he had also called the quits. His belly now began to press against the floor, and it was starting to spread his hind legs apart. Either way, Naruto wasn't finished eating yet, and he was focused on stuffing his face, completely oblivious to the fact that the other two had called the quits.

Kiba, noting this, said, "Naruto's still going. He's such a slow eater." To be fair, you sorta got a head start, Kiba. Akamaru pointed out to Kiba. "That's true." Kiba replied. Naruto was still oblivious to all this, as his shirt was lifted to the point where it didn't cover any of his bloated belly anymore.

"Wow! He's really focused." Kiba mused. "Is that what I look like when I eat a lot?" Akamaru merely nodded in response, as he was watching Naruto, amused. The two continued to watch Naruto eat, fascinated, and finally, Naruto stopped, and he looked green in the face, just like Kiba. Akamaru looked at the bellies of the two, and he noticed that Naruto's belly was...
1153311222122211221121111.title: Kiba's limit

choices: The three lug their ways to Kiba's place to digest in peace.
Too full to move, the three wait at the bakery to digest enough to move.
11533112221222112211211112.content:
Hey, Kiba? Is it just me, or did Naruto swallow an inflated medicine ball...? Kiba glanced down at his pal curiously, then to Naruto. "Huh? Whadduya mean by th-?" Despite his fullness, Kiba glared with a hint of astonishment at the sight of Naruto's massive belly. Despite it appearing to be infinitely tighter than Kiba's due to not softening the way his had, it appeared to be nearly the same size as Kiba's own immense stomach. It had grown so massive in the time Naruto spent wolfing down his pastries and baked goods that he also had to push his seat back to prevent his belly from pressing against the table the way Kiba's did.

"Man, guess Uzumaki was serious about not wanting to lose another eating contest ever again," Kiba said to Akamaru, chuckling to himself as he continued to massage his large gut gingerly. I'm surprised his belly button didn't pop out the way yours did, especially considering how much tighter a fit it looks to be still... Kiba laughed, still wiggling his own inverted navel a big before shrugging and adding, "Eh, then again, he DID take it a lot slower than I did for a good while..."

Groaning, Naruto leaned back against his chair, and rested both hands atop his massive belly, his face still green from fullness as Kiba laughed weakly and said, "Damn, bonehead...didn't think you'd be able to pack away so much so fast. Hate to admit it, but I'm actually kinda impressed!" Naruto worked up a weak smirk of appreciation, but as soon as he opened his mouth to thank Kiba, a massive belch blasted from the bloated teens mouth. He grinned sheepishly and blushed with embarrassment as Kiba chuckled with amusement, then let out a burp of his own, causing both teens in all their fullness to stop for a moment, then burst into a little fit of laughter, which ended shortly with both young men groaning and tending once more to their inflated midsections.

"Ugh...y'know? It's strange though. You haven't been practicing since you lost, yet you managed to eat more now than you did when I whooped your ass in that contest. Why is that?" Kiba asked, causing Akamaru to roll his eyes. Naruto; too full to scowl, merely shrugged and said, "I dunno. I was havin' more fun here just kicking back and chomping down than I was competing, and I guess when you're actually enjoying yourself, you got a lil more drive pushing you." Kiba glanced at Naruto curiously then said, "You don't enjoy yourself at the eating contests?" Naruto shook his head and added, "No, I do, but I enjoy kicking back and stuffing my face with my buddies more." Kiba smirks then rubs the back of his head. "Heh, yeah, guess I enjoy eating with a bud more too." Akamaru smirked to himself. Oiy...leave it to these two to let eating enough food to feed two whole families to turn 'em all sappy...

In that moment, a sharp discomfort from Akamaru's own globular belly reminded him of something else. Oof...say, Kiba? If you guys are done...how are we gonna lug ourselves around when all three of our stomachs are this huge...?

Kiba thought for a moment...
11533112221222112211211112.title: Just about the same size as Kiba's.

choices: Are ya up to finishing this food?
We could hang out at my house. I haven't had anyone over in a while.
115331122212221122112111122.content:
Kiba tried to heave himself up, but he had a lot trouble. Normally, he would use Akamaru for help, but because Akamaru had eaten so much, even he wasn't able to maintain balance, as he was barely able to stand on all four paws. "Let's just hang out here for a while. It'll be hard to get home like this!" Kiba said, patting his belly for emphasis. "Good point." Naruto responded.

With that, the two proceeded with idle conversation. Akamaru would occasionally chime in, but Naruto couldn't understand him, so it was a bit awkward, and it always ended with Naruto getting flustered, and Kiba and Akamaru sharing a laugh. It wasn't long, however, before Naruto's eyelids were getting heavy. He yawned, with Kiba and Akamaru following suit.

Within minutes, all three were passed out, with Naruto and Kiba sprawled haphazardly over their seats. Akamaru, without much choice, stayed in somewhat of a standing position, and he rested on his belly. The owner of the store saw them there, shrugged, and got containers for their extra food while he cleaned up empty pie tins and other food wrappers.

After a couple of hours, Akamaru was the first to wake up. They look so peaceful when they're sleeping. Akamaru mused to himself as he realized that he had shifted in his sleep, and now he was laying on his side, his somewhat smaller belly flopped out to the side. Naruto was next, with Kiba soon afterwards. Both of the teens bellies had reduced in size, with Kiba's navel having returned to its normal concave position. Their bellies were now small enough to allow their shirts to rest just above their respective belly buttons. "What do ya wanna do now Kiba?" Naruto asked. In response Kiba said, "..."
115331122212221122112111122.title: Waiting a while

choices: Kiba wakes up before Naruto gets there, and decides to order some food
Naruto arrives at Kiba's house, waking him.
1153311222122211221121111222.content:
Kiba shrugged. "Eh, my mom's out on a mission, and Hana's on a house call to another village." He smirked. "Ya wanna come over my place? I haven't had anyone over in a while, and it'll be nice to have the company...ya know, even if it's you."

Naruto grinned. "Sure, sounds like a great ide---heeeeey!" He swiftly scowled as Kiba's insult registered. The dog-nin couldn't help it; he burst out laughing. Even Akamaru wagged his tail a bit.

"Heh, it actually took you that long to get it?" Kiba managed between snickers. At Naruto's continued scowl, Kiba rolled his eyes. "Ah, c'mon, don't be like that." Still snickering, he scooted back from the table. "C'mon, let's get outta here." He stood up...

...only for his shorts, the waistband of which had completely busted, to fall down to his ankles. Kiba's face did its best overripe tomato impression, Akamaru gaped and whined, and Naruto....

"BAHAHAHA!" Naruto laughed, clutching his middle. "W-who's the idiot now, huh?" Even as Kiba glowered at him, the blonde took a closer look at him. "Heh; nice undies, Inuzuka!"

Kiba's face, impossibly, reddened even further as he looked down at said garment: specifically, a pair of green boxer-briefs with a fire hydrant pattern on full display. "Sh-shut up!"

Akamaru, mortified, whined, covering his eyes with his ears. Oh great...and to think Kiba wore those shorts to PREVENT embarrassing crap like this form happening...

Kiba continued to scowl and redden as Naruto continued to laugh at him. "Yeah, haha," Kiba muttered, too embarrassed to do anything more. Grumbling, he bent down and pulled his shorts up, making sure to hold onto them tightly. "C'mon, let's get outta here." Still grumbling, he quickly walked towards the exit, Akamaru following close behind. Naruto, watching them, rolled his eyes. "Man...guy cna't take a joke." Snickering a bit, he sucked in his gut as much as he could and re-buttoned his pants; it was a rather tight fit, but he managed. With that taken care of, he got out of his seat and followed the two.

Seeing the three go, the shop's owner called, "Hey, wait! What about your stuff?"

"Just deliver it to my place," Kiba muttered, his face not quite as red as it had been. Before the shopkeep could answer, the three were out the door.

The three walked in silence for a bit, Kiba's face gradually losing its red color as Akamaru walked beside him. Unsurprisingly, it was Naruto who broke the silence.

"Hey, guys?" Naruto spoke up, wincing as his pants cut into his middle. "I, uh, gotta stop by my place to change. I'll be over as soon as I can."

"Go ahead," Kiba muttered, still a little mad at Naruto for his outburst. Naruto raised an eyebrow, but nonetheless grinned and gave a thumbs-up.

"Great! I'll see you guys in a little bit!" Waving, Naruto quickly left their side, making a beeline for his apartment. Kiba, watching him go, rolled his eyes. "Idiot..." he muttered. Akamaru whimpered, and Kiba managed to smile and pat him on the head (making sure his unoccupied hand was holding his shorts up, of course). "Ah, it's OK, buddy; it's just a mood, it'll pass." Akamaru whined again, but he licked Kiba's hand, more or less placated for the moment.

Soon, Kiba and Akamaru reached their house. Getting out his keys and unlocking the door, the dog-nin made his way inside, heading straight for his bedroom to change, Akamaru following dutifully behind. Kiba peeled his gray t-shirt off and shucked his broken shorts, rooting through his things until he found a couple of garments that were to his liking: specifically, a red tank top with a paw print on it and a pair of tan khaki shorts. Grinning, he slipped the clothes on; owing to his still slightly-stuffed belly, his tank top still rode slightly above his navel, and his khakis had to be unbuttoned and unzipped, but otherwise, they fit well enough.

He nodded. "Alright, all set!" He smiled, plopping down onto his bed. Akamaru, already sensing what Kiba was planning, hopped up behind him, curling his body and allowing Kiba to recline against him. "Now, while the dummy does whatever he has to do and what's left digests..." he smacked his belly for emphasis. "...I think a nap's in order." He yawned. "Oi, Akamaru; if someone comes by, wake me, OK?"

Despite the order, Akamaru wasn't offended; he was well used to getting up before Kiba, anyway. With an affirmative nod, he laid his head on the bed, shutting his eyes. Smiling, Kiba yawned again and closed his eyes as well. Soon, both boy and dog, were sound asleep, sleeping off what was left of their massive meals.

A bit later...
1153311222122211221121111222.title: We could hang out at my house. I haven't ha...

choices: "Ramen, ramen, and more ramen, if you please..."
11533112221222112211211112221.content:
A considerable amount of time had passed, allowing Kiba and Akamaru to digest their ample meals. Finally, Akamaru's eyes fluttered open as he yawned heartily and lapped his lips groggily. Glancing down, he felt that his stomach had shrunken considerably and sighed with relief. Much better...

He then looked down at Kiba still resting soundly against him and couldn't help but smile. Hehe, even after all that gassing on and pouting about, he always looks so peaceful when he's sleeping...especially when he's sleeping off a giant meal for six...

Nonetheless, Akamaru leaned his head down to Kiba's face and started licking the teen across the cheek, waking him shortly after. Tired, Kiba nonetheless smiled at the big dog's greeting and ruffled his fuzzy head. "Hehe, good morning to you too, boy...err...good whatever time it is..." Stretching his arms up, Kiba yawned heartily and smacked his lips, resting his hands atop his stomach, which had digested an amble amount of his massive meals, and shrunken down immensely to where his shirt once again covered all of his stomach, which was now only bulging a bit more than it had when the days escapades had begun beneath his red tank top. "Ahhh, that was JUST what I needed," Kiba exclaimed, patting his stomach happily as he jumped out of his bed.

Heading back to the living room with Akamaru, his smile dropped as he scratched his head curiously. "Wait, Dummy isn't here yet?" Akamaru whined and shook his head. Kiba rolled his eyes and scoffed, "Jeez, what the hell's takin' that idiot so long? Hmph, knowin' him, he probably forgot his keys again and now he's trying to find another way that doesn't involve breaking and entering in his own place..." Akamaru glanced up at the dog-nin and whined.

You're not still mad at Naruto, are you?

Kiba shook his head. "Nah, I'm over it, boy," he then rubbed the back of his head and smirked sheepishly, "aaaaaaand, I guess I DID kinda have it coming, after that crack I made about his bone-headedness. Only makes sense that he'd jump at whatever opportunity he could to laugh right back at me, right?" Akamaru barked happily and licked Kiba's hand.

To be fair, he DOES make it pretty easy...

Kiba laughed and ruffled Akamaru's head playfully. "Haha, he sure does, he suuuure does. Still, brain dead moron or not, he's a good guy, I guess, so-"

No sooner than he said that, had an obnoxious knocking at the door caught the boy and dogs' attention. Kiba opened the door and in stepped Naruto, dressed in different, less snug and constricting attire, and; like Kiba and Akamaru, his stomach seemed to have digested nearly all of his massive meal, but unlike Kiba's, had shrunken down to his near completely flat and normal state. "About time. Man, what the hell took ya so long?" asked Kiba.

Naruto rubbed the back of his head and said, "Well..." Kiba facepalmed. "You lost your keys again, didn't you..." Naruto scowled and said, "N-no! W-well, yeah, but I forgot to lock the front door, so-nevermind! Look, I know I was being kind of obnoxious back at the restaurant..." he started snickering slightly to himself, "...I still can't believe you actually wear those things-errr, but anyway, I thought you might still be pissed, soooo, yeah, sorry, I guess."

Kiba smirked and nudged the young blond in the arm, "Ahhh, whatever, bone-head. Come on, make yourself at home." Smiling, Naruto opened his mouth to thank Kiba, when suddenly, a loud growl emanated from the teens stomach. Kiba was about to comment when an even louder rumbling emanated from his own stomach. Akamaru glanced at Kiba and nearly gaped.

...Oh, you've gotta be kidding me...

Grinning sheepishly, Kiba gave the dog a wide smiled grin and said, "What can I say? All that reconcilin' makes a guy hungry." And before Akamaru could protest, his own fuzzy tummy began to rumble as well, causing him to blush beneath his white fur.

You're not helping...

Laughing, Kiba ruffled the dogs head and turned to Naruto. "So, what do you guys feel like eating?"
11533112221222112211211112221.title: Kiba wakes before Naruto arrives, and orders food.

choices: The delivery guy's brought all 120 massive bowls
He was only able to bring sixty huge bowls at a time
115331122212221122112111122211.content:
Naruto thought for a second. "Uh, I hear Ichiraku's is doing deliveries, now." He grinned at Kiba. "Do you think we could, ya know...

Kiba rolled his eyes. "It's always ramen with you, isn't it?" A quick look of disappointment flashed across Naruto's face, and the dog-nin couldn't help but laugh. "Ah, c'mon, lighten up." He smirked. "The voucher's good for all kinds of food, remember? We can totally do ramen." He rubbed his stomach. "Besides, after a few weeks of meat, ice cream, and baked goods, I could go for something a little different."

"Really?!" Naruto exclaimed, his eyes gleaming. "Thanks, Kiba! You're the best!"

Kiba chuckled. "Heh; you're just realizing that now?" Akamaru barked and wagged his tail while Naruto sputtered and glared a bit at the dog-nin. Ignoring this, Kiba made his way over to the phone, spinning its wheel and dialing Ichiraku's number (he'd actually ordered from them a couple of times with the voucher, contrary to what he'd said). Holding the phone up to his ear, he waited as it rang a couple times, grinning when someone picked up. "Hey, it's me again." He looked over at Naruto. "Yeah, we'll take eighty extra-large bowls of ramen, as many toppings as you can cram in..." he chuckled as he heard the speaker-probably Teuchi-sputter over the phone, and Naruto going slack-jawed and eyes widening in a mixture of shock and pure joy. "Yeah, I'm gettin' 'em for me and a buddy..." The speaker asked something, and Kiba smirked. "Yeah, it's Naruto; I figure we'll each do forty bowls each..." He thought for a moment. "...actually, tack on an extra forty bowls for Akamaru, extra meat." The dog's eyes bugged out. Kiba... he whined pleadingly. Kiba only looked guilty for about a second or two before he winked and continued speaking. "It'll take a while? That's OK, we ain't going anywhere. And yeah, I'm using the voucher." The voice on the other end of the line said a few more words, and Kiba grinned. "Great! See ya in a bit!" Slamming down the phone, he turned to Naruto and Akamaru, the former of whom had a huge grin on his face. "Well, Uzumaki, I hope you're hungry..."

As if to answer, Naruto's nearly-flat stomach-hidden beneath an orange tank top with Konoha's symbol on the front-growled. The blonde only grinned, rubbing it a bit. "Heh, you bet I am!" He yanked the waistband of his camo-patterned trousers. "Not to mention, I didn't get a chance to bust my pants at the bakery; figure this is as good a place as any to do it."

Kiba laughed. "Feels great, doesn't it?"

Akamaru whined, sinking to the floor and covering his eyes with his paws. The only bad part about them getting along? They're so much alike, they make each other worse...

As the ramen was still a good while away, Naruto and Kiba plopped down on the couch next to each other and decided to pass the time by making idle conversation, discussing past missions, their friends, their past eating escapades... honestly, they were just trying to pass the time.

Eventually, though, the doorbell rang. Grinning, Kiba leapt out of his seat, Naruto following closely behind. "Awesome, they're here!" As they rushed to the door, Kiba took a deep sniff. "Aaah.... I can already smell it..."

Reaching the door, he opened it to find...
115331122212221122112111122211.title: "Ramen, ramen, and more ramen, if you pleas...

choices: Akamaru stops after a few bowls, and Naruto and Kiba get competitive.
Akamaru decides to stuff himself, and catches up with the other two.
1153311222122211221121111222111.content:
The delivery boy was quite a sight to see. He was about Kiba and Naruto's age, maybe a bit older, and he was panting, exhausted. A comically large box was strapped to his back. It looked like it could hold a refrigerator. Either way, Kiba helped him get the box off, with Naruto following suit. The box was insulated, and it wasn't even warm to the touch. Either way, Kiba and Naruto lugged the box into the house, gently placing it on the floor in front of the couch. Since he had quite a bit of money because he hadn't been spending it on food, Kiba gave the delivery boy a hefty tip, with the latter grinning from ear to ear at the sight.

The box in question had a large seam on top. Kiba, knowing what to do, unlocked two flaps on the top of the box, then opened up all four flaps, revealing the broth-laden goodness inside. The bowls of ramen were about the size of Kiba's head. They were made of Styrofoam, and the flavor of the ramen inside was displayed on the side. Each bowl had a seal on top, much like pre-made ramen, except it was sealed fresh instead of dried. On top of the seal was logo for Ichiraku's on top, and Teuchi's signature on the bottom. Since Kiba didn't specify a flavor, Teuchi just made plenty of each flavor for the three.

While Kiba and Naruto immediately picked their flavors, Naruto picking miso pork, and Kiba picking beef, Akamaru laid down in front of them, waiting for Kiba to put down a bowl. Afterwards they plopped down on the couch, and they ate at a moderate pace (for them, at least), moaning a bit from the Ichiraku's flavor. Akamaru then said to Kiba I'm not really that hungry, Kiba. You didn't have to get me so many bowls. Once I'm finished, you and Naruto can have the rest of mine. "Are you sure buddy?" Kiba asked. I just wanna watch what I eat. Akamaru replied, trying to get a subtle hint across. Kiba was oblivious, however, and he merely said, "Suit yourself!"

As the two reached their second bowls, Akamaru lagging behind somewhat, Naruto said, "It's pretty awesome that Ichiraku's delivers now! How'd you find out, Kiba?" "Ayame told me when I passed by her in the village." Kiba wasn't really lying. That was how he found out. He just found out much sooner than Naruto thinks. Either way, the two stuffed themselves while continuing their idle conversation.
1153311222122211221121111222111.title: Time to feast

choices: The three continue to slurp away at a steady pace.
Kiba notices how fast Akamaru is eating, and starts to get competitive.
11533112221222112211211112221112.content:
As time went on, both teens continued to slurp down their ramen at a steady but slow pace for the time being. Akamaru, having just finished his fourth bowl, sighed with some relief and stopped eating for a moment as he glanced at the several other bowls left for him by Kiba. Okay, I think that should do it for m-

Stopping mid-sentence, a thought had occurred to Akamaru. Wait a minute...if I stop this early on, then that means Kiba'll have nearly another forty bowls to stuff down his throat... He then glanced at Kiba's slightly bloated stomach then whined to himself, still concerned that this little venture was going to leave his dog-nin pal a bit rounder than he'd like to be. No matter what, those two are gonna keep eating their ramen til they look like they're pregnant with boulder babies...but if I leave Kiba all this ramen...

Slurping down the last noodle to his latest bowl, Kiba smacked his lips and smiled, before looking down and noticing Akamaru looked to be in deep thought. Placing his empty bowl down next to the few others he'd slurped down thus far, Kiba turned to Akamaru and asked, "Oi, Akamaru. You okay, buddy?"

Snapping him out of his train of thought, Akamaru turned to the dog-nin and nodded. Kiba then glanced at Akamaru's bowls. "Just noticed you weren't eatin' is all, and kinda figured maybe you were full already," Kiba noted, licking his lips slightly at the sight of all the bowls left to gulp down. Catching on, Akamaru gulped to himself. Well, a-actually, now that you mention it, I, errr, think I'm starting to get a little hungrier. So I'm thinking I might tackle a few more bowls.

Smirking, Kiba ruffled the big dog's fuzzy head and said, "That's the spirit, boy!" then proceeded to turn to his next bowl and stuff more noodles and toppings into his mouth. Akamaru simply glanced down at his next bowl and sighed to himself, unbeknownst to Kiba who was still too busy working on his noodles with Naruto and occasionally talking idly with the blond. Great, now I'M gonna end up looking like I'm pregnant with the boulder pups...but it's better I stuff my gut with as much of my ramen as I can, then let Kiba try and eat all of his bowls AND mine...cause knowing him, he'll actually pull it off, and probably make himself really sick...

He then proceeded to slurp away at his next bowl of noodles at a bit of a faster rate, eventually gulping it down with gusto as he moved onto his next bowl. Mmmm, well, if I'm gonna force myself to stuff my face, at least I'm stuffing it with this stuff...

In no time at all, Akamaru had caught up with Naruto and Kiba, causing a slightly bump in the big dog's tummy. As more time went on...
11533112221222112211211112221112.title: Akamaru decides to stuff himself, and catch up.

choices: Supplement their noodle feast with loads of sweets
115331122212221122112111122211121.content:
