The minutes ticked by as both teens and even Akamaru dug into their noodles, all three of them enjoying the flavors immensely.

"Mmm," Naruto sighed as he slurped up some noodles. "Dunno how they do it, but this delivered stuff's just as great as getting it fresh!"

Kiba grinned, lifting his current bowl up to his mouth and drinking the broth. "For once, you're talkin' sense, bonehead." Licking his lips, he grabbed another bowl and began slurping away. Scowling at the insult, Naruto nonetheless did the same with his broth, picking up another bowl once he was done.

Akamaru's tail wagged as he continued gulping down the noodles, meat, veggies, and broth, in spite of himself. Can't argue with that; this stuff tastes like its been fresh-made! He continued gulping away, all the while conscious of the small bump in his tummy, which he could feel getting heavier, bit by bit, as he tucked into the bowls. Gah, I can't stop eating this stuff; by the time we're done, I'm gonna need a hell of a tummy rub...

Slowly, each of their bowls began to stack up as they went through each one, savoring the tastes. Slowly, the bumps that had formed in their tummies began growing heavier and bigger as the noodles were slurped down.

Eventually, each of them had polished off about ten of the large bowls each, and they all had to take a breather. Setting their empty bowls aside, Naruto and Kiba reclined on the couch, the former with one arm laid across the top of the couch, and the latter with both arms up on the back of the couch. Akamaru, taking the cue, laid on his side on the floor. Oh man...those bowls are so big; they really start to add up...

Indeed they did; Naruto's stomach, which he was rubbing with his other hand, had bulged rather noticeably, rounding out and pushing against his shirt, though it still remained underneath the orange fabric. Kiba's stomach was in much the same state, though considering it had been slightly rounded even before they'd ordered, it was a tad bit bigger, the red tank top rising up a bit to expose a tiny sliver of flesh. And as for Akamaru, the bump in his tummy had grown into a small sphere; nothing that would impede movement, but still far more noticeable than the ninken would have liked.

At any rate, they all relaxed for a few minutes, letting the already-considerable amount of food they'd downed to settle in preparation for the other bowls.

Soon, they had all rested to their satisfaction, and decided to...
115331122212221122112111122211121.title: The three continue to slurp away at a steady pace.

choices: Didn't want the rest, so Kiba and Naruto challenge each other for it.
Decided that he might as well finish it, and eats both with the other two.
1153311222122211221121111222111212.content:
"Ya know those cakes and stuff we still have left from the bakery?" Naruto asked. "Yeah...?" Kiba asked rhetorically, knowing exactly where it would lead. Here we go again. Akamaru thought. Naruto answered by saying "Maybe we could have a little dessert with our ramen. After all, it can get boring eating just ramen." Naruto didn't even finish his sentence before he brought out the containers from the bakery.

Kiba still had two and a half dozen of his doughnuts, three of his apple pies, half a dozen cinnamon rolls, and two cakes left from last time. Naruto had two dozen sticky buns, three dozen cupcakes, three dozen muffins, two blueberry pies, and one and a half of the chocolate cakes from last time. Akamaru had three dozen of his muffins left, five dozen cookies left, and two of his cakes left. He had completely finished his jelly doughnuts, however. Now he wasn't quite as tempted to eat the sweets, as his favorites were already gone.

Akamaru told Kiba I'll take ramen for now. You can have the rest of my desserts if you want Kiba asked, "Are ya sure buddy, because you said that about the ramen last time!" Akamaru thought about it, and he...
1153311222122211221121111222111212.title: Back to the baked goods!

choices: The trio proceed to finish the rest of their baked goods.
The trio hop back to their ramen.
11533112221222112211211112221112122.content:
Akamaru thought for a moment, remembering that the only reason he was even stuffing himself with the others was to keep from letting Kiba overstuffing himself, and making himself sick...or a bit too round in the middle. And so, he whimpered to himself. ...S-silly me...on second thought, I think I WILL enjoy myself some delicious muffins and a cookie or two...

Smiling, Kiba placed Akamaru's leftovers from the bakery down before the big dog and ruffled his head playfully. "Bon appetit, buddy!" he exclaimed before sinking his teeth into one of his doughnuts. Naruto glanced up curiously and said, "Bone apple-what...?" Both Kiba and Akamaru stopped for a moment and glanced at each other for a moment, before shaking their heads and resuming their meal. Jeez, he gives a whole new meaning to Bone-head sometimes... Kiba laughed and said, "He sure does, boy..." Naruto scowled and pointed a half eaten cupcake at the two, and barked "Hey! Is he talking about me again?" Kiba simply laughed and said, "Ah, just eat your damn cupcakes, Bone-head," before stuffing several more doughnuts into his mouth ravenously.

Grumbling a bit, Naruto nonetheless complied, taking a huge bite from a chocolate cupcake, frosting and all, and almost immediately, his face lit up. "Mmm! Don't think I tried any of these kinds yet," Naruto exclaimed before stuffing the rest into his mouth, causing his cheeks to bulge out comically as he chomped away.

Akamaru on the other hand, was a little less motivated than the other two to stuff his maw. You're doing this for Kiba, you're doing this for Kiba... Akamaru thought to himself before he begrudgingly took a big bite from one of the muffins laid before him. Sure enough, he took another, and another, before he knew it, he was chomping away at his pastries around the same speed as Naruto and Kiba, plowing through muffin after muffin, even stopping to occasionally relish the flavors. Blueberry, cranberry, cinnamon, raisin; it was as if he was sampling the entire menu all at once. All the while, his already occupied tummy continued to swell larger and larger with every few muffins consumed. Occasionally, he would glance up and see both Naruto and Kiba's stomachs had also continued to expand alongside his. Seemed futile to try and keep his dog-nin buddy from overeating his fill, but Akamaru nonetheless assumed that no matter how large Kiba's stomach would end up getting, it at least wouldn't be as bad as it could have been had Akamaru not eaten his share as well. And so, for his pal's well being, no matter how full he was feeling, he trail-blazed on, and in some instances further, than the two teens.

Some time had passed. Several muffins later, Akamaru belched loudly and plopped on his side, tongue sticking out as he glanced forward. What was once a stack of a few dozen muffins, had been reduced to little else than crumbs and muffin wrappers. Akamaru then glanced down at his tummy, which had grown large enough to look as though the dog had swallowed a large watermelon whole. Ugh, I swear, if ever in the world a dog needed a tummy rub...

His thought process was interrupted when he heard an even louder belch coming from above him. He looked up to see Kiba leaning back against his chair, patting his bloated belly proudly. The young dog-nin had consumed his entire two and a half dozen doughnut leftovers, the result of which left his belly swollen by a good few inches, and caused that sliver of flesh at the bottom his shirt to rise up further, just below his navel. "Ahhh, good thinking with the baked goodies, Uzumaki!" Kiba exclaimed, still massaging his bloated midsection.

Naruto burped slightly and grinned back at Kiba. His own stomach had grown to the point where his shirt had now risen up to expose just a sliver of flesh at the bottom like Kiba's once had. "Not such a bone-head afterall, am I?" Naruto exclaimed. Kiba glanced down at Akamaru and smugly said, "Heh, nope. Just MOST the time..." Despite feeling immensely full, Akamaru couldn't help but snicker at this, even more so when he saw Naruto grumbling angrily. Kiba then looked down at Akamaru and asked, "How you holding up, boy?"

The dog whimpered a bit as he glanced up at Kiba sympathetically. Catching on, Kiba grinned and immediately began scratching the big dog's bigger tummy, causing Akamaru's tail to wag as his hind leg kicked slightly. Seeing the sight, Naruto couldn't help but smirk himself.

Then, after a while of that...
11533112221222112211211112221112122.title: Decided to finish and eat both with the others.

choices: The strain becomes too much, and one of them stops to unbutton their pants
One of their pants can take no more, and the button gives
115331122212221122112111122211121222.content:
Deciding to give the sweets a rest for the moment, Naruto and Kiba turned their attention towards their ramen, grabbing a bowl each and slurping away. Akamaru, taking the cue, drew several bowls closer to him, ripped the tops open with his teeth, and began slurping them up. Remember, you're doing this for Kiba, Akamaru told himself, even as his tail wagged as he slurped away. Ooh, that's really tasty...

Naruto and Kiba, oblivious to the dog's inner musings, slurped up mouthful after mouthful of noodles and toppings, only chewing as much as they needed to before swallowing and diving right back in. Before long, they'd finished their current bowls, only to grab another one and start to work on that.

Akamaru, to his not inconsiderable distress, was in roughly the same place, having finished his current bowl. Groaning inwardly, he drew another bowl close to him and opened it, digging into it.

Soon, the teens had finished their second bowls and had already started on their third bowls. Then their fourth. Then their fifth, sixth, seventh....

As the boys and dog plowed through their bowls, the humans' stacking up beside them and the dog's becoming scattered around him, their stomachs slowly but surely continued to expand as more noodles filled their bellies. The humans' tank tops both slid upwards very slowly as their stomachs grew rounder and heavier, and Akamaru could feel the fullness in his gut increase as the watermelon-sized sphere it had become. He whined, but continued on; as big as Kiba's stomach was likely to get, it would get even bigger if Akamaru didn't eat his share.

The minutes ticked by; up and up the boys' shirts slid, and bigger and bigger their and Akamaru's tummies became. Soon, both boys had a couple stacks around them, and they had the stomachs to show for it; Kiba's shirt was now above his navel, and Naruto's was just underneath his own belly-button; it would likely see the light of day rather soon. Akamaru whined as he looked at his own midsection and saw that it, too, was becoming bigger, rounder and heavier. In spite of this, he pressed on, determined not to let Kiba overstuff himself any more than he usually would.

More time passed. Kiba's stomach was now pushing out even more, and his shirt was a good several inches above his navel, starting to scrunch up the paw-print design in the process. Naruto's stomach, though it was slightly less so, had caused his tank top to ride up enough to expose his belly button; in addition, the bottom of the shirt had begun to crinkle, slightly distorting the Konoha symbol on it. Akamaru's furry tummy had now grown even bigger, and he could actually feel it starting to hang down. Ears drooping, he stopped slurping up his current bowl and gave it a defeated look. Oh man...I'm gonna look like I'm carrying puppies by the time we're done...

By this time, both boys were starting to feel a rather distinct tightness in their waistlines, as their ever-growing middles continued to intrude against their pants. Naruto and Kiba both winced, but, not wanting to show the other weakness, soldiered on.

Eventually...
115331122212221122112111122211121222.title: The trio hop back to their ramen.

choices: Sure! It be nice to make more room.
Don't worry about it. I wanna break this button.
1153311222122211221121111222111212221.content:
Kiba felt a the familiar strain of his shorts on his belly, and he was going to brush it off and continue, but then he realized that he already broke a pair of shorts. His mom was going to kill him if he broke another pair, and she was really scary.

With that in mind, he began struggling with his shorts button, trying to undo it to release his massive belly. He wasn't very successful, however, and his attempts to undo it caught Naruto's attention.

To Kiba's surprise, Naruto walked up to him and pushed on his belly. "What are you doing? This hurts you moron!" Kiba blurted out in surprise. Naruto was a bit annoyed by that remark, but nevertheless, he said, "Now that your belly's pressed in, it's easier to unbutton your shorts! Didja think about that?"

Kiba then felt bad for yelling at Naruto, and mumbled "Thanks" as he undid his button with relative ease. Naruto then let go, and his belly flopped out, forcing the zipper down a bit. Kiba sighed a sigh of relief, and patted his belly proudly.

"Look's like you might need to unbutton, too, Naruto" Kiba began, "Want me to help you like you helped me?"

Naruto then replied, with his trademark smile, "..."
1153311222122211221121111222111212221.title: Learning from last time

choices: He pushes just far enough for Naruto to unbutton his pants and free his belly.
Kiba accidentally pushes too hard, forcing a huge belch out of Naruto.
11533112221222112211211112221112122211.content:
After giving it a few seconds thought, Naruto gave the dog-nin his trademark smirk and said, "Ah, sure, why not? It'd be nice to have some extra room!" He winced then looked down at his protruding stomach, pressing sharply against his pants, pressing it to its' limits and added, "Sooner preferably than later...plus, I wouldn't wanna bust another pair'uh pants so quick, y'know?" Kiiba nodded and gestured for Naruto to get over to where Kiba was sitting. "Alright, err....." Kiba muttered, as he raised an eyebrow, uncertain of what to do next. Catching this, Naruto glanced down at Kiba curiously and asked, "What's up, dog-breath?"

Rubbing the back of his head, Kiba exhaled and said, "Uhhh, it just dawned on me that in order for me to push your gut in for you to unbutton your pants, I gotta actually touch your stomach..." Naruto raised an eyebrow and added a sarcastic, "You mean in order to push my stomach in, you gotta actually touch my stomach? Well, gosh! You don't say...!" Kiba scowled as he grunted in annoyance and said, "H-hey, don't gimme no attitude, numbskull! You want my help, don'tcha?" Naruto rolled his eyes and nodded. "That's what I thought. So shut up and lemme figure out how I'm gonna do this..."

Naruto winced some more as he felt his gut still uncomfortably snug against his pants. He glanced down at Kiba and said, "Ugh, look, if you're gonna be such a baby, then forget it, I'll try'n unbutton it myself." Scowling, Kiba glared angrily and shouted, "I'm not being a baby! I just-" but before he could continue, Naruto had already attempted to try and unbutton his pants to free its' constriction against his belly. Unfortunately, his stomach had bloated outward so much that it obstructed his button and made it near impossible to reach without feeling immensely uncomfortable, and on a full stomach, that's the last thing anyone wanted.

Sighing with frustration, Kiba shook his head and said, "Ugh, just c'mere, dummy..." Naruto gave up on trying to unbutton himself, and opted to follow Kiba's request. The blond ninja approached the dog-nin as he just rolled his eyes and pressed his palms square against Naruto's immensely bloated tummy, and sure enough...
11533112221222112211211112221112122211.title: Sure!  It'd be nice to have some more room!

choices: Kiba begrudgingly helps push more burps out of Naruto
To play it safe, Kiba lets Naruto figure it out himself.
115331122212221122112111122211121222112.content:
As Kiba presses his palm against Naruto's bloated belly, the young blonde winces as he feels his gut gurgle deeply in response, confusing Kiba as he feels Naruto's bare stomach gurgling beneath his palm. Taking his palm off the other teens stomach, Kiba glances back at his friend with a brow cautiously raised.

"Oi, bonehead...y-you feelin' okay? You're not gonna puke or anything, are you...?" Kiba asked slightly nervously, afraid he might have pushed down the wrong way. And doubly afraid that his friend was about to make a mess, which, needless to say, would kind of kill the momentum...as well as Kiba's appetite. These concerns were doubly raised when Naruto lurched forward, one palm covering his mouth as his cheeks swelled up. Wincing again, Kiba eased back and looked away, not wanting to see what came next...and moving out of the 'line of fire,' as it were...DEFINITELY not wanting to be in the way of that...

However, what had come out of Naruto's mouth, was not what anyone expected...

*BBBWWWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!!!!!*< br />
...For out from Naruto's mouth, expelled a long, deep, MIGHTY burp, one which blasted throughout Kiba's home, and made the blonde's rounded stomach physically jostle from its' sheer force. Kiba physically flinched from its' sheer volume and glanced back at Naruto with an expression that was a blend between surprised, annoyed, and bewildered.

Akamaru, meanwhile, watched the eructation expelling from Naruto's gaping mouth with a rather deadpanned expression on his face and blinked dully.

...Huh. And I thought Kiba occasionally sounded like a foghorn exploding...

Finally, when it came to an end, Naruto sighed with immense relief and leaned back in his chair, letting out a much smaller burp then giving his belly a few proud pats of sweet relief. "Phew, man, that felt GOOD," cooed Naruto with a smile of utter relief and contentment plastered on his happy face.

Kiba, on the other hand, eventually sat up and said, "Jeez, man, what the hell was THAT?? Ever heard'uh covering your mouth?"

Naruto simply snorted and said, "Oh, don't even gimme that. You burp all the damn time, Inuzuka."

Akamaru glanced back at Kiba and smirked despite himself. It's true, Kiba. You're hardly the model example of good table manners...especially these days...

Kiba grumbled a bit when he heard his two friends go on, but responded with, "Yeah, maybe so, but not when I'm RIGHT NEXT TO SOMEONE, dummy! What, you tryin' to deafen me or somethin'? That the thanks I get for treatin' us to all the free grub or what?" complained Kiba as he rang out his ears, earning another snicker from Naruto who shrugged and said, "Hey, it's not I could help it or anything. YOU'RE the one who offered to help unbutton my pants, remember?"

At that, Kiba raised a finger and opened his mouth to reply, but stopped for a moment and grumbled to himself, before adding, "Alright, fine, ya got me there. But a little warning wouldn't hurt. Least that way, I don't have a freakin' heart attack tryin' to help you unbutton your damn pants of all things."

Rolling his eyes, Naruto just shook his head and said, "Man, it wasn't like I felt it coming. It just sneaked up on me, that crap happens sometimes, especially when someone's pushing down on your stomach. What can ya do? But fine, whatever, next time I feel a big one coming, I'll give you a lil friendly two weeks notice or whatever, sound good? Yeah? Awesome. Now, can ya please help me unbutton my pants now? I mean, Ramen ain't gonna eat itself, y'know..."

Despite an annoyed grumble, Kiba nonetheless nodded then once again got to work trying to unbutton the blonde ninjas pants to give him the extra room needed to pack away more ramen. However, as he fumbled around with the waistband, he found himself unable to get a solid grip on the button. Naruto's stomach, surprisingly, was bloated enough to the point where it was pressing too far down against his waistband, keeping his button pinned by his rounded gut of all things, making unbuttoning seemingly impossible for Kiba, who gave up after an annoyed little struggle.

"Rgh, dammit," complained Kiba, "your stomach's still pressing against your pants button. I can't get it loose."

Despite himself and the situation he found himself in against his better judgement, Akamaru snickered to himself. One of the benefits of being a dog...no clothing to get in the way of a hefty meal...even if I'm only doing this to keep Kiba from eating EVERYTHING...I'll...stop talking to myself now...

At this, Naruto rubbed the back of his head as he thought, then chuckled sheepishly.

"H-heh, well, eating tons of ramen DOES build up a bit'uh pressure, as you probably noticed..."

Kiba blinked dully yet again and said, "...You don't say..."

Rolling his eyes, Naruto nonetheless went on, "My point is that there's probably a lotta pressure still stuck in my gut right now. Usually, I let loose every so often so it doesn't build up, but today, we were on a roll. And, well, you DID help work up that monster just now..."

Glancing in confusion, Kiba eventually pieced together what Naruto was saying and did a double take.

"Wha-? I'm not helping you do that! You ain't a freakin' baby, Uzumaki! If you gotta burp, do it yourself! Ya don't need me gropin' your belly to do that."

"C'mon," Naruto insisted, "you helped work up way more pressure. And the sooner my button's undone, the sooner we can stop talkin' and get back to chowing down. Now, c'mon, whadduya say?"

Kiba thought for a moment to himself, annoyed by the whole situation, and confused by Akamaru seemingly mumbling quietly to himself. Then, he turned back to Naruto, and after some thinking, decided on what to do next...
115331122212221122112111122211121222112.title: Accidentally pushes up some excess pressure.

1153311222122221.content:
Kiba grinned widely, folding his arms behind his head and leaning against Akamaru. "Ah...this is the life, eh, buddy?" His short, spiky hair was plastered to his forehead with sweat from training, and his clothes-a dark purple/blue hoodie with a net shirt underneath and tan pants- were similarly damp.

The dog woofed happily, licking the side of Kiba's face, eliciting a giggle from the child. <i>Hmm, let's see: no missions, all the free time in the world, hanging with my best buddy...oh yeah, I'd say it's the life.</i>

Several weeks had passed since Kiba and Naruto had been regressed into 8-year-old kids, and a couple since their big pig out, and life, to put it simply, was sweet. The two were closer than they'd ever been, and spent much of their time with one another, whether it was training (just because they'd been turned back into kids was no reason to neglect fitness, after all), playing, or even playing a prank or two on their unsuspecting friends (the one with Neji, the maple syrup, and pillow feathers had been particularly classic.)

Any time not spent with the blonde was spent with Akamaru (who usually joined the two, anyway), who was more than happy to accommodate the little dog nin. After all, they'd been best pals practically their entire lives, and since they'd been forbidden to go on missions until a cure could be developed, they spent practically every waking moment together (and quite a few sleepy moments too), whether it was Akamaru giving Kiba a ride at breakneck speed though the treetops, the little Inuzuka hollering in glee, the two playing chase throughout the streets of Konoha, or the big dog simply pinning the boy under him without warning and assailing him with a relentless series of licks.

True, it had taken Kiba a while to really see the perks of his current situation, what with not being able to go on missions and having a more volatile emotional state (the jutsu that had transformed him and Naruto had also, to a lesser extent, regressed their minds; they still retained all their memories, but their mental states were otherwise how they had been the last time they were this age); it had taken a huge feast alongside Naruto that had left the boys (and Akamaru) utterly stuffed and fit to burst, but which they had found they had genuinely enjoyed. And, as they had laid down and slept off their massive meal, he had been struck by how...carefree he felt, and how happy he was.

Speaking of the feast, Kiba thought as his hand wandered to his stomach, he had eaten an awful lot, but that had been in competition, if a very playful and friendly one,with Naruto at the time, increasing his determination to push himself to his limit. Considering I'm this size right now, who knows how much I can pack away on my own?

Suddenly, his stomach rumbled. Akamaru, hearing this, looked over at him, tail wagging. Someone a little hungry?

Kiba grinned. "How didja guess, buddy?" With a "hup!", he hopped to his feet, stretching and smiling as he felt the sun's rays peek through the trees. Akamaru, taking his cue, got to his feet. So, any idea what you wanna do?

Kiba thought for a moment. "Well, I don't really feel like going home right now..." he smiled as he patted a bulge in his back pocket. "...but I have a lotta money saved up; let's go out to eat!" Licking his lips, Kiba ran off, Akamaru barking happily and following close behind him.

As he ran, though, Akamaru felt a twinge of worry. Why do I get the feeling he's gonna be using more than a little bit of that money?

The dog shook it off; it was probably nothing, and besides, Kiba was a kid right now; he needed a lot of nutrients.

The two continued running, eventually reaching the village proper. As he looked around and took in the myriad smells, Kiba decided to...
1153311222122221.title: Sure!

11533112221222211.content:
Kiba had always had a bit of a sweet tooth, but now that he was eight years old, he had a much stronger sweet tooth. Being an eight year old kid with a lot of money and freedom, of course he made a beeline for an ice cream parlor.

This ice cream parlor was definitely the best in Konoha, and Kiba had only been there once, so he didn't really remember it. Either way, he saw that they had tons and tons of flavors, too many for him to bother to count anymore, and that made him really excited.

Akamaru was a little concerned at this point, and he said I don't think it's a good idea to eat too much ice cream. Kiba, in his usual manner, even as a little kid, brushed it off, saying, "Don't worry Akamaru. It's not like I stuff myslef all the time. (At that, Akamaru did the dog equivalent of a face-palm) Besides, if Tsunade finds the cure, then I won't be like this forever, stuck in the village. I might as well enjoy myself while I still can!"

Akamaru wanted to try getting Kiba not to stuff himself, but he wasn't going to get anywhere, so he just braced himself as Kiba said, "Oi!" This surprised the old man at the counter, who was quite surprised to see a young child by himself at an ice cream parlor. He was even more surprised with Kiba's order. Kiba said, "I'll take..."
11533112221222211.title: Being a kid

He finishes his bowls, but is still hungry for something more filling.
11533112221222212.content:
As both the boy and dog continued to look around for a bite to eat, Kiba's heightened sense of smell detected a steamy and all-too-familiar aroma filling his nostrils. Taking it in, he smiled and said, "Mmmm, smell that, boy? That's Ichiraku's if I ever smelt it!" He then turned to Akamaru, ruffled his fuzzy head and said, "Hehe, y'know what? I'm startin' to think all those ramen eating contests with the Bone-head are rubbin' off on me, cause I suddenly got a huge hankerin' for some ramen. Whadduya say?" Akamaru barked happily, but in his mind, another thought occurred to him. As long as it's just SOME ramen…and not…all of it…

Nevertheless, the young dog-nin hurried towards the source of the scent, reaching the novel Ichiraku's Ramen shack and hopped on top of a stool, only to then be promptly greeted by the smiling face of Teuchi, who looked around with slight surprise and said, "Oh, our favorite little customer isn't with you two today?" Kiba shrugged and said with a smirk, "Nope, just us today. Buuuut we outta be able to give you some good business."

Akamaru stopped for a moment, then disregarded that remark as Kiba then thought for just another moment, and said, "But speaking of the Bone-head, could I get ten bowls of Miso Ramen with extra char siu?" He then looked at Akamaru and asked, "What about you, boy?" Akamaru barked happily. The same's good enough for me.

Kiba grinned and gave Teuchi another order for Kiba as well. The old man nodded and went back to whip up Kiba and Akamaru's orders. Internally, Akamaru was relieved. Ten bowls may seem much, but considering just how much Kiba was capable of putting away, especially in this current state of being, this was as close a victory as Akamaru could have hoped for. Both Kiba and Akamaru continued their idle chatter, reflecting on how things had been going for them and Naruto these past few weeks.

The boy and dog reflected on some of their more humorous happenings, such as Namely how rough things may have started out, and how there had been moments where the two boys' regressed minds had caused some more heated emotional mishaps here or there, but luckily the pair were able to pull through their hardships each time. Sure that tended to lead to the two eating more than any person has any reason to ever eat, but for Akamaru, it was worth it to see his little pal happy and watching his friendship with Naruto strengthen…even if that meant more eating contests…

Finally, Teuchi returned with ten steamy bowls of ramen for Kiba, and ten for Akamaru. Licking his lips eagerly, Kiba placed Akamaru's bowls down for the big dog to work on while he wasted no time scarfing down his first bowl. The warm broth and noodle combo was a burst of zesty flavor as Kiba smiled and continued to scarf away.

In no time at all, the boy had downed his first bowl with gusto, then promptly jumped to his next bowl, munching and slurping away like he hadn't eaten in days. Licking his own bowl clean, Akamaru looked up to see the sight of Kiba pigging out on his bowl of ramen and chuckled to himself. Manners were never one of Kiba's stronger traits; which Akamaru would normally remind him of in outings like this, but in this current state, it was almost adorable to watch the young dog-nin slurp away happily yet hungrily with a wide smile on his face.

And so, he continued, finishing his second bowl, followed shortly by his third, then fourth, and so on, until...
11533112221222212.title: His contests with Naruto made him crave Ichiraku's

choices: "Get one of those 72 oz steaks for Akamaru, too!"
"We're just gonna share all this stuff."
115331122212222122.content:
Kiba finished gulping down the broth of his tenth and final bowl, slamming it down. "Aaahhhh..." he sighed, leaning back on the stool and licking his lips. "That was really good..." Lifting a hand, he tenderly rubbed his belly, smiling as he let his tongue stick out the side of his mouth. His stomach, having received the contents of ten bowls or ramen, was bulging rather noticeably underneath his hoodie.

Akamaru, having polished off all his bowls in the meantime (hey, he was hungry!), licked his chops and looked up at Kiba. Smiling a doggie smile, he wagged his tail. Aw, look at him; looks like a happy puppy after a nice meal... Going up beside Kiba, he licked the side of the boy's face, causing the ticklish young dog-nin to giggle a bit (with Akamaru privately savoring the taste of some broth that had been on his cheek.). You look like you enjoyed that.

Letting out a small burp, Kiba grinned at Akamaru. "Yep, sure did!" Turning back towards the counter, he rooted around in his wallet, pulling out some cash and putting it on the counter. "Thanks for the meal!" Burping again, he rubbed his stomach, smiling.

Teuchi smiled back. "Come back any time!"

Kiba winked. "I'm gonna hold you to that." Turning around in his seat, he hopped off the seat, Akamaru following close behind him.

After walking for a bit, Akamaru sidled up beside Kiba. So, whaddaya wanna do now? He punctuated this by nuzzling Kiba's face as they walked. In response, Kiba grinned and wrapped his arms around Akamaru's neck as best he could, pulling the dog closer to him as they walked. "Huh, I dunno, boy. We both just ate a lot, though, so what do you say we head back home and rest up a bi-"

Suddenly, Kiba's stomach growled. Eyes widening, Kiba looked down towards the appendage. "Huh, I'm still hungry?"

Akamaru, his head still encircled by Kiba's arms, looked down at his buddy's tummy in shock. Yeah, you're still hungry?!

As they walked, Kiba looked down at the bulging appendage, right before his face split in a huge grin. "Heh, just as well." He looked towards Akamaru, releasing his grip on the dog's neck, though he still stay close to him. "I was wondering how much I could pack away whenever I'm not competing with Naruto, anyway..."

Akamaru whined. You were?.... And things had been going so well...

Kiba nodded, licking his lips. "Yep!" His nostrils flared, and he looked over in the direction of the scent, smiling. "And I think I found just the place!" He took off at a brisk walk in that direction. Akamaru, watching him go, hung his head and sighed. Well...at least I can try to rein him in a bit. Shaking his head, he trotted after the little dog-nin.

Soon, the two reached a rather sizable building, the (admittedly delectable, Akamaru admitted) scent that Kiba had found wafting out of it. The boy looked up at the sign on the building, grinning. "Steak...exactly what I felt like." Still grinning, he walked through the doors, pushing them open and allowing Akamaru to pass through as well.

Once inside, Kiba got the attention of a waiter and asked to be seated. The man, sparing a confused glance at Kiba's already-bulging tummy, nonetheless motioned for Kiba and Akamaru to follow. Eventually, he lead them to a rather large booth. Thanking the man, Kiba slid in; Akamaru, seeing the sheer size of the booth, decided to hop up himself, sitting beside Kiba. Eyes bulging, the man raised a finger to protest, but thought better of it. Wearily, he asked Kiba what he wanted.

Kiba's cheery response? "I'll take a 72 oz ribeye, four racks of ribs, and a jumbo plate of fries, please!" Akamaru's eyes practically bulged out of his eyes, while the man's mouth dropped wide open. However, he managed to numbly nod and write it down. With a quiet "I'll be right back with your order", he walked away.

Whining, Akamaru looked down at his little buddy. Kiba...

Grinning, Kiba ruffled the fur on Akamaru's chest. "Don't worry about me, pal; I can eat the entire dessert menu of the restaurant, I can take care of this."

Akamaru groaned. I hope you're right, buddy... He looked toward the ceiling. I hope you're right...

Eventually, the man returned, wheeling a cart and grunting; it was scarcely any surprise, given that it held a truly massive ribeye steak, juices running off it and pooling on the plate, four huge racks of ribs at least two feet long each, and a towering plate of fries, reaching at least a foot in the air, with melted cheese practically drenching each one. One by one, he laid them each on the table, struggling under the weight of each one. "W-will that be all?" The man asked, quietly hoping Kiba said no. Unfortunately, he wouldn't be so lucky.

Grinning, Kiba replied, "Now that I think of it..."
115331122212222122.title: He finishes his bowls, but is still hungry for ...

Akamaru consumes his plate with gusto, and surprisingly, is still hungry...
1153311222122221221.content:
The waiter gripped his collar nervously, as Kiba finally completed his statement with, "...Ah, what the heck! Let's get one more of those 70 oz steaks for my buddy Akamaru, too!" The waiter stopped for a moment, processing the notion of taking an order for a dog, who looked equally baffled as he turned to Kiba. K-Kiba? I appreciate it, but I'm actually not too hungry, though...

Kiba raised an eyebrow and grinned impishly as he ruffled the big dog's head and remarked, "Oh really? Because I'm pretty sure that face you were making when you saw this guy drag that cart of food wasn't an 'I'm not hungry' face." Akamaru's doggy face flushed beneath his fur for a moment as his own stomach growled audibly, causing him to blush even further. Kiba folded his arms victoriously and smirked as he added, "I rest my case."

Almost relieved that it was just one steak and not an entire cartload for the big dog, the waiter took down Kiba's additional order and got the steak prepped. Despite himself, the smell emanating from the kitchen had Akamaru practically drooling. Nevertheless, he was still concerned his little pal was going to go overboard(...again.)

Kiba, you sure you'd rather not just share? Because that looks like an awful lot of food... Hearing that, Kiba licked his lips and grinned mischievously. "It suuuuure does, don't it." Whining a bit, Akamaru addressed his buddy a little more seriously. I know you wanna see how much you can put away without Naruto around, but, well, you kinda have a tendency to go overboard, and I don't want you to get a tummy ache...or end up completely immobilized... Smiling, Kiba pet the big dog's head. "Oh c'mon, boy, don't worry about me. If there's one thing I can handle, it's meat," Kiba said, practically salivating at the last part of his sentence. "Besides, if ever there was a time to just cut loose, now's the time to do it, when my metabolism is all mega fast and stuff."

With that, the waiter returned with a large platter. Atop it, a big, juicy 72 oz steak with Akamaru's name on it. Turning to the sight, Akamaru's concerns almost completely faded as his jaw gaped. The waiter placed the steak before the big dog, and, albeit a bit confused, rubbed the back of his head and said, "Ehhhh...enjoy?" and took his leave.

Grinning, Kiba grabbed a handful of cheese laden fries and said, "Whelp, that's enough banterin'. Whadduya say we dig in, buddy?" He then shoved a handful of fries into his eager mouth, chewing vigorously. "Mmmm! Holy cow, this stuff is killer!" He then grabbed a larger handful of fries and put it next to his rib eye as he licked his lips of some cheese residue, and started tearing into his steak. Akamaru, despite his initial concerns, was far too captivated by the utterly flavorful aroma steaming from the huge slab of meat before him to resist any longer. He then proceeded to lean down and take a huge, gaping bite of his steak. As the tender chunks of beef slid down his mouth, his eyes widened as he proceeded to chomp away further. Seeing this, Kiba grinned after gulping down another mouthful and said, "Hehe, told'ja!"

Before they knew it, both the boy and his dog were tearing into their plates as carefree as the pair could be. And as more time went on...
1153311222122221221.title: "Get one of those 72 oz steaks for Akamaru, too!"

choices: The two continue through their meals at a quick pace
Kiba gets thirsty, and orders something for him and Akamaru to drink
11533112221222212211.content:
The pair continued on, completely lost in the flavors their meals provided. Kiba, in particular, was shoving fries into his mouth with one hand (spattering his mouth with cheese in the process) while the other, gripping a fork, ripped chunks of meat off the steak (it was extremely tender, and he practically didn't need a knife) and crammed them into his mouth. As the flavors mixed in his mouth, Kiba's face lit up in a huge grin, even as he chewed and swallowed the huge mouthful and began stuffing his face anew.

Akamaru, placing his front paws on the sides of his steak (much to the alarm of the other patrons), ripped off huge chunks of his own steak, tail wagging as he gulped them down. Oh man...this might be the best steak I've ever had! Gulping down his mouthful, he licked his chops before going back in. I'm probably gonna regret this later...but I just can't stop!

As Kiba and Akamaru continued stuffing their faces, they slowly began going faster and faster, unable to get to those delectable flavors fast enough. Bits of steak, juice, and melted cheese flew every which way as as boy and dog ripped into their respective courses. Akamaru's tail wagged even faster, and Kiba began kicking his legs, unable to help himself; it was just so good!

Eventually, the two had almost worked themselves into a blur, food detritus flying everywhere, but neither of them paid it much mind. What they did notice, even if it was more of a peripheral thing, was the effect this was having on their midsections. Already holding the contents of ten ramen bowls, they felt their stomachs slowly grow heavier as more and more food made their way down their gullets.

Eventually, the two stopped for breath, leaning back against the booth. As one, they let out a deep, contented sigh of bliss.

Suddenly, Kiba burped, and he giggled. "H-heh, scuse me." He grinned, his mouth and cheeks splattered with cheese and steak juice.

Akamaru licked his chops, looking down fondly at Kiba. You're excused. Oh, and ya got a little something on your face. His tail started wagging. Here, lemme take care of that for ya. Leaning down, he licked Kiba's face affectionately, causing the boy to laugh uproariously. In return, he extended his arms and gave Akamaru an enthusiastic hug. Smiling a doggie smile, Akamaru nuzzled him. You're welcome.

Still laughing, Kiba disentangled himself from Akamaru and leaned back in his seat, patting his stomach. "Oh man, this stuff's amazing..." As he did so, he glanced down at his belly. Sure enough, it had grown even more, and now formed a definite round shape under his hoodie. Gulping, Akmaaru looked down at his own tummy; to confirm his thoughts, his stomach was beginning to noticeably distend, sticking out from his underside like a big, furry bump.

Kiba laughed at Akamaru's embarrassed expression. "Heh, we're really putting it away, aren't we, boy? And we still got..." He checked his own steak. "...about three-quarters of our steak left each!" He rubbed his stomach in anticipation. "Can't wait to see how big our guts'll get once we finish..." he looked towards the as-of-yet untouched ribs and smirked. "And we haven't even gotten to the ribs yet!"

Akamaru burped wetly, looking down at Kiba in concern. Y-yeah, but aren't you forgetting something?

At this, Kiba's smile faded somewhat, and he tilted his head curiously. "Huh? Whaddaya mean, boy?"

Akamaru tilted his own head. Do you remember what happened the last time you wore that getup and you pigged out?

Kiba thought for a second, nodding. "Yeah, I ended up busting my net shirt, Mom got really mad..." He trailed off as Akamaru's statement sunk in, and he paled slightly. His mom wasn't gonna like it if he busted another net shirt...

Akamaru, noticing Kiba's discomfort, whined a bit. So, uh, are you gonna lift your net shirt up so there's less chance you'll bust it?

As Akamaru asked this, Kiba lifted up the bottom of his hoodie to examine his stomach; sure enough, the net shirt stretched to cover his growing midsection, and if he taxed it any further, it would start fraying...

An idea suddenly came to Kiba, and the sides of his mouth slowly lifted up into a smile. Akamaru, seeing this, raised an eyebrow (or where one would be, anyway.) Kiba, I know that look. What are you planning?

Kiba looked up at Akamaru, a mischievous smile on his face. "Watch." Scooting back as much from the table as he could, he lifted up one arm, grabbed the opposite sleeve, and pulled the arm occupying that sleeve into his hoodie. Then, taking that arm, he grabbed the inside of the other sleeve and pulled that arm inside.

Akamaru blinked. Kiba, what're you... He trailed off, his eyes bugging out. Oh Kiba, please tell me you're not gonna...

Kiba merely gave Akamaru a cheeky grin in response. Reaching down to the bottom of his net shirt, he grabbed it and pulled it upwards, pushing his hoodie up a bit as well and exposing some bare skin in the process. Disregarding this, Kiba continued pulling it up until it was above his stomach. Grinning, he reached towards one net shirt sleeve with one arm, then to the other arm, doing the same thing with the undershirt that he'd done with his hoodie. Then, once his arms were free of his net shirt, he reached up out of his hoodie's neck with them, grabbed its hem, and yanked it off...and pulling his hoodie up further, exposing more of his belly. Kiba, blushing a bit at this, nevertheless pulled it the rest of the way off, holding it above his head. Grinning, he crumpled it up and threw it to the side, the discarded garment coming to rest on the floor. That taken care of, Kiba brought his arms back down, put each one back inside each sleeve, and pulled his hoodie back down, once again concealing his belly. "There; that oughtta take care of that." Akamaru, at a loss for words, merely sighed.

This did not deter Kiba in the slightest. "Oh, c'mon, buddy, don't be like that!" He turned back to his food. "Now that I don't have to worry about busting my net shirt, I can go all-out!" With that, he grabbed a handful of fries, and the fork with the other one, and once again began cramming his face full of food. Akamaru watched this with no small amount of dread, but a rumbling in his stomach reminded him that he was still hungry. Ah, well; the steak's delicious, and it'd be a shame to waste it... His tail wagging, he placed his paws back on the steak and resumed ripping into it.
11533112221222212211.title: Kiba and Akamaru pick up the pace...

choices: They both drink about a quarter in and resume eating.
Kiba's pants button begin to feel a tad snug.
115331122212222122112.content:
Both the boy and dog continue to messily devour their slabs of steak, despite the occasional glances of awe and utter confusion from some of the nearby patrons and wait staff. All the while, both their tummies continued to distend with more and more of their meals consumed. Kiba's hoodie continued to push outward, still concealing his belly, but just barely, while Akamaru's distended tummy continued to grow outward with more and more of his steak consumed. Stopping, he winced and examined his growing appendage and sighed to himself.

Great...now I look like I'm eating for two...ugh, well, at least I don't have to worry about busting any clothing... He glanced back at Kiba who was still chomping away at his own ribeye and cheese covered fries. I still can't believe he just took his damn under-netting off in a restaurant like that...eh, but I guess at least now, he won't bust it and get scolded by his mom...and get me scolded by proxy... he gulped nervously as the image of Tsume's furious glare popped into his head. Almost instinctively, he jumped right back to his steak, and in that instant, his thoughts were stilled, and replaced with an overwhelming sense of joy. Ah, hell, it's worth it for steak THIS good...

More time had passed as the two continued gleefully chomping away and putting a considerable dent in their meals. As both reached a little past the half way point of their steak and rib-eyes, they had stopped to catch their breath. Burping loudly, Kiba sighed and patted his distended belly happily as he turned to Akamaru and smiled. "Okay, NOW try and tell me that coming here after Ichiraku's was a bad idea," he said smugly. The big dog rolled his eyes and playfully nudged the boy with his muzzle. Okay, so this place has the greatest steak I've ever sunk my teeth into. Point taken. That still doesn't mean you should go too overboard. Waving his hand dismissively, Kiba said, "Ah, I know, I know, I won't make myself sick."

Akamaru scoffed to himself. I know I'm probably sounding like a broken record, but it's because I don't want you to be hurting. Kiba smiled at the big dog and ruffled his fuzzy head as he added, "I know, because you're my pal. Even if it's unnecessary, I know you can't help but worry every now and then, and I appreciate that, you big softy!" Akamaru smiled a doggy smile at Kiba's acknowledgement and proceeded to lick the boy's face affectionately, causing him to giggle ticklishly. Just making sure.

As the scene carried on, the waiter once again returned, still nervously processing that the boy was having a conversation with a big white dog and interjected. "Erm, is everything satisfactory?" Kiba smiled and patted his tummy proudly. "Sure is!" The big dog barked happily in response. The waiter, however baffled, took that as a yes. "But now that'cha mention it, I'm kinda parched. Can you bring a big pitcher of soda or something to help wash this stuff down with?" Akamaru whined. Catching that, Kiba nodded and said, "Oh, sorry, boy. And can we also get like a big...bowl of water for my buddy here?"

Once again left dumbfounded by the unusual request, the waiter simply stood there for a few seconds of awkward silence before nodding and taking his leave. Akamaru chuckled to himself. You certainly know how to leave an impression on people at restaurants, don't you, Kiba? Laughing, Kiba rubbed the back of his head sheepishly and said, "Heh, I guess it IS pretty weird for him to be taking orders for a guy with a huge appetite and big dog with a larger-than-he'd-like-admit appetite." Akamaru's face flushed red beneath his fur as Kiba grinned mischievously at him.

The two continued to rest up and catch their breath after what seemed like a whirlwind of food all at once being scarfed down. Kiba occasionally munched on another cheesy fry, then fed one to Akamaru who scarfed it down with gusto and proceeded to lick his chops happily. "Man, I wonder what's taking 'em so long to get our drinks." Akamaru chuckled and noted, They're probably still looking for a bowl in the kitchen they can give me. Kiba chuckled sheepishly and said, "Ehhh, remind me to leave a really good tip for this poor guy when we're done."

In that moment, the waiter returned with an ample pitcher of soda for the young dog-nin and a sizable metal bowl (clearly not meant for dogs, but the waiter had all but given up on caring about the unconventionality of this whole thing at this point) filled with water for Akamaru and took his leave. Grinning, Kiba grabbed his pitcher with both hands and exclaimed, "Cheers, boy!" and proceeded to take several ample gulps while Akamaru proceeded to lap his water bowl hastily, clearly rather parched himself.

All the while, a few ongoers and fellow patrons observed the scene of the stuffed boy chugging down his beverage and a big white dog sitting at a booth, lapping away at a bowl of water, and; like the waiter, opted to just carry on and not ask questions.

As the two continued to drink their respective beverages...
115331122212222122112.title: Kiba gets thirsty, and orders drinks for the pair.

choices: The pair keep up a quick pace, but Kiba unbuttons his pants just in time
They continue eating so fast that Kiba can't get to his button in time
1153311222122221221122.content:
Kiba grinned as the sweet, bubbly beverage flowed down his throat, splashing into his belly and producing a cool, pleasant sensation in the appendage. Aaaaahhh....just what I needed! Akamaru, even as he lapped up his water, glanced over at Kiba; at this point, his hoodie had begun to rise up a bit, exposing the tiniest bit of bare flesh. And, at the rate he was chugging that soda, and the inevitable fact he'd be returning to his food soon, chances were more would be showing soon...

However, as Kiba chugged, he felt a tightness in his waist. Curious, he lowered his pitcher, swallowing the soda left in his mouth. Scooting back as much as he could, he reached hand under his growing belly and felt around the waistline of his pants; sure enough, his consumption of ten bowls of ramen, 36 oz of beef, who knows how many cheesy fries, and some soda were now causing his midsection to begin pressing against his pants. It wasn't at the point where it was hard for him to breath, nor was it painful, but that snugness would only increase.

Lifting his head up from his bowl of water, Akamaru turned his head toward Kiba. Pants feeling a little tight there, Kiba?

Still feeling around his waistline, Kiba looked towards Akamaru, shrugging. "Eh, a little bit, but it's not too bad right now." He smirked. "I can probably go a little longer without undoing them."

Akamaru whined, tilting his head. You sure that's a good idea? I mean, your mom was most upset about you busting net shirts, but she got pretty mad when you busted your pants button, too...

Kiba winced, shuddering a bit. "Y-yeah, that's true..." He rubbed his distended belly absentmindedly, a couple of his fingers brushing against the exposed skin. His mom would be pretty mad if he'd have to his his button sewn back on again...

But then again, Kiba reasoned, taking a deep breath and once again feeling the snugness, It's not that tight yet, and if I undo them now, it's almost like I'm chickening out... He furrowed his brow, deep in thought. Akamaru, curious, tilted his head again.

Finally, Kiba had decided what he was going to do. Looking towards Akamaru, he smirked cockily. "Ya know what, boy? I don't want Mom yelling or lecturing at me again, so I'm gonna undo my pants..."

Akamaru wagged his tail, relieved Kiba was actually demonstrating some sense...

"...as soon as my pants get really freaking tight and I can barely breathe!"

Akamaru's face fell, his tail stopping mid-wag. Kiba, I really don't think that's a... The dog faltered as Kiba picked his jug of cola back up and resumed guzzling it down. Wearily, and with a sense of impending doom, he continued lapping at his bowl of water as well.

Eventually, though, both of their thirsts were quenched for the moment (even though they weren't even a quarter of the way through their respective beverages yet,) and they resumed ripping into their meals. Kiba, determination flowing through him, crammed forkful after forkful and handful after handful of fries into his mouth, chewing and grinning at the wonderful flavors before gulping them down and repeating the process. Before long, his hoodie began rising up a bit, slowly exposing more flesh. Simultaneously, he felt his pants' waistline become slowly but surely more snug; a jolt of nervousness ran through him, but he kept up his pace, not wanting to lose his groove....
1153311222122221221122.title: Kiba's pants button begin to feel a tad snug.

choices: Kiba let out an embarrassingly loud belch.
The sudden motion has given the boy a tummy ache.
11533112221222212211221.content:
The momentum the boy had built up, combined with his new-found determination had become too great. He was on a roll, tearing through his rib-eye and fries like he'd not eaten in years. Akamaru, while not as fast paced, had also picked up the pace a considerable amount. He had slowed down a tad, occasionally glancing back at the boy, and keeping his eye on Kiba's ever expanding tummy, to make sure he wouldn't bust his pants and suffer Tsume's wrath. With every hearty mouthful of meat and cheesy laden fries gulped down, Kiba's tummy continued to push outward just little by little, exposing a tad more flesh, and pressing against his pants even further. Akamaru whined, fearing the boy would be negligent and not unbutton in time, but hunger still had a hold over the big dog, and so, he cautiously resumed chomping into his steak.

After ripping another big chunk of his rib-eye, Kiba chomped away vigorously then stuffed another mouthful of fries into his mouth, smiling as the two flavors complemented one another for a moment, then gulped heartily, sending them both down his throat and into his growing gullet. This particular mouthful was larger than the others, however, causing his stomach to push outward slightly more. The boy winced, as he pressed a hand against his belly, which was now snagged by the front of his pants, constricting his stomach tightly and causing considerable discomfort. Akamaru, seeing this, whined to himself once more. Alright, I think you've made your point, Kiba. You should probably undo the button while you still can.

Despite Akamaru's protests, Kiba shook his head, and instead, opted for one more large mouthful of steak and fries. "Juuuust a little more," Kiba said, some obvious strain in his voice. The constriction in his gut was making it harder to swallow food, and sending a sharp pain in the boys' midsection, which became facially visible. Akamaru didn't like seeing his friend in pain like this, especially self induced pain.

Nonetheless, the boy was committed to test his endurance without busting any of his attire, and so, he chewed vigorously, before taking one large gulp. As he felt the mouthful of meat and fries slide down his throat, he immediately reached for his button and struggled a bit. The sheer volume of food packed in his gut combined with how deeply constricted his pants were digging into his bloated tummy made grabbing a hold of the button a challenge, and time was running out, as he felt his belly begin to expand as more food was deposited into it. Akamaru whimpered, covering his eyes with his ears, and ducking down beneath the table as he expected the worst.

Kiba could feel the button straining as his abdomen continued to try and force past the constricting front of his pants. But to Akamaru's surprise, there was no dreaded SNAP, no button nailing an innocent bystander in the face, no Kiba apologizing sheepishly, and best of all, no wrath to suffer by Tsume. For at long last, the boy grabbed a hold of the button and successfully undid it just in time, causing his belly to surge outward past the front of the pants, and down past the zipper slightly as it extended a considerable amount. His hoodie now rode up just below his belly button, as his tummy was finally liberated. Akamaru cautiously rose back up his seat, and confirmed that Kiba had indeed undone his button before it could break. The big dog then sighed with relief, knowing all things considered, that could have gone south in a hurry.

Leaning back against the booth seat, Kiba slouched and sighed with immense relief and newfound comfort. "Ahhhh, THERE we go!" he said, patting his belly proudly. Unfortunately, the sudden shift of movement, combined with all the meat and cheese, combined with a quarter of soda, and tapped off with some hearty patting had caused quite a stir brewing within Kiba's now troubled stomach, alarming both the boy and the dog as it proceeded to gurgle audibly, causing the young dog-nin to wince in pain.

Kiba? A-are you alright? Akamaru inquired with some obvious concern...
11533112221222212211221.title: Kiba unbuttons the front just in the knick of time

choices: Kiba finishes off his steak and fries, and immediately starts on his ribs
Kiba finishes his steak and fries, but takes a breather first
115331122212222122112212.content:
"Ooooh," Kiba suddenly groaned, leaning forward in his seat and clutching his distended tummy as a sharp pain erupted inside it. "My stomach hurts, Akamaru..." He squeezed his eyes shut, thumbs kneading his belly to try to relieve some of the pain.

Akamaru whined in concern, leaning over and licking Kiba's cheek. Well, I hate to say I told you so, but...

Kiba groaned again, moving his hands up and down his midsection. "C'mon, Akamaru, not now, OK? It really really hurts..." He whimpered a bit, and Akamaru's ears shot up in alarm; Kiba really did sound like he was hurting. Couldn't have that...

Hey, c'mon, little buddy, Akamaru barked softly, nuzzling the boy's cheek. You know I was only joking.

"Y-yeah," Kiba muttered, wincing as a particularly sharp bolt of pain shot through his belly. "I-I know. Th-this just really hurts, is all..."

Suddenly, his eyes flew open, and to Akamaru's shock, his face contorted in a scowl. "Damn it!" He banged a fist on the table angrily, startling the other patrons. "Uh, kid?" one tentatively asked. "Everything OK?"

"I'm fine!" Kiba snarled. "Just shut the hell up and get back to your food!" Eyes widening in shock, the patrons decided it'd be better to avoid the ill-tempered boy and quickly got back to their food.

Akamaru stared at the seething boy, mouth agape. Kiba, he ventured slowly, What's wrong?

"What's wrong?!" Kiba repeated, rounding on Akamaru. "Akamaru, I haven't even gone through HALF the stuff here, and my stupid gut's starting to give up!"

Akamaru gave a nonplussed look at the huge steak that was a little over half finished, along with the plate of fries that was noticeably diminished. Kiba, you've eaten plenty, not to mention those ten bowls of ramen you had beforehand...

"So what?!" Kiba found himself yelling back, causing the dog to recoil a bit. On some level, he knew he shouldn't be yelling at Akamaru, but he was just so mad... "I've eaten way more than this before, even if it was when I was competing with the bonehead! I know I can handle more! I should be able to handle more!" Snarling, he held up his hands in front of his face. "But this stupid body won't let me!" He narrowed his eyes. "It's..."

Almost like turning on a switch, his expression switched from enraged to despondent. "It's too weak..." he muttered in a very small tone. Akamaru, catching this, leaned back down towards him. Kiba...?

To the dog's alarm, Kiba's hands started trembling a bit...as did his bottom lip. Akamaru's eyes widened. Uh oh. As if to confirm his worries, tears started gathering in Kiba's eyes.

Almost to complement this, the dog whined; the only thing worse than seeing Kiba in physical pain was seeing him emotionally distressed. As Kiba sniffled, a few tears running down his cheeks, it took Akamaru only a millisecond to decide his next course of action. Kiba, the dog barked softly. At the noise, Kiba's eyes widened, freeing a few more tears. Listen to me. Sniffling, Kiba turned towards Akamaru. Seeing he had his attention, the dog leaned his head in close to the boy's. You are not weak. You're one of the toughest, most determined ninja I know, and I'm not just sayin' that 'cause you're my partner... the side of his muzzle quirked up a bit. ...though that's definitely a factor. Kiba, though he still had tears in his eyes, smiled at that comment.

Internally excited over his first little victory, Akamaru continued. And I know I don't like it when you stuff yourself, but to be honest, on some level, I'm never really worried. Know why?

"Wh-why?" Kiba asked, sniffling again and wiping his eyes on his hoodie sleeve.

Akamaru wagged his tail. Because I know that, however much food you might cram down your throat, I know you can take it. You're just that tough.

Kiba smiled again, this time showing some teeth. "R-really?"

Ah, there's a smile, the ninken thought, gratified. Out loud, he barked, Does this look like a face that would lie to you? At this, he stuck his tongue out, moved his ears at weird angles, and crossed his eyes.

That got the desired reaction: Kiba burst into a fit of giggles, the only tears running down his cheeks now the ones that had already accumulated in his eyes. Akamaru smirked to himself. Heh; mission accomplished.

Scarcely had he finished this thought than Kiba reached up, seized the dog's neck, and pulled his head in close. "Thanks, boy," Kiba muttered, rubbing the side of his face against Akamaru's.

Always happy to help, Akamaru woofed, nuzzling Kiba's face in kind.

The boy and dog stayed this way for a good minute or so, and likely would have gone on longer had another sharp pain not erupted in Kiba's belly. Wincing, he released Akamaru's neck and jerked away, putting his hands to his belly. Akamaru, slightly disappointed, nonetheless wagged his tail. Still, your body's different than it would normally be, so ya might need to do something a little different if you wanna keep stuffing your craw.

Kiba tilted his head. "A little..."

As he said this, his eyes wandered to the pitcher of cola, and a grin lit up his face. Bingo. Whirling back around to face the table, he picked up the jug, opened wide, and tilted it to his mouth. As Akamaru watched, a bit confused, the cola poured down Kiba's throats, small rivulets of the drink running down his cheeks. As he chugged, Kiba felt his belly continue to churn, and he couldn't help but wince as more bolts of pain shot through his belly. Still, he pressed on, deterimned. Akamaru tilted his head. Uh, Kiba...

Kiba winked at Akamaru, continuing to chug. Then, finally, he slammed the pitcher down (sloshing some cola about in the process), pressed hard on his tummy (which had bulged some more from the cola, forcing his hoodie up just high enough to expose his navel), opened his mouth, and...


*BURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP*

...let loose with a titanic belch that startled Akamaru, and caused the other patrons of the restaurant to look towards them in disgust.

Finally, after a good several seconds, the burp wound down. Kiba was blushing a bit from the sheer volume it had held, but nonetheless held a triumphant smirk on his face. "Ahhh, just what I needed," he sighed, smacking his belly a few times, much to Akamaru's alarm. However, he did not wince in pain. At Akamaru's confused whine, Kiba giggled. "Well, whaddaya know, boy? All I had ta do was release some pressure, and now I'm feelin' all better!" A determined grin on his face, he turned back to what was left of his ribeye. "Now, instead of wasting any more time...." He picked his fork back up and continued ripping chunks of meat off and shoveling them into his mouth, cramming mouthfuls of fries in when he could. "...let's do this!"

Akamaru watched, a bit confused; had he just given Kiba a pep talk to keep stuffing himself?

His tail wagged; maybe, but if he had to choose between his little buddy continuing to be sad or cheering up and being happy while he stuffed himself...well, it was no contest, really. With that thought, he turned his attention back to his own steak and started ripping into it once again.

As more time passed...
115331122212222122112212.title: The sudden motion has given the boy a tummy ache.

choices: Kiba's belly button begins to feel funny...
The two slowly but surely consume the entirety of their meals...
1153311222122221221122121.content:
A good while had passed as Kiba; with newfound vigor, had resumed tearing into his ribeye and fries combo. Akamaru also resumed chomping away at his fat steak, but he took it at a much slower rate, due to a mixture of his own fullness that he was beginning to experience, and just occasionally checking up on Kiba to see how he was fairing.

The boy had made ample progress, and didn't seem to be suffering anything but an increasingly larger tummy. However, despite that, Akamaru couldn't help but wag his tail as he saw the hearty smile across his little pals face, because at this point, all Akamaru cared about was that Kiba was happy....even if that meant stuffing himself and making a spectacle of himself around the other patrons, though they seemed to be getting a bit more accustom to the boys particularly animated gorging.

Occasionally, Kiba would stop to catch his breath; if only for a moment, before digging right back for more. All the while, as the boy ate and ate, his tummy continued to distend more and more, as the pile of fries had begun to shrink and the depleting steak continued to lessen, Kiba's hoodie rose just ever so slightly more and more above his belly button. His ballooned out belly had expanded to the point where it looked like Kiba had swallowed a sizable watermelon and then some, but his vigor remained just as strong.

Even Akamaru couldn't help but feel a semblance of pride in Kiba's progress. Sure, as he'd said again and again, he's never been too thrilled with Kiba overdoing it when it came to food, but his words about Kiba being tough were 100% genuine, and whether he liked to admit it or not, there was something to be admired about his pal having enough endurance to push himself to his limits and beyond. Not just with food, but training, fighting, tolerating Naruto's air-headedness, and just toughing it out when life was at its' hardest. It was all part of the same package, and if anyone could take it, it was Kiba.

And as if to prove that point, Kiba proceeded to down the last large chunk of steak and an extra hearty final mouthful of cheesy fries into his mouth in one go, chewing vigorously as his cheeks bulged comically large. Akamaru couldn't help but giggle to himself at this ridiculous sight. Jeez, you look like a blowfish...

Kiba mumbled something incoherent before wincing and taking a rather audible GULP.

Straining a bit, Kiba gulped harder until the massive amount of food had traveled down his throat and down into his vastly bloated belly. Finally, with a rather large belch, the boy sighed with immense relief and smacked his lips. "Phew! Tasty or not, that steak was a contender!" Kiba exclaimed, patting his belly proudly. Akamaru then proceeded to lick the boy's face happily, earning a ticklish giggle from the young dog-nin. Hehe, I knew you could do it, pal!

Smiling, Kiba ruffled the big dogs head and said, "Thanks, boy! But y'know..." Kiba stopped for a moment and gave Akamaru a more sincere look of appreciation as he continued, "...I doubt I'd have ever toughed it out as much as I did if it wasn't for you." Akamaru glanced curiously. What do you mean? I knew my little pep-talk reached you, but-

Kiba waved his hand dismissively and said, "Nah, not just now, but I mean, in general. Being stuck like this has had its' ups and its' downs, and sure, me and the bonehead manage as best we can, but it's been hard, y'know?" Akamaru whined a bit, knowing all too well how true that was. "I know you probably already know and all that stuff, but...I just want'cha to know how grateful I am to you for always being there. Even at the lowest points in all this, you were always there to help be right back up. You even helped me see how being a kid again could actually be a blast! So, thanks, Akamaru. Thanks for being the best pal a guy could have." The boy smiled warmly as he hugged the big dogs neck in appreciation.

Surely, Akamaru already knew Kiba's always been grateful, but hearing it, even in this state? Something about it was different, more meaningful, somehow. Enough so to where he began to feel that familiar inner warmness, a mix of both brotherly and fatherly (given Kiba's current state) and so Akamaru nuzzled the boy in turn, before giggling to himself as he noticed Kiba's tummy accidentally pushing against the dog. But he didn't mind. Even some of the already on and off observing patrons; whether mortified by the rapid eating display or Kiba's earlier outburst, couldn't help but smile at the scene, before returning to their meals, knowing all too well it wouldn't be long before the boy and dog resumed said feasting.

Instead, he licked the boy once more and smiled a doggy smile back at his pal. Hehe, hey, what are friends for, right? Akamaru then glanced at what remained of his steak and waterbowl, and back at the full stack of ribs and the remains of the cola pitcher Kiba had left unconsumed. Kiba, seeing this, grinned as he nudged the dog more playfully. "Whadduya say, boy? How 'bout we finish strong?" The dog barked happily. Hey, no use stopping now, right?

"Haha, that's the spirit, buddy!" Kiba exclaimed before grabbing one of the ribs and wasting no time chomping the meat right off the bone, smearing some of the BBQ sauce on his lips. Akamaru smirked to himself as he jokingly mused. I swear, some people just eat like animals...

He then proceeded to put his paws on his steak and chomp voraciously, tearing off another hearty chunk before gulping it down. The boy and dog pair continued ripping into what remained of their plates. However determined, there was no denying that the two had eaten a considerable amount, and so their momentum was beginning to flag just slightly. Akamaru would stop to pant for breath whilst occasionally lapping at his bowl before proceeding. Kiba would also occasionally catch his breath, or take a gulp of his soda to help wash down his meal, or burp to relieve some pressure before resuming.

As time pressed on...
1153311222122221221122121.title: Kiba finishes up, then moves onto the ribs.

choices: "...I think I'm wedged into the booth."
"...my pants feel like they're about to bust."
11533112221222212211221212.content:
In spite of their flagging momentum, the pair pressed on, determined not to let either of their meals go to waste; Kiba would grab a rib, stripping it of meat and licking his lips, only to swallow and go onto the next one, while Akamaru continued ripping off huge chunks of meat. Every several mouthfuls, they would pant, take a drink of their respective beverages, and/or let off a quick belch before continuing. As a result, it was somewhat slow going, especially compared to their earlier pace, but they nonetheless kept at it.

As more meat vanished into their maws, their stomachs slowly grew; Akamaru's furry tummy continued swelling and pushing out, and he noted, with a blush, that he now looked as though he'd swallowed a basketball. Still, the steak was delicious, so he kept eating.

Kiba's midsection, likewise, continued ballooning out as he continued gulping down his ribs, forcing his hoodie higher and higher. His fly, already forced all the way down, began to strain as his stomach continued to put more pressure on it. Kiba winced as he felt this, but knowing full well there was nothing he could do about it (aside from taking off his pants, and there was no way he was gonna stoop to doing something like that), he shrugged, taking a drink of cola and burping before grabbing more of his ribs and ripping into them.

Time ticked by as the two kept on soldiering away, cramming mouthful after mouthful of food and drink into their mouths, burping, panting, and repeating the whole thing over again. As they did, their stomachs continued to expand, Akamaru's continuing past "basketball" to "small beach ball" and still not letting up, and Kiba's growing bigger and closer to the table, putting more pressure on his pants.

Finally, after what seemed like an eternity, Kiba stripped the last rib bone, tossed it aside, and let out a victorious belch as he leaned back in his seat, massaging his tummy. "Oh man...now THAT was a meal!"

Akamaru licked his lips, having just finished swallowing his last bit of steak. You said it, pal! He let loose with a burp of his own, then sighed, leaning back against his seat. He wagged his tail as Kiba reached an arm over and scratched his overstuffed tummy. Ooh, yeah; that's the stuff...

Kiba's stomach had ballooned out to near beach-ball proportions, his hoodie now riding entirely above the overstuffed sphere. and putting an uncomfortable amount of strain on his zipper. His navel, surprisingly, was still in its normal state, but a distinct pressure around it told Kiba it wouldn't stay that way for long. In spite of this, the boy sighed happily, leaning back and rubbing the appendage, closing his eyes and licking his lips as he tried getting at the steak juice, barbecue sauce, and cheese that was smeared across his face.

Akamaru opened his eyes enough to look down at the boy massaging his oversized tummy, and that familiar warmth came flooding back. He looks so happy, so content, Akamaru thought to himself, wagging his tail some more. I don't care how much trouble I'll get in; he looks so damn cute.....</i>

Scarcely had he finished this thought than Kiba's face contorted in a rather odd expression. Akamaru, curious, was about to ask what was up, when...

POP!

...the boy's belly button finally gave up the ghost, popping out into a fleshy nub. With the sudden release of pressure and the relief it brought, Kiba couldn't help but giggle uproariously. "Ah, THERE it goes! Always love it when that happens!" Akamaru had to admit, it did look rather funny, and, somehow, made Kiba look even more adorable.

Akamaru suddenly let loose with a loud burp; looking down, he noted, to his displeasure, that his own tummy was now the size of a small-to-mid-size beach ball, to the point where he could feel his back legs beginning to become forced apart. Well, the dog thought, sighing, at least this isn't the biggest it's ever been, not to mention I can probably still walk...

Scooting to the side, he turned his headi toward Kiba. Alright, Kiba, it looks like we're about done here; ya wanna get going? He climbed down to the floor, swaying a bit as his belly, hanging very noticeably beneath him, pulled him along, but he managed to right himself. Ya can get the money out once you get outta your seat.

Kiba grinned. "Sounds like a plan, boy!" He made as it to move...

But stopped suddenly, his eyes widening in alarm and worry. "Oh, you gotta be kidding me..."

Akamaru whined, immediately shifting into "Concerned Best Buddy" mode. <i>Kiba? What's wrong?</i>

Kiba gulped, shifting a bit in his seat. "Uh, Akamaru," he mumbled as he stared down at his belly and the table, "don't freak, but..."
11533112221222212211221212.title: The two slowly but surely consume the entirety ...

choices: They decide to rest off their bloated tummies at the nearby park.
They run into a familiar bonehead down the road...
115331122212222122112212121.content:
Akamaru's ears drooped down to the side of his head as his jaw gaped. Could you run that by me again...? Kiba grunted in annoyance and gestured towards his bloated belly currently wedged between his torso and the booth table. "See? Rgh, my gut's wedged into the damn booth!" Kiba said, both annoyed and dumbstruck that he actually managed to get himself stuck. "Ugh, figures I'd ask for a booth. Nice and comfy, and bolted night and tight into the ground..." He tried forcing himself out, but winced in pain as his exposed belly rubbed hard against the table, causing him to recoil and halt his motion immediately. Akamaru whined as he looked at his friend with concern. Be careful, Kiba. You might cut yourself if your stomach rubs too hard against the tables' surface.

Kiba pouted a bit then nodded. "Well, then what the heck am I gonna do?" Kiba asked as he dropped his arms to his sides. Akamaru glanced curiously at his pal as a few thoughts arose. Can't you just...tuck your tummy in and coot out? Kiba scowled a bit and tucked his tummy in as far as he could, going a little red in the face in the process, but having literally just eaten, it did little to nothing for the poor boy, who exhaled and caused his belly to distend outward slightly yet again. "Ah, dammit...I'm too full to suck my gut in right now."

Hmmm...maybe I could just hop up and push on your tummy so you could scoot out then? Kiba immediately grimaced as he rested a hand against his tummy and shook his head. "That much pressure on a full gut...? Nooooo thanks..." Akamaru immediately nodded in agreement. Yeah, that could actually get pretty...messy...

Groaning a bit in annoyance, Kiba sighed to himself and said, "Guess I just gotta wait til my stomach works off some of this meal or something..." Akamaru raised what would be an eyebrow and took a closer look at Kiba's bloated midsection pushing against the table, seeing just how truly bloated the young dog-nin was. Errrr...considering how much we...you in particular just ate...thaaaaaat might take a little while...

Kiba pouted some more as he looked down at his wedged tummy and winced. "But I can't sit like this for too long! My stomach's starting to really hurt!"
