"Whew, wonder where that came from," asked Natsu as he smacked his lips. Gray simply gave Natsu's gut a light pat and continued kneading at his slightly less bloated belly. "Well, like you always say, you got a fire in your belly, and it's gotta come out somehow, right?" asked Gray as he rubbed.
"Yeah, but I didn't eat any fire. Just Tempura and noodles."
"Who cares, do you at least feel any better?"
"Ugh, well, my belly still feels like a sandbag, but...yeah, a little actually...."
"Huh, maybe it's just a fiery case of indigestion. Eating so much at once made your stomach work overtime, and now, it's storing up too much extra pressure."
"Well, then let's push it out," Natsu said with a smirk, signalling towards his stomach for emphasis. Gray shook his head but complied, continuing to rub at the tender spots in Natsu's stomach.

"Oh wait! I feel a big one coming! Here, when I point to you, push down on my belly as hard as you can. Okay?"
"Hell no! You're gonna burn the entire Guild to the ground, dummy!"

As if it agreed, Natsu's stomach quivered, forcing him to moan once again moan in pain. Sighing angrily, Gray simply shrugged and clutched onto Natsu's abs once again. Smiling, Natsu took a big gulp of air, forcing his tummy to push outward a little more. He then pointed to Gray who reluctantly pressed down on Natsu's belly as hard as he could. What exploded from Natsu's mouth was loud enough to be heard from well outside the FT Guild.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!*

Natsu burped loud and furiously for a good six seconds straight, which came with a considerable bout of smoke in the process. Normally, Natsu's lack of manners disgusted Gray. But this time, he couldn't help but find it, almost attractive. "Okay, even I have to admit, that was a pretty good one." said Gray.
Sighing heartily, Natsu goes limp then turns to Gray. "Man, I've *URP* NEVER burped THAT loudly before!" laughed Natsu. Gray simply smirked as he continued to work out some of leftover gas festering in Natsu's belly. "I dunno how else to put it, but you know to work a fire out of a guy's belly." Natsu paused, looking away, unable to say what he wanted to say, so finally he compromised by muttering a small "thank you," under his breath. Catching it, Gray too; looked away, trying not to blush, so he responded by saying, "Just glad I could help..." started Gray, trying to think of the right thing to say before following with, "maybe now you'll stop whining like a little girl." He patted Natsu's still pretty expanded middle for emphasis. "Oh ha ha ha. Very *brruuup* funny." responded Natsu.

Finally all 'burped out,' Natsu rose from his seat, no longer in pain, and said, "Well, I dunno about you, but I'm about to ready to call it a day. PLUS..." Natsu started, "if we're still here by the time the others come back, we're dead..."

A sudden look of dread grew over both boys as Gray realized Natsu was dead right. Immediately, both fled the scene of the crime...
115331221111211.title: Dragonslayer's belly rub

choices: "...On second thought, forget I opened my mouth..."
115331221112.content:
The two tear the kitchen apart, and find not a single scrap of food in the entire place. "Oh, you gotta be kidding me!" shouted Natsu as he hopelessly re-checked empty drawers. "Not even just a little bit of ramen or a torch or ANYTHING?!"
"Ah quit your bellyaching, let's just go out and grab a bite," suggested Gray as he struggled to put his shirt and pants back on.
"Ugh, fine, but we're NOT taking the wagon into town!"
"Yeah yeah, motion sickness. Whatever you say, crybaby..."
"CRYBABY?! How about I-?"

Before Natsu could finish blabbering, Gray froze his mouth shut, much to Natsu's shock as he mumbled angrily at his smirking rival. "Now come on, I'm starving." Gray headed out, dressed once again. Natsu continued mumbling angrily before using what little fire he had left in him to melt the ice and catch up with Gray.

By the time both had reached the town, they were groggy and half conscious, but the sight of the local "All-you-can-eat" place re-energized young Natsu as he jetted inside, practically drooling at the sight and smell of the meals to be. Gray simply followed, almost too embarrassed to be seen directly with Natsu.

The two were eventually seated, and immediately, both boys dig into their plates like ravenous jackals to fresh meat; particularly Natsu, who utilized the "All-You-Can-Eat" aspect to the buffet and had a series of several plates stacked before him ready to be devoured while Gray worked on a hearty helping of Steak. "Mmm, *GULP!* it all taste so freakin' good!" noted Natsu between bites. Finally, after swallowing a heaping mouthful, Natsu sighed then wasted no time in moving onto his next venture.

Meanwhile, having just finishing his Steak, Gray sighed with content and leaned in his chair while Natsu raised a curious eyebrow. "Ummmm...what the hell is that?" asked Natsu.
"What the hell is what?" responded Gray, only for Natsu to point at his one empty plate.
"THAT. We're *MUNCH* in a buffet and all your stomach can handle is *GULLLP* ONE PLATE of steak?! I thought you said you were hungry!"
"Hey, not EVERYONE goes out of their way to stuff themselves stupid, Smokey. Then again, you tend to do a LOT of things stupid, don'tcha...?"
"Pffft, so not only can I outfight you, but I can out-eat too, hehe. Man, it's gotta be rough for an icy little fella like you living under such a fiery badass shadow like mine," condescended Natsu as he continued to stuff his face. Gritting his teeth angrily, Gray stood up; shirt randomly missing again, despite them being in public.

"FIRST OF ALL, YOU DIDN'T BEAT ME! SECONDLY-"
"Ummm, Gray?"

Blushing, Gray immediately realized he'd somehow ended up in his boxers again, and quickly dressed up, before regaining composure and getting back in Natsu's face.

"Secondly, I can out-eat you with my mouth wired shut, dragon breath."
"That sounds like a challenge to me."
"You're damn right it is!"
"Hmmm, okay, eating contest it is. Whoever can put away the most plates wins."
"And whoever puts away the least, pays for BOTH meals!"

Natsu's face went white for a moment. Gray grinned cockily at the fire mage. "What's wrog? Ya chicken?" No response.
115331221112.title: Find nothing.

1153312211122.content:
"THE ONLY CHICKEN HERE IS THE FRIED ONE I'M ABOUT TO EAT MORE OF THAN YOU, SNOWMAN!!" shouted an angry Natsu, before finally he pointed fiercely at a smug Gray and shouted, "SO GET YOUR WALLET READY, BECAUSE IT IS SO ON!"

And with that, the two went at it, both devouring the contents of their plates seamlessly before polishing them off completely and moving onto the next one at virtually the same time. Both Natsu and Gray had stuffed their second plates with various meats and noodles then sat back at their table, glaring deeply at each other as they scarfed down their food. *SLLUUUUURRP* "Y'know, these noodles, *GULP* aren't half bad," Natsu said, as he couldn't help but appreciate such a fine taste. Slurping down his own noodles, Gray raised an eyebrow and nodded with agreement. "Yeah, this part of town's known for great noodles, I think," Gray started, "I'll be sure to stock up after we finish up here. Maybe I'll use the jewels I saved not having to pay for my meal here."
"Oh, in your friggin' dreams!" replied Natsu as he grabbed his lamb shank and chomped a huge chunk of beef from the bone like a shark.

One hour and several plates later, both Natsu and Gray were still going at it, albeit sluggishly. Natsu's stomach had distended slightly, creating a small but noticeable bulge in his muscle bound belly. Gray fared no better. Once again spontaneously shirtless, his exposed stomach had also bloated outward to an equally sized bulge which he rubbed tenderly, feeling a tad full. Natsu on the other hand, continued putting away his next plate with great fiery determination as he scarfed down fried chicken wings one wing at a time, until finally, his plate had become nothing but a massive pile of chicken bones.

Leaning back in his chair, Natsu burped loudly and patted his belly happily. "Ahhh, it's been a while since I've eaten this good. How about you, Mr. WayTooFullbuster?" asked Natsu tauntingly. Gray rubbed his slightly swollen stomach tenderly as he glared back at Natsu and said, "You can trash talk all you want, but I'm not throwing in the bib just yet..." Smirking, Natsu rose from his seat and pointed Gray to the buffet table. "Then by all means, after you," he said with a cocky grin on his face. Admittedly, Gray was feeling a bit full, but he wasn't about to lose to Natsu. So he rose from his seat and joined Natsu as the two packed their next plates with various sushi rolls and seafood such as King Crab legs, Fried Shrimp Tempura, and smoked Salmon.

Sitting back down, both the young mages once again proceeded to stuff themselves. Gray cracked open the Crab Leg shell and immediately began sucking down the meat inside. Natsu followed suit, only he dug it out with a fork and dipped it in sauce before scarfing it down. Natsu then started stuffing the shrimp into his mouth and swallowing them down in comically huge mouthfuls. Both their middles continued to expand in accordance with the amount of food they continued to stuff down their gullets. "Okay, I'll be the first to admit, I didn't think you'd last this long," Natsu started, "but it isn't gonna be enough, man."
"Well, I'll tell you what, if you admit defeat now, I'll only make you pay half."
"Pffft, nice try, Snow Cone, but you're not getting off the hook that easily.
"Whatever, don't say I didn't warn you."

Both of their taunting became tired and strained as both were now trying their best not to show the other just how full they really were. All the while, both boys continued stuffing their faces, occasionally stopping to massage their ever expanding stomachs. This carried on for quite a while, but ultimately, one would outlast the other. And that somebody was...
1153312211122.title: Eating Contest - Natsu vs Gray

11533122111221.content:
Natsu continued devouring the contents of his plate, his stomach bloating outward further as a result. Gray was struggling. He tried his best to keep up, but the more he ate, the more his ballooned belly began to quiver with fullness, until finally, the stuffed feeling was simply too much. "...Ugh....okay....okay....no more..." mumbled an overly stuffed Gray as he slumped back in his chair and clutched his distended belly, groaning in pain. Grinning, Natsu stuffed the remaining meats on his plate into his mouth and gulped it all down in one comically large mouthful, before giving Gray a victorious, toothy grin. "BOO-YA! What did I tell ya, huh?! Don't mess with the champ!" gloated Natsu as he sat back in his chair, secretly relieved that he barely managed to out-eat Gray.

His muscle bound belly had bloated outward past his open vest, appearing as though he'd swallowed a basketball. It churned almost as violently as Gray's distended tummy, causing Natsu to wince and rub it in a massaging manner. "You can go ahead and pay the bill now, I'll be outside," winked Natsu as he chuckled to himself and hoisted himself and his distended gut from the table and slowly exited the buffet. Gray sighed and grabbed his Jewel Bag, dumping enough Jewels to cover both himself and Natsu, before rolling his eyes and exiting the buffet to join the Fire Mage.

Afterwards, the two...
11533122111221.title: Natsu!

115331221112211.content:
*BuuuUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAPPPP!!!*

A disgustingly loud belch exploded out of Natsu's mouth for five seconds straight; quite literally, as a small stream of flame accompanied it, much to Gray's disgust. After it had ended, Natsu sighed with relief and gave a toothy grin. "Ahhh, the sound of victory...don'tcha just love it?" he said, thumping his chest and let out a smaller flame free burp. He then tenderly rubbed his bloated belly with a smile across his face. Natsu always overdid it when it came to food, but never this much. And doing it, feeling how much his stomach had taken in felt satisfying and almost, sensational.

"Way to live up to your nickname, Dragon Breath," said Gray as he waved the air around him, causing Natsu to laugh.
"Awww, is Frosty still upset because his little tummy couldn't handle a man's meal?" said Natsu in a sarcastic cutesy voice as he poked Gray's slightly deflated stomach tauntingly. "Oh please, you BARELY beat me, and that was only because I didn't want to overdo it like a certain fiery dumbass," responded Gray as he gestured towards Natsu's still relatively bloated middle, though as little as Gray wanted to admit it, like Natsu; feeling as immensely full as he did, felt really good to him as well. Smirking, Natsu slapped his belly firmly and said,

"Keep telling yourself that, Gray. Face it, no matter what you do, I'll always be better at it then you."
"Is that so?"
"For the millionth and a half time, yes. Why? You wanna make something of it?"

As the two went at it again, they chanced across a rather famous steakhouse, known for the 72 oz Steak Challenge. Few of which had ever been completely consumed by anyone. "Put your money where your mouth is then. The 72oz Steak Challenge. Double or nothing. Whoever can't finish pays for the others meals for a week!"

Natsu raised his eyebrow, rather tempted by the idea of free food for a whole week. But 72 ounces of Steak when his stomach was already so full was going to be tricky. On the other hand, that meant it would be tricky for Gray too...
115331221112211.title: Wandered through town.

1153312211122111.content:
"Oh, it is so ON!" shouted a hot-headed Natsu. The two then marched into the steakhouse and said proclaimed their intentions to the restaurant owner, who promptly sat them down down at the challenge table dead center of the entire restaurant.

Both Natsu and Gray sat across from one another sharing their usual death glare while onlookers crowded the area, in anticipation of the upcoming challenge. Finally, two silver platters were placed before the young men. The overwhelming surplus of beef caught both boys off guard as they immediately dropped their gaze and dropped their jaws in unison at the sheer size of their upcoming endeavors.

After a moment, Natsu regained his composure, and with a toothy grin, said to Gray, "Oh, for the record, I'm gonna want my ramen extra spicy this week."
"Yup, keep on letting that hot air out, bozo. You're gonna need as much room as you can if you're gonna try and beat me this time."

With that, they were off. Both mages immediately tore into their steak, chewing on heaping mouthfuls of beef and gulping it right on down before moving onto their next bites.

Despite how full he had already felt, Natsu was still able to savor the smoky flavor of his juicy steak before gulping it down heartily. "Mmmm, remind me to get seconds after we're done here," moaned Natsu as he patted his already swollen belly happy.

"Oh don't worry, *GULLLP*, you'll have plenty left over for a doggie back when I'm done with you, pinky," taunted Gray between large gulps. His overly full stomach was still pretty packed from their previously challenge, and had slowly begun to swell back up to a more than noticeable bulge. It groaned in protest, causing Gray to once again wince in pain, but this time, he would not be dissuaded. And so, the two ate. And ate. And ate. And ate...

With every mouthful, their stuffed bellies would expand just ever so slightly. Yet, the two would continue to wolf down their massive meal like it was their last. Both were equally determined to beat the other, no matter how straining it would be...
1153312211122111.title: "You're on!"

11533122111221111.content:
Some time had passed, and more and more patrons began to watch as these two young men stuffed their faces with inhuman amounts of steak. Neither appeared as though they would quit, and the possibility that both may actually beat the unbeaten steak challenge seemed more and more possible with each chunk of steak the boys wolfed down.

Both Natsu and Gray had successfully put away more then half their steaks, and continued to keep on eating. Their bare bellies; a true testament to their gluttonous conquest, had both ballooned out comically, as though they had swallowed oversized basketballs. Yet, they just kept on eating.

Upon gulping down his latest mouthful of meat, Natsu sighed heartily as he clutched his immensely swollen gut firmly. His skin felt tight, strained from engulfing so much in such a short period of time. Feeling a rush of air rising from his gut, Natsu clutched his belly firmly and let fly a painfully loud burp which carried on for a few seconds straight and brought forth a tiny stream of fire in the process, frightening and disgusting many patrons at the same time. Smacking his lips, Natsu gave his gut a firm pat then smiled wide at Gray, who ignored Natsu's boorishness and continued eating.

"You can still call it quits, y'know. There's no shame in losing to me, Gray. Hell, you outta be used to it by now," taunted Natsu. Gray was able to continue ignoring Natsu's taunting, but the more he ate, the harder it became to ignore the searing pain emanating from his midsection. It groaned audibly, causing Gray immense discomfort as he stopped eating and leaned back in his chair, clutching his gut in pain with both hands. Taking notice of this, Natsu had assumed the challenge was too much for Gray and continued to taunt him further. "D'awwww, is the baby tossing in his itty bitty bib?"

Angry, Gray opened his mouth to respond and put Natsu in his place once and for all. "Rgh, Natsu, will you shut the hell u-*UUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR-RRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!*"

Gray's response was cut short by a thunderous belch which carried enough force to blow Natsu's hair back, and stretched for a near 10 seconds flat, stunning patrons and Natsu in the process. As it finally came to an end, Gray exhaled with great relief and leaned back in his chair. "Oooooh man, that felt good...." he said, giving his slightly less strained belly a hearty pat, in a very Natsu-esque fashion. He then grinned back at Natsu and proceeded to continue eating his meal.

Admittedly, Natsu was taken back. He hadn't seen this side of Gray before, and he almost had to admire it. After a moment, Natsu collected himself and got back into eating more beef.

Maybe this wasn't going to be as one sided as he initially thought. It was anyone's game at this point...
11533122111221111.title: Continue...

choices: They head over to Natsu's house
They take their chances and return to the Guild
115331221112211111.content:
As more time went on, both Natsu and Gray were nearing the end. Their pace had slowed down a considerable amount, their stomachs, stuffed and bloated beyond all logical comprehension. Both would occasionally stop to massage their aching, medicine-ball sized bellies, or let out the over indulgent belch here or there to relieve as much excess pressure from their stomachs as possible. Then they would get back to their meat.

Gray seemed to be struggling a bit more then Natsu with these final bites as his immensely bloated stomach gurgled viciously with each bite.

Natsu; on the other hand, was nearing the finish line of the challenge. Taking the final chunk of steak, he stared groggily at it for a moment, then tossed it right in his maw, chewing a bit longer then usual, before taking one final, hearty gulp, and sending it straight down. Slumping back to his chair, Natsu sighed weakly whilst rest both his hands atop his stupendously bloated middle. Suddenly the restaurant owner stormed towards the table and held Natsu's arm up. "AND WE HAVE A WINNER! Congratulations, young man! You've successfully done the impossible and eaten the largest steak anyone in the city has ever or will ever eat! How do you feel?"

Unable to respond, Natsu brought his fist to his mouth and suppressed a loud burp, causing smoke to emanate from his mouth. "I feel like I just swallowed a cow..." groaned Natsu as he rubbed his swollen gut tenderly. As he did, he took notice to Gray, who clutched his own gut with one hand and began to sweat, struggling immensely to finish. Normally, Natsu would have chalked this as yet another victory over Gray, but not this time. For some reason, he actually wanted to see the Ice Mage succeed.

"....Ugh, I give up....you win AGAIN...."
"The hell I do! You're almost there!"
"Wha..?"
"You've come this far, right? And you've only got a few bites left, so suck it up and eat that meat before I kick your ass right back to Erza for being a little quitting cry-baby!"

Gray was stumped. He was unsure if Natsu was trying to encourage him or if he was threatening him, but either way, it was enough to encourage him not to quit just yet. And so, he ate on, with his bloated stomach protesting all the way. Finally, after slugging through most of the steak, he came to the final bite. Both Natsu and teh crowd were cheering Gray on to finish up. The mere sight of this last piece of steak before his eyes was enough to cause his gorge to rise, but he mustered through it and took that final hearty bite, then successfully gulped it down.

The crowd cheered as Gray leaned back, utterly exhausted and stuffed to his gills as he rubbed his gurgling gut with both hands. Natsu simply smirked at the boy and let him have this moment. The owner approached Gray and said, "Good heavens! TWO winners in one night?! Somebody check the windows for flying pigs!"

Natsu immediately glanced out the restaurant windows and looked up at the clouds. In unison, Gray, the owner and the crowd simply stared in awe at this kid's stupidity. "Nope, nothing but clouds."

"...Anyway, congratulations to you as well, son! How's it feel to be the champ?"

"...Very, very, *URRP*...filling..." was all Gray could muster as he attempted to calm his aching middle. "Well, I hope you'll save room down the road, because as you all know, anyone who beat the Steakhouse Challenge earns themselves a month of free meals whenever they stop by! Because anyone who can put away that much meat deserves a free meal every now and then, right?"

While a victory and a definite bonus, the mere thought of food made both boys cover their mouths in effort to keep from losing their very bountiful lunch, causing the owner to laugh. "Anyway, congrats to the two'uh you!"

Afterwards, both boys hauled themselves out of the restaurant and sluggishy headed towards the Guild, still rubbing their stuffed stomachs. After a moment, Natsu finally broke the ice and said, "Guess we'll call our bet a tie then?"
"Guess so," responded Gray. "Tell em something though. You could've won. So why'd you help me out back there?"
"I dunno, you'd come so far, it would've been a waste not to see it through, y'know?"
"...Well, thanks for that, man..."
"Yeah, whatever..."

The two continued walking, until...

"Hey, Natsu? A thought just occurred...."
"That's a first."
"Har har. But seriously, we look like we just swallowed elephants...don'tcha think Erza and the others might be a little pissed that we weren't on missions because we were too busy stuffing ourselves raw?"
"....Ehhhh, I could see Erza or Lucy being annoyed with that....or Gajeel pissed that we didn't invite him..."
"Then what should we do?"

Natsu pondered for a moment....
115331221112211111.title: Both finish the challenge...

1153312211122111111.content:
Gray simply stared in awe at the massive clutter of garbage that had consumed Natsu's surprisingly spacious home. "...D-did a tornade blow through or what...?" asked Gray, half-serious. Natsu rolled his eyes and cleared a spot in the living room for Gray while he promptly plopped down on the couch. "Yeah, yeah...I'm seriously too damn full to think of any comebacks, okay...?" responded Natsu as he rested one hand atop his bloated gut.
"Ugh, tell me about it..." responded Gray as he unbuttoned his pants, allowing his ridiculously swollen belly to push out even further while he rubbed it with both hands to make it ache less. "In all my life, I have never been this full before...."
"Think this might be a first for me too, actually..."
"I don't buy that for a second. You and Happy are always stuffing yourselves. Speaking of which, where is Happy, anyway?"
"Probably off with Lucy. Dunno if he'll be coming by after the mission's over or not. But whatever...and I can't help it, man. When you've got fire festering in your belly, it's harder to stay full. But at least I won't look like a sumo wrestler by tomorrow thanks to it."

A sudden grumbling caught Natsu's ear. He turned towards the source and saw Gray once again clutching his belly in pain. "Awww, someone's still got a tummy ache?" said Natsu in a mock cutesy voice.
"Shut it," responded Gray, still wincing in pain.

Natsu chuckled then hoisted himself from the couch, almost stumbling under his stomach's extra weight. "Ugh, should probably keep movement to a minimum," he said to himself as he clutched his bloated middle in pain. He then headed towards the kitchen. "Here, want something to drink? That always helps me whenever I get indigestion."
"Sure."

Natsu came back with two canned beverages and tossed one Gray's way, almost clocking him in the forehead. "Nice throw, idiot..."
"Hehe, my bad..." responded Natsu as he scratched the back of his head a bit embarrassed. "What is this stuff, anyway?"
"Got it from Super Express Restaurant, pretty tasty stuff actually."

Both boys popped their cans open. Natsu began chugging away. Gray sipped first. A torrent of bubbly flavor washed down his throat as he raised his eyebrows in pleasant surprise, then began to chug away as well.

After several moments, both Gray and Natsu had finished chugging their beverages. Natsu smacked his lips in satisfaction, crinkled up his can and tossed it amongst the already frightening pile of clutter around them. Gray shrugged and did the same.

"Feel any better?" asked Natsu.
"Yeah, actually. A lot better!" responded Gray. However, downing his beverage so quickly caused a large air bubble to rise from the depths of his belly and up his throat, forcing its' way out of Gray's mouth in the form of a loud *BBBBUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRP!!!* Covering his mouth, Gray sheepishly muttered an apologetic "Excuse me."
"Excuse this, *BBBBBBUUUUUUUURRRRAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPP!!!*" Natsu clutched his swollen gut and forced out a room shaking belch which carried on longer and louder than Gray's burp. When it ended, Natsu sighed in satisfaction and patted his belly happily. "It's just us, Fullbuster. You don't need to be afraid of cutting loose around here. Got it?"
"Well, in that case...*HHHHHHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRPPPPPPP!*" Gray pushed out an even longer burp than his previous eruption, then smiled with relief. "Ohhh man, that felt good..."
"Hehe, nice one, dude. But I feel a BIG one coming up..." warned Natsu as he rubbed his belly in anticipation. Finally, he opened his mouth.

*urp*

Gray bust out laughing. "That's IT?!"

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUU UUPP!!!!* A thunderously loud and lengthy belch exploded from the Fire Mage's mouth and shook the very room in which the boys sat in, lasting close to seven seconds straight. When it ended, the two sat in silence for a moment, before they had both burst out laughing.

It was strange to think about. In all Natsu's interactions with Gray, he'd always struck him as some stuck up jerk, while Gray had always seen Natsu as something of an egotistical moron, yet, here they were, staying the night over together, shooting the briefs, and having a good old fashion burping contest of all things.

Maybe neither were as bad as the other had once thought...
1153312211122111111.title: They head over to Natsu's house

115331221112212.content:
Some members of the Guild had returned and continued to idle around amongst themselves. Standing out from the crowd were Lucy and Happy, who both seemed to be waiting around. "Rgh, where is that dolt?!" scorned an angry Lucy as she checked the clock. Happy was about to answer, when a loud, disgusting sound interrupted him.

*BBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP!!*

"...I believe that would be the dolt," replied Happy as he sweat dropped in embarrassment from the source. From the main entrance entered Natsu, patting his belly happily as he blew smoke from his mouth and said "Whew, that one was spicy haha!" Some of the other guild members laughed and carried on. Lucy simply stared in awe at Natsu's vastly bloated midsection.

"Honestly, Natsu...could you be more obnoxious...?" replied Gray as he entered, whose stomach; much to Lucy's surprise, was almost as bloated as Natsu's. "What...the...hell...?" replied Lucy. Happy flew up and poked Natsu's gut, jokingly replying with "Maybe he's hibernating for the winter?" Natsu chuckled, but Lucy was still in no mood for jokes. "Oh lighten up, Lucy. It was just a little friendly competition bewteen Frosty and yours truly."
"...We were supposed to be on job this morning."

Natsu froze with fear, much to Gray's amusement.

"...Uhhh..."
"Uhhh? Yeah, remember? Big rampaging Wind Mage? 500,000 jewels? Well, since you weren't around, the job went to Gajeel and me and Happy got stuck trying to clean up the mess you made on our last job. I thought maybe you were training with Gray before we headed out, but instead you guys spent the time seeing which one of you was a bigger glutton?!"
"No-no, it's not like that, Lucy! We were training, but then we got hungry and well..."

Knowing Natsu was eventually going to say something stupid, Gray decided to step in. "Actually, Lucy, we're training for another mission."
"Another mission?" asked a skeptical Lucy.
"...Yeah, another mission?" whispered an uncertain Natsu.
"Yup, uhhh regional eating contest! Winner gets 750,000 jewels and crowned King Glutton,...errr something like that..."

Lucy didn't appear convinced, until much to hers, Natsu's and especially Gray's surprise, they noticed a pamphlet for a Guild Regional Eating Contest coming up, and sure enough, same rewards, same stipulations, same everything. "Huh..." was all Gray could respond with.

"Well, in THAT case, c'mere you!" said Lucy as she grabbed Natsu by the ear and pulled him towards the exit. Natsu whined and cried aloud the whole way. "Ouch! OW! Hey! E-easy! W-where are we going?!"
"To my apartment. We've got some training to do!"

Natsu's stomach groaned in protest as he glanced angrily at Gray who smirked mischievously at the young fire mage as he was being dragged back to an angry Lucy's apartment.
115331221112212.title: Returned to the Guild.

choices: Go ahead and rest on the couch.
I think you can still handle some more.
1153312211122121.content:
Soon enough, Lucy plopped Natsu on the couch, then she quickly said, "Good thing I got groceries. You're in for a treat!" Before she ran off to the kitchen, cooking frantically. Natsu soon wondered whether his "treat" will be good.

Natsu looked over to the kitchen entrance and saw various ingredients, utensils and such flying out in a comedic anime way. Soon enough, a fraying pan flew and hit him in the face. "Hey Lucy, watch where you throw those things!" Natsu yelled, with an "Aye!" heard from the nearby Happy, though the two heard no response.

After a while, Lucy yelled, "Natsu! Get over here!" Natsu then wandered into the kitchen, where he saw a large meal fit for a large family spread across the table. Natsu's jaw dropped as Lucy said, "If you're going to win this competition, you'd better eat all of this!"

Natsu then complained, saying, "I ate plenty already! I don't think I can eat anymore!", patting his belly for emphasis. Lucy then yelled, "You already took away the two-million jewel reward for that one book job! You're not taking this reward away too!"

With that, and much to Natsu and Happy's surprise, she stuffed a rice ball into his face, and with a puzzled look, he chewed it. He wasn't sure if he should like this, or if he should be afraid, as it wouldn't be long before he felt more than full.

Before he could complete that thought, however, Lucy stuffed a piece of fried chicken into his face, and he chewed it just like before. Soon enough, the two gained momentum, and Natsu was able to rub his own belly while Lucy stuffed him. That alleviated some pressure and allowed him to push further than he would normally be able to.

Happy held his mouth open, and pointed to it, and when Lucy noticed this, she yelled, "In your dreams, cat!" Either way, Happy then settled down and began to watch, fascinated.

Natsu's already bloated belly then began expanding outwards again, and it wasn't long before his belly was the size of a basketball. Thanks to his self belly rubs, however, his belly wasn't too overly stretched.

Either way, before he knew it, he had finished the table of food, and his belly was massive, and it stuck out quite a bit in front of him, sticking out quite a bit from his vest.

Lucy had a satisfied smile on her face, and Natsu looked completely dazed. She then told him, "I knew you'd be able to finish it all! Now..."
1153312211122121.title: At Lucy's apartment...

choices: Natsu's stomach had deflated, giving him more room to eat.  So he complied.
Still a bit of gas festering.
11533122111221212.content:
Before the still dazed Natsu could even comprehend what was happening, Lucy had another large platter of food placed before Natsu, whose face almost went pale upon the mere sight of it all. "...I think you can still handle some more," said Lucy as she grabbed a piece of fried chicken, ready to stuff it down Natsu's mouth.

"Ugh, Lucy, I really don't think I can eat anymore..." responded Natsu wearily as that look he gets whenever getting motion sick began to grow over his face.
"You think this is too much? Just wait and see what you're up against at that competition. If you can't handle an appetizer like this, then how do you expect to win?" responded Lucy sharply.

Groaning, Natsu sighed, still cursing Gray in the back of his head for apparently being psychic and inadvertently trapping Natsu in a competition he had no idea existed. After a moment, Natsu complied and opened his mouth begrudgingly as Lucy promptly stuffed the chicken down his mouth. He chewed at a much slower rate, still far too full to go his usual rate, but he continued to massage his distended gut, in an effort to sate the sharp pain that was ailing the young fire mage. After gulping down the chicken, Lucy grabbed a few pieces of tempura and shoved them right in Natsu's less than awaiting mouth.

As Natsu tried to chew the multitude of tempura still in his mouth, Happy once again opened his mouth and gestured towards it eagerly at Lucy. Rather than tell him off yet again, Lucy grabbed a rice ball and chucked it at Happy's face, causing him to fall flat on his back, with a rice ball square in the center of his jaws. Though that probably hurt a bit, food is food, so Happy shrugged and gulped it down with gusto.

Gulping down the tempura, Natsu tried to catch his breath, only to find yet another rice ball shoved down his mouth. Rolling his eyes, he continued to massage his ever aching belly as he gulped down more and more. The pressure was starting to become a little too much for the fire mage as his stomach continued to distend outward, to the point where his previous beachball sized balloon belly was starting to grow more like that of a medicine ball.

So before Lucy could stuff another piece of food into Natsu's mouth, he held his hand up for a moment and stopped her. "Why'd you stop?" asked an impatient Lucy. Natsu, still a little green in the gills, said, "Ugh, one sec Lucy, but...I REEEAAALLY gotta burp. Like, right now..."

Rolling her eyes, Lucy scoffed and said, "C'mon, be gross on your own time. Right now, we gotta train."
"I know that, but I'm dead serious. I feel like if I don't get this gas outta my belly right this second, I may legitimately explode." Raising an eyebrow, Lucy sighed then said, "Fine. Just get it outta your system so we can get back to work." She then plugged her ears and walked out of the room for a moment, taking Lucy with her in case any fire came up with it.

As soon as she did, Natsu smirked and glanced at the door to the outside. Hoisting himself to his feet, Natsu attempted to sneak out and spare himself any more stuffing by Lucy's hand, but all that moving around, did in fact jostle the pent-up gas brewing within his stomach. Before he could so much as take five steps past his seat, a massive belch forced itself out of Natsu's mouth, lasting several forceful seconds and shockingly no fire attached. The sheer force of it caused Natsu to stumble back into his chair, and by the time it ended, Lucy and Happy returned to find Natsu sitting right back where he started, much to his dismay.

"Wow, good one, Natsu!" cheered Happy. Natsu's face sweat dropped with embarrassment.

Shaking her head, Lucy sighed and said, "Feel better, you big baby? Good. Now, may we continue now?"
11533122111221212.title: I think you can still handle some more.

115331221112212121.content:
Natsu didn't really see any choice in the matter, so he nodded submissively, causing Lucy to smile approvingly before heartily craming some more chicken into Natsu's hesitant maw. Natsu merely ate anything that came to him. He may be beyond full, but Lucy did have a point about the training, and a chunk of the huge reward was quite appealing.

After what seemed like hours for Natsu, he had finished the plate, and was able to endure. His stomach was truly enormous, and it extended out to his knees, resting on his thighs like a boulder. The skin was taut and stretched, but surprisingly, there were no stretch marks, and it was perfectly smooth. He had eaten so much that his belly button popped outwards.

Happy was quite distracted by it, and he playfully pawed at it, causing Natsu to turn green in the face. Lucy looked satisfied, and she said, "Alright Natsu, get some rest! We're going to be doing even more training tomorrow!" She looked at Natsu to guage his reaction, but he had already passed out on the chair. She got him a blanket, draped it over him, and went off to bed. Happy settled down on Natsu's wobbly belly, curled up, and fell asleep.

Lucy was the first to wake up in the morning, and she went out to get more groceries. Luckily for her, the store was less than a block away, so she could simply walk there and back. She was back within the hour, and she found Natsu still asleep, snoring loudly. She then began cooking a massive breakfast. Eggs, bacon, sausage, toast, potatoes, and even homemade doughnuts made their way onto the table.

Natsu woke up to the smell of the food, and he looked down to find that his stomach had gone down, but now instead of defined abdominal muscles, Natsu had a flat stomach. Upon careful inspection, it even looked like it may be sticking out a bit. Other than that, there were no noticeable changes yet. Either way, Natsu's stomach growled loudly, and Natsu said, "Do you think that's going to be enough?" Happy added an "Aye!" Lucy replied, saying, "That's the Natsu I'm used to!" before she went to finish a final plate that was piled high with omelets.

As she struggled to find a place on the table for her last plate, Lucy said, "Go ahead and dig in guys!" This time around, Natsu was much more enthusiastic, so he didn't really need Lucy to stuff him anymore, though that was probably going to happen later. As he stuffed his maw greedily with scrambled eggs and sausage, Lucy said, "Eat up! You need to train as much as possible. The contest is in only..."
115331221112212121.title: No time for stopping

choices: "He can train with us.  Nothing makes training easier than competition."
"No, let's just keep it between us and train harder so we can get a larger cut."
1153312211122121211.content:
"The contest is only in five days! Which means I gotta get you into proper competition ready shape in just five short days!" Natsu simply shrugged as he continued stuffing his face with scrambled eggs. Happy simply gnawed on one of Lucy's homemade donuts for a while. Gulping down a mouthful of egg, Natsu sighed and said, "Five days, huh? Pfft, we'll be ready in no time! Cause right now, I got a fire in my belly, and it's burning for as much as I can cram into my mouth!" With that, he took several pieces of sausage and laid them out near his eggs as he took his fork and stuck several pieces onto it with a bit of egg on top and immediately crammed it into his mouth. Enjoying the mixed flavor of the two, Natsu almost mechanically began to shovel eggs and sausage into his maw in the same fashion, stuffing bigger mouthfuls into his jaws at once and gulping them down with gusto.

Leaning back, Natsu rubbed his stomach happily and with a smile, said, "Damn, those were some great eggs, Lucy! Honestly, had I known I'd be eating THIS good, I'd have done these eating contest things a long time ago!" He then grabbed a plate of bacon and began shoveling several at a time into his mouth like they were french fries. Crumbs and bacon residue spewed from the sides of the fire mage's mouth as he munched down giant heaping mouthfuls of crunchy, crispy bacon. Gulping it down heartily, he exhaled happily and proceeded to stuff more into his eager jaws.

Glancing down, Lucy had also noticed that Natsu's stomach had lost some of it's usually rock hard definition, and seemed...softer. with almost a slight angle to it, and with all the bacon he was consuming, it looked to be distending even more, albeit slightly.

"Looks like you're making some progress. Good thing you were already training with Gray before we got started, or it might've taken us a little longer," she said as she continued to cook up some more bacon, and began to pour batter for pancakes.

"Hehe...yeah, uhhh, glad me'n Gray thought ahead...heh..." muttered Natsu as he rubbed the back of his pink spiky hair sheepishly. "Oh, that reminds me! Is Gray entering that contest too?"
"I-is he what now?"
"You guys were training for it before you came back to the Guild, and when you did, his belly looked almost as big as yours did."

Natsu grinned proudly upon being reminded that he was able to eat more than his rival Ice Mage, but quickly regained composure as he adjusted the collar on his vest a bit and said, "Ummmm, y-yeah, I think he is too. Why?" Pondering for a moment, Lucy said, "Well, I was thinking maybe he could train with us too."
"What? Why?"
"Because that way, we have a bigger chance of winning if more of us are in the competition. Besides, if I help him train, I can get him to agree to split the winnings with us three ways. What do you think? Should I get him on board with all of this too?

Natsu thought for a moment, glancing back as Happy continued to stuff his little face with another donut, then finally, he said...
1153312211122121211.title: Five days, which means we train as much as we can!

choices: A bakery with a clearance sale and an eating challenge to boot.
An all you can eat buffet that was practically empty.
11533122111221212111.content:
Natsu actually liked Lucy's plan, and it would be nice to beat the pants out of Gray again. He also wanted to drag Gray into this, as he wanted to get back at Gray for yesterday, as he knew that Gray wasn't much of a big eater. Either way, Lucy smiled, saying' "Good! I'll go get him!" Natsu and Happy didn't respond, as they were already back to stuffing their faces.

In about ten minutes, Lucy was stomping back to the apartment, dragging Gray in by his ear. Gray was struggling the entire time, complaining about how much of a pain it would be to work with Natsu.

Natsu heard this, and he quickly riled Gray up, mocking him with "Sound's like someones afraid that I'll beat 'em again!" This got Gray off, and he began yelling, "You just got lucky that time!!" He was in his underwear when he said that, and Lucy got mad at this, saying, "You're in my apartment! Put your clothes on!"

Once Gray had his clothes back on, Natsu said, "Don't flatter yourself, Gray. I can beat you even after I've had breakfast!" He then patted his bloated belly for emphasis. It was at this point that Lucy and Gray looked at the table and found that it was already nearly empty. Natsu merely burped, a stream a flame escaping his mouth before he said, "You make a good breakfast Lucy!" Happy added a cheery "Aye!"

Soon enough, Gray accepted Natsu's challenge, much to Lucy's delight, and they walked through town, trying to find a place where Gray and Natsu could compete with each other. Finally, the group settled on...
11533122111221212111.title: Training together

115331221112212121111.content:
As the three browsed through town, Lucy spotted a bakery with a large clearance sale sign nailed to the top of it. Intrigued, she and the others headed on inside, where they were promptly greeted by the baker. "Hello, young lady! What can I get you and your friends there?"
"Hi! We saw outside that you're having a clearance sale?"
"Oh my yes. We're changing locations so everything's 75% off."

Upon hearing this, Lucy's eyes immediately lit up as she quickly proceeded to run every which way and grab all her arms could carry from the shelves and everywhere else in between. Meanwhile, Natsu looked around and saw another sign about an eating challenge. "There's an eating challenge going on?" asked Naruto. The baker laughed and said, "Well, there would have been; I even just finished cooking all the platters for the challenge. Unfortunately, both competitors were training beforehand, and I guess gave themselves bellyaches before they could compete. Too many lightweights, young man. At least it looks like you seem to appreciate a good meal here or there," he noted, pointing towards Natsu's bare stomach, which had deflated considerably since breakfast at Lucy's, but still had a hint of roundness forming where his abs used to reside.

Laughing, Natsu patted his stomach proudly. "That I do! Definitely more than THIS lightweight!" He said with a toothy grin, pointing towards Gray, who glared back angrily and snapped back with, "Laugh it up, you flaming moron! We'll see whose laughing after I kick your ass at that regional eating contest!" Hearing this, the baker leaned in intrigued as the two were head to head as per usual and said, "You mean that big eating contest taking place a few days from now? Why wait then when you can settle your squabbles now?" Both mages turned to the baker curiously. "Afterall, I DID just finish baking all kinds of entrees for an eating contest two other guys weren't man enough to show up for. Maybe you two are."

Glaring back at each other, the two grinned competitively. Lucy and Happy returned with a comically massive pile of various baked goods, ready to pay, only to see no one in sight. "Happy, where is everyone?" she asked, struggling from the weight of everything she was carrying. Happy looked around and saw Natsu and Gray at a table with an eating challenge sign at the front of it. "They're having an eating contest again." The struggle was too much, immediately Lucy's pile collapsed on top of her and Happy. Digging themselves out, Lucy glanced to see the two indeed about to have an eating contest and smirked as she said, "Good. Maybe a little competitive edge is just what those two idiots need."

The baker returned to the table carrying two platters, each one with five freshly baked apple pies on them each. The sweet aroma filled the nostrils of all four residing in the bakery as he brought them down before Natsu and Gray respectively and said, "The rules are simple: whoever can finish all their food the fastest wins. The winner shall receive a weeks worth of baked goods on the house when we open in our new location tomorrow." Hearing this immediately fired up both Natsu and Gray as they grabbed their forks and knives and immediately proceeded to ravenously dig into their pies. The baker chuckled and said, "Well...umm, begin?" and stepped aside.

Both Natsu and Gray intently wolfed down big heaping forks full of pie crust and caramel sauce laden apple slices within the crust, taking big hearty mouthfuls, chewing down the pastry treat and gulping it down before immediately going back for more. It only took the two a few minutes to completely demolish their first pies. Within seconds, they were already sticking their forks into their second pies.

Lucy and Happy watched with amazement as the two took big massive chunks of pie with their forks, sometimes big enough to be a tiny slice of pie itself and immediately open wide and stuff it right into their eager maws. Much to her amusement, both continued to stare down intently as they occasionally glanced back at each other and exchanged a few choice insults, then resumed stuffing their faces.

By the time their second pies had been reduced to crumbs...
115331221112212121111.title: A bakery with a sale and eating challenge to boot!

choices: Natsu was able to keep his lead.
Gray had caught up. The two were neck and neck.
1153312211122121211111.content:
Despite having eaten breakfast right beforehand, Natsu still had the edge on Gray, and he viciously tore into a large torte that the baker brought him. When he was about halfway through, Gray started on his own torte. Gray saw that he was falling behind, and that only gave him the determination to push harder.

Natsu had a slight edge in this competition, as he had been practicing since they first competed with each other. His stomach capacity had increased considerably since, and his appetite grew to match. Either way, he was still giving it his all, yet Gray was starting to match his speed, much to his surprise.

Next up was a dozen large muffins, which Natsu greedily stuffed into his face, his cheeks puffing out comically. After a few muffins for Natsu, Gray moved on to the muffins, glaring at Natsu, who was very jolly and carefree in his stuffing spree, almost as if to mock Gray.

Their stomachs had grown from all this, as Natsu's was about the size of an overfilled basketball, and Gray's was not much farther behind, his shirt rising up about halfway, resting right where his navel was.

As the contest wore on, Lucy and Happy chatting, as they were starting to lose interest,...
1153312211122121211111.title: Still a better eater

11533122111221212111112.content:
As Natsu continued to plow through his muffins, he glanced back at Gray, and much to his surprise, the Ice Mage's gut had distended to about the same size at Natsu's own stomach; if not, the exact same size. "Hey, what the hell?" was all Natsu could work out with a mouthful of muffin. Gulping down his own mouthful and sighing happily, Gray smirked and said, "What's wrong, lava lamp? Ya scared of a little challenge?"
"Scared?! Pfft! As if! It's just gonna make it all the more satisfying after I kick your ass...AGAIN!" responded Natsu sharply as he proceeded to stuff a whole muffin into his mouth, causing his cheeks to bulge out comically. Shaking his head, Gray continued to stuff his own face with more muffins.

By the time their muffins were all but depleted, both boys' stomachs had pushed outward to the size of beach balls. Natsu's belly stuck out from his vest and over his lap, while Gray's had distended to the exact same point, to where he had to unbutton the bottom portion of his shirt just to keep it from tearing, exposing his belly button and a fair amount of distended skin above it in the process. Both sat there for a moment, rubbing and massaging their bloated guts, occasionally burping to make some more room. All the while, staring intently and competitively at one another. Both had eaten and bloated to the same size, and neither was going to let the other take the lead without a fight.

"So, Gray, wanna know the first thing I'm gonna eat here once I win that free weeks supply?" taunted Natsu with a toothy grin. Gray scoffed and said, "Actually, I'm more curious about who you went up against that was such a lightweight that he couldn't even beat YOU? Cause you sure as hell won't be winning squat today," responded Gray sharply.
"Oh yeah?!"
"Yeah!"

Before the two could go head to head again, the baker returned with several large pitchers of milk. "Nothing washes down a warm and doughy pastry like an old fashion pitcher of milk. Or a few," noted the baker jokingly as he stepped aside. Immediately, both Natsu and Gray grabbed a pitcher each and began to chug away as intently as either one could chug anything.

As the two continued to chug in a seemingly endless pace, their stomachs continued to distend just ever so slightly with every few passing gulps. By the time either one had stopped around the halfway point of their first pitchers for a breather...
11533122111221212111112.title: Gray had caught up. The two were neck and neck.

choices: Natsu kept his lead, and won by a considerable margin.
Gray barely caught up, but it was enough for him to scrape by with a victory.
115331221112212121111121.content:
Soon enough, Natsu regained some momentum, and he began to chug on ahead of Gray, a jug in each hand as he gloriously gulped down the dairy, ignoring protests from his stomach as it continued to strain, advancing ever so steadily outwards. Gray was trying to keep up, but soon he was an entire pitcher behind, despite the fact that he was essentially mimicking Natsu in how he drank milk.

The two didn't talk at all, as they were completely focused on the competition, but their glares at eat other were all the words they needed, and as one gained a bit of momentum, the other would push to keep up.

Natsu still had the upper hand, though, and once he finished his milk, he went on to the final, and hardest, part of the competition, five loaves of bread. Natsu immediately grabbed a baguette, which was nearly four feet long, and he stuffed one end into his face, feeding it in continuously as his cheeks puffed out ridiculously in order to accommodate for all the food.

When Natsu was about a third of the way through his long baguette, Gray began on the first of his five loaves, a freshly-baked banana bread. He wanted to take care of the rich, sweet breads first. Forgetting any semblance of manners, Gray grabbed chunks of the banana bread and stuffed them in his face heartily. Soon enough, Natsu moved on to a loaf of classic white bread, one which was unlike anything he ever tasted, and not too long afterwards, Gray moved on to the pumpkin bread.

All the while, their stomachs bloated further and further outwards, and they became heavier and heavier. Natsu's belly began to hang after his second loaf, and soon afterwards, Gray's followed suit. Soon enough, their bellies would both be resting on their thighs.

Next up for Natsu was a massive, circular loaf of sourdough, with cross cuts in the top and everything. After that, Gray moved on to his loaf of sourdough. The two glared at each other, seeing that they were eating the same type of bread, but they didn't really care, as long as they were stuffing their face faster than the other, they were satisfied.

As Gray moved on to the leavened breads, he gained some momentum, and when Natsu moved on to the richer, sweeter breads, he began to slow down gradually, being overwhelmed by the heaviness.

Speaking of heaviness, by this time, the bellies of the two were heavy enough to drag themselves down to the laps of their respective owners. From their, they continued outwards, consuming whatever space was left between them and the table.

Soon enough, the two were on the last loaves of bread, and both of their bellies were now bisected by the table in front of them, and they both winced at the new pressure, but they both tried to hide it so that they show no weakness.

Finally, at the end of the competition...
115331221112212121111121.title: Back to the lead.

choices: They make it to Lucy's apartment and rest up for a bit.
The trek is too much for Natsu and Gray as they stop half way to digest.
1153312211122121211111212.content:
It was a struggle for both mages to cram that final loaf of bread into their less than eager maws, but both had managed, and were doing their best to swallow it before the other could. Natsu was doing his best to gulp it down, little by little, but no matter how much he tried, his belly would accept no more bread. Gray struggled immensely, but slowly, he began to have some success, gulping down what remained of that final piece into his throat, until finally, after one of the thickest sounding gulps he'd ever had, he opened his mouth to show that there was indeed no bread left, and went practically limp in his chair as the baker approached him and called it. "And we have a winner!"

Turning their attention back to the contest, Lucy and Happy were legitimately stunned when they saw the baker holding up a queasy looking Gray's arm up victoriously instead of Natsu's. "Whoa....Gray BEAT Natsu...?" was all Happy could mutter, still in shock. Lucy glanced over at Natsu who, despite his fullness, looked infuriated and shamed by his defeat. Suddenly, a smile grew over her face. Happy noticed this and asked, "Why are you smiling? The guy you need to win an eating contest just lost a pre-eating contest!"
"Yeah, he lost. But I know Natsu..." Lucy responded as she folded her arms together and grinned, "this is just the kinda motivation he needs to keep his training going."

Meanwhile, the baker turned to Gray and said, "Congratulations, young man! You've earned yourself all you can eat from our new establishment for a whole week! How do ya feel?" Gray opened his mouth to respond, but a sudden and titantic belch erupted from him instead, causing him to blush as he covered his mouth. But then he noticed Natsu's face and with a smirk, said, "Like a winner." Glancing back at a beaten Natsu, the baker turned to him and said, "Don't feel too bad, kid. You powered through like a champ til the very end. And with some practice, I think you'll do dynamite at that eating competition five days from now. Til then, pick out as much as you'd like from here today on the house. You've earned it!" Hearing that softened the blow of defeat for Natsu and humbled him a bit as he turned to the banker, and smiled appreciatively. "Thanks," he said, still a bit woozy from the competition as well.
"Well, I'll give you two a moment to digest for a bit," said the baker before taking off. Both Natsu and Gray's bellies pushed firmly against the table they were competing in, bloated to no absolute end. The two simply sat there, caressing and massaging their bloated midsections, occasionally letting out monumentally loud and wet sounding belches back and forth, groaning in discomfort, and staring each other down despite the competition's end result.

"So," started Gray as he massaged his vastly bloated gut, "how'd it feel to get your ass kicked?" Scoffing as he folded his arms over his immense belly, Natsu turned away and said, "Oh whatever. I was kicking your ass that entire contest, but that damn sweet bread killed it for me..."
"Uh-huh, whatever you say, smoke-breath. When are you gonna learn to not be such a sore loser?"
"I'M NOT A SORE LOSER, YOU OVERGROWN POPSICLE!!!!"

Stepping in before the two bloated mages could go at it, Lucy interjected. "Easy, guys! Easy. Natsu, Gray beat you fair and square. Accept it, and just do your best for next time." Natsu pouted agitatedly, like that of a child, as Lucy turned to Gray and said, "And Gray? You don't have to rub it in Natsu's face, ESPECIALLY considering how seldom you've ever beaten him." Hearing that, Natsu immediately lit up as he grinned smugly at the unamused ice mage.
"Anyway, rest up while you can, boys, cause your training isn't over for the day."

Hearing that, both young bloated mages shrank in their seats, mortified at the news of what Lucy had in store for them, causing their bellies to quiver in unison. After Lucy had utilized Natsu's free "all you can take," she had gathered enough baked goods to last the rest of the day, and after bidding the baker farewell, went along the daunting task of walking all the way home on their immensely bloated bellies...
1153312211122121211111212.title: Gray barely caught up, just enough for him to win.

choices: Lucy lets the two stop on their own.
Lucy stuffs more into their faces, as she wasn't satisfied with their progress.
11533122111221212111112121.content:
Soon enough, the two boys were on the couch, panting just from the exhausting trip to Lucy's house. There, Lucy and Happy distributed the comically large pile of baked goods, which were on the house today, throughout the house. Both Natsu and Gray rubbed their bellies tenderly, and they were actually focused more on that than on bickering at the moment.

In less than a half hour, Lucy said, "Alright guys, are you ready to eat more?" Natsu was the first to yell, "Lucy? We just ate?". "Yeah, don't you think we've had enough already?" Gray said in agreement, surprising everyone there. When he said that, however, he was just in his boxers, which wasn't very surprising, and Lucy just sighed in an annoyed manner, not wanting to yell again.

She then said, "Think about it, guys. Usually in an eating contest, the first part doesn't matter. Once the contestants get very full, however, the winners are usually the ones who keep going. If we work on endurance as well as speed, then we're bound to win!" She didn't give the two much choice, however, as she stuffed cupcakes into both boys' mouths.

With that, Natsu smiled, then wolfed the cupcake down as he said, "I guess you're right. Maybe frosty here can't handle it, but I'm up for testing my endurance. That fired Gray up, and he wolfed his cupcake down, saying, "In you're dreams, hothead, I can beat you in an eating contest, and I can eat more than you."

"Wow, that worked better than I thought." Lucy remarked as the two regained vigor.

Still, the two were beyond full, so they wouldn't last long. They stayed tied the entire way, and after only a few more baked goods, They were both at their limits, and they ate more slowly and laboriously.
11533122111221212111112121.title: A quick rest

choices: The two massage their guts, and digest in peace before falling asleep.
After a little while, the two find themselves hungry again.
115331221112212121111121211.content:
Both Natsu and Gray continued to struggle and struggle as they attempted to gulp down a pair of muffins each. Their movement was now sluggish and tired, and their guts had distended to the point where they now rested well beyond their laps. Finally, after forcing himself to gulp down a mouthful of muffin, the young spiky haired mage turned to Lucy, almost looking a bit pale in the face and said, "Lucy...we can't eat any more..." Folding her arms together, Lucy scoffed and said, "C'mon, you guys said you wanted to work on building your endurance, didn't you?"
"Well, y-yeah, but I mean, we can't-" Natsu stuttered, both too full and too dense to respond properly. Seeing this, Gray rolled his eyes and said, "-We can't do it all at once. Like anything, you need to build up with each passing day. You can't just expect to work our endurance and stretch out our stomachs all in one fell swoop. That's just gonna make us sick and perform even lousier in the competition."

Hearing this, Lucy stopped for a moment, then ultimately nodded in agreement. "Okay, that makes sense, I guess. I mean we DO still have a few days til the competition," responded Lucy as she put the rest of the baked goods and pastries away for the time being. "You two can stay here for the time being. Just rest up, digest, do whatever. But tomorrow, we're pushing on. Got it?"

Both Gray and Natsu nodded half scared, half sick while Lucy smirked at the two took her leave with Happy flying besides her with a whole donut sticking out of his maw. But first, she stopped and said, "Oh, and..good job today, boys." Hearing this earned a weary but grateful smile from Natsu while Gray merely smirked, still massaging his achingly bloated belly with both hands. "Oh man, how do you do this more than once a year, Lava Brain?" asked Gray before burping loudly. and groaning in discomfort. "Ugh...think something almost came up with that..."

Letting out an even louder burp, Natsu chuckled weakly and blew out some smoke in Gray's direction, causing him wave it out of his face in annoyance. "Real cute, dumbass," was all Gray could say, earning an innocent grin from the fire mage as he stroked his own bloated belly firmly yet gently and said, "You wanna know the truth of it? I just push on, I guess."
"Push on?"
"Like, I eat and eat to the point where I get this major bellyache, but I don't let it stop me. It's like whenever we're on mission and we're up against a really tough S.O.B. Sure, they'll kick our ass again and again, and sure, it'll hurt like hell, and that pain may be too much for a lot of people, but not for us at Fairy Tail. We take it all in and just keep on pushing."

Gray had to scratch his head on that one. For once, Natsu said something that made sense, as he opened his mouth, and after a moment of silence, simply said, "Huh...good point."
Grinning mischievously, Natsu then turned to Gray and decided to add, "Of course, luckily for me, that fire in my belly makes things digest a lot quicker than most." Glancing back at Gray's distended gut, Natsu smirked and said, "Hope you don't have ICE in your belly, or digestion's gonna SUCK."
"Funny. Guess that's what happens when a dumbass tries to be a smartass..." responded Gray, earning an angry glare from Natsu as he immediately rose from his sitting position and got in Gray's face as he shouted in his characteristically angry voice, "WHO'RE YOU CALLIN' DUMBASS, SNOWFLAKE?!" All that sudden jostling and shifting caused Natsu's immensely bloated gut to gurgle violently as he went green and clutched his belly firmly with both hands, groaning in pain all the while. Gray smiled victoriously. "That's what happens when you mouth off to m-"

*BRRRAAAAAAAAAAPPP!*

The angry shifting had apparently worked up a gas pocket within Natsu's belly, causing him to let fly a lengthy belch right in Gray's face, carrying with it, a considerable torrent of fire, which set Gray's hair on fire, forcing him to immediately freeze the top of his head. Natsu groaned in discomfort while Gray simply sighed in annoyance and muttered, "Touché..."
115331221112212121111121211.title: Lucy lets the two stop on their own.

choices: Lucy began stuffing Gray's face with food, forcing him to eat more.
Natsu is able to coax Gray into another eating contest.
1153312211122121211111212111.content:
After a peaceful silence, Natsu said, "Man, this is the life!" as he stretched his arms out and yawned. Gray then said, "I hate to say it, because I'd be agreeing with you, but you're right Natsu!"

He was expecting Natsu to say something nice in response, but much to his annoyance, he heard a loud snoring, and looked over at Natsu to see him sprawled haphazardly across the chair, sleeping peacefully in an awkward position. His rounded belly rose and fell as he breathed, and Happy was curled up on top, sleeping silently. Gray couldn't help but chuckle to himself, and soon enough, he was sleeping silently as well.

Meanwhile, Lucy was counting the baked goods, taking inventory of everything that she got from the bakery. She then got a few boxes from when she moved in, and she sorted out the baked goods, with breads going into one box, cakes in another, so on and so forth. Either way, once she was finished, she took a couple of hours to study up on how to train for eating competitions, and then she looked for recipes for dinner to utilize some of the baked goods.

Either way, Natsu and Gray woke up to Lucy hitting a pot with a spoon, yelling, "Natsu! Gray! Time for dinner!"

Natsu was the first to spring up, and he stretched before taking a brief moment to look at his body, seeing that his stomach was now slightly distended, and it was fairly doughy, but not quite yet jiggly. His limbs were also no longer muscularly defined, and his rear end began to fill out.

Gray wasn't in as bad a shape, but he was no longer as trim and muscular as he used to be. He hadn't digested nearly as much as Natsu, and he still felt a bit full. Either way, Natsu eagerly ran to the kitchen, his stomach growling, and Gray, with a full stomach, trudged over to the kitchen hesitantly. While Natsu immediately stuffed his face with anything nearby, Gray was picking at the stuffing dish that Lucy handed him.

Lucy was worried that Gray wasn't eating as much, and Natsu began to notice this as well. Soon enough...
1153312211122121211111212111.title: Afternoon nap

choices: Gray's second wind causes him to keep momentum against Natsu.
Though both push on, Natsu's eating more at at a quicker rate.
11533122111221212111112121112.content:
"What's wrong, man? Don't tell me you're quitting on us," noted Natsu as he grabbed a slice of cake with his bare and took a nice big chomp, chewing vigorously, and spraying a bit of crumbs all over the table, and partially on Happy who was nearby chewing on a riceball, oblivious to the raining remnants of chocolate cake. Gray shook his head and forced himself to take another fork full of stuffing into his mouth. As Natsu and Lucy watched, Gray was taking much longer to finish chewing before gulping down and grimacing slightly.

Stopping for a moment, Gray leaned back and clutched his still slightly curved stomach in pain, groaning a little bit in the process. "I dunno, Dragneel, my stomach still isn't quite as used to taking in so much on the fly like this..." responded Gray as he massaged his aching gut, hoping to coax the pain away. Natsu waved his hand dismissively. "Ah don't sweat all that! Ya just need a second wind to get the fire in your belly going!" Gray face-palmed.

"Uhh, Natsu?" noted Happy. "Bah, w-whatever! It's a figure of speech for everyone who isn't ME, okay? My point is, ya just need a lil motivation to get to that point."
"What more motivation could he need when we're already doing this for a grand prize?" responded Lucy a bit sharply, hoping to remind them both why they were stuffing themselves to begin with.

Natsu smirked then said, "Pride. We STILL have to settle which one of us can eat more than the other, snow-globe."
"What're you talking about, dummy? I already beat you at that bakery competition!"
"Yeah, and I beat you at that restaurant...." Natsu stopped, immediately remember the cover story they told Lucy that ended up being somehow true. Smiling all-too-innocently, he turned to Lucy and said, "Y-y'know, when we were training before? Ehhhehe..."

Composing himself, he turned to Gray and said, "Anyway, I beat you then, and you beat me at the bakery....barely..."
"BARELY?!" shouted Gray, once again in his boxers.
"Pants. Shirt. NOW." responded Lucy sharply. Getting re-dressed, Gray composed himself and shouted once again. "I kicked your ass as hard as ever, you fire loving dolt!"
"It was a fluke and you know it!" snapped Natsu.
"A FLUKE?! I'LL SHOW YOU A FLUKE!!"

Angrily, he took his fork and began shoveling the stuffing into his mouth like no tomorrow, much to Lucy's surprise. "Fine, *mmph!* you wanna *GULLLP* tie breaker? You'll get a tie breaker, Natsu!" Grinning toothily, Natsu said, "NOW you're talkin', Fullbuster. Alright, here's how it'll go down. Lucy's prepared enough food to feel a small village, right? We stuff our faces with as much of it as we can cram into our bellies, and whoever's left still eating while the other...YOU...is weeping off their bellyache, is the winner. Whaddua say?"

Pouring gravy over another plate of stuffing, Gray stuck a big portion with his fork. "Are we talking or are we eating?" then stuffed a huge forkful straight into his now oh-so-eager maw. Grinning, Natsu proceeded to stuff the remaining slice of cake straight into his mouth practically whole...
11533122111221212111112121112.title: Natsu coaxes Gray into another eating contest.

choices: Tried to think of a way to take the fire mage down a few pegs.
Talked with Lucy about how he could improve his endurance and speed.
115331221112212121111121211122.content:
Though Gray put up a good fight, Natsu managed to stay one step ahead of him. Gray finished the stuffing, but Natsu had already finished two loaves of garlic bread in the meantime. Gray was full in the beginning, and despite the fact that he didn't eat as much at dinner, his distended belly was about the same size as Natsu's, both being the size of a volleyball.

Either way, Natsu's fiery belly, combined with his determination, allowed him to continue eating faster than Gray, and he greedily stuffed muffin after muffin into his maw while Gray struggled through his cornbread. This process continued for quite a while, and the bellies of the two were really showing it. As Natsu's belly became beach ball sized, Gray's became barely larger than a basketball. Natsu's belly grew large enough to cover the chair after his spread his legs, but Gray's wasn't even beachball sized yet.

Finally, Gray couldn't handle anymore, and he more or less resigned, rubbing his belly tenderly. At this point, there were only two dishes left, and Natsu grabbed them both. "Looks like someone couldn't finish their food!" Natsu gloated, "That's alright, though. I got it covered!"

With that, Natsu grabbed both dishes, and finished them in record time, patting his belly smugly afterwards. "I guess it was a fluke!" Natsu remarked. "It's only because your fire helps you digest faster!" Gray retorted angrily. "Someone sounds like a sore loser!" Natsu responded childishly. Gray was about to retort, but Natsu belched a massive belch, covering Gray's face with a stream of fire, leaving it coal black and dumbfounded.

"A hothead like you would be that immature!" Gray scolded. He was expecting a response, but already, Natsu had dozed off, draped sloppily over the chair as he snored fairly loudly. Happy was soon back on his belly curled up, falling asleep himself. "Man, they even sleep at the same time!" Lucy observed.

Gray, in the meantime, was quite angry at the defeat, and he wanted to win badly. Instead of sleeping, like Natsu was, Gray...
115331221112212121111121211122.title: A fiery belly is hard to beat

choices: Give Gray a belly rub to help ease his aching tummy.
1153312211122121211111212111222.content:
Rising up, still nursing his achingly bloated belly, Gray sought out Lucy, who was still up cooking for tomorrow's training. "Oh, hey, Gray. Still sore about losing again?" asked Lucy, still focused on the baked goods in question. Scoffing, Gray shook his head and said, "I'm just tired of that gloating idiot somehow getting the jump on me at every freakin' turn! Every time he wins ANYTHING, it goes straight to his head, and it's time someone took him down a peg or two!"
"How do you plan on doing that?"
"I'm gonna challenge him to another eating contest tomorrow. I'll make the stakes high enough so that he'll HAVE to accept. And when he does? I'll show him up once and for all!"
"I dunno, Gray. History has a tendency to repeat itself."
"I know, that's why I'm here. I want you to help me the way you did with him. He had an edge on me from the start cause he was training with you. But now he's asleep, and by the time he wakes up, I wanna be ready for 'em. Whadduya say?"
"It's a little late, isn't it?"
"Think about it, Lucy. If you have two really skilled eaters instead of just one, then imagine how your odds'll fair when the REAL competition starts."

Lucy considered the notion. On one hand, Gray made a good point, but at the same time, if humiliation was driving Gray this far, then if she could help him humiliate a defeated Natsu, he'd push himself further than ever. With a devilish grin, she turned to Gray and said, "Have a seat. I'll have the first few dishes for you ready in a few minutes."

Finally, she brought out a series of baked goods and some leftover roasted chicken for Gray to put away, but despite his vigor, he was still rather full from his earlier session and defeat against Natsu. So Lucy decided to...
1153312211122121211111212111222.title: Talk with Lucy about how to improve eating skills.

1153312212.content: What about Ice Mage / always half naked pretty boy toy Gray Fullbuster?
1153312212.title: Gray?

11533122121.content: And what happens with our little Ice Mage?
11533122121.title: Gray!

choices: But there's no food in sight!
115331221211.content:
Natsu, Erza and the others watched from afar as a half naked (as per usual) Gray trained fiercely in the Guild's training room, freezing wooden statues and punching them in half, several at a time. He took to several other wooden targets and angrily punched them to bits, one by one. The others raised their eyebrows in concern, except Natsu, who simply watched disinterested. Erza nudged to Natsu who glanced back and scoffed, still uninterested. Erza then glared angrily at Natsu, who looked back at her, a bit more nervously, then with a roll of his eyes, approached the young Ice Mage.

Natsu approached the still rapidly fierce Gray and said, "You know, you've been training yourself to the bone these past few days, maybe you outta ease up."
"So what? Afraid I might show you up?" Gray responded, irritating Natsu to no end.
"Show ME up? YOU?!" Fire began to form from the Fire Mage's palm but after hearing Erza clear her throat angrily, he calmed himself down and diffused his flames. "I'm not here to fight, I'm just saying that the others are kind of worried about you. You've been really tense lately and the others for one reason or another, thought I should let you know that you're making them uncomfortable."
"Tense?" Gray responded angrily, then after hearing himself, stopped and considered what Natsu had just said. "...Okay, maybe I have been, but it's just because I'm tired of always being overshadowed out there!"
"Overshadowed?" Natsu asked. Gray raised his eyebrows angrily.
"Oh, don't even start, you know exactly why I mean. 'Save us, Natsu! You're my hero, Natsu!' All day, every day. We all put in the work, but Mr. Hero gets all the credit. Well, I'm sick of it, and I'm gonna make sure the people remember that there's more than one hero in this guild!" said Gray before punching an icicle clear through a cutting log. Natsu glanced, then also thought about what Gray had just said. "Okay, maybe I HAVE been kinda hogging it as of late. If it's bothering you that much, I'm sorry. I'll try and ease up on it."
"You mean it?"
"For you, yeah."

Gray smiled, indeed grateful to the Fire Mage for understanding and being a good sport. There was a brief silence in the room, until a loud rumbling emitted from Gray's stomach. Blushing red from embarrassment, Gray placed a palm flat on his chiseled six pack then smirked sheepishly. "You may've been right about the intensity thing. Think all that training worked up one hell of an appetite," said Gray as Natsu laughed., then responded, "You up to grab a bite in the kitchen? Think Erza was putting the finishing touches on a lamb spit before all this happened."
"At this rate, I could eat the lamb," said Gray hungrily. Sniffing briefly, Natsu stepped away and said, "Maybe after a quick bath? You stink like a wet hatchling over here."
Gray mock laughed, then headed to the bath house.

After a while, the two were in the kitchen, ready to get their grub on...
115331221211.title: Weight Gain

choices: The Guild came bursting into the kitchen.
