12231111.content:
The air was still, until Shinra Infantryman Cloud Strife stumbled back, struggled as he barely managed to fight off a G-Reaper. Panting heavily, he gripped his sword tight as the reaper roared viciously and charged at him full throttle. Charging right back at the beast, the two exchanged blows, sword to scythe, their metal clashed again and again, until the beast kicked Cloud in the chest, knocking him flat on his back as the monster leaped up in the air and swung his scythe down for a killing blow. Luckily, Cloud managed to roll away last second before the scythe could make mince meat out of the young blond. In that brief moment, Cloud capitalized by slashing down at the beast, ending it on the spot. "Phew, that wasn't so bad..." Cloud said with pride, albeit out of breathe.

"Level 1 complete. Now beginning level two simulation," declared the AI announcer. Suddenly several G-Reapers appeared from thin air, all around Cloud, causing him to gulp nervously.

From outside, SOLDIER Third Class Kunsel was wandering down the lower levels of Shinra when an enormous commotion from the VR Training Room caught his ear. After what sounded sounded like a brutal battle ensued, Kunsel listened in to hear the announcer cancelling the Level 2 Simulation. Moments later, a bruised and battered Cloud exited the Training Lab, beaten and humiliated...again, only to be greeted by Kunsel's friendly smile as he said, "Hey, you're that new Infantryman, right? The one who helped Zack stopped Genesis in the mountains?"
"Uhhh, yeah," responded a still dazed Cloud. "Nice to meet'cha. Name's Kunsel. Soldier Third Class." Kunsel shook the boy's hand as Cloud offered a faint smile and said, "Cloud. Nice to meet you too."
"So I hear you're gonna be part of Zack and Sephiroth's new field team, is that right? Pretty cool, man. I'm guessing that's why you're running VR so late. My advice? Don't take it too personally if Zack or Sephiroth make the rest of you guys look bad in the field. Very few are on par with those two. Only ones I can think of were Angeal and Genesis, and well, you know what happened to them..." said Kunsel as his smile faded a bit. Curious and a bit concerned, Cloud turned a bit more attentively to Kunsel and asked, "So...how's he been doing? Y'know...since the mission in the mountains-"
"You mean since he took down Angeal? Well....he's tough, man, and sure, he puts on a strong or happy face, but he's human, just like you or me. It's never easy losing a friend and mentor....and I can't even imagine how it'd feel to lose them to your own blade...but I'm sure he'll be fine. He's the man afterall! Anyway, good meeting you, man! And best of luck on the field!"

Kunsel headed out for the night. Still dirty and beaten from training, Cloud opted to wash up real quick before heading home. After a brief shower, Cloud dried up in the Shinra Locker rooms, dressing up in his casual long sleeved blue shirt and black pants, when he spotted a familiar face sitting on a bench nearby; Zack. Cloud wanted to greet him, but he could see that he was in a deeply focused state as he examined Angeal's parted Buster Sword. Before he could say anything, Zack noticed the younger man in the reflection of the blade and turned to him, his face immediately lighting up at the sight. "Oh, hey, Cloud! Long time no see!"

Smiling a bit nervously, Cloud walked up to Zack and shook his hand and said, "Hey, Zack. Good to see you again. Looking forward to working with you."
"Same! Sooooo, what're you doing 'round these parts so late? I thought Third Class and Infantry were off the clock."
"Oh, we are. I just, ummm, thought I'd do a lil training in VR before tackling any field missions."
"Pffft, dude, with the way you handled yourself on our first mission together, I think you'll be fine."
"B-but Professor Hollander escaped because of me..."
"Nah, he escaped because he's a slippery slimeball. Besides, at the time we all had more pressing threats than that fat scumbag. Like Genesis and...well, you know."
"...Yeah. I just, really don't want to let you guys down."
"You won't, man. Trust me. We'll get Hollander sooner or later. Meantime, we got the week off since G-Copy sightings are all but non-existent now that Genesis is gone. Spend that time chilling and enjoying some YOU time, y'know?"
"Heh, yeah..."

Before Cloud could say anything else, a loud, hungry rumbling emanated from his stomach, causing him to blush with embarrassment as he covered his stomach and tried to silence it, earning a laugh from Zack. "I take it you haven't eaten yet?"
"Heh...i-it kinda slipped my mind, yeah."

Rolling his eyes, Zack grabbed Cloud by the arm and playfully pulled him out of the locker room and back into the main lobby. "Rule number one of being in SOLDIER; NEVER head into battle on an empty stomach."
"THAT'S rule number one...?"
"Well, it should be. Now come on, let's grab a bite to eat."
"It's kinda late, isn't it?"
"Exactly, which means fewer customers to worry about. There's plenty of places around Midgar that're open well into the night. Besides, I'm so hungry, I could eat an extra large Chocobo..." said Zack as he rubbed his own stomach hungrily. Glancing back at Cloud, he smirked and said, "My treat."

Raising his eyebrows, Cloud paused for a moment, and said, "Weeeeell, in that case, lead the way, boss!"

Where do the two eat at?
12231111.title: Two weeks after defeating Genesis and Angeal.

choices: Cloud finishes the plate with gusto and moves onto his next plate.
Cloud needs to take a breather.
122311111.content:
After a lengthy stroll through Migdar, the two teens eventually make their way to Midgar's All-You-Can-Eat Buffet. Doing his best to maintain composure, Cloud simply smirks while Zack is practically drooling at the mere word Buffet. Happily, both boys headed right in. Zack paid up front and immediately the two headed over to the food selections, still fresh, steamy and unoccupied. Cloud got himself a plate of roast beef and potatoes and found a seat, while Zack returned with what appeared to be a mountain of food stacked on top of a plate. Cloud glanced in utter bewilderment.

"Wow...you weren't kidding when you said you were hungry..." said Cloud, to which Zack scoffed upon glancing at Cloud's plate and said, "Yeah, but apparently you were. C'mon, we're at a Buffet. Get your moneys worth, man! Here, tell you what-"

Upon saying that, Zack took Cloud's plate and swapped with his infinitely larger plate, causing Cloud's eyes widen with intimidation at the mere sight of so much food at once. "I'm gonna go refill this plate, you show me what you can do." Zack rose and began to stock up with many of the same entrees he had stuffed on what was now Cloud's plate, until he returned with yet another mountain of Buffet food under a plate and sat down across from Cloud, who was still just looking at his plate. Finally, Zack said, "Come on, dude. You're in SOLDER now. There's no pussy footing around. Show me you got what it takes to be on our team." With that, Zack immediately dug into his plate hungrily and voraciously.

Cloud, a bit more refined, stuck his fork in and pulled out a dumpling which he promptly stuffed into his mouth. As he chewed on it, he noticed Zack was literally shoving food into his gaping maw like a madman. Luckily no one was around to bare witness to such a sight, though Cloud suspected Zack probably wouldn't care too much. As he swallowed his dumpling, his stomach roared hungrily for more. Placing a hand on it embarrassed, Cloud blushed for a moment, then glanced back at the mountain Zack had just ordered him to 'overcome'. "Well, if it's for SOLDIER..." Cloud said to himself before taking another dumpling and stuffing it into his mouth. The young blond chewed a bit quicker and gulped it down heartily, finding himself to be enjoying the taste before he took another bite, and another, and another. Before he knew it, he too, had become a human vacuum, inhaling whatever delights he could fit into his mouth, much to Zack's approval.

Chewing down a comically large mouthful, Zack gulped it down and sighed with relief as he leaned back in his chair and patted his stomach and smiled back at Cloud who was still shoveling food into his gaping maw. "That's the spirit, bud! Keep it up!" he said with approval as Cloud simply kept on eating. As Zack proceeded to resume his own feast, he looked past the mountain of food Cloud was consuming and down to the younger teens stomach. Much to Zack's surprise, it had vaguely begun to bloat outward ever so slightly from Cloud's rapid food intake. He promptly smirked, doubly impressed by the young blond's drive, then proceeded to resume his own stack of food...
122311111.title: Midgar's All-You-Can-Eat Buffet

choices: Upon arriving home, Cloud discovers he's still hungry.
1223111111.content:
Some time had passed as Zack continued to work on his pile of food. In the midst of his consumption, he heard the CLANK of a fork dropping onto an empty plate and looked up, to see Cloud's plate picked bone dry, while Cloud himself leaned back satisfied as he picked at something between his teeth and rested one hand atop his just slightly bloated stomach. A satisfied grin grew across his face as he said, "Mmm, man, you weren't kidding, Zack. That was some good eating!"
"Damn, that's gotta be some kind of record eating pace, dude! Don't think I've ever seen anyone in SOLDIER put away so much food so quickly!"

Much to his surprise, Cloud rose from his seat and headed back to the buffet line. "Dude, no way..." was all Zack could mutter as he watched Cloud pile on even more meats, and side entrees on a larger sized plate than before. "Huh...this could be interesting..." With that, Zack resumed working on the sizable remainder of his own ample meal. Taking a huge bite of pasta, Zack looked up with awe as Cloud dropped his massive plate with a heavy thud atop their table. Piled on it were various ribs, fried and BBQ'd chocobo, egg rolls, more mashed potatoes, and a few slices of pizza.

"Dude...." was all Zack could mutter, earning a smirk from Cloud as he replied with, "You said it yourself, if I'm gonna be in SOLDIER, I gotta see how far I can push myself, right?"
"Hehe, guess so," was all Zack could say. He found himself actually rather eager to see if his new pal; a thin and fellow countryboy could really put away so much food or not.

So he watched the blond eat as ravenously as he'd ever seen anyone eat in between his own bouts of ravenously devouring the rest of his own plate. Cloud was like a machine, tearing the meat off the ribs and scarfing it down one bone at a time. Occasionally, he'd get some BBQ sauce on his face which he'd promptly lick off whatever he could and wipe the rest with a napkin. In no time at all, his ribs were reduced to a pile of sauce laden bones while Cloud worked his way towards his fried chocobo wings and drumsticks.

Some time had passed, and Zack had all but completely stuffed himself on his first large plate alone. Thumping his chest a few times, Zack burped loudly and smacked his lips happily as he rubbed his satisfied stomach with his right hand. He then proceeded to shift all his attention to Cloud, who had consumed his fried chocobo and was finishing up with the pizza and egg rolls like they were nothing.

As Cloud continued to stuff his face, Zack's focus shifted down towards his midsection. The sheer volume of food Cloud had consumed in so short a time had caused it to distend and bloat outwards slightly more noticeably than before. It was no longer a concave firm, but flat with the slightest bit of roundness forming at the surface beneath his blue long sleeved shirt. Smiling a bit, Zack looked back up at Cloud, who had now just successfully polished off this next plate with relative ease. "Phew, that hit the spot!" said Cloud as he patted his belly happily and licked his lips of some pizza sauce remnants. As Cloud leaned back in his chair, feeling relatively satisfied with all he'd eaten, a feeling of ease wafted over the normally uptight and shy young man. Fullness. That heavy feeling in his belly, pushing the limits in such a way, that it actually felt quite good to the boy, and even though what he'd eaten would have satisfied anyone else for about a few days straight, he felt as though he could keep going if he absolutely wanted to. But considering Zack had paid and it was getting late, he opted against it for the time being.

"Well, looks like it's getting kinda late," said Cloud as he checked his watch. Zack examined his to confirm and nodded as he pointed towards the exit. "Wanna jet?" Cloud nodded, and after the two boys had almost forced themselves to hoist up to their feet, they exited the buffet.

As they headed back out to the nearly empty nightlife, Cloud smiled at Zack and said, "Thanks a lot for the dinner, man! I haven't eaten that great in years!" Nudging the blond playfully in the shoulder, Zack winked and said, "Anything for a fellow countryboy, dude." After bro-fisting each other, Cloud walked off, but after a moment, Zack stopped and added, "Hey, Cloud."

Cloud stopped and turned his attention to the older boy. "Yeah, Zack?"
"Y'know, anytime you wanna go out and grab a bite, just hit me up. Believe it or not, a lotta these dudes'll give us free meals for tending to Genesis and his G-Copies, and it'd be cool to kick back with someone from the countryside every now and then." A moment passed before Cloud smiled back and said, "Sounds cool, man. Til next time!" And with that, Cloud took his leave...
1223111111.title: Cloud finishes his plate and moves onto another.

choices: Call Zack and see if he was down for some late-night binging.
Call takeout and binge some more solo.
12231111111.content:
After a good while walking back to his apartment, Cloud's living conditions were all but bare, sporting a clean; albeit empty apartment with little occupation of furniture, photographs, or any real signs of residence. Things seemed rather bare, and empty. All things considered, it was the last thing on the young blond's mind, as he finally made his way home and plopped down wearily upon his couch, exhausted from the day of training, and night of binge eating.Resting one hand atop his once again thin, and firm stomach, Cloud reminisced back to that sensation of fullness. It wasn't one he was particularly used to or too familiar with, but boy did it feel good at the time. Lifting up his shirt, he examined his smooth, bare stomach's flat surface. Once again, completely flat, muscle toned, and lacking of any additional or extra weight.

While Cloud had always maintained a physically perfect physique, he couldn't help but frown due to the lack of that previous sensation. That fullness was something part of him greatly wished to experience again. In fact, Cloud began to wonder how far his concave stomach could truly go if pushed to its' absolute limits, and he wondered if perhaps Zack might just be the person to help him reach that state. He certainly seemed intrigued in watching Cloud push himself to his limits, and was even going as far as to encourage and challenge him all the way onward.

As if on cue, the boy's muscularly thin stomach let out a rather audible growl. Dropping his shirt to once again cover his bare torso, Cloud rose up from his couch and headed towards his kitchen, examining the contents of his fridge to see if there were anything that could sate his hunger. But nothing looked appetizing or more importantly, filling. So Cloud grabbed his phone and was about to dial for late-night takeout, but then he stopped and wondered if maybe Zack was serious about continuing to push him. Standing in his kitchen for a moment with his phone at hand, Cloud thought for a moment, then finally, decided to...
12231111111.title: Upon getting home, Cloud finds he's still hungry.

choices: Half way in, he takes a quick breather...
He finishes the whole pizza with gusto.
122311111111.content:
After a few moments debating on his rumbling stomach, Cloud finally decided to call Zack and see if he was down for some late-night binging. So he grabbed his phone and dialed Zack's home number; one hand still rested atop his hungrily gurgling abs.

"Ugh, hello?" said Zack on the other line, causing Cloud to light up slightly.
"Zack! Hi! Erm...h-how are you doing?" asked a timid Cloud.
"Well, it's pretty late and I just woke up, sooooo peaches...whassup, Cloud?"
"What's up? Well, I was...I was kinda wondering if...."
"Cloud, what is it?"
"-Are you serious about you willing to push me to my limits as SOLDIER?"
"What?"

Rolling his eyes, Cloud smirks then presses his phone to his stomach so Zack can hear the loud gurgling emanating from it.

"Oh..." responded Zack as he listened in for a moment.
"I was thinking maybe I could come over and take you up on your offer, but-"
"Y-yeah! Come on over! I've got TONS of good eats lyin' around! It'll be fun!"
"You sure?"
"Cloud, don't question a superior officer, just hop on by, alright?"

Cloud smiles then agrees before Zack gave him his apartment address and hung up and immediately getting on his bike and peeling over to Zack's place. Knocking at the door, he waited while his abdomen continued to gurgle viciously demanding food. "It's open, come on in!" came Zack's voice from inside. Cloud complied and headed inside, looking around the not-so-surprisingly messy apartment of Zack Fair, only to find him in the kitchen; wearing only a sleeveless tanktop and board shorts, piling several dozen dishes on his counter.

"Hey, what's up, dude?" asked Zack as he warmed up some steak and potatoes. "Wow, you weren't kidding..."
"Yeah, well, I'm usually too busy on the field or training to ever really eat half this stuff. Don't worry, none of it's expired. In fact, I get most from grateful citizens. Heh, what better way to thank the heroes than by plumping 'em up, right?" responded Zack with a smile as he patted his ripped stomach for emphasis, earning a chuckle from Cloud. Finally, Zack pulled out an extra large Pizza and placed it on the table with a 2L bottle of soda. He then opened the box and let the rich smell of melted cheese and peperoni fill Cloud's nose. "What better way to start than the classics, right?"

Cloud glanced back at Zack for a moment then went wide eyed. "Y-you want me to finish that WHOLE pizza?"
"All sixteen slices. A good way to start, don'tcha think?"
But Cloud didn't respond. He was too dumbstruck at the notion to say anything to the contrary. Seeing this, Zack smirked than sat the younger man down at his table in front of the pizza. Cloud paused for a moment, when suddenly his stomach ROARED for subsistence. Feeling this, Cloud winced, then glanced back at the pizza and nodded. "Alright, let's do it!" he said as he grabbed the first slice and stuffed a good chunk of pizza straight into his mouth, biting almost a third of the pizza slice in one bite, chewing immensely before gulping it down. As the flavors burst unto his tongue, Cloud smirked then took another bite, and another, until the first slice was no more.

Licking his lips, he grabbed the next slice, and proceeded to eat it in all but three massive bites, earning an impressed smile from Zack. "Not bad, dude. Not bad at all..." Hearing this, Cloud smirks a bit more confidently and proceeds to take even larger bites of his third slice and down it all in TWO massive bites, which he spent more time chewing before gulping heartily and sighing with relief as each mouthful of pizza slid down his throat and deposited into his ever-so-hungry gullet...
122311111111.title: Call Zack and see if he was down for some late-...

choices: A quarter of the way in, Cloud feels something rising up his throat.
Cloud finishes the whole bottle and still can't burp.
1223111111111.content:
Cloud continued to gulp down his slices two surprisingly massive bites at a time. Zack's eyes wandered from Cloud stuffing his face to his stomach. All the while, as he did, his stomach would push outward just ever so slightly, to where it was no longer perfectly concave, but now flat and just slightly rounded outward a little bit. Eight slices of pizza gulped down, Cloud groaned in moderate discomfort and leaned back against his chair, rubbing his belly in an effort to coax the tense pain that was brewing from within. "Urgh...my stomach hurts," complained Cloud as he clutched his abdomen firmly. Zack shrugged and said, "That'll happen, man. Your stomach isn't used to taking in so much in so large a volume at so quick a pace. You're trying to eat too fast."
"Lesson number one, I guess..."
"Heh, guess so. What do you feel exactly?"
"Ugh....just a lot of pressure in my upper stomach..."
"Ohhhhh, is THAT all? Jeez, why didn't ya say so?"

Cloud stared at Zack curiously beneath the pain he was feeling, then continued groaning. "Rgh, w-what is it, Zack?" Zack smirked and said, "Don't worry, like I said, you were eating a lot more and a lot faster than your stomach is used to, so it's taken on a lot of the air that came with your meal being scarfed down so quickly."
"Meaning what exactly?"
"Meaning all you gotta do is burp and your stomach'll feel better."

Cloud's eyes widened slightly, before he put on a cool face and said, "O-oh, heh...is that all? Okay..." he then nervously sat up for a moment and opened his mouth as he pounded his fist to his chest a few timse, but nothing came out. Zack raised an eyebrow curiously as Cloud grinned a bit nervously and said, "Uhhh...g-guess it's stuck or something. Maybe I should just eat some more and it'll come out on its' own?"
"Bad idea. You try and eat with all that pressure building and you're gonna feel even sicker."
"Oh. Well, see the thing about it, Zack..." Cloud said as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly, "...I, uhhh...don't know how to."

Zack simply sat there for a moment, scratching his head. "How to do what? Wait, you dunno how to burp?!" Cloud shrugged and said, "No one ever taught me." Rolling his eyes, Zack shuts the pizza box close for a moment and turns to Cloud. "Okay, watch carefully..." Zack said as he stood up straight and proceeded to gulp down some air. "The key to burping," Zack said with a bit of a strained voice, "...is to gulping down as much air from your esophagus as you can into your stomach." Pressing one hand against his stomach, Zack continued sinking his chin into his neck as he gulped down more and more air. "You'll start to feel your stomach expand with all the air you're taking in. And then..."

Cloud watched a bit confused as Zack stopped and after thumping his fist into his toned chest, pushed out a mighty and lengthy belch which carried on for almost 4 seconds straight. "And there you have it!" said Zack as he sighed and patted his stomach proudly. Cloud, however, scratched his head and; in a classic blond moment, said, "Yeaaah...I'm not exactly sure how to do any of that..." Hearing that, Zack immediately facepalmed before turning to the fridge and returning with a 2L bottle of soda, earning a nervous gulp from Cloud. "Drink up," said Zack. Less than anxiously, Cloud unscrewed the top, and after a moment, brought the whole bottle up to his lips as he proceeded to slowly gulp down the fizzy beverage...
1223111111111.title: Half way in, Cloud takes a quick breather...

122312.content: You could always back track to a time before Cloud, with Zack and the Crisis Core gang.
122312.title: Zack Fair?

1223121.content: First and foremost, which version of Zack shall we follow? The rookie second class Zack or more experienced first class Zack?
1223121.title: SOLDIER First / Second Class Zack Fair!

choices: After killing Angeal and earning the Buster Sword
12231211.content: Will this be before or after Angeal's Death?
12231211.title: SOLDIER First Class!

122312111.content: Will SOLDIER First Class Zack gain muscle or gain poundage?
122312111.title: Before killing Angeal

1223121111.content: And who will lead Zack to his soon to be larger waist size?
1223121111.title: Weight Gain

12231211111.content:
Times grew heavy over all of Midgar as Genesis copies had since begun terrorizing all the region at the seams. Shinra devoted every and any resource it could spare into wiping out the threat as best it could. Determined above all others, was SOLDIER First Class Zack Fair. Spending every waking hour he could, he searched the city and confronted all G-Copies head on, leaving each battle stronger yet no more victorious. Every sword fight ended with G-Copies defeated and Zack victorious, yet they just kept on coming. So long as Genesis, Hollander and unfortunately, Zack's mentor and friend Angeal were at large and degraded, the onslaught would continue.

Finally, after one particularly draining day, Zack found himself wandering through the Slums. Beat up, dirty, and utterly worn. His entire body ached from his most recent battle with a G-Reaper, but for the time being; all was well. So he thought he'd go and visit Aerith at the Church. Opening the large doors, Zack wearily made his way down to the alter, where he saw Aerith picking flowers growing out of the grass patch before the main alter. "Still getting that Flower Cart ready, eh?" asked Zack with a smile on his face. Something about seeing Aerith could always bring a sprig of energy back into the young man's step. She simply smiled back at him and nodded. "They've been getting plenty of sunlight so I thought I'd start sampling them to the people in the market," she replied, continuing to pick more wild flowers from their roots and stuff them into dirt vases.
"Smart thinking. May as well get a good jump start when the season's right. Need a hand?"
"Oh goodness no. You've been wearing yourself paper thin dealing with the threat to Midgar, I don't want you to-"

Zack laughed as best he could given his current state and said, "Trust me, compared to fighting the never ending G-Dorks, wheeling a flower cart around will be like a day at the spa. Besides, it gives me a chance to spend more time with you," he said a bit more tenderly as he brushed her bangs and gave her a warm hearted smile. She blushed and laughed to herself. "Oh okay, if you insist."

So the two continued picking flowers uninterrupted, when suddenly a loud rumbling sound echoed through the run down old church. Aerith looked around curiously, trying to detect the source of the sound, eventually discovering it, when she looked back at Zack and saw his face flushed with embarrassment as his stomach roared hungrily for fuel.

"Sounds like someone could use a lunch break," she said light heartedly as she jokingly poked Zack's six pack, causing him to chuckle sheepishly. "Okay, I'll admit, fighting the G-Dudes takes a bit out of me..."

Given how hard Zack had been fighting, Aerith wanted to make this special, so she decided to...
12231211111.title: An exhausted Zack stumbles into the Slums Church

12231212.content: Teenaged Zack was a bit leaner but every bit as fit and combat ready as his more experienced self. Is he going to get ripped or get soft?
12231212.title: SOLDIER Second Class!

choices: It was SOLDIER Second Class Kunsei (Zack's Best Friend)
122312121.content:
It was late into the night for SHINRA. Most of its' employees had called it a night except for the usual skeleton crew. At the bottom level of the company, was the weight room where young SOLDIER Second Class Zack Fair was training, all but alone. Zack worked his trademark squats, dozens at a time, groaning with exhaustion as he continued. Stopping for a moment, Zack wiped the heaps of sweat from his face and looked around. Noticing he was the only one in the gym, he removed his shirt and let the air conditioning waft down over his sweat covered body. He sighed with relief before sitting down on the crunch machine, and worked several sets of sit-ups, with no signs of slowing down. The young man always had plenty of energy to spare, and never tired easily, which made keeping his physique sculpture perfect was much easier for him than most of his fellow SOLDIER employees.

Finally, after he could crunch no more, Zack plopped onto the crunch bench, breathing heavily from exhaustion. His entire body ached, but it as always, it would pay off for the teen. Suddenly, someone else entered the empty gym...
122312121.title: Working up an appetite

choices: Zack finished his second plate with gusto
1223121212.content:
"Zack?" said a voice from afar. Startled, Zack almost comically flipped out of the crunch machine and stumbled onto the floor, before rising back up to his feet, relieved to see it was only his good friend and fellow Second Class recruit Kunsei.
"Oh, Kunsei! Hey dude, w-what's shaking?" Said Zack as he tried to play off his little accident. Kunsei merely laughed, then looked around the gym.
"Y'know, I didn't think the weight room was open this late. Go figure."
"Yeah, well I figure it's easier to get a proper workout this way than having to fight off 50 boneheads for a treadmill," said Zack as he grabbed his towel and wiped up. "What's up?"
"Well, I kinda wanted to thank you for saving my ass when Professor Hojo's VR Room malfunctioned. One virtual Sephiroth was bad enough, but six glitchy ones? Noooo thanks...."
Zack laughed then gave his pal a pat on the shoulder. "Don't sweat it, dude," said Zack as he grabbed his water bottle and downed it in seconds, before removing the bottle from his lips with a deep breath afterwards. Kunsei was a bit nervous to continue, but worked the courage to ask, "So, I was wondering if I could get you dinner, y'know, as thanks for your help. How about it?"
Zack glanced back at Kunsei, but before he could speak, a loud rumble emitted from Zack's stomach. Embarrassed, Zack placed his palm flat on his six pack abs and laughed, "Guess I DID kinda work up an appetite, hehe. And a free meal don't sound too bad either. But first, lemme hit up the showers. I'm kinda stinking like a wet moogle over here." The two boys laughed as Zack grabbed his duffel bag and headed for the showers.

~Afterwards~

The two took a bus from Midgar all the way to the Slums. Zack, now dressed in a black sleeveless t-shirt and green board shorts exited the bus alongside Kunsei, who was still in his SOLDIER Uniform, minus the helmet, revealing short frizzy brown hair and blue as sky Mako fused eyes, like Zack and most SOLDIER employees. "So where are we off to?" asked Zack. His answer came as the two approached a modest restaurant near the flea market called 'Desperado's All-You-Can-Eat.'
"You'll love this place, man. It's got everything and then some! Not like those crappy second hand buffets in Midgar," said Kunsei as the two entered the buffet. "Good thing it's all you can eat, cause right about now, I think I could eat an Ifrit!" said Zack as his stomach once again growled with anticipation.

As the two boys sat at their booth, Kunsei brought back a modest plate of Grilled Chicken with Green Beans and a glass of Water while Zack came back with an assortment of Steak, Stuffing, Mashed Potatoes, French Fries and Fried Chicken Nuggets all on one plate alongside a glass of coke. Kunsei was dumbstruck. "...Yoooooou realize you can make more than one trip, right...?" asked Kunsei, to which Zack laughed and said, "I'll be making plenty of trips, don't you worry, dude..." said Zack before he began to hungrily scarf down his meal. Kunsei couldn't help but watch as Zack began to clear his plate at an incredibly fast pace, and without any sign of slowly down. "Ho-ly-crap..." said Kunsei to himself as he watched his friend put away an ample meal. Kunsei had to admit, it was pretty damn impressive. Finally, Zack finished and took a deep breath before grabbing his plate and heading back for another batch of food. Finally broken from an almost trance-like state, Kunsei started eating his much leaner plate of Chicken as Zack returned with an even larger batch of assorted foods onto an even more cramped-tight plate than before. Zack licked his lips and looked down at the meal to be with a smile, "And now for round two...."

Kunsei couldn't help but resume watching his friend chow down at inhuman paces, until...
1223121212.title: Kunsei drops in

choices: And decided to spend the night.
But decided to just head home.
12231212121.content:
And with gusto, Zack had just polished off another meal for two. Licking the remaining food remnants from his fingers, Zack sighed heartily before he leaned back into his seat and rested his hands on his his stomach. As Kunsei glanced, he could see the other teen's tummy had bloated ever so slightly due to two simultaneously vast meals. "Ahhhh, you weren't kidding, Kunsei. This place ROCKS!" said Zack as he rubbed his hands over his still firm and rock hard yet vaguely extended tummy. But Kunsei could only focus on Zack as he blissfully rubbed his belly up and down. "Uh, g-glad to hear it, man," stuttered a nervous Kunsei as he proceeded to resume working on his first plate. Zack proceeded to pound his fist into his chest a few times, before working up a short but juicy burp. Kunsei laughs nervously and says, "Good one."
"I try," responds Zack before he gets up and grabs his plate yet again.

Kunsei looks up at him utterly in awe.

"You can't POSSIBLY still have room after that..." says Kunsei.
But Zack merely shrugs back at his friend and says, "Like I said, dude, I could eat an Ifrit right about now," he says with a smile before giving his belly a hearty pat and heading back for a third course. Kunsei nervously drinks his water, trying to process what was going on. Sure enough, Zack returned with even more food on his plate, and the same hungry look in his eyes.
"Oh, you can't be serious..." Kunsei says to himself before taking another bite from his chicken.
"Ladies and gentlemen, please fasten your seatbelts," said Zack to no one in particular before greedily stuffing his face with one last assortment of meat, pasta and stuffing. All the while as Zack stuffed his face, Kunsei watched Zack's stomach slowly began to extend little by little as his meal progressed. After just a few short minutes, Zack had completed his meal and decided to wash it down with the glass of coke, which he downed in just a few seconds flat. Exhausted, Zack plopped back into his seat and rested both hands on his stomach which had bloated out about three to four inches, nothing too big, but visibly noticeable.

"...So, did you enjoy your meal?" asked Kunsei sarcastically. Zack opened his mouth to reply, but what came out instead was a loud and booming belch. *BBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRP!* Laughing, Kunsei waves the air in front of him and smiles back at his friend. "I'll take that as a yes."
Zack smiled sheepishly at other patrons then covered his mouth, "Excuse me. And yes, I enjoyed my meal very, very, very, *URP*...very much."
The two boys laughed. Then Kunsei paid the bill and the two were off.

As Kunsei walks Zack to the bus stop, Zack groaned and said, "Ugh, y'know what? I'm not sure if I'm gonna make it al the way back to Sector 7." Kunsei thinks for a moment, then says, "Well, actually I live about a block from here. If you want, you could spend the night over."

Zack considered Kunsei's proposal....
12231212121.title: Zack finished his second plate with gusto

choices: ...And woke up to the smell of bacon.
122312121211.content:
"Oh dude, you're a life saver, that'd be awesome!" Zack said, mixed with excitement and utter fullness while Kunsei rubbed the back of his head nervously and laughed, "Well, technically you're the life saver. Consider this my way of meeting you half way there," he said as the two laughed and headed to his apartment.

It was a relatively small but clean place. Had a small living room, a kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom, everything a young bachelor would need in a place like Midgar. Zack promptly took off his sandals and laid down onto the couch, feet resting on the arm rest while hands rested on his groaning stomach. Kunsei looked back at him with some concern. "Are you okay?" he asked. Zack groaned but nodded.
"Ugh, yeah. Just...think I kind of overdid it back at the buffet," he said as he pressed down on his just slightly bloated stomach. Kunsei shook his head, "You THINK you overdid it...?" he scoffed, but stopped as he noticed his friend was in legitimate pain.

Thinking for a moment, Kunsei sat on his couch next to Zack. "I THINK I have a solution, but I warn you, it may be a little weird..." Kunsei says as he removes his gloves and gently pulls up the bottom of Zack's T-Shirt, exposing his smooth tan, muscular, aching belly. Zack glanced up curiously, "Rgh, what're you doing, man?" he asked. Kunsei then gently placed his palm flat atop Zack's stomach, and began rubbing in gentle, circular motions. Zack's eyes widened for a moment, then after a brief pause, he began to ease back. "Your stomach's trying to work off a much larger meal than your usual intake is used to. So this should ease the pain some of that work is causing you," Kunsei explains as he continues to stroke Zack's belly up and down in a slow, precise pattern. Zack eased greatly as he seemed to be enjoying it. "Y'know what? That actually...feels amazing....!" Zack says as Kunsei smiles and continues.

As little as he was willing to admit, the feel of Zack's smooth abs against his hand was a pleasurable experience for Kunsei as well. This moment of tranquility was interrupted as another loud belch emerged from Zack's mouth. *BBBBRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRP!* Zack's burp extended for several seconds before it unwinded, causing Kunsei to laugh as Zack sighed with relief. "Ugh, sorry about that," Zack responded, but Kunsei smiled, patting Zack's belly assuring. "That's only normal. In the process of easing the pain, the rubbing is also working up some of the excess gas that's stuck in your stomach," Kunsei responded. "Besides, what are you apologizing for? It's not like you're shy about it at HQ. I remember one time in the lobby, you burped so loud, the front desk lady thought Hojo's lab blew up again!" Kunsei says, as the two boys laugh again. "Which was all natural, for the record!" said a slightly less pained Zack. Suddenly a loud bubbling began to brew from within his stomach as he and Kunsei both looked down at his bloated gut, "Speaking of which, you might wanna hold onto something, because I feel a biiiiiig one coming up, man," he said almost nervously. Suddenly Kunsei got an idea, "Here, when you're ready, I'm gonna push down as hard as I can. Ready?" Zack paused for a moment, then said, "Ready!" With that, Kunsei knedded deep into Zack's bloated abdomen, the resulting rush of air was massive and lengthy.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*{/u }

Zack's burp extended close to ten seconds straight, growing with bass and volume the whole way before it came to an end. The two boys paused for a moment, then broke into a fit of laughter. "I officially declare you; Zack Fair, best burper of Midgar!" Kunsei said mockingly as he gave Zack's bare belly a congratulatory pat. "Ahhh, I'm still nowhere near the same league as Angeal, but thanks anyway," Zack said as he sat up and pressed his hand against his stomach, "Y'know, I think those fingers of yours are magic, cause my stomach doesn't hurt at all anymore." he went on. Kunsei shrugged and headed for his room, "I try. Anyway, it's getting late. Lemme grab you a spare blanket and you can sleep on the couch. Sound good?" Zack merely yawned from exhaustion and nodded.

Later into the night, Zack was laying on the coach, hand rested atop his stomach, which seemed to be back to normal. However, as Zack lifted his up shirt and pressed onto his bare stomach, he noticed his abs had slightly less definition to them, feeling a bit softer than he was accustom. But he was still far too full to care, and promptly went to sleep...
122312121211.title: Tummy rub for Zack

choices: Zack raides the fridge and eats in peace.
1223121212111.content:
*RRUUUUUUUUUUUMMMMMBLEEE*

The loud noise startles Zack in the middle of his rest, causing him to stumble comically out of the couch like he before, until rising to his feet and resting a palm on his stomach.
There is LITERALLY no way I could possibly still be hungry after all that! I mean, what the hell!" he yelled silently so as not to wake up Kunsei. But his stomach would not let up. So finally, Zack shrugged and glanced back at Kunsei's bedroom to make sure he was still asleep. "I guess maybe a LITTLE midnight snack wouldn't hurt..." Zack thought, until approaching and raiding the fridge.

Upon doing so...
1223121212111.title: ...When suddenly his stomach growled again.

choices: Kunsei entered the room for a glass of milk.
12231212121111.content:
"Man, can't believe I'm still not tapped out from that buffet," thought Zack as he carried several Tupperware bowls from Kunsei's fridge and with a gallon of milk and a cup. "Let's see what's behind door number one," said Zack as he opened the first plastic container, only to find rotten fish inside. Zack's face went green as he begin to feel nauseated from the horrid smell, before immediately shutting it and throwing it back into the fridge. "Okay, second time's the charm.....right?" Zack said nervously as he hesitated before opening the second container. Sure enough, a few steaks and some fries. Smelled decent enough, so it was probably safe to eat. Zack smiled as he tossed the meal onto a plate and into the microwave, watching and waiting eagerly before canceling the heat just a second before it would have gone off and beeped aloud throughout the tiny apartment.

Placing the plate onto the table, he poured himself a glass of milk and dug right in, eating the steak with his bare hands rather than traditional fork and knife. The steak tasted thick and juicy, each bite was better than the last. As he ate, Zack rested his free hand down to his stomach, feeling its' current softness expand as more and more meat traveled downward into it. Around two steaks in, Zack downed his glass of milk and leaned back in the chair, sighing contently as he massaged his once again bloated midsection from under his shirt, exposing his more noticeably stuffed tummy. Zack brought his fist to his lips and muffled an upcoming burp in an effort to keep quiet. The sound of the burp reverberating through his cheeks was still pretty loud, but much quieter than the alternative. Giving his belly a good pat, he glanced back down at the remaining steak and fries and resumed his late-course meal.

Just then...
12231212121111.title: Zack raides the fridge and eats in peace.

122312121211111.content:
Zack continued to greedily gorge down Kunsei's leftover meals, when suddenly a groggy yet familiar face approached the scene. Kunsei, dressed only in a black undershirt and striped boxers, rubbed his eyes before standing nearby and watching Zack continue to feast. A few moments passed before Zack finally noticed his friend, and, like the first two times prior, was startled out of his seat, as Kunsei laughed quietly from how tired he was.

Nervous, Zack said, "Kuh-Kunsei! Umm, w-what're you doing up?" Kunsei stares curiously then says, "With all the commotion earlier, I forgot to have my bedtime cup of milk. So....having fun?"
"Dude, I'm so sorry, I know I shouldn't be going through your fridge, it's just that-" but Kunsei held his hand up, halting his explanation as he sat down next to Zack. "Hey, mi casa es su casa, pal." Kunsei responded. Zack tilted his head curiously.
"You sure?"
"Look, if you're hungry enough to be gorging THIS late into the night, then absolutely."

Zack brushed the back of his head embarrassed and looked away. "Honestly, I don't know WHY I'm so hungry. I just...AM!" he said, almost ashamed.
"Really, it's fine. Besides, you're my guest, and I believe in being a good host." After a moment, Zack looked back at the other boy and smiled, then proceeded to get to work on the last two steaks. As he did, Kunsei got up and reached for the milk on the table, pouring himself a glass. As he drank, he glanced back down at Zack's tummy, which, shockingly, had bloated outward quite noticeably, at least 5 inches, enough to lift the bottom of Zack's undershirt up ever so slightly, exposing his bare stomach just below his belly button. Kunsei was so distracted, he hadn't realized he was still drinking his milk and accidentally choked down the cold drink in one gulp, coughing violently as he finished.

Zack stopped eating and looked back up at Kunsei. "You okay, dude?" Coughing, Kunsei nodded, pounding his chest a couple times before letting out a surprisingly loud burp. Sighing with relief, Kunsei plopped into his seat next to Zack as he glanced at him rather impressed. "Nice one, man!" Kunsei blushes then shakes his head, "Still nothing compared to one of yours, dude." Zack shrugged and resumed eating. Kunsei continued to watch as Zack's belly slowly pushed outward with each chunk of steak. Finally, after some time, all the leftover steaks had been consumed along with the fries. Zack was slouching back in his seat, a bloated mess. His stomach bulged outward a good 6 inches as he rested both hands atop it, in utter bliss. "Ohhh man, am I stuffed..." Zack said as he glanced down at his bloated gut. Smiling, Kunsei gave Zack's belly a few hearty pats and said, "Glad everything was to your liking, champ." Zack burped loudly from the patting and said, "Ohhh, *UUUUURRRRRRRRP!* dude. Sorry to ask, but, umm..... do you think you could give my belly a little rub like before?" Kunsei glanced back at him, unsure what to say. Zack looked away, blushing, "I know this sounds weird, but when you did it last time, it felt, like, REALLY good. Don't make me beg..." Zack said, almost mock pouting, and giving Kunsei his trademark puppy dog eyes. Kunsei laughed, then reached for Zack's middle, until Zack leaned forward and removed his shirt completely. "This outta make it a little easier. I-I mean, if you don't mind, of course!" Zack said, flustered. Kunsei blushed harder as he looked down at Zack's chiseled body, and stretched out and bloated abdomen. "I don't mind at all, heh..." Kunsei said as he placed his hand on Zack's taut flesh, and like before, rubbed in slow, circular motions. Zack moaned with delight as Kunsei's touch eased a lot of the pressure building in his stomach. "Ohhh, *uuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrp* duuuude, that feels *bbbrrrraaaaap* amazing!" Zack said between burps. Kunsei merely smiled and continued to work his magic...
122312121211111.title: Kunsei entered the room for a glass of milk.

choices: Sure enough, there was an entire Liter of Ginger Ale!
122312121211112.content:
As Zack rushed through several fries at once, his stomach let out a violent gurgling sound, causing him to stop mid bite and slouch forward, clutching his slightly bloated stomach in pain. "Rgh, what the hell...?" was all Zack could mutter before an overwhelming pain surged through his swollen gut. Zack winced in immense pain as he rested back in his seat. Sweating heavily, he rubbed his stomach gently, hoping to coax this bout of indigestion, but the painfully acidic gurgles continued to emanate from his belly. Bringing his fist to his mouth, Zack muffled another loud burp, followed by another, and another, with each one getting harder and harder to keep down.

His belly quaked furiously, Zack was expecting another burp, but instead he actually lurched forward, feeling bile rise up his throat. Covering his mouth and trying to maintain himself, and trying so quietly, he felt like he wanted to cry from how painful it all was. Until he recalled his youth, and how whenever he got fierce indigestion, (which was often), his mom would make him drink Ginger Ale to coax his aching tummy. So Zack got up and browsed Kunsei's fridge, hoping to find some Ginger Ale...
122312121211112.title: Indigestion

choices: To take his chances and down the Ginger Ale.
1223121212111121.content:
As he desperately and quietly searched, he managed to stumble across an entire liter of untouched Ginger Ale just waiting to be downed. "Score!" Zack thought to himself as he smiled and quickly cracked the top open, shutting it immediately after opening it, so as to keep the carbonation leak quiet. After a few seconds, he was able to pop the top off in peace as he poured himself a nice, fizzy cup. He readied to take a hearty gulp, but stopped, as he remembered something else. "Waaaaait a minute, if I drink this, I'll be burping up a storm...aaaaaaand if I do that, I'll probably wake Kunsei up..."

But as he pondered an alternative, quieter solution to his tummy problems, his stomach once again emitted a vicious gurgling, causing the boy to wince in pain yet again. So, at that moment, he decided...
1223121212111121.title: Sure enough, there was an entire Liter of Ginge...

12231212121112.content:
Kunsei meanwhile, was resting peacefully in his bedroom, until the sound of rustling from the kitchen woke him. Groaning, he rubbed his eyes and rose from his bed. "Rgh, what is that...?" he said to himself as he groggily stepped from his bedroom and to the living room. Sure enough, he saw Zack searching the fridge. He stared almost blank eyed for a moment, then cleared his throat to get his attention. Startled, Zack fumbled to put everything back in its' place then slammed the fridge shut, then, like a child, smiled wide and innocently.

"Uhhh, h-hi!" said Zack. Kunsei simply stared for a moment before asking, "So I see your stomach is better now."
"Ummm, y-yup! All better!" he said happily as he gave his stomach a firm pat before glancing at the fridge, then back at Kunsei. "Look, I know it's late, and I'm really sorry I woke you-"
"Don't sweat it. I've actually been meaning to clean the fridge out for a while," said Kunsei as he stepped towards the fridge. "I probably won't have time to eat a lot of this stuff anyway, and when I do, it'll just go bad. So no harm putting it to use." He opened the fridge and looked around. "Let's see what we got in stock for ya," he said as Zack sat down and said, "Oh, dude, you've already done plenty, you don't need to-"
"Trust me, it'd be my pleasure," Kunsei responded. Zack merely shrugged, too hungry to really respond with anything else.

After a while of watching Kunsei cook whatever seemed edible, Zack's stomach began to growl hungrily with anticipation. He clutched his once again thin but softer tummy and licked his lips, "Everything smells great, dude!" he said as Kunsei smiled back and began to stack everything onto some paper plates. "Welcome to Kunsei's All-You-Can-Eat. Tonight, we've got some Beef Ramen, some rotisserie chicken, shrimp dumplings, and Cajun Sausage. And of course, for some late night sweets, we've got a few Rice Balls, and a slice of Chocolate Moose. To wash it all down, we've got Ginger Ale, Milk and Sparkling Water. Please, help yourself," he closed his little speech as Zack marveled at what legitimately looked like Restaurant Grade food laid before him. He glanced back at Kunsei, "Dude, you are the MAN!" he shouted before digging into the Sausage. Chewing, he glanced back at his friend, then, after a hearty gulp, asked "Aren't you gonna eat too?" Kunsei shook his head, "I typically don't eat too late, plus I don't mind just watching. It's kind of intriguing." Kunsei said. Zack wasn't sure what to make of that, but simply shrugged it off and went to town on his meal.

Kunsei watched in marvel as Zack's stomach began to expand once again from ingesting so much in so little time. Finishing the Cajun Sausage, Zack moved onto the dumplings, but paused for a moment, to let out a huge burp.

*BBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRP!* "Whew, that tasted spicy!" laughed Zack as he slapped his belly heartily before rubbing it up and down. After a few minutes of rubbing and burping, Zack continued his meal with the dumplings. After every few, his belly began to bulge a little more outward, until all were gone. He then took the bowl of Beef Ramen to his lips and began slurping the whole thing down into his gullet, which was expanding outward even further, to the point where his sleeveless t-shirt began to ride up, exposing just the near bottom of his stomach.

Upon completion, Zack placed the bowl aside and sighed with relief as he leaned back in his chair, placing both hands atop his bloated belly. "Ohhhh man, I-am-STUFFED..." moaned Zack as he caressed his stomach. Kunsei was admiring Zack's bloated midsection, how it pushed outward so vastly. Zack had really put in his money's worth. Kunsei sat next to Zack and poured him a glass of Ginger Ale. "Here, this'll help ease your stomach," said Kunsei as he offered Zack the glass. Taking it, he gulped the beverage down in a matter of seconds. Zack felt a vicious rumbling from his stomach, and immediately opened his mouth,

*HHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUPPPP!*

Zack's disgustingly loud belch extended several seconds, and smelled of Cajun spices. As it finished, Kunsei laughed, then said, "Damn. GOOD one, man!" he said. Zack merely smiled and burped again, causing the two to laugh.

Glancing back down at his bloated stomach, then back at the table, which still had some desert left, Zack decided to...
12231212121112.title: Kunsei wakes up and cooks for Zack.

choices: The two finish up and head out for the day.
1223121212112.content:
Night turned to day as Zack slept like a log atop Kunsei's couch. The sizzle of a frying pan sent a lifting aroma wafting over near Zack, who; in his sleep, sniffed the delicious scent and woke up on the spot. He slowly rose from his spot on the couch and spotted Kunsei, dressed in casual attire, frying up some breakfast. Kunsei glanced back at Zack and smiled before shifting his attention back to his stove. "Heeeeeey, rise and shine, Sleeping Beauty," he said as he flipped a few pancakes from a separate pan. Zack rose to his feet, yawning, still a mess in comparison to his friend. "What's all this, dude?" Zack asked, groggily. "Well, I figured before you headed out, I'd make a little breakfast to send you on your way," said Kunsei.

Yawning again, Zack nodded and scratched his stomach sleepily. He then stopped, a tad more wide eyed as something seemed strange. He turned away from Kunsei and lifted his shirt up, examining his abdominals more thoroughly. His stomach was no longer bloated and his abs were still visibly present, but they felt softer and looked softer; with less definition. "Wow, guess I really did overdo it last night," he said a tad embarrassed. "But maaaaaan, was it worth it," he decided, giving his abs a hearty slap, before turning back to Kunsei. "Breakfast, huh? Sounds and smells great, thank you!" said Zack, to which Kunsei nodded and said, "Ah, think nothing of it, pal."

Some time later, Zack washed up, using Kunsei's spare toothbrushes and deodorant, before sitting back at the table as Kunsei served up two plates of Flapjacks, bacon and scrambled eggs. "Jeez, I can't even remember the last time I had Flapjacks. You're something else, y'know that, Kunsei?"
"So I've been told, heh. Welp, bon appetit!" said Kunsei, marking that breakfast was indeed served. Zack scarfed down his food happily, enjoying every bit of it. "Mmm, MAN this stuff tastes great!" said Zack as he consumed his meal. "I'm glad ya like it, Champ," said Kunsei as he smirked and took a bite of eggs, "but you might wanna slow down. Don't wanna eat too fast and get another bellyache, right?" he said as his friend continued to scarf down his meal as though it would be his last. Still, admittedly, he thought Zack's tummy troubles last night were quite adorable, and he rather enjoyed helping him cope through it...
1223121212112.title: ...And woke up to the smell of bacon.

12231212121122.content:
After finishing a hearty breakfast, both Zack and Kunsei headed out towards the bus stop. Zack was still licking his lips. "Dude, all I'm saying is if you can turn scrambled eggs into THAT? Then you outta have your own restaurant," said Zack as he slapped his belly in appreciation. As he did, he glanced down curiously. All this binge eating had taken a surprising toll on Zack's perfect physique, as his stomach had softened quite a considerable amount, and even stuck out an inch or two more than usual.

"Holy crap. Dude, is it me or have I put on a couple pounds?" Asked Zack. Kunsei glanced at Zack's midsection. It was indeed noticeably different. He poked Zack's stomach, and it no longer had that hard feeling to it, nor was it concave any longer, but instead flat and much softer than usual.

Yeah, I'd say you've been overdoing it a bit since last night," said Kunsei, who continued, "Still, I mean you work hard for SOLDIER. If anyone's earned a little overindulgence time, it's you."
"I DO work hard..." Zack said, pondering his situation, "and considering how extensively I work out, I'll be back to normal in like a week TOPS!"

Zack rested his hand dead center on his stomach and smirked. "And truth be told," he said before gesturing to his stomach, "this actually kinda feels good. Eating til my gut's on the verge of exploding, resting it off, and eating some more. If I'm just gonna work it all off when work starts again, no reason I can't enjoy this a little while longer, right?"
"Exactly! We still got a few days off, why not enjoy them to their...fullest?" Kunsei said, giving Zack's softer belly a light pat. Zack raised an eyebrow.
"Do you feel good about that pun?"
"....Shut up."

Zack shook his head and laughed, Kunsei eventually joined in, though still a little embarrassed, then asked, "So where do you wanna go from here?"

Zack thought for a moment...
12231212121122.title: The two finish up and head out for the day.

choices: "I could go for some more hotdogs."
"Let's see what other eats they got."
122312121211221.content:
The bus dropped the boys off to the sunny pier, just by the beach, where not too many patrons were present. Feeling the sun bake his body, Zack removed his shirt and exposed his muscular torso to the hot sun. Kunsei glanced and saw that Zack's abs had indeed softened a considerable amount, and that his stomach had expanded maybe an inch or two forward since last night. Zack stretched his arms up and yawned as he looked around the pier. "Guess it's still pretty early for most folks, huh?" said Zack.

Kunsei simply nodded, then began to sweat from the merciless sun. "Jeez, apparently not early enough for the sun though. Can't believe how hot it is!" he said, wiping the already forming sweat from his forehead. He then removed his own shirt, exposing his also muscular but much less tone and far more pale body to Zack, who glanced back and raised his eyebrows. "Dude, you REALLY need to start going out in the daylight more." he said, causing Kunsei to flush with embarrassment as he wrapped his arms around his torso, but Zack simply chuckled and said, "Oh come on, dude, I'm just messing with you, don't worry about it." Considering it, Kunsei eased up as the two headed towards the beach.

As the two bare chested boys walked along the sand, a loud grumble caught their attention. Looking down, Kunsei laughed at and said, "That didn't take long." Smirking, Zack patted his bare stomach and and said, "Nope, sure didn't." He then spotted a Hot Dog vendor alongside the beach and nudged Kunsei. "Wanna grab a quick bite?" asked Zack. Kunsei's stomach also growled surprisingly as he clutched it, blushing. Zack laughed, "I'll take that as a yes." So the two ordered extra large hot dogs and Cokes, then sat by the water, chowing down. Zack finished first obviously, but surprisingly Kunsei wasn't too far behind. Finished, Kunsei leaned back, resting his hand on his stomach. "Man, that was actually pretty filling," said Kunsei, but Zack shrugged and responded, "Eh, whatever you say, Light weight." Zack then proceeded to gulp down his soda rather quickly.

Kunsei mock laughed then took a sip of his own drink. Taking his drink aside, Kunsei let out a small burp then covered his mouth, "Pardon me," he said, as Zack raised his eyebrow, clearly unimpressed. "Pfft. Weak." He said before continuing with, "Come on, you can do better than THAT, right?" Kunsei shrugged then took a heartier drink of his soda. Finishing, he sighed heartily then rested one hand on his stomach, pushing out a slightly louder burp, but still nothing special. Kunsei shrugged then said, " *URP* That's all I got left. I'm not as good at this as you are, what can I say?" Zack scoffed then said, "Here, lemme show you how a real man burps." He then pounded his chest a few times and let out a much louder belch.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!* Upon completion, Zack smacked his lips and gave his slightly more bloated stomach a pat, letting out a smaller but relatively juicy afterburp. He then glanced back at the vendor from afar...
122312121211221.title: To the Pier

choices: ...He too, wanted to gain with Zack.
...Zack was right, best stick to the sidelines.
1223121212112211.content:
"Y'know, I could actually go for some more hotdogs, how about you?" asked Zack. Kunsei rubbed his stomach, still full from his first one, but simply nodded so Zack wouldn't have to eat alone. Zack then came back with another pair of footlongs with two drinks a piece, handing Kunsei his dog and his soda while he plopped back down on the sand and immediately began chowing down on his dog. "Mmmmm, MAN these bad boys taste great!" Zack said between bites. Kunsei took his first bite, and already was feeling absolutely full. His stomach was substantially smaller than Zack's, so ingesting so much so quickly wasn't something Kunsei was used to at all.

Half way into his hot dog, Kunsei glanced groggily as Zack had just finished consuming his. Smacking his lips, he gave his slightly more bloated stomach a hearty slap, before rubbing it in satisfaction. "Oh man, that tasted great." He then glanced back at Kunsei who was still struggling with the remainder of his hotdog. "How you holding up, dude?" asked Zack. Kunsei groggily looked back at Zack, then stopped, lowering his hotdog and clutching onto his bare stomach with his free hand as he felt a painful rumbling emit from within himself. Zack looked at his friend with concern. "Hey, y-you alright, man?"
Kunsei looked quite green around the gills, as if he were about to vomit profusely. Suddenly his cheeks bulged and his eyes widened as Zack inched away, preparing for the worst. But what exited Kunsei's mouth instead wasn't his meal, but instead a shockingly loud:

*BBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPP!*

Kunsei burped louder than he'd ever burped before. After several loud and bassy seconds, Kunsei's mouth shut, leaving him staring blankly as Zack burst into hysterical laughter. "HAHAHAHAHA!! Dude! NICE!" congratulated Zack as Kunsei just sat there in shock.
"Ho-ly-crap.....w-was that ME....?!" Kunsei asked, legitimately stunned by his gassy eruption. Zack was still catching his breath. Kunsei then glanced down on his stomach, and sure enough, the pain and excess pressure was gone. "Huh....guess I've got room afterall," he said with a shrug, and promptly went back to finishing the rest of his hotdog. Sighing with relief, Kunsei patted his stomach, then stopped suddenly and glanced down. Much to his surprise, it seems his stomach had bloated just slightly by an inch or two from consuming two footlong hotdogs in such short a time. Looking down, Zack poked his friend in the stomach and laughed. "Haha, careful dude. You keep that up, and it won't be long before you're at my level," he slapped his belly to illustrate his point.

Kunsei pondered that, deciding...
1223121212112211.title: "I could go for some more hotdogs."

choices: Another restaurant or buffet for both to eat at.
12231212121122111.content:
"You know what?" Kunsei started, "I think I WOULD like that..."
"Like what?" asked Zack as he started sipping his drink.
"Getting in on this eating fun. I mean, all this time, I've been watching and enjoying from the sidelines and helping you out along the way, but I think I'd like to help and get in on it too."
"You sure? It's gonna be harder to work off for you than it is for me."
"Maybe I won't want to work it off."

Zack stared back at him curiously. "Why work it off when it feels so good?" Kunsei asked. Zack considered that question, never really thought of it before. "Yeah, but...I kinda HAVE to..." said Zack. "As awesome as this feels, I can't really expect to be the hero of Midgar if I'm too stuffed to fight the bad guys, right?"
"I suppose..." said Kunsei as he massaged his firm but slightly bloated stomach. "...STILL, no reason we can't enjoy ourselves the max while we can, right?"
Zack smiled and winked back at his friend, "Damn straight."

In the midst of massaging his stuffed tummy, Kunsei worked up yet another gas bubble, which he promptly felt rising up his throat.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLCCCCCCHH HHH!*

Kunsei's burp lasted several seconds, almost matching one of Zack's in volume and length. After several seconds, both boys laughed. "You're getting pretty good at that, dude." said Zack. Kunsei simply smiled and started taking a drink of his own soda, then said "Honestly, I've never burped that loud before. Didn't realize how fun it was! OR how good it feels..." Upon finishing his drink, Kunsei tossed his cup into the trash and pressed on his bare stomach, pushing out some smaller but wet burps immediately after.

Zack raised an eyebrow, then tossed his drink aside as well. "Still...." Zack started, "...just make sure you remember who the REAL champ is..." he then sucked in a large amount of air, and immediately pushed out a massive

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!*

Zack belched a monstrous belch right in Kunsei's face, blowing his brown hair back, and forcing him to wince from the stench of Zack's previous meals wafting over his face at once. As Zack's burp ended, he grinned toothily at Kunsei who laughed and coughed, waving the air around his face away. "Ugh, how on earth could I possibly forget NOW...?" said Kunsei, causing both boys to laugh.

At this point, the two got up and headed towards...
12231212121122111.title: ...He too, wanted to gain with Zack.

choices: Let's clean the fridge out completely!
122312121211221112.content:
Later in the day, both boys return to Kunsei's apartment, still shirtless and in their beach shorts, with an extra large pizza and two separate liters of cola. Zack plopped back down on the couch, as Kunsei placed the pizza down on the table. Having baked in the sun all day gave the young man a bit of a full body tan. Zack looked down at Kunsei's stomach and noticed that it had deflated almost back to normal, while his own had only stuck out just a few inches. He prodded at his stomach and sure enough, it felt much softer than before. His abs barely visible, now layered under softer flesh.

"Looks like I'm making progress," Zack said with a smile as he slapped his stomach in satisfaction a few times. Kunsei smirked at him then felt his much harder and firm stomach, then said, "Hopefully I'll be saying the same after this." Zack flipped from the couch and sat down at the table with Kunsei as both boys began digging into the pizza. "Mmmm, who'd have guessed BBQ Chocobo pizza could taste so good?" said Kunsei as he finished his first slice. Zack had already moved onto his third as he hungrily devoured his meal. Upon finishing his third slice, Zack moved onto his third, but before taking it to his lips, needed to stop for a second as a look of discomfort grew over his face, which Kunsei caught as he consumed his second slice. "Mmmphhf, something wrong?" said Kunsei between bites, but Zack didn't respond. Instead, he thumped his upper stomach a few times and pushed out a loud burp.

*UUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRP!*

"Ahhhh, not anymore," responded Zack before patting his belly and getting to work on slice number four.

After finishing a few slices, Kunsei grabbed his liter of cola and began downing it directly from the bottle. After reaching all the way down to the label, his stomach began to push into his swim trunks. As soon as he removed the bottle from his lips, Kunsei burped loudly, then held his hand forward in a "wait a second" fashion. He began thumping his chest a few times, pushing out a few small burps, but still had a look of dissatisfaction on his face. Zack recognized it, and smirked. "Here, allow me," said Zack as he got up and approached Kunsei. He then placed his palm dead center on Kunsei's bloated belly, and pushed down, forcing out a mammoth sized belch.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP!!*

Extending several seconds, Kunsei had to catch his breath after that large and sudden eruption. *urrrrrrrp* "Thanks, man," said Kunsei before getting back to work on pizza. In a matter of time, both boys had completely demolished the extra large pizza, and were now slumped in their chairs, utterly stuffed to the brim.

Zack groaned in discomfort before unbuttoning his board shorts. The result caused his belly to seep forward several inches as he caressed it with one hand. Kunsei, meanwhile, was massaging his aching and bloated tummy as it stuck out quite some inches as well, but nowhere near as far as many as Zack's. Both boys just sat there, rubbing their bloated bellies, letting out moans of satisfaction or the occasional wet burps here and there.

Finally, Kunsei got an idea...
122312121211221112.title: Kunsei's apartment.

1223121212112211121.content:
"Oh man, that tasted great...I almost couldn't eat another bite..." said Zack as he rubbed his distended middle. Kunsei glanced for a moment and said, "So you wouldn't be down with a little chugging contest then?"
Zack scoffed and said, "I said almost, smartass. Not that it would be fair, you already drank yours down to the label. I haven't even opened mine."

Smirking, Kunsei rose from his seat, one hand rested on his bare still slightly bloated stomach, and browsed in his fridge, pulling out another liter of unopened cola and sat back down across from Zack, who nodded and grabbed his liter. "Okay, Light weight. Let's see what you got..."

Within seconds, both youths had screwed their tops open and immediately began chugging down their fizzy beverages. Both gulped at rapid paces, reaching the labels at around the same time. Kunsei's eyes began to water from all the carbonation being ingested at once, before removing his lips from the bottle about 40% down. Upon catching his breath, Kunsei burped loudly several times one after the other, while Zack continued downing his at a slower rate. Burping again, Kunsei looked down at his stomach, seeing that it had bloated outward a considerable amount since their contest began. Pausing to finish catching his breath, Kunsei once again brought his beverage to his lips.

Getting to around 60%, Zack finally stopped, belching enormously several times almost immediately after taking the bottle from his lips.

The carbonated beverage combined with his previous meals had expanded Zack's belly outward by about 10 inches even, making him appear pregnant as he rested his free hand atop his bare, vastly bloated middle, pushing down on it hard to coax out some even louder belches and free his belly up of some of the immensely building pressure from within.

*BBBBRRRRAAAAAAAP!* *BBBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRP!* *HHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!* "Hehehe...*urp*, feel like giving *UUUUUUUUUUUPPPPP*, yet?" asked Zack between burps. Kunsei continued to chug profusely, until Zack got an idea. Placing his cola on the table, Zack took both hands and shook his bloated belly up profusely, shaking up all the gas building inside himself violently. Just then, Zack leaned in front of Kunsei and let rip his nastiest and perhaps loudest belch yet.

*bbBbBbbbBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPppPpPPPpPpPPpPPpPppPpPPPPPPPP!!!!!!*

The massive 12 second eruption caused Kunsei to choke and gag mid sip, forcing him to stop and cough from the stench. Coughing, Kunsei turned back to Zack and shouted between coughs, "Zack, you ass!" Laughing, Zack leaned back, patting his belly and responded with, "Heeeeey, all's fair in love and drinking contests, right?" Before he resumed drinking. Glancing back at him, Kunsei smirked, feeling an immense amount of pressure building within his own bloated stomach, and in a mirrored chain of events, let rip an equally rank belch right in Zack's face mid-drink.

*HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP P!*

The almost as lengthy but equally disgusting belch in his face forced Zack to stop drinking as well, coughing and laughing from the stench. "Ugh, okay fair enough, we'll play fair from here on, deal?" Kunsei was about to say deal, but the carbonation forced him to burp a *DDDDDEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAALLLLPPPP* instead, causing both boys to laugh. After a little while of catching their breath, the two resumed their contest. Both chugged vigorously, stopping only to catch their breath and let out the occasional monstrous belch, but in the end, the victor was...
1223121212112211121.title: Chugging contest!

choices: Kunsei runs to his toilet and throws up.
Kunsei lets out the biggest burp Zack's ever heard.
12231212121122111211.content:
The two continued to chug vigorously, but after some time, Kunsei and his much smaller stomach could no longer keep pace against Zack and his bloated keg. Pulling back from his beverage, Kunsei coughed violently while Zack continued to gulp down more and more of his carbonated beverage, inflating his abdomen gradually with each gulp until finally, Zack pulled the bottle from his lips and flipped it upside down. Not a single drop left.
"And that, as they say, is that..." said Zack as he tossed the bottle aside and leaned back in his chair, one hand rested atop his bloated belly. Kunsei, still exhausted, clutched his still firm but pretty bloated gut in discomfort as he winced in pain then burped very loudly. Zack being Zack, of course, smirked and saw his opportunity to one up his friend. With a single thump across his belly, Zack let rip an enormous two-parter, which damn near deafened Kunsei.

*BBBBBBBBBRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*-*BEEEEEEELLLLL LLLLLLLLLCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHH!!!!*

After several seconds passed, Zack smacked his lips then patted his belly victoriously. "Ey, I've seen you's two 'round before, haven't I?" he asked. Zack and Kunsei just glanced at each other curiously, as neither recalled meeting this guy before. Then, as if a light bulb had gone off in his head, he snapped his fingers. "Oh yeah! Soldier! You boys're wit Soldier, right?"

Both boys eyes lit up with excitement. Though Kunsei wasn't too hungry after those hotdogs, he'd never say no to a free burger. Zack meanwhile, glanced at the menu up top and asked, "What's like the biggest burger you guys got here?"

The older man glanced fora moment, then reluctantly said, "Uhhh, well dat'd be the Triple Decker Belly Bustuh. A full pound'uh meat slabbed on sour dough bread, with grilled onions, secret sauce, lettuce, pickles, tomatoes, and'uh side fries. You sure you wanna take her on though, kid? As with before, Zack's bare stomach growled audibly as he smirked, placed a hand atop it and said with a wink, "Trust me. Oh, and two sodas please!"

So the two sat at a table outside, alone, with the sun setting over the ocean. T'was a pretty remarkable sight for so early in the morning. "Man, sure is a nice day today, huh?" said Kunsei. Taking a massive first bite, Zack moaned in ecstasy at the burst of flavors. He then took another massive bite, and another, and another. Kunsei glared back at him wide eyed. Zack blushed a bit and resumed, saying "You've always been a really nice dude, really easy to talk to, never judgemental, and you care about people. That's more than most folks can say."
A beat passed, then Kunsei smiled, almost teary eyed. Zack smiled back and resumed to say, "and if you wanna know the truth? I like this little stuffing thing we've got going, and how great you are at helping along the way. It's...well, pretty fun! And speaking of fun..."

*BBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*< br />
Instead of Zack kissing Kunsei, he accidentally let rip a monstrous belch right in his face, blowing his hair back and spraying his face with the odor of Zack's gargantuan meal of the day. As it finally winded down, Zack's eyes widened terrified as he reeled back, horrified. "Oh my God, I'm-I'm so sorry, Kunsei! I-I didn't mean to-"

Kunsei then began to burst out laughing, cutting Zack's apology short as he glanced curiously at his friend who was now applauding him. "That was fantastic!" said Kunsei, confusing Zack to no end. "What...?" was all Zack could ask in his confused state. "...b-but we were being open and I just, totally ruined the moment..."
"Ruined the moment?" asked Kunsei with an eyebrow raised, before shaking his head and following with, "no, you made the moment, man. That burp was amazing!"
"But I, literally, smacked you in the face with it!" responded Zack, which Kunsei nodded to, before leaning closer to Zack.
"That you did, and guess what? It was incredibly sexy. I told you already how much I loved how awesome your burps are, what'd you think I meant?"

Eventually Zack managed to put two and two together, as he nodded slowly then smirked. "Well, glad you liked it then," Zack said with a chuckle as Kunsei pulled him closer by the shoulder with one hand, and used the other to massage all over Zack's bloated belly. "Is there any more where that came from?" asked Kunsei hopeful. Zack laughed then took a deep gulp of air, before thumping against his chest a few times, pushing out another loud belch right in Kunsei's face. *UUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRP!* "Oh don't you worry, dude, there's boat loads more where that came from," responded Zack between burps. The next while was spent with Kunsei nudging and massaging Zack's belly, forcing out the occasional monstrous belch from Zack, much to Kunsei's pleasure.

After some time, Zack finally just glanced down at his stomach, and was finally able to marvel at how vastly expanded it had become in the day of gorging on so many wonderful meals at once. "Wow, I really did pack it on today, didn't I...?" said Zack in almost awe, as he spent most of the day gorging, not actually seeing the extent of its' labor. Kunsei simply smiled and nodded, patting Zack's belly comforting. "That you did, Zack, that you did..." responded Kunsei as he also marveled at Zack's bulging midsection.
"Kinda makes me wonder what tomorrow's got in store..."
"Well, the night is still young, right....?"
122312121211221211112111.title: The boys head back to Kunsei's apartment.

1223121212112212111121111.content:
After a hearty power sleep on the couch, Zack woke up the next morning and yawned greatly, reaching up towards the sky before groggily resting his hands on his previously gorged stomach. Feeling his stomach, Zack could sense it had softened immensely. Looking down, he saw that there was no longer any visible muscle definition to his stomach, but rather a solid layer of soft flesh.
