His stomach itself had softened and gotten rather pudgy since the gorging began, now naturally just sticking out a few inches on its' own. "Wow, I really put down my money's worth, didn't I..." Zack said to no one in particular as he yawned again and groggily scratched his shirtless torso as he rose from the sofa and headed to the bathroom.

After washing up and brushing his teeth, Zack stepped onto the scale to see the damage. Before all this, he was a solid 125 lbs of all muscle, but as it stood now, Zack weighed in at around 155 lbs. "Dude, around 30 pounds in just two days? Am I the man or am I the man?" he said as he slapped his pudgier belly in congratulations to himself. "Let's see how much further we can take this..." he said as his tummy gave a hungry rumbling.

"That's the spirit!" he said, laughing as he slapped his gut heartily and got dressed in a separate pair of board shorts and a sleeveless T-Shirt from his favorite band. As he stepped out, Kunsei groggily emerged from his bedroom, dressed in nothing but his shorts as he yawned and rubbed his eyes. "Mmmm, g'morning..." muttered a half-awake Kunsei as he brushed back his messy brown hair. Chuckling, Zack smiled back at his friend and said, "Good morning to you too, sunshine. Dude, you gotta check this out!" responded Zack as he lifted up his shirt, exposing his pudgier abdomen to Kunsei. Rubbing his eyes, Kunsei observed, and was quite astonished at how quick Zack's gorging was effecting his body. "Goodness, all in just two days?" he responded as he poked at Zack's pudgy middle, causing him to chuckle and nod. "And like you said," Zack started before he dropped his shirt back down and stood near the kitchen, "the night is still young, riiiiiiiiight?"
1223121212112212111121111.title: The next morning...

12231212121122121111211111.content:
Smirking, Kunsei yawned then went back to his bedroom to get changed. Coming back out, dressed in casual ware, Kunsei went back to the kitchen and opened the fridge door. "So what do you feel like for breakfast?" asked Kunsei. Zack shrugged. "Whatever is edible, dude," responded Zack as he sat back down at the table, eagerly rubbing his hungry tummy. Smiling, Kunsei browsed the fridge and pulled out some bacon, pancake batter and eggs, and went right to work.

"Have you always been such a great cook?" asked Zack. Kunsei scoffed and said, "Trust me, I'm thoroughly average."
"You kidding? These last two breakfast's have been some of the best I've ever had in years! Not even my mom could whip up a breakfast like that, and she's one of the best cooks in Gongoga!"
"Well, I've always enjoyed cooking for people. It's cathartic, and as aspiring artists, it's nice to have an outlet to express some of my creative needs that I otherwise couldn't express at Shinra or in SOLDIER. Although, breakfast is a pretty straight forward thing really, I don't really shine until I'm cooking dinner, then I've got more room to be creative."
"Creative, eh?"
"Not that kind of creative, you perv."

Laughing, Zack leaned back in his chair and sniffed the aroma of cooked bacon and pancakes atop the pan and moaned eagerly. "You ever consider going full time?" asked Zack. Kunsei shrugged and responded, "Hadn't crossed my mind, but considering how poorly I've been doing with SOLDIER, perhaps I should be considering different employment."

Zack stood up and nudged his friends' shoulder assuredly, then said, "Come on, don't think like that. Everyone starts out a little rocky before they get the hang of things." Kunsei smiles then says, "Not you. For you, being a soldier; even a hero, is just basic. The VR incident wasn't the first time you saved my ass, Zack. Plus, we've both been working at Shinra for the same amount of time. Some people just have what it takes, some don't. I mean I'm not upset about that, I just think it's better to accept certain realities."

Breakfast was done and ready to be consumed. "Besides, going full time cook wouldn't mean we couldn't still hang out. In fact, if I DID go full time cook, I'd need a taster," Kunsei said as he nudged towards Zack who considered the delicious possibilities.

"And with that, breakfast is served..."

Kunsei placed down a massive stack of flapjacks smothered in syrup onto a plate for Zack alongside several strips of bacon next to a side of scrambled eggs and a pitcher of orange juice. Mouth watering with anticipation, Zack got his fork and knife and immediately dug in...
12231212121122121111211111.title: Kunsei cooks Zack breakfast

choices: The two head out for the day
Kunsei gives Zack a post-breakfast tummy rub
122312121211221211112111111.content:
Zack tore through the flapjacks rapidly, gulping each one down bite by bite, moaning with delight as he chewed on several pieces at once, then gulped them all down before sighing heartily and devouring some more. "Mmm-mmm-mmm! Dude, I don't know how you managed to do it, but somehow you made flapjacks taste even better!" he said between bites. Kunsei smiled, appreciating the complement as he took a bite out of his substantially smaller plate. "I aim to please," responded Kunsei as he took another bite. Taking a large piece of flapjack, Zack saturated it with the syrup on his plate then opened his mouth wide as he stuffed an almost whole-sized piece of flapjack into his mouth, chewing quickly and taking a hearty gulp, sending a noticeable bulge from his cheeks down to his throat and eventually out of sight as it reached his gullet.

After several flapjacks had been consumed, Zack's now thicker stomach began to bloat slightly again. After ingesting several pieces of bacon at once, Zack leaned back in his chair, with both hands rested on his gut for a breather. "I swear, I don't think I've ever enjoyed breakfast this much before in my entire life, and bare in mind, my mom's cooking was always amazing! So that says something, man," said Zack as he massaged his fairly bloated middle. Kunsei once again smiled back at Zack, then said, "You know, I actually remember that one time I came over and your mom made those chocolate waffles. Those ARE really good, so thank you. Hehe, I also remember even back then when we were kids, you'd always overdo it."
"I can't help it if I'm surrounded by awesome chefs. Still, for real, those were always good times."
"Things were simpler back then."
"And right now at this moment, things are nice and simple too. May as well enjoy it while we can, right?"

Kunsei nodded in agreement as Zack hoisted himself forward and resumed his hearty breakfast. Continuing to tear through what remained of his flapjacks, Zack took larger mouthfuls of bites before chewing and swallowing larger quantities, sending larger gulps down to his tummy each time, pushing it outward ever so slightly with each mouthful swallowed, until finally, his plate of flapjacks was licked clean. Licking the syrup remnants from his fingers, Zack began consuming what remained of his eggs and bacon. All the while, Kunsei watched as Zack's stomach began to push outward a bit more with every few bites of his remaining meal. Zack then took a large swig of his orange juice, before placing the glass back on the table and thumping his chest, resulting in a sharp burp from Zack as he sighed with relief and got back to work on his meal, until eventually, his plate was nothing more than a few egg and bacon grease remnants.

Leaning back in his chair, Zack rested both hands atop his stuffed belly and smiled blissfully. "Best. Breakfast. Ever..." said Zack.

Immediately afterwards...
122312121211221211112111111.title: Stuffing himself with flapjacks

1223121212112212111121111112.content:
*GGGGGGUUUUUUUUURRRRRRGGGGGGLLLLLEEEE!*

A loud gurgling emitted from Zack's stuffed tummy as he clutched it. "Ugh, probably should'a slowed down a little bit towards the end, huh?" asked Zack as he moaned in moderate discomfort. Sitting next to Zack, Kunsei as per usual, began to ease Zack's pain with another one of his post-meal tummy rubs. The resulting massage brought a look of bliss to Zack's face as his body went limp. As Kunsei rubbed, he could feel just how soft and expansive Zack's belly was starting to feel. He felt around briefly, and sure enough, couldn't find any hidden abs beneath the soft flesh.

"Wow, you're really coming along, aren't you," said Kunsei as he continued to rub, resulting in a moan of delight from Zack. "Ahhhh, sure am," responded Zack as he gave his belly a hearty slap. The resulting slap caused a brief ripple which Kunsei could feel as the flesh almost seemed to jiggle in response to the slap. His eyes widened with amazement. "Goodness, you really DID come along!" laughed Kunsei as he continued. It truly was remarkable how vastly the normally chiseled Zack had transformed his once stone cutter six-pack abs to a continuously growing gut. Oddly enough, the rest of Zack was still as fit as ever. The fat in his stomach had not transferred over to the rest of his body, likely due to Mako fusion all SOLDIER members have within themselves; Kunsei included. Which wasn't a bad thing at all. It simply meant more weight was going straight to Zack's belly, causing it to grow at much quicker rates than it would of a normal human. It was all very scientific, but it mattered very little to either Kunsei or Zack. Right now, they were both simply enjoying the moment as Kunsei continued to gently rub his hands across his friends belly. Sure enough, the rubbing worked up some of the excess air that was stowed away in Zack's stomach from the meal. Feeling a rush of air work its' way of his throat, Zack smirked at Kunsei then opened his mouth nice and wide.

*Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrpppppp!*< br />
Zack belched a bit lower but surprisingly lengthy as it carried on for close to six seconds straight. Laughing, Kunsei gave Zack's belly a light pat then got back to work. "Not bad, Zack," said Kunsei as he continued to rub Zack's tummy. But Zack still had a look of discomfort o his face. "Something wrong?" asked Kunsei, but Zack just held his hand forward in a 'hold on a moment' fashion. He then pressed his hand against his chest and swallowed some air, pushing out a quick but juicy burp after. Wincing, he burped again and again and again, still looking as though he were in pain. "Ugh, I can feel it right there, but I just can't get it out," said Zack as he belched again, just unable to get the big one out. Catching on, Kunsei then clutched Zack's gassy stomach and with considerable force, pushed down hard on it. The resulting push forced out the pent-up gas within Zack and forced it immediately out of his mouth in the form of a massive:

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPP!!*

Zack belched long and loud, extending several length seconds and carrying enough force to blow Kunsei's hair back. As it came to an end, Zack slouched with relief as Kunsei just stared in awe. "Ahhhhhh *uuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrrp* that felt good...." said Zack. Kunsei simply laughed then patted Zack's belly admirably. "That was beastly, dude! Guess you really DO like my flapjacks!" laughed Kunsei. Zack simply smirked and nudged his friend in the shoulder, saying "You know it."

Afterwards...
1223121212112212111121111112.title: Post-breakfast tummy rub

1223121212112212111121112.content:
Kunsei ordered some takeout from a local wing place and within minutes, a delivery boy dropped off a few bags worth of food as Kunsei paid him and sent him on his way. Placing the food on the table, Kunsei sat down across from Zack as he marveled at all the delicious smelling fried foods. Boxes of spicy Chocobo Wings and drumsticks, Cajun Fries, all kinds of dipping sauces, and a 2 Liter bottle of Cola, Zack's mouth was practically watering at the sight. "Well? Dig in, my man!" said Kunsei, to which Zack more than happily complied.

Greedily scarfing down a handful of fries at once, Zack hummed in delight as the many spices sent a burst of flavor and zest into his mouth. He then wiped his mouth and targeted the wings, ripping the meat from the bones with his teeth and ingesting them immediately. Picking one wing bone dry after another. All the while, Kunsei's focus kept shifting from Zack to his bloated but still growing stomach. As more and more was deposited inside, his belly began to stretch outward and outward even further, stretching into his buttoned up board shorts. After a few minutes, Zack had to stop to massage his aching tummy. "Mmmmph, hold on, I know what to do..." said Zack before unbuttoning his shorts. Almost immediately after, his belly surged outward considerably, almost hitting the table as Zack moaned with sweet relief. "Ahhhhh, there we go..." he said before getting back to work on the wings. Kunsei was dumbstruck. His belly had to be sticking out by at least 11 inches at this point. What was even more amazing was that the rest of him was still completely tone, all except for his massive balloon belly, which continued to inflate with more and more consumed. Occasionally, he would pour himself a glass of cola and down it in just a few seconds flat, usually ending each gulp with a loud burp or a forceful hiccup, or both, then go right back to stuffing his already stuffed face.

After some time, all that remained of the wings was a pile of sauce laden bones, as Zack was just finishing the Cajun fries. Finaly finished, Zack sighed with relief and leaned back in his chair, picking at his teeth. "So, how was it?" asked Kunsei. Stuffed to the brim, Zack simply gave a thumbs up. *hic* *urrrrrrrp* "Ohhh man, that wing place is something else, dude..." said Zack as he caressed his gut with one hand. Kunsei moved his chair next to his and placed his hand on Zack's stomach, feeling it break down his massive meal. "I didn't even know places like that were open this *hic* late..." said Zack, thumping his chest, to force out another sharp belch.

*BBBBBRRRRRRUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRPPPP!*

"Mmmmm, spicy," half-joked Zack, causing both boys to laugh. "Yeah, Chocobo BBQ Wings is one of those 24/7 places. Used to always order if I was working late-night at Shinra and couldn't eat there." responded Kunsei as he massaged Zack's aching belly, before yawning from exhaustion. Zack did the same. "Well, I dunno 'bout you, but I'm about ready to hit the hay," said Zack as he groggily rubbed his eyes. Kunsei nodded in agreement, but looked as though he had something to say, which Zack caught. "Something on your mind, dude?"
"Well, I was-uhhh, I was gonna say...that couch is kind of old and rough, and my bed's a king-sized. If you wanted to, you could always...well, uhhh, y'know....least for the night. Course if you don't want to, that's cool too!" said a nervous and flush Kunsei.
1223121212112212111121112.title: Filling up on Takeout later in the night

12231212121122121111211121.content:
A moment of silence passed between them. Kunsei was nodding, accepting it as an unspoken "no" when much to his surprise, Zack placed his arm around his shoulder and pecked him on the cheek, saying "I'd love to." Kunsei smiled back at his friend.

After brushing up for the night, Kunsei stripped to his boxers and laid down in bed while Zack kept his board shorts on and did the same; his extensively bloated middle sticking up as he did. Cuddling, Zack kept his arm wrapped around Kunsei's shoulder while he kept his wrapped around Zack's bulging stomach. "It's been quite a weekend thus far, hasn't it?" asked Kunsei as he massaged Zack's stomach, to which, Zack smirked and simply nodded. "I swear, you could be a masseuse with those hands, dude..." said Zack as he leaned back, enjoying his tummy rub.
"Hehe, weeeell, I don't think there's an open market for 'professional belly rubber' just yet."
"Then you could make your own business out of it. Hell, you could probably make top dollar with hands like that."
"Your pleasure is all the payment I need."

Zack looked back at his friend and smiled. "Right back at you, dude. Which is why I was holding this in just for you..." Kunsei glanced curiously, until he felt Zack's stomach lurch inward as he took a quick gulp of air and immediately pushed it out in the form of a massive belch right in Kunsei's face.

*BBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPP P!!*

The sheer force was blowing Kunsei's hair back as Kunsei himself bit his lip with delight as Zack's burp extended for several seconds, carrying with it, the stench of his recently consumed meal. As it finished, Kunsei sniffed and half-jokingly said, "Mmmm, smells spicy." Zack smiled and pulled his friend closer as Kunsei playfully rested his head onto Zack's chest. "Y'know, maybe I could wait a little longer before working this thing off," said Zack as he slapped his belly admirably. Kunsei glanced curiously. "But what about SOLDIER? Won't they get pissed if you're unfit enough for active field work?" asked Kunsei.
"Well, I've got plenty of vacation time I haven't cashed in, plus after the VR incident, Director Lazard tossed in a few extra weeks with pay as well. Juuuuust one of the many perks of being a hero," joked Zack. Kunsei chuckled alongside him.
"You really are amazing, Zack."
"No, those wings...now THOSE were amazing..."
"I'm serious, I'm not the only one who knows it. Everyone loves you, man. For all that you do for people, how hard you work, and that's not even getting into how amazing you are as just a person. I mean you're funny, gentle, kind, optimistic, how many at Shinra can say the same?"

Zack blushed, from flattery and embarrassment as Kunsei kissed him on the cheek and followed by saying "You're an amazing person, Zack Fair." Zack glanced back at Kunsei and smiled sincerely, then said, "Right back at you, Kunsei." The two then locked lips and kissed intimately.
12231212121122121111211121.title: Spending the night with Kunsei

choices: "Nah, that's enough excitement for one night."
122312121211221211112111211.content:
After some time, they resumed cuddling, with Kunsei's head against Zack's chest, rubbing his belly gently. All was quiet and peaceful for a few minutes until a loud gurgling emanated from Zack's gut.

*GGGGUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRGGGGGGGLLLLLLE!*

"Everything okay in there?" asked Kunsei as he stopped rubbing Zack's tummy. A familiar look of discomfort grew over Zack's face as he turned to Kunsei and jokingly said, "Are you SURE all this burping isn't ruining the mood? I can't help but feel like sharing an amazing kiss and following it up with a monstrous burp is somewhat of a moment killer."
Kunsei scoffed then said, "Maybe that'd be true if your burps weren't so loud and manly, but because they are..." he hinted with his eyes as he playfully nuzzled Zack's chest. Taking the hint, Zack smiled then placed one hand atop his bloated belly, then after pressing rather hard, pushed out a massive *BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRR RRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!*

Kunsei cooed with delight as Zack's burp carried on for several seconds as always. As it finished, Zack sighed with relief and patted his belly proudly. "Just gets sexier every time," said Kunsei. Zack smirked then turned to Kunsei and said, "Please, I bet you could push out some mean ones too." Kunsei stared curiously, "...M-me?" he said, a bit nervous about being on the spot.
"Come on, you were letting out some pretty good ones when we ate."
"Well, I mean, that was because I had food in my stomach, I was full."

Zack scoffed then shook his head. "Oh no no no, this is not full," he said as he pat Kunsei's still slim and trim stomach. "THIS is full..." he followed with before giving his infinitely larger belly a hearty slap. "Heh, no argument there. Still, I'm not sure I know how to really do it on cue like you. I really don't wanna embarrass myself."
"Embarrassed? It's me, you got nothing to be embarrassed about. Trust me."

Kunsei glanced back at his friend then nodded. He then took a deep breath and waited.

*urp*

Zack stared blankly for a moment, trying his best not to snicker. Kunsei caught that and frowned, "See?! I told you!" he said, humiliated.
"Oh come on, it's fine. You just need a little guidance. Who better than the master, right?"
Kunsei shrugged, still pretty embarrassed.
"Here, all you need to do is suck in a bunch of air from your esophagus down into your stomach. Like so," Zack started before taking a few hearty gulps and burping it right back out. "Now, *urrrrp* you try."

Following Zack's advice, Kunsei reluctantly started gulping air. He then pushed out a slightly louder burp, but still dinky in comparison. "Remember, the trick is to gulp it down into your stomach through your esophagus. Your stomach should feel a little bloated before you let it out."

Giving it one more go, Kunsei gulped down a few more times, hand pressed against his stomach. Sure enough, he felt it begin to feel harder and a bit expanded as the air accumulated. He then paused briefly, before pushing out a shockingly loud and booming belch.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP PPPP!!!!*

Louder than any before it, Kunsei's burp was almost on par with one of Zack's. Zack, meanwhile just stared in awe at his friend then applauded as it came to a close. Kunsei sighed with relief, still wide eyed from the unexpected belch. "Holy crap....that came from me....?"
"It sure did, stud!" Zack said, quite impressed.
"Y'know, that actually felt....really good!" said Kunsei as he rubbed his stomach, satisfied with his expulsion. He then gulped down more air and let rip an even longer burp than the one he'd just released. Zack raised an eyebrow and smirked at his friend. "Sounds and smells like you're getting the hang of this..." started Zack as he jokingly waved his hand around. Kunsei chuckled. "What would you say to putting that newfound talent of yours to the test?"
"What, you mean like a burping contest?"
"If you're up to it."
122312121211221211112111211.title: Late night burping session

1223121212112212111121112111.content:
"Okay, let's do it!" said an excited Kunsei stood up and immediately began gulping down a large quantity of air. Resting his hand against his bare stomach, he could feel his stomach push outward with all the air he'd just gulped down. Letting it sit for a moment, Kunsei pushed firmly onto his stomach, forcing out a loud belch.

*BBBBBBBBRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPP!!*

Kunsei's belch was impressive, particularly from a first timer, but Zack wasn't phased. Instead, he simply gave his bloated stomach a good pat and let out a louder and gassier belch on the spot.

*HHHHHHHHHHHHUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!!*

The sheer amount of content still being digested by Zack was working up a lot of natural gas which Zack had little to no problem letting rip almost immediately. Kunsei caught on and scoffed. "I'm not giving up that easily, Fair." Zack smiled and said, "I would hope for no less," then thumped his chest and let out a sharp but quick belch right in Kunsei's face, causing both boys to laugh.

Kunsei then thumped his fist into his chest a few times, forcing out a small but pretty loud burp. Looking unsatisfied, he continued down to his upper stomach, thumping at his top abs, and forcing out a louder belch than before, but nothing that would even come close to topping Zack's belches. Meanwhile, Zack laughed and said, "Oh come on, you can do better than that!" Both taunting yet encouraging his friend. He then pressed against his stomach and pushed out another lengthy belch.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRPP!!*

Sighing with relief, Zack smirked and awaited Kunsei's response. He sucked a large quantity of air into his stomach, and tried to let rip a louder one, but as he opened his mouth, what emitted instead was not a booming belch, but instead a watery pre-vomit sounding burp, which caused Kunsei to cover his mouth and gag, before breaking into a violent coughing fit. As he finished coughing, he thumped his chest, forcing out another small but deep belch. Rolling his eyes, Zack leaned in towards his friend and placed his hand on Kunsei's thin stomach.

"Wait, what are you doing? I don't have any food in my stomach," asked a confused Kunsei. Zack nodded but continued onward to say, "No, but there's always pent up air in your stomach somewhere. The key is to find it and force as much of it out as you can."

As he said that, he began to rub Kunsei's thin stomach much like how he would Zack's bloated stomach. Feeling his abs against his hand, Zack smiled, seeing why Kunsei enjoyed working on Zack's stomach so much. He then felt one part of the stomach to be a bit more tense than the rest, and clutched onto that part. "Aaaaaand eureka!" He then pressed on that part, forcing Kunsei's mouth open immediately as a gargantuan belch emitted from his gullet.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

Kunsei's pent-up belch lasted longer and louder than any Zack had emitted over the night and carried enough force to blow Zack's lengthy hair back as he smiled proudly at his friend. When the belch was over, Kunsei almost plopped back in his bed, exhausted. Sighing with sweet relief, Kunsei patted his bare stomach, laughing wearily as he said "Whew, that felt amazing..."
"Sounded amazing too..." responded Zack, still in utter awe that his shy friend could produce such a monstrous belch. "Think it's safe to say who won the burping contest..."
"Well...." Kunsei started, pausing as he pressed a hand to his stomach and forced out a wet after-burp, "considering I could only burp that loudly with YOUR help, I think we'll call it a draw. Sound good?"

Smiling back at his friend, Zack gave him a peck on the cheek and said, "Sounds good."

The two then laid back down in bed and cuddled the night away.
1223121212112212111121112111.title: Burping contest

choices: A loud rumbling came from his stomach
He realizes that he isn't alone in the bathroom.
12231212121122121111211121111.content:
Both Zack and Kunsei had passed out whilst in each others arms, resting peacefully well into the morning. As the chocobo's outside crowed, Zack groggily opened his eyes, finding a still slumbering Kunsei lying peacefully atop his no longer bloated stomach. The contents of Zack's stomach had finally digested overnight, and the result left Zack with a noticeably fatter gut, particularly his lower abdomen around his belly button. Scooting the sleeping Kunsei aside to investigate, Zack clutched and felt around his tummy, which now felt much softer and a bit pudgier than he was accustomed. Poking at his belly, Zack was amazed as it had a bit of a jiggle to it now.

"Wow, I'm a bloated little cow..." he thought to himself with a smirk as Kunsei slowly awakened atop his friend.
"Mmmmm, morning, stud..." said a half awake Kunsei, head still laying comfortably atop Zack's belly like a pillow.

Zack ruffled his friends hair and smiled back, responding with, "Morning to you too, sunshine. Hey, check out the work in progress..." he said as he slapped his belly to illustrate his point, once again causing a ripple amidst his abdomen. Kunsei looked down and was in shock at how much pudgier Zack's tummy had grown in such a short time. Jaw damn near dropped, he began to prod and caress Zack's belly in an observatory fashion, producing a few suppressed and surprisingly ticklish giggles from Zack.
"Wow, who'd have thought it would have grown so big in so short a while?" said Kunsei. Zack simply shrugged.
"Not me. Anyway, we should probably get back to it, shouldn't we?"

Kunsei nodded in agreement, then reluctantly rose from atop Zack's soft tummy. Yawning, Zack scratched himself and rose to his feet, stretching his arms upward as he yawned again and headed towards the bathroom. After washing up, he stepped atop the scale, and much to his surprise, the scale read 160 lbs. Zack's eyes widened. "HO-LY-CRAP....160? T-that would mean I put on almost 40 pounds since this weekend began!" Zack stopped for a moment then rested his hand atop his gut, pondering as his fingers drummed atop his slightly bulging belly. "Might take a little longer to work this bad boy off than I initially expected....although, alternatively, I COULD just keep it for a little while..." he thought to himself. As he did...
12231212121122121111211121111.title: Surprised by the results

122312121211221211112111211111.content:
As soon as that thought entered his mind, a loud rumble erupted from his thicker stomach. Clutching it with one hand, Zack smirked and licked his lips. "May as well get started then, shouldn't I?" Zack thought to himself as he slapped his belly happily and exited the restroom.

Upon exiting, the aroma of bacon and eggs sizzling on a pan almost lifted Zack off the ground as he took a big whiff and smiled, mouth watering at the flavorful scent emanating from the kitchen. "Mmmmm, smells like the Iron Chef of Shinra is hard at work." joked Zack as he approached Kunsei; now dressed in sweat pants and a black t-shirt, from behind and wrapped his arms around his shoulders, nuzzling the back of his neck with his chin playfully. Kunsei smirked and added a dash of pepper to his pan. "Figured I'd make us a nice breakfast to start the day. Then maybe we could go out and do something fun like see a movie or something. How's that sound to you?" asked Kunsei.
"Sounds delicious," he said with a smirk, tightening his grip ever so slightly around Kunsei's shoulders. Kunsei smiled back at Zack and gave him a light peck before resuming his scrambling of the eggs.

Zack changed his board shorts, and put on another oversized sleeveless t-shirt. However, due to the increase in the size of his stomach, his shirt road up slightly, not hanging off as loosely as it always did. As time passed, Kunsei had whipped up a hearty amount of bacon, with scrambled eggs, some sausage, and buttery French Toast lathered with Maple Syrup. The mere sight of this feast made Zack's mouth water as the two placed everything on the table.

Like before, the proportions were plenty, but this time, both plates were stacked up pretty bountiful, though Zack's still had much more in comparison to Kunsei's plate. "Is that French Toast?" asked Zack curiously.
"Sure is. Figured I'd mix things up instead of the usual bout of Pancakes and Waffles. You don't mind, do you?"
"Nah, not at all, dude! I've just never actually had French Toast before."
"WHAT??!" blurted out Kunsei surprisingly astonished, startling Zack for a moment. "NEVER?!!"
"...No?"

Wasting no time, Kunsei immediately cut up a tiny piece of his French Toast and stuck it with a fork, bringing it towards Zack's mouth. "I'm sorry, but such an injustice has to be resolved immediately."
"Injustice?"

Shrugging, Zack opened wide and bit off the piece of French Toast hanging from Kunsei's fork and chewed briefly. Kunsei waited eagerly for Zack's feedback, and got it when Zack's eyes widened. "Ho-ly-crap..." muttered a dumbstruck Zack. He then glanced down at his own plate of French Toast and immediately tore into it with his fork and knife. Kunsei smirked and went back to his own breakfast. "Justice has been served..." he said to himself half-jokingly and half-serious.
122312121211221211112111211111.title: A loud rumbling came from his stomach

1223121212112212111121112111111.content:
Kunsei had long since finished his smaller breakfast as Zack continued to munch down an assortment of French Toast, pancakes, eggs and bacon all at once. Zack was a beast, putting it all away with way more ease than before, all the while, his already bigger gut was growing ever so slowly with each mouthful gulped down, and it didn't even seem to phase Zack in the slightest, or even slow him down. It was incredible.

Kunsei admired as the young man continued to scarf his face with no signs of slowly down anywhere in sight. "Hehe, I guess with that jollier gut of yours, you can put away more now, can'tcha?" said Kunsei as he poked Zack's belly. Zack smirked as he wiped some bacon grease from his mouth. "Definitely seems that way, don't it?" he said as he leaned back in his chair and gave his thick belly a hearty slap, letting it jiggle briefly for emphasis before he resumed scarfing down his meal.

"Oh dude, *GULP* this is all so good, dude! *MUNCH!* I'm telling ya, man! I've NEVER met a cook as good as you!" Zack said to Kunsei, causing his friend to blush a bit from the complement. "If you like it, that's good enough for me, Zack." responded Kunsei as he watched Zack take a large chunk of French Toast and munch it down in one go. He then poured himself a glass of OJ and gulped it down in one go, just barely six seconds flat. Slamming his cup onto the table, Zack pressed a hand to his belly and burped enormously immediately after. Kunsei grinned. "Good one as always, champ." Grinning like a kid, Zack gulped some air and burped out the words, *THAAAANK*....*YYEEEEOOOOOOUUUUU*....*URRRP* and then continued onward with his breakfast.

More and more, Zack continued to stuff his face, and more and more, his gut continued to push outward little by little, eventually to the point where his shirt road up high enough to expose his belly button. After some time had finally passed, all that remained of Zack's hearty breakfast was a stack of plates and a few crumbs here and there. Licking his lips, Zack leaned back and rested both hands atop his vastly bloated belly victoriously. Kunsei then sat next to Zack and rested his ear atop his exposed belly like a father to a pregnant wife. "Enjoying the show?" laughed Zack as he wrapped his arm around Kunsei, making him almost hug against his belly. "Hehe, I can hear it all sloshing and digesting in there. It's absolutely incredible, dude!" responded Kunsei as he continued to listen in the breakfast he had prepared for his friend now breaking down and digesting in Zack's large stomach. Suddenly, Kunsei could hear a loud gassy gurgling emanate from Zack's stomach. "Hehe, let's see if you can hear this...." said Zack mischievously as he clutched the side of his gut with one hand, and looked down at Kunsei, who looked back up at Zack, awaiting eagerly as he knew what was gonna happen next.

*BBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR UUUUUUPPPPPPPPPPP!!*

Zack let fly another massive, gassy belch, this time right in Kunsei's face. Several seconds passed as Kunsei almost basked in the bacon scented gas blowing in his face. Finally when it ended, Zack sighed and Kunsei patted Zack's belly happily. "Smelled like you really did enjoy your breakfast," laughed Kunsei. Zack merely nodded and licked his lips, still savoring the delightful taste. "I suuuuure did..." he said, slapping his belly for emphasis, soliciting a smaller burp afterward. He then glanced down at Kunsei and with puppy dog eyes, asked, "Hate to ask, but would you mind working your magic?" Grinning widely, Kunsei nodded and began to rub his large belly with both hands. Admiring his bloated flesh, Kunsei kissed Zack's stomach tenderly as he rubbed it in large, circular motions with both hands. "Do you have any idea just how hot you are right now?" asked Kunsei. Zack smirked cheesily and brushed the back of his head and nodded, "Hehe, well I have a hunch, dude. I have a hunch..." The two continued on for a little while as Zack moaned in delight at the feel of Kunsei's magic fingers easing the tension to Zack's immensely bloated gut, occasionally letting out another monstrous burp in the process, much to Kunsei's delight.
1223121212112212111121112111111.title: A hearty breakfast

12231212121122121111211121111112.content:
Kunsei continued to knead deep into Zack's belly in an upward and downward pattern, and naturally, Zack loved every second of it. "Mmmmm, that feels incredible...thank you so much for this, dude..." said Zack in a blissful state. Kunsei simply smiled back and gave Zack's belly a light peck in response before resuming his rubbing. Some time continued onward, until a thought arose in Zack's mind. Debating whether or not he should share said thought with Kunsei while receive perhaps the most incredible tummy rub a man could receive, Zack finally decided to ask and see.

"Say, Kunsei...can I ask you something?"
"Anything you like, man."
"All this; the belly rubs, the feeding, the getting to know each other better...you ever do this sorta thing with anyone else?"

Kunsei stopped for a moment and pondered long and hard at Zack's question. Finally, Kunsei responded by saying, "Well, yes and no," and proceeded to resume rubbing Zack's large stomach. "See, when I was younger, I...well, wasn't quite as sure what to make of things in terms of how I felt about people. But I had a hunch, since back then, I'd love nothing more than to see my friends stuff their little faces, and to see their always razor thin stomachs push outward to their absolute limits. And being the only kid that I could think of who knew how to cook, and cook WELL, that made it all that much easier to help make it happen so I could watch them gorge themselves whenever we hung out." Zack nodded then chuckled to himself, still enjoying the feeling of Kunsei's hands stroking Zack's still tender belly, before responding with, "I figured as much. You're way too good at all this for me to be the first. I mean, I'm definitely not that special, haha!"

Kunsei stopped for a moment and stared back at Zack in a very direct manner. "But you are special, because I didn't love any of them." And as soon as those words exited Kunsei's mouth, it was almost as though Zack had forgotten he was utterly stuffed to the brim, and glanced back down at Kunsei as the two locked eyes for a moment. Zack couldn't explain it, for some reason, he got misty eyed for a moment, then smiled back at the young man. "Love you too, dude." He then wrapped his muscular arm around Kunsei's hip and gave him a big old bear hug, almost lifting him from his seat. Kunsei laughed and embraced Zack proudly, before continuing to give Zack his tension easing tummy rub. "Plus, none of them were ever lucky enough to enjoy this either."

The two laughed, as he resumed.
12231212121122121111211121111112.title: Tummy rub for big bloated tummy.

choices: Zack wakes up in a medical bed.
The Doctor knows magic too.  (Used Phoenix Down)
122312121211221211112111211111121.content:
After a hearty breakfast, both teens headed out for the day, simply wandering down the Slums towards old town. Zack kept one muscular arm around Kunsei, and the other atop his vastly bloated gut. His shirt was especially tight on him given how distended his stomach had grown since breakfast. Kunsei could notice a faint jiggle in Zack's belly with every step they took, and smiled. "You're really coming along, aren't you?" asked Kunsei. Zack smirked and gave his gut a hearty slap, then said, "Trying to, hehe. I almost wonder how much further this bad boy can go."

"Heh, well I'm sure we'll find out soon enough, won't we?" Said Kunsei. "Sooner than that." responded Zack. And as if to emphasize this, his large stomach let out a shockingly hungry rumble, much to Kunsei's surprise. "And here I thought breakfast would sate you. Alas..." he said, smiling to himself, and earning a chuckle from Zack, before he jokingly said, "Sorry, all that good eatin' just made me so darn hungry!" The two laughed then continued wandering down the desolate region of old decaying buildings and temples, impressed that places like this could survive as long as they have in Midgar. "It's kind of peaceful here," said Zack, while Kunsei nodded and admired the scene, then said "I always try to imagine what kind of people lived here, how they spent every day life, or even where they all went and why they left."

"Not EVERYONE left..."

The two turn around and spot a hooded figure approaching them with a toothy malicious grin over his shadowy face. "Some of us came back...thought we might keep an eye on the ol' place...and uhhh, between you'n me, we don't really take to kindly to having outsiders in our neck'uh the woods..." Zack guarded Kunsei and edged back cautiously. "...Alright pal, just take it easy and we'll be outta your hair," stated an alert Zack.

"Hahaha, sorry kid, but it don't work that way...." said the hooded figure as he pulled his hood back, revealing glowing red eyes and dead skin. As Zack took notice, two other figures came from behind the two, both armed with knives, both whom had the same condition. "Marauders..." warned Kunsei. "Think I know what happened to the people who lived here, Kunsei. They lived in peace and got by just fine, until bastards like this came along and terrorized them to the point of abandoning the place they once called home for their own safety." The head Marauder laughed and said, "More or less. Difference is, THEY were smart enough not to come back..."

Zack took a fighting stance, but winced as his stomach began to cramp up, Kunsei looked worried and whispered, "...you up for this?" Zack grimaced, but took his stance firmly and fiercely, before responding with, "I'm always up for taking out the garbage." The three marauders circled the two young men like a pack of wolves, and on the Alpha Marauders command, all three moved in for the kill. One several swings with his blade at Kunsei, who barely managed to evade each attack. Zack however, was holding off two including the Alpha, until one of the underlings overpowered Zack and grabbed him by the arms in a shoulder lock while Alpha jumped towards the boy and began delivering a flurry of punches into Zack's stomach, none of which was helping with his previous cramping. Kunsei kicked the underling he was fighting aside and moved in to aide his friend, pulling the guy holding Zack down off just long enough for Zack to break free and deliver one fierce punch to the Alpha's jaw, knocking him off his feet and into a pile of rubble while he immediately moved in on the other two. One took a swing with his knife, which Zack blocked with his forearm, slicing it good, while the other slashed at Zack's bicep. Zack's blood painted the ruins, but it wasn't enough to stop him from grabbing one of the Marauders by the arm and hurling him with all his might into the second one, knocking them both back while Zack moved on the offensive and grabbed the two while they were down and punched them both out cold. Zack was on fire, but his still bloated stomach was in agony from all the sudden burst of movement and impact. The adrenaline rush was too much for it to slow Zack down.

The Alpha rose back to his feet, eyes glowing an unnatural red as fire began to form from his palm. "Now I'm pissed..." he said before sending a wave of Fira blasts at Zack and Kunsei, forcing both behind a pile of rubble for cover. Kunsei noticed the blood leaking rapidly from his friend, Zack smirked to him and said, "Just superficial wounds, I'll be fine. But THIS jackass...?" Zack grabbed a piece of stone and as soon as the Alpha reeled to toss another Fira ball, Zack hurled the chunk of stone right to his dome and knocked him out cold. The two stepped out, the trouble was over. "Are you okay?" asked Zack, who appeared noticeably white in the face, forcing Kunsei to disregard the question and examine his friend immensely concerned. "Don't worry about me, look at yourself! We gotta get you treated now!" pleaded Kunsei, only to be drowned out by a vicious gurgling in Zack's stomach, causing him to clutch his gut in pain and fall to his knees. "W-what's wrong?!"
"Ugh, I probably should'a waited to digest breakfast before taking on a pack of Marauders..."

With that, Zack wretched profusely, spewing the contents of his previous meal and then some. While disgusting, Kunsei sat beside his friend and rubbed his back to help coax the process. "It's okay, it's okay, man. Just let it out," said Kunsei as comforting as he could, to which Zack complied. After several moments, Zack groaned and clutched his slightly less distended stomach in agony. "Oh man, that hurt like hell..." said a weakened Zack. Kunsei then placed Zack's arm over his shoulder and helped walk him back towards the Slums while still trying to dial for medical emergency.

"Dammit, no signal," cursed Kunsei. Zack simply groaned in response. "Alright, just hang tight, man, they might be able to help out back home. Just tough it out."
"...I told you, I'm fine..."
"Actually, you're about to pass out from blood loss."
"......Ah."

The two eventually arrived to the slums, and much to Kunsei's surprise, a crowd of people were already waiting for them. "Oh God, what did Sev do to this boy?! Get the doctor now!"

A pair of young boys ran back into the central Slums while everyone else backed up, giving Zack and Kunsei room to breath. "...How do you guys know what happened....?" asked a weakened Zack. One of the residents said, "We started hearing explosions back in old town and knew it could only be Sev."
"...Oh, you mean that Marauder jerk...? Yeah, he's not gonna be bothering anyone for a while..."

The crowd stared amongst themselves then back to Zack and Kunsei.

"How do you mean?"
"Zack took that Sev guy and both his cronies down. In fact, all three are still out cold. Now I know you guys don't like Shinra all that much, but if you can get them on the line-"

Before Kunsei could finish, several had already pulled out their phones and dialed to have the three captured and detained before they could regain consciousness. "....I don't understand, w-who was that guy...?"
"Ten years ago, Sev worked for SOLDIER before he was dishonorably discharged for what he did to a local village housing an enemy milita. His Fira magic made him a menace, and when he came to our town demanding we join him in his vendetta against SOLDIER, he used Fira to terrorize our fair city into submission."
"But when that didn't work, he just started attacking us nonstop until we fled. He single handedly took our town and claimed it for himself, letting the whole thing rot. That's why the Slums is what it is today. There's so many of us and so little to go around. We tried turning to the rest of Midgar, but none of us could really afford to live there."
"But with Sev gone, maybe now we can actually start rebuilding what he took from us. Hell, maybe a few us'll join Shinra and learn the same kind of spells he learned in case others like him or any of those monsters try to stir up trouble!"
"You single handedly saved this town, young man. And we owe you an immense debt!"

Zack smiled weakly then nudged Kunsei. "...No. WE saved the town. I'd have been mince meat if Kunsei here didn't save me from Sev's goons...and thanks by the way..." Kunsei was at a loss for words. Even in such a weakened state, his friend was still looking out for him. He smiled back and whispered, "...thanks, Zack." Zack winked back then turned to the crowd and said, "....Uh, not to be a burden, but I'm kinda....dying over here? Any chance I can see a doctor any time soon....?" He laughed cheesily then passed out just as the doctor arrived.
122312121211221211112111211111121.title: New Trouble in Old Town

choices: "Let's put that all you can eat on the house thing to use."
1223121212112212111121112111111212.content:
Kunsei panicked as Zack lost consciousness, and attempted to shake his friend awake, but the elder doctor simply smiled and calmly pulled the boy aside as he drew a colorful feather from his coat and placed it atop Zack's scalp. Kunsei's fear subsided as he saw the item. "Is that...?"
"I was saving it for a rainy day, but all things considered, I suppose I could spare one for the occasion," said the doctor. The magical feather glowed bright as it broke into thousands of white particles which were absorbed into Zack's body, healing his wounds and returning the color to his skin. Groaning, Zack's eyes flickered as he regained consciousness. Kunsei sighed with relief and immediately hugged his friend. The crowd cheered as Zack came to.

"Ugh, w-what just happened...?" asked Zack. The doctor smiled to the boy and said, "Young man, if you ever intend to take on another renegade SOLDIER operative and his flunkies, I recommend you invest in a Phoenix Down or two. Don't worry, that one's on the house. Call it a gift for taking down Sev."
"Wow, those things really DO work! Thanks a bunch, doc!"
"Please, we're the one's who're thankful. And if there's anything you need-"

Before the doctor could finish his praise, a familiar rumbling emanated from Zack's much less distended stomach, causing him to chuckle sheepishly and blush with embarrassment. "Ehehe, weeeeell, now that you mention it, kicking Sev's butt DID kinda made me a little peckish..."

"Kid, as long as you're here, anywhere you feel like grabbing a bite; all you can stomach, on the house," called out a grateful voice from the crowd. Zack turned to Kunsei and smiled innocently. "How's that sound to you?" asked Zack. Kunsei smiled back and patted Zack's stomach lightly then said, "Sounds delicious. What'll it be, Mr. Hero?"

Zack pondered while his stomach continued to growl audibly. Then decided....
1223121212112212111121112111111212.title: The Doctor knows magic too.  (Used Phoenix Down)

12231212121122121111211121111112121.content: Where is Zack going to overindulge at next?
12231212121122121111211121111112121.title: Where to?

122312121211221211112111211111121211.content:
One citizen; a large hulk of a man with a lumberjacks' build and beard approached the two, towering over them, then said with a booming voice, "Y'know, kid, you look like a hearty eater." Zack smirked then gave his thick gut a hearty slap. "I like to think so," he responded, "why do you ask?"
"Cause I own a steakhouse near Desperados, and I think I got just the thing for you. Stop on by any time if you think you're up for the challenge."

Zack raised an eyebrow, very intrigued by the burly Steakhouse Owners offer.

Some time later, both Zack and Kunsei headed to his Steakhouse and were seated immediately by the owner himself. He turned to Kunsei and asked, "Can I get you anything, son?"
"Uhhh, Tri-Tip medium rare sounds good. And I guess, a lemonade and baked potato on the side if you wouldn't mind?"
"Not at all," he said, then turned to Zack grinning, "As for you; anyone who can take on Sev and live can surely take on the Show Stopper."
Zack glanced curiously. "What's that?" he asked. "The ultimate piece of meat heaven. 72 ounces of tender meat, marinaded to zesty perfection, with caramelized onions sprinkled on top, and a cash prize for anyone who can overcome her. FYI, that current list consists of zero. I wanna see if you got the stomach to be number one."

Zack looked back at Kunsei and winked confidently. "Let's do it! Also, can I get a pitcher of cola?" The owner nodded then headed back with their orders. Kunsei glanced a bit curiously at Zack and asked, "Soooo, how are you feeling?"
"I feel lively, to be honest. Could be the Phoenix Down, could be the fact that I'm not dead, or it could just be the idea of eating 72 ounces of steak in one sitting. How about you? How are you holding up, man?"
"Me? Oh, I'm uhh, I'm fine. Just a little exhausted after all the commotion."
"Tell me about it. It's so much to take in. I had no idea things got so bad over here because of one person. It almost makes you wonder why SOLDIER was never sent to deal with Sev. Surely he'd have been taken out with ease against Angeal, Sephiroth or even Genesis. So why wasn't anyone ever deployed? More important than that, how come neither of us ever even heard the name Sev until today?"
"A lot's changed in Shinra and SOLDIER the past 10 years. Most of us were just kids when Sev got thrown out of SOLDIER, and command probably wanted to wipe any trace of him and his crimes ever existing within their ranks."
"What do you think SOLDIER will do with him now that he's been arrested?"
"Sev's an enemy to the state, they'll lock him up and throw away the key. After what he's done to these people, and what he's probably done to a lot more, he deserves a lot worse."
"Killing him won't undo his crimes or make the pain he inflicted on others any easier, Kunsei. Better we learn from him and his mistakes and hopefully, our own so SOLDIER doesn't make another mistake like Sev again, right?"

Kunsei nodded. What happened was clearly troubling him, so Zack didn't push the subject further. Instead, he hoped to take his mind off the trouble that ensued and back to taking his stomach to the max when the Owner returned with Kunsei's steak at hand. "Here ya go." He placed it in front of the young man while a separate waiter brought the two their drinks. Then, yet another waiter heaved out a massive silver platter with a giant hunk of meat painted exactly how the owner had described it and set it before a wide-eyed Zack. "Good luck, kid." he said, half confident and half tauntingly then let them be. Both Zack and Kunsei simply stared at the massive slab of cow meat for a good while, at a complete loss for words.

"...That's....that's a lot of meat..." said Kunsei. "....I hadn't noticed...." responded Zack, half sarcastic, but too in awe to really emphasize his sarcasm. Zack turned to see several patrons watching eagerly to see how far Zack would take it. Just then, his stomach rumbled eagerly. Glancing down, he shrugged then grabbed his fork and knife. "Well...here goes nothing." And with that, he dug right in. Slicing that first piece, Zack took his first bite. His eyes widened as the sheer juiciness and flavor was absolutely overwhelming. Licking his lips, he immediately dug in and took his second bite. Then his third. Then his forth. "MMmm, *GULP*, dude, this may seriously be one of the best steaks I've ever tasted..." said Zack between bites.

Kunsei had already made good progress on his regular steak, but was all too in awe at Zack chowing down to focus his attention on his own meal. Several bites in, and Zack hadn't shown any signs of slowing down. His belly had expanded little by little, pushing outward to its' previously bloated state this morning, and the steak wasn't even a third of the way finished.

Some time had passed, and Kunsei had long since finished his meal. Zack was roughly half way into the Show Stopper. 36 straight ounces of juicy steak was now just sitting in his vastly bloated belly. Zack's stomach strained his shorts, and had grown so large that his oversized shirt had grown quite tight atop it, so much so that the very bottom of his shirt rode up, exposing his bare belly flesh, while he himself had slowed down immensely since starting this endeavor. After finishing his next bite, Zack stopped for a moment and leaned back into his chair, rubbing his distended gut tenderly. His stomach felt like a small boulder with the amount of meat that had yet to be digested just sitting inside it. "Oh man, I don't think I've ever been this full before..." groaned Zack as he unbuttoned his shorts and let his belly protrude outward to the point that his shirt rode up just above his belly button. His gut gurgled, digesting what it could while Zack continued to nurse it from the outside. Suddenly, he began to look a little green around the gills. The crowd around him, owner included, winced, preparing for the worst. Kunsei however, smirked, knowing what was about to come next.

*BBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRU UUUUPPPPPPPPPPPP!*

Zack let fly a monstrous belch which lasted close to eight seconds. Kunsei watched as Zack's belly actually quaked with his massive eruption, almost like jello. Some patrons appeared grossed out, others laughed, while the owner was still invested in seeing if Zack could finish. Smacking his lips, Zack groaned with relief. "Ohhhh man, that felt good..." said Zack before burping again and giving his belly a good pat. "Y'know, I think that may've cleared up some room. So onto round two," he said to himself...
122312121211221211112111211111121211.title: The Slums Steakhouse

choices: Zack in dire need of a belly rub.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111.content:
Digging right back in, Zack continued onto the second half of the 72 ounces. Each bite, a strain, but Zack downed it all the same, while his abdomen continued to swell outward more and more with every few bites. Kunsei just stared in awe at how large his belly had grown and how much larger it was going to get. At no point since this week began had Zack ever pushed himself this far. Just imagining how badly Zack was going to need someone to help ease the pain of such an immense fullness was overwhelming for Kunsei as he discreetly bit his lip with anticipation. For the most part, undertaking this challenge had helped take Kunsei's mind off of Sev and the Marauders, just as Zack had hoped. Unfortunately for Zack, this steak may have been quite literally a bit more than he could chew. Still, that didn't stop him. Swallowing another mouthful, Zack poured himself a glass of cola and chugged it down within seconds to help wash down the steak. Sighing heartily, Zack gave his muscular chest an open palm thump and burped loud enough for patrons outside the restaurant to hear, then got back to work on the steak.

Little by little, the steak began to disappear into Zack's ever expanding stomach. The crowd was eager with anticipation to see if Zack could truly be the first to beat the Steakhouse challenge. So much so that they were no longer grossed out by the piggish noises emanating from the boy as he progressed. Some more time had passed and the steak was almost finished. Zack, however, looked like he was about ready to toss the bib.

He moaned in pain and clenched his immensely bloated belly with both hands, wanting so badly for the challenge to be over. The mere thought of taking another bite was nauseating to the young hero. Pressure was building within him, but he knew if he burped it out, there was a good chance something else would come up with the excess air, which would disqualify him and render this entire endeavor meaningless. So he just sat there, sweating and hurting. "Ugh....Kunsei, I really don't know if I can...*mrrp* keep going..." said Zack, whose voice was horsed from the pain. But Kunsei glanced back at Zack assuredly and intensely then said, "Of course you can! I know you, Zack! There's not a single obstacle that you can't overcome! No amount of pain you can't fight through! Hell, you already conquered a giant burger not too longer ago, this outta be a cakewalk!"
"PLEASE...stop mentioning giant food..." said Zack queasily. Kunsei shrugged then said, "Point being, you're a warrior, and one of the toughest I've ever known. Now, do what you set out to do and show these people how a REAL man eats!"

Glancing down at the last little bit of steak left, Zack took a deep breath, and slowly brought it to his lips and after a moment, opened wide. He chewed on the large chunk of meat for quite a while, while everyone around him watched, anxiously and cautiously. After some time, Zack gulped down that one final mouthful Then winced. After a moment, he opened his mouth to prove it was gone and held his empty platter up high. There was silence. Then, the crowd cheered. "I KNEW you had it in you!" said Kunsei. Zack smiled weakly and said, "...that makes one of us..."

The restaurant owner then came to Zack would a large trophy stuffed with some prize money and shook his hand for a photo. "Well done, son. I knew anyone tough enough to beat Sev and save our town was tough enough for the Show Stopper. Heh, how'd ya like the steak?" Zack opened his mouth to answer, but as he did, the air that was building up and waiting to be expelled could wait no longer.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRR RRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!*

Perhaps the largest belch Zack had ever produced, it was loud enough to drown out the congratulatory cheers and forceful enough to blow the owners hair back. After several seconds, it winded down, and Zack blushed with immense embarrassment, before rubbing the back of his head nervously and muttering a sheepish, "...s'cuse me..." The patrons couldn't help but laugh, the owner included. "I'll take that as a complement, hehe. Well, congrats on your victory, boy. And once again, thanks so much for all you've done for us. Remember, you and your friend are always welcome back here, whenever you want a bite to eat on us."

Zack and Kunsei thanked the man and after a few more thanks and expressions of gratitude from the rest of the crowd, both teens headed back to Kunsei's apartment.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111.title: Zack finishes the 72 oz steak

12231212121122121111211121111112121111.content:
Returning immediately back to the apartment, Kunsei helped Zack in, only for both to stumble onto the couch as Zack's immensely bloated gut stuck ouward and rested down almost towards as far as his thighs. He groaned; exhausted from the day. "Ugh, man...was that something or what...?" asked Zack. Kunsei simply smirked, still impressed and in awe that Zack actually managed to finish the Steak Challenge in one piece, then patted his friends belly gently in a congratulatory manner. "Fantastic progress, man," said Kunsei, I didn't think anyone could eat that much in just one sitting, let ALONE one plate!" Zack's stomach rumbled as he groaned and said, "Ugh, neither did I..."

Smiling, Kunsei lifted Zack's strained shirt off, exposing his still muscular torso coinciding with his bulbous gut and said, "Here, lemme make it feel a little better," and with that, began rubbing his friends rock hard boulder of a gut. "Ohhhhh, thank you so much, Kunsei. Can't tell you how badly I needed this..." said Zack with a much more relaxed and less strained voice. Kunsei was amazed. Zack's belly was more distended now than it had ever been, and the feel of his taut, bloated, yet still firm flesh along the palm of his hands felt heartier than ever. Kunsei found himself grabbing big slabs of flesh amidst the dome of a belly protruding through Zack's torso. He could feel his gut tense up and ease as he did his best to rub around the much larger gut. Zack simply kicked back and enjoyed the ride.

But then, as he felt his friends body in his hands, he remembered back to that moment during their fight against Sev and his goons, watching Zack taking such a vicious beating, then getting cut up left and right before overpowering Sev's henchmen, and despite his best efforts, it began to overwhelm Kunsei, who looked away, troubled. Zack took notice, then nudged his friend gently. "Something wrong?" asked Zack.

"...I was just, thinking about our fight with Sev. Seeing what they almost did to you..."
"Almost being the key word-"
"Zack, you could've been killed...w-who knows what might've happened if we didn't make it back to the Slums in time, o-or if that doctor didn't just happen to have a Phoenix Down on him! I mean, I-I..."

Flustered and scared, Kunsei tried his best not to break down. Zack did his best to calm him down. "What happened, happened. It's done now, and so is Sev."
"...I was scared. I didn't want to lose you, but I'm not as strong as you...I couldn't keep you safe from their assault..."
"What are you talking about? You DID keep me safe, remember? If you hadn't gotten me out of their hold, Sev would probably STILL be using my gut as a punching bag!" Zack said, half joking as he gave his large gut a pat for emphasis. "Don't ever doubt yourself, Kunsei. You didn't run away. You stuck by me. You fought alongside me, and you carried me and this friggin keg all the way back to the town. I owe you my life, man..." Hearing that, Kunsei glanced back at Zack as tears welled up, he rolled his eyes and looked away. "I'm sorry, I don't mean to be such a baby...." said an embarrassed Kunsei, but Zack wrapped his arm around him tight and squeezed playfully. "Don't sweat it, Mr. Hero." Kunsei rolled his eyes and nudged back. "Oh gimme a break," responded Kunsei. After a brief moment, he smiled back and rested his head on Zack's chiseled chest while wrapping his arms around Zack's bloated middle. He could feel it rumbling fiercely. "Sounds like someone's tummy is working overtime," joked Kunsei as he rested his palm dead center to Zack's gut. "May I?" Zack leaned back, smiling then said, "Have at it."

So Kunsei pressed down onto Zack's gurgling belly, forcing up a considerable amount of the excess gas building from his stomach digesting all that steak at once in the form of a disgustingly loud and bassy belch.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOR RRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!!!*

While not the longest, Zack's burp was loud enough to be heard from well outside the apartment. As it ended, Zack sighed with relief. "Ahhhh, there it is..." said Zack happily as he patted his belly proudly. Kunsei smiled and said, "Jeez, maybe I should'a worn earplugs!" joked Kunsei, before he asked "Feel better?"

Zack shook his head and grinned mischievously before saying, "Actually, I think there's still quite a bit left in there. That much meat always gives me a wicked case of gas. Would you do the honors?" Kunsei smiled back eagerly and said, "My pleasure." And so, Kunsei spent the next several moments prodding and pushing against Zack's bloated belly, forcing out one monstrous belch after another, and enjoying every second of it. Zack felt as though a cinderblock had been lifted from his stomach as each burp relieved a great deal of pressure from his stomach.

*BBBBRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAPPPP!* "Man, I dunno how you *EEEERRRRRPP!* do it, dude, but when it comes to helping a man *BBBUUUURRRRRP*...burp, you're a *PRO!*" said Zack between burps. Kunsei smiled and nudged ever so slightly just above Zack's belly button, forcing out a particularly loud belch which carried on for several seconds. "What can I say? I know what a body needs and where it needs it," responded Kunsei as he continued to prod and push away.

Some time had passed, but finally, Zack was all 'burped out', save for a few little afterburps here and there. His stomach felt just slightly lighter, still immensely bloated, but relieved enough to where he could move around with a little more ease. Looking at the time, Kunsei yawned and said, "Well, I don't know about you, but I could REALLY use some shut eye right about now. How about you, Zack?"
12231212121122121111211121111112121111.title: Immensely bloated and in dire need of a tummy rub

122312121211221211112111211111121211111.content:
Zack stretched his arms up high and yawned heartily. "Ugh, yeah dude, I'm about a half second from passing out," so Zack hoisted himself and his immense gut up from the couch, and headed off to Kunsei's bedroom. Still in board shorts, Zack plopped heavily onto Kunsei's bed as his stomach stuck up tremendously. Resting both hands atop it, Zack felt the added weight and how far out his midsection had now expanded since this gaining escapade had begun. "Damn, I'm gettin' huuuuuuge!" Zack thought to himself. He then turned to see Kunsei stripping down to his striped boxers. Jokingly, Zack started mouthing pole dancing music as Kunsei neatly tucked his clothes aside and rolled his eyes. "Har har har. Too funny, Porky Pine..."

Zack giggled immaturely as Kunsei hopped into bed alongside his friend, snuggling gently into Zack's bloated belly. "Mmm, your stomach's so warm and cozy," said Kunsei with a tired smile on his face. Smiling back, Zack wrapped his toned arm around his friend and snugged him closer. "Yeah, well, this big ol' tank's gotta be good for something," responded Zack as he patted his gut gently for emphasis. "And thanks for working your magic earlier, man. I'd still be a complete gassy mess if it weren't for those magic fingers'uh yours." Kunsei nodded then kneaded the sides of Zack's belly gently as a response, causing the bloated boy to moan in ease.

"So how much bigger do you plan on getting?" asked Kunsei half eager half curious as he absent mindedly continue to rub Zack's belly slowly. Zack shrugged, then after giving his belly a hearty slap, causing his taut flesh to jiggle slightly, he said, "I guess however bigger I can physically take it. Cause afterall, the bigger the stomach, the cozier the pillow, right?" To respond, Kunsei teasingly adjusted himself to Zack's stomach then plopped his head back into Zack's belly freely. "Besides," Zack started, "I've really enjoyed doing all this with you since we started. The eating, hanging out, eating, getting to know each other, eating, and just...just having this together. It's a feeling I wouldn't trade for anything else in the world, and one I want to keep experiencing for as long as I can." The two then stared silently for a moment before sharing in a short but tender kiss,

"Neither would I," responded Kunsei afterward.
122312121211221211112111211111121211111.title: "Let's hit the hay"

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Slowly, Zack's eyes flickered opened as he groggily rubbed them with his fist. Looking over at the alarm clock, he saw that it was almost 10:30am and Kunsei was already wide awake and in the living room. Cracking his neck, Zack yawned heartily, stretching both his arms high towards the sky before plopping them both to his tummy. His meal had properly digested overnight and therefore, his stomach had shrunken down considerably. However, as he prodded and clutched his taut flesh, he felt a considerable surplus of pudge where muscle used to be. Surprised, Zack smiled and slowly caressed his belly admirably. "Heh, coming along quite handsomely, aren't we?" said Zack to no one in particular, before giving his gut a hearty slap and feeling it jiggle in the palm of his hand. Giggling to himself, he rose up and exited to the living room. His eyes widened with curiosity when he saw several bags of what looked like Take-Out on the table and Kunsei on the couch watching T.V.

"Morning, studly," greeted Kunsei. Zack was still curious about the bags. "Morning. Uhh did you go out?" asked Zack.
"Huh? Oh yeah, I ordered take-out for breakfast. Figured you'd wanna put that 'free food' thing to use from yesterday."
"Free food? When did I-oh-OHHHH, right! Right, cause we saved the town from that pyro nut. Sorry, dude, I'm still all over the place from yesterday."
"No apologies necessary. Anyway, go wash up and whenever you're ready, let's dig in. Sound good?"

Taking a sniff, Zack licked his lips at the smell in the air and rubbed his now growling stomach with anticipation. "Sounds delicious."

After a soothing shower, Zack scrubbed down and stepped onto the scale to see where he was at currently. "166 lbs, not half bad," said Zack as he slapped his gut proudly. 166 wasn't a lot at all, but the fat hadn't been distributing to other portions of his body, which was why the rest of Zack was still as chiseled and trim as ever. Instead, it all went straight to his stomach, creating a gradually distending belly where his abs once were. After brushing his teeth, Zack just stared in the mirror, continuing to admire his gradually growing gut. He was surprised at how he could now grab a big chunk of fat towards his lower abdomen pull it slightly. He found that his softer middle complemented the rest of his muscle bound physique quite handsomely, and it only made him want to push on further. Just then, his stomach rumbled loudly, reminding Zack of what was waiting for him outside. So he rinsed out his mouth and headed right out eagerly and hungrily.

What awaited him was...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: The next morning

choices: It was better to save them for later.
It was better to eat them now while they're still nice, hot and fresh.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
"Ho-lee-crap..." was all Zack could say when he saw the sheer size of the pizza on the table, whose mix of sweet tangy BBQ sauce, sausage and zesty cheddar cheese was filling the room with an enchanting aroma. Zack took one big whiff and his mouth immediately began to water.

"I was thinking, after all the excitement yesterday, how would you feel about just relaxing here for the day?" asked Kunsei.
"Eh hehe, I could definitely use a lazy day after all that," Zack responded, brushing the back of his head nervously reliving the attack. "Besides, it'll be fun! Like we can kick back, watch TV, play games, and everything in between! Plus, if we're all by ourselves..." Zack started before grinning mischievously, "...then no reason to so modest, riiiiight?" he finished before pulling his short of and letting his bare torso do all the talking for him.

Kunsei nodded in agreement then smiled as he grabbed some paper plates and his mugs for the 2Liter bottle of cola set alongside the pizza box. "Hope you're hungry." As if to respond, Zack's stomach let out a tremendous groan, causing the young bloated hero to chuckle sheepishly. "Ask questions; get answers," he muttered as Kunsei laughed to himself and handed Zack his plate and cup.

"Bon appetite," said Kunsei before grabbing a few slices and putting them on his plate. Glancing back, he saw Zack already scarfing down his first slice at immensely quick pace. "Holy cow, you keep getting quicker and quicker. Watch, next time, it'll be a slice per bite!" Kunsei half joked, thinking that wasn't all together impossible for Zack, especially if challenged. Chewing up the last bit of crust and gulping down a hearty mouthful, Zack smacked his lips and promptly moved onto his second slice like clockwork, eventually gulping the whole thing down in no time at all. Licking the sauce from his hands, Zack grinned before giving his belly a hearty pat of satisfaction. "Mmmm-MMM! Now THESE folks know how to make a pizza!" said Zack as he continued to rub his sated tummy.

Upon finishing his first slice, Kunsei glanced back at Zack and asked, "You're done eating?" Zack raised an eyebrow before glancing back and Kunsei and blurting out a very blunt "Hell no!" and getting right back into his third slice. Kunsei smiled as he got to work on his second slice. Zack's pace had slowed down a tad, but he was nonetheless determined to fill his hungry tummy no matter how satisfied it already was. Stuffing the third slice down his gullet, Zack sighed heartily before feeling a bit of pressure build up from eating the third slice so quickly. After a moments break, the discomfort passed and after thumping his stomach, he moved onto the fourth.

Some time had passed until both young men had cleaned their plates, (for the most part) and were leaning back in their chairs, stuffed and satisfied. "Ahhhh, now was that a breakfast or what?" said a stuffed Kunsei as he rubbed his thin, albeit full from pizza stomach with both hands. "You can say that again..." responded Zack before giving his much bigger bare belly a hearty slap, causing it to jiggle, which solicited a small chuckle from both Kunsei and himself. Then without warning, Kunsei let out a surprise burp, audible and sudden enough to startle Kunsei and get a laugh out of Zack.

"Good one, bro!" laughed Zack. Kunsei smiled sheepishly then played it off as intentional. "Hehe, thanks." Then, for some reason, he poured himself a cup of soda and began chugging it down at a much faster rate than he was used to. Soda began to dribble down his chin and spill onto the collar of his t-shirt, but he didn't care. Upon finishing, Kunsei exhaled deeply, almost out of breath from downing so much so quick. He then pushed out a low, watery sounding burp immediately after, trailing off weakly towards the end, causing him to wince in pain as the rest began to build up. "Ugh, one sec, I think it's stu-*UUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!*" Before Kunsei could finish the rest of his statement, a much louder belch forced itself out from his throat and past his lips, extending for a few seconds straight quite loudly. When it came to an end, he sighed and wiped his forehead while Zack burst out laughing hysterically, his belly jiggling with him as he laughed.

In truth, it felt pretty good to kick back and just pig out. Of course, given his high metabolism, and already pretty docile albeit slightly muscular figure, it would take quite a while before Kunsei would ever get anywhere near as big as Zack, if he even could. All he knew was right now, he felt good. Feeling full and carefree made him blissful enough not to dwell on the near life threatening attack the two faced yesterday, and was just the outlet Kunsei needed. Though he'd be damned if he ever told Zack that after Zack saw how emotional the whole ordeal made him last night.

"Hahahaha! Oh man, where the hell'd that come from, dude?" asked Zack. To which, Kunsei feigned a shrug and said, "Been practicing, and wanted to show the sensei my skills." Zack nodded then held his hand forward, "You've got the skills, young warrior," Zack said in a mock elder's voice, causing Kunsei to snicker at the hilariously bad impression. "But, if we're talking skills..." Zack started before clutching his bloated midsection, "....then you may need some practice..." he then pressed firmly, promptly releasing a massive belch for emphasis.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPP!!*

Zack's burp carried on for almost seven seconds straight and carried enough force to blow Kunsei's brown hair back. "Ahhhh, sorry, was holding that one in for a while, hehe." responded Zack as he patted his belly happily. Laughing, Kunsei gave Zack a thumbs up, then leaned back once more. "Never gets old," Kunsei said. The morning was going great thus far. Then he remembered one outlet he'd enjoy more than himself getting bigger; Zack continuing to get bigger, as he noticed the pizza box still had around six more slices out of the initial 18 leftover and asked, "Hey, there's still a few slices left. Want 'em?"

Zack glanced back at the box, "Hmmm....I could probably down those no problem. On the other hand, I'm pretty full..." Zack thought for a moment, then decided...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Xtra BBQ Pizza - The Breakfast of Heroes

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
"Ah, why not? May as well get 'em while they're fresh, right?" said Zack as he reached for one of the last remaining slices. As he brought it to his mouth however, his bloated gut groaned violently, causing him to wince in pain as he clutched his midsection firmly. "Something wrong?" asked Kunsei, who heard Zack's noisy tummy all the way from the other side of the table, to which Zack replied, "Ugh, I dunno man. I'm kinda having a hard time with these...might be fuller than I thought..." he said as he continued to clutch and prod at his belly in an effort to calm it down. Kunsei thought for a moment then:

"Maybe I can help," he said as he pulled his seat right next to Zack's and began to rub Zack's boulder heavy stomach gently with only one hand. The always soothing feeling of Kunsei's hand caressing his bloated and tense flesh made Zack coo gently as his stomach continued to groan heavily. In his eased state, Kunsei was able to take the slice of pizza and bring it to Zack's mouth. "Now, open wide," said Kunsei as Zack, much more relaxed, simply complied and took a large bite.
