Chewing for a moment, he struggled to gulp down his mouthful, but Kunsei continued to rub the tensest portions of Zack's stomach, easing his stomach muscles as they worked on the pizza Zack had just gulped down. After continuing to rub for a little while longer, Kunsei brought the rest of the slice into Zack's mouth, depositing the whole thing slowly and gently into Zack's mouth as he bit down on the pizza and pulled it into his mouth bit by bit until the entire thing was one giant mouthful. Kunsei giggled at the slight of Zack's cheeks ballooned outward with virtually entire slice of pizza being chewed up inside.

*GULLLLP*

It took some doing, but Zack managed to gulp down the entire mouthful, sighing heartily from near exhaustion. His stomach churned wickedly, almost in protest from so much being broken down at once. Zack moaned in discomfort and said weakly, "Ugh, dude, it's too much. I swear if I eat anymore, I'm gonna hurl..." Kunsei could hear that there was a lot building up in Zack's belly all at once. Then another idea came to mind. "Hold that thought, my man."

He then grabbed the liter of soda and uncapped the bottle's top. Zack glanced with confusion and a bit of worry then nervously asked, "Uhhh, w-what are you doing?" Kunsei brought the bottle's top near Zack's lip and said, "I have a theory, and I'm pretty sure this should work."
"....Pretty sure...?"
"C'mon, just trust me on this one."

Hesitant, Zack slowly opened his mouth as Kunsei brought the bottle to his lips and lifted it upward as the carbonated cola washed down Zack's throat. Zack gulped down great amounts of soda, his eyes tearing up from so much carbonation at once, then Kunsei pulled the bottle back, as Zack burped wetly immediately after and began panting heavily, nearly out of breath. His stomach bubbled and churned even more violently than it was before, causing Zack immense discomfort. "Oof...dude, whatever your plan was, I really don't think..." was all Zack could muster before Kunsei pressed on the tensest portion of Zack's belly, replacing the rest of Zack's sentence with a disgustingly loud:

*buuurrr-RRRRRRAAAAAAAAAPPP!*

Zack's short but bassy belch boomed through Kunsei's apartment forcefully. Suddenly, Zack's stomach wasn't churning so heavily anymore. "There we go. Feel better?" asked Kunsei. Zack paused for a moment, still a bit startled by his sudden eruption, but then he noticed the discomfort in his midsection had softened considerably. "Yeah. I feel a lot better actually!"
"I figured as much. That much food and grease at once had to be collecting a lot of unneeded air. And between all the other stuff your tummy was working on, it was starting to get a little crowded. Ergo, problem solved." Smiling, Kunsei gave Zack's belly a light hearted pat, accidentally forcing out another loud belch, which caught them both by surprise. "...A little warning next time...?" said Zack, half-joking, half-startled.
"...S-sorry, heh..." responded Kunsei sheepishly.

And so Kunsei fed Zack the next slice, and the next, and the next. All the while easing his belly with his soothing massage and working out any excess pressure whenever needed, until finally, the pizza box was empty.

Zack was sprawled onto the couch, groaning weakly as his immensely bloated gut gurgled and churned immensely, working down its' massive intake. Kunsei had finished putting everything away then sat beside Zack, leaning on him as he heard his tired gut digest noisily. "How's that for a hero's breakfast?" asked Kunsei. Too stuffed to speak, Zack merely groaned, half from pain, half from satisfaction. "Ohhhh man, talk about overkill, heh..." was all Zack could muster. Kunsei rested his hand atop Zack's taut flesh, admiring just how distended it had grown, pushing outward like a balloon. He massaged wherever felt tense, trying to ease the pain as best he could. "How's that feel?" asked Kunsei as he gently rubbed Zack's belly in his usual circular motion, near his upper and lower abdomen. "Incredible..." moaned Zack in comfort as Kunsei continued to rub Zack's aching belly, gradually making the pain go away.

As Kunsei rubbed Zack's middle, he simply glanced at it with awe. It never ceased to amaze him to see just how much food Zack could put away in one outing. And the feel and sight of his bloated flesh just drove Kunsei wild, though he masked it as best he could around his friend, though Zack was more than aware and as much as he loved this satisfied, stuffed feeling, he loved how much Kunsei loved it even more. Which was why he nudged Kunsei closer to his belly and said, "Hey, check this out." Zack then held his breath and pushed his belly outward more, like a balloon being blown up even bigger. Kunsei couldn't believe how much larger Zack's stomach grew as it pushed outward. Playfully, Kunsei pressed his ear to Zack's belly and drummed on it. The echo felt and sounded almost hollow like an empty water gallon. Zack then exhaled, as his belly dropped back to its' regular bloated form.

"C-could you do that again? Pretty please?" asked Kunsei anxiously, giving Zack puppy dog eyes to coax him into a 'yes.' "Awww, no fair. I thought that was my thing," joked Zack in response. Laughing, he nodded then took a deep breath and held it, pushing out his belly even more than his previous breath. Kunsei enjoyed hugging Zack's immensely bloated gut like a fleshy pillow while Zack enjoyed the feel of Kunsei around his stomach. But rather than simply exhale, Zack smiled to himself and instead gulped down the air he'd held, causing his stomach to retract slightly before he poked Kunsei's back. Kunsei looked up at Zack curiously, then;

*bbbbbbbbbbbbuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuUUUUUUUUUUUuUuUuUuUuUuUuUOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRPPPPP! *

Zack let rip a disgustingly explosive burp right in Kunsei's face, forceful enough to blow his hair back and carrying with it, the scent of his massive meal. "Ahhhh, how's THAT for showing off talent?" said Zack as he sighed and patted his belly. The sight and the sheer beauty of Zack's manly display was too much. Unable to contain himself any longer, Kunsei jumped towards Zack and the two started making out on the spot. Zack's stomach churned the entire time...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Kunsei feeds Zack the rest of the pizza

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
After the excitement had passed for the time being, the two decided to unwind with some video games, which proved to be quite a refreshing endeavor. Both had been on the field so often and so fiercely, that just kicking back with a little video game action seemed like but a fond memory of someone much older than these teenaged warriors. As with real life, Zack was also quite superior in the gaming world as well. Match after match, the two played fighting games for hours, and each one ended the same, with Zack beating Kunsei ridiculously.

"Haha! Aaaaaand that's game. Again," gloated Zack. Kunsei simply scoffed and grabbed his control. "C'mon, best two out of three!" he urged, eager to play some more. Zack laughed. He hadn't seen Kunsei's competitive side before, and simply put; it was just adorable. "Well, technically, wouldn't be best two out of....like a million?"
"Bah! You game or what?"
"Oh ho ho, you know it. I just hope you don't mind getting crushed....again. But this time..." Zack started, "let's shake things up a bit."

Kunsei glanced curiously. "Shake things up?"
"Yeah. If I win again; which I will, then you gotta down that entire 2 liter bottle of soda in one go." Kunsei looked a bit nervous. Such a task would be a breeze for Zack, less so for him. But part of him really wanted to see what pushing himself the way Zack had done was like, and if he could pull it off. So he accepted. "Fine. You're on! But! If I win-"
"-which you won't."
"IF I win...then you gotta chug two of those 2 liter bottles in one go!"

Zack raised an eyebrow. He[d never downed that much fizzy drink before. But glancing down at his mighty gut, he figured he could take it. And besides, it's not like he'd ever lose to Kunsei. So he accepted. "Okay. You're on. Let's do this!" he said, giving his stomach a slap of confidence for emphasis, causing it to ripple for a few seconds before the two grabbed their controllers and went at it.

The button mashing was immense, and both fought relentlessly, but ultimately, there would be one winner, and that winner was...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Later...

choices: Zack rubs Kunsei's tummy to ease the pain.
Kunsei sits there for a moment and relieves as much pressure as he can.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
"Game. Set. Match!" cheered Zack as he held both his arms up victoriously. Kunsei rolled his eyes and put his controller down. "Ugh, good game, I guess..." he said begrudgingly. Zack then ruffled his short brown hair jokingly then, with a smirk, pointed to the 2 liter bottle of cola sitting on the table for him. Taking a deep breath, he grabbed the bottle and twisted off the cap. Pausing for a moment, he then took off his shirt, exposing his thin muscular torso; albeit nowhere near as muscular as Zack then said, "I like that shirt, don't wanna spill anything on it."

Zack waited eagerly and asked, "Ready?" A moment passed, then Kunsei brought the bottle to his lips and started chugging. "Chug! Chug! Chug!" chanted Zack jokingly. Kunsei's eyes watered as he continued chugging nonstop, all the way down to the top of the label, until finally, stopping so he could take a breath. Panting heavily, he burped loudly then rested one hand on his abs, trying to catch his breath. After a moment, he went right on back to chugging. The more he chugged, the more his stomach began to push out just ever so slightly. Combined with the heavy breakfast of BBQ Pizza he and Zack had indulged themselves earlier, the bulge wasn't noticeable, but the more carbonated beverage he ingested, the more it became apparent to both Zack and himself. He was roughly one third of the way done with the bottle before he needed to catch his breath again. Pulling the bottle from his lips and burping wetly immediately after, Kunsei clutched his uncomfortably bloated (for him) stomach with one hand and groaned in pain.

"How ya feeling, champ?" asked Zack.
"Ugh, I don't know how you can put away so much at once, man..." responded Kunsei as another smaller burp worked its' way out of his mouth. Catching his breath, he went right back to chugging. Some cola dribbled past his cheeks and dripped down on his chest as it had reached near the halfway mark. All the while, Zack watched as his friends abs began to noticeably bloat outward from so much carbonation being ingested at once. Considering how thin Kunsei was, it was impressive to see him put away so much in so quick a pace. "Damn, dude. Not bad. Not bad at all, actually!" At this rate, he could give Zack himself a run for his money should the two ever compete in this faucet.

After downing more than half the 2 liter bottle, Kunsei caught his breath for the third time, and moaned in pain as he rubbed his now noticeably bloated stomach in pain. "You alright, man?" asked Zack. Kunsei winced then saying, "Oof, I dunno, my tummy feels like a balloon on the verge of popping..." Zack laughed aloud and said, "Did you just say 'tummy'? Awww, that's adorable!" Kunsei chuckled a bit. It was kind of a cute word, though he was not quite sure why he said 'tummy' either. Regardless, he continued to massage his aching belly until the pain had subsided long enough for him to go back to chugging.

More and more, Kunsei chugged while Zack continued to watch and cheer his friend on. "Come on, you can do it, champ! Chug-uh-lug. Chug-uh-lug!" And all the while, his belly continued to inflate like a balloon slowly getting air blown into it with each mouthful of soda gulped down. As he chugged, Kunsei rested one hand on his stomach, feeling it expand with every bit of soda consumed. While painful for someone as immediately thin as him, at the same time, it felt kind of good, pushing his stomach to its' absolute limits, and feeling it expand little by little upon his fingertips. His chugging became more strained as he neared end, each gulp of soda became harder and harder to keep down. But rather than stop, Kunsei kept on chugging, much to Zack's surprise. "Damn, dude..." was all Zack could say as he watched Kunsei fight through the pain and chug damn near the entire second half of soda in what looked like it would be one go. At this point, Kunsei had himself a little balloon belly from the massive amounts of air brewing with the carbonated drink, making him uncomfortably tense, and causing him to tear up even more. Each gulp hurt his throat and his stomach, but he kept on going, to the point where it felt like his stomach would legitimately explode.

Finally, after all that, he pulled the bottle from his lips and turned it over. Not a single drop left. Zack cheered him on. "WOO! You did it, man! That was freakin' awesome!" he said to a rather dazed Kunsei. "So? How do ya feel now, champ? Kunsei didn't respond. The amount of air in his belly was too great to allow any kind of response, so instead, he opened his mouth and expelled a massive:

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!*

Kunsei let out perhaps the loudest, window rattling belch he'd ever let out in his life, carrying on for several seconds straight before it finally came to an end. Zack laughed hysterically and said "Damn, that was huge!" Kunsei smirked weakly and let rip another loud and strained belch immediately afterward, before groaning and sitting on the couch, caressing his bloated belly with both hands. "Man, I...*URP*...didn't think I could pull it off, but sure en-*BUUURP!*-enough, here we are. Ugh....my stomach really, really, *urp* really hurts" Kunsei said between burps.

So then...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Zack!  (yet again!)

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Zack marveled at how bloated his friend had gotten from a mixture of pizza and an entire 2 liter bottle of soda all in one seemingly simultaneous outing. He then poked at Kunsei's belly, feeling how stiff and immense it felt, causing Kunsei to wince. "Sorry about that. I think I'm just starting to really notice how much you put away." Kunsei laughed weakly and poked at Zack's much larger belly and said, "Nothing compared to the real champ," responded Kunsei. Smirking, Zack slapped his beachball sized belly for emphasis, resulting in a brief jiggle. "Oh don't worry, should the occasion arise, I'm sure you could give 'the champ' a run for his money," said Zack, but his response was drowned out by a loud gurgling emanating from Kunsei's stomach, causing the young man to groan in pain and clutch his uncomfortably distended gut with both hands. "Yeah, it hurts like hell at first. But remember when we started? Remember how you made my pain go away? Well, if you don't mind, I'd like to return the favor."

Kunsei didn't know what to say. He loved Zack's touch and for it to help ease the pain would only prove to be icing on the cake. So he nodded appreciatively, then paused for a moment. "Oh wait, one sec," he said before unbuttoning the top button to his pants. In that instant, Zack's eyes widened as Kunsei's belly began to balloon outward over his strained pants, pushing the zipper outward in the process. Eager to get started, Zack rubbed his hands together and then placed them both atop Kunsei's swollen stomach. He then began to rub all over, causing his friend to coo with delight, rather than moan in pain. Zack could hear the cauldron sounding churn ease already as his touch pressed against the tensest portions of Kunsei's stomach.

Admittedly, Zack's hands felt much more rough than Kunsei's, but to him, they were rough and firm in all the right places, making for efficient tension alleviation all over. "How's that feel?" asked Zack as he rubbed. Kunsei smiled and said, "Utterly...fantastic. Thank you so much."
"Anytime," responded Zack as he kissed Kunsei tenderly on the cheek, causing the young man to smile back at Zack and pull him in to kiss across the lips.

The gurgling subsided, as the rubbing stimulated Kunsei's abdomen, and eased a lot of the tension brewing in a stomach not used to storing so much at once. However, in addition to which, the rubbing also worked out much of the gas that had been building up from he carbonation that hadn't initially been expelled after Kunsei finished chugging his soda. So just before he and Zack could lock lips, Kunsei opened his mouth and, well...

*BBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPRRPPP !!!*

Kunsei's eyes widened and his face went red as he had just accidentally burped loudly in Zack's face. "Excuse me! Oh my God, I-I'm so sorry, I-I didn't mean to-" but Zack's laughter interrupted him. "Hahaha! Good one, dude!" he said, patting Kunsei's belly. "You're not pissed?" asked a nervous Kunsei. Zack shook his head and said, "Why would I be? It's only natural. Plus, your burps are beastly. And of course, as you know, I don't get mad," he said before pulling Kunsei close to his face. "I get even." He then gulped down some air and burped as hard as he could in Kunsei's face.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUU UURRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!*

Zack's burp carried enough force to blow Kunsei's hair back, carrying with it the same BBQ Pizza scent as before. Smacking his lips and giving his belly a hearty pat, Zack smiled back at Kunsei, who immediately locked lips with the bloated young hero, allowing the two to make out atop the couch, as both their bloated bellies continuously pushed into each other during.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Zack rubs Kunsei's tummy to ease the pain.

choices: He started chugging down the second bottle.
His stomach shook and churned violently.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
And so the battle reigned on and on, neither side backing down. Zack was smashing buttons and glancing frantically as Kunsel confidently began to gain the upper hand, eventually finishing the game with his character upper cutting Zack's character out of orbit. Victorious for the first time, Kunsel got up and did a little victory dance that went on for far too long. Zack merely sat there, still utterly bewildered that he could ever lose in a game he'd been known to pretty much dominate all opposition in, especially against Kunsel of all people. "Boo-ya! Can-you-dig-that?!" gloated Kunsel as he can through every victory one-liner he could think up on the spot, which; sadly, was quite a few. Zack simply sighed and rose from his seat.

"Yeah, yeah. Good game..." he grumbled childishly. He then recalled the other thing that came with defeat, as did Kunsel as he immediately trotted and handed Zack his first 2 liter bottle of soda. "Now remember, don't think of this as you drinking away defeat. Think of it as you celebrating one of the few victories your dear pal Kunsel has ever got against someone," he said with a playful grin. Zack smirked then nudged Kunsel's shoulder as he took the bottle from him and unscrewed the top. Once the fizziness had settled, he held the bottle up and said, "Cheers, dude," then went to town.

He'd gulped down a considerable amount with ease and with no signs of stopping. Kunsel watched as the massive gulps of soda traveled from Zack's throat down to his ever expanding stomach. Finally; after reaching the half-way mark of his first bottle within less than a minute, Zack removed the bottle from his lips and sighed heavily to catch his breath. He then clutched his gut with his free hand and pushed out a bassy *BBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP!* followed by a smaller burp afterward. "Hehe, nice one!" complemented Kunsel with a thumbs up. Smacking his lips, Zack gently slapped his belly and continued on.

Chugging more and more. Hoping to get this first bottle out of the way as quick as possible, until finally draining the first bottle with damn near superhuman ease. "Ahhhhh, now that hit the spot!" said Zack as he rubbed his bloated middle slowly. Seeing how far distended it had grown, Kunsel got up and very gently rested his hand atop Zack's ballooned belly. "Jeez, looks like you swallowed a couple of friggin' watermelons, man!"

Grinning, Zack brought Kunsel in for a closer look, allowing him to rest his ear onto his belly as the gas and fizz from the drink caused his stomach to churn and bubble quite audibly. "Does that sound like a watermelon to you?" asked Zack. Kunsel smiled back and snuggled closer, hugging Zack's large belly with both hands as he pressed his ear right up against his stomach. "How about this...?" followed Zack as he looked down at his friend, before...

*BBBBBBRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPP!*-*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP!*

Zack let rip a bassy two parter as hard as he could in Kunsel's face, causing him to laugh aloud as Zack sighed with relief. "Whew, that felt good," said Zack with relief in his voice as he reached for the second bottle.

"You ready?" asked Kunsel, both anxious and a tad nervous in case it proved to be too much for the young hero. But Zack was all but confident as he winked at his friend and said, "Watch and learn."

And with that...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Kunsel!  (Shockingly!)

choices: He fights through the pain and finishes the second half in one go.
The pain gets worse as he continues to chug.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Zack grabbed the second bottle and unscrewed the cap, then took a deep breath and went right back to chugging all over again. His eyes watered from the extra dose of carbonation being ingested all at once. This time around, he chugged at a much slower rate, due to how full he was already feeling. He began to wince in pain as he clutched his immensely swollen abdomen, then shortly after, forced himself to remove his lips from the bottle as he'd swallowed down just above the label near the top. He gasped for air and breathed heavily as his stomach churned violently.

Kunsel glanced at his friend with concern and asked, "Hey, are you already, man?" But Zack didn't respond. Instead he clamped his hand over his mouth, as though he were about to throw up. Kunsel inched away, preparing for the worst. Instead what came up was a loud closed mouth burp.

*MMMMMMMMMMRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!*

Zack's cheeks inflated from the large amount of gas reverberating within his mouth, but still, he seemed green around the gills to Kunsel. So he began to rub his friend's back gently, like that of a toddlers. This resulted in Zack easing up slightly as a few more deep burps worked their way up, which; this time, he released proudly, each one sharper and louder than the last.

*uuuuuuuoooooooorrrrrrrrrrppppp* *bbbbbbbbrrrrrrrrraaaaaaaaaapppp!* *BBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRPPPPPP!*

Sighing with relief, his stomach ceased its' churning. With enough gas expelled, Zack could once again resume his chugging endeavor. With each gulp, his belly continued to bloat outward, well past its' limits. Kunsel simply marveled as it pushed beyond Zack's waist and road up his thighs. The carbonated beverage did a great job of speeding the expanding process up tenfold. He placed both hands atop his vastly distended middle and slowly rubbed gently all around. He had to legitimately reach to get both hands all the way across this borderline globular gut. "Man, this is crazy...I mean I knew soda makes a person bloated, but jeez..." responded an astounded Kunsel as he continued to rub.

After some time, Zack once again stopped chugging almost near the halfway mark of his bottle and gasped heavily for breath once again. Chugging so much was taking a lot of energy out of him. His face was flush with exhaustion and wet from both sweat and tears caused from the carbonation and lack of oxygen flow from chugging so much for so long a time at a slowed down breathing rate. Taking a deep breath, Zack sighed heartily, then opened his mouth to expel more pressure, but nothing came up but a tiny (for Zack at least) watery burp which caused Zack to break into a fit of coughing. Kunsel laughed then said, "It's probably best not to force them out yourself right now. Perhaps someone who knows where to apply just the right amount of pressure onto your tummy could help? Me? Well, if you insist." Zack rolled his eyes, too bloated to properly respond to his friends' cheesy attempt at being funny. Instead, Kunsel moved his hands to the center of Zack's upper belly and pushed both hands just so slightly down onto it, forcing out a large rush of gas as a result.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAPPPPPPPPP!!!!!*

The following eruption carried on for a few seconds straight and was loud enough to make Kunsel's ears ring. Zack appeared surprised by the sheer volume of his sudden belch. "Is it strange for a person to burp better when someone else pushes them out...?" asked Zack, half joking. Kunsel simply laughed and shrugged. "Probably. But strange or not, there's no denying the results." For emphasis, he kneaded Zack's belly again, forcing out another window rattling belch from Zack's mouth, which caused both boys to laugh aloud like little kids.

"Alright, I think that made enough room," Zack said, then resumed chugging the second half of the bottle...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: He started chugging down the second bottle.

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Zack took one last deep breath and proceeded to chug away the remainder of the bottle. Little by little, Kunsel watched as Zack's belly continued to grow yet even more than it had already grown, pushing young Zack to his absolute limits. He placed his ear against Zack's sloshing and gurgling gut, listening as it continued to collect and expand as more soda was deposited within it, listening as it bubbled incoherently as the last drops of soda had been forced down Zack's throat, until finally, the bottle was all but empty. Kunsel smiled then patted his friend gently, "I can't believe it, you actually did it! That's awesome, man!" congratulated Kunsel, but Zack was not in the physical state to agree with the notion.

His face flush from exhaustion and covered in sweat, he plopped back onto the couch and clutched his belly hard immediately afterwards, followed by a strained groan of pain. "Ugh....dude.....this challenge was a mist-*MRRPPP!*...urrgh...a mistake..." struggled Zack as he caressed his troubled gut with both hands, feeling his mouth water painfully as the bile rose up his throat. Kunsel's expression changed to one of concern as he rubbed Zack's back gently. "Are you okay?"
"N-no, man, I feel like I'm about to throw-" was all Zack could muster before he felt his gorge rise up his throat. Immediately, Zack clamped his mouth shut with one hand and sprinted as best he could with such a distended middle straight towards the bathroom. His belly wobbling with each step, increasing the intestinal discomfort that was ailing Zack. Kunsel promptly followed him to make sure he was okay. His face had rested towards the toilet seat as he doubled over and kept his mouth open towards it, wanting nothing but to throw up. But that wasn't what happened.

Instead, his belly groaned yet again, causing the young man to tear up in pain as he called out to Kunsel's name, who immediately ran to Zack's aide. "Zack!" shouted Kunsel as placed his hand atop his shoulder. Zack felt his gorge rising again, but he managed to hold it down long enough to turn to Kunsel and say, "Hehe, guess there are some challenges we shouldn't put ourselves in..."

He knelt before Zack and after very gently pressing his hand against Zack's protruding belly, began to rub it tenderly as always, doing his best to maintain composure. "Zack, I'm sorry, I shouldn't have made up this whole stupid challenge. It was selfish of me, I just really-"
"-wanted to see how big I'd get after, I know. So did I. Hell, why'd you think I said yes?"
"Yeah, but I hate seeing you in so much pain! Look at where we are!"

Suddenly, Zack jerked back as he leaned back down into the toilet bowl. Seems Kunsel's fingers had worked up whatever was causing Zack's intestinal discomfort. But it wasn't what either one was expecting. Instead, Zack opened his mouth and let fly a massive, throaty belch which carried on for several seconds straight and echoed all throughout Kunsel's apartment.

As it finally winded down, both Zack and Kunsel stared for a moment, before laughing with relief. "Whew, thank God..." said Kunsel as he patted Zack's belly happily. Zack meanwhile just plopped lazily into Kunsel's unexpecting arms, forcing both boys to fall onto their backs in the bathroom, making them both laugh with relief before Zack let out yet another window rattling burp immediately after. Followed by another, and another and another after that. Much to both their amusement, seemed the carbonation ingested from both bottles grew too much for Zack's poor tummy. And so for the next several moments, the two just laid on the bathroom floor. Kunsel; prodding all around Zack's massive belly, and Zack, exhausted as he continued to burp uncontrollably.

"Jeez, how can you do that so many times in a row and not get dizzy?" asked an admittedly impressed Kunsel as he prodded and massaged Zack's troubled gut. Zack turned to him and muttered "Truth be *BRRRRAAAAP!* told, I DO feel pretty *URRP* dizzy...." said a damn near dazed Zack between burps, causing Kunsel to laugh. Admittedly, now that the urgency had subsided, this gassy outburst proved quite comical and above all else, very impressive to Kunsel as he enjoyed how Zack's belches seemed to get louder and wetter with each one. Zack on the other hand...was less than amused.

Finally, after all that was settled...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: He fights through the pain and finishes the sec...

choices: Zack scarfs down his meal with gusto.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Some time had passed since the relatively messy conclusion of that double liter challenge Kunsel imposed on Zack, and he was all but better now, and shockingly starving as his impressive gut rumbled loudly for food.

Rather then utilize the free meals from the grateful town, Kunsel decided to cook up a bounty of Gongaga classics. Upon entering the kitchen, Zack was overwhelmed by the delightful aroma of Pineapple glazed Chicken, buttered rice, black pepper seasoned pasta, spicy sausage, the works. The aroma almost immediately took Zack back to his childhood.

"Smells like home," noted Zack with a reminiscent smile on his face. Kunsel smirked back and nodded. "Thought after so much local delicacies, you might like a little taste of home every now and then. Think of it as an apology for that stupid dare," responded Kunsel. Scoffing, Zack walked over to a hard at work Kunsel and patted him on the back. "Ah, don't even worry about all that. Glad to at least know where my limits stand."

After finishing, Kunsel set the various platters onto his dining table for both he and Zack (mostly Zack) to dig into. Wasting no time, Zack took that first bite of Gongaga style Chicken. As if a million flavors had hit his tongue at once, Zack immediately began cutting up and scarfing down the chicken breast bite after bite. Kunsel seemed to be enjoying his peppered Steak, clearly admiring his own cooking talents. "Mmmm, dude, I swear, not even my mom could ever make Gongaga Chicken taste this amazing!" said Zack between bites.
Kunsel smiled and said, "Thanks, man. Mmm, y'know, come to think of it, I should try cooking more Gongaga classics more often."

Upon finishing his chicken, Zack immediately helped himself to a heaping bowl of the creamy peppered pasta. The heavy meal brought a surplus of spice and zest to Zack's taste buds, as he couldn't help but simply admire the flavor before continuing to inhale the pasta. Within no time at all, Zack had scarfed down his pasta bowl and had completely licked his bowl clean. Letting out a deep belch immediately afterward, Zack smacked his lips and patted his immensely swollen belly in satisfaction. "Mmmm, spicy."

Kunsel laughed as he finishes his steak and helps himself to a bit of pasta and sausage. "Dude, if ever I was glad to have put on so much weight, it's this meal right here. Because now, I can appreciate so much more of my childhood favorites then I could prior."
"Haha, well, I guess that's one perk to our little endeavor."
"One of many, bro."

After a moment, Kunsel glanced back at Zack who was still stuffing his face silly, and said "Can I ask you something?" Zack simply nodded as he gulped down a hearty mouthful of chicken and rice. "Do you ever miss home?"

Pausing for a moment, Zack smirked softly and shrugged. "Well, yeah, sure I do. I miss Mom and Dad, my friends, the countryside, the color. I miss it a whole lot sometimes."
"What made you leave?"

"SOLDIER. Ever since I was a kid, all I ever dreamed about was being a hero. Back home, all we ever heard about were the exciting missions the great heroes Sephiroth or Angeal had just returned from. Saving innocents, stopping the bad guys. That's what I wanted to do with my life. Make a difference. Help people. Maybe make my folks proud and...meet someone along the way?" Zack added a little wink to the last part of his statement, earning a blush from Kunsel.

"Can't argue with sentiment," noted Kunsel as he bit down on another piece of sausage. Pausing briefly, Zack smirked reminiscently. "Still, nothing ever beat the days back home. Just the little things we don't get in Midgar, like just resting under the Gongaga Palm trees. The grass beneath your bare feet, family always there for you. I guess that's one of the reasons I've enjoyed this little trek of ours so much."

Kunsel glanced curiously at Zack and asked, "What do you mean?"
"Just recapturing some of that carefree lifestyle, and just, enjoying the ride with someone you care about. It's not something a lot of guys at SOLDIER can appreciate anymore. I'm just, glad the sentiment isn't lost on ALL of us."
'Me too, man."

A moment passed before Zack's stomach seemed to growl angrily, earning a chuckle from Zack. "Welp, that's enough mushy stuff for one dinner. Bon appetite."
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Dinner time!

choices: "It's getting pretty late.  Wanna hit the hay?"
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
*BUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPPP!!!*

Zack let out a loud, drawn out belch for a few seconds straight before sighing with relief and leaning back in his chair. "Phew, haven't had a meal like that in a looooooong time," said Zack, smiling happily as he rested both hands atop his now beach-ball sized belly and glanced down at several now empty plates stacked atop one another. Kunsel smiled back and said, "I knew you'd like a taste of home."

To which, Zack simply nodded, whilst rubbing his sizable stomach slowly, then noted, "For real, dude, sooner or later, you gotta open up a restaurant."
"Someday, maybe. For now, it's all for the eventual hero of Midgar," responded Kunsel, whose plate still had most of his peppered Steak left over. He, however, was too fixated on watching Zack eat to really focus on his own food, which Zack noticed and asked, "Aren't you gonna finish your food?"

A moment passed, until Kunsel slyly said, "Ummm, no no, I'm too full to finish." He leaned back in his chair and patted his thin and empty stomach for emphasis, which caused Zack to smirk and raise an eyebrow skeptically. "Buuuuuut if you're still hungry..." Kunsel hinted, childishly nudging his plate towards his friend. "I dunno, I'm pretty full myself..." responded Zack as he slapped his larger belly for the similar emphasis as Kunsel, "Buuuuuut I s'pose I could find my way to finishing up if a certain someone helped me finish it."

More then eagerly, Kunsel plopped himself next to Zack and cut a large piece of steak with his fork and knife into various pieces, then eased his fork towards Zack's awaiting mouth. Zack took his bite and chewed the chunk of meat slowly, enjoying the zesty well seasoned flavor, before gulping it down. "Mmmm, now that's what I call zesty..." responded Zack before Kunsel smiled and brought another piece to Zack's mouth. As Zack chewed on this next chunk, Kunsel took his free hand and placed it right atop Zack's overly distended middle, simply feeling his bare, tight skin vibrate as Zack's belly began to work down the surplus of food he'd ingested.

"Hehe, sounds hard at work in there, doesn't it?" said Kunsel as he gently patted Zack's belly and fed him another piece of steak. Zack moaned with delight as each bite began to taste zestier and tastier then the last, and as Kunsel began to gently stroke Zack's stomach slowly. "How's that feel?" asked Kunsel.
"Feels....*BRRRAAAAAP!*....oof...great..." responded Zack in a strained voice, before thumping his chest and burping loudly again. "Ugh...talk about heartburn..."

The two laughed for a moment then went back to work on the plate.

Finally, after finishing up, both Zack and Kunsel had cozied up on the couch, watching TV. Kunsel had snuggled up to Zack's slightly more extended balloon belly like that of a cushion, while Zack kept one arm wrapped around Kunsel, and the other atop his domed gut. "Man, oh man, thanks for that, Kunsel..." said Zack, patting his belly and yawning audibly. "Haven't had a lazy kick-back day like this in a long time..."
"Tell me about it..." responded Kunsel, who listened in as Zack's rounded stomach continued to digest and churn loudly.
"Seriously, thanks so much for this, man. Means a lot to me." said Zack as he kissed Kunsel gently across the cheek, causing him to smile back and nudge him gently. "My pleasure. Soooo, what do you wanna do now?"

Zack thought for a moment...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Zack scarfs down his meal with gusto.

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Zack plops lazily onto the bed, which creaks slightly under his weight. His distended gut sticks out upward as he sighs and rests one hand atop it. "Ahh, today sure was fun, eh, Kunsel?" Smiling, Kunsel stripped down to his boxers before hopping in bed and nuzzled against Zack's broad chest warmly, nodding. "Sure was," he noted as he rested one hand atop Zack's belly, rubbing it gently and slowly. Almost purring, Zack smiled with delight as he wrapped one arm around Kunsel and pulled him closer. "Mmm, I swear, that never doesn't feel amazing..." said Zack, in utter bliss. Kunsel smiled, equally enjoying the smooth feel of Zack's vast midsection beneath his fingers and said, "You can say that again..."

"Seriously, I can't believe how long it's been since I've ever just spent the days just kicking back. Part of me feels like a little kid again!"
"Well, you've always been a big kid at heart," responded Kunsel, reflecting on some of Zack's more adorably childish moments in the time they've known each other. The two laughed briefly before sighing in ease. "Y'know, the people here in the Slums got the right idea," started Zack, getting Kunsel's attention.

"The marauders took everything from them and no one ever came to help because no one cared, but they didn't just lay down and die. They rebuilt, and made the most of what they had. They just seem so genuine...so happy...and BOY do they know how to eat up here," laughed Zack, slapping his belly for emphasis, causing it jiggle slightly beneath Kunsel's palm, earning a laugh from Kunsel as well, before he responded with, "Yeah, that's one of the reasons I chose to live down here instead of central Midgar. They're a good, honest, hard working bunch of people, kiiiiiiinda like someone else I know..."

Looking back at Kunsel, Zack smiled warmly as he pecked him across the neck, then after a moment, said, "I've been thinking. Neither SOLDIER nor Shinra'll ever go out of their way to help these guys in case someone like Sev or worse ever shows up. And, well, the time we've been spending together's only gotten better and better. D-do you think..." Kunsel glanced curiously as Zack, much to his surprise, was stumbling to finish his statement.
"What's up, Zack?"
"Ummm......d-do you think......."
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: "It's getting pretty late.  Wanna hit the hay?"

1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
A few more stuttering moments happened before Kunsel tried to get Zack's attention. "Zack, if you need to say something, go ah-"
"-Could I move in with you?" responded Zack quickly as he forced himself to ask his friend the question. Taken back slightly, Kunsel paused for a moment. "You wanna....move in?"
"I-I know it's all like, really sudden and all that, b-but I think it could work! Obviously I'll pay rent and all that stuff in between, cause I'm no freeloader, but I just..." Zack stumbled half way in, before turning to Kunsel and sincerely finish with, "...I want to be with you, man."

Another moment passed, before a smile grew over Kunsel's face. Like a kid, he almost pounced onto Zack's belly happily, causing Zack to grunt a bit as Kunsel cheerfully and excitedly said, "I'd love that, are you kidding me?!" Rubbing the back of his head, Zack smiled and said, "You're the best, dude," he then hugged Kunsel tightly, while Kunsel returned the favor, and snuggled gently into Zack's stomach. "I honestly didn't think you'd ever ask me that," said Kunsel almost with relief, much to Zack's surprise.
"Why not?"
"Because part of me wasn't entirely convinced all this was real. Finally being with someone, being able to eat and stuff together, hanging out, and even being able to help the towns people. Sometimes, it just feels too good to be true, like a dream. And no matter how hard I try, I always wake up...remembering it's just fantasy..." Smiling, Zack raised Kunsel's head up by the chin, and slowly the two locked lips for a good moment before Zack pulleda way, leaving a fluttered and blushing Kunsel.
"Trust me. This is real."

Almost gratefully, Kunsel hugged Zack and proceeded to rest his ear against Zack's tummy and then gently rub across it, much to Zack's delight. The relaxing sensation eventually put Zack to sleep, and after a few more minutes of rubbing Zack's gut, Kunsel's eyes grew heavy, and he too, drifted into slumber, resting his head against Zack's large stomach.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: "...could I move in with you?"

choices: Zack's stomach began growling out of hunger.
The two got up and decide to hit up the gym.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
The two slept in as morning came; the eventual sunlight sunlight shined down them both, snuggled together under the sheets as it slowly woke them both. "Mmmmm, morning, dude," said Zack as he groggily greeted Kunsel with a pecked on the cheek, causing him to smirk as his eyes slowly flickered open. "Morning," he said, still half asleep as his hand gently stroked Zack's smooth, defined chest. A moment later, it slowly wandered down his stomach, which had once again deflated a good amount since last night. However, the meals had been adding on, officially giving Zack a bit of a pot belly now.

Smiling, Zack patted his belly and said, "Respectable, huh?"
"I'll say," responded Kunsel as he attempted to rise from his bed, but Zack playfully snagged him back in. "Ahh we don't need to get up just yet, do we?" said Zack as he gave Kunsel his infamous puppy dog eyes, causing the teen to laugh as he got back in bed and snuggled cozily with Zack. "Hehe, your body feels so nice and warm. Perfect for snuggling up against the cold mornings," joked Kunsel. Chuckling, Zack's arm held Kunsel tight to his chest as he said, "Didn't think SOLDIER Third Class could double as a bedside heater."

The two laughed for a moment, still barely awake, when suddenly a loud gastric groaning emanated from Zack's gut. Pressing his ear against Zack's stomach, Kunsel raised an eyebrow curiously. "Huh, doesn't sound like hunger groaning."
"Oh trust me, I definitely don't feel hungry just yet, hehe. Nah, my stomach's been kinda cramped since last night. Just an occupational hazard that comes with the digestion process, I guess."
"Well, if you'd like, I know how to make it less painful."
"Pfft, as if you even need to ask..."

Smirking, Kunsel's palm immediately rested against Zack's smooth, round belly. His fingers nudged and stroked the tensed abdomen as he slowly circulated his hand all across Zack's stomach, causing the young man to coo with delight as an expression of bliss grew over his face. As Kunsel continued to gently massage the troubled tummy, he began to feel around for areas where it felt tensest.

As he did, he felt what he suspected to be a trapped gas pocket around Zack's upper belly. With his knuckles, he gently but firmly kneaded at this tense region of Zack's stomach, in an effort to expel the gas. After a few moments of this, Zack let out a resounding belch, smacking his lips and sighing with relief shortly after, earning a chuckle from Kunsel as he continued to massage his friend's tummy all over.

For the next few minutes, Kunsel rubbed and massaged Zack's belly all over, and occasionally worked out any gas pockets he could find, earning some decent burps out of Zack in the process. Finally, Kunsel found particularly present pocket around the middle of Zack's belly which he tried to knead out, but was having some difficulties. "Boy, that one's really stuck in there..." said Kunsel as he continued to knead to no avail. Smirking, Zack stopped him for a moment and said, "Hold up, I've got an idea. I'm gonna gulp down as much air as I can, and when I say to, I want you to press down on my belly as hard as you can."

Shrugging, Kunsel agreed as Zack immediately began gulping down big mouthfuls of air. As he did, his belly continued to bloat outward more and more from all the air being deposited into it at once. Finally, after one last big gulp of air, Zack signaled to Kunsel, who immediately pressed down on Zack's belly as hard as he could.

Promptly afterwards, he felt a torrent of air leaving that tense portion of Zack's stomach and immediately expel from Zack's mouth in the form of a massive belch.

*BBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPP!*

Zack's booming belch lasted several seconds, and was loud enough to evoke a ringing in Kunsel's ears, not that he minded. As it carried on, Kunsel could feel Zack's belly deflating from all the air expelling itself, until it was all but gone. Smacking his lips, Zack patted his belly proudly and said, "Whew, ohhh MAN that felt good! It's like a boulder just got lifted from my stomach."

"Glad I could help. Still, even if you're all burped out, you don't mind if I keep going a little more, do you?" Smiling, Zack more than welcomed it. So Kunsel continued to massage and rub Zack's belly for a few more minutes, much to both their delight, until finally...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Morning tummy rub

choices: Zack successfully finishes the whole pizza with ease.
Kunsel's own stomach began to rumble.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Kunsel spent the next while slowly rubbing his friends' belly in as relaxing a manner as he could conduct, earning a blissful coo from Zack as he just enjoyed the feel of Kunsel's hand slowly massaging up and down his immense gut. Occasionally as he stroked the massive orb of flesh, Kunsel would warmly peck Zack on the neck while Zack wrapped his arm around Kunsel and squeezed him tightly and affectionately.

Suddenly, in the middle of rubbing, a massive rumbling shook the bed. Zack's face went red as his bloated belly visibly began to jiggle as it rumbled hungrily in the dead of night. "Damn, can't believe I'm STILL hungry after a meal like that..." said Zack with surprise in his voice as Kunsel chuckled and playfully patted Zack's belly, feeling his flesh jiggle a bit beneath his palm. "Welp, you're a big, growing boy, right?" he said teasingly, earning a nudge in the shoulder from Zack as he smirked. "Guess so."

So the two got out of bed, both still only in their boxers and headed to the kitchen. Zack sat down at the table, rubbing his belly in an effort to calm it down while Kunsel checked the fridge, then the oven, and pulled out an extra large BBQ Pizza out from the oven. "Wow, still warm!" Kunsel said with surprise in his voice as Zack licked his lips eagerly. Placing the box down in front of Zack, Kunsel opened it and let the aroma waft directly in front of Zack, making his mouth water as he took the first slice eagerly, but stopped before he could stuff it into his maw. Staring for a moment, Zack turned to Kunsel and asked, "Hey...would you mind feeding me again?"

Seeing Zack give him his infamous puppy dog eyes, Kunsel smileld and nodded as he pulled his chair right next to Zack and stuffed the first whole slice half way into Zack's mouth. Zack bit the slice in half in one go and savored the mass amount of pizza melting in his mouth as he chewed it and gulped it down. He then immediately opened his mouth as Kunsel stuffed the second half completely in. He gulped it down and sighed with relief as Kunsel already stuffed a second slice half way into his mouth. He chewed, swallowed, and got the other half stuffed right in immediately after. After gulping it down, Zack smiled then turned and said. "Hey, let's see if we can go for broke."
"Go for broke?"
"Yeah, try stuffing a WHOLE slice in! C'mon, I can take it!"

Shrugging, Kunsel decided to give it a try, and cram the third slice completely into Zack's mouth. His cheeks bulged comically as he chewed on the entire slice in one go. Kunsel's attention went straight to Zack's immense gut as he wiped his hands with a napkin and proceeded to eagerly rub it as Zack gulped down the entire slice of pizza. Feeling a bit of tension, Kunsel kneaded Zack's belly slightly, coaxing out a few mighty burps from the young man's mouth as he sighed with immense relief. "Ready for another?" asked Kunsel.

"Wait, hold on," said Zack as he sat up for a moment and slammed his fist into his still surprisingly tone chest a few times, forcing up yet another massive belch. "Ahhh, there we go. Proceed," he said with an impish smirk as he opened his mouth wide to receive his fourth whole slice of pizza.

As time went on...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Zack's stomach began growling out of hunger.

choices: Zack had pent up gas which needed to be expelled
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Zack moaned, in a complete and utter food coma as the last slice of pizza had finally been gulped down. He'd eaten so much that his belly had distended to the point where it was reaching past his waist and near just half way past his thighs. "...So....much....pizza..." was all a dazed Zack could mutter. Kunsel chuckled, admittedly finding this act absolutely adorable as he sat himself next to the young SOLDIER and absent mindedly rubbed his now massive belly in slow, circular motions all over. He rested his head against Zack's belly, listening as it worked off yet another massive meal, gurgling and rumbling audibly. "Mmmmm, like music to my ears..." was all Kunsel could mutter. Zack merely blushed, still far too full to come up with a witty response.

Some time passed, as Kunsel continued to rub Zack's belly whilst still keeping his ear pressed to it. However, as Kunsel listened to Zack's massive gut working off the pizza, he could ear a sudden acidic gurgling, which meant only one thing...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Zack successfully finishes the whole pizza.

choices: I think i've made room for a second pizza!"
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Kunsei and Zack both knew that there was a monster belch building up in Zacks enormous stomach, but the boy was too full and exhausted from eating to push it out, and so he just groaned as the loud rumbling continued. Kunsei decided that instead of forcing it out the usual way, he would try something new. "I think if you change position all the gas will be able to come right out by itself...come on, let me help you stand up." Zack looked a little reluctant at this suggestion, placing his hands protectively around his ridiculously swollen belly. Nonetheless, he knew that he could trust Kunsei to know whats best when it came to being burped...
Taking hold of Zack's hands, Kunsei heaved his friend to his feet. The sight of Zack's midsection protruding so far forwards was such an amazing sight to behold, and Kunsei had to steady him. Moving behind Zack, Kunsei put his arms around his friend so that his could stroke Zack's belly with both hands. "Lean back into me and relax", Kunsei commanded. Zack did as Kunsei asked, letting out a deep sigh of relief, which was immediately followed by the sound of a huge amount of air gushing up his throat and out of his mouth....
"BUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!" "Ahhhhh", sighed Zack, grinning and leaning his head back onto Kunsei's shoulder. With his hands still firmly on either side of Zack's stomach, he gave Zack a little kiss on the side of his cheek. Zack turned his head slightly to return it when another enormous belch burst out of his mouth and right into Kunsei's face.
"UUUUUUUUURRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP". Zack laughed, but before he could apologise, another burst of air rushed out of his belly and he opened his mouth wide and let the rush of relief reverberate off the walls.
"BUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP". In total awe of his friend, Kunsei slapped and squeezed Zack's belly from behind, bringing up an almost continual flow of belches for the next two minutes.
"Wow!" Zack exclaimed at the end...that really did help get them out- thanks Kunsei!!" Zack turned around and gave his friend a hug, which wasn't easy considering the size of his belly. "You know what?":
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Zack had pent up gas which needed to be expelled

choices: Half way in, the two take a quick breather.
In no time at all, both finish the extra large pizza.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Kunsel glanced curiously at his pal, when suddenly a loud rumble emanated from his bloated midsection. Zack chuckled as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly and said, "I think losing all that pent-up gas made room for some more goodies, hehe." Kunsel poked Zack's belly playfully and said, "Good thing I figured one pizza alone wouldn't be enough to sate a hero like you. Which is why there's a second one waiting in the oven!" Zack laughed and raised his eyebrow. "Haha, seriously? How'd you figure I'd want more" Kunsel smiled and patted Zack's tummy playfully as he said, "Call it a hunch." Zack blushed a bit before he eagerly headed back to the kitchen and pulled out the extra large BBQ Chocobo Pizza from the oven. Pulling the top of the box open, Zack took a big whiff and smiled with delight. "Mmmmm...still warm..."

Pulling a chair next to Zack, Kunsel eagerly awaited for Zack to take that first magical bite, when suddenly another hungry rumble filled the room. Zack looked down and began to grin impishly when he saw Kunsel blushing with embarrassment as he covered his bare stomach trying to silence its' hungry growls. Laughing, Zack patted his friend on the back and said, "Hey, don't worry about it, man. You just need to get a lil food in your belly, that's all." He then took the slice he was about to eat and offered it to Kunsel, adding "and no time better than the present, y'know?" Kunsel smiled and said, "Thanks, but I'm fine just watching-" his stomach rumbled in disagreement, cutting him off. Zack smirked, knowing Kunsel couldn't refuse for much longer, so he added, "Come on, dude, sharing is caring, right? I can't enjoy this delicious meal if I know my best bud is suffering hunger pangs."

Sighing to himself, Kunsel eventually conceded, much to Zack's delight. He took the slice of pizza from Zack and took a huge gaping bite. He paused for a moment, then immediately took another bite bite, and another, and another, until it was reduced to crust remnants. "Mmm! Wow, this really IS good!" Kunsel exclaimed, licking his lips while Zack nodded and grabbed two slices at once. Grinning, he said, "Check this out. A lil pizza eating trick my dad taught me!" He stacked the two slices on top of each other like two slices of bread over a sandwich and opened his mouth nice and wide as he took a huge gaping bite. Kunsel watched in amazement as Zack chewed heartily on the comically large mouthful of pizza, then gulped it all down with a noticeable bulge traveling down his throat and disappearing into his muscular chest, and down into his ever expanding belly. Zack licked his lips then took another huge bite of the two for one pizza slices, "Mmm, I swear, each bite is better than the last!" Zack exclaimed before taking another massive chomp.

The two youths continued down this road for a good while, savoring the flavor of each slice of pizza and demolishing it one swift bite after another, as more and more slices of pizza began to dissipate...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: "I think i've made room for a second pizza!"

choices: The two head out and walk along the ruins.
They wait a little longer to lettheir stomachs digest a bit first.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Slice after slice, both teens continued to demolish the extra large pizza, as their bare bellies continued to expand outward more and more with each slice consumed. Finally, after several moments, the pizza box had no more than crumbs and some grease and cheese stains to it. Having eaten their fill, both Zack and Kunsel plopped their rears onto the couch in the apartment, both hands rested atop their bloated bellies. Kunsel had eaten so much that his normally thin stomach looked as though he'd swallowed a greatly inflated volleyball, while Zack's belly, having already been so greatly distended, looked as if he'd consumed a medicine ball, now hanging partially onto his thighs as he spread his legs and let his gut distend freely onto his lap.

"Man...that was some damn good pizza..." moaned Zack as he massaged his greatly distended belly with both hands. Kunsel nodded in agreement, looking almost dazed as he absent mindedly rubbed his own bloated stomach to sooth the pain of fullness away, if just slightly. "Man...I haven't eaten that much in AGES..." Kunsel groaned, wincing a bit. "...ugh...so...full..." Feeling a bit of pressure building, Kunsel pressed against his upper stomach firmly and let free a deep belch, before coughing a bit and letting out a shorter burp immediately after. Zack laughed and said, "Nice one, dude." Not one to be showed up, Zack leaned forward a bit and patted his own belly a few times, forcing up a much louder and longer belch. Followed by a few shorter belches he expelled to relieve as much pressure as he could. Content, he then rested one arm around Kunsel's shoulder and pulled him closer, causing Kunsel to lean comfortably into Zack's still muscle bound upper torso. "Heh, that was fun, wasn't it?" Kunsel nodded, nuzzling his head into Zack's chest. "You said it," responded Kunsel. Looking up at Zack, he playfully gave him a light peck on the cheek and asked, "So whadduya wanna do today?"

Zack laughed and slapped his immense gut firmly, causing it to jiggle a bit. "Well FIRST? I wanna let these settle before we do ANYTHING!" he said, gesturing towards both his and Kunsel's bloated tummies. "After that? Let's get outta the apartment and go see the sights and all that. That sound fun to you?" Kunsel smiled and once again rested his head atop Zack's chest, then said, "As long as I'm with you, everything we do is fun!"

Shortly after...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: In no time at all, the boys finish the pizza.

choices: Kunsel continues to give Zack a nice belly rub for a while longer.
They both head out and enjoy the day.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
The two young men sat comfortably the couch, nuzzled close as their hands massaged their achingly bloated stomachs as they occasionally groaned from fullness. "Man, I still don't know if I'll ever be able to keep up with you," said Kunsel, his bloated stomach pressing slightly against Zack's almost bulbous balloon belly. Zack laughed and said, "Eh, just give yourself time, dude. Your gut's gotta adjust if you ever wanna be able to fit in anywhere near as much as I can." To emphasize, he slapped his gut, causing it to ripple a bit. "I'll say this much," Zack continued, "there are very few feelings quite as relaxing as resting on a couch with this much food in your belly..." Kunsel smirked and rested his hand atop Zack's stomach and gave him a wink.

"How about this?" Kunsel asked before slowly beginning to rub Zack's belly soothingly, earning relaxed coos from the young hero as he smiled with delight. "Ohhhh man....okay...this is definitely up there too..." said Zack both relaxed yet playfully as Kunsel continued to push his hand firmly into Zack's rounded stomach, and slowly knead it, easing much of the tension that strained it, enjoying the feel of Zack's vast midsection, soft, thick and warm, beneath his fingers and palm as he explored every inch of Zack's stomach and kneaded the pain away with a smile on his face. "Remember when we first?" Kunsel asked, still rubbing Zack's belly. Suddenly, Zack started laughing and said, "Haha, how could I forget? It was my second week in SOLDIER. You'd just joined along with a bunch of other meatheads. They were all your typical Midgar jocks, all beefy'n full of themselves. Then there's this little guy. So freakin' nervous and shy on his first day that he spent it hiding in one of Hojo's chambers...only to realize he was hiding in the VR training room." Zack laughed heartily as Kunsel shuddered. "Then as a joke, one of the other guys turned it on..." Kunsel replied, still recollecting the incident as if it were yesterday. "And typical of me, I forget my damn weapon and have to try and fend these virtual fiends off myself...I thought for a split second, that those things could'a actually killed me..." Kunsel said, before smiling and looking up at his friend, "...until someone dropped in and saved the day..." Zack smirked, rubbing the back of his head and said, "Well, I had to do SOMETHING. I could hear you screaming in terror all the way from the lounge area! Then I found the jerk who turned it on and set it to that high level and decked him square in the face."

Kunsel glanced at him curiously and said, "I always wondered; why'd you do that? It wasn't like we were friends at the time when it happened." Zack shrugged and said, "I don't like bullies. Pure and simple, especially when we're all supposed to be a team." Kunsel scoffed and said, "And go figure, that jerk got discharged a week later after failing VR Tests that were just HALF the level he set me on!" Both boys laughed heartily amongst themselves, before sighing a bit, still recollecting their earlier moments together. "After all that, we started training together, sparring, racing, hitting weights. I remember, you even tried giving me one of those helmets..." Zack said, earning a laugh from Kunsel. "Oh yeah! I remember that! Hehe, it got stuck on your spiky hair the first time. We almost had to give you a trim just to take it off." Kunsel replied, causing Zack to protectively conceal his mid-length black hair and reply with, "Never!" earning another laugh from Kunsel, before he glanced back at Zack and smiled warmly. "Y'know, in truth? I really don't think I'd have even made it to SOLDIER Third class if I never met you, man. You helped me train, you made me more confident, and...well...you gave a reason to keep trying at every single turn."

Zack blushed a bit and smiled back at Kunsel, then said, "I was just grateful be your friend, dude. Always have been, always will be." The two smiled softly at each other before leaning closer and locking lips for a good moment. The moment was quickly halted when Zack's cheeks puffed up. Immediately he pulled his mouth away from Kunsel and turned his face away, burping loudly for a few seconds straight. He turned to Kunsel a bit sheepishly and said, "Sorry about that..." But Kunsel smiled warmly back at Zack and said, "Don't be. I kinda like it when you burp." Zack tilted his head curiously and said "Really?" Kunsel nodded 'yes.' "What can I say? When you do it, it's so much sexier than when some jarhead does it at SOLDIER, or some pigheaded drunk from the streets." Zack blushed and said, "Well, I AM a pro..." Kunsel laughed and continued massaging Zack's strained gut, nodding in agreement. "That you are, man. That you are." The two then resumed their kiss, uninterrupted this time.

After a good while of the two sharing an intimate moment...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: They wait and to let their stomachs settle first.

choices: "...Cause I feel a BIG one coming up."
"...Cause I think I'm actually getting hungry again, hehe."
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
As Zack and Kunsel hugged it out, Zack's large belly pressed firmly against Kunsel's flat stomach, just a little too hard, working up some more pent up gas. Kunsel could feel it all brewing from Zack's stomach. Zack chuckled a bit, and said, "...I think there's more to come!" Kunsel smiled softly as the two still had their arms wrapped around each other. "Not a problem," said Kunsel with a playful smirk, "I have another idea. I want you to hug me as tight as you can." Zack raised an eyebrow and said, "Y-you want me to give you a BEAR hug...?" Kunsel nodded as Zack looked away a bit uncertainly, then said, "I dunno, dude...I don't wanna hurt you or nothing..." But Kunsel laughed and said, "Trust me, I'll be fine. Besides," he added as he looked down affectionately and began gently stroking Zack's belly with one of his hands and said, "I've got the cushiest tummy in the world to keep me from getting hurt."

Zack smirked and said, "Oh, alright..." Kunsel again wrapped both his arms around Zack while Zack did the same with him, and squeezed nice and tight. The squeeze forced Kunsel's torso to push firmly into Zack's bloated belly. Which immediately forced more of the pent up gas from his throat...

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP!!!!*

Zack tilted his head upward so as not to blast Kunsel in the face again, and let fly a deep, bassy, and lengthy belch. Followed by a few, tinier (for Zack at least) afterburps. Sighing with relief, Zack smiled at Kunsel and took a deep breath, squeezing him into his belly yet again...

*bbbBBbbbBbbbuuuuUUUUUUUUUURRRrrrrrrrRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPP PPP!!!!*

His second belch was longer, wetter, and became more forceful towards its apex. Kunsel laughed and jokingly said, "All better, little guy?" Zack grinned impishly and accidentally burped in Kunsel's face, causing him to chuckle sheepishly as he blushed. Kunsel laughed, finding the sight almost adorable, then pecked him on the cheek. "Hehe, aww, you're so darn cute when your all embarrassed like that." Zack rolled his eyes, then laughed a bit. "Well, it's a good thing you find all that cute..."
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: "...I think there's more to come!"

choices: "You have no idea what you have started"...as a 2nd thunderous rumble began!
"You're the best! Whatever will you come up with next?"
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
"Woah kunsei....I feel a BIG one coming up...I hope you are ready for this!!" Zack smirked proudly as Kunsei braced himself for the last big squeeze. Taking a huge breath Zack grabbed Kunsei and forced his great belly into Kunsei's abs, and opened his mouth...but nothing came out. Kunsei was disappointed, and slapped the sides of his friends huge globe of a gut to try and dislodge the air.
Zack released Kunsei with a sheepish look on his face, before one of intense discomfort...he REALLY needed to burp! "A little help Kunsei, you can't be out of ideas...?" Kunsei wasn't, and relished the chance to help his cute friend to burp in new and exciting ways.
"Try going on your hands and knees so that your belly can really relax- you've made it too tense with all the squeezing" he laughed.
Zack, now a little flushed from the pressure that the previous belches had stirred up did as he was told. Kneeling down he spread his weight onto his arms, and let his enormous belly hang down between his hands and knees. This made Kunsei burst out laughing: "you look like a cow about to give birth!" He exclaimed.
"Not funny", groaned Zack, with his head hanging down..."I'm feel like I'm about to give birth to something, but it definitely isn't goingto be a calf..."
Kunsei dropped to his knees and out his hands under zacks belly, stroking the hanging gut, and making it away slightly from side to side . For a moment they were both silent until suddenly, Zack arched his back and lifted his head up , opened his mouth and after an audible rumble that visibly shook his swollen belly he projected one of the loudest belches he had yet done...
BbbbuuuuuuuRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!
When it was finally done Zack dropped his head in relief before exclaiming...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: "...Cause I feel a BIG one coming up."

choices: Zack spends the next few minutes burping out as much of the gas as he can.
Zack lets out his single loudest burp yet.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
"Ohhh, dude..." Zack explained as he sat on his knees and rested both hands against his belly in discomfort. "Kunsel...I don't think you know what you've just started...." Before Kunsel could inquire further, a louder than usual rumbling emanated from his friends bloated stomach. "Whoa...sounds like the perfect storm's brewing in there," Kunsel remarked. Zack looked a bit queasy from all the gas building up in his tummy. "That's okay. Swaying your stomach around must've unlodged a lotta the gas at once. All I gotta do is help push it out the old fashion way." He then rested his hand atop Zack's rounded belly and stroked it circularly, causing the boy to smirk a bit, despite the discomfort in his gut.

As Kunsel stroked, he felt around for tension, before finding it in the upper part of Zack's belly. Without hesitation or warning, Kunsel pressed against the tense portion, just enough to force the gas up Zack's throat and out of his mouth in the form of yet another ear ringingly loud...

*BBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRR RRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!*

Zack's massive belch carried on for nearly 10 seconds straight, growing only louder and louder with each, bassy second. By the time it had reached its' apex, Zack gasped for breath, before clutching his belly and bopping his head forward, unleashing yet another monstrous belch, strong enough to blow Kunsel's hair back a bit. Followed by yet another.

Kunsel patted his friend on the back and began rubbing it comfortingly. "There you go, just get it all out." Zack merely nodded, before letting out a particularly watery burp. *URRRRP* "Ugh..who'd have guessed eating a whole pizza could make a guy so frigging gassy..." choked back Zack before yet another massive belch forced its' way past the young mans' lips. Kunsel chuckled a bit and said, "Well, I'm pretty sure MOST people would have figured that....then again, most people don't eat whole extra large pizzas by themselves," responded Kunsel playfully. Zack rubbed the back of his head and grinned sheepishly, but weakly as another painfully sharp belch came out of his mouth.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: "You have no idea what you have started"

choices: Help Zack demolish the extra large pizza.
He'd rather just watch and help Zack eat for now.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Zack sighed with relief and rolled on his back, letting his distended stomach stick upward. Patting it gently, Zack smiled and said, "Ahhh, that feels SOOOO much better!" Kunsel laid down on the floor next to Zack and smiled proudly, massaging his friends' bloated tummy. "Glad I could help," replied Kunsel. Zack turned and grinned, then said, "You're the best, dude! Jeez, that may've been one of the more unusual ways to get gas out, but MAN did it work, hehe. Whatever will you think of next, maestro?"

Kunsel laughed, shrugging while still stroking his friends bloated midsection, and enjoying the smooth, taut feel of it while Zack enjoyed the feeling of having his distended belly rubbed so soothingly. "Eh, I'm just glad I could help a friend," Kunsel said, giving his friend a light smooch on the cheek. Zack smirked cheesily and pulled Kunsel close. "Tell you what though, I'll keep thinking about other, effective ways to get gas out, and who knows? Next time you need to burp, maybe we can try a move or two." Zack laughed, then kissed Kunsel on the neck, causing the boy to blush as he replied, "Sounds like a plan!"

Just then, Zack's stomach let out an audible rumble. The two glanced at the boy's bloated belly, as it groaned hungrily. Zack smirked and said, "Welp, maybe you won't have to wait too long, cause I'm starving! Haha, guess all that burpin' made extra room, huh?" Kunsel smirked and playfully nudged Zack's tummy before rising to his feet. He then hoisted Zack off the ground, causing his belly to bounce just slightly as he did.

"Good thing I was prepared for that, cause we got another extra large Pepperoni in the oven," said Kunsel with a smirk. "How's that sound to-" Before Kunsel could finish his sentence, a second even louder hungry rumble filled the room. Zack looked around curiously, then turned back to Kunsel, to see him blushing profusely as he covered his own groaning stomach with his forearm, hoping to silence the hungry noise emanating from it. Zack grinned mischievously and said, "Hehe, guess I'm not the only one who's ready to chomp down on some pizza." Kunsel chuckled sheepishly and said, "Ahh, it's fine. I'll grab a bite later or something."

Zack laughed the patted his friends shoulder. "C'mon, don't be a baby. A couple slices of pizza isn't gonna kill ya! Besides, it'll be fun eating together."

Kunsel thought for a moment; his thin stomach still rumbling hungrily, and decided to...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: You're the best!  What will you come up with next?

choices: Kunsel lies down on Zack's lap just in time to here the first rumble of action..
Kunsel loves the idea, but suggests that Zack chugs the coke first...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
Kunsel placed the extra-large pizza in front of his friend. Zack's belly was still so big and bloated that he had no idea how he could still have any space, but his own belly was growling repeatedly for attention. The pizza was steaming hot, so Kunsel grabbed a couple of 2 liter bottles of coke from the fridge to help it go down. Zack raised his eyebrows and smiled: "Well this is going to be interesting. Think you can keep up with me my little friend? Let the feast begin!"
The two growing boys (literally), tore into the pizza. Slice by slice it disappeared, and Kunsel's stomach began to protrude more and more. His top was so beginning to feel so tight..."Zack- do you mind if I ditch the t-shirt, its hard to breathe!" Zack grinned at him. "Only if I can ditch my shorts...look at the waistband!" Kunsel could see that even though zack's zipper had long been undone, his belly was so big that the waistband was cutting in. "Deal". Both boys blushed a little as they pulled off their clothes, leaving zack in some exceedingly tight white briefs -all but invisible under his belly!) and a t-shirt that was totally riding up above the huge mound of flesh sitting on his lap. Kunsel sat next to him in his shorts, but topless, so that his belly had room to grow. Playfully, Zack slapped his friend's mid-section, which caused Kunsel to muffle an unexpected burp with his fist. "Kunsel, buddy! Let it out!" As if to demonstrate, Zack grabbed each side of his own belly, threw his head back and projected the most forceful burp in Kunsel's direction, before bursting out laughing. "Come on, it feels so good!" Kunsel blushed again "...maybe when i've had a bit of coke....i'd rather let the pizza settle first."
The boys tucked back in, until the pizza was all gone. They sat back on the sofa, side by side, their bellies sticking up in the air. Zack's was enormous, like a beachball, while Kunsel's was more like a watermelon, and less soft, but still impressive. Sighing, Zack put his arm around Kunsel. "Well come on them, lets hear it", Zack chuckled. "I can't zack", Kunsel replied, "im too full, honestly. "Man, but its so easy..." Still lying back in almost nothing but his underwear, Zack lolled his head in his friend's direction and let out a long, low burp right into Kunsel's ear. Kunsel could feel the warm air on his face and smell the pizza as zack's burp reverberated in his ear. When he was done, zack kissed Kunsel on the cheek. "See? Didn't you like that?"
Kunsel did like that! It was true he was so full he could hardly move, but the sight of Zack lying back in his briefs, his belly stretching out in all directions was so incredible. "Here", zack smiled", lay your head on my lap and we can get the air out together. I figure that you need to relax in order for your body to release the pent up gas, and nothing relaxes you more than listened to my belly as the burps come up!" That sounded like a pretty good idea to Kunsel...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Help Zack demolish the extra large pizza.

choices: Get him to chug the second liter of coke.
Offer to give him a belly rub to coax the gas out.
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.content:
"Sounds like a plan to me. B-but first? How about we stir things up a bit?" responded Kunsel, causing Zack to raise an eyebrow as he asked, "Stir what up? How?" As if to answer his question, Kunsel winced and rose to his feet, clutching his achingly fully abdomen as he climbed up to his feet and walked over to the kitchen. Kunsel grabbed both the 2 liter bottles of cola and headed back to the living room, handing one of the still cool bottles to his friend. "Can I listen to you chug that first? It's always incredible, listening to your tummy react to all that carbonation," replied Kunsel as he plopped himself back down besides Zack and leaned against his bloated gut as he rested his head atop it.

Zack looked at the bottle a bit reluctantly and said, "I dunno, man. Last time I tried chugging one of these things, I swear, I almost threw up...remember?" Kunsel did in fact remember. However, he simply chuckled a bit, patting his friends' beach ball sized gut affectionately and said, "Heh, how can I forget? But this time, I'll be right here to sooth your stomach so it doesn't get too tense." As if to emphasize his point, he grinned and began slowly massaging Zack's bloated belly, causing his eyes to light up as a big grin grew over Zack's face. "Ohhh man...I-I mean, no fair, dude!" Zack rolled his eyes and snatched the bottle playfully then said, "Aww, alright. But first?"
