Zack peeled off his unfitting t-shirt, exposing his surprisingly still perfectly chiseled and muscular torso, complemented perfectly by his immensely bloated and soft belly. "Ahhh, now like you, I got room to breathe," he joked, nudging Kunsel's arm playfully, before unscrewing the top of his bottle and taking a deep breath. "Welp....h-here goes nothing..." Cola bottle at hand, the young man proceeded to bring the bottle to his lips and chug away.

Sitting right besides Zack on the sofa, Kunsel leaned against the boy, massaging his belly with the palm of his hand while his ear rested against Zack's bare gut. Kunsel listened as the gas began to bubble and brew within Zack's overactive stomach. The busy sounds were like music to Kunsel's ears. All the while, as Zack chugged away, and as Kunsel massaged away, the carbonation, combined with the gasses of Zack's earlier meal had begun to combine and build up, causing his already immensely bloated belly to expand even further, from right below Kunsel, who could feel it slowly inflating. "Wow..." he muttered, still rubbing Zack's tummy as Zack chugged almost nonstop. Finally, after several moments, Zack reached the half way marker, and gasped heavily for air as the bottle left his lips. Kunsel laughed a bit, patting Zack's belly proudly, then said, "Nice job, buddy!" Zack grinned cheesily, albeit still exhausted, when suddenly, a very loud, acidic gurgling emanated from Zack's gut. He winced. "Ohhh boy...you might wanna brace yourself for this one..." Zack warned as he took a deep breath and held it for a few moments. Looking at Kunsel and gesturing to his bloated midsection, Kunsel took the hint and pressed his hand firmly atop Zack's upper belly. "Ready?" asked Kunsel. Zack simply nodded as Kunsel then pressed firmly against Zack's stomach.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP !!!!!!!!*

Zack's mouth flew open as he tilted his head up towards the ceiling and let fly a deep, explosively loud, and lengthy belch which carried on for almost 12 seconds straight. As it expelled from Zack's mouth, Kunsel could feel the gas rushing out of Zack's belly, and even felt it deflate a considerable amount from the pure volume of air and gas being expelled. By the time it was done, Zack groggily leaned back in the sofa, exhausted. Kunsel laughed hysterically and said, "Jeez, man! That was amazing!!" Zack smiled weakly and muttered, "All in the days work..."

After finally catching his breath, he wrapped his arm around Kunsel and leaned him into his muscular chest and massive belly, occasionally letting out some smaller afterburps here or there. Until Zack held his hand up, "Oh hold up...feel another one coming..." Zack said as he held an expression of concentration for a moment. He then took another big breath and sunk his head into his neck for a moment, before bobbing his head forward and letting rip another massive and loud, but much shorter belch. "Nice one," Kunsel said as he gently nuzzled against Zack's shoulder and pecked him on the cheek. Zack smiled back and returned the favor. "Well? Did the show relax you enough to start letting 'em rip yet, or what?" Zack joked. "You know what? I think so," Kunsel said with a smirk as he patted his own stomach confidently.

He took a deep breath and held it for a moment, then clutched his own belly with one hand and said, "Here it comes..." Kunsel then opened his mouth nice and wide...

....*urp*

A brief pause happened, before Zack started to snicker, trying not to laugh. Kunsel scowled and said, "Damn it. Hold on, one sec, one sec..." He took another deep breath, causing his stomach to expand just slightly, then forced out a decent but otherwise, wimpy *uuuurrrrp*. Frowning, Kunsel rubbed his stomach and winced in discomfort. "Man, now I know how YOU feel when you need to let it out and it just won't," Kunsel complained, when suddenly, his stomach started gurgling similar to Zack's from earlier. "You okay, dude?" asked Zack. Kunsel shook his head and winced in pain, "My stomach really hurts, Zack..."

Zack helped his friend back to the sofa as he rubbed his gurgling stomach in pain. Until finally, Zack thought of a way to help get the gas out of Kunsel's stomach...
1223121212112212111121112111111212111111.title: Kunsel suggests that Zack chug the soda first.

122312121212.content:
"I appreciate it, man, but it'll probably just be easier if I suck it up and just head home," responded Zack. Kunsei smirked back and said, "Yeah, good luck sucking that in, Zack," poking Zack's slightly bloated gut for emphasis, causing a sarcastic laugh from Zack.

"Thanks again for dinner, dude! I had a blast!" said Zack.
"Anytime, my friend." responded Kunsei, as the two parted ways for the night.

-After a sluggish walk home-

It was well into the night by the time Zack finally made it to his apartment. Unlike Kunsei, Angeal, and many other SOLDIER members, Zack was kind of a slob, who never really cared to clean up after himself or organize his apartment since all his time was usually spent training at Shinra, or just out in the field. Inside there were wrappers, soda cans, and dirty laundry scattered all across the place, and like any other lazy teenager, Zack just walked right past it all and headed straight to his bedroom.

Utterly drained, the exhausted teen plopped face first into his bed, not even bothering to change out of his clothes for the night. After a few seconds, he flipped back onto his back and rested one hand atop his once again thin stomach, courtesy of the long walk. "Man, that was one awesome buffet..." said Zack to himself as he rubbed his belly from beneath his shirt, when suddenly he felt it rumble hungrily.

*GGGGGUUUUUUURRRRRRGGGGGLLLLLEEEE!*

Raising an eyebrow, Zack rose slightly from his bed, and pressed against his stomach to silence the loud groaning. "Jeez, how the hell could I still be hungry after a meal like that?" said Zack. Checking the clock, Zack just sat there for a moment, unsure what to do while his stomach continued to insist on tearing his fridge apart. "I dunno, I REALLY shouldn't be eating this late into the night..." As if responding to Zack's statement, his stomach groaned louder, causing him to wince in mild discomfort. "Ugh, alright! Alright! Sheesh!" responded a begrudging Zack as he headed to the kitchen.
122312121212.title: Zack heads home.

1223121212121.content:
Browsing his fridge, Zack took whatever containers and tupperware he could dig through his equally messy fridge and opened them one by one, taking a sniff to see what was good and what was past its' prime. Sure enough, much of it was well past prime...and still put back in the fridge despite the vomit-inducing smells Zack forced himself to endure. "Ugh, c'mon, there's gotta be SOMETHING!" thought a hungry Zack as his stomach continued to roar violently. Luckily, Zack managed to salvage an entire drawer in his fridge loaded with still fresh leftovers from the week, consisting of BBQ Chocobo-Wings, a few cheeseburgers from his night out with Angeal and the team, some garlic fries, and half of a Deep Dish Pizza. Glancing down at his mini-feast to be, Zack's mouth watered as he started warming up his leftovers, plate by plate.

As he waited, he grabbed some milk from his fridge and started drinking from the carton, gulping down massive amounts of milk at a surprisingly quick pace. Continuing without any breaks, Zack began to sweat as milk drizzled down his chin and spilled over his t-shirt. He then pressed his stomach with his free hand, feeling it expand little by little as more and more milk continued to travel down into his gullet. Finally, he crinkled the carton as he sucked it completely dry then slammed the carton onto the table, letting out a monstrously loud belch immediately afterward. Sighing with relief, Zack then wiped the milk dribble from his mouth and patted his belly in satisfaction. "Whew, didn;t even know I was that thirsty," Zack said to himself curiously, "wonder what that was about."

One hand still rested on his stomach, he glanced down curiously and lifted up his shirt, exposing his still firm and muscular but now slightly expanded abdomen. "Man, barely even a dent!" he gloated as he slapped his gut proudly, before letting his shirt fall back down, as the food in the microwave beeped ready. Licking his lips with anticipation, Zack took the rest of his mini-feast out from the microwave and set it all on the table in front of him. Despite having just downed an entire carton of milk in a single shot, Zack's stomach still groaned hungry for more. So Zack delivered.

Wasting no time, Zack immediately tore into the BBQ wings, ripping the Chocobo meat clean from the bones in big, heaping mouthfuls, gulping each one down and immediately digging in for more. "Mmmm! *GULLLLP!* Man, I never noticed how great these things realy were!" said Zack between bites. "And the sauce is killer!" Picking one wing bone clean, Zack immediately moved onto the other, repeating the same process until it was bone dry, all the while getting BBQ sauce all over his mouth and fingers.

Finally finishing the wings, Zack licked his fingers clean and wiped his mouth with a paper towel before moving onto the decent sized burgers from some unnamed restaurant Zack couldn't really remember. He didn't really care where they were from at this moment. All he cared about was where they were going to be as he began to chomp down on the first burger. All the while, his stomach continued to expand little by little with every few mouthfuls swallowed, to where his shirt began to get just a little tighter.

After a good while of stuffing his face, Zack began to slow down, resting one hand atop his gut as it pushed outward by two to three inches. "Starting to feel a little full," thought Zack as he massaged his stomach tenderly from beneath his shirt...
1223121212121.title: Zack raids his fridge.

choices: But it was far too late to eat, so Zack went to bed.
So Zack ordered late night takeout.
12231212121211.content:
Despite his own fullness, Zack fought through the pain, putting away burger after burger as his gut expanded a little more with each one's consumption. Finally, after seven of those burgers, Zack's stomach had bloated outward all in all by around five straight inches past his waistline, as though he'd swallowed a football whole. His stomach was so full that it pushed the bottom of his shirt upward, exposing his taut tan flesh, just below the belly button. And naturally, good ol' Zack couldn't be more pleased with himself as he just leaned back in his chair, rubbing his belly tenderly from under his shirt with a big open grin on his face.

"Ahhh, now THAT one hit the spot..." said Zack as he patted his bloated belly and sighed with satisfaction. "Man, I didn't think my gut could take in this much food, in truth...I don't think I've ever eaten this much before..." he thought, simply marveling at his bloated midsection as it stuck outward before him. Poking at it, he winced as it felt hard as stone, unlike anything Zack had ever felt before. The prodding and thumping of his gut, however, brought forth a very familiar rush of air, causing Zack to let out a lengthy and strained belch.

*BUUUUUUOOOOOOORRPRRRRRRRPPPP!!!*

Loud and lasting five seconds straight, it ended as Zack caught was forced to catch his breath and laugh wearily to himself, "Whew, that felt good," he said with a light hearted chuckle, gently massaging his bloated gut, and continuing to just marvel at it's current form.

"Y'know...this doesn't feel half bad..." he said to himself. "All the time, all I'm ever doing is training or fighting or training some more and fighting some more. It's not often I just get to kick back and indulge for my own sake. It kinda...feels good. What if I kept doing it...?" Suddenly his stomach rumbled, as if to agree with Zack, and to let hi know, that somehow, some way...he was still hungry. Zack laughed childishly and said, "THAT'S the spirit!" then gave his gut a hearty slap for emphasis.
12231212121211.title: Zack keeps eating.

12231212121212.content:
Zack tried to reach for another burger but both he and his stomach groaned in protest. "Ugh, no man, enough's enough for one night..." he said, too full to say any more. He then dropped the burger onto his place and leaned back in his chair, holding his belly with both hands as he moaned in both a mix of bliss and stomach pains. "Ohhh man...I can't remember the last time I've ever been this full..." said Zack as he rubbed his bloated gut up and down with both hands. His stomach gurgled loudly, causing a loud burp to exit Zack's mouth as he moaned groggily.

"Ugh, my stomach just feels so damn bloated right now...like I could burst any *mo-ment...*" said an utterly stuffed Zack, working his way around another burp towards the end of his sentence. "Man, I bet if Angeal saw this, he'd already be kicking my ass straight to the training room, working this thing off this very second. Buuuuuut, what Angeal don't know, won't hurt me, riiiiiiight?" he said mischievously as he thumped his belly for emphasis.

"To be honest, this actually feels...pretty damn good! Almost, rewarding, just seeing how much my stomach can take..." he thought as he lifted up his shirt and marveled at his firm and muscular, but still rather taut stomach. Keeping his shirt lifted, he gently stroked his bloated abs in a slow circular motion and moaned in ecstasy. He then pushed and prodded at it, feeling his stone cold flesh between his fingertips. "I don't care what Angeal or anyone at SOLDIER thinks, right now, this right here? This is absolutely beastly, dude!" He said, thumping his gut before letting his shirt fall back and once again cover his stomach.

"It's settled then; I got the week off, and I'm gonna live it up as hard as my stomach can take! Oof..ugh, but first? Maybe I should hit the hay..." Zack said sluggishly as he clutched his groaning stomach...
12231212121212.title: Too full to continue.

choices: So he downed his soda to calm his stomach.
So he unbuttoned his board shorts.
12231212122.content:
After several straight minutes of scarfing his face, Zack paused for a moment and slouched in his chair, hands cradling his still firm stomach. Kunsei raised an eyebrow skeptically. "So much for round 2, eh?" said Kunsei as he chuckled. Zack merely groaned in a mix of delight and discomfort as he rubbed up and down his muscular stomach. "Mmmph, ohhh don't worry, I'm not through by a long shot. I just...need a breather is all," said Zack. "Been working out so much that I'm not really used to eating so much so fast, y'know?"
"No, I wouldn't know, because I don't eat like it's my last meal."
"Oh har har har..."

Kunsei shrugged and dug into his meal and ate at a much more regular pace, though a bit quicker due to the fact that he himself was quite hungry from the day as well. Zack glanced back at his meal and attempted to follow, but his stomach groaned in protest. "Oh shut up," he said to his stomach before punching it, and wincing in pain, causing another laugh from Kunsei and an annoyed sigh from Zack at his own stupidity. He took a chomp out of a fried drumstick, then another, and another, until eventually it was picked clean.

Sighing heartily, he looked down at his groaning stomach, noticing it started to feel a bit strained. There was an uncomfortable bubbling brewing within his tummy, and it was keeping him from really enjoying his meal.
12231212122.title: Zack took a break

123121.content:
All Pokémon end up looking for a mate with only few exceptions. One Lucario had no excuses and also no mate, at least no formal relationship with one. A lopunny was in a neighborhooding area and he wanted to mate with her. With him being a more secluded species, finding the opposite sex wasn't the easiest job. It was close to mating season and the Lucario had to do something to keep from force palming himself while others had time to get with someone else.

He took the short trek to the lopunny's place and noticed her and some other females at a hot spring, talking and socializing as they bathed. He was a gentleman and decided to not get invasive, but as he turned, he otherheard a couple of their giggles.

"So, did you find anyone yet?" Said a mienshao.

"No... not yet. I'm not as eager as you are, Mienshao." Responds the lopunny.

"Come on, Punny, you will have to eventually."

"Yeah, I know. Most of the guys here are scrawny dweebs who can't handle a fight with anyone their own size. I want a bigger guy."

The rest of the conversation was muted to the Lucario as he thought. He wasn't the meatiest Pokémon, but how would she know whether he could take on someone else if he didn't have the mass to prove it? He at least knew how to win her over as he starts to head to some place that could help.
123121.title: Wild Lucario

123122.content:
Ah, of course. Domesticated Lucarios are commonplace in the Sinnoh region! One of them is bound to wanna get big.

But the question remains, just what kind of 'big' are they looking for?

Lucario finds an interesting vial in his trainer's room...
12312211.content:
Lucario lounged lazily on the couch in his trainer's home. He let out a contented yawn as he stretched, his paws reaching towards the ceiling before flopping back down to his lithe chest.
After years of travelling with his trainer, practicing day in and day out, honing his connection to his aura, and fighting battles, they had finally done it. His trainer had become champion at last! And now, he was free to do as he pleased. He had earned this relaxation, after all.
Life had slowed down considerably after defeating the elite four. His trainer decided to settle down with the prize money he earned, and Lucario decided to stick with him, not wanting to leave his trainer's side.

Some time had passed and Xiba was now working on various meats and drumsticks. The more meat the boy ingested, the larger and larger his quickly expanding stomach became. Maxi couldn't help but watch, fascinated as Xiba's belly continued to grow and grow with his gorging. Finally, after picking his last drumstick clean, Xiba once again slouched back into his chair, both hands atop his much larger stomach, which bulged out almost a good couple inches. "Ahhhh, that hit the spot!" said the boy before letting out another much larger burp.

*BBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!* "Ohhhh, that felt good." said the boy, patting his belly. Even Maxi couldn't help but smirk at the kid's brashness. "It's amazing how much you managed to fit into that thing," said Maxi. Xiba stared back at his mentor for a moment and shook his head. "Oh believe me, Maxi, this is nothing!" responded the boy.

Getting up and sitting next to the boy, Maxi poked and pressed on Xiba's bloated gut, feeling how hard his bloated but still muscular middle was. "Can I ask you something, kid?"
"Shoot, Maxi!"
"Why ARE you always hungry all the time? Every other second, you're always going on about food, I just wanna know why."
"Because food is life!" responded Xiba, getting Maxi's attention. "Our bellies absorb that life, we taste it, we enjoy it, and after it breaks down, it gives us energy to continue onward until we are lucky enough to eat again! And it tastes amazing most times, ESPECIALLY the sticky buns!" he said with a smile on his face. Maxi hadn't considered that before, but then he glanced down at the boy's bloated belly and said, "Think you may have ingested a bit too much life, today?"
"Oh this?" responded Xiba, giving his belly a hearty slap to illustrate his point. "I have a fast metabolism too. So combine that with the fact that I'm always active, and I get to work this off relatively quick. Plus it feels amazing, pushing my belly to its' limits and enjoying as much food as I can!"

Maxi glanced at the boy and nodded, he was starting to get it. And the more he thought about it, the more he was intrigued by it.

Just then...
1251321111.title: Xiba continues to stuff himself.

choices: Xiba continues to chomp away at the same pace.
12513211111.content:
Suddenly a loud, rumble filled Maxi's ears. Immediately, he looked down at the source, and gaped for a moment, dumbfounded. "...You've got to be kidding me..." Maxi muttered, as Xiba laughed and rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "What can I say? Some need more life than others!" Xiba responded, giving his bloated belly a hearty slap before hoisting himself to his feet and eagerly heading back for more food. Maxi shook his head, still a little bewildered at the teens almost relentless hunger, but was no less intrigued by the notion of seeing how far he could push himself to his limits. Stamina builds endurance... Maxi thought to himself while Xiba continued to stuff as much food as his plate could carry. If that glutton is tough enough to wolf down that much food and not be in tears, then maybe he's tough enough to handle what the Edge Master has planned afterall...

As Maxi mused over the notion of seeing just how far this young man could go, Xiba returned with yet another overwhelmingly ample mountain of food atop his plate. Various meats, rice balls, tempura, several bowls of ramen, more drumsticks, and some other delights lost amidst the seeming mountain of food Xiba had intended to consume. The young warrior examined his massive meal to be with wonder as he licked his lips and rubbed his hands together eagerly. Before he could dig in, Maxi held his hand out to get Xiba's attention. "Hold it," Maxi said. Xiba pouted and said, "Aww, c'mon! The sign outside says all you can eat!" Xiba responded, earning a sigh from Maxi as he worked up a smirk and nodded. "Yes, I know. My question to you is, do you really think you can eat THAT much food? Your belly isn't exactly the most vacant place to be right now."

Xiba laughed, patting his belly assuredly as he said, "I already told ya, my gut's strong enough to take ANYTHING tasty!" Maxi shrugged and said, "Alright then. But I'm holding you to that then, because we're not going anywhere until that plate is bone dry. I don't approve of wasteful behavior, and neither does the Edge Master. So if you REALLY think you can eat all of this, then have at it." No sooner than Maxi had finished his warning, has Xiba eagerly dove right into his meal. Already, the boorish young glutton was wolfing down several egg rolls at a time, as ravenously as a man who hadn't eaten in weeks.

Maxi watched, both intrigued to see if Xiba could manage to eat as much food as he had intended, and mortified by the actual sight of him chomping down morsel after morsel with his bare hands, but as time went on, he didn't seem to mind it too much more. His focus soon shifted from Xiba messily scarfing down as much as he could fit into his mouth, to Xiba's steadily swelling belly. With every few gulps of food consumed, his bare stomach expanded outward ever so slightly, like a balloon slowly filling with water. Yet, despite how much it had already contained, Xiba was eating away at the same abnormally fast pace as when he began. Maxi hated to admit it, but he was impressed.

As more time passed...
12513211111.title: Xiba's stomach rumbled loudly.

1253211.content: Let's try the main character. How about Rowan?
1253211.title: Aytolis' fattest knight?

12532111.content: So Rowan's going to be getting bigger. But who wants him to?
12532111.title: Gaining how?

125321111.content:
Since the twins had beaten Velezark, several parties and feasts had been held in their honour and they were more than happy to attend. Lianna took her time to meet with her subjects and wish them well. For Rowan, however, it was all about the food. Despite his athletic training, he was quite a glutton, stuffing his face at any opportunity he got. With all the festivals, his training was put on hold but his feasting more than doubled...

One morning, while getting up, Rowan caught himself in the mirror. His form was not that which he recognised. In fact, a rather noticeable bulge had formed around his midsection. His months of feasting had caught up with him. He patted his gut and thought...
125321111.title: Indulging during celebrations.

choices: No, they had an early event to go to.
1253211111.content:
He patted his gut and thought it looked kind of cool. In fact, he wouldn't mind getting bigger. A lot bigger.

After getting dressed, with a sigh of disappointment, Rowan noticed his new chub wasn't noticeable with clothes on. He wanted to let his belly stand loud and proud. That would probably net some concerns from his mother and sister however, who'd get him on some sort of weight loss regime.

But were his mother and sister in?
1253211111.title: Getting bigger.

12532111112.content:
That's right! They had been invited to some floral event or whatever. Aytolis had been trying to mend relations with nearby kingdoms. As you might expect, this meant attending meetings and events. One kingdom, ruled entirely by women, had offered the Queen and Lianna the opportunity to attend one of their celebrations. They'd be gone at least all month and, with an early start too, Rowan would have the place to himself for quite a while.

That reminded him! He had also been invited to another event which, coincidently, only allowed males to attend. Apparently the King was conducting an event for the males while the Queen was conducting one for females, which neither Lianna or the Queen could attend. This meant Rowan was pretty much forced to go otherwise Aytolis would seem disrespectful. It wasn't all bad, this kingdom was nearby and the festival started in the afternoon. He hadn't really read the invitation though.

His stomach gurgled for something to eat. Back on topic, if he wanted to get big, he would need to eat.

He took of his shirt and patted his now exposed belly. He wanted to see every inch of progress he made.

The servants, under Rowan's request, prepared a large breakfast. Their Prince's behaviour was... odd but none dared say a word for he was royalty.

Eyeing the food, Rowan looked down to his currently small belly, "Well, here we go!"

Rowan began tearing through the food, shovelling whatever he could in his mouth. Bacon, eggs, bread. All were emptied into his mouth. The empty plates began stacking up but the prince's pace was slowing down slightly as he was becoming overwhelmed by the amount of food he was trying to eat. His desires shone through and he kept pushing on. Every now and then, he'd look down to check the progress of his belly.

His small belly had began pushing out. His body was unable to digest the influx of food as fast as it was being thrust in leaving his belly looking bloated and stuffed. His flat chest curved out in an arc which ended in a gut slowly forcing its way onto the lap below. Groaning and gurgling sounds could be heard as it begged for its master to stop but he wouldn't listen.

Before long, all the plates had emptied and Rowan leaned back in a sigh of relief and pain. He tilted his head forward and clutched his complaining stomach. While many would regret this moment, Rowan smiled through his pain, his feelings of suffering surpassed by the feelings he was getting from his remarkable gut. The only question was, where from here?

He spied the invitation on the table and noticed something odd written on it...
12532111112.title: A small breakfast

125321111121.content:
"All attendees must arrive at the event shirtless." An odd dress code but coincidentally fitted Rowan's desires. A thought passed him by as to why the King would want shirtless attendees. Who cares came another thought.

A groan from his stuffed belly diverted his attention. It was still early and the event wasn't until the afternoon. Just enough time to sleep off his meal.
125321111121.title: A peculiar dress code

1253211111211.content:
As the carriage pulled up to the event location, Rowan spied gathered royalty. Princes and Kings from nearby Kingdoms were chatting and laughing with each other. There were two kinds of people at this event, those who wore cloaks to conceal their upper body and those, usually young princes, who showcased finely constructed abs.

Well, three kinds actually, there was Rowan. He wore a pair of buttoned shorts with Aytolis' insignia on them but let his belly show proudly. While no longer stuffed, it still protruded a fair amount and made his belly button seem a bit deeper.

One arrogant prince strutted over laughing. He stopped by Rowan and patted his belly twice, continuing to laugh, "Who knew the 'Hero of Aytolis' was such as pig? You'll be lucky if it's an eating contest, Bubble belly!"

Little did he know he would come to eat his own words...

"Could all guests here for the event please proceed to the Great Hall."

The guests did as they were told.

Inside the hall was a long table with a seat for every guest. The table itself was covered with all sorts of different foods from the nearby region.

When Rowan took his seat, he found that prince from earlier...
1253211111211.title: At the event

choices: Halfway through, Dylan takes a breather
12532111112112.content:
The prince, named Dylan apparently, had been sat next to Rowan. Looking at the chubby prince again, he stifled a laugh.

The King of the country was sat on throne on the balcony at the top of the hall. He wore a cloak but no crown and abided by the same dress code as his guests letting his most distinctive feature, his impressive gut, which his thick arms rested upon.

"My esteemed guests, as you may be aware my country has been very reclusive in the past. This is, in fact, the first gathering we have organised in thousands of years. We do not ally ourselves with other countries to avoid conflicts and to uphold our traditions unimpeded. Today you shall be participating in one of them. An eating contest."

Dylan turned and glared at Rowan, who simply smirked back.

"The winner will be decided by myself. I will choose who I please. It may not be the one who eats the most or the one who lasts the longest so please, eat all that you will. The victor shall be allowed within the confines of our Kingdom and will become our ally. I shall give you a moment to prepares yourselves and you may begin upon the sound of the horn."

Rowan patted Dylan's flat stomach, "Well, guess who got lucky."

He was visibly agitated, "I'm still going to beat you." He poked Rowan's belly before quietly coming to the realisation he may earn one of his own.

The horn blared and they were off.

choices: Link makes it half way but is too full to finish his platter
1253321111212.content:
It was just another day at the Skyloft Academy. Classes were in session, and today, the Junior Knights were getting another Aviation lesson from Owlan, the expert Bird Flying Instructor. Today's session was on how every knight should keep their Loftwing on a proper diet. Zelda, of course, was writing up a storm of notes, while Link was having somewhat of a harder time keeping up with Owlan's lesson. Of course, Groose and his goons were far too busy talking in the back to even pay the least bit of attention, and catching that, Owlan smirked and stopped his lecture mid-sentence and called out to the pointy haired teen. "Don't you agree, Mr. Groose?"

Fumbling nervously upon being caught, Groose shuffled his one blank piece of paper and cleared his throat. "Errr, y-yes! Absolutely!" Owlan raised an eyebrow and with a sly smirk, asked, "Absolutely what?" Gripping his collar nervously, Groose said, "It's important that every knight maintain a healthy...diet...potion...?" Owlan shook his head while Zelda and Link snickered to themselves. Owlan was just about to scold the arrogant teen when a sudden loud rumbling filled the ears of the entire classroom.

"What the devil was that...?" asked Owlan, confused for a moment, and only a moment, as he knew the answer, upon seeing Link's strawberry red face and realizing that loud noise was the blond's hungry stomach. "I see we've skipped breakfast yet AGAIN, young man?" Link rubbed the back of his head sheepishly and flashed an embarrassed smile. "Sorry, Mr. Owlan. Was kinda running late...again..." Link replied apologetically. Rolling his eyes, Owlan simply chuckled to himself and said, "Well, since we're on the subject of proper dietary maintenance, it's important not to fly your Loftwings on an empty stomach. So I suppose this is as good a time as any to call in and get something to eat. We'll resume the rest our lecture tomorrow."

The Junior Knights then took their leave from the classroom. Groose being Groose, took the opportunity to rub Link's face in his embarrassing ordeal as always. "Jeez, Link, I thought Skyloft was having a skyquake for a second there!" Link's face grew a bit redder, but luckily Zelda intervened and said, "For your information, I was helping him study for our Goddess Mythology test this morning. Sorry he didn't spend all morning looking at himself in the mirror like you do every day." Groose's shoulders slumped downward as Zelda smirked smugly at the pompous knight and headed to the Academy kitchen alongside Link, where they were greeted by Fledge and the Lunch Lady.

"Hiya, guys!" Fledge said. "Say, how do you guys think you did on the Goddess exam?" Link was about to reply, but yet again, his drained stomach let out yet another hungry growl, causing him to flush red with embarrassment as he covered his stomach with one hand. The Lunch Lady scoffed and said, "Hold your horses! I'm working as fast as I can!"

After a moment, she brought out a shockingly large portion of food for the young junior knight. Link simply stared wide-eyed at what looked like a mini-hill of various entrees. Meat, fruits, riceballs, and various other Skyloft delicacies. "Don't worry about the Rupees, young man. I still owe you for helping Fledge move all those barrels. Enjoy!" Link was practically salivating like a hungry puppy at the mere sight of all that food. Zelda couldn't help but chuckle to herself at the sight.

"Let's eat outside, it's a really nice day today!" Zelda exclaimed. Link nodded, only half paying attention, and carefully maneuvered his hill of food out to the shady falls where he and Zelda always had little picnics here and there. Wasting no time at all, Link began scarfing down whatever he could fit into his mouth, too hungry to differentiate any of his entrees. With two plump Stamina fruits at hand, Link gulped down an ample mouthful of food and proceeded to greedily chomp into the fruits vigorously. Zelda couldn't help but chuckle with amusement at the sight, while she helped herself to a sandwich the Lunch Lady had prepared. "Wow, Link, I don't think I've ever seen you this hungry before," she noted with some surprise in his voice. Gulping down one of the fruits, Link sighed with relief and said, "Sorry...I...kinda forgot to eat yesterday, so I'm catching up now," Link replied before taking what was left of his second fruit and swallowing it whole. As he continued eating, Zelda noted that Link's normally slim stomach was beginning to bulge outward slightly from all the food he'd been ingesting...

FInally, after a little while had passed...
1253321111212.title: A Junior Knight's Hunger

choices: Fly to the Lumpy Pumpkin and try some of that world famous Pumpkin Soup
12533211112121.content:
Zelda couldn't believe her eyes, her reserved quiet friend had not only eaten more than his share, but he had somehow, eaten every last item on his now empty platter. Link sighed with relief and smiled a wide smile as he leaned back in the grass, one elbow back supporting him while his free hand rested atop his slightly bloated tummy. "Ahhh, just what the doctor ordered!" Link exclaimed happily, patting his stomach proudly. Unfortunately, the sudden thumping against his bloated stomach had worked up some of the air Link had swallowed with his plethora of food, causing Link to belch quite loudly on accident. Covering his mouth immediately, Link blushed with embarrassment and yet again smiled a bit sheepishly. "Eh hehe...s-sorry about that," Link said apologetically. Zelda simply laughed and playfully poked Link's belly as she said, "That's alright. It's Knight Academy! Everyone's allowed to cut loose every now and then, right?"

Link smiled gratefully as Zelda smiled back and rose to her feet, helping her dear friend back up on his. The two of them simply stood in silence and marveled at the wonderful clear sky above and below them as the breeze blew ever so gently across the floating village in the sky. "Ahh, it really is nice and quiet up here, isn't it," she asked. Link simply smiled and nodded. "I needed this. These last few days have been so hectic! It's nice to just take some time for yourself and unwind every now and then." She then glanced over at Link and said, "I'm just glad I have a friend to share that time with." Before Link could reply, Zelda playfully pecked him across the cheek, causing the teen's jaw to drop slightly as he flushed red, earning a smile from Zelda, as she said, "Well, I better get going! I promised my father I'd help him with the upcoming festivities. I'll see ya around, Link!"

A bit of a goofy smile rose over Link's face as he watched Zelda take her leave. He was about to leave as well, when; much to his surprise, his stomach rumbled hungrily yet again. Wha-? How could I possibly be hungry?! I just ate more food in one go than I've eaten all year long! Link thought to himself, stunned. As if to emphasize this point, another pocket of stale air rose up the teen's throat, causing his cheeks to puff out as he stifled another burp, causing Link to grimace with discomfort as he thumped his chest a few times, and excused himself to no one in particular.

Then, he thought back to what Zelda had just finished telling him, about taking some much needed 'me-time'. The truth was, Link had been doubly stressed himself. Between exams and strange recurring dreams of ominous beings from a strange and distant world Link knew only from mythology, he was in knots all over, and needed to unwind. Link always had a very big appetite, but he'd never indulged past his limits, part of what kept him in perfect figure most of his young life. But, strange as it seemed, just kicking back and eating an obscene amount of food brought a wave of relief and jolted a much needed fire in his belly. Especially given that this past week, Link's troubles had prevented him from eating much at all, and the truth was, he needed to get his energy back.

It may not have been conventional, but if taking some time to just eat and re-nourish his depleted stamina could constitute as unwinding time, then Link had no choice but to indulge.

If just for a little bit longer... he thought to himself, snickering a bit as he rubbed his stomach hungrily, deciding on how to get his next fill. Finally, after a bit of thinking, Link decided to...
12533211112121.title: Link finishes the entire platter

choices: Groose, so he can have zelda
Zelda, because she likes bigger men
125332111122.content: Who will make link get fat?
125332111122.title: Someone fattens him up

1253321111222.content:
*BRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIINNNNGGGG!!!!!!*

The bell rung relentlessly throughout the Skyloft Knights Academy. A few mere moments later, the door to Mr. Owlan's class snapped open, and out ran all the young knights to be, eager to get on with their day as they chatted and laughed amongst themselves. Zelda; the teenaged blonde girl and bookwiz who was typically last to leave the classroom at any given day, was just about finished packing her bag, until she dropped one of her larger lecture books. Fortunately, just before it could smash against the ground, someone caught it mid-fall. Looking up, Zelda smiled gratefully as she saw a familiar messy blond haired young man smiling back at her.

"My hero..." Zelda remarked playfully as Link chuckled a bit and handed her the book, before grabbing his own and walking alongside her towards the exit.

"Link, before you go..."

Both Link and Zelda stopped as they turned to see Mr. Owlan; their tall, long white haired professor standing firmly behind his desk with a smirk of vague pride across his calm yet often stern face, as he said, "I just wanted to let you know I'm very impressed by how well you did on today's exam. In fact, I've noticed your grades have been progressing quite nicely these days. Be sure to keep it up, young man."

Said young man rubbed the back of his head and smiled gratefully at the elder man, but before he could open his mouth to reply...

"Pffft, yeah, keep up the great work, nerd!"

Recognizing that smug, arrogant voice all too well, both Link and Zelda turned to see Groose snickering at his own insult as he grabbed his own book and rose from his desk. Turning his attention to the beefy but prissy teen, Owlan's face remained neutral as he said, "That didn't stop you from trying to cheat off his exam, now did it, Mister Groose..."

Groose's snickering came to a screeching halt as he blinked dully and turned to his teacher.

"...Eeeh...y-you saw that...?"

Owlan raised an eyebrow and added, "You didn't think it was strange that your grade was 'See me after class?'" Groose's previously smug expression went completely blank as both Link and Zelda snickered to themselves then took their leave.

"See ya next week, Mister Owlan!" Called out Zelda, chipper as ever as Owlan smiled at the two parting teens, then turned his attention to the cowering bully sitting alone in the back of his classroom. "Tell me, Groose...how do you feel about cleaning the Loftwing stables?"

Groose whimpered pitifully...

Meanwhile, both Link and Zelda were still walking together through the Academy Hallway. "Man, I STILL can't believe I got an A on that test...I was SURE I'd get another D..." remarked Link, more than a hint of relief present in his voice. Zelda just smiled and playfully nudged her friend in the arm.

"Yeah, who'd have thought opening your book and READING it every once in a while would lead to that silly brain of yours actually retaining stuff?" joked Zelda. Link just rolled his eyes and shook his head.

"Hardy har har..." chimed Link, before he turned to Zelda and; with a more genuine and grateful smile, added, "Seriously though, I really appreciate you taking the time to help me study these past few weeks. Goddess only knows how badly I'd still be failing if it weren't for you, Zelda..."

Zelda just smiled back at her friend and added, "Hey, what're friends for, right?"

"H-heh, yeah..." Link just chuckled and rubbed the back of his head a bit sheepishly, then added, "...S-still, is there any way I can repay you? A-as thanks for helping me study and all that stuff?"

Zelda stopped and thought for a moment, but before she could reply, a LOUD rumble emitted throughout the hall. From afar, one of the senior knights; Pipit, stepped out from the lobby and looked around curiously. "What in the name of the Goddess...? Was that a skyquake...?"

Judging from Link's flushing red face, however, the source of that rumbling was in fact, his hungry stomach. Catching this, Zelda just laughed while Link chuckled sheepishly with embarrassment as he grabbed his midsection and turned away, hoping to stifle its' hungry musings.

"Tell ya what; how about you repay me by having lunch with me?" offered Zelda, much to Link's relief.

"S-sounds good to me, h-heh..." replied Link, still embarrassed as he continued to try and quiet his rumbling stomach in any way he could.

Where do the two friends decide to eat at?
1253321111222.title: A grateful Knight-to-be...

1253322221111.content:
The gamer kid strolled down the street in defeat. Not only had the games begun to destroy the city, not only had he been turned into a gorilla and helped, not only had the experience left him in his pants/underwear...

He was hungry too.

He placed his hand on his empty stomach and rubbed it sadly. He would have been embarrassed to be walking around the streets in his pants but everyone had fled the city when the games attacked so no-one would see him. He looked up to the neon glowing sign above him: Nancy's diner. The titular 'Nancy' had likely fled the city but there was likely to be food still in there.

He quietly opened the door and looked around. No-one seemed to be there. He approached the counter in an attempt to go over and into the kitchen from there but was instead greeted by a lady. She appeared to be human but had that eerie glow the other video games had.

"Hi sugar. Bet ya'll are hungry aren't ya!" She started. She didn't seem evil. Maybe she wasn't corrupted. "Tell you what hun, you go sit over there and I'll bring you somethin' special." He was sceptical but a quick growl from his stomach made his decision for him. He placed the can that gave him powers on the table. He wasn't wearing his T-shirts anymore but they were only so his powers were identifiable. He sat at the table as his stomach growled violently for something to eat.

Just then, the lady came back with...

Whatever this woman put in his cake he wasn't complaining. He loved every moment. The taste, the texture, the way it satisfied his hungry stomach.

Speaking of his stomach, a cake that size had to go somewhere. His formerly flat and toned stomach became softer. When he was halfway through the cake, his stomach had a very slight curve to it. He was completely oblivious to his gain. He was lost in the taste of the cake.

125332222222111.content:
Normally, Lucio liked diversity and change but it gets aggravating when your business is being stolen by someone.

A new DJ, going by the alias of bEATs, had become a sensation. Just like him, bEATs sold concerts worldwide and, just like him, had albums under and coming under his name. The music between them was similar in quality but Lucio didn't come with the stipulation of a buffet, so why was bEATs more popular all of a sudden?

Pondering this one day (he had nothing better to do), Lucio received a phone call from an unknown source, "I hear you've been out of work due to a new rival. I have just the solution for you, they should be at your door very soon..."

"Who is this?" They hung up.

The doorbell rang. Opening the door, there was a person stood with a relatively large case. "Hello. You are Lucio, correct?"

"Yeah..."

"Might I come in?"

"Sure..." He gestured inside but not quite trusting the...
125332222222111.title: Drop the bEAT.

1253322222221111.content:
The two sat down and Lucio asked what the man was here for.

"Sorry. My name is Raymond and I was hired to come here and make you into a DJ to beat bEATs."

"How?"

"I was requested not to disclose that information myself until a contract was signed." He handed over a contract and a pen, "If you don't want my help then that is fine but this opportunity may not come again."

It was incredibly suspicious but he was right. An opportunity to get back on top may not happen again and he was obviously closer to knowing what made bEATs more popular. Was it worth the risk? The contract's text, well, there was a lot of it and not possibly enough time to read it all.

"I must ask for a decision, sir."
1253322222221111.title: A contract...

12533222222211111.content:
"Life's too short to worry." Lucio stated as signing the contract.

"Excellent, sir. You won't regret it!"

"So who signed you up for this?"

"Truthfully, I don't know. Though they claimed to want to beat bEATs at his own game."

"Which is why you're here. So, why is bEATs so popular?"

"Simple, really. He's fat. You'd be surprised at how many people like that."

"And how does that relate to me?"

"Well, if he's popular for being big. Then you must also be big."

"You're going to fatten me up? No way!" Lucio exclaimed, shocked.

"You've already signed the contract. There's no going back now. One of the terms in the contract was complete control of your lifestyle from what you eat to where you go and when."

Sighing and realising there's nothing he could do, Lucio asked, "So how are we going to do this?"

125332222222212.content:
Eight stepped onto the metal floor of the train and the doors closed behind him.

After saving Inkopolis from Tartar, Eight had made sure to come back frequently. Sure the place was a death-trap but it was a great way to stay in shape away from prying eyes even if Pearl and Marina couldn't always feed him advice through a radio.

More recently, he'd been simply riding the metro as a way to relax. He could swear he could hear the Calamari Inkantation on the radio but no-one else seemed to. Maybe it really was etched into his soul.

He took at seat and watched the bright colours soar by the windows. The metro was quiet today, it was just him and the Conductor.

He opened the CQ-80 to see if he could point the train is a less... strikingly bright direction. He simply wanted to- Hello? What's this?

It was faint but there appeared to be an additional line extending past the bottom of the hologram.

Zooming in, it did appear to be another line. Four stations.

No mem cakes to be found here, though, which was disappointing. Of all the things Eight was able to remember during his adventure, his name was not one of them...

No weapons allowed in any of them. Curious. Maybe he got a selection of canned weapons inside? Memories of Girl Power Station caused him to shudder.

Should he?

He came here to relax after all, not throw himself into more challenges. Pearl and Marina weren't here to help him either.

He flicked to the first and scanned over the name: Gut Instinct Station ~ Heavy hitters. Nothing too useful there.

His finger twitched over the confirmation button. Should he? Shouldn't he?
125332222222212.title: Back in the Deepsea metro...

1253322222222121.content:
Oops! My bad! Forgot to ask!

Is Eight going to gaining a belly or some muscles?
1253322222222121.title: I almsot forgot!

12533222222221211.content:
He pressed the button and flinched slightly as if waiting for something.

"Destination Set: Line K-1." C. Q. Cumber announced over the intercom.

Eight breathed a sigh of relief (for what, he didn't know).

Arriving at the station, he stepped into the Equipper. No weapons just as the preview said.

What he didn't expect was for the Equipper to de-equip his ink tank. Definitely no weapons in here then, not even canned ones.

Eight walked over to his conductor for advice on the upcoming trial.

"This is a test of endurance and willpower.

The exit will not appear until you have finished everything.

There is no time limit, take as long as you need.

...

Good luck."

Well that was helpful. Eight rolled his eyes.

Endurance? Willpower? Would this be like Move it Move it?

Finished everything? What could that mean?

At least there was no time limit and no bomb either. He could take as long as he needed to figure this out.

Of course he could always step out now. But that's quitter talk right?
12533222222221211.title: A new line...

125332222222212111.content:
Eight paid his CQ points and super jumped into action.

Across the platforms was a table filled with various foods and a seat. Taking said seat, Eight was startled by C. Q. Cumber's announcement, "You must clear the table to proceed."

Test of endurance? Finished everything? Clear the table? Now it made sense.

He had to eat all of this food. Perhaps he shouldn't have eaten before coming down here...

Too late to change his mind now, Eight dug into one of the three burgers that were in front of him.

They were actually really good. Who knew the test chambers had good food hiding away?

Finishing all three, Eight stifled a burp. Less filling than he thought they'd be but perhaps that was for the best. There was still rather a lot to eat.

The table spun robotically and presented him another dish. Rinse and repeat.

As he ate though, he quickly slipped from eating vigorously to nibbling at each one.

After only his fifth plate, he had to stop for a moment. A sensation of fullness had been building up. He'd tried his best to ignore it but it had simply become too much.

Eight groaned and clutched his stomach which had been showing the effects of his meal too.

What was a flat stomach had bloated out into a belly. Eight pressed a finger against its surface finding it hard and taut. He stuffed it so full that it had begun forcing the zipper on his shirt up. The resisting clothing had begun to dig into his skin so he fully unzipped the piece but left it hanging on his shoulders. It wasn't much of relief, but it was something.

Glancing up, he was halfway through. Only 5 other things left. His stomach groaned unpleasantly.

He began thinking it would've been better just to sit on the train and listen to music.

In spite of his increasingly growing gut, Eight soldiered on hoping to just get finished if nothing else.
125332222222212111.title: Now it makes sense

12533222222222111113112221131232.content:
Well with Josh back to sleep and nothing else to do in the house Chris decided that maybe it was best that he started making breakfast. Though he was a little nervous, he wasn't sure if Josh's family kept the place stocked while they were away. Josh timidly opened the cabinets in the kitchen fearing he was going to find nothing in them. Though thankfully to his relief he saw that there was plenty of food stocked. Chris then went over to the refrigerator to check there and saw that it too was also filled with food as well. Chris guessed that Josh must have had his parents have had the cabin restocked before they headed up to the cabin, not surprised given Josh's new appetite. He grabbed some eggs, milk, and got some of the pancake mix that was in cabinet. He decided they were were going to have a breakfast for today.

Chris started with the pancakes first, since he wanted to make sure the eggs were still warm when Josh decided to come down and eat. He prepped making the pancakes, measuring the flour, putting it in a pouring bowl and then mixing it with milk. After he gave it a hearty stir so it was mixed properly, he turned the stove on, got a frying pan hanging on the floor and poured some of the batter into the pan. He flipped it over a couple of times till that battered turned into a fluffy golden brown pancake and repeated the process a few times till he hard a large stack of pancakes. He then moved on to making the scrambled eggs. He cracked the eggs into a bowl and the beat the eggs till it was thoroughly mixed, the yolks taking on a light yellow color. Taking another frying pan he poured the eggs into the frying pan and began to slowly move the eggs around with a spatula to properly scramble them.

"I thought a smelled something good." A voice boomed out in the cabin

Chris looked to where the voice came from and saw Josh heading towards him. Chris noticed that Josh;s shirt looked a tight on him, he guessed from his binge from last night.

"Thanks, thought I whip up on breakfast while you were sleeping" Chris said.

"And it looks all pretty good" Josh said as he rubbed his hands together in anticipation to start eating. "I'm starving".

"Didn't you eat a ton of junk food last nigh" Chris asked.

"Yeah but that was then and this is now" Josh said as a took a seat on the table. He grabbed a pancake from the stack and began eating it without a plate or utensils just ripping it with his teeth.

"Dude!" Chris said annoyed. He had spent much of the morning cooking breakfast and Josh was going to eat without him.

"What?" Josh replied with as he chewed the pancake.

"Wait for me at least, I'm still making the eggs". Chris said.

"I'm sorry bro but I'm just hungry is all, I'll wait for you" Josh said apologetically.

"Thanks" Chris said as he continued back on making the eggs. The two boys continued to idly chatter till the eggs were ready. Chris divided the pan into half one half for him and another half for Josh.

Just as Chris sat down to eat Josh then began to dig in, Chris just sighed and just started to eat. Chris was halfway done with his meal when he heard a groan come from the other side of the table. Chris took his eyes off with his food to see that Josh had already finished, not a crumb was spared. Josh was already leaning back into his chair rubbing his bloated gut. It was kinda hot to be honest. But he went back to finishing his meal, only to join in with Josh after his finished his meal as well. Chris had to admit his eyes were bigger than his stomach sometimes.

Peeta looked up from the delectable pastries in the counter below. "Yes Mr. Abernathy, sir?" Haymitch comes up to the counter, his breath reeking of alcohol. "I want to buy tfour baskets of muffins and cupcakes from here." Peeta looked shocked at the Victor. "Four baskets, sir?" Peeta asks. Haymitch replies, "One for me, three for you, and only you. I have seen how your family treats you, and I felt that you deserved a treat for all your hard work. And while you are at it, buy a cake as well, for you." Peeta felt touched at this kindness never seen before from almost anyone in District 12. As Haymitch left the bakery...
1321.title: Peeta

13211.content: As Haymitch left the bakery, Peeta tore into the first basket. It was muffins, chocolate chip, banana nut, raisin, blueberry. One by one until all 12 were polished off. Stomach still growling, he tore into the second basket. Cupcakes. Chocolate, strawberry, any kind you can imagine. Each one large and thick with rich icing. Resting his hand on his now bloated gut, another customer comes in.
13211.title: he starts eating his treats

132112.content:
"Mister Mayor!" Peeta exclaimed, shocked out of his food - induced stupor. Peeta stood up clumsily, until Undersee acknowledged the salute. "Good evening Master Mellark, I just happened to notice Mr. Abernathy walk out of here looking rather grunted for once, and I must ask what he had bought to feel this way." Peeta was stunned. He gulped and said, "Well sir, Haymitch came in here drunk and bought several things, giving me all but one to eat." Mayor Undersee nodded and replied. "Well, did he say why? He must have had some ulterior motive to this unusual act."
"Well, Mayor Undersee, he said he knew how my family treats me and he wanted me to feel better, so he bought me some comfort food." Mayor Undersee observes the obvious bulge under Peeta's apron and clears his throat. "I see that you have a liking to indulge yourself on the rare occasion." Peeta looks down and blushes, all while tugging at his uniform. Mayor Undersee chuckles. "Don't worry my boy, I actually need someone like you, who can finish his food and then some. The President himself has requested every mayor to select one citizen from their district to go to the Capitol on rotation, as a food tester for the banquets, and I'd like to send you as District 12's representative. What do you say?" Peeta's jaw drops as he absorbs what the Mayor was saying. He could go to the Capitol regularly and escape nights of stale food with his rotten brothers and mother, or he could stay home and take care of the family business.
132112.title: The Mayor of 12

1332222.content:
Embry was glad to finally get to hang with Jacob and Quil again now that they all changed into Werewolves. He had missed them when Sam kept them all underwraps and away, with good reason but nonetheless, surely there was some better way of doing it than nearly destroying one's friendship. Anyhow, it was all good now and he was excited to go back to playing ball, chatting about girls, eating, video games, and such things with his buds.

There was one thing that bugged him though and that was how skinny he was as a werewolf. Yes, he was a small werewolf compared to everyone else and it was almost obscene that even Jacob and Quil who had changed more than a month after him were bigger than he was. Yes compared to humans, he was pretty big but when measured against his pack, he was the runt of the litter, again. Just like when he was human. That was one of the few things he had been looking forward to as a wolf, not being smaller than everybody else but even Seth, Leah's little brother who was in the pre-phase step before phasing was bigger than him! And he was 2 years younger and not a full wolf yet! How was that even fair? The good news was that there was little to do as a Wolf. Just go around running stupid patrols finding non-existant vampires and eat and relax. Especially eat, There were definitely worse things to be doing anyhow. All the vampires seemed to have gone away and even Sam who was insanely strict, finally was convinced to loosen the patrolling schedule and it became more of a once in a while thing than something they did everyday.

Ah eating. That was something they all looked forward to. The wolf spirit really ratched up the food requirements and they were all so hungry all the time. But they could eat whatever they want, however much they want, and they all got big hulking huge manly bodies without even having to do anything free of charge! However, he noticed something weird that the others haven't really seemed to notice yet. At first he thought there must have been some mistake, that he was seeing wrong or imagining. But yes, Sam's belly was beginning to bloat out a little around the edges and the abs less defined. Jacob's, Paul's, and Jared's as well. Quil never really had the same degree of definition as the others, sporting a belly with partial abs but it seemed even those were gone now and was becoming a gut which to be honest was more suiting....uh yeah. He checked himself out and he also had a bit of flab covering his abs but not so much it was noticeable unless you squeezed or felt it. It turned out there was a bit of repercussion for eating like they did, even with werewolf metabolism, and changing just once a week, sometimes even just once every two weeks if at all...Well, this wasn't much of an issue. Actually, he kind of liked it, this manly feeling and it honestly wasn't all that much. Their metabolism still ate most of it and if it was just a few pounds here and there and if he ate enough, he could catch up to the other guys and not be so small. And it wasn't like they were complaining or even seemed to notice.
1332222.title: Embry

133231.content:
Seth looked in the mirror dismayed by what he saw. He didn't look that bad, not now that he had his werewolf growth spurt, but he still looked puny compared to others in the Pack. Seth had always been on the slighter side and while the others looked like massive muscle beasts who could bench cars and bend steel like supermen (they tested and Jacob, Sam, Paul, and Quil actually could) he looked a swimmer. Admittedly a very ripped and lean one but when your friends are all easily two to three times as broad towering giants with biceps about as big or bigger than your head, it certainly does not build one's confidence. He wanted to look more like Jacob, Sam, or Paul (as much as he disliked him). Why did the spirits see it fit to give him such a small pathetic body? That was just not fair. Not to mention that everyone thought of him as a kid or pup. He was no kid! He was only two years younger and they all treated him as such a baby. He killed vampires just like they had and they still treated him as a baby. Jacob and his friends were at least nice about it, but Paul and Jared ridiculed him and made him feel very unwelcome. Paul especially liked to throw his size around. It was horrible but Seth actually was almost turned on by the feel of the bigger man against him. Not to say he was attracted to Paul, but Seth loved bigger sizes. Having been surrounded by bigger people all his life, he couldn't help but be attracted. And Paul, while not as big as Jacob or Sam, was huge and even if he was a dick Paul was hot. He'd be hot too if he was bigger.

"Seth, dinner time," his mom called and he looked away from the mirror. He was tired of always being the smallest in the Pack. He would get big and strong, maybe even as big as Jacob whom he idolized, and would show them all. Seth Clearwater was no kid, he was just as much a wolf as those guys. Bounding into the kitchen he kissed his mom and sat down as she served him the huge portions of mashed potatoes and macaroni and cheese. Grinning, he digs in making noises of appreciation (in contrast to most parents, Sue Clearwater actually got upset if it was just quiet and polite like they weren't enjoying their food) and does something that makes his mother and sister Leah look at him in shock. Letting out a long burp (when surrounded by a number of big overgrown immature guys, one learns things) he cleared his throat and asked-

"Can I have more?" and it just grew quiet as Leah and Sue stared at him.

142111.content:
"It's over hatter" growled Bruce, cornering the little man. Batman had tracked the Hatter down to the Doughboy Donut Packing factory in Gotham industrial district, and after solving his ever increasingly annoying rhymes and games, the Bat had him on the fence or so he thought.

"Make this easy for yourself" said the Bat sternly, lifting the Hatter off his feet and holding him againt the wall.

"Oh such fun, you following me, here there and back. But the night is young, and theres much to do, so as a reward, a special.... bat snack"

"What?" Scowled Batman. But before he could ask, the Hatter forced somehting into his mouth, and while Bruce coughed in a cloud of powdered suger, he started to feel dizzy. The sweet suger shimering in the air like noxious gas fumes. The Batman fell to his knees, coughing violently.

"Wha... what did you do!"

"Just a taste, a sweet one too, now whatever I say, you will do!" sung the Hatter.

"Cough*... Never!"

"You see this little treat, will make you want eat, and the more you do, the more it feels so right, so good, so new. And thanks to my little sweetie, you'll soon be bigger then both tweedle dum and dee. So my dear Bat, you will love getting fat, yes, so much fatter. And its all thanks to me, your dear friend Hatter"

Batman tried to force himself to his feet, but he fell into a stack of boxes, the Hatter gleefully laughting as he walked away. Batman wanted to chase, but he was filled with the overwhelming urge to eat. He grabed the donuts and began stuffing them into his mouth, one after the other.

"more *gulp* I need... *chew* I need more"


Batman reawoke at daybreak. Groggily he sat up. His entire body hurt, as he looked around to see a dozen or so empty boxes, each one once holding a dozen or so doughnuts. He then looked down to see the plating on his suit was warping out of position around his stomach, his suit uncomfortablly tight around the middle.

Fearing that there was some truth to what the Hatter had said, he quickly did a scan for any irregularly in his phisiolagy. Sure enough, his body had accumulated 30 pounds of fat overnight.

'Damn' thought the bat. He programed the suits plating to expand as much as it could to relieve some of the preasure, but even then it was still tight. And the worst part was hw was still hungry. Heading back to the Batmobile, Bruce wobbled as his center of gravity had altered. He needed to solve this fast, but a rumble from his newly aquired gut gave a strong counter argument.

"Okay... find something to eat. Then fix this"
