Harley found an opening and knock Fire back and saw Batman was open to an attack. “This is for Mister B. “shouted the crazy clown princess she flung a big bomb filled with joker gas and a painted happy face on it. “Harley no.” shouted Ivy as she knew what would happen to everybody in the tight room. “Hsinav” spoke Zatanna as the bomb glowed, but exploded releasing a huge wave of force knocking everybody back into different parts of the museum.

Batman saw Harley trying to harm him and saw Zatanna chanted a spell to make the bomb disappear only for Talia to get thrown in Zatanna while she chanted the spell. The next thing he know he was thrown across the main gallery into a museum corridor and saw a big red ball of twine with a dog statue on it starting to fall. Batman rushed to save the artifact from falling and potentially breaking. He saved it only to fall unconscious as he felt his conscious slip. The last thing he saw before falling completely unconscious is a Scottish terrier looking at him. “How did a dog get in here?” thought Batman before he blacked out.
1421122111.title: All the villainess meet in the gallary

14211221111.content:
Zatanna came to and saw that she saw that was blasted she was surround by the ancient Roman artifacts. “Man the spell had a huge black lash of power. Somebody must has interfered when I was chanting the spell. “thought Zatanna she thought about what happen to her spell. The spell was just to make the bomb vanish not cause a force blast. She noticed the artifacts started to glow.” Not good.” The artifacts couldn’t have gotten damage. They were not in the main gallery.” thought Zatanna she backed away from the glowing artifacts.

The artifacts started to float and from their glowing came ghostly figures. The figures were dressed in ancient noble’s robes and some of the figures were ancient Roman armor. Zatanna instantly recognized them as the Roman pantheon of gods.

She knew from her knowledge of supernatural and from her and Batman’s mission in Rome several months ago. The world leaders were gathered Rome for a peace conference. Batman, Zatanna, and Wonder Women got a lead that Felix Faust wanted to tap into magical source of power, and kill the world leaders. The source of power was an ancient Roman temple dedicate to the gods. Zatanna saw varies statues and pictures of the roman gods. The trio managed to defeated Felix Faust and many world leaders put more trust in the superheroes.

“You are the one known as Zatanna?” asked one of the ghostly figures.

“Um yes, what do you want for me? “asked Zatanna is she wondered what did the Roman gods want with her. She knew that her magic is weak against divine beings like gods.

“We wanted to express our gratitude to you as you saved our temple from being used by the pitifully excess of a sorcerer. “said of the ghostly figure. Zatanna felt honored and remember that she tapped into the magical power of the temple to defeat Faust as Batman and Wonder Woman distract him.

“When you tapped in the magical source we felt you use the power there and noticed there was a mental block on your power. Our gift is for you is the remove that mental block and have full access to your power and our blessing should give you a huge boost in your magical powers. “said one of the figures as all the gods waved their hand over Zatanna.

“That you for such a great gift. Words cannot express how grateful I am.” said Zatanna as she felt a huge surge of power flow through her body. She felt a stronger connection to magic. She felt that she could do the most complex forms of magic just be doing a mere hand gesture or by a mental command.

“We felt that you are only one that can take care of our artifacts and we will let you take care of them. Before we go let me tell you that your mind and soul is linked to another person, but he will take of you well. A far more powerful being caused the linked.” said another ghostly figure. After that the ghost images faded away and the glowing artifacts stopped floating and glowing.

Zatanna stood in the dark museum gallery filled with ancient Roman artifacts. She remembers about the lose villainess and the thought of her comrades and Batman might be hurt. She ran out of the gallery towards the main gallery.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~
Wonder Woman knocked back and when she gained her bearing and saw she was blasted in the ancient Greek artifacts gallery. She even saw some Amazonian pottery and jewelry. She noticed that many of the artifacts in this gallery looked like the artifacts worn by the Greek gods she has encountered.She heard a familiar laughter from coming from one of the artifacts.

“Show yourself now!” called out the Amazonian princess. She looked around, but saw no one.

“Really Dianna don’t you recognized my voice. “said an echoing voice. A light appeared and it morphed into a handsome Greek man wearing ancient Greek toga with winged sandals and a caduceus. The figure is Hermes the messengers of the gods.

“Hermes, my apologies, but what are doing here?” asked the brunette as she looked curious.

“I’m here to signal the rest of the family. “said Hermes as she snapped his finger and soon lights appeared and they morphed into Greek gods. Wonder Women saw she was surround the Greek gods.

“We are here to thank you from rescuing us from Granny Goodness after she held us captive and from stopping the witch Circe from trying to drain us of our divine powers. As a gift we decide to increase your powers. “said Athena.

Diana remembered that Granny Goodness kidnapped the Greek gods and held them while she tried to cause the amazons to go to war with Man’s world. The justice league attack Darkseid and Wonder Women and Batman freed the gods and the gods unleashed their divine vengeances of Granny Goodness. Five months ago the witch Circe tried to drain all the gods of their power to defeat Wonder Women. Diana and Batman freed the gods and they imprisoned the witch in the underworld. When they imprisoned the witch it broke an ancient spell on some of the gods that caused them to act reckless and more aggressive.

“Thank you Diana. For freeing us from the witch and Granny Goodness. I will enhance your endurance and strength. Now you can punch a planet and cause it to crack apart. “said the goddess Demeter as she snapped her fingers and Diana felt a surge in power. The rest of the gods soon give their gift to the Amazonia princess. Hermes gave her the ability to fly faster than light and travel in space without air to breathe. Aphrodite gave her the ability to emit a calm and loving aura to calm the mind and hearts of people. Athena gave her the gift of always having several great back up plans should her first plan fail. Apollo gave her immune to all poison, toxins, and disease always and a faster healing factor. Zeus gave her the power the channel divine lightning into her lasso. Hades gave her a pass to the underworld that she could use any time and to help souls pass on into the after side. Hera gave her very high resistant to mind control, illusions, and telepathic attacks. Poseidon gave her the ability to not needing to breath underwater and moving faster in water and being immune to water pressure. Hestia gave her the power to install hope, love, and compassion to people. Dionysus gave her ability to withstand madness and always have a level head in any situation. Artemis gave her the ability to hunt or track any being magical or mortal. Hephaestus gave the power to see any weakness in any weapon, armor, or machine. Finally, Ares who was the most impacted god from Circe spell. After the spell broke he calmed downed and apologized to Diana and became more levelheaded. He gave Diana the power to wield any weapon as if she was a master of it and to reduce people’s violent urges and to give people courage to help better society.

“Diana another ancient being older then us linked your mind and your soul to another person. The link is immune to our powers, but you know that person well. “said Athena as each god gave their goodbyes and left or Olympus.

“Thank you my lords and ladies. “said the Princess as she was soon left in a dark empty gallery filled with ancient Greek artifacts. She then ran back towards the main gallery hoping to catch the villainess and help if any of her fellow heroines were hurt.
14211221111.title: Let's check on the heroines part 1

142112211111.content:
Black Canary was blasted into to gallery. When she gained her bearing she noted that her surrounding was of ancient Celtic artifacts. She knew that they were of Celtic origin as she was attack by an old evil Celtic spirt claim to fought her mother to reclaim her “Canary Cry”. The spirit claimed that her family line was blessed by a group of banshees and the spirit wanted her Dinah powers. She went to Batman as he would help her even if the story sound silly. Together with Zatanna they would a way to send the spirit back to where it came from and seal off any way of coming back. After that a part of her wanted to know about her origins. She only found out that some of her ancestors were Irish and that they came to America.

“Daughter of Dinah come closer. Do you not seek knowledge about your powers?” asked an echoing voice coming from the walls.

“Who is there show yourself. Come out you coward?” spat Black Canary as she raised her guard and slowly walked around looking for the source of the voice.

“I do not mean harm but gratitude as you banished the tainted spirit. The spirit wanted to slowly destroy those who banished it long ago. “the echoing voice said again.

“What are you talking about? My mother didn’t banish anybody. “said Dinah as she looked around.

“She did not, but long ago before your family came to these lands. One your ancestors was a druid priest who sang and together with other druids they banished that spirit who was destroying many villages and kill many innocent people. The druids and villages prayed to us the Celtic gods for help. I sent help and the daughter of your druid ancestor had a great gift of singing. I helped her unlock that full potential and so many generations went and only recently your mother could tap into that power, but you have greater talent and your line and will have access to it full power. “said the voice again.

Black Canary inspected many of the artifacts and finally came to an old metal flute. Below the flute on a metal plaque it read. “The flue of Lugh god of skills, druids, physicians, smithing, war, magic, commerce, reincarnation, lighting, water, arts and crafts, prophecy, healing, journeys, music, poetry, and manual arts.” She knew the voice was coming from here as being close to the flute she could hear the voice getting louder.

“So what do you want? “asked Black Canary with some spunk.

“Simple to awaken your dormant powers and to thank you for your heroic actions. I must warn you. You are linked to another person and even my power can get rid of that link. I suspect who ever put that link there is older and more powerful than even me and the rest of the Celtic gods. “the echoing voice. The flue emitted a bright burst of light and Black Canary closed her eyes as it was too bright. She didn’t feel any different.

“Note to self-cut down on the night crime. I must be imagining things. “thought Black Canary as she remembers about her comrades and Batman. Shen then sprinted out of the gallery towards the main galley.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Doctor Light was flung by the blast into a gallery containing artifacts. When she regained her stance and shock off the dizziness from the blast she noted that she was in the Japanese artifacts gallery.

She saw various objects like samurai equipment to objects that are rumored to belong to the gods of Japan. She knew how to identify as she grew up in Japan was learned of the folklore and myths about her ancestral country.

She and Batman and some of the Justice League members helped stop the Injustice league from causing Mount Fuji to have a super volcanic eruption and cause a huge earthquake. The Injustice league wanted to kill all the Asian world leaders as they all gathered in Tokyo for an economic and peace summit. Kimiyo was an important factor as disarmed the bomb that would cause the eruption while the rest of team fought and distract and lured away the Injustice League. Batman talked her through the team’s com link on how to disarm the bomb. The heroes won and managed to put away some of the member of the Injustice league while the rest escaped.

Kimiyo admitted to Batman she was very scared as the bomb was in a dark cave and guarding it was Doctor Light the villain named Arthur Light. He attacked her and told her about how he eliminated her kids and that she will be next. Batman talked to her and with his advice Kimiyo managed to defeated Arthur and managed to disarm the bomb before it went off.

She asked Batman to help get over her fear of the dark. Batman agreed and called in the hero Obsidian to help. He had Oracle to help with the emotional support and both women had close when they visited the graves of Kimiyo kids and her father. Batman and Obsidian slowly helped Kimiyo get over her fear of the dark and Batman also contacted few martial artist teachers to help her on her hand to hand combat. After her period of recovery, she regained her confidence and self-esteem. She thanked Batman and Zatanna who used her magic to summon the spirits of her kids to say goodbye for a final time. Oracle further asked her to join the Birds of Prey. Kimiyo joined and the members of the Birds of Prey helped provide emotional support

She saw two round glowing mirrors that was decorated with ancient Japanese designs. One mirror has the kanji for the word sun and the other mirror had the kanji for the world of moon.

The sun mirror glowed and the light formed into a beautiful young Japanese woman with long black hair wearing a bright sunny yellow Kimono. The moon mirror glowed and the light formed into a handsome young Japanese man with short black hair and wearing a silver and dark blue hakama.

The women spoke “You are the heroine known as Doctor Light. Are you or are you not?” asked the women.

“Yes, I am, but who are you?” asked Kimiyo

“My name is Amaterasu and my companion is my brother Tsukuyomi “said the women as both parties bowed.

“We are here to thank you for stopping Mount Fuji. On the mountain there are two ancient shrines there. One for me and one for my sister. “said Tsukuyomi as he explained.

“The Japanese people for generations have coming to the shrines and praying to us. We are glad they were not destroyed. So as a gift of gratitude we will give a gift.” Said Amaterasu.

“I give you the power of healing and absorbing light from the moon. I also will help you feel at ease in being surround by darkness and the moon often is covered the shadow of the earth. “said Tsukuyomi as he waved his hand and Kimiyo glowed silver for a few seconds before fading.

“I enhance your light based powers to rival the light of a dozen suns. The is connected to your will alone. These light cannot get stolen one you have the power to turn of this light.” Said Amaterasu as she also waved her hand and Kimiyo glowed golden for a few seconds.

“Thank you again for saving our shrines. Before we go we would like you to know that you are bonded to another person. The bond is immune to our power, something or someone more powerful and older then us must have caused the bond to appear. “said Tsukuyomi as both sibling bowed to Kimiyo and then started to glow and then disappear with a cloud of sparkles.

“That was very usually. “thought Kimiyo as her logic side came and dismissed that they were gods, but another part of her did remind her that she does work with magic users and she has seen Wonder Woman fight some gods.

As she was lost in thought about the gods. As scientist she is driven by logic, but she has worked with supernatural beings like Dr. Fate, Zatanna, Phantom Stranger, and the Spector. She just remembered about Batman, her fellow heroines and the villainess. She quickly flew out of the gallery back to main gallery hoping no college would be serious hurt.
142112211111.title: Heroines status part 2

1421122111111.content:
Tora was thrown back and when she brushed off the dizziness she noticed she was in the gallery filled with Scandinavia artifacts. She knew this because she grew up in a kingdom filled with magical ice people and her father is the king. Growing up she learned about the Viking and their culture and the Norse gods.

Recently a mission about eight months called her back home as Killer Frost tried to freeze all over Europe and turn the land into a snow lifeless arctic tundra. She and the justice league stopped Killer Frost. Tora, Batman and Fire fought Killer Frost while the rest of the league would stop the cooling of the continent. Ice was the one who finished of the final blow to Killer Frost’s head to knock her unconscious.

Tora then noticed that the artifact’s in the galley started to glow and hover. She back away to be in the middle of the gallery with her arms emitting an ice cold aura. Her battle instincts kicked as she got in a fighting position.

“Maiden of Ice, do not fear we mean no harm. “said an echoing voice

“Who are what are you? Show yourself!” said Ice as she looked around the gallery trying to pinpoint the location of the voice.

The glowing artifacts emitted a bright light and there stood these ghostly forms dressed in Viking attire.

“We are the Norse gods and goddesses. “said one of the ghostly figures.

“What do you want with me?” asked Tora as she wonder she would incur their wraith.

“The people of your kingdom once worshiped us and a few still believe in us today. We are here to thank you as the mortal known as Killer Frost tried to use ice powers of your people. She would have turned the continent into a frozen tundra and killed your people. That power was given to your people by us long ago. We are to thank you as the people who believe us keep us kinked to your world and we can see what goes on in the world today. “said another ghostly figure.

“As a thank you gift we would like you to give full access to your powers as your royal birth allows your powers to grow and evolve. The blood of the royal family is special as your ice powers are stronger and can grow stronger. “said another ghostly figure.

“Maiden of Ice, there is a bond that connects your being to another person. I suspect an older and more powerful being put the bond in place and our powers can’t break that bond. “said another ghostly figure.

“Now go and return your duties. Your comrades need you. “said the ghostly figures in one voice and they disappeared in a bright flash. Tora stood in the dark museum gallery in shock and disbelief. She never heard her father talking about the origin of her people ice powers and that she just got an upgrade in the powers department. Shen remember what the gods told her and she ran out of the gallery to the main gallery to check up on her comrades.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Beatriz was blasted into a dark gallery and when she shook of the dizziness from the blast she saw it was too dark to see. She summand a green fire ball and sent it up a few feet in the air to give off some light. Beatriz saw that the artifacts in the gallery were all pre western contact artifacts.

After becoming the heroine known as Fire she started to reach about her mother and her. She found out her mother sides of the family had ancestry from all over South America. She cut of her father after turning him over to the authorities after seeing that he was terrorist. She then focused on her mother family. She read about some of ancestors on her mother’s side and learn some of the other cultures in South America besides her Brazilian heritage from her father.

Nine months ago the Justice League and the Global Guardians went to South America after a new team of the Injustice league was spotted there. The Injustice league wanted set fire to the amazon rainforest after a plant was discovered and was reported to have many medical benefits. They wanted to set off the volcanos in in the Andes Mountains. The Justice League and the Global Guardians managed to stop most volcanos from erupting and stopping the Injustice League and capture some of the members. The capture members revealed that the drug cartel and some shady drug companies wanted the plant gone as it would have hurt their money income and wanted people to buy their drugs so the cartel and companies payed the Injustice members to get rid of the plant. Doctor Fate, Aquaman, and Red Tornado help stop the lava from spreading while Fire was chosen to absorb the massive wildfires started by the lava. Fire absorbed the fires and stop the flames from spreading, but was put was exhausted. She found out that absorbing the massive amount fire caused her power to change and her powers strengthen to new heights. She left the Global Guardians and joined the Birds of Prey to help regain control and finesse over her powers.

Beatriz wandered around the artifacts looking at them with great fascination as she found many interesting to look at. She noticed a spark of light behind her and spun around and she jump into the air and set herself on fire. This caused a massive amount of light to illuminate the dark gallery. She saw that many of the artifact started to hover and glow.

Fire raised her guard as she was surround by divine godly artifacts. She then heard echoing voices

“Woman of the green flames calm yourself we do not mean harm.” said the echoing voices.

“Who are you? Show yourself! “called out Fire as she increased the amounts of green flames around her body making the dark gallery fill with green light coming of her green flames.

Flashes of bright light appeared and soon Beatriz saw dozens of ghostly figures of beings dressed in ancient South American clothing.

“We would like to thank you from stopping the fires from destroying the plant. The plant is sacred to us as various shamans use that plant’s root to enter a trance that allows them to communicate with us. “said one of the ghostly figures who looked like warrior.

“It was no problem I am a superheroine it is my job to protect the defenseless and innocent. “said Fire as she was on her guard but not about to throw a large fireball.

“We would like give you a gift. After you and your teammates put out the fires, the shamans entered in a trance and told us about your help. We noticed that part of your fire powers are magical in nature and so we decided to unlock your magical fire powers so that your fire powers affect anything that is supernatural.We also noticed that there is a bond that ties you to another mortal man. The bond is strong and our powers can't break that bond. We can tell you that the man has a good heart. “said one of the ghostly beings who looked like a king. All the ghostly beings’ eyes started to briefly glow green as Fire felt a huge surge of power going through her. It felt warm, powerful, and energetic but also kind and loving.

“Take care Woman of the green flames “said one of the ghostly beings as they all started to fade away and the gallery started to darken to only the light given off by Beatriz’s flames.

“I got to stop drinking a few glasses of wine before the mission. “said Fire as she stood there trying to understand what happen. Fire then remember her fellow heroines and Batman and fly out of the gallery o find them and stop the villainess.
1421122111111.title: Heroines status part 3

14211221111111.content:
Catwoman was blasted and she regained her balance. She cursed her friend Harley was sloppy and that her love for Mister J blinded her. She noticed that she was blasted into the gallery that hosted the artifacts from Egypt. Selina smirked and soon looked all over the collection and saw her target.

The necklace of Bast saw on podium with a glass case. Selina was glad that the security system was disabled also no alarms and no motion detectors system. She quickly created a hole in the glass case with her diamond sharp gloves.

“Come to me my pretty kitty. “said Selina as she picked up the necklace. The necklace emitted a bright glow and she looked around saw nothing happen. She heard a woman giggling echoing around the gallery. Catwoman looked around trying to find whoever is cause that laughter.

“What do I have here? My children have spoken of you as you have helped some of them when they are threatened by humans. They have also said that you send money to shelters that help my children find homes. “said a voice as a beautiful Egyptian woman dressed like a goddess came out of the shadows and into the light coming off from the necklace.

“Who are you “said Selina she looked at the woman trying to see if see is a threat.

“The necklace belongs to me, but the mortal and fellow gods call me Bast cat goddess of Egypt. “said the woman as she snapped her fingers and two large tigers popped out of thin air and started to brush against her like little kittens.

“You a cat goddess. Right. That trick is cute, but you just might be a superpower human with magic or illusion casting. “said Selina.

“Really you don’t believe, the heroine known as wonder woman has fought gods and help her patron deities. Believe what you want, but enough about me. Let’s take about you. “said Bast as she petted her tigers.

“Me what would you want with me.” said Selina as she tried to think of a way of this situation.

“My children have whispered your name and how you save many of them from being killed by the hands or mortals for fashion or for science. “said Bast as she scratched both tigers head on the side.

Selina thought on how that several months ago. She was on mission to steal a big cat’s eye diamond. While trying to find a way to steal the diamond she found out that the person who owned the diamond was an infamous big game hunter. The hunter captured dozens of rare big cats. Catwoman ran into Batman who was also trying to capture the Hunter as he was a big crime boss in the criminal underworld. Working together, Selina freed all the big cats, and Bruce capture the crime boss and sent him away for good.

“My gift of gratitude for you is that you will that cats will help should you be in a situation that needs an assistance from a friendly feline. Now go and put my necklace down. I sense a person dear to your heart is in trouble. I can see that you and that individual will have a future together linked by the highest power.” said Bast as stopped petted her tiger and they were on guard and glared at Selina.

Selina knowing that she was at a disadvantage put down the necklace as she did not want to fight two large tigers and woman who may have superpowers. Selina swiftly left the gallery head to main gallery trying to get out from this failed heist.
14211221111111.title: Villianess part1

142112211111111.content:
Poison Ivy regained her senses and shook of her dizziness and muttered curses about her friend Harley Quinn and her unpredictable behavior. When she looked around she saw that she was blasted in a very small gallery. She then saw her prize, The Scepter Of Gaia. The scepter was encased in a glass container.

“Like that going to stop me.” said Pamela as she snapped her fingers and several vines erupted from her costume and wrapped around the glass to tight that the glass broke. She grabbed the beautiful wooden scepter with a huge green emerald. She could feel the power from the emerald increasing her power over plants. She could feel the winds blowing through the bamboo forests in China. The roots of trees growing in soil in the rain forests in Brazil. The feeling on the sunlight on the leaves in gardens throughout Europe. The animals walking over the grass in Africa.

“With this scepter. I will finally take over the world and restore the natural ecosystem before humanity walked this planet. “said Pamela as she got a rush of power and excitement.

“I wouldn’t do that if I were you. My scepter does not like being used by anyone, but me. “said a woman’s voicing coming from behind her.
Poison Ivy turned around and saw a young beautiful woman wearing a green robe with floral and animal patterns. Pamela snapped her fingers and vines tried to attack the unknown woman only to stop around the woman.

“Thank you for summoning some of my children. “said the woman as she patted the vines and they moved in happiness.

“Who are you?” asked Poison Ivy as she tried to think of a meta human who had control over plants, but came to mind about a woman wearing a green robe.

“I go by many names in history. So many cultures have given me a name. The Norse called Jord. The Celtics called me Danu. The Romans called me Terra. Today the mortals call me Mother Nature. “said the woman who looked at Pamela with a stare that looked into Poison Ivy’s core.

“I can see it in your soul that while you commit many crimes against humanity, you have also helped humanity. While your action cost many people there lives, your actions also help people who are lost. The orphans and homeless people you took in when you ruled over Robinson Park. The children found nice loving homes and have a bright future and the homeless people found jobs, homes and other caring family members. “said the woman as she cared for the vines.

“I don’t believe you. If you are Mother Nature, then why do let humans pollute nature and kill off animals? “said Poison Ivy angrily at humanity who kill innocent plants.

“Humans, plants, and animals are my children. Humanity is young and they need a person to plant the seeds of change towards a greener future. I feeling that you could be that person to ignite the spark that would cause people to make more environmentally future. “said Mother Nature.

“How do you know the children and homeless? Why do you care anyway? Your job sounds for a hero then me.” said Poison Ivy as she was not impressed as she felt like an outcast among humans.

“I know of the children and the homeless as one of my powers is see the future of all humans. The people you rescued will help spread the word of people being more green. The plants also speak of you and I have heard the whispers from The Green. You could be my agent as The Green, The Red, The Rot, The Clear, and more fall under my domain. Beside your friend Harley cares and Selina also. Even your enemy Batman care for you as he respects you and can see the good in you. He also has helped you several times and you helped him. Said Mother Nature as she summoned a chair made of vines to sit on.

Poison Ivy felt some desire to stop being a villainess as she frown tired from running from the law and she gave up the homeless and orphans to the police in Robinson Park as she experienced that the people need more help then Pamela could offer. She also felt some joy from helping innocent people like when she developed a cure against a form of scare toxins that Scarecrow unleashed on Earth Day. Scarecrow wanted to cause chaos on that day as Gotham Botanical gardens hosted a rare plant that could neutralize the normal scare toxins that Scarecrow uses. Poison Ivy did not want Scarecrow to kill the plant so she teamed up with Batman to defeat Scarecrow. She also liked when she Catwoman and Harley Quinn formed the team The Gotham Sirens. They did clean up some crime when they were involved. A voice inside of her told her that she has more friends then she realizes. While another part of her told her that her past marks her and many people will leave her when she shows her true self.

“It not like I can become a hero, the public will not forget I have blood on my hands and there are a lot of humans who have disrespect for nature. I am also connected to the plants I can feel their pain. I can’t be good like Harley or Selina. I have green skin and my skin is toxic. I also look down on men and see how humans cause a lot of environmental damage. “said Pamela as she had very few connections to the human world and she felt that she could not give up the love for her plant children.

“I would like to give a gift. Your connection to the plant world is strong but unstable. My gift for you is that because you man have help the environment, but your methods are bit violent, but the results have caused many mortals to talk about the environment and many have taken action to help the planet like replanting trees, building and investing money in clean renewable energies. Helping animals that are endangered to have a stable population” Said Mother Nature as she petted the vines in the chair she sat in and voices numerous ways humans are helping the planet recover from humanity’s reckless behavior in the past

“My gift will enhance your powers. Your connection to the plants will stronger and you will even get to communicate and control plants that are not from this planet. Your presence alone will cause growth in plants surrounding you. You can cause a vast forest to grow in mere seconds from a barren wasteland or cause plants to mutate into monsters. Your toxins and pheromones will be stronger and you will hear the true voice of nature. Should you practice and train with your stronger power you may surpass that abilities of Swamp Thing “said Mother Nature as snapped her fingers and Poison Ivy gave off a briefly green glow.

Poison Ivy closed her eyes and felt the rush of power and felt her powers growing stronger. She stood in thought about what just happened. As a scientist she knew there were no such thing as gods and magic, but in the past she has encountered various supernatural beings. She looked around and just ask a question, but she didn’t see Mother Nature. A small voice insider her mind told her that this was all just a dream, but another told to leave and return to her lair to think about what just happened as her current location is not the best place to think.

She looked down at the specter and felt the power coming from the it was gone. To her it was nothing more than a pretty stick. She dropped the scepter and planned to go back to her lair and practice her new powers. She ran to the main gallery as it was the only path to the women bathroom and escape the way she came in.
142112211111111.title: Villianess part 2

1421122111111111.content:
Peyton regained her balance and shook off her dizziness from the blast. She cursed the Clown Princess, Harley Quinn. She looked around and saw she was in one of the smaller galleries. The gallery housed ancient divine artifacts that belongs to ancient cultures that historians know very little about. So far historians and archeologists only recovered some myths and little records about the long lost cultures.

Peyton looked around and inspected each artifact until she saw what she came for. The diadem of the mad queen. The glass case contained a jewel encrusted tiara with strange symbols on it. Archaeologists hound the diadem in an ancient tomb and with histories they managed to find some information behind it. The legend is that an ancient kingdom was strike by war and the king was killed. The queen leads the kingdom and soon grief caused her to her voices in her head. A traveling mystic heard the problem and give the queen a diadem and soon the voices went away, but then the queen went mad with power and lead her country against her enemies and caused the destruction her kingdom and diadem was lost until rediscovered in the tomb.

Peyton looked at the diadem and took out a glass cutter and cut a hole in the glass and took the diadem and it sparkled in the moonlight from the overhead window.
Peyton looked at the diadem in her hand and thought about how she got in this situation.

Peyton grew up a mafia family and later was forced into a loveless abusive marriage. Her husband turned on her and her family leaving her a survivor of her mob family massacre. She later went insane and tried to kill her husband and was manipulated by the villain Hush. She wanted to get away from her past and knew the diadem would silence the voices from the puppet Scarface. Off all the people she met she noted that Bruce did care about her and tried to steer her away from life of being in the underworld. She was not well and tried to kill him. She hopes not one day that Bruce will forgive her.

The diadem suddenly emitted a bright flash of light. Peyton closed her eyes and when she opened her eyes nothing happened. She quickly put the diadem away and went to the entrance of the gallery as she remembered that with Zatanna here she knew she would cast a spell over other exits like windows, fire escapes and she knew that only way she could leave is the same way she came in. She was just about to exit the gallery when an echoing giggling was heard throughout the gallery. Peyton turned around and looked around to make sure that nobody saw her seal the diadem and find the origin of the giggling.

“You found me little diadem. I was looking for it. I remembered that one day it just disappeared and I had to look into the mortal realm and found some clues as some mortal queen wore it and then trail ends. Now It has been found again. “said a female voice. Peyton looked around and searched for the origin of the voice and saw a young woman.

The woman had long curly red hair, pale skin, eyes that seemed to stare off into space, like as if she was daydreaming. She wore a black knee length dress. She seemed to give off a feeling of delirium or not all being there. The women then started to babble on how a platypus who is a secret agent. Peyton started walking to the exit, but she paused to remember the exact way out. She felt a tap on her shoulders and turned around and saw the women

“Can I have diadem back, if I don’t get it back my siblings will get mad and I don’t want the get my older brother, Dream, upset at me.” Said the women who looked at Peyton and then looked away as she was bewitched by the sparkles caused by the moonlight hitting the various gems in the display cases in the gallery.

Peyton thought about as a part of her is telling her that some tiara is not going to get rid of the voice in her head. Another part of her is telling to find a metahuman who has telepathy to heal her fractured mind. Peyton also thought how that she would hand off the stolen item and that she would not be chased by the cops or other heroes.

“Here take the diadem. It would not do me any good. The legends surrounding it are just legends.” said Peyton as she handed the strange women. She then turned around and walked to the exit as she knew this museum is not a got place to spend time foolishly as their villainess and superheroine and Batman. She was just to leave the gallery when she bumped into something that caused her to fall to the ground. She got herself up and dusted herself off. She looked to caused what caused her and saw the strange women.

“For helping find and giving me my jewelry I give a gift. This whisper in your mind will begone and your mind will be whole again and you will regain your lost skills. You are connected to a person who will love you and care for you, but beware trust will be hard to earn. “said the women as she blew some powder dust into Peyton. Peyton started to cough and close her eyes as they started to water. When she opened her eyes after saw that women disappeared. She looked around and still couldn’t see the women.

A part of her mind was nagging her just to forget about that strange women and leave before you get caught and be sent to Arkham Asylum. Peyton agreed and left the gallery went to the main gallery to exit the museum. “Besides you can figure the mystery women tomorrow when you have a good night’s rest. “she said to herself as she exited the gallery towards her destination
1421122111111111.title: Villianess part 3

14211221111111111.content:
Andrea Beaumont regained her bearing and knocked off the dizziness from the blast from Harley Quin’s explosion. She knew that the clown girl would mess up this heist. It was supposed to be a simple job to break in the museum and steal an artifact and return it to Russia.

She was retired and left Gotham after Batman stopped her from killing the Joker who killed her father. She thought she was done with Bruce and Batman, but a tiny spark inside her heart reignited the flames of love and passion. She fled to Europe and reached her mother side of the family and she found that her mother was from Russia and was very smart. She later found that her grandmother came from a long line of women who operated as medicine women in a tiny remote village. While her grandfather came from old Russian royalty and hid away his family wealth. She also found out that there was a family artifact that was stolen from her family. Her research came up that one her ancestors was medicine women and was entrust with an artifact that was said to have great power. She tracked the artifact to Gotham and it caused her some uneasiness about running into her old flame.

Andrea looked around and saw that she was in the gallery that contain the artifacts from the Slavic pantheon. She noticed banners and so many artifacts in glass containers. Andrea knew that the security system was down as she knew that Catwoman always disables the security when she goes on a heist. She looked around in the dark gallery only letting the moonlight coming through the windows giving her light to see. She finally found her target a gem encrusted necklace. Looking at it alone it would worth millions, but it is billions. Her reached showed her that the ancients gods and goddess blessing the necklace with divine powers and it said to grant the wearer great wealth, power, and influence.

Andrea reached into her belt and pulled out a container of a chemical. She opened the contained poured the container to the glass and saw that glass dissolved away. She reached into the contained and grabbed the necklace.

“Finally what has been stolen from my family will know return to its rightfully owner. “said Andrea. As she grabbed the necklace. From what her reports were after the necklace was stolen from her family they started to lose their high standing and wealth, only when her great-great grandfather locked away the remaining family wealth did they started to recover. The family decide to try to leave Russia and go to America to escaped the bad memories.

“Who do dare hold our necklace?” came a choir of voices echoing around the dark, empty, silent gallery. Andrea looked up thinking that somebody must have sneak up on her. She looked around the gallery and saw nobody. She put away the necklace in a bag and went to the entrance of the gallery to go back the way she entered the museum.

She was about to leave the gallery when a small ball of light appeared and blocked her from leaving the gallery.

“Now where do you think you are going? ‘said a voice. Andrea looked around and tried to pinpoint the location of the voice. She realized that the voice came from the ball of light. The ball approached her and Andrea walked back on her guard. Soon she was in the middle of the gallery. The ball of light suddenly shot out dozens of smaller balls of lights that floated around the gallery. The balls of light quickly morphed into ghostly like beings. Form their clothes they wore, Andrea noted that it was ancient and are dressed in the style of clothing that the early Slavs. She read about the exhibits and knew of the curse of the treasures of the gods and how these not worthy suffered wraith of the gods, but she dismissed them as superstition and fairytales.

“Explain why do you have our blessed artifact? “said one of the ghostly figures as the necklace popped out of thin air into view where it as it floated in the air. The figure appeared male

“Many have stolen our trinket and they suffered our divine wraith. You would be just another person on our list of those who have stolen something that does not belong to you. “said one of the ghostly beings in a feminine voice as Andrea noticed it came from a woman.

“Look closely at her! Do you not see her aura it is faint, but it is there? She shares the same blood as the one who we trusted our artifact to. She may be a descendant of her, our head priestess. “said one of the ghostly beings who stared at her. Andrea felt uneasy as the male ghostly being started at her.

“You are right, there it is. Our chosen bloodline has returned. The question is what shall she do with our divine artifact? Will she take it and keep it or has the chosen family cast off our pact and will fall from the grace of society? “said one of the ghostly being who appeared as a woman.

“It would best to observe what the young woman will do with the artifact. “said one of the ghostly figures softly so that Andrea would not hear that statement. The other gods agreed.

“We will be watching! “said one of the ghostly beings as he and the rest of ghostly beings vanished.

Andrea shock her head as she did not believe in magic and supernatural gods. To her running into her old flame must have caused some mental unbalance as she remembered that she felt uneasiness seeing Bruce as Batman.

She shook off her thoughts and told her self to think about Bruce at a safe location. She ran out of the gallery toward the main gallery as that was the only exit. She knew that batman would have the other exits blocked and hopefully the other villainess would be a great distraction for her to get away.
14211221111111111.title: Villianess part 4

142112211111111111.content:
Harley was blasted into a small closet. She got and said “Now that was a blast! If only Mister J were to see it.” She dusted herself off and noticed that she was thrown into a janitor closet as she saw several brooms, mops and other cleaning and maintenance equipment. She looked around and noticed that she was in a small hallway. She was just about to leave when she slipped a small soapy puddle. She didn’t realize that she fell behind some boxes blocking her from the exit of the janitor closet. She let out small groan and see a flash of red, blue and gold.

“I wonder what is the rush?” Harley muttered as she thought who could that be. She knew that it could not be any villainess or Batman as all of them didn’t not wear any gold. Zatanna is in all black and same with Black Canary. She then realized that those color match Wonder Woman costume colors. Harley knew that she did not win against her in a fight and so she knew to run towards the direction that Wonder Woman fled from. Harley then ran down the hallway which led in a large gallery filled with ancient Greek artifacts. The clown girl started to walk around and look for her item of interest among the priceless artifacts.

Harley looked around until she saw a theater mask with a smile encased in a glass container. She jumped with joy and inwardly scream with the joy. “The Mask of Thalia “she whispered with barely concealed glee.

She pulled out a fake clown flower and squeezed it. The flower squirted out a stream of acid and it melted the glass container. She then tossed the used flower gag toy away and reach in and picked the mask. Only for it to emitted bright flash of light for a second and then it stopped flashing. Harley almost dropped the mask when she noticed the flash. Harley looked around and saw nothing changed.

“With this nobody can stop from busting out pudding from that awful jail.” Said Harley as she jumped with joy. Thinking about how she will rescue the Joker and he will treat her like a queen and love her and may even propose to her. She put the mask in a hidden pocket in her uniform and started to walk towards the exit gallery. She heard a cough and she turned around and saw a woman right in front on the form glass container which held the form mask of Thalia.

The woman had Mediterranean skin color and olive black hair. She wore a toga in the ancient style. She had a curious look on her face as she walked towards to clown princess.

“Freeze! Get your hands off my mask “said the unknown women to Harley Quinn.

“Your mask? Finders Keepers Losers weepers.” Said Harley as she stuck out her tongue.

“It is my mask and beside what use would you have for it?” asked the unknown woman.

“First of all who are you?” said Harley as she didn’t know if she could trust this woman. She got an uncomfortable about her. She felt danger and that is woman is very likely a metahuman with unknown powers.

“My name is Thalia the muse of comedy and you are? “said the woman as she introduced yourself.

“Harley Quinn Clown Princess of Crime and so to be wife of the Joker. As soon as use this mask and I can get him out of Arkham Asylum and he may even propose to me.” said Harley is a dreamily voice who mind was entertained by vision of marriage to her beloved pudding.

“The Joker. I have heard of him and his relationship with you. The whispers and rumors of the criminal underworld have told me many tidbits.

“I am surprised you are so loyal to him and love him. I have heard gossip of what Joker did to you. “said Thalia as she questioned Harley’s relationship to the Joker.

“The criminal underworld pities you, Harley. The whispers of you getting strapped to a rocket after the Joker realized that you were holding him back, you getting thrown from a window when you captured the hero known as Batman while the Joker didn’t allow it, how you stole a lot of money and used it to build a new hideout for your lover, only for him to throw you out on the street. “said Thalia as she summoned up images about the joker’s lack of respect and love to Harley.
Harley stood there with tears in her eyes. “You wrong he loves me, he told me that I am his most trusted friend. We told each on how we would grow old together and have kids and send them to college and have the good life together. “said the weeping blonde.

“If that is the case, how is that when thieves Punch and Jewelee came out of retirement, Punch did not survive a simple robbery. The rumor is that the Joker set him up as Jewelee would a nice replacement for you if Joker gets tired of your presence. Joker even made their child disappear and hired some telepath to wipe the memory from Jewelee’s mind of her husband and child. “said Thalia as the images change to a scene of joker laughing and telling his dumb henchmen of his plan to get another loyal recruit and how he set up Punch’s future robbery on for the items punch stole to be high level explosives to of when he stole the objects.

“Let us not forget the fact that when you busked out of Arkham asylum multiple times it was the Joker who was still imprisoned that rated you out to the authorities to gain some leniency. “said Thalia as the images changed to Joker telling the cops where to find Harley Quinn at her usual hangout when she recently busted out from Arkham Asylum.

“Look sweetie. I am all about comedy, laughter, and mirth, but the way that Joker treats you is just sad and filled with sorrows. Many criminals are making a betting pool to see how long you last under the Joker’s servitude. Hate to say it to you, but the Joker only loves himself and cares about himself. Everybody is just a useful tool or puppet and he has got you under his control like a willing servant. If your lucky somebody might write a book about your sad, abusive life and expose the tangled relationship that you and the Joker have. “said Thalia as she changed the images to all the times where Joker just fooled her and used her. She then disappeared in the shadows of the dark museum gallery.

Harley stood there with tears coming down her checks and the thoughts of how she just dismissed the way that the Joker treated her in the past as a product of his quirky personality. A part of her told her that these were just lies and that this woman wanted the Joker for herself. While another part of her told that this was the truth and that she became a willing pawn that the Joker will get rid of once she ends her usefulness.

Harley get rid of her thoughts and just wanted to return to her current hideout and get under the covers and deal with her new thoughts of doubt. She dropped the mask and ran to the exit in the main gallery as she knew Batman and the other heroes got the other exits covered.
142112211111111111.title: Villainess Part 5

1421122111111111111.content:
Talia was thrown into to a dark gallery. She got up and told herself to hurt the crazy clown princess and that the league of assassins will not do any business with the Joker or any of his gang and perhaps eliminate some of their gang members should their paths cross

Talia looked around the gallery and was alert as there are many shadows, anything could come out and try to attack her.

She looked around and notice that the gallery she was blasted into held ancient middle eastern artifacts. She knew as she grew up learning and find artifacts for herself or for her father. Her father taught her about the cultures of the middle east and the old religions as the Lazarus pits are consider as old as the old religions. He found old scrolls that mention the pits and how ancient holy men and women would use them to contact their gods.

Talia walk around the gallery on guard. She knew that it would best to grab an artifact in this gallery then the others as the other may be occupied by heroes or other villains. She did not want a confrontation with other heroines or villainess.

She soon felt a pull and turned towards the direction it was coming from. She walked among the artifacts until she reaches an old crown covered win ancient symbols. Talia looked at the crown and noticed that the plaque on the case describes it as the head piece of the high priestess to the gods.

She quickly removed the glass contain the ancient headdress without making a sound. She could break in to some of the top-level security buildings due to her assassin training. She grabbed the headdress as a symbol of her skill. She needed the headdress to show that she could lead the league of assassin if her father was unable to lead them.

The headdress started to quickly glow and suddenly emitted a bright golden light. Talia closed her eyes to shielded her from the bright light. She opened her eyes and saw these ghostly like beings surround her and cutting herself of any exit.

Talia looked at the ghostly beings and recognized some form from old statues are artwork which depicted gods of the ancient middle eastern cultures. Her father took her as a child to show the temples and relics of old lost civilizations to make a statement on how humans cannot be united and will always fight with each other. Her father used that teaching moment to further explain why the league of assassins need to get rid of humanity.

“The woman has the smell of the demon priest doe she not’ said one of the ghostly being in feminine voice.

“Yes, she carries the scent of the demon priest who helped repeal invaders who wanted use the holy pits as their own.” responded another ghostly being in a masculine voice.

“True, the demon head priest did help us, but he also did us a great did steal some of our sacred artifacts, I vote we give her a blessing, but it will only help to her and her bloodline.” said of the ghostly figures.

The other ghostly figures murmured and agreed. They started to chant in ancient language and soon lights started to appear around Talia. The lights started to shine brighter get brighter until Talia closed her eyes due to the sheer luminosity. She felt a strong pulse and opened her eyes and noticed that the lights and ghostly figures were gone.

Talia knew something she just experienced was supernatural and decided to escape as it was not the best of times to slow down and think f what just happened. She headed toward the entrance she as she knew it was the best way to leave as the other villainess and heroines would have blocked other exits.
1421122111111111111.title: Villainess Part 6

14211221111111111111.content:
In the main gallery leading to the exit. Selina arrived first flowed Harley, Poison Ivy, Talia, Andrea, and lastly joined by Peyton.

“Got out of my way! “snarled Catwoman as she readied her whip. She was eager to leave before the heroes arrive and knew villains tend to fight then they meet with each other during heists. Each villainess got out her weapon, from Poison Ivy’s vines to Harley’s Hammer to Talia’s sword. The scene looked like something out of an old western movie. Selina was about to act only to notice a flash of light in one of the shadows. She jumped backed noticed that Talia also jumped out of the way.

Both women heard the shout of “Peels.” They saw Zatanna come out of the nearby shadows followed by the other women superheroes. Harley, Ivy, Peyton, and Andrea were engulfed with a small cloud of sleeping powders. The villainesses soon got sleep and dropped to the floor. Wonder Woman tossed her lasso and tied up the sleeping villains while Black Canary got into a fighting position against Catwoman and Talia.

Wonder Woman being the diplomatic one step in between the two parties and said.” Stand down both of you. We need to find Batman. I would imagine he would like to drop off these four at Arkham.” Wonder Woman hoped that both parties would stop from fighting as a fight can cause unnecessary damage to the museum and may damage some of the artifacts in the nearby galleries.

All women heard a slight groan and turned to see Batman followed by Doctor Light. Batman head his head still a little sore from his thrown from the blast and he woke up from Doctor Light helping him regain consciousness and that her medical training helped him inspect to see if Bruce got a concussion. Her inspection revel nothing more than some slight dizziness, she knew that Batman’s mental training would help shake it off in a few minutes.

Selina and Talia both knew that picking fights with Batman and six other heroes would result in a very low chance of them winning and felling is not an option so both decide to stick around until Zatanna get rid of the magic blocking all the exits.

“Are you, all right? “asked Zatanna as she readied her magic to all injuries to Batman.

“I’m fine, nothing more than some dizziness that should wear off In a few minutes.” Said Batman as he saw the villainess tied up and still sleeping.

“Should we drop these women of at Arkham? “asked Wonder Woman.

“No I have cells at the Batcave for these ones. Arkham was destroyed by Joker after some of the other villains doubted that he could blow it up. Joker accepted the challenge and blow up Arkham with exploding bubblegum balls. Since then other inmates at Arkham have been sent to Belle Reve, Blackgate Penitentiary, and Iron Heights Penitentiary. Arkham is being rebuilt but, it is a slow progress. The staff and inmates from Arkham have been sent to work in other holding facilities or are in the hospital being treated for injuries from the explosion. “said Batman as got out handcuffs and tied up each villainess except for Andrea.

Batman looked at the sleeping woman and then at Zatanna who nodded and snapped her fingers. The sleeping woman woke up and get up from the ground and stretch a bit before looking around at her surroundings.

“Andrea what are you doing back in Gotham? I have heard that you went clean, so why have you decided to come back.” questioned Batman.

“I did leave Gotham, but I later found out that there is an artifact the belonged to my family that was stolen and I wanted it to be in its rightful. Also, I wanted to visit my parent’s graves and see you again. You are one of the very few people I trust. “said Andrea honesty as she hoped she and Bruce would rekindle their love for each other.

While both Bruce and Andrea talked each other, woman glared as each woman was trying to win Bruce’s heart.

Batman nodded and then turned to the other woman and spoke “I will take these to the Batcave and I have some interesting information for each of you. I trust that you would meet me in the Batcave later. Zatanna could you reverse any damage to the museum. I need get these ladies in the containment cells in the Batcave. Said Batman as he picked up the sleeping women and walked towards the exit.

Zatanna summoned up her magic and focus her magic to reverse and evidence that there a fight at all. Her eyes then glowed for a few seconds while she got rid of the magical barriers around the museum. She then asked if it is all right to teleport the other heroines to the Batcave and each woman nodded back to her. Zatanna teleported herself and the other heroines to Wayne Manor.

Batman turned and tilted his head to Selina and Talia who both walked with him to the Batmobile. He pushed a button in his utility belt and out popped three seats to contain villainess Batman captured when he would drop them off at Arkham or police stations. He then strapped in Harley, Ivy, and Peyton who were still sleeping. He then bushed the same button and the seats went back into the Batmobile. He active the cockpit and it popped open. There were three seats. Batman got in the driver and Talia and Selina got in the two backseats. Bruce then started the car and drove towards the Batcave weaving through the late-night traffic and after twenty minutes he drove into the Batcave.
14211221111111111111.title: Main gallery entrance/exit

142112211111111111111.content:
He got out and saw the heroines waiting for him. He turned around and saw Selina and Talia all out of the Batmobile. He pressed the button and the out popped the seats containing the sleeping villainess. Wonder Woman asked him Bruce’s needs any help, but he shook his head.

He then unstrapped and carried each to their cells down in one of the many tunnels of the Batcave. Harley’s cell contained a bed, toilet, sink and desk. And bullet proof glass doors that were several feet thick. Bruce kept anything out of the cell that could be used as a weapon or to escape with. He then put Ivy in her cell. Her cell contained the same things as Harley on with a small water fountain a few plants enchanted by Doctor Fate and the Swamp Thing to prevent her from growing the plants escape. He also asked Doctor Fate mages to use magic to prevent Ivy from contacting the green to help her escape from her cell. Her cell also had bullet proof cell doors that were seal to keep out her pheromones and were several feet thick. Finally, he put Peyton in her cell which contained the same things as Harley and the same features for the bullet proof doors. Finally, is that each cell has a small television set and Peyton and Ivy has a small radio as Bruce found notes from the Arkham staff that music and sooth them.

He then walked back to the waiting women and led to the main computer only to hear voice arguing with each other. They hear several male and female voices talking fast with each other.

“Grayson let me out of your grasp. I’m giving three seconds until I get out of it on my own. “said a younger male voice.

“Little D you didn’t your daily hug today. “said and older male voice.

“Red Hood can’t you do anything about those two?” asked another male voice.

“No replacement, I like how they distract you from your work. “responded another older male voice full of mirth.

“Oracle, should we do anything about the fighting and yelling? “asked another older male voice.

“Relax Batwing, just calm down and watching the fighting. They will stop soon enough. Join me and Black Bat as we munch on popcorn. “said a female voice with evidence that she just finished puberty.

“Do they always fight with each other?” asked a female voice.

“Pretty much, they do when Batman is not around or Alfred scolds them. “said another male voice.

“Our boss is here, and he brought guests.” said an older female voice.

The women followed Bruce as she headed towards the Batcomputer and saw several of Batman’s sidekicks and former ones. There was Oracle, Black Bat, Spoiler, Red Hood and Red Robin, Flamebird, Batwing, Nightwing, and Robin all crammed around the Batcomputer. Dick sat in the chair in front of the Batcomputer hugging Damian only for Damian trying to get out his grasp and hitting Dick with Dick’s escrima sticks. Jason watched with mirth as he knew that it annoyed Tim. Barbara and Tim were working two laptops trying to tune out the small fight. Cassandra and Stephaine were munching on popcorn watch the little show while Duke and Luke looked a bit bored after watching the Robins. Bette looked at them with a puzzled expression.

Batman cleared this throat and everybody in the Batfamily stopped what there were doing and turned to Bruce and gave him their acknowledgement.

“Mother” Damian greeted his mother with reserved voice.

“Son.” Talia responded and went up to her son and gave him a small hug and kiss on his forehead.

“Here is the info that us to look through. This info is going to cause a lot of people a headache. “said Barbara as she wheeled her nice antigravity wheelchair. Batman created Barbara a nice wheel where with some alien technology in to after her old wheelchair was destroyed in an attack on Gotham by the Joker. The new wheel chair looks normal but and multiple new feature and on is antigravity to help her negative over rough terrain. The chair know can levitate several inches to feet over any terrain. “We couldn’t make any progress on the last case, there are no connections we could find. “added Red Robin as he looked a bit of disappointed that he could not make any progress in the case he handed Bruce a large pile of folders.

Batman then handed each woman, except Andrea, a file and asked to look through them. Bruce then saw the clock on the Batcompter and noticed that it was well past midnight. He ordered his current and former sidekicks to get rid for bed and get some sleep. He told them to go towards their rooms in Wayne Manor.

Tora yawned and then other woman started to yawn. Bruce noticed them and told them they can stay overnight at the manor if they don’t cause any problems with each other. All women had a truce not to have any conflict and Bruce summoned Alfred who came down the elevator. Alfred nodded and lead the women into the elevator and towards their rooms. Batman felt exhaustion hit him. He out of the Batsuit and waited for the elevator and went in and got off in the manor. He went towards his room and took quick showered and dressed for bed. He got in bed and lost the fight against sleep and soon he fell asleep.
142112211111111111111.title: Later at the Batcave

1421122111111111111111.content:
Bruce woke you to sound a loud bleeping noise. He shook of the embrace of sleep and noticed that it was his alarm clock waking him up. He noticed it was morning and got out of bed and took a short shower fully awaking himself and dressed in black pants and black turtle neck. He left his large bedroom and headed towards the dining room for breakfast.

He heard loud voices coming from the dining room and smelled the scent of fresh cooked breakfast dishes. He walked into the dinning room see his sons and members of the Batfamily have breakfast or talk to each other. He also saw the women who were also having breakfast and reading the files that the gave them last night in the Batcave. All of them were out of their costume in normal attire. Bruce would often have female company both in the crime fighting business and non-hero business. He would have clothes available for women who stayed overnight if they were active the hero community. All the women blushed a bit seeing such a handsome man. Bruce Wayne by looks would put even male supermodels to shame. There were rumors that that his looks could rival that of gods.

He went over and sat down at the head of the table. He saw that his plate is over filled with breakfast meats, hash browns, pancakes, waffles, eggs, and toast with a huge cup of coffee. He starts to chow down on his breakfast. It is well known in Batfamily for Bruce to eat multiple high calorie meals as he often engages in combat with Gotham’s scums or works to solve cases that the normal police that solve or handle. He would often be down in the Batcave for days with no contact with the outside worlds trying to solve for clues or leads for the safety of Gotham or other superheroes.

Bruce saw the Lucas Fox got up from his place at the table and thanked Bruce for breakfast and for letting him stay overnight. He also told him that his father says another shipment of crime fighting supplies just came in and would like to Bruce to come by and test them out. He then motioned Duke to come join him as both went to have light training session with Lady Shiva and Richard Dragon. Bruce bribed Lady Shiva to teach and improve his sidekicks training abilities by granting her time with her daughter
Cassandra. For Richard, Bruce gave him the location of a base of rouge assassins who split off from the League of assassins who tried do eliminate Richard. They failed and got Richard angry who wanted revenge on them.

Bruce saw Stephanie and Cassandra got up and told him that they were going shopping and later going enjoy relaxing the Manor’s pool. Both girls left the dining room. Barbra thanked Bruce and told him that she need to get back to work at her job as Oracle, the hero community’s hacker. She told Bruce that is going to stay for several hours and work with Tim to father information for a few other heroes outside of Gotham. Damian got up and told his father that he going to go training out in the back yard with Tim and Dick as watchers. “No I have not, I found no notes on the formulas and some of the notes were complete burned to ash. His computers were wiped so no hacker could restore information that were his computers.
