They ensured he had a communication device on him along with a personal camera affixed to his chest piece so they could get footage of every moment of the fight. Even if Thor fell they'd at least have some evidence.
14333221121.title: Peter and Steve recover back at the tower.

choices: One of the four hefty heroes gets a craving for food to powerful to resist.
One of the two heroes on patrol has a fattening run-in with a certain villain.
143332211211.content:
As the slowly fattening Clint, Peter, and Steve all got some much needed rest, the rest of the Avengers watched a monitor as Thor made his way across the city to the pier. When the god of thunder landed he saw that police cars had surrounded the warehouse but law enforcement had yet to make a move. Thor approached the nearest officer, looking down at the much shorter man.

"Has anything changed?" The Asgardian asked, but the officer simple shook his head.

"We've detected movement inside through thermal imaging but we can't tell for sure if it's him or somebody else. We've tried talking to whoever is inside but no response. The person inside hasn't moved in a few minutes and there's also two large heat sources inside that we can't identify." The officer informed him.

"Regardless, if it is this fiend he shall not escape this day!" Thor said, approaching the warehouse.

The blonde god approached the large steel door and gripped his hammer tight. He raised it, ready to smash the door inward, but remembered that the person inside might not be The Feeder. Thor lowered his weapon and placed his hand at the bottom of the door, lifting open the heavy steel with one hand before entering the dark warehouse. Thor took several steps inside, looking around the pitch black room, before stopping when he realized he had snagged a trip wire.

The steel door slammed down and all of the lights flicked on at once revealing that the warehouse was empty save for two massive piles of doughnuts on either sides of the room, a huge monitor hanging from the ceiling, and a stuffed police officer who was resting against one of the piles; his belly bloated and huge from overeating. Thor eyebrows furrowed and he gritted his teeth, angry at himself for having walked into such an obvious trap. The god gripped his hammer tightly, ready for whatever was thrown his way, when Tony spoke to him through his ear piece.

"Thor, get out of there!" Tony yelled to the God, but Thor's attention was brought to the monitor as it turned on - The Feeder's half-masked face on full display.

"Well if it isn't the God of Thunder himself! Y'know, I didn't know who would show up but it's a pleasure to finally meet you, Thor. Though I'm sorry it had to be digitally." The Feeder said.

"What business do you have with us, villain!" Thor asked, his pointed directly at the screen.

"Y'know, I don't really feel like discussing that just yet," The Feeder replied, a grin on his face, "Unfortunately, I have to cut our little talk short; two robberies and a trap in one day?? I'm pretty tried, to be honest."

"Face me, you coward!!" Thor demanded but the Feeder simply scoffed.

"In time; but for now, why don't you enjoy some of my delicious cooking?" The Feeder said, his voice seeping out through the speakers and borrowing it's way into Thor's ears. The God's eyes flashed red and he grimaced, placing his hand over his eyes and trying to fight back his sudden urge to eat. The Feeder watched eagerly as Thor gave in to his desire and made a bee-line to the closest pile, dropping Mjölnir next to him and shoving doughnut after doughnut into his mouth.

"See you around, Thor! Hopefully the next time we meet you'll have a body worthy of a god." The Feeder said before lowering his mask and shutting off the camera.

"NO!" Tony exclaimed, slamming his hands down onto the table as he rose from his seat.

"Welp," Wolverine said, his beefy arms crossing his massive chest, "Somebody better go get him"

----------------------

It was well over four hours later when Thor was finally plugged into the machines at the tower to monitor his condition. Thor had refused to leave the warehouse until every last pasty had been shoved into his gut, which was only possible thanks to his already enormous Asgardian appetite. Monitors and charts beeped, blipped, and blooped as he, Clint, Steve, and Peter all slept on their examination tables - Tony and Bruce watching over their condition.

"This is odd." Bruce said, getting Tony's attention. The scientist flipped the hologram scream around so Tony could see and pointed at Thor's chart. "His metabolism has been altered like the others but he's digesting his food at a much faster rate."

"I noticed that with Cap's chart as well," Tony replied, "Clint and Peter's are both similar but Cap seems to be digesting faster as well. Though, based on these charts it looks like Thor's digestion is faster than Steve's."

"I think it's because Thor is an Asgardian and Steve's a Super Solider," Bruce explained, "They already had increased metabolisms to be begin with. I'm fairly certain this means they'll end up gaining weight the fastest as well."

"That's probably the case," Tony said, looking to his teammates.

Clint had put on the most fat thus far, being the first to be hit, but the liquid diet that was being pumped into him was slowing down the process. The once toned, 195-pound archer now weighed a hefty 300 pounds; having already gained 105 pounds to his slowly fattening body. If it weren't for the liquid food being pumped into him Tony theorized that Clint would probably have already hit 450 by now. Clint had already developed a double chin, his pecs were slowly becoming larger and puffier and his now fat, jiggly belly rose and fell as he slept. He had developed lovehandles, his thighs had expanded even more, and his waistline and ass had clearly grown as well.

Peter's lithe frame had fattened up as well; though nowhere near Clint's size having only gained 50 pounds so far. The now 210-pound wall-crawler's muscles had grown in size, giving him a similar build to what Clint had before The Feeder had attacked, but he was much softer all over. His face had rounded out, his pecs were beginning to softer, and he a very noticeable pot-belly. His waist, lovehandles, thighs, and butt had grown as well, but he was still the smallest of the four heroes.

Steve was already much larger than both Clint and Peter to begin with, and while Clint had gained the most body fat out of all of them, Steve actually weighed more than archer. The Captain was a hefty 335 pounds, having already gained 70 pounds since falling under the villain's effects. The fat was mostly concentrated on Steve's stomach, his once rock hard abs having been replaced with large, fat gut, but he was clearly bigger all over. His muscles had grown some and he had lost very little definition outside of his stomach, but the effects of his slowly increasing weight gain were clear.

Thor was the heaviest of all four, however, though he was always the heaviest member of the team to begin with; The Hulk withstanding. The God's body had already digested the dozens of doughnuts he had eaten in the warehouse but the effects had only just begun to kick in. The 340-pound Asgardian had only gained 25 pounds so far - enough to clear away some of the definition on his abs and give his midsection a slight curve but not enough to make the thunder god seem more than simply bloated.

"Maybe we could...," Tony sighed, pinching the bridge of his nose as he thought, "I don't know... I was already tired this morning when we started all this nonsense and now-"

"You're running on fumes?" Bruce asked.

"The empty lights been on for hours." Tony admitted, "I don't want to stop until we figure out how to stop this but-"

"You need rest." Cap said, startling both the scientists.

"Didn't know you were up." Tony said, rubbing his eyes.

"Just happened. Listen, Tony," Cap started, sitting up, his belly spilling over his star-spangled briefs, "There's no point in working this hard if you're so exhausted you can't even think. A solider needs his rest."

"He's right, Tony," Bruce added, "The Feeder even said he's done for the night, and if that's a lie, we have Falcon and Wolverine out there on patrol." Tony looked at Steve, then to Bruce, then back to Steve, and chuckled a bit.

"You're right." Tony added, "I'm gonna hit the hay for a bit; Wake me if anything happens."

"Will do." Bruce said as he watched the billionaire shuffle out.

Later that night-
143332211211.title: Thor goes alone.

choices: Jarvis wakes up Tony and Bruce.
1433322112111.content:
The only sounds in the lab were that of the beeps of the machines that Bruce had left Jarvis to attend to. That and the snoring from the four large men laying across the tables. Jarvis continued to monitor their vitals, marking off the numbers every hour for a report that would be generated for Tony once he woke up. Though things seemed to be no different than earlier. Vitals were fine, weight was climbing. Even the AI was stumped as to what could be going on. Even brain patterns seemed to be normal. A bit more stimulation from the stress of the event but nothing too far out of the ordinary to be alarmed.

With a grunt, one of them began to wake. Thor opened his eyes and looked up at the ceiling, sighing. His belly rumbled hungrily in the quiet, audible to anyone who hadn't been passed out. Between him and Steve, he had the crazier metabolism and digestion. By now, all of those doughnuts he'd eaten were nothing more than calories floating in him to become fat and he was hungry for more. The liquid diet was keeping his body stable but it wasn't food or filling. That was where the scientists had gone a bit wrong. Thor and Steve would need something more in order to actually feel fed.

The god grunted again as he got up, feeling his belly sag over his waist. His eyes roamed his body in the dim light and he could see that he wasn't too bad off compared to the others. Clint looked downright fat now while Thor looked simply a little out of shape in the tummy. Reaching back he felt that that also applied to his butt. Nothing he couldn't fix though, right? Plus the effects weren't as bad on him so maybe he'd be okay for a while.

But his stomach rumbled again.

He got up out of "bed", tugged the electrodes off his body, and started to plod toward the hallway. The kitchen was nearby and there was likely something left over from everyone else's dinners. Though as he made his way down the hall, Jarvis followed.

"Sir, I recommend you return to bed and return the monitors to your body," the AI said like a parent.

Thor waved a thick hand, "I will, I will. I simply need real nourishment. The man of iron and the doctor have done well to craft their potion but it is not a meal."

"Sir, we do not know exactly what food will do to your body and we cannot take the risk."

Thor stopped at the doors to the kitchen, letting them slide open and walked inside without another word. Sighing, he looked around the room at the bare center island and counters. Nothing had been left out. Now he was getting really hungry. He started to walk toward the refrigerator, feeling an intense hunger for... something... anything! He could remember eating all of those doughnuts now. He could remember how each one tasted and how good they were. When he arrived back at the tower he couldn't remember anything after the Feeder appeared on the screen but now he was getting flashes of the joy he felt when gorging. What was a bit troublesome was that he enjoyed it.

"Perhaps it was the Feeder's magic," Thor mumbled as he put his hand on the handle of the fridge door. "Though..."

No, he wanted to eat them. Seeing the piles had made him hungry. He had wanted to try them. See what they were like since the others had seemed to like them so much. It was as if the Feeder had... His thought trailed off as he opened the fridge and was met with the bright light and tons of food. The god was all but drooling now! Thick hands reached inside and started to pull containers out while tearing tops off of tupperware. Thor tilted the tubs to his mouth and swallowed things down, barely chewing. He guzzled the drinks, chomped through the veggies, ate sandwich fixings without bothering to actually make the sandwiches.

"Oh dear," Jarvis uttered, making sure to note this down as well.

Thor panted and continued gorging. It was like some sort of gate had been unlocked. Like the part of him that restrained himself from gorging like a god at a victory feast was blasted apart to allow the glutton in him free. It was so intense he didn't even realize the floor around him was littered with empty containers and torn wrappers. His hand groped inside the fridge for more, finding only a bottle of salad dressing. With a shrug, he tore the top off and chugged back the bottle of ranch like it was water.

"Oof... bbbbbuuuUUUURRRRRRPPPPPPPP!" bellowed the god.

He stumbled back against the center island and saw his gut was rounded out even further from all the food he'd crammed into it. A hand went to the side and rubbed it as he groaned from how full he felt now. He also felt a heavy feeling inside of him. Whatever was going on was working to digest his mini-feast. Though it was just one feast... How bad could it really be, right?

"Perhaps I have... overdone it... as they say," he mumbled as he started back for bed, shutting the door but leaving the mess.
1433322112111.title: Midnight Snack

14333221121112.content:
"What the...what happened in here?!" screamed Tony. He had just gotten up for a cup of coffee and when he stepped into the kitchen, it looked like a tornado had blown through it.

"Sir, Thor had a midnight snack last night. I had suggested against it but he insisted he was fine. I would have cleaned it up but I thought you should see this." Jarvis's voice echoed. A digital screen popped up and showed Tony the footage from last night where Thor was stuffing his face with just about anything and everything he could find."

"Okay ew, Thor chugged ranch dressing? That's just not right. In fact, none of this is," Tony said. "Where is Thor now?"

"He is safely back in his room although at a bigger size than he was before," Jarvis said. "The meal last night seemed to trigger something."
"I don't think I can get that out of my head. That was disturbing to say the least." Tony headed to the room where Clint, Steve, Peter, and Thor were being monitored. All of them were still asleep somehow and Tony headed over to Thor's bed. Honestly, Tony had no idea how the others were still asleep. Thor's snoring was monstrously loud and Tony had to fight the urge to cover his ears. Perhaps it was part of whatever the Feeder had done to them to be able to sleep like the deaf. No wonder they didn't notice Thor getting up and sneaking out. Steve especially would have at least been aware under normal circumstances. None of this was normal however. Gripping the bed covers, Tony tried to carefully slide them down to see but all of a sudden, Thor's eyes snapped wide open.

"Iron Man, what are you doing?" Thor asked confused.
"Were you up out of bed last night?"
"Yes, I got hungry. Your potion, as acceptable as it is, was not enough to quell my hunger. I had to go and find actual nourishment."
"Yeah, well, that wasn't a very good idea. We don't know what it could do. Until we find a way to fix this, I seriously don't think you should eat actual food. Also, you left a mess in my kitchen and chugged Salad Dressing of all things, that's just gross."

"I am sorry for making a mess. I will go clean it up. I don't know what came over me but I had to have something to eat." Thor pushed the blanket aside and got up. Tony stared at him.

"What is the matter?" Thor asked confused.
"Well, I think your 'meal' had a bit more impact than expected," Tony said pointing to Thor's midsection. He still had the definition of abs but his stomach was rounded out instead of flat and looked like Thor swallowed a barrel. It was pretty impressive actually how Thor still had a thick solid muscle gut with not much bounce unlike Steve, Peter, and Clint who definitely had more flab. Tony checked the scans. "It looks like you've put on about 80 pounds overnight, Thor" Tony said.

"I feel no different and 80 pounds? That's not so unreasonable," Thor said, going to put his armor on. He winced a little as he snapped it on. "It is an inconvenience at best."

"Um, where are you going?" Tony asked.
"To find this Feeder and give him a piece of my mind about what I think of his methods."
"No you're not," Tony said, grabbing Thor's bicep.
"Why not?"

"Because we have no idea where he is, who he is, and what he's doing. He's already infected Steve, Peter, you, and Clint. We can't risk anybody else going after him without some sort of plan and knowing how it is that he is messing with your minds. He's been picking us off one by one and I don't like that whatever he is doing has affected even you and Captain America."

"Very well. Then can I have breakfast?"
"What? You already ate everything in the fridge last night."

"He did what?!" screamed Clint who had woken up as soon as Tony had said that. "You're saying Thor ate everything?"
"Everything that was stored in the refrigerator, yes. However, it would have definitely been a bad idea for you though Hawkeye as you would have blown up even further like Thor and Steve and unlike them you don't already have a super metabolism and will just get fatter than you already are."

Clint groaned as his stomach let out a very loud audible growl. "But I'm hungry," he groaned.
"He certainly is," said Thor. "I was like that last night."
"Well that is not good..hey Bruce?" he tapped on his communicator. "Do you have any more of the liquid supplement? I think the hunger is even worse than yesterday. Thor ate everything in the fridge and Hawkeye sounds like his stomach is going to swallow itself if it doesn't have something soon. It's rather loud."

"On my way," and in a rather very brief period of time, Dr. Banner came in with more vials of the liquid and handed them to Hawkeye and Thor. "Here you go." Thor immediately chugged it then sighed sadly. "I mean no offense good doctor but the potion isn't working to get rid of the hunger. If anything," Thor winced. "I think it made it worse." Now it seemed like Thor's stomach was calling loudly, even louder than Clint's if that was possible."

"Well that's not good," Bruce said.
"Ya think?" Tony said sarcastically as Thor started to bellow about how hungry he was. "It doesn't seem to be working anymore." The racket had finally woken up Steve and Peter.

"What's going on?" The Captain asked.
"Oh nothing, except that the solution has seemed to stop working for the moment somehow. In fact, it somehow made it worse for Thor." Hawkeye grabbed a vial from Bruce's pocket and chugged it before letting out a sigh of relief."

"That feels better," Clint groaned.
"Did it really work on you?" Tony asked.
"Well a little. I don't feel like I'm being stabbed apart from the inside any longer in hunger," Clint said.

"So it worked for Clint and not Thor, that's interesting," Tony mused.
Suddenly Thor bolted up and started marching out. "I cannot take it any longer. I need food now!"
"Wait, Thor, no..." Tony started but Thor was already swinging his hammer around and lifting off to go.
"They never listen do they? Well, as long as its to get food I guess and not to try to go another round with the Feeder, he will be alright. Just...bigger.
"Well, I kind of...have to agree with Thor Tony," Steve said.
"Come on not you too!" Tony said exasperated. Steve gave him a salute and was off, running at a speed that was actually kind of surprising given how much he had grown from yesterday.

"And then there were two," said Spiderman, Peter Parker.
"What, you don't want actual food?"
"No, trust me, I do, I really do but I can't exactly risk adding that much weight yet unlike Thor and Captain America. This is awkward enough as it is," he said, looking at himself.

"What are we going to do about the Feeder?" Sam Wilson asked walking in. "He's no ordinary villain or supervillain and has been beating us at every turn."
"Well for now, he has only been committing small type robberies on banks and jewelry stores. It's annoying but at least he hasn't gone after anything like a science lab or military base yet. I mean, until we figure out a way to protect ourselves from whatever he's doing, I think we could leave him alone."

"Yeah, but what if he doesn't leave us alone? He knows that we can be affected by him and that the Avengers are vulnerable. It is also known he already humiliated four of us, including Thor and Captain America. That is terrifying actually, that he was even able to affect an Asgardian and a Supersoldier."

"Then I don't know. We better get back to work finding a cure for whatever he's doing and seeing if there is a way to undo whatever he has done and to get rid of that extra weight if possible."


Thor landed in front of a bakery and inhaled the scents. His stomach rumbled approvingly and he actually found himself drooling. The smells, they were so good. He walked inside and the place fell silent as everybody stared in awe and whispers of "Thor!" and "Thor's here went throughout the room. There were even humans taking pictures. Thor walked up to the counter and put on his best smile.

"Hello...Puck," he said to the cashier standing there, scanning his name tag. "I'd like all of your finest donuts please." Puck looked at Thor.
"All of them?" He asked.
"Yes, all of them. I'm feeling mighty famished and I need their sweet sugary substance."
"Okay then," he smiled. "I can't believe I got to serve the Thunder God Thor himself. It is an honor to meet you in person."
"Yes, well, it is an honor to meet you too, purveryor of breakfast miracles. People like you are very valuable in having the goods that provide energy. How much is it?"

"No, it's okay. You can have them all on me," Puck smiled. "You've saved the world how many times over now? I think you deserve all you can handle for that."
"Then I thank you again fair Puck." Thor looked over at the fourteen boxes Puck pulled out. He licked his lips, eager to bite into the delicacies.
"I hope you come again," Puck said.
"Perhaps I will," Thor said.

"Oh. They will be, I promise you that." Puck grinned and waved as Thor exited. Thor waved back and went to the park so he could dig into his prize in peace. This was going to be messy and he didn't want to terrify anybody in the bakery.

Steve went towards a pancake house. If he was going to put on weight, he figured he might as well eat the good stuff since the formula not only for whatever reason didn't work today, it made things so much worse. Only bottomless pancakes would fill the bottomless pit that seemed to have opened up in his stomach, despite the excess flesh that shouldn't be there. He had to mull on that. He had never really been fat before since the first part of his life he had been a skinny kid with no muscle but a lot of heart, and a well built perfect specimen after that with perfect defined muscles. Having a gut was quite unusual for him and as soon as he sat down at a booth and the menu placed in front of him, he had to feel for himself. It didn't actually feel too bad but that wasn't good either.
14333221121112.title: The next morning.

choices: Steve returns to the tower bloated and fatter than before.
Thor in the Park with Doughnuts.
143332211211122.content:
Steve stopped playing with his now fleshier middle, grabbing the hem of his white, skin tight underarmor shirt and tugging down over his chunky belly. Steve had gained a good 15 pounds overnight - putting his weight at an even 350, and it really showed. The formerly-fit super solider now sported a a hefty, fat gut that spilled over his waistline and stretched his shirt tight; the fabric kept riding up over and exposing Steve's gut and growing love handles. His pecs and pecs has grown as well, larger and beefier, but more rounded and puffy than defined like before. Steve's thighs and ass had doubled in size also, his exercise pants clinging to his beef and his ass bouncing with each step he took.

The Captain pushed opened the door to the pancake house he'd found and finding himself tugging down the hem of his shirt once more. From the looks of it the place had just opened for the day and he was their first customer.

"Hello," Steve said, "Table for one, please." The employee showed Steve to an empty table and Steve lowered his heft down at his usual pace, which was apparently too fast for the chair as it creaked under his still slowly increasing weight.

"You came in at a good time!" The waiter said, "We're running a special today; dollar double stacks! Our normal stacks are 3 buttermilk pancakes but the double stacks are 6 and today they're all-you-can-eat for a dollar a stack!"

"That sounds great, I'll take that and some milk. Start me off with 10 stacks." Steve said, handing the employee back the menu that he hadn't opened. Steve sat back in his chair, his hands resting on the shelf that was his belly, as we relaxed and waited for his meal. As irritating as this whole situation was with The Feeder, he had to admit his new, fleshier frame was... nice. Comfortable, even. A good 15 minutes went by before the waiter returned, carrying two big trays with 5 double stacks each and began to set them down in front of the fat superhero. Once done, the waiter placed Steve's milk, along with a big, ice cold pitcher of the drink, down on the table and hurried off to continue his job.

Steve sat forward and licked his lips, rubbing his hands together before grabbing a bottle of blueberry syrup and smothering the first stack with it. Without a second thought, Steve grabbed his fork and knife and dug in, cutting out a good chunk of the fluffy cakes and stuffing them into his mouth. The second they hit his tongue Steve's eyes shot open and his stomach growled loudly and the american-hero found himself shoveling in the food as fast as he could. It was as if he'd never eaten a day in his life - devouring his plate in less than a minute before grabbing the next one and scarfing it down as well.

Steve ate a lightning fast pace, plate after plate quickly sliding down his throat and piling up in his gut. The waiter took notice of this and approached Steve, "Everything okay, sir?" he asked.

"Yeah," Steve said between bites, "Just... double my order..."

"Uhh.. sure!" The employee said before turning around. He didn't go far as Steve grabbed his shirt sleeve.

"Wait," Steve said, "Bacon and eggs - a lot of it... I can afford it."

"Of course!" The man said before heading into the kitchen.

Just as Steve had finished off his last bite of pancakes the waiter returned, along with another waiter who was on staff, carrying a total of 20 double stacks. As soon as the first plate was set down Steve dug in, scarfing it down as quickly as he could. As Steve devoured plate after plate another waiter returned, setting down a massive plate of bacon and a huge plate of scrambled eggs. Steve ate and ate at lightning speed, pausing every now and then to chug some milk or gobble down bacon and eggs, his gut expanding with each bite as food filled it.

Steve's under armor slowly creeped it's way up Steve's growing gut as he packed in more and more food, the button on his pants popping off mid way through. Steve was finally starting to slow down, only a few bites left, and once he finished off the last plate the waiter returned, another 20 stacks on his tray, and set them down in front of Steve. Steve looked at the stacks and then down at his gut - which took up his entire lap, had doubled in size, and was rock solid and stuffed tight. Steve wanted to stop, already stuffed to his limit, but his hunger demanded more and he dug in, devouring the last 20 plates.

The final piece of food slid down Steve's throat as he sat back in his chair, which groaned under his weight, and The Captain grunted - bloated and stuff beyond belief. His gut was massive and tight as drum, and the blonde beefcake did all he could to soother his now painfully bloated gut.

"Anything else?" The waiter asked.

"Ugh... no. Thank you, though, and... sorry about how rough I was with you." Steve apologized.

"Think nothing of it," the waiter said, "Here's you're bill, $79.40."

Steve reached into his wallet and produced a one-hundred dollar bill, "Here," He said, "Keep the change."
143332211211122.title: Steve's Pancake Pigout

choices: The next victim(s) of the Feeder
The next victim(s) of the Feeder
1433322112111221.content:
Falcon, also known as Sam Wilson, pulled up to the front of the pancake house where Steve was at and was shocked to see what he saw. He wasn't surprised to see Steve like this after being affected by the Feeder, but he was shocked to see how big he was now. Steve looked like he probably ate the restaurant out."I'd ask what happened here, but I think I already know," Sam said edging his way in. "Come on Cap, time to go." He moved over to where the Captain was sitting for the moment after being unsteady on his feet and tried pulling him up. "Uh, Steve, help me a bit. You're really heavy." Steve nodded and when Falcon pulled, Steve unsteadily got up, his massively bloated belly slamming against Sam and almost knocking him down from the weight of it.

"Sorry about that," Steve said blushing.
"It's okay, let's just go before something else happens," Sam said as he pulled Steve along behind him with an unsteady gait, not used to this weight distribution. Getting into the limo, Falcon pulled Steve in behind him. "So uh, what happened in there?"

"I ate pancakes, eggs, and bacon. It was delicious," Steve said, licking his lips which still had a sticky spot from Maple Syrup.
"How much?" Falcon asked.
"Let's see, I think like 50 stacks of pancakes and platter of eggs and bacon."
"How many are in a stack?" Falcon asked.
"There were about six in each so apparently approximately 300 fluffy golden wonders."
"It's a miracle you don't explode," Sam said. "I want to see what effect it has had on your body and metabolism."
"The Feeder is a dangerous threat like nothing we have ever seen before," Steve said.
"Uh yeah he is. I have never seen anything quite like this," Sam said staring at Steve's body. "Honestly, I am wondering if I can figure out a way to stop him."
"Don't worry Falcon. If anyone can, you will" Steve said, then let out a massive burp. "Ooof, excuse me," Steven blushed.
"Um, it's okay. I really hope so," Falcon said. "As of now, I don't have much to go on other than that his power lingers and he is really good at persuading people and infected our best heroes."

"You are important Sam," Steve argued.
"Uh yeah I know but just from power levels overall, the Feeder has certainly knocked you guys down." When they reach Avengers Tower, Sam pulled Steve inside. "I want to conduct some more tests on you. You've grown again from today and really, 300 pancakes?"
"They were light, comparatively speaking." Steve said.
"Well still, I want to do some more tests on you." Walking Steve to the Testing Room took a lot longer than usual what with Steve's huge bloated gut swaying back and forth every step. Eventually they reached inside and he had Steve get onto the scale first.

"378 pounds a gain of 28 from this morning after only one meal. Still, not really a big surprise considering the breakfast you had. I was worried it was going to be higher somehow. I guess at least a part of your metabolism still works to digest the food somewhat properly? Anyways..." he put Steve on the table. "It looks like your clothes are ruined," Falcon said awkwardly.

"Yep."
"Want me to make new ones that will be able to stretch and accomodate any size you wear in case you get bigger? Not that I want you to get bigger or anything but this is a challenge I have always wanted to do. What was that movie again, the Incredibles? Totally designing a super suit for you Captain. Also going to work on one for Hawkeye, Thor, and Spiderman. I especially don't want to see Hawkeye or Spiderman without one." Sam shuddered.

"So you're okay with Thor?" Steve asked amused.

"No comment," Sam said. "Now let's see here..." he started squeezing and feeling around Steve's body, feeling it with the stethoscope. "Everything seems normal, breathing a little heavier but that's not surprising as your body is bigger and needs more oxygen, but vitals are all good, if not better. It's amazing but other than the whole food eating thing, the Feeder has actually made your body more healthy and able to convert into energy than before. I mean, even more super than your super enhanced status." He took of the stethoscope and removed the other wires of electrodes he attached. As he did so, Falcon rubbed his hands over Steve's chest, squeezing the thick sagging but still strong pecs which were still solid as a rock.

"Um..." Steve said as Falcon went lower and rubbed his still aching belly that still bothered Steve. There was a quiver to it and it jiggled a bit more than he liked but it wasn't bad. "What are you doing?" Steve asked. Falcon continued to explore, his hands feeling out Steve's newly developed love handles and rounded out paunch. Steve coughed again. "Falcon, what are you doing?" Falcon looked up for a minute and blinked. "Um what?"

"What are you doing?" Steve asked a third time.
"I'm checking to make sure everything's okay."
"By squeezing and rubbing it?" Steve asked. There was a moment of blank uncertainty for a moment before Sam nodded yes.
"That's right. Squeezing and rubbing to make sure everything's okay." Falcon said. Steve narrowed his eyes thoughtfully. There was something going on here, he just didn't know what.

Back at the park, Thor was celebrating his acquisition of the donuts, reverently opening up the first box. "Oh mighty and wondrous sugary substance, may your energy lift my hammer on this fine day..." before immediately shoving the first one into his mouth. He moaned in ecstasy at the taste. These were the best donuts he ever had! With a cry of excitement, Thor started bringing as much donuts to his face as possible, filling his mouth up with sugar, jelly, cream, on the inside donuts. There seemed to be something familiar about this motion and he had a brief flash to when he had first run into the Feeder. The feeder had him eat donuts like these to free Mjolinir and then somehow the memories were scattered in his mind. For a second though, Thor was sure he had it before the smell and taste of the donuts wafted over and scattered Thor's thoughts all over again. Swallowing heavy, he sighed and licked his lips and teeth of donut innards before grinning and opening the new box, stuffing as many donuts as he could at one time into his mouth. It was about four but he kept going. Driven by compulsion and the taste of the donuts, Thor continued to eat them.

Around box 8, Thor had to pause as he was feeling lightheaded and squished. It took him a bit of digging before he figured out what was wrong. His armor was too tight! With only a vague misgiving, Thor undid the armor straps and took the metal off, freeing his bloated gut that had been trapped, push against the sides. He let out a sigh of relief as his stomach spilled out to fill the open space now that it wasn't pushed in. It drooped a little over Thor's belt but he was still mighty hungry so he resumed eating the donuts. Going from box to box, he consumed donut after donut, not noticing or caring how his stomach expanded out further and further. Soon all the boxes were gone and Thor pawed the bottom of the last box and was disappointed to find it empty. Shaking his head, Thor broke whatever trance he was in while eating the donuts was gone. Thor already looked bigger and heavier, especially with his bloated stomach protruding. Thor pounded his gut and let out a long massive burp. Getting up, he looked around. Fortunately there was still nobody to see his embarassment. Picking up the pieces of his old armor, Thor flies off to Avenger's Tower and when he landed, the earth around his landing shook a little.

Thor tried sneaking in but he was caught by Dr. Banner.
"Ah Thor, I wanted to see you."
"Yes doctor?
"I was just curious and wanted to see first hand when you got back what was going on.
"Nothing is going on. Other than that," said Thor.
"Shut up. get ready/"
"Freddy in what way?"
"No ready,"
1433322112111221.title: Steve returns to the tower bloated and fatter t...

14333221121112211.content:
Thor sat on one of the beds as Bruce hooked him up to some nodes that ran to the computers. He typed a few things in to set up some tests and stood back as they ran. Brow furrowed, he shook his head at the results that were coming up. Every model that was being displayed to predict the outcome of what was going on showed Thor swelling bigger and bigger. The best possible scenario would be that he'd stop around 800 pounds in a few months but even that had a low percentage rate of happening!

"It appears his midnight snack and his breakfast are activating whatever it is in his mind that controls this... change..." Jarvis said to Bruce.

The doctor nodded, "Yeah, I see that. Thor, you're going to have to stick solely to the nutrient solution until we can figure this out."

Thor shook his head, "I cannot do that, doctor. That is not food. I require true food. I must eat!"

"It'll just be another day or two. Tony and I can figure this out," Bruce sighed, rubbing his eyes and hoping that Thor would believe him.

"No. I will eat food," Thor said, starting to get a bit annoyed.

"Thor!" shouted Bruce, stopping himself and trying to hold back. "Thor. I told you. You cannot eat real food until we figure this out. You're only activating what The Feeder did to you and if you do that... I mean, you were already the consistent biggest on the team since, you know, I'm only that at certain times. If you keep this up you'll be the biggest for sure!"

Thor got off the table and tore the nodes off of him. He couldn't help but rub over his much bigger belly, feeling that the bloat had all but gone, leaving mass in its place. Though he didn't care. Real food was real food! He wanted that!

"I shall now find something for lunch. You shall not stop me, doctor."

Bruce came out from behind the computers, "No! I told you not to eat real food!" His eyes flashed and he felt the walls start to break. He clenched his fists, hoping to hold back. Then suddenly...
14333221121112211.title: The next victim(s) of the Feeder

choices: The battle has ended and Bruce and Logan are gorging themselves. What happened?
143332211211122111.content:
Bruce came out from behind the computers, "No! I told you not to eat real food!" His eyes flashed and he felt the walls start to break. He clenched his fists, hoping to hold back. Then suddenly a Feeder alert goes off.

Unfortunately the sudden alert caused Bruce to turn into the Hulk. Once the transformation was complete Hulk punched a hole in the wall.

"Dr. Banner come back! Where are you going?" Jarvis yelled.

"I'm going to smash the Feeder. He's somewhere in Central Park."

Hulk then makes his way towards the docking bay.

"Master Stark, Dr, Banner has gone AWOL and he insists on facing the Feeder by himself." Jarvis said after turning on the communicator within the lab.

"What! This isn't good. The situation will be a lot worse if Hulk is infected."

"That's exactly what crossed my mind Master Stark."

"Well he certainly isn't going alone. I've got a plan to stop the Feeder. I've been working on a new device that should prevent him infecting anyone else. Hopefully I can catch Hulk before he takes off."

"Don't you worry about it Stark. I was tired of sitting around. Just don't be late. We'll save plenty of action if we don't apprehend him first."

"What? Don't be so rash Logan. We need to work together..." Tony replied after getting cut off.

"Sir, was that Wolverine?"

"Yep, and he decided to follow Hulk. Things have just gone from bad to worse. If Wolverine is infected he'll be like Thor and Cap given his healing factor, maybe even as bad as Hulk if he gets infected too."

Iron Man suits up and takes off for Central Park. By the time he arrives...
143332211211122111.title: A Feeder Alert Goes Off

1433322112111222.content:
Thor sat himself down on a park bench after buying the doughnuts. The bench creased as Thor sat, screaming under Thor's massive size. Thor ate the first donut and was in the same trance as before with the food. Thor started shoving food in his mouth as much as he could. Thor always had a huge appetite, but now with an enormous gut, he ate more than ever.

When Thor only had a box or 2 left from his 14 boxes, the feeder was on his way to his next crime scene. He swiftly walked and saw Thor stuffing himself on the bench that seemed like it was about to break.
"I see Thor is still under my trance, why not help him a bit?" The Feeder asked himself. He quietly approached the hungry superhero and took his empty boxes and filled them with donuts. The Feeder also gave Thor more boxes, triple his original amount, and filled those too. Thor sat in front of 42 full boxes of dozens of donuts and he continued eating without noticing The Feeder. Thor ate faster and faster after each bite, and before Th Feeder could go along with his plans, Thor had eaten 10 boxes.

The Feeder considered sticking around to refull Thor, and decided he would. The Feeder refilled the empty boxes. The Feeder wanted to fill Thor so much so by the time he noticed him, he wouldn't be able to get up.

Thor ate and ate, donut after donut. Although he was eating at lightning speed, he devoured each donut and admired the taste.

As the boxes got empty and refilled Thor's shirt was starting to rip. Before his eating spree of donuts Thor couldn't get his shirt to cover his belly button, but now Thor sat in a shirt with holes, filled with fat bulging out. Most of Thor's fat went to his belly, growing more and more. After Thor finished his 72nd box, his shirt completely ripped off exposing his huge enormous belly. After finishing his 95th box the bench fell under Thor's weight, and he began to slow down. Th Feedef fled, and Thor was left unaware.

"That was good." he said, content. "Where did these extra boxes come from? - I guess I ordered more than I thought."

Minutes later the mobile avengers reported to the scene, seeing everything from the cameras back at the Tower.
"Thor the Feeder filled you up again!" Bruce said worried. "What will happen to your metabolism now?! It'll sky rocket!"
Thor patted his belly and he was brought back to the Tower.

There, Captain America looked like he ate the original hero, or maybe even 2. Thor and Steve blew up with weight, but _____ weighed more.
1433322112111222.title: Thor in the Park with Doughnuts.

choices: Refuses Tony's idea. The Feeder must be Smashed!
Concedes and calms down. Tony may have a point.
1433322112112.content:
Later that night Wolverine and Falcon were out on patrol. The two heroes each went to a different part of the city. Falcon was paroling the suburbs while Wolverine would patrol downtown. As Wolverine drove his motorcycle he didn't notice anything out of the ordinary yet. Several night owls were having the time of their life as they partied.

"Sure is peaceful. A little too peaceful. I think I may have to do a thorough investigation. I swear the Feeder is here. I can smell the faint odor of a mutant."

Wolverine then parks his motorcycle in the parking lot of a fairly new club called Delectable Delights.

"Delectable Delights? I've heard rumors of this place. It seemingly opened the same night the Feeder made his mark. Might as well see if he's here.

Wolverine enters through the clubs double doors. Once inside he sees several fat men chowing down on burgers and drinking their fill of exotic drinks that were being blended by the female bartender. He also noticed that on the center stage several dancers were dressed in food themed clothing which were designed to provoke one's own desires to gorge himself if he watched their seemingly hypnotic dance. He then approaches the counter to ask the bartender if she noticed anything unusual.

"Pardon me tuts, but have you seen an alleged criminal dressed in red and white who calls himself the Feeder?"

"I haven't. It's my first night working here. I'll go get the owner. I'm sure he might be able to answer your question sir."

The bartender quickly excuses herself as she enters the kitchen which led to her boss's office. It was shortly after that the performers started to leave the stage as they danced toward Wolverine carrying trays of the different types of food that they were dressed after.

"Would you like a free sample mister?" A woman wearing a fastfood uniform and a burger styled hat asked.

"No thanks, I'm not hungry."

"Come on mister! We won't get paid if our customers don't try a free sample!" A woman dressed as a chocolate bunny pleaded.

"I said no. If you don't pestering me then I might pin you to a wall. I'm on an important job right now trying to catch a nutcase who calls himself the Feeder."

"Nutcase? It's not polite to insult someone who you haven't met, especially if he happens to own this place." Came a new masculine voice.

When Wolverine turned around he saw none other than the Feeder himself.

"You! You're the Feeder! You're going to pay for what you did to my friends!" Wolverine growled as he extended his claws.

"I don't think so Wolverine. It would be easy to hypnotize you, but not until my minions have some fun. Feedettes, feed him!"

Then without warning the women dressed in food themed clothing begin attacking Wolverine by attempting to use magic to shove their respective dish down his throat. Wolverine quickly sliced up the food before it could reach his face. The Feedettes then use their special food based powers to summon the food they were dressed as in order to forcefeed Wolverine. Wolverine quickly dodges the assaults and begins slashing the Feedetes with his claws. This however is where he made his mistake. The Feedettes begin their mesmerizing dance to create food barriers to protect themselves.

"What the hell?"

"What's wrong Wolverine? Can't handle my Feedettes?" The Feeder scoffed as he began to lift up his mask to reveal his mouth.

"I will put an end to you and your minions if it's the last thing I do!"

"I don't think so. Why don't you just sit back relax and gorge on all of this delicious food. Let the Feedettes stuff you with their delicious treats." The Feeder said in a hypnotically soothing voice.

"No! Never!" Wolverine yelled as his eyes glowed red for a brief period while trying to fight off the hypnotism.

No matter how hard Wolverine struggle the hypnotism finally took full control as a Feedette stuffed a chocolate bunny into his mouth. As soon as he ate the chocolate bunny Wolverine started devouring anything piece of food the Feedettes offered him.

"I would stay and watch, but I have other business to attend to. The next time we meet I'm sure my Feedettes will have more fun stuffing full of delicious treats."

The Feeder then makes his exit by walking out the backdoor. It wasn't until early in the morning that Falcon discovered that something was wrong.

"The night's over and still word from Logan. Something tells me that a certain someone ran into Wolverine."

Falcon then flies downtown to find Wolverine. As he is flying he catches a glimpse of Wolverine's motorcycle.

"Typical Wolverine, he decided to get personal and ask people if they spotted the Feeder."

Falcon then lands and walks into Delectable Delights. To his horror he saw Wolverine out cold in a food coma. It seemed that the mutant put on at least 40 pounds of fat and muscle.

"Ironman, we have an issue. The Feeder has infected Wolverine."

"What! Not again! We'll be right there."

After Sam contacted Tony Logan's gut bulged as his body converted his late night feast into five more pounds of fat. It was thirty minutes later that Wolverine was brought to the tower and hooked up. Unfortunately he gained another five pounds bring him to 350 pounds. As Sam was catching up on some sleep Bruce and Tony were arguing on how to stop the Feeder.

"Hulk! We can't charge in and take the Feeder head on! We don't know what he's capable of!"

"We can take him if we call my agents of S.M.A.S.H. I know enough that with my cousin's help and two other Hulks and yourself we can definitely smash him."

"You're not getting the point! Just calm down and we can work on a strategy together with your agents of S.M.A.S.H. and some of our female Avengers! I know that Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne should be returning from there missions. We also have Captain Marvel returning from her missions as well. Just hear me out Bruce! I know this whole Feeder issue has gotten on your nerves. He's driving me crazy as well. What do you say big guy?"

Hulk sighs and then...
1433322112112.title: Wolverine Vs. the Feeder

choices: Ironman, Hulk, Falcon, Wasp, and Captain Marvel discuss how to stop the Feeder
Followed the other male Avengers as they recuperate
143332211212.content:
As Thor was about to leave Wolverine decided to follow Thor just in case things got out of hand. As the two heroes arrived on the scene cop cars were already parked outside. Unfortunately the male officers were gorging themselves on fastfood, sweets, and soda. Meanwhile the female guards were standing guard at the door.

"What matter of nonsense is this? The men gorge themselves on earthly delicacies while the women do nothing. Some foul magic is at play."

"Smells like a demon to me and maybe mutant as well."

"When did you arrive Wolverine? I thought you would be with the others. With your help we can bring this Feeder of men to Justice."

"I wouldn't be too sure about that. In fact there is no way you'll stop me!" The Feeder exclaimed as he and a lady dressed in business attire stood at the doorway to the warehouse.

"Prepare to be vanquished Feeder of men foe your time has come! Wolverine, see that his hostage is escorted to safety while I vanquish this fiend!"

As Thor engages the Feeder in combat Wolverine tries to save the woman standing in the doorway. The woman's black hair almost covered her eyes and her fair complexion glistened in the sun. Unfortunately for Wolverine the hypnotized female officers started to fire their guns at him.

Argh!!! What is up with these women?! Could the Feeder be controlling them too? Wolverine thought as he was being pelted with bullets.

Wolverine knocks the female officers unconscious and removes the bullets in his body using his claws. Once removed Wolverine's wounds heal as if nothing happened.

"You're coming with me! The sooner we get you out of her the sooner you'll be free of the Feeder's control!" Wolverine said as he took the woman by the hand.

"Sorry to burst your bubble, but I'm here on my own accord. I was just here to discuss the new dance club my tenant wanted to purchase!" The woman responded.

"Listen lady, but your tenant is an alleged criminal. I don't know what damn lies he told you, but you must not stay here!" Wolverine argued.

"Actually I'm fine. More than fine. I actually feel quite wicked right now." The landlady responded as her skin began turning mint green.

Before Wolverine's eyes the seemingly innocent, but stubborn landlady transformed into what one would say a witch wearing a black motorcycling outfit adorned with a black hat usually worn by magicians.

"You're working with him!"

"That's right Wolvie boy. The Feeder has a revolutionary plan for reforming the world!"

"That sounds insane! So you're just going to help him commit crimes and fatten men up like whales. That sounds sick if you ask me!" Wolverine said as he extended his claws in order to attack the wicked landlady.

Wolverine then jumped at the landlady, but the landlady used her magic to dodge the attack.

"What's wrong Wolvie? Can't hit me?" The landlady scoffed.

Wolverine responds by lunging at the landlady and slicing her with his claws. However, this caused her to split into five more duplicates.

"What the hell! You got to be kidding me!"

"If I was kidding you then I wouldn't be the Wicked Witch of the West Coast now."

"Is that what you're calling yourself! It sounds like it was taken out of a children's book!"

Meanwhile Thor was dealing with the Feeder.

"Feeder of men you are no match for Mjolnir!"

Thor throws his hammer at the Feeder, but the Feeder dodges it and then uses his powers to pin it to the ground with doughnuts.

"What matter of trickery is this?!"

"It's magic. The men and women you see can't resist my alluring voice. Whenever I speak women usually make out with me on the spot." The Feeder replied.

"What matter of creature are you? I have not seen magic of such potency."

"I'm demon. An Incubus to be exact, well half incubus and half human. Before my new powers manifested I could only control women, but when a great mist rolled on the earth I became a bit more than half incubus and half human per se." The Feeder replied.

"It matters not for I Thor Odinson will vanquish you today fiend! Mjolnir to me!"

When Thor tried calling his hammer it was stuck under an evergrowing pile of food. The feeder then pins Thor to the ground with licorice and stuffs a chocolate bar into the Norse god's mouth. The Feeder lifts his mask to reveal his mouth.

"If you want your toy then you're going to to have to eat that pile of food for it. After that you can eat these other piles of food. What's this? A camera hidden in your breastplate? I'll take that if you don't mind. My partner will have to alter the contents of this before I can let you have it back. Now go get your hammer." The Feeder said in a melodic, but hypnotic voice.

Thor's eyes glow red briefly before he eats the licorice pinning him down and the pile of food that is burying his trusted hammer. As Thor was gorging himself Wolverine tried slashing the Wicked Witch of the West Coast, but no matter how hard he tried she kept replicating herself with her magic.

"Do you give up yet Wolvie?"

"I will never give up to a witch like you!"

"That's too bad Wolvie boy. This had been such a fun fight."

The Witch of the West Coast converts her duplicates into electricity and shocks Wolverine. Wolverine was temporarily stunned, but it gave the Feeder enough time to put the mutant under his spell.

"I see you met my landlady, but we have to go now. Why don't you sit back, relax and help yourself to some burgers, desserts and soda." The Feeder said in the same hypnotically soothing voice.

Wolverine's eyes turn red before he starts eating from a pile of burgers.

"Look what I found my lovely dear. The Avengers tagged Thor with a pesky camera. If you would do the honors of altering this footage so we can continue to work in the shadows."

"Hand it to me."

The Feeder hands the camera over to the Wicked Witch of the West Coast, who uses her magic to alter the contents of the camera to a surprise party at the warehouse.

"That should do it. Now they won't know a thing. I also cast a strong memory alteration spell so they remember you breaking into the supposed surprise party. That should be enough to keep them off our tail for now." The Wicked Witch of the West Coast said as she pooffed the camera back onto Thor's breastplate.

She then poofs away by using her magic while the Feeder uses his armored truck to drive to his secret hideout.

Two hours later Wasp and Captain Marvel arrived at the scene. The two ladies quickly noticed how Thor, Wolverine and the male officers were in food comas while the female officers just recovered from their hypnotism and being knocked out by Wolverine.

"What happened here?"

"I don't know but we need to contact Tony and the others." Captain Marvel responded as she took Thor's communicator.

"Tony, it's me Captain Marvel. We were just returning from our missions when we encountered both Wolverine and Thor in food comas."

"Thanks Carol, well be right there." Tony replied.

Soon enough an Avengejet came and picked up the four heroes. Upon returning to headquarters Wolverine and Thor were placed on two beds next to Captain America and Spiderman, both who plumped up and bulked out along with Hawkeye.
143332211212.title: Thor and Wolverine v. the Feeder and his Landlady?

choices: During his patrol the Falcon runs into the Feeder
The Feeder captures Captain Marvel and forces her to forcefeed another male hero
1433322112121.content:
Back at the tower Tony and Bruce were looking at the charts of their fallen comrades. Clint, the Feeder's first victim was 300 pounds. His form though doughy and pudgy and donning a double chin had layers of developing muscle underneath. Peter Parker, the smallest of those afflicted added 40 pounds to his frame and it was obvious that despite the new flab that he was also getting slightly buff. Captain America, Thor, and Wolverine were different stories. Due to their unique predicaments they were digesting faster and growing more quickly. Steve who was already heavier than Clint and was now 325 pounds. A fifty pound gain from his previous weight. Thor already being one of the heaviest, sans Hulk, only gained a mere twenty-five pounds bring him to 350 pounds. All of which made the Norse God look bloated. It was Logan that was the most complicated one. Despite originally slightly heavier than Steve by 10 pounds or so, thanks to his adamantium skeleton. It was his regenerative healing factor that he gained 35 pounds bringing the mutant up to the same weight as Captain America. After reviewing the chart they noticed Carol Danvers and Hop van Dyane standing behind them.

"Tony, what do you guys know about this Feeder?" Carol asked.

"We know that he can hypnotize men, and is possibly some kind of mutant magic user. We sent Thor to confront him, but as he and Wolverine arrived we lost contact with them and the audio and visuals on our systems went haywire."

"So some strange guy is running around robbing banks and fattening men? Have Wolverine and Thor remembered anything?"

"That's the problem. All they remember was the Feeder wrecking a surprise party for a police officer, but given the evidence prior I suspect that their memories have been altered." Bruce replied while trying not to lose his cool.

"Easy there Bruce, you almost punched a hole in the wall trying to fix the malfunction in our equipment." Sam said trying to reassure the scientist before he Hulks out.

"You're right. A few hours ago I left to see if anyone one we know could be working with guy. In the end I did manage to stop the Leader from trying to gamafy everyone for the umpteenth time. By the time S.H.E.I.L.D. picked him up and after I returned that's when everything started working again and by then the Feeder already got away."

"So there may someone helping the Feeder?" Hope asked in a surprised tone.

"That's our new theory for the time being. With Bruce's escapade and the disturbance that caused our systems to go haywire there has to be more than meets the eye." Tony said as he brings up a screen showing places that the Feeder has been spotted. "As you can see ladies the the areas marked in red is where we encountered the Feeder. The places in blue was before news was out of his minor burglaries. The places in green are the next targets that he may strike next."

"This is a well thought out diagram. It seems like there's a trend though. It seems like he's been making his way up to other heists. If he can hypnotize men then I'm sure he's making the women do the stealing for him. He may not have an interest in making the women stuff themselves, but I doubt he is beneath making them steal valuables and possibly cramming handfuls of food down the men's throats." Carol said.

"Carol you're a genius! Jarvis compile a list of women at every crime scene. If we can ask these women we may be able to learn some more about this Feeder. In the meantime Bruce is working on a memory manipulation device that will help restore memories of his victims no matter how altered they are."

"I'll call Scott Lang and my cousin. We could use the backup just in case the Feeder rears his red masked face."

With that the Avengers started to lay down a plan to stop the Feeder once and for all. After their discussion they decided to retire for the night. Falcon and Captain Marvel went out to patrol the city.
1433322112121.title: Formulating a Strategy to stop the Feeder

choices: Quicksilver and Captain Marvel wake up in S.H.E.I.L.D custody undergoing tests.
They wake up at the tower.
14333221121212.content:
As Captain Marvel was patrolling the city she saw nothing out of the ordinary yet, but due to her years of service in the military Carol knew that something had to be up. As Captain Marvel continued her patrol she noticed a quick blur of silver.

Could that be Quicksilver? I thought he was out of town helping the Scarlet Witch with a mission. Maybe I can ask him if he knows anything of this Feeder.

Captain Marvel follows Quicksilver to what appears to be a S.H.E.I.L.D. facility.

"Quicksilver!" Carol called out to her friend.

"Captain Marvel, what brings you here?"

"I should be asking you the same thing."

"It's complicated. Let's just say a certain prisoner made their getaway."

"Who could that be?"

"Let's just say that whoever they are they are controlling my sister."

"It must be the Feeder!"

"Who?"

"Never mind him, isn't strange that we weren't surrounded by S.H.E.I.L.D. agents?"

"You're right. Something feels odd. It's like we might have walked into a trap."

"Correct you are my simpleminded foes."

Out of nowhere a monitor showing the Leader and a tied up Scarlet Witch could be seen.

"Didn't the Hulk give you over to S.H.E.I.L.D.?"

"Correct Ms. Marvel or should I say Captain Marvel. I purposely let the Hulk capture me so I can hack S.H.E.I.L.D. for the Feeder. He should be here any minute now."

"You're not the real Leader! You're a fraud!" Quicksilver yelled.

"You're quick intellect is amusing. You're right about that. I'm really", The Leader starts changing forms. A green light envelopes his body. Once the light fades it is revealed that the Wicked Witch of the West Coast had been posing as the Leader. "... the Wicked Witch of the West Coast!"

"You won't get away with this!"

"But we have Quicksilver." The Feeder said as he emerged from the armored truck with his mask above his mouth.

The Feeder tries to pin Quicksilver down with some doughnuts, but Quicksilver proved too fast. The Feeder turns his attention to Captain Marvel.

I need a way to slow that guy down and I think it's time to show the Avengers that my powers are effective on women.

Captain Marvel charges at the Feeder. Unfortunately the Feeder pins her down to the ground.

"Let me go!"

"I don't think so Captain Marvel. I have plans for you."

"I don't want any part of your twisted scheme!"

"That's too bad. I'm sure a clever woman like you has deduced that I can make women fall under my charm. Now Captain Marvel, I want you to feed Quicksilver for me. Force him to eat all these yummy treats so I may be able to work my magic on him." The Feeder said in a hypnotic tone.

As Carol's eyes glowed red the Feeder kissed her on the lips. As he kissed her a strange energy surrounded the Feeder's body, making him stronger as his muscles bulged with new found strength.

"What the?! Captain Marvel! Snap out of it!" Quicksilver yelled.

Unfortunately Carol has completely under the Feeder's control. Without a word she used her powers on Quicksilver and begun flinging food into his mouth. Quicksilver tried to fight off the brainwashed Captain Marvel, but she kept on blasting him with energy every time he would try to punch the Feeder. As Pietro tried to get up Carol forced a doughnut into his mouth. The Feeder then tries to hypnotize Quicksilver.

"Quicksilver give up while you can. You can't stop me. Let Captain Marvel feed you all this yummy food."

Quicksilver struggles to fight off the brainwashing, but with each new food item crammed into his mouth he felt his willpower weakening. It was after 30 doughnuts that the brainwashing took full control of Quicksilver. He then began eating everything that Captain Marvel gave him. By then the Feeder and his partnered loaded the truck with abandoned S.H.E.I.L.D technology and the Scarlet Witch. It wasn't until morning that some agents discovered the two superheroes passed out.

"Director Coulson, we found Captain Marvel and Quicksilver at the scene of the incident. Our plan to capture the Feeder failed. What should we do sir?"

"Call the Avengers. Maybe we get them to help us with this guy. He's been a pain since we first encountered him."

"Copy that."
