1551311221.content:
Kristoff was the star of their school's hockey team. As an incoming freshman, he was already labeled as a star and definitely fast-tracking to pro. Some might think him a bit arrogant, and he certainly could be, but he really had talent. Or at least had. The season had started off well but then a new team from a rivaling school had come and it wasn't pretty. To everyone's utter surprise and horror, the opposing Sentinels had utterly thrashed the Reindeer in what could only be described as a massacre. They hadn't scored a single goal. Then it happened again and again. The Sentinels might as well have been unstoppable and the entire team was despondent, Kristoff especially. This was personal as he had never before failed so bad, especially as team captain, and it was a horrible feeling. The Sentinels were well deserving of the title as they were such tall giant muscle behemoths that it seemed dubious that any of them were actually in college. It turned out they were but it still reeked of legal loop-holing but nobody could or wanted to prove anything. The co-captains of the opposing team were Snow and Thor who were some of the largest people he had ever seen and while most of the Sentinels were giant, they might as well have been gods. Kristoff had always thought he was tall but considering everybody on the Sentinels were over 6 feet, he was a shorty. No one could ever mistake Thor and Snow though as Thor was 6'4-6'5 or something and Snow was a ridiculous 6'7 and both were linebacker broad since they also played football and had muscles on their muscles. Kristoff was pretty big himself but compared to them, well, there was no contest really. Never in his life had Kristoff ever been so jealous even as he was angry they were ruining everything for him and his team.

After the fourth loss in a row, they all just about had it. Kristoff as team captain had to suffer the heat and get a tongue lashing from their desperate coach. It was clear that unless something changed, the Sentinels were going to win every game and were pretty much an unstoppable force. Strategy didn't really work, not because it was bad and they did score a few points, but it had just become clear that it came down to physical size differences. The Sentinels were just plain bigger but other than their new players this year Snow and Thor, were just average. Had the two blonde hulks not decided to play this year or that they liked it, the team would have been only decent at best and while not entirely un-noteworthy, still minor overall. But the introduction of their new muscle turned them into an elite fighting force. You wouldn't have thought that people so big could move quick but they surprisingly did but colliding them was like running into a steel wall. It doesn't budge and they just bodily knocked people down left and right.

What they needed was essentially size. Strategy was almost entirely irrelevant as they were both decently fast on the ice but had such extreme length of reach and mass, it was just hard to get anything past them. More importantly, it would stop leaving people knocked to the floor every time they got slammed. They had quite a few people injured, people that would have been valuable, because they hadn't gotten out of the way fast enough and just got barreled into. And as team captain, the duty fell to Kristoff to inspire and lead the troops though he wasn't keen on getting slammed by either Snow or Thor either. It happened a couple of times which had left him dizzy and grounded for a time, but thankfully they never hit him together. He doubted that most anyone could withstand a coordinated hit and they had to send three over to the hospital that had the misfortune to being slammed by both at once. All had been laid out for the season with broken bones and one had a concussion but since it was legal, they couldn't really have Snow and Thor evicted unfortunately though they had tried. It really was unfair.

"Kristoff!" Coach yelled loudly and he could tell he was angry. Bracing himself, Kristoff swallowed and headed to coach's office. He was in for it, he could tell. But even he was surprised when he got delivered an ultimatum.

"Those blasted Sentinels....Snow and Thor! If I could have them banned from the hockey league I would and there is something fishy going on there because no way are they rookies but anyways...we have a big problem. I say a BIG problem. Those guys are behemoths and though you are the biggest guy on the team, they still outweigh by probably at least 120 or even more lbs. They're utter monsters and I have no idea how they got that way since steroid tests amazingly turned up negative, but for now the only thing to do to win is match them and you're going to do that."

"Huh?" Kristoff asked confused.

"It's simple. You and the rest of the guys are going to do whatever it takes to become heavy enough that the terror duo Snow and Thor will have a much harder time of knocking you down. I also had considered breaking their legs but unfortunately that idea was nixed." Kristoff hoped Coach was joking but he had sounded serious and Kristoff himself entertained ideas such as that briefly after the humiliating first loss and the second loss.

"So what are you saying?" Kristoff asked, confused.
"I'm saying you and the rest of the team are going to all put on at least 100 lbs before the finals in a couple of months each and anyone who doesn't is off the team." Kristoff stared at him in shock.

"100 lbs in only 4 months! You can't be serious!" Coach stared at him levelly.
"Of course I can. It's entirely possible and only 25 pounds a months at minimum. Surely that's not hard for you to understand?"
"Well no, but that's extreme!"
"No, what's extreme is those Sentinel bastards having Snow and Thor to steamroll over everyone. We'll just send them a bit of their own medicine as other than those two, the rest of the team isn't that great."

"True," Kristoff agreed. "But 100 pounds?" The coach nodded in agreement.
"Yeah you're right. Since you're the star lets put you at least 150 pounds minimum." Kristoff stared in horror.
"Umm...that's not what I meant."
"I know, but I'm telling you. 150 pounds for you as leader and our weapon against Snow or Thor, and 100 pounds everyone else minimum."
Kristoff shook his head. "But..." he started and Coach glared at him.

"Impress me or you're off the team and you won't be considered for pro-league." Kristoff shuddered. Hockey was his life. He had always wanted to be a Pro Hockey player forever and he couldn't afford to lose his spot. But 150 or more pounds...this was starting to sound impossible. He was about to say so again but the look Coach sent him made it very clear that if he voiced anymore objections then Kristoff was canned. "Tell the rest of those losers!" Coach called as Kristoff left.

"So uh guys, it uh looks like we're going to be growing." Kristoff said. "Everybody has to put on at least 100 pounds if not more by the start of the championship game against the Sentinels." They looked at him.

"100 pounds?" Jack asked in disbelief.
"Yes, 100 pounds everybody or they're off the team." Kristoff shuddered before adding, "and for me that's 150." Everybody gasped.
"What are you going to do?" one asked.
"I don't know yet," Kristoff answered. He was getting asked the impossible and even though Kristoff was big and excellent at working out, he wasn't sure how he was going to get everybody to gain that weight in the time they had left. At least, weight that would be functional and not a hindrance. He changed into his normal everyday clothes as he got ready to leave for work, still wondering what he was going to do.

Heading to Oaken Ice's Ice Cream Parlor, Kristoff felt distraught as he had no idea what he was going to do and people could tell when he started scooping the ice cream. Usually he was a lot more cheerful.

"What's the matter?" his friend Sven asked him, munching on a carrot. Sven was one of his best friends and had a thing for carrots, which made it kind of funny that he hung out at an ice cream store.

"You know those two Sentinels Snow and Thor?" Kristoff asked.
"Who doesn't? Also, you complain about them all the time," Sven reminded.
"Well, yes but anyways we lost again." Sven winced.
"Ooh bummer. But not unexpected." Sven ducked when Kristoff flicked ice cream at him.
"Jerk-off. Anyhow, yeah Coach has gone out of his mind."
"In what way?" Sven asked.
"He's demanding everybody put on at least 100 pounds before the championship game in four months."
"Those guys would still be bigger than you, they're monsters." Sven said.
"Yes, well that is true but it would make getting smacked by them not as crippling and a couple of people might then actually be able to take out one or the other. It's not like the Sentinels are any good other than Thor or Snow."
"That's true." Sven said, taking another bite of carrot.
"Well for me its 150 pounds," Kristoff muttered. Sven stared before giggling a bit.
"Why are you laughing? This is not funny!" Kristoff growled.
"Yeah it kind of is. I'm just thinking of how big you're going to be. Man you're going to be fat," Sven poked Kristoff's gut. "Say goodbye to those perfect abs haha." Sven laughed at the thought.

"You know sometimes I really hate you," Kristoff said. He also shuddered too. He'd always been big but not like fat but getting that weight in such a short time would definitely result in a rather large beefy stomach. Snow had one too and sure knew how to throw it around but Kristoff hadn't seen that many hockey players with one and here he was trying to match with two behemoths. He was so totally screwed and he also had no idea how he was going to put on the weight in only a couple of months. He might as well resign now."

"Hey, don't feel bad," Sven said. "I think I know someone who can help you."
"Huh, you do?" Kristoff said.
"Yeah his name is Hans. He is a feeder and has experience with this."
"Lets give it a try.
1551311221.title: Hockey Dilemna

15513112211.content:
"I'll make the call then!" Sven said, throwing the empty bag of baby carrots away before pulling out his cell phone.
"You have his number already?" Kristoff said as he handed a woman her bowl of ice cream and put the money in the register.
"Yeah," Sven muttered as he scrolled down the list of numbers in his phone, "Remember when I looked into gaining weight a few months ago? I contacted him but he charges way too much. Besides," Sven said, pointing at the pudgy belly he sported, "I think I did a pretty a good job on my own."
"Thats true." Kristoff said, "I did offer to help you work out, though."
"Yeah, but I wanted fat - not muscle." Sven corrected, "Besides, you DID help me out. All those cartons of ice cream you got me with your employee discount packed on the pounds quick."
"How much did you gain again?" Kristoff asked.
"A hundred pounds." Sven said, "Brought me up to 270." He said with a grin.

         Sven stepped outside for a bit while he made the call which gave Kristoff some time to think. He didn't WANT to put on 150 pounds - and coach said that was the MINIMUM. What if he was forced to gain more? No matter what, though, he had no other choice. It was either gain weight or quit the team.
Sven came in a few minutes later, "Good news, buddie!! Hans picked up and we're meeting him tonight at his house."
"What about the price? You said he was expensive." Kristoff asked.
"He is but I also called your coach. He said the school will personally pay for Hans' expenses if it means getting their star player to fatten up."
"I'm not getting fat." Kristoff said.
"Yeah, you are." Sven replied, "Its gonna happen. You'll gain a LOT of muscle too but you're gonna also get fat."
Kristoff sighed, "Do you have his address?"

~+~+~+~+~

         Kristoff slowly pulled his car up to the gates of the giant mansion before him. An enormous three story building with more rooms than Kristoff has ever seen for a house. He rolled the window down and pressed the button on the intercom. The speaker before him crackled before a voice came through, "Hello?"
"Umm... hi. My name is Kristoff Bjorgman and I'm here to see Hans? A friend of mine called earlier a-" Kristoff was cut off by the sound of the heavy metal gate sliding over. He thanked the intercom and pulled up to the front door. Kristoff adjusted his black and roodie hoodie to make sure it wasn't wrinkled, though the sleeves were strained because of his huge biceps, and walked up to the door. He knocked and a butler opened the door, "Follow me, Sir."

         Kristoff followed the butler through the mansion and on his way through he several rooms with open doors. Kristoff noticed about 12 other men in the house all doing various things ranging: watching tv, playing video games, reading, doing homework, working out, and eating. One thing Kristoff noticed was how BIG they all were; from body builder sized muscles to sumo sized fat bodies and everything in between; all 12 of these guys were massive in one way or another.

         The butler opened the door and lead Kristoff in, "Sir, a Mr. Kristoff Bjorgman is here to see you."
The young man who was sitting at a desk on his laptop turned around in his chair, "That'll be all." he said.
As the butler left the room Kristoff watched as the man stood and walked over to him; he was taller than Kristoff but not by much and unlike the other 12 men in the house he was lean; toned, but lean. He was wearing a very expensive looking shirt with equally expensive looking designer jeans and boots. He was defiantly handsome and his red mutton chops framed his face nicely, "Sven called and told me everything, Kristoff. The school has already paid for this so theres no turning back."
The man held out his hand and smiled, "I'm Hans Westergaurd. Its nice to meet you."

         Kristoff shook his hand, "Nice to meet you too." Kristoff said, a bit hesitant.
"SO," Hans started, "To start this off you're gonna have to strip down to at least your underwear. I need an accurate weight to begin."
Kristoff's face turned red but sighed and stripped down until he was in just the jockstrap he had been wearing all day. Hans smirked, "Y'know, you're VERY attractive, Kristoff."
"Thanks." Kristoff said, his face turning a darker shade of red.
"And you'll be ever sexier once you've put on weight. Follow me." Hans said as he lead Kristoff to the scale in his room.

         Kristoff stepped onto the scale and Hans grabbed his tablet, "Whats that for?" Kristoff asked.
"My dad's company helped me develop an app for tracking weight gain." Hans said as he punched in Kristoff's current weight, "You weight about 240 right now, all muscle. You're coach wants you to gain 150 pounds so by the end of these four months you'll weight 390."
"Thats... a lot." Kristoff murmured.
"It sure is. BUT We'll add an extra 10 pounds on to put you at an even 400." Hans said, "You can get dressed now."

         Kristoff started to get dressed when he decided to ask Hans a question, "So... those guys in the house?"
"My brothers." Hans said, "Gaining runs in the family; four of them gain only muscle, four of them only fat, and the last four do both. I'm the only encourager. You can leave your shirt off, by the way."
Once dressed, minus his shirt, Hans smiled and patted a spot on the bed next to him, "Lets get started." As if on cue a chef entered the room with an XXL pepperoni pizza, a pile of bread sticks, 10 chicken wings, and a gallon of root beer.
"You... expect me to eat ALL that?" Kristoff asked.
"I sure do." Hans said with a grin.
15513112211.title: Meeting Hans.

choices: Kristoff later recounts the experience with Sven and they talk
155131122111.content:
"I don't know..." Kristoff said looking at the table laden with food. "Doesn't this seem a bit much?" Hans looked at him.
"You want to get bigger right? Enough to not get kicked off the team?"
"Yeah," Kristoff said.
"Then yes, this is just fine. We'll see how much you can handle and go from there." Kristoff sighed, as he nodded.
"Fine. Let's just get this over with." Kristoff had eaten some of this just fine individually. He could easily eat those ten wings and breadsticks for sure. It was the pizza that he wasn't confident that he'd be able to follow with nor the root beer. He didn't usually drink sodas so this was going to be an experience. It was also incredibly awkward sitting there shirtless with Han's eying him. Kristoff was proud of his buff muscular trained body but the way Hans was staring at him so fixedly was really weird and distracting. Trying to ignore the sense of being under a microscope, Kristoff picked up the wings and started eating.

The wings were actually quite good and the sauce was phenomenal. Sucking the juicy chicken down, Kristoff tried to focus on the positives. For example, he was going to be able to eat a bunch of really good food and in any amount and quantity he wanted. The downside was that he was going to get fat. He had never had a belly before but during this adventure he was going to have to put on quite a bit of weight. He'll lose his famous muscle abs that everyone wanted beneath a layer of jiggly pudge and it was going to blow his mind. At least he had a fat friend so he wouldn't be alone, and he was not the only one who was going to have to put on weight for the team. They all did but it was unfair that he had to put on the most. He was curious how the others were going to do it. A positive was that he got to actually taste delicious food since it wasn't like he needed to worry about the fat content now. The downside was he was going to get fat. Ugh this was awful. At least Sven wasn't going to mind. If anything, he seemed a bit too interested as well in seeing Kristoff gain weight. Sven sure was a mix of contradictions: both smart but dumb, muscular but fat, lover of carrots and lover of junk food. He had to remember to take a picture because he wanted to see Kristoff before and after.

Dripping some sauce, Kristoff moved to clean it but Hans shook his head. "You can do that later. Please continue." So Kristoff did, licking his lips as he finished the last wing. Next, Kristoff moved onto the pile of breadsticks. This was going to be a lot of bread but the breadsticks sure were good. Ripping off pieces, Kristoff stuffed them into his mouth and chewed. The breadsticks were the easy part but Kristoff was beginning to feel a bit full. Unfortunately he had a lot more to go before stopping. With a smile Kristoff finished the breadsticks before turning to the pizza. He cringed, thinking especially of how much calories from the bread and cheese would stick around but the goal was to gain weight. He just had to keep that in mind but it was hard since this new quest went against everything he had ever done. Trying not to cringe, Kristoff took a slice and sniffed it. It smelled delicious but also turned his stomach in knots since he rarely had pizza and he was feeling satisfied from the wings and breadsticks. He looked at Hans who smiled encouragingly and Kristoff was shocked by one of the most beautiful smiles he had ever seen. Hans motioned to the pizza and Kristoff swallowed. All of a sudden he didn't want to disappoint Hans so he took the bite of the first slice and moaned in delight. As sickening as it was, it was just as delicious and tempting and now that he had taken a bit, it was much easier to eat it. Chewing and swallowing, he moved his way through the thick cheesy pizza, unknowingly making the most amazing keening and sounds of pleasure noise. Hans had to shift legs a couple times and work hard to maintain his brilliant encouraging face when all he wanted to do was have Kristoff above or below him.

When Kristoff first came in for his session there were a couple distinct emotions Hans had felt. One was approval of the client. Kristoff had an amazing body and face and although he hadn't mentioned yet, Hans really was a big fan of the golden blonde wonder on the hockey field. He looked to have great potential as a client as well. The other feeling was wanting to strip off all Kristoff's clothes and fuck him hard. It wouldn't have particularly mattered who was on top first, whether it was Kristoff or him, both would be amazing. Finally, the fantasy and soon to be reality of Kristoff with extra weight was utterly phenomenal and it was all Hans could do not to freak out in front of him. Shaking his head, Hans tried to focus on Kristoff then almost lost control again. Kristoff's belly was bloated out, the abs stretched around his rounded out stomach. Kristoff was on his fifth piece and there were splatters of cheese and sauce that had unknowingly fallen from his mouth and landed on his thick beefy chest with perk nipples. Hans wanted to lean over, lick it off, and then latch onto and suck that delicious chest. Sure he had brothers that had bigger but that would be kind of weird if he did that to them, but there was something about Kristoff's that was just especially appealing. He even liked the thin delicate golden chest hairs and usually Hans liked them smooth-shaven.

Somehow he avoided doing anything and as Kristoff slowed down, Hans kept a straight face as he gave encouragement. "Just a little more," "almost finished," that's great," "you're going to get big in no time!" Kristoff had almost given in a few times but with the encouragement and belly rubs that almost made Hans crack, Kristoff was poked, prodded, cajoled, and soothed into somehow finishing the pizza to both their surprise since Kristoff only rarely ate pizza as a treat. Leaning back, Kristoff rubbed his bloated stomach and let out a loud burp.

"UUUUUUUUURRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP, that was....that was...I don't even know," Kristoff groaned. "Am I dead?"
"No, you're still alive." Hans said.
"Yeah-uuuuuuurrrrrpppp-should have figured. I'm in pain." Kristoff drummed his fingers against his bloated stomach that was rounded farther than it had ever been before that the abs were not visible then. The bloated ball sat in his lap and looked pretty darn solid. Hans was eager to touch it. With a nod from Kristoff, Hans eagerly grabbed it feeling the heft. For a moment his mask slipped and Kristoff saw just how into it Hans was. That would have ordinarily freaked him out but he was kind of out of it and Han's rubbing and soothing circular motions eased the utter distended pain of his stomach so he was cool with Hans touching him. Kristoff was relieved when Hans touched a couple of spots and allowed to relieve the pressure in his stomach. Eventually the pain faded and was replaced by erogenous pleasure from the feel of Hans's smooth fingers rubbing it and Kristoff enjoyed the massage. This wasn't so bad now. This actually felt quite good and he loved the feel of Hans's long slender fingers touching him. Hans sure knew his stuff. Leaning back he let Hans take care of him, occasionally burping as pressure was released and Kristoff was feeling better than he had in a long time. Who knew he was under so much stress? Losing to those Sentinels, being embarrassed, strict workouts and panic, he could finally relax. This was weird yes. But who knows, maybe he could learn to like it? Especially with Hans helping him. Finding his eyes closing, they snapped open when he felt Hans let go and Kristoff struggled to sit up to see what he was doing, his belly slapping against his legs. Hans was bringing out the soda and all of a sudden Kristoff was in a panic again.

"Is that really necessary?" he asked Hans. "I mean I'm pretty full now, I might pop if I drink all that." Hans looked at him with a friendly expression.
"No you won't. And don't worry. I won't make you drink all of it."
"You won't?"
"No, you did a good job. Even better than I thought you would for your first time and being an obsessive nutritionist."
"Uh...thanks?" Kristoff said.

"But you are going to drink some," Hans sighed as he grabbed Kristoff's chin and tilted his head up as he poured root beer into Kristoff's mouth. Kristoff was surprised by the move and he missed some, sticky rivulets traveling down his chest. Kristoff tried to struggle but Hans was stronger than he looked and Kristoff was too stuffed and laden with food to put up much of a protest as Hans continued pouring root beer down Kristoff's throat. It was either swallow or choke and Kristoff quickly got used to the rhythm, shooting daggers at Hans from his eyes for the unexpected surprise. It was fascinating, watching Kristoff's thick throat move as he swallowed and Hans marveled at the beauty. Usually his sessions weren't so erotic feeling but then, he never had anyone so gorgeous and perfect. Kristoff had the perfect body for all sorts of gaining be it extreme muscle, fat, or the muscular-fat they were doing. He would look good in every variant and there was just something about him. As it was though, Hans imagined Kristoff with that built padded chest, even huger biceps and triceps, huge pecs and thighs with a big solid gut. His abs were a thing of the past and Kristoff's large tank needed constant fueling to stay in it's perfect rounded solid shape. Hans would feed him rubbing that sexy massive body and feel all over while Kristoff ate and smiled at him, saying wonderful things of how much he likes and desires Hans. Then after the feeding was done, they'd lay together and Hans would play with the massive gut and they'd make sweet love...

Kristoff's choking noises interrupted Han's fantasy. Looking down he saw Kristoff's wet face where he spilled root beer and that sensuous mouth twisted in a frown.

"What are you doing?" Kristoff demanded of Hans. Hans shrugged helplessly, embarrassed.
"Oops?"
155131122111.title: Kristoff's first eating session.

1551311221111.content:
Kristoff stood and examined himself. He hadn’t had to go to work for the last week but he was finally assigned a shift again with Sven. ‘Sven isn’t going to be able to recognize me,’ Kristoff mused, running his fingers up and down his stomach. Okay, that was pushing it and he hadn’t changed that much yet but he certainly looked and felt different. Two weeks of meeting with Hans for daily stuffing sessions had already make a mark on his body. Kristoff still kind of felt conflicted but he wanted to win and make people proud and if this is what it took, then so be it. In just two weeks time his sculpted abs had been submerged under the onslaught of fattening things Hans obtained or cooked up each day and replaced by a pudgy layer that protruded a little more each day and now sucking in, he could no longer find a hint of abs even on an empty stomach. In fact, Kristoff was now sporting a little belly marking the beginnings of a gut which stuck out a few inches. He found his pants harder to zip up but after sucking in and bouncing a little, he managed to get them on and zipped close. His stomach only hung out over a little and getting his shirt on, it still fit but was snugger than he was used to and emphasized his little belly more than he liked. When he stretched, the very bottom of his belly briefly peeked out from underneath before he dropped his hands.

“Okay then, time to go to work.” He wasn’t sure how to react, being surrounded by icecream. He had found he was beginning to get hungrier and crave more food to fill his stomach after only a few sessions with Hans and his stomach capacity had certainly jumped. Hans was impressed by how much Kristoff had improved in only a few days and upped the ante a couple times to make sure Kristoff wouldn’t leave without being so stuffed full he literally couldn’t eat anymore. Hans definitely was serious about his job and Kristoff tried to match and so far with Hans’s help he had. As he had spent so much time with Hans, he hadn’t been out so much in public so no one had seen the newer bigger Kristoff yet. He wondered if anyone would notice? He certainly felt noticeable. Walking in, he got behind the counter where Egbert Weselton stood waiting.

“Welcome back Kristoff!” He said excitedly. “Good to have you working again, we always get more customers when you’re in.” For an icecream guy, Egbert was surprisingly skinny. Then again, he was more of an accountant for the store. When Kristoff moved to the back, Egbert followed instead of going off to do whatever he does when Kristoff and Sven were out front. Kristoff guessed when it wasn't playing with money, he played computer games or read and only pretended to be working when they came in but he wasn’t going to question as they were paid reasonably well for a low-wage paying job and Egbert was very easy-going except when they were full of people.

“Hey, hold up a moment,” Egbert said. Kristoff turned to face him.
“Yes?” he asked.
“Something is different about you.”
“Really?”
“Yeah, I don’t think that was there before,” Egbert said pointing to the noticeable curve of Kristoff’s stomach.
“No, I don’t think so either,” Kristoff said. He stood still as Egbert came and poked it.
“Well I never thought I’d see the day. Is something going on?”
“The hockey team is bulking up a little to beat the Sentinels.”

“Hmm, I thought something was going on. No wonder I’ve been seeing more of you guys around, even with you on break. I see you’ve been doing some yourself but I got to say that seeing the size of those monsters, especially the dynamic duo of Snow and Thor, you and the rest have a ways to go.”

“Oh I know,” Kristoff groaned. “I don’t know where they came from but they’ve made this a real pain.”
“I’ll say. I hope you guys succeed though.” Egbert winked. Kristoff smiled back as Egbert went to his office. All of a sudden Sven came bounding in.
“Hey, sorry I’m…late.” Sven said as he moved behind the counter towards Kristoff and his voice trailed off as he stared. “Oh my god,” Sven said.
“Is it really that noticeable already?” Kristoff asked.
“What happened?”

“I’ve been eating with Hans for the last couple weeks as you know. As you can see, I’ve already been making some progress.” Sven laid his hand on Kristoff’s stomach and rubbed it.

“Aww yeah man I say you have. I can’t believe you have a bonifide belly already, well I knew it was going to happen, but not so soon. This is just so weird.”

“You do know that I am on a very strict nearly impossible timeline right? I have less than six months to gain at least 150 lbs. I’m going to be freaking huge.”

“I’ll say, that’s um…wait wasn’t it four?”

“Coach was exaggerating. The real date isn’t for six months and he misspoke when he said four as he told Hans. Either way though, it is still going to be a pain. Especially practicing and playing games in the meanwhile.”

Sven paused and did the calculation in his head. “25 pounds a month which definitely is going to be tricky, especially when you plateau and it becomes a real struggle to gain anymore. That’s a little more reasonable than 37.5 but still going to be difficult. But how much have you gained so far since I’ve last seen you?”

“I think like 17-18 pounds or something, possibly 20. You can’t believe what my appetite is now.”
“Yeah, as an athlete I totally get that but you know I still out eat you anyday of the week,” Sven smirked. He patted his larger stomach and grinned.
“One day soon I’ll actually beat you and be bigger than that little stomach you call a gut.” Kristoff said.

“Not for a while yet." They got into business mode as the first trickle of customers came in for the afternoon shift and word had gotten out Kristoff was in. Nobody else really seemed to notice anything was that much different or they just weren't saying. A number of other team members came in throughout the day ordering large orders which Kristoff and Sven gnerously scooped out extra for. They saw Flynn, Hiccup, Jack, Phoebus, Guy, Nod, and Sully that day and they smacktalked and goofed around a bit with Kristoff and Sven. Some of them were sporting growing bellies of their own since they kind of all were under the same requirements, though not as bad as Kristoff's which he unfortunately had talked himself into. At least some people were taking this seriously and used the intervening weeks to gain some weight because Sully was definitely thicker and Phoebus who closest to Kristoff's size was tigher in that shirt he often wore.

Eventually they left and Sven and Kristoff could lock up. Egbert came out from the back then.
"Hey, we got a problem with one of the cooling units which has unexpectedly broken. A bunch of icecream is going to go bad and melt which is a huge waste as well a pain to clean among the expense of fixing the refrigeration. We can't keep the icecream but I was just thinking you guys could eat it and solve at least that problem until it could be fixed."

"Don't worry sir, leave it to us," Sven said smiling as he nudged Kristoff. "It'll be cleared in a jiffy."
"Uh yeah," Kristoff said. Egbert smiled delightedly.
"Oh good wonderful. I'll let you to at it and lock up when you're done. See you later." He walked out.

They went to the back where the room temperature was normal which wouldn't keep the icecream. Most of the stock had been sold but there were still at least 12 gallon containers of various flavors. Sven went out and got them actual spoons and smiled. "Free icecream, my favorite. Bottoms up my friend. I can't wait to see your new appetite in action, if you're not exaggerating. I've never seen you eat that much icecream so this is going to be interesting."

"Trust me, I can do this," Kristoff said. They each grabbed a container and started shoveling in. Kristoff had gotten chocolate chip cookie dough and Sven the Rocky Road. They went silent for a bit as they steadfastly began eating.

Kritsoff had to admit he had been missing out as icecream was amazing. Okay it wasn't like he had never had it, but now that he was no longer inhibiting himself and allowed himself to revel in the taste, it tasted amazing. He understood how Sven got fat off this stuff, this stuff was great! He had to gain weight anyhow and this was a nice way of doing it. He was going to have to reccomend Hans getting icecream some time but for now he just had to live in the moment. Focusing on the zone, Kristoff turned his thoughts inward and just allowed the sensation of taste. Sven having more experience was faster but it wasn't officially a contest and he was actually keeping up as his spoon scooped the bottom just a minute later than Sven finished the first and Kristoff moved onto the second as well. Kristoff was an eating machine which while slower than Sven, kept a good consistent speed of closely finishing behind as they consumed another gallon. Kristoff felt his stomach stretch but it was still distant. He had gotten good at ignoring the sensation with Hans and how to keep going until it was literally impossible to will away. Sven didn't seem phased at all and onward they went. At around 3.5 gallons Kristoff really then started to feel the icecream stretch in him, his stomach getting tighter. His shirt had risen up, unable to keep his bloated stomach covered and his hands were too numb and awkward to undo his pants which were getting really tight on him. He could only think of a couple ways to relieve this obnoxious pressure so he took the remaining gallons which were semi-liquified and drank them down, spooning to get guzzle it down as quickly as he good before he gave out. Groaning, he tossed the fifth gallon container away and stretched. With an audible pop his pants bottom blew out and his belly splashed out as Kristoff sighed in relief.
1551311221111.title: Storage Malfunction

15513112211112.content:
The next hockey practice was short. It wasn't an actual practice yet but a weigh-in to see if people were keeping on track with the proscribed regimen. Kristoff was nervous because while he was onboard with the whole gaining thing, it was still weird to be publicly gaining so much and showing off how fat he was getting. His clothes were definitely getting too small to cover him and barely holding together. Hans wanted Kristoff to keep wearing them until Kristoff literally burst out of them and they were getting there. Kristoff had to suck in buttoning any of his pants and some he just could not get around to hold his bigger gut. Changing into his uniform that day was a relief just to take off the pants that were deeply constricting him, especially after a lunch meal to Han's texted specifications. His team uniform which had once fit perfect, only came down part way and the bottom half of his belly stuck out over the stretchpants.

Kristoff was the last to arrive and so he was nervous as he went in but he needn't have worried. The entire team was there and they certainly took advantage of coach's command to put on weight. Kristoff was up there among the most changed, but there were some others who looked just as heavy, if not more so. Kristoff was the one under the most pressure but they were all feeling the heat in order to stay on and not disappoint their school and supporters. Everybody had a noticeablely protruding stomach, and most of the team had grown guts where there had once been rippling abs. It made Kristoff feel better since everybody was more or less in the same boat. Sully and Phoebus were the biggest after Kristoff but everyone was looking thick which gave Kristoff hope that they could do this. The room which had been buzzing with group conversation hushed when Coach entered the room.

"As you all know, we're bulking up to take down the enemy, mainly our rivals the Sentinels who now have the greatest challenge we have ever faced in the form of the blonde beasts Snow and Thor. Everything else was and is cake compared to those. If we can at least reasonably take them on and not have you guys trampled to the ground by a single smash, I do believe we can win the championship again this year, despite our poor record previously with them." He looked them over and smiled. "Looking at you all, it looks like you guys took this seriously, as you should have. We will have to practice our manuevering and strategy at your heavier weight but first we need to check that you guys are on track because there is only a couple months left before the championship, and I refuse to hand it over because of some overgrown monsters who, let's be honest, probably aren't students but nothing can be proven against. Anyhow, let's get this show on the road. Kristoff, you head on up first." Coach pointed to the special scales that supposedly weighed up to a ton they had. Kristoff walked over, his belly bouncing slightly as he got on.

"245," Coach called out. "That is how you do it people. 30 lbs in a month is pretty impressive and hopefully you can keep about the same pace. Next we have Sully." Sully who had always been bigger bellywise than Kristoff ended up being 240, a solid 22 lb gain. Phoebus their solid defense was at 230 which was a decent 18 pounds. Phoebus grinned widely as he got off the scale as he patted his lightly furred stomach.

"Tadashi, you're up." Their resident nerd and intellectually smartest member got onto the scale, his face uncertain. "225, congratulations. Second highest gain after Kristoff at with 25 lbs from an even 200. I am impressed."

"Aunt Cass's bakery helps a lot and this way, Aunt Cass doesn't have to worry about waste or stress-eating herself. It's a win-win-win." Coach nodded.
"Wasabi." Their other science jock nerd was nervous as he got on. He hadn't gained all that much and his belly compared to others was smaller. He was already fairly big so it was hard. "Looks like 235, a 12 lb difference. I expect you to do better Wasabi."

"Yes Coach," Wasabi said. Role call continued with Flynn, Nod, Jack, and Hiccup. Flynn weighed in at 215, putting in a 17 lb difference from earlier. Nod who looked a lot like Flynn pulled in at 210, up 15 pounds. Jack weighed in at 200 which while tiny compared to his teammates, was actually pretty significant as it was up 24 lbs from his light-weight 176. No one had expected the lithe Jack to gain that much since he had always been thin and ripped. Hiccup also weighed in at 200 tying with Jack which surprised them both as Hiccup had always been bulkier at 185.

"Looks like we're in the same weight class, Jack" Hiccup said. They listened as the next mate was called.
"Jim." Jim got on there and it landed around 213. "213, a 13 lb gain. Not awful but could be better." After the rest of the team had been called, Coach came and stood in front of them.

"Remember we are trying to gain at least 100, or more pounds. In other words, a minimum of 17 pounds a month for all of you, preferably more. Of course Kristoff has the toughest mandate at 30 lbs a month or more which he passed admirably. We should do all we can especially to help him reach his goal. If we all do our parts, we can obtain victory. Those who haven't met their quota need to make up for it by the next weigh in or there will be trouble. There will be a practice later but for now you are dismissed those who passed. Those who haven't will go to the cafeteria to start on catching up with the rest of the group." Krisoff sighed in relief for having passed. Wasabi, Jim, Hiccup and others who had not passed went to the cafeteria. Of course, he might as well do the same because maintaining this relentless pace was going to get extremely difficult and Kristoff was kind of scared for what would happen when his body would adjust and make it extremely difficult.
15513112211112.title: 1 month Weigh-In

155131122111122.content:
A week had passed since that first team weigh-in and a chill ran down Kristoff's spine as we down the street; the cold halloween night air making him shiver as it brushed along the underside of his slightly exposed belly. The warm black and orange sweater the beefy blonde was wearing had fit him perfectly the previous year but this year it was much tighter and clung to his new belly, the very bottom of it showing off no matter how hard Kristoff pulled it down. Kristoff quickly made his way inside from his parked car to Aunt Cass' diner, pushing the unlocked door open despite the 'CLOSED' sign hanging on the door. Once inside he spotted two of his teammates, Sulley and Tadashi, in the back corner booth.

         "Hey, guys." Kristoff said, taking a seat next to Tadashi.
"Hey, yourself," Tadashi replied, pushing a plate of leftover cookies to Kristoff, "Eat up! Aunt Cass needs us to get rid of the leftover halloween treats."
"I know - Sulley wouldn't stop texting me about it. All the texts said were 'FREE FOOD AT CASS'S FREE FOOD AT CASS'S'."
"Hey," Sulley said after swallowing down his fifth coffin shaped brownie, "In MY defense... its free food."
"He has a point." Tadashi said, which made Kristoff shrug.
"But," Sulley said, pointing to his right, "The real reason we had you come over is because there is a LOT of food we need to get rid of." Kristoff looked to his left and saw stacks on stacks of halloween themed pastries; cakes, cupcakes, cookies, brownies, everything.
"So you need somebody to help scarf it all down?" Kristoff asked.
"Basically, yeah." Tadashi responded, "Aunt Cass hates throwing food out."
Kristoff sighed, "Might as well."

         Eagerly, Sully got up from his seat with an audible 'oof' and hurried over to the counter, carrying back all of the food in his beefy arms.
"Lets make this interesting, though," Sully replied, setting the food on the table and dropping into his seat, "Lets see who can eat the most?"
"An eat-off?" Kristoff asked, chuckling.
"Yeah, man, lets do it! It'll be fun!" Sulley said, excitedly, before looking at Tadashi, "Don't you agree, man?"
"No, he's right, it does sound fun." Tadashi replied, leaning forward and separating the food three ways.

         When Tadashi was finished each of the guys had one full cake each (festively decorated like a graveyard), 15 cupcakes, 10 brownies, and a tray of at least 14 cookies each. Tadashi pulled out his cellphone and set a timer, "Whoever eats the most in 5 minutes wins."
Kristoff sighed and shook his head, "Guess I don't have a choice, huh?"
"Nope!" Sully said just as Tadashi hit the button on his phone and the timer started.

         Tadashi and Kristoff both quickly grabbed a fork from the cup of utensils and dug into the cake, the biggest things in front of them, but Sully used his big hands and just dug right in. Sulley shoved handfuls of cake into his mouth, chewing fast and swallowing down big chunks as he did. Kristoff kept up a good pace, already downing close to half of his cake but out of the corner of his eye he noticed something that shocked him; Tadashi was already finished with his cake and had moved on to this brownies, shoveling in two at a time. It shocked Kristoff, which caused him to slow down, but he returned his focus to the cake and went right back to eating.

         With the cake finished at roughly the same time both Sulley and Kristoff moved on to the brownies, scarfing them down as quickly as he could. The cake was already sitting heavily in Kristoff's belly, slowing him down and filling him up as he shoves brownie after brownie into his gut. The alarm on Tadashi's phone dings and all three guys stopped just as Kristoff has swallowed the last brownie.

         "Looks like I win!" Tadashi said, patting his rounder belly.
"How?" Kristoff asked, honestly shocked, "HOW did YOU of all people manage to eat EVERY SINGLE PASTRY in 5 minutes but neither of US could finish half?"
"More than half." Sulley said, licking his fingers clean, "I got in 4 cupcakes before the alarm."
"Well, believe it or not, I've actually got a huge appetite." Tadashi said, a little embarrassed.
"I'll say..." Kristoff said, amazed at how much Tadashi had packed away, "With the way you eat you could be the biggest guy on the team!"
"Yeah, but thats your job," Tadashi said, poking Kristoff's belly, "It did feel nice to let loose, though."
"Tell me about it." Sulley said, scarfing down another cupcake.
Kristoff cracked a smile, the first time he had when it came to all this gaining stuff, but being with friends made it easier. Sure, Hans knew what he was doing when it came to this stuff, but being with his buddies made it seem more fun.
The three guys hung out there for a few hours, joking around and stuffing down more treats than he ever thought he could handle by himself.
155131122111122.title: Halloween

choices: Thanksgiving meal with Sven and his family
Thanksgiving meal with Sven and his family
1551311221111221.content:
After halloween, Kristoff made sure to spend a couple of times a week hanging with Tadashi and Sully in addition to meetings with Hans and Sven. Sven was still his somewhat closest friend but Kristoff had discovered a lot about some of his teammates, especially Tadashi, and he was glad to finally have the guy as his friend. They may have been teammates but prior to spending that time together on Halloween, they hadn't really been friends. He hadn't grown up with Tadashi and at practice Tadashi was entirely focused on it and Kristoff just honestly hadn't known much about him. It turns out that he is really cool and he had the thing where Kristoff just felt comfortable with him. Eating with him and Sully was fun and Kristoff was beginning to really enjoy himself with them.

So he hung out with all of them. Hans was pleased with his progress and Kristoff's sort of change of heart regarding the situation. Kristoff was starting to enjoy being big, being the biggest on the team and kicking it with some awesome bros. He complained less to Hans and smiled more, and was even doing some things of his own initiative. There were still some slight reservations but overall, Kristoff enjoyed the feeling of big. He began to see why people sought it out, the feeling of power and placement. Once he got more used to his heavier center of gravity and acclimated to the feeling of bouncing belly rather than a muscular ripped six-pack, he actually found he played better. After all, they were skating and with heavier mass, he got more momentum and power and he was only marginally slowed down at turning. He wondered why he had never came up with this before because with only minor decreases in initial acceleration and turning, everything else went way better. He was unstoppable in the one on one scrimmages and even playing four against him.

Hans was right that after the first thirty it got easier before getting harder again but right now, Kristoff was coasting on the easy side while he could. His appetite had dramatically increased and he spent a long time eating. Though he still simply could not out-eat Tadashi when they hung out, he kept improving as did his stomach. It was joked that he kept growing everytime he saw them which he was with all the help he was getting. Tadashi and Sully were growing too as was everyone on the team but they three were the fastest unsurprisingly. Aunt Cass was more than happy to have them around so food wouldn't go to waste and she liked feeding people. Hiro sometimes came down and kept them company, amazed by how big his brother Tadashi and his friends were getting.

Near the end of the month, Kristoff was probably weighing at least 260-65 if not more. He was well on track as he could only imagine what the final days would bring considering it was Turkey month. While most of his old clothes no longer obviously fit, he tried to take some of the loose fitting ones that still managed to fit that had been bought for his size in the 240s. He managed to put on a nice button up as Hans requested, though it was sort of tight and clingy around his stomach. Kristoff could sort of guess what Hans had in mind and he had to admit, he was sort of curious himself to see.

Kristoff was again driven over to Han's mansion and Hans was eagerly awaiting for him at the door. He smiled as he saw Kristoff in the tight clinging dress-shirt. Kristoff sure was different than how he had been almost two months ago. He was big and more proud of it with a manly gut. He was still very built in the chest and shoulders though the belly was edging past and there was a swaying motion and jiggle when he took a step. He also had a delightful butt that his slacks huggged against in the most intriguing way. Hans lead Kristoff to the set dining room on which there was a massive array for a feast.

"Please, dig in and help yourself," Hans told Kristoff, giving him a little slap on the belly. Kristoff was used to these displays so he wasn't freaked out like the first couple times, but it was still a little too intimate for him for someone who was not on his hockey team or a close friend. He wouldn't mind Tadashi or Sully doing it but it felt weird from Hans. Kristoff liked it more when Hans gave him bellyrubs after huge meals because Hans was godly amazing at those and it helped so much, but other touches were frankly a little creepy from someone who he didn't know so well. Despite seeing Hans multiple times, Kristoff still didn't really know much about him other than his interest and talent in helping others gain. He didn't know Hans's family that well either since while he saw them occasionally, he rarely got to talk to them other than the occasional hi and it was strange. He didn't understand the dynamic or if Hans loved his family. He seemed somewhat distant and cool towards them whenever they did appear, except when it came to their growth. Kristoff didn't hear much but Hans was also his brothers' trainer for all the goals.

Kristoff did as directed, piling his plate high with turkey, mashed potatoes, stuffing, corn, etc. The scent of it all was delicious and his belly growled hungrily in anticipation, as it started to do whenever in the presence of food. He eagerly started eating, gasping in pleasure. It was exquisitely cooked to perfection and tasted phenomenal. A couple of Hans's brothers wandered in and filled their own plates to eat and while Kristoff was curious to see if he could finally learn something, he was much more concerned with eating and filling his hungry eager belly at the moment. It was probably similar for them as well since the only sounds that were made were the little moans, gasps, burps, grunts, groans etc from excellent food. When Kristoff finished a plate, he got up for more and the food seemed almost limitless. To drink, he drank glass after glass of delicious sparkling cider that Kristoff quickly lost count of with plate after plate of food. After 6 utterly massive plate sizes of turkey, potatoes, and everything else, Kristoff began to feel pressure reach his food focused brain. His heavily laden gut pushed strongly against the waist of his formerly loose slacks and also against his button-up, straining the fabric. It looked like he was going to burst at any moment. He didn't, though he had to relieve pressure, undoing the button of his slacks, letting his stressed gut out and burping multiple huge burps. The buttons somehow held which made Hans's eyebrows twitch a little as he was hoping to see them pop off as Kristoff's big hugely bloated beautiful belly spilled out majestically. Fortunately, there was still dessert.

Hans clapped his hands and kitchen staff appeared seemingly out of nowhere bringing in the pies. Kristoff groaned as he saw them as he knew they were going to be delicious. When the help left and Kristoff scooped out a huge slice for himself and tasted it, he knew he was right. It was, like all of Hans's meals, absolutely delicious. He tried to hurry though because if he spent to long enjoying it, he might throw up as he was stuffed like a turkey himself. He got the huge first slice and a second one almost as large before it became to much and he had to rest. As he did so however, trying to relax his belly outward, there was zing as a button popped off. Then another and another as 5 of the buttons of the button-up popped off and his belly spilled forward from its confined space. He looked and felt absolutely huge and he groaned as he touched it. It was heavy and felt like it was going to pop if Kristoff wasn't careful. Hans placed his hands on it reverently. It was one of the most perfect looking bellies he had ever seen on a really beautiful and attractive person. He had to preserve this memory. He took out his camera and photographed it in all its glory from different angles. Kristoff had looked stuffed other times but this time was just perfection. He looked massive and powerful, but also vulnerable and in need of relief. Hans reverently placed his hands on the solid mass and gently rubbed and kneaded, enjoying the orgasmic look of exhilaration on Kristoff's face as he moaned in relief.

"Yes, that's it..." Kristoff groaned. Hans smiled as he did just, happily rubbing Kristoff's bulk.
After a while, Kristoff felt his phone ring. Getting it out of his pocket, he heard Sven start talking asking him what time he was going to be over for dinner. Kristoff groaned as he realized he had somehow completely forgotten he was also going to have thanskgiving with Sven. Shit, he was going to have to eat there today. He winced as he stood up awkwardly, his belly protruding in front of him even more so and feeling oh so heavy. All he wanted to do was sleep off this meal but he needed to go to Sven's.

"I'm sorry, I need to go," Kristoff told Hans.
"To where?" Hans asked curious.
"I am having thanksgiving with Sven today as well...which somehow slipped my mind," Kristoff groaned. Hans froze in shock and then smirked.
"You're in for some trouble now."
"Yes I am. Do you have any clothes for me to wear? These obviously won't do." Kristoff gestured to the fact he was just in underwear and a destroyed button-up."
"I think I have some clothes that will fit you," Hans said. He left and was soon back, carrying a set of clothes.

"You can borrow these. They're a pair of one of my brothers. He won't miss them." Hans had to help dress Kristoff as he couldn't really do it himself. After that, he drove Kristoff over to Sven's, smirking mischeviously as he dropped Kristoff off. "You can do it, I believe in you! Send pictures." Hans drove off, wishing he could have watched in person how this was going to play out.
1551311221111221.title: Thanksgiving meal with Hans

choices: Sven hates pumpkin pie and makes Kristoff eat all ten.
Kristoff and Sven meet up with Sully and Tadashi at a buffet.
15513112211112211.content:
Kristoff groaned as he readjusted his shirt; making sure that it was tucked in before making his way to Sven's front door. The shirt Kristoff had borrowed from Hans' brother would have fit perfectly under normal circumstances but Kristoff has just eaten an entire thanksgiving meal big enough to feed a family of four. The beefy hockey player grunted as he struggled to tuck in the dress shirt but once in Kristoff noticed that a little bit of his stuffed gut was peeking through the gaps between the buttons. Kristoff sighed - there was no was this shirt would last the night.

         When Kristoff got to the front door he winced a little - his belly was so big and packed with food that it stuck out farther than he expected and it pressed against the door unexpectedly. Kristoff grunted as he took a step back before ringing the doorbell. In no time at all Sven answered the door and suddenly Kristoff felt overdressed - his fat best friend was wearing a pair of work out shorts that clearly fit him 100 pounds ago and a tank top that was stretched tight across his gut, "KRISTOFF!! Bought time you got here, buddy!"

         "Hey, Sven. Sorry I'm late; I had to go to Hans' place first." Kristoff said, pointing to the massive gut his shirt could barely contain.
"Hey, no worries!" Sven said, putting both hands on Kristoff's belly, "Whoa - he did a number on you, Kris. Think you can still eat?"
"I'll do my best.," Kristoff said as he made his way in, "So, where are your folks?"
"Out of town!" Sven replied, "They decided to spend thanksgiving with my aunt but I told them I was staying behind to have dinner with you, big guy."
"Oh! Sorry you missed out on the visit then." Kristoff said, feeling a little bad.
"Don't worry, bro! Besides, my mom made dinner her for the two of us anyway. Let's chow down like only two bros can!"

         Kristoff followed Sven into the living where Sven had laid out all the food his mom had prepped for them. Kristoff made an audible gulp at the sight; it was almost as much food as Hans' had cooked. The only plus side was that it was a meal for two - not one. Sven plopped down on the couch and Kristoff followed suit but the second he did his shirt threw in the towel as a loud RIIIIIIIIIIIIIIP filled the air.

         Sven and Kristoff both looked down at Kristoff's huge gut and they were both surprised by what they say; the buttons had stayed on but the fabric right next to them has ripped and there was now a wide, vertical tear that followed along the circumference of Kristoff's gut.
"Those... are some strong buttons." Sven said, snapping a quick pic on his phone and uploading it to his blog.
Kristoff unbottoned the shirt, thankful that the dress pants still fit him (though a bit tight) and tossed it aside, "Well... guess we should eat."

         Sven logged into one of his video streaming accounts and started playing a few episodes of his and Kristoff's favorite sitcom. The two best friends kicked back as they ate - their plates piled high with turkey, ham, mashed potatoes, sweet potatoes, candied yams, stuffing and much more. A few hours went - every minute filled with laughs and more and more food. By the time all the food on the table had been cleared out (save for the 10 pumpkin pies) Sven was as stuffed as Kristoff had been when he arrived and Kristoff's gut was so huge and packed with food he had to lie down, his gut so big he couldn't see past it.

         The hockey player groaned as he rubbed his gut, the button on his pants popped long ago, and before he knew it he was passed out on the living room floor - Sven sleeping on the couch in his own stuffed bliss. Kristoff and Sven both woke up around 8 that next morning, bellies empty but clearly much fatter than the previous day. After the two cleaned up the living room and did dishes-
15513112211112211.title: Thanksgiving at Sven's.

155131122111122111.content:
Sven took a closer look at the pies they had been saving last night and swore. Kristoff came in, the borrowed dress shirt hanging off him unbuttoned.
"What is it?" he asked worried when he heard Sven's scream. "Is everything alright?"
"No everything's not alright. These pies...they're pumpkin, not carrot!" Kristoff sighed in relief that there was nothing actually wrong.
"Oh, you had me worried there for a second. I thought it was something serious."
"This is serious! You know I hate pumpkin pie!" Kristoff shrugged. It still made no sense to him why Sven hated the taste of pumpkin pie yet craved carrot pie which he personally thought was terrible but yeah, Sven was not going to eat those now.

"Ugh, I hate waste too but...hey, you can eat them! You love pie, especially pumpkin!" Kristoff preferred chocolation cream as his top pie choice but pumpkin was a somewhat close second.

"Well, I guess..." Kristoff rubbed his belly, an action that was becoming second nature to him, even when not ridiculously stuffed. There was something comforting about it and it was a lot of fun empty or otherwise. It was farther out than he was used to empty, past his pecs and straining out over his pants. It bounced a little as he rubbed and he made a note to up working out as well because while he was obligated to gain weight, he was not going to jiggle as much as he could prevent it when playing. At the moment though, it was kind of fun and it caught Sven's eye.

"Damn dude, you're getting so huge," Sven said placing his hand on Kristoff's gut. "I still can't believe you're bigger than me in only a couple weeks while it took me over a year to grow this," Sven bumped his gut against Kristoff's.

"Motivation, dedication, hard work...and torture were what got me this far. I do have to thank Hans though." Sven nodded as he rubbed Kristoff's gut.
"Yeah, I have to thank him again too. You think he'll help me sometime?"
"Probably, the guy is certainly into his job of helping people gain. I didn't even know that was a thing, in this way."
"It is."
"No duh, now I know." Kristoff joked, poking Sven. "You got to keep up man, it feels so weird being being chubbier than you of all things. The world is upside down." Sven shrugged.

"Sorry. I love being big but I'm no quicker hurry than what I can naturally do. I'll totally do a couple of sessions with Hans if you think he'll do it but everyday? No thank you. I like being a medium big or whatever I'm meant to be. You on the other other hand were always meant to be a large man." Kristoff paused.

"Yeah, that is true," Kristoff flexed his arms causing Sven to smile and shake his head.
"Jock," he said goodnaturedly. Kristoff tilted his head and Sven rolled his eyes. "Okay okay," Sven squeezed Kristoff's huge bicep which felt like hard rock. "You still got it." Kristoff sighed in relief.

"Whew, now let's eat this pie shall we?" he asked, looking at Sven. Sven nodded.
"Yeah, I don't want to look at these fakes any longer than necessary." Sven unwrapped the first one, cringing his nose against the strong smell of pumpkin. "Ugh, it smells horrible. Kind of like you after practice or a game but worse."

"Oh gee, thanks. How come do you like pumpkins on Halloween then?" Kristoff shot back.

"It's cause you carve it into fun spooky decorations and you don't have to eat it." Kristoff gave him another another eye-roll before looking down at the pie in front of him. It was weird despite the fact that he ate two ridiculous sized repasts the night before that he actually felt hungry now that it was in front of him. His stomach growled approvingly and he couldn't wait to dig in. As soon as Sven came back with a knife and fork, Kristoff was ready to dig in. "Wait a moment," Sven said before he took out a can of whip cream and sprinkled it on top. "You can't have pie without whip cream. I'll bring out the icecream in a bit." As soon as Sven stepped off, Kristoff dove right in.

It was actually really good pumpkin pie, 'Sven doesn't know what he's missing,' Kristoff thought. There was no way he could have eaten it the night before, having to eat all that turkey, mashed potatoes, ham, stuffing, cornbread, and everything else at both Hans's and here but now that he wasn't stuffed like a turkey himself, he was actually excited for this. The thrill of novelty had yet to wear off and it was at times like these Kristoff was still amazed at what he had been missing out on on a strict diet. If he was to be honest with himself, he was ruined on restriction. He would never be able to go back to the bland diet previously as he'd always long for tasty treats but on the other hand, as long as he didn't let himself go and stop working out and be lazy all the time, it was okay and actually helpful. After all, his game had actually improved significantly once he got used to a larger size and gravity pull.

Each slice was absolutely delicious with the whip cream. He finished the first pie in short time. These weren't small pies either but big ones meant for multiple people. Sven's parents knew his appetite and since he was having company, they made sure to get enough for what they thought would last for days.

Sven was impressed at the speed of which Kristoff had eaten the first and brought out the next couple so he wouldn't have to keep going back for pie. He then turned his attention to scooping out a massive serving of icecream into a big bowl while Kristoff worked on the second pie. That one also disappeared quickly and Sven was amazed. He lost track of time while he watched his buddy absolutely devour those pies. Around the 5th pie, Kristoff paused to unbuckled his once again tight pants and sighed with relief as his gut spilled forward free. Letting out a huge belch, Kristoff rubbed his gut in contentment. "UUUUURRRPPP aw yeah, this is nice." Sven walked over and started pulling down Kristoff's pants. "What are you-UUURPP-doing?" Kristoff asked.

"Freeing you even more. You don't need those and it certainly is freeing when not pushing up against pants," Sven also pulled off the unbuttoned dress shirt "or this. Being in a more natural state is much better don't you think?" Kristoff nodded in agreement.

"Good point," he says before continuing to eat the next pie. Now free in just his underwear (and Sven had some naughty thoughts about yanking those off as well but even though they have seen each other, Kristoff was all about respect and that would be rude) he continued.

"Hey, you should eat some icecream before it melts entirely." Kristoff shrugged and switched over to the half-melted icecream and scooped into his mouth. Realizing it was liquid enough by this point, he lifted the bowl up and scooped and dribbled it into his mouth. Most of it made it but there were drips that missed his mouth and trailed down his mouth and chest. Sven blushed, feeling hot. Did the temperature of the room just raise? It took all his restraint not to go over and lick Kristoff clean. Those trails were taunting him though. Such dirty, dirty trails that needed to be licked smooth.

Returning back to the pies, Kristoff ignored the mess for the moment and continued stuffing his face full of pie. Sven shifted back and forth, playing with himself so he didn't launch himself at his bro who wasn't finished yet. But ugh, this was the sexiest thing Sven ever saw and he couldn't believe he was lusting after his mate. Kristoff had always been gorgeous but now he was really turning Sven's buttons. Kristoff slowed down around the ninth pie, breathing heavily as he leaned back in is chair, hands rubbing his bloated stomach desperately.

"Oh..." he groaned before releasing a long, loud, disgusting massive burp. Sven was impressed. He followed it up with a string of aftershock burps that were almost as impressive as he flailed, trying to get comfortable. Sven moved over to help him out, rubbing Kristoff's belly. It was freaking huge and solid. Sven thumped it, causing Kristoff to wince and brought out more burps.

"Uuuuuurrrppp, don't do that," Kristoff complained.
"Sorry, just clearing room," Sven said. "You're going to need it to finish that 10th pie."
"Yeah, I don't think so," Kristoff groaned. "I'm too stuffed right now with all those pies and the feast I had last night. Feasts rather. I've never eaten anywhere near as much food so close together in my life."

"You've done a very good job of it too," Sven said. "Crud, I forgot to be taking continuous photos but here's one now." Sven pulled out his phone and snapped a couple of shots. "Yup, there we go. All set. Now you can finish off that last pie."

"I just said no," Kristoff muttered. Sven tutted.
"I'm disappointed. Here I thought you could do everything but you can't finish a measely 10 pies."
"Neither could you," Kristoff pointed out. "Even if they were carrot. Those pies are huge. I am amazed I could even eat this many."
"Well, you're not leaving until I get rid of this 10th one. You don't want it to go to waste do you?"
"I can take it home later," Kristoff pointed out.
"That's no fun. I want to see you eat it."

"No..." Kristoff started before Sven shoved a sliice in. Chewing quickly, Kristoff glared at Sven. "What are you-" Sven shoved another piece in and another as soon as Kristoff opened his mouth again. Never enough to choke him but just enough to force him to swallow or spit out, and despite protestations, Kristoff swallowed dutifully. Eventually he even opened his mouth willingly as Sven fed him piece after piece, chewing thoughtfully. Eventually he opened his mouth and nothing went it. He had finished all 10 pies.

"How was that?" Sven asked.
"Fuck you," Kristoff said, but without anger and smiled slightly to let Sven know he wasn't that mad. Sven grinned as he wiped his finger around Kristoff's mouth and stuck it in, letting Kristoff suck the last bit of pie down. Sven then leaned down and licked the dried icecream trail that had been calling him with his tongue.
155131122111122111.title: Sven hates pumpkin pie and makes Kristoff eat a...

choices: would love too, count me in
can't make it I have an appointment
1551311221111221111.content:
Kristoff got a text to meet with the team at school for a surprise weigh-in. He was a bit shocked as he thought he didn’t gain enough to meet the weigh-in goal. It’s a good thing that Sven lent him some his dad’s clothes as his current clothes were several sizes to small and were past being held together. Kristoff then changed into his uniform only to noticed how small and tight it is. It showed off how fat he has gotten. He felt that if he bent in any direction his uniform will tear and fall off. His hockey tee stopped at his belly button as it highlighted his large gut and his pants barely got up his thick thighs.

Like last time he was the last to arrive and was not so nervous as he saw Sully and Tadashi. When he entered weight room the room was buzzing with conversation and some players were telling jokes and some people were laughing at the joke, while other were comparing belly sizes. He saw the rest of the time and it looked like that Sully and Tadashi had really blown up as he noticed their physique were bigger than their chow down during Halloween. He also noticed that Phobus came quickly behind them in terms of added size with Jack and Nod coming behind him. He also noticed that people were a bit more relaxed with their new gain as he saw Flynn, Jack and Nod were comparing belly size. When the Coach entered the room the conversations stopped at once.

“You know the drill, bulk up and eat more to take down our rival team the Sentinels and Kristoff is our weapon against the blonde beast Snow and Thor. I believe that you guys are on the track to not being smash be a single blow and we may see the winning champions at the end of this road.” He then smiled at the team.” Look you guy you all grew while I hope you pass the goal line only the scale will tell. Remember that we have to practice our maneuvering and strategy as you guy are still adjusting to you heavier bodies. Alright let’s get the show on the road. Kristoff your up first. “said the Coach as he motioned Kristoff to get on the scale. Kristoff walked were he stood to the scale with the belly slightly jiggling with each step he took.

“290” Coach whistled “That’s a perfect role model for you guy to follow. A 45 lbs in two months that is impressive and hopefully you will continue this gaining pace. What have you been eating?” said coach he jokily poked Kristoff belly only for it to jiggle like jello. Kristoff inwardly let out a sigh as he met the weigh in goal but was a bit embarrassed that his belly jiggle like jello. Sully went up and weighed in at 267 a hefty 27 lbs gain. Sully got off and went around high fiving the team on his gain. Phobus went up after Sully and his weight went up from 230 to 250 a decent 20 lbs. He smiled and patted his belly which a growled a bit and he went red of embarrassment as a couple players giggled at his belly response. Tadashi went up and he went up from 225 to 255 a whopping 30 lbs gain. “This is another role model for you guys to follow and look up to. “said the Coach as he jolted down the gains for the team. Tadashi went up to the Coach and whispered something in to the Coach’s ear and Coach nodded back.

“Aunt Cass just expanded her bakery and got in two new giant industrial size ovens so her production doubled and she is try to make her second bakery cookbook and she asked me and the team would like to be the taste testers. 155132211111.content:
Adam sat in front of the rose. The curse, it was strengthening. He could feel its power taking him over more so, but he didn’t know what was affecting him.

He gazed into the deep red petals, if the rose died, he would be a monster forever. “People used to adore me...” he stated aloud, “I haven’t looked at myself in so long, I have no idea what’s become of me, I just know that I’m not who I was. Let me be happy again.”

The rose shimmered almost in protest to the Beast, he growled, if he could smash it he would but that would be a dumb move.

“That girl is my only hope.” Then he turned and backed out of the West Wing.

Suddenly, his stomach lurched. And a feeling of unfamiliar hunger washed him over.

GLLLRRRPP

Beast realized he was hungry so he stomped into the kitchen and was greeted by Lumiere.

“Uhh master, hello!” Lumiere stammered.
“Just get me a meal NOW.” Beast roared at him, Lumiere backed away into the kitchen and told his staff of objects to cook ASAP.

Beast took an end seat of the elongated table. His stomach roared again, he almost felt bigger.

Soon, plates upon plates of meats, desserts, and other foods were balanced on the table.

Adam began to dig in, with no signs of gratitude or enjoyment while eating, he just ate ravenously.

“MMMMMCH UUHRGH UUURRRP” he groaned while eating, it was almost pleasurable.

Little did he know, his body grew with every bite he put into his mouth.

It has been a year since Belle kissed the Beast and broke the curse on the castle and its staff. The beast was transformed into his human form of a handsome prince. The staff also regained their human forms and the castle and the surrounding forest was transformed back into its beautiful state. Adam and Belle had a grand wedding with the castle staff and the villagers. After the wedding Adam became King and Belle became Queen and Adam’s parents past away when he was a young child. Adam quickly transition into his kingship role and taught Belle about royal or noble manners and culture. Adam would host foreign kings and other important and powerful nobles. Belle quickly learned all about high class and their manners. While Adam entertained the husbands or men, Belle would host the women and there were some dignities that were unsure as Belle was not a high ranking birth, but a commoner who marred into high status. Those fears were laid to rest as Belle made her hosting an experience to be never forgotten. Many royals and nobles were impressed by Belle and it help Adam gaining more trade, military and political agreements.

After that whirlwind of Adam and Belle reconnecting their kingdom to the outside and surround kingdoms. Belle knew that Adam would be very busy the kingdom and making decisions on who to improve. She also knew that her father would be very busy as that with the better trade agreements her village has expanded and got more villagers and shops, one of them a hardware and crafts store that her father loves to use in his inventions. Adam did tell her that could pass the time by learning new skills. Belle then decided to improve her handcraft skills by taking lessons with Madame Armoire who was the wardrobe for a few months. After she then went to Chef Bouche who was the former stove when the curse was in place. He is the head of the royal kitchen was ecstatic to teach Belle the culinary art. Chef Bouche told Belle that she is very talented as a cook or baker.

Currently, Belle is pushing a mobile trolley filled with freshly baked croissants, pain au chocolates and madeleines with hot chocolate with cinnamon. She stops outside on her husband private study. She knocks on the closed doors. She heard her husband tell her to enter. She went in and saw her husband sitting in an elegant chair and in front on his desk filled with papers that was disorganized. She saw her husband wearing his white tunic and black tights.

“Hello my big beast of a husband. Hungry ? I figured that you might need a snack as you are busy running this kingdom.” said Belle as she used her pet name for her husband. Since the breaking of the curse Adam would sometimes have had beast like tendencies like eating food without utensil, but he had control over most of these moments.

“Well thanks for the food, but that seems like a lot of food.” said Adam as Belle moves some papers into a neat stack and moves from of the food and drink onto that part of the desk.

“Well I notice that you didn’t eat much at breakfast. “said Belle as she noticed that Adam did eat more than average man. She did sometimes wonder how he stays in shape due to the amount of food he eats, but she assumes that he exercises when she is not around.

“Well I baked these treats myself for you. Now if you need me come to the library as I found this very interesting book. “said Belle and then gave him a kiss on the check and left his study with the door closed.

Adam did look at the tray of baked good and they did smell good and his stomach let out of growl to eat the baked goods. He reached for one and bit into it and his mouth exposed and flavors and it was like eating a piece of heaven. He went back to read the papers on his desk. The papers were a mix of trade agreements and other problems when leading a kingdom. While filing and reading the papers he would subconsciously reach for the baked goods and drink the hot chocolate. He lost track of time by finishing the paperwork until he noticed that the tray of food is empty. He then heard a knock at the door and in came in….

“I heard that you wanted to meet with me. May I ask what you want to meet with about. You have me at a disadvantage. I don’t even need know your identity. “said Adam as he felt that this person may be a magic user like the enchantress that cursed him before.

“You don’t need to believe me or not, but when your kingdom was under the cruse, my sight over this region, was blocked by magic from the enchantress. She is one of many magic users, but think of me as a friendly magic user. “responded the oracle.

“I also give this warning, there is powerful natural wild magic in the castle and surrounding woods. Beware, the chained beast as it still sleeps, it hungers to food. Your wife holds the key to control this chaotic magic. “said the oracle as she finished her warning. She then disappeared in a flash of rainbow sparkling dust.

Adam stood there in bewilderment and shock. Thoughts were swirling around in his head as to what just happened. As he stood in confusing, he heard his voice being called and saw it was…

"Damn, man," he thinks to himself, "I might be the biggest guy here." But after a hard game his mind went straight for food. He finally finished the meal fit for a king. 3 Grand Macs (+ large fries on each), an original recipe bucket, a meat lovers pizza and a 2 liter of Coke later, he felt stuffed! His workout shirt rode up to reveal a massively swollen gut, and even his workout shorts felt slightly tighter. He must have had 5 pounds of food! In the 2 weeks since his playoff game it had come time for that magical American holiday: Super Bowl Sunday. Over the last couple of weeks Dontari had taken it pretty easy; his visits to the gym less exhausting and, today, non existent. Had he checked his weight, he'd have known that he had just hit 352 pounds!
The table was set with all the gameday snacks. Chips, popcorn, candy, wings, nachos, beer, soda, you name it! It was a small party, just him and a few teammates. But they had eaten at another teammates house earlier, so as the pre game ended and the intense game (Philly vs. New England) began, only one guy was eating.
"Yo Dontari, you gonna slow down boy?" Asked d-lineman Vic Beasley.
"Yeah, but man this stuff is too good!"
It's 10:30 pm and an exhilirating game had finished. But even more impressive was the 2 bags of chips, 5 beers, ANOTHER 2 liter of Coke, and pounds of candy and appetizers sitting, uncomfortably, in Dontari's gassy stomach. His teammates gone, he went to bed knowing he had overdone it again.
